40001001	Nnya Yesu Kristo banantii ayooto ninle n-ya mmle nɛ. Ɔka Dawid kɔna kuale kuakye ni Abraham leyo kamɛ.
40001002	Abraham lalofo Isak, ni di Isak kafɔɔ lalofo Yakob wɔ nialofo ni Yuda ku babilɛma nɛ.
40001003	Yuda kafɔɔ ku ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ Tamai lalofo Peres ku Sera, ni di Sera kafɔɔ lalofo Hesron nɛ. Hesron kafɔɔ lalofo Aram.
40001004	Aram kafɔɔ lataka aalofo Aminadab, ni di Aminadab kolofo Naheson nɛ. Naheson kafɔɔ lalofo Salmon.
40001005	Ni di Salmon kafɔɔ kɔtaka anlofo Boas wɔ di ɔya latoole ni Rahab nɛ. Boas kafɔɔ lalofo Obed, ɔya niale Rut nɛ. Obed kafɔɔ lataka aalofo Yisai,
40001006	ni di Yisai kafɔɔ kolofo Ɔka Dawid nɛ. Diɛyɔ ni di ɔka Dawid suoto diɛlaase ni di obe wɔ kamɛ di Babilon batii lamufũ Israel batii baasifiko ni sɛlanle kamɛ di Babilon kasɔ suoto yi, kɔna nwu ninle nko mmle nikɔwa ni nɛ. Dawid ku ɔsanko wɔ niale ni Uria ɔsɔfo lalofo Salomo.
40001007	Ni di Salomo lalofo Rehoboam nɛ, ni di Rehoboam kolofo Abiya nɛ. Abiya kafɔɔ kolofo Asa nɛ.
40001008	Ni di Asa lalofo Yehosafat nɛ. Yehosafat kafɔɔ lalofo Yoram, ni di Yoram kafɔɔ kolofo Usia nɛ.
40001009	Usia lalofo Yotam, ni di Yotam lalofo Ahas nɛ, ni di Ahas kafɔɔ kolofo Hiskia nɛ.
40001010	Hiskia lalofo Manase, ni di Manase lalofo Amon nɛ, ni di Amon kafɔɔ kolofo Yosia nɛ.
40001011	Yosia lalofo Yekonia ku babilɛma suɔtɔbi di sɛlanle kamɛ di Babilon batii kasɔ suoto.
40001012	Diɛyɔ ni di obe wɔ di Israel batii ladie ni di Babilon kasɔ suoto di sɛlanle kamɛ, diɛlaase ni di obe wɔ baalofo ni Yesu, bawa nɔɔ ayooto ninle n-ya mmle nɛ. Yekonia lalofo Sealtiel, ni di Sealtiel kafɔɔ lalofo Serubabel nɛ.
40001013	Serubabel lalofo Abihud, ni di Abihud lalofo Eliakim nɛ. Ni di Eliakim kafɔɔ kolofo Asor nɛ.
40001014	Asor lalofo Sadok, ni di Sadok lalofo Akim nɛ. Ni di Akim kafɔɔ kolofo Elihud nɛ.
40001015	Elihud lalofo Eleasar, ni di Eleasar kafɔɔ kolofo Matan nɛ.
40001016	Matan lalofo Yakob, ni di Yakob kafɔɔ kɔtaka anlofo Yosef wɔ niayɔ ni Maria wɔ nialofo ni Yesu wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni alɛ Kristo nɛ.
40001017	Nkpo oso diayɔ ni di Abraham suoto dialaase ni di Dawid suoto yi, diabla lefosi ana anà. Diayɔ ni di Dawid suoto kafɔɔ dialase ni di obe wɔ di Babilon batii lamufũ Israel batii baasifiko ni kasɔ lɛma suoto kafɔɔ, diabla lefosi ana anà. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ diayɔ ni di obe nwu kamɛ dialaase ni di obe wɔ baalofo ni Kristo nwu kafɔɔ, diabla lefosi ana anà.
40001018	Nnya mmle okle diawa ni fiɛ baalofo ni Yesu Kristo. Baakaalɛ Maria baata Yosef, kafɔɔ fiɛ babayɔ ni bawo yi, Maria lanya alɛ nfɛ alaka lɛmɛ. Yaa Ninwuna Klekle niata diawa ninkpo.
40001019	Yosef lale otii tinini di Yaa anu. Kafɔɔ atamiɛ alɛ ookpee nwɔ sinunsɔ di batii anu. Nioso aabla disibu alɛ, oodiɛ nwɔ buɛɛ.
40001020	Obe wɔ ɔɔbla ni disibu le mmle aasifi aalaate nii, Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ ladiki suoto aatuo nwɔ di kɔlaafɔ kamɛ, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Yosef, Dawid leyo kamɛ obi, tanyɛkɛ Maria ɔsɔfɔ lɛfɔ ɔyɔ. Diekye lɛmɛ le alaka ni yi, Yaa Ninwuna osie kamɛ diekye.
40001021	Abalofo osuɔtɔbi, faatika nwɔ leyooto falɛ Yesu, diekye nnwɔɔ nimadiki batii nɔɔ ankyeko sikpile lɛma kamɛ nɛ.”
40001022	Asaa ya mmle amuu lawa kaanya alɛ, sɛlaa se di Yaa labuɛ aafenko ni di ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ nɔɔ suoto kawa kaanya. Aabuɛ alɛ,
40001023	“Kabitɛ ka nínanye ni osuɔtɔ, malaka lɛmɛ, anlofo osuɔtɔbi. Babalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ Emanuel.” Lɛsɔdiki ninle alɛ Yaa nsiko wo.
40001024	Nkpo oso obe wɔ di Yosef lasɛnkɛ nii, aayɔ Maria aabla ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ fɛ mmle di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ nii.
40001025	Kafɔɔ, Yosef ku Maria ditatofo bawo fɛ ɔsa ku ɔsɔfɔ dialaase di obe wɔ aalofo ni obi nɔɔ suɔtɔbi nwu nkpo. Ni di Yosef latika nwɔ leyooto alɛ Yesu nɛ.
40002001	Di obe wɔ di Herode latoole ni sɛka yi, ni baalofo Yesu di okpoo wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Betlehem di Yudea kasɔ suoto nɛ. Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, ni di banumbentɛ ba ninye ni asaa di awɛntrɛbi suoto bawo lakye kufĩ katunkɔ baawa Yerusalem nɛ.
40002002	Ni baakaalɛ alɛ, “Ɔfɛ beelofo obi wɔ nimale ni sɛka di Yuda batii kasɔ suoto? Buɔnya lɛwɛntrɛbi nɔɔ di kufĩ katunkɔ. Nioso butɔɔwa bulɛ buɔbatansa nwɔ nɛ.”
40002003	Obe wɔ di Ɔka Herode lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle yi, ɔfɔɔ lasifi nwɔ ku Yerusalem batii bamuu osie kanya.
40002004	Nkpo oso aalɛɛ Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo bamuu ku kufiofa asaa batuotɛ aasiisa, ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ɔfɛ babalofo Kristo nwu nkpo?”
40002005	Nfa nfɛ bɔɔtɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Betlehem okpoo di Yudea kasɔ suoto babalofo nwɔ. Diekye nimmle okle di Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ lɛkpana ni alɛ,
40002006	‘Afɔ Betlehem di Yuda kasɔ, diele okpoo biibii fale di Yuda sekpoo kamɛ. Diekye afɔ kamɛ di tunletɛ kplɛ nwu madie ankye, amaleko kale nii Israel batii katũ.’ ”
40002007	Nkpo oso Herode lalɛɛ bafɔɔ nwu nkpo niakye ni kufĩ katunkɔ di ɔlɔɔkɔ kaawofakɔ, ni aakaalɛ ma aanu obe wɔ kamɛ tutuutu baanya lɛwɛntrɛbi nwu nkpo lakyɔɔ nii.
40002008	Ninfɛ aadiki ma osuku alɛ batɔɔkyɛ Betlehem nɛ. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitɔɔkyɛ biɛlaawolaa obisɔ nwu nkpo nwaa. Nse biɛnyɔɔ, biekple biwa biɛbatɔkɔ mi alɛ ami kafɔɔ kakyɛ nnaasumu nwɔ.”
40002009	-
40002010	Nioso bafɔɔ nwu nkpo layefe osuku baasifi. Obe wɔ nfɛ bakyɛ ni di osuku, baakple baanya lɛwɛntrɛbi nwu nkpo tutuutu baanya ni di kufĩ katunkɔ. Baanya ni nii, suoto layɔɔ ma osie kanya. Lɛwɛntrɛbi nwu nkpo laleko ma katũ diakyɛ dialaayila di lɛba le di obisɔ nwu nkpo late nii.
40002011	Ni baabuo di leyo nwu nkpo kamɛ nɛ. Nioso obe wɔ baanya ni obisɔ nwu nkpo ku ɔya Maria yi, baase akunkyi kaasɔ, baawakosa asi kasɔ baasumu nwɔ. Ninfɛ baasɛkɛtɛ kotofoe lɛma baadiki atasaa ya awo niefũ ni kɔya ninle ni koto sɛɛle, olufuii ku kloboo baatɔɔ nɛ.
40002012	Nni kamaa, baafe di osuku bamba suoto baasifi okpoo lɛma. Diekye Yaa lasĩ ɔlaa aata ma kɔɔlaafɔ kamɛ alɛ, bataasinkple baalaafe di Herode ɔkyɛ.
40002013	Obe wɔ baafɔɔ nwu nkpo lasifi ni kamaa yi, Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii ladiki suoto aatuo Yosef di kɔɔlaafɔ kamɛ. Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Herode mawolaa obisɔ nwu nkpo alɛ oolo. Nkpo oso taka faakpaa obisɔ nwu nkpo ku ɔya bietoso bisifi Egipte kasɔ suoto. Biesiɛ ninfa dielaase di obe wɔ makple ntɔkɔfɔ nlɛ kple fawa ni.”
40002014	Kakyɛ nwu nkpo Yosef lakpaa obisɔ nwu nkpo ku ɔya baatoso baasifi Egipte kasɔ suoto.
40002015	Baasiɛ ninfa dialaase di obe wɔ di Herode lakpi nii. Nle mmle lawa ninkpo, diata alɛ ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa labuɛ aafenko ni di ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ nɔɔ suoto lawa kaanya alɛ, “Egipte kamɛ lalɛɛ obi nii lakyeko.”
40002016	Di obe wɔ di Herode latofo alɛ bafɔɔ nwu niakye ni kufĩ katunkɔ lakyɔnkyɔ nwɔ ni yi, ɔblɔ lafiɛ nwɔ osie kanya. Nkpo oso aakpee bakpɛtɛ nɔɔ baakyɛ Betlehem ku aba ya niɛtɛɛtɛ ni nfa fɛɛ, alɛ baalaalo babi suɔtɔbi ba nintoofũ ni alɛɛ anyɔ ku mba ninayifũ ni nkpo. Aabla nkpo ta mmle okle di bafɔɔ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ ni obe wɔ baanya ni lɛwɛntrɛbi nwu nkpo.
40002017	Babisɔ ba mmle olo lata alɛ ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yeremia labuɛ aatɛ ni lawa kaanya. Aabuɛ alɛ,
40002018	“Batii lanu sɛlɔ sewo di Rama alɛ boowi kaku osie kanya ku sɛnyaami. Rahel nikowi anta babi nɔɔ. Eesĩ kafɔɔ alɛ batanlo sɔɔ, diekye babi nɔɔ nwu nkpo lekpi.”
40002019	Obe wɔ di Herode lakpi ni yi, Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii ladiki suoto aatuo Yosef kɔɔlaafɔ kamɛ di Egipte.
40002020	Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Taka, faakpaa obisɔ nwu nkpo ku ɔya biekple bisifi Israel kasɔ suoto. Diekye batii ba nikomiɛ alɛ balo ni obisɔ nwu nkpo ntookpi.”
40002021	Nkpo oso Yosef lataka, ni aakpaa obisɔ nwu nkpo ku ɔya baakple baasifi Israel kasɔ suoto nɛ.
40002022	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di Yosef lanu alɛ Arkelao wɔ ninle ni Herode obi nfɛ ninsi ni di ote lekpomii suoto oole ni sɛka di Yudea yi, aayɛkɛ nfa ɔkyɛ. Nioso Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii lasĩ aatɔɔ kɔɔlaafɔ kamɛ alɛ atankyɛ nfa, ninfɛ aakɛ aasifi Galilea kasɔ ntɛɛ nwu suoto nɛ.
40002023	Obe wɔ aalaabuo ni nfa, aasifi aalaasiɛ di okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Nasaret. Nfa lɛma ɔlaasiɛ lata alɛ, ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ labuɛ baatɛ ni alɛ, “Batii malɛɛ nwɔ ni Nasaret otii yi,” diawa kaanya ninkpo.
40003001	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane lakyɛ Yudea ɔfaafuu kasɔ suoto, aakye kasɔ aatooyie Yaa ɔlaa lɛkya,
40003002	aatoobuɛ alɛ, “Bidiɛ sikpile ɔbla, diekye Yaa sɛka kalekɔ ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ.”
40003003	Yohane wɔ mmle niale otii wɔ suoto di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia labuɛ aatɛ alɛ, “Otii onwii kɔfaa di ɔfaafuu kamɛ ambuɛ alɛ, ‘Bilolaa osuku bitɛ bita Saate nwu ɔwabee. Bikyɛkyɛsa aba ya abafe ni bitɛ nwɔ!’ ”
40003004	Awu ya di Yohane lakpee ni yi, kapupɔnkɔ sinwini baayɔ baabla n-ya. Ni aayɔ bɔkɛɛ kukũ okũ aatika ofiamɛ nɛ. Alesaa nɔɔ kafɔɔ niale bablɔ ku akpakyekyee.
40003005	Batii lakye Yerusalem okpoo ku Yudea kasɔ kamuu suoto ku sekpoo se simuu niɛtɛɛtɛɛ ni Yordan okle baawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ.
40003006	Baadiki sikpile lɛma baabuɛ, ni aakpeesa ma Yaa ntu di Yordan okle kamɛ nɛ.
40003007	Obe wɔ di Yohane lanya Farisi batii ku Saduki batii kpinwu lawa ni ɔkyɛ nɔɔ alɛ akpeesa ma ni Yaa ntu yi, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye kɔsaanwu kɔna! Owe niɛka ye alɛ biatoso di Yaa lɛkanko le nikɔwa ni kamɛ?
40003008	Bibla asaa ya nimatuo alɛ bitookyi ni siikple lee kamɛ.
40003009	Bitanyu bilɛ biatɔkɔ suoto lee bilɛ Abraham banantii bile. Diekye kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, Yaa mafuo afuɔ ya mmle ɔyɔ ɔbla banantii anta Abraham.
40003010	“Nunua bia yi, batɔɔyɔ kafɛ beese di awoso sidu suoto kofokofoko. Kowoso lele ninantika abi biene yi, bababudi kũ, man-yɔ kũ mankpee di ɔtɔ kamɛ.
40003011	“Ami yi, ntu kɔyɔ nkpeesa ye Yaa ntu, diotuo alɛ bitookyi ni siitu lee kamɛ biediɛ ni sikpile ɔbla. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ ninkɔwa ni kaamaa nii yi, abayɔ Ninwuna Klekle ku ɔtɔ ankpeesa ye Yaa ntu. Otii nwu nkpo lɛtaka katɔɔ alenke mi, ninansiɛko alɛ katuka nwɔ ni bia ntokota.
40003012	Akle kɔfɛɛ nɔɔ ninnɛɛ kamɛ, abafɛɛlɛ kufuo andiki ni di kamɔɔ kamɛ, an-yɔ kamɔɔ ankpete ni di owu kamɛ. Kafɔɔ abafiɛ kufuo nwu di ɔtɔ wɔ ninnaa ni kaloo kamɛ!”
40003013	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, Yesu lakye Galilea aawa Yohane nfũ di Yordan okle kotoko alɛ, Yohane akpeesa nwɔ Yaa ntu.
40003014	Kafɔɔ Yohane lamiɛ alɛ ookyisa nwɔ ni disibu nwu oso, aatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Ami dikpe ni alɛ lɛwa ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ feekpesɛɛ Yaa ntu. Diele afɔ nikawa ɔkyɛ nii!”
40003015	Kafɔɔ Yesu ladiki kanya aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nu kasɔ, faata bubla ninkpo nunua. Diekye nle mmle nimatuo alɛ buɔbla Yaa dibiesaa nɛ.” Ninfɛ di Yohane lanu kasɔ aatɔɔ nɛ.
40003016	Nioso obe wɔ baakpeesa Yesu Yaa ntu baaloo ni aatoodie ni di ntu nwu kamɛ, nfanwu osi niasɛkɛtɛ, ni aanya Yaa Niwuna latoosoo fɛ mmle di lɛlaapɔɔ nsoo nii, diabasiɛ nwɔ di suoto nɛ.
40003017	Ninfɛ di sɛlɔ lakye osi siabuɛ alɛ, “Nnya obi nii bɔmbɔtɛ ninle nwɔ mmle nɛ, oobuo mi anu nwaa.”
40004001	Ninfɛ di Yaa Ninwuna lakpaa Yesu aasifiko ɔfaafuu kamɛ alɛ, Abonsam alaasɔ nwɔ anyu nɛ.
40004002	Di obe wɔ di Yesu ntoonii kanya kakũ ku kakyɛ ayi afosi ana eeloo nii, kɔka laklee nwɔ.
40004003	Ninfɛ di Abonsam lakyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ aalaatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse Yaa obi fale, ni tɔkɔ afuɔ ya mmle falɛ akple alesaa.”
40004004	Kafɔɔ Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Diele alesaa lete suoto di otii nsiɛ nkpa. Kafɔɔ ansiɛ nkpa di ɔlaa lele niedie kuokye Yaa kanya kamɛ.’ ”
40004005	Ninfɛ di Abonsam lakpaa Yesu aasifiko Yerusalem ninle ni Yuda batii okpoo kplɛ klekle nwu kamɛ. Ninfɛ aayɔ nwɔ aalaatika di Yuda batii Olekatakɔ katakalekɔ nɛ.
40004006	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse Yaa obi fale yi, faayefe fakye ninfũ fasifi kasɔ. Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Yaa makyesee batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ alɛ babakafɔ fɔ ku nnɛɛ lɛma, alɛ flaayɔ kɔkpaa lɛfɔ fasa di afuɔ kuanwii suoto.’ ”
40004007	Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Kafɔɔ Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ nwu nkpo lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Tansɔ Saate Yaa lɛfɔ faanyu.’ ”
40004008	Ninfɛ di Abonsam nwu nkpo lakple aakpaa Yesu aasifiko kobokote takale kunwii nsintɛɛ. Ninfɛ aadiki kayi ka mmle sɛka nlekɔ mmuu ku sɛlɛ ninya aatuo nwɔ nɛ.
40004009	Ni aatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Nse fabapɛ akunkyi kaasɔ fansumu mi yi, kamayɔ asaa ya mmle ammuu nta fɔ.”
40004010	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Satana, kyɛ mi di ɔlɔɔkɔ fasifi! Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Saate Yaa lɛfɔ lete faase katũ kaasɔ fanta. Lete nɔɔ kafɔɔ faatansa.’ ”
40004011	Ninfɛ di Abonsam nwu nkpo lakyɛ aadiɛ Yesu nɛ. Ni di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ lawa babakyakaako nwɔ nɛ.
40004012	Di obe wɔ di Yesu lanu alɛ batoomufũ Yohane bɛɛtɛ ni di leyo katenkɔ yi, ni aasifi Galilea nɛ.
40004013	Atasiɛ di Nasaret, kafɔɔ aasifi aalaasiɛ di Kapernaum, okpoo wɔ ninte ni di Galilea Lekpo ɔlɔɔkɔ di Sebulon ku Naftali kasɔ suoto.
40004014	Aasiɛ ninfa diata alɛ Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ lawa kaanya alɛ,
40004015	-
40004016	“Sebulon ku Naftali batii ba ninsi ni di osuku wɔ niefe ni lekpo ku Yordan okle kamaa, ku Galilea kasɔ suoto mananle ni Yuda batii! Batii ba ninsi ni di ditunu kamɛ manya lɛkpa kplɛ. Ku mba ninsi ni di kasɔ ka di kukpi kole ni sɛka yi, lɛkpa makpa ninkpete ma di suoto.”
40004017	Diayɔ ni di obe nwu kamɛ yi, ni di Yesu lakye ɔlaa nɔɔ kasɔ lɛkya oyie alɛ, “Bidiɛ sikpile ɔbla, diekye Yaa sɛka olebee ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ!”
40004018	Obe wɔ di Yesu latoofe ni di Galilea lekpo kotoko yi, ni aanya basuɔtɔbi banyɔ banwii nɛ. Mma niale Simon, nwɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Petro ku obilɛma Andrea, baatɔɔtaa asawu di lekpo nwu kamɛ, diekye kɔkpaku badikitɛ baale.
40004019	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biwa biɛbatikankoe, matuo ye mmle mandiki ni batii.”
40004020	Nfanwu, ni baadiɛ asawu lɛma baatɛ, baatikanko nwɔ nɛ.
40004021	Obe wɔ aakyɛ ni sitũ kɛɛkɛ, ni aakple aanya Yakobo ku obilɛma Yohane ninle ni Sebedeo babi nɛ. Baasiɛ di oklo lɛma kamɛ manko ote lɛma baatooloso asawu lɛma. Ni di Yesu lalɛɛ ma nɛ.
40004022	Nfanwu, ni baadiɛ oklo ku ote lɛma, baatikanko nwɔ nɛ.
40004023	Yesu lakyɛ aakyi Galilea kasɔ kamuu suoto aatootuo batii asaa di Yuda batii nsiisakɔ. Aatooyie lɛkya di Yaa sɛka ole ɔlaa biene nwu suoto. Ni aayɔɔsa batii ba ninkofiɛ ni sifiɛ ate ate bamuu sifiɛ nɛ.
40004024	Leyooto nɔɔ lakyaka Siria kasɔ kamuu suoto. Nkpo oso batii lakpaa batii ba bamuu nikofiɛ ni sifiɛ ate ate baawako ɔkyɛ nɔɔ monoofuo ni lele kuniwii ɔbla. Batii ba di anwuna kpile nisi ni kaamɛ ɔɔkɔkpɛko ma nii, mba nikofiɛ ni kakpibubu, ku mba niekpi ni kakyɛkakyɛ. Ni di Yesu layɔɔsa bamuu lɛma ofiɛ nɛ.
40004025	Batii dikudi kpinwu lakye Galilea ku eekpoo kplɛ lefosi nwu kamɛ ku Yerusalem ku Yudea kasɔ suoto ku Yordan okle kamaa fɛɛ, baawa babatikanko nwɔ.
40005001	Di Yesu lanya ni batii dikudi nwu nkpo yi, ni aasifi kobokote kunwii suoto nɛ. Obe wɔ aasiɛ ni kaasɔ yi, ni di basaatekete nɔɔ lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ nɛ.
40005002	Ni aakyako ma asaa otuo alɛ,
40005003	“Suoto siyɔɔ batii ba nietofo alɛ bale ni bapiitɛ di ninwuna kamɛ, diekye lelema ninle Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nɛ.
40005004	Suoto siyɔɔ batii ba nikowi ni sɛnyaami, diekye Yaa makpee ma kɔnɛɛ kaafutu.
40005005	Suoto siyɔɔ batii ba niɛwakosa ni suoto kasɔ, diekye mma nimale kayi ka mmle asaa nɛ.
40005006	Suoto siyɔɔ batii ba di anu lɛsɛɛ ma alɛ boosiɛ ni nkpa tinini di Yaa anu, diekye babawɛ lɛsaa le nimayɔɔ ma ni kafutu.
40005007	Suoto siyɔɔ batii ba ninnya ni bawo lɛma nyaami, diekye mma di Yaa manya nyaami nɛ.
40005008	Suoto siyɔɔ batii ba siitu lɛma ntika ni lɛɛba ninwii, diekye mma nimanya Yaa nɛ.
40005009	Suoto siyɔɔ batii ba ninlolaa ni batii ntɛɛ, diekye mma di Yaa malɛɛ alɛ babi nɔɔ nɛ.
40005010	Suoto siyɔɔ batii ba baatii ntikanko bɔɔnya ni dibuo, ta basi ni nkpa tinini di Yaa anu oso, diekye lelema ninle Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nɛ.
40005011	“Suoto siyɔɔ ye nse batii letufa ye, bɛɛta ye biɛnya dibuo, bɛɛlaa sɛlaa kuafunu beetika ye, ta bitikanko mi ni oso.
40005012	Binya suoto lɛyɔɔ biɛpɔ, diekye letota lee mpɔ di Yaa kafa. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ baatikanko Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ ba niale ye ni katũ, baata ma baanya dibuo nɛ.
40005013	“Ote bite fɛ mba biɛta batii bamuu. Kafɔɔ nse mba nwu nkpo ɔmɛnɛfɛ nɔɔ ntooloo, lɛsalɛsaa kuninwii nsinnaa babayɔ mankpee mi ni ɔmɛnɛfɛ. Disinnaa nfasũ kunnwii, nioso ɔyɔ man-yɔ manwii batii nnanafu mi manfe.
40005014	“Ote bite fɛ lɛkpa biɛta kayi kamuu. Okpoo wɔ beebudi ni koobokote suoto ninwofa diidii.
40005015	Otii kuonwii ninsɔ kandiɛ aayɔ lɛsaa aatĩi nwu. Kafɔɔ ɔyɔ an-yɔ antika lɛɛba le kubakpa kunta ni batii bamuu leeyo.
40005016	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ dikpe ni ɔsaabla lee lɛkpa fɛ kandiɛ kuɔta batii nɛ. Ni babanya asaa biene lee ya biɔbla nii, man-yɔ lɛtansa manta Teeye wɔ ninkpe ni kaatoo.”
40005017	Yesu lakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Bitannyu bilɛ ɔwa lɛwa nlɛ kɔmaklee Mose kufiofa ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ asaa otuo ndiki. Ninwa nlɛ kɔmaklee nya ndiki. Kafɔɔ ɔwa lɛwa nlɛ asaa ya beetuo ni kawa kaanya.
40005018	Komiɛ nlɛ bitofo bilɛ, obe wɔ di osi ku kasɔ ka mmle lɛnya kakpe ni yi, blɔbakyɛlɛnsa kufiofa ko mmle bɛɛkpana bɛɛtɛ nii bia kabɛfɛɛ nɔɔ dilabadie kaamɛ, diɛlaase di obe wɔ di asaa ya kuufiofa nwu nkpo kotuo ni lɛwa ni kaanya.
40005019	Nkpo oso nse otii owo lɛtaka eeyila di kufiofa ko mmle bia kabɛfɛɛ nɔɔ suoto, eetuo batii bamba kafɔɔ alɛ baabla ninkpo yi, abale otii yɛntɛle di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ nse otii owo lɛbla di kufiofa ko mmle suoto, eetuo batii bamba kafɔɔ alɛ babla ninkpo yi, abale otii finle di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ.
40005020	Nkpo oso kɔtɔkɔ ye klekle ntikiti nlɛ, fiɛ bibafuo ni Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo obuo yi, diediki biesiɛ nkpa tinini fɛ mmle okle di Yaa komiɛ nii, dielenkee kufiofa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii nle.
40005021	“Bitoonu, baatɔkɔ bakofo alɛ, ‘Bitanlo otii.’ Ni otii lele niɛbla nkpo yi, dikpe ni bɛɛkanko nwɔ.
40005022	Kafɔɔ nunua yi, ami kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, otii lele niɛnya ɔblɔ eekpeeko obilɛma yi, babakanko nwɔ. Otii lele kafɔɔ niɛtɔkɔ owo nɔɔ alɛ, ‘Faale otii kuonwii’ yi, baalɛɛ nwɔ kaakankɔ di banɔɔfo anu. Otii lele kafɔɔ nimatɔkɔ owo nɔɔ alɛ, ‘Buutɛ fale’ yi, Yaa mananfi nwɔ kootoko di kawɔɔ ɔtɔ dibiɔ nwu kamɛ.
40005023	Nkpo oso nse fakle lɛtasaa falɛ fɔɔkyɛnko Yaa di Ole ɔta nɔɔ akyikye suoto feenyuma falɛ ɔlaa owo nsi di minko owo lɛfɔ ntɛɛ yi,
40005024	nfanwu diɛ lɛtasaa lɛfɔ nwu nkpo fatɛ di oleɔta akyikye nwu nkpo katũ, faasifi bilaakpete bawo ntu ku owo lɛfɔ nwu nkpo fiɛ faawa fabayɔ lɛtasaa lɛfɔ nwu nkpo fata Yaa ole.
40005025	“Nse otii owo alɛ ɔɔkpaa fɔ ankyɛnko kakankɔ yi, miɛ obe bielolaa bawo ntɛɛ fiɛ biɛlaabuo kakankɔ nwu nkpo. Nse diele nkpo fiɛ biɛkyɛ biɛlaabuo kakankɔ nwu nkpo yi, dibafuo ɔwa alɛ abayɔ fɔ ankpee di kantɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ, kantɛ kafɔɔ n-yɔ fɔ ankpee di bamufũtɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ, mantɛfɔ leeyo.
40005026	Nwaako kɔta fɔ fantofo nlɛ, nfa fɔɔwa ɔbasiɛ diɛlaase di obe wɔ fatɔɔta ni letokonanfi lɛfɔ koto yɛntɛle.
40005027	“Bienu bilɛ beebuɛ alɛ, ‘Bitankpee asɔnɔ.’
40005028	Kafɔɔ ami kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, osuɔtɔ lele niɛnya ɔsanko eeklee nwɔ ɔkɔnsɔ kamaa, atookpee asɔnɔ ku nnwɔɔ kofokofoko di otu nɔɔ kamɛ.
40005029	Nkpo oso nse koletanɛɛ ninu lɛfɔ kɔta fɔ faambla okpile yi, faadiki ni fayu. Diekye yi, nse suoto sina lɛfɔ lɛba lewo leyu yi, dilɛ dilenke alɛ baayɔ suoto sina lɛfɔ simuu manfuki mamkpee di kawɔɔ ɔtɔ dibiɔ nwu kamɛ.
40005030	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ nse koletanɛɛ lɛfɔ kɔta fɔ fambla okpile yi, faabudi kũ fayu. Diekye yi, nse suoto sina lɛfɔ lɛba lewo leyu yi, dilɛ dilenke alɛ baayɔ suoto sina lɛfɔ simuu manfuki mankpee di kawɔɔ ɔtɔ dibiɔ nwu kamɛ.
40005031	“Beebuɛ alɛ, ‘Osuɔtɔ lele nialɛ oosĩ ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ yi, dikpe nii ɛɛtɔɔ kusinkũ.’
40005032	Kafɔɔ ami yi, kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse osuɔtɔ owo lesĩ ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ, dilanle asɔnɔ eekpee yi, ni atɔɔta ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ nwu nkpo lekpee asɔnɔ. Osuɔtɔ lele kafɔɔ niɛyɔ ɔsanko nwu beesĩ ni yi, atookpee asɔnɔ.
40005033	“Bitoonu kafɔɔ alɛ, baatɔkɔ bakofo alɛ, ‘Tansĩ ntam be fɛɛka ni ɔbla. Kafɔɔ bibla di lɛsaa le suooto biɛka ntam biɛta ni Saate nwu.’
40005034	Kafɔɔ nunua yi, kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ bitansinka lɛsalɛsaa kuniwii nse biobuɛ bilɛ bibabla lɛsaa lewo. Bitanka di osi diekye nfa ninle Yaa lɛkakpomii nɛ.
40005035	Ee bitanka di kasɔ, diekye Yaa nkpaa kasekɔ kale. Bitanka kafɔɔ di Yerusalem, diekye nwu ninle baka Ɔka nwu okpoo kplɛ nɛ.
40005036	Tanka bia disi lɛfɔ, diekye flabafuo disi onwini lɛfɔ onwii ɔbla kupu ee kuwɔfɔ.
40005037	Bita yii lee dibla yii, biɛta oowo lee dibla oowo. Nle mmle kamaa, lɛsaa lele biekple biebuɛ kyiditɛ nwu nfũ diekye.
40005038	“Bienu beebuɛ alɛ, ‘Nse feebiɛ owo lɛfɔ ninu yi, afɔɔ baabiɛ fɔ lele. Nse fɛɛkpa owo lɛfɔ lɛnyɛɛ yi, afɔɔ baakpa fɔ lele.’
40005039	Kafɔɔ nunua yi, kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse owo lee lɛbla ye okpile yi, bitambla nwɔ okpile nwu biakyisa. Nse otii owo lɛpɛ fɔ kɔnɛɛ kootokosi di oletanɛɛkyɛ yi, faamunikĩisa kɔmɛntu tokosi kafɔɔ faatɔɔ apɛ.
40005040	Nse otii owo alɛ ɔkpaa fɔ ankyɛnko kakankɔ anfũ fɔ awu ya fankpee fantɛ ni kasɔ yi, faadiki osi ale kafɔɔ fatɔɔ.
40005041	Nse sientɛ owo lesiɛ fɔ di suoto alɛ, tuka nwɔ atoo lɛkɔ ninwii yi, afɔ faatuka akɔ anyɔ.
40005042	Nse otii owo lɛkaalɛ fɔ lɛsaa yi, faatɔɔ. Nse otii owo kafɔɔ alɛ fɛnsa nwɔ lɛsaa yi, faafɛnsa nwɔ.
40005043	“Bienu beebuɛ alɛ, ‘Bibɔmbɔ basiɛwo lee, biekyidi balo lee!’
40005044	Kafɔɔ nunua yi, ami kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, bibɔmbɔ balo lee, biɛpɛ ɔlaa bita batii ba nikɔkpɛko ye ni.
40005045	Ni bibakple Teeye wɔ ninkpe ni kaatoo babi. Diekye nnwɔɔ ninta kufĩ nɔɔ mpɛ kunta batii kpile ku babienetɛ kyɛkyɛ. Anta kafɔɔ kanto nɔɔ nnɔɔ anta batii ba ninte ni tinini ku mba ninante ni tinini kyɛkyɛ.
40005046	Nse batii ba nimbɔmbɔ ye ni lete mimbɔmbɔ yi, ni letota nwaa kuniwii nnaa di Yaa mata ye nii. Diekye bia akpooto bafuntɛ kafɔɔ mmbla nkpo.
40005047	Nse basiɛwo lee lete minsɛɛsa yi, ni biibla lɛsaa le ninlenke ni baapɛ ni sɛfa. Bia batii ba ninanle ni bafũbanutɛ kafɔɔ mmbla nkpo.
40005048	Bile batii ba niewo ni niimu fɛ mmle okle di Teeye wɔ ninkpe ni kaatoo lewo ni niimu.
40006001	“Bilolaa binyu nwaa alɛ biɛbla sifutulɛ lee di lɛkpaka alɛ batii kanya. Nse biɛbla asaa ya mmle di lɛkpaka yi, ni letota kuninwii nnaa ye di Teeye nfũ di Yaa Kafa.
40006002	Nkpo oso nse fɔɔta piitɛ owo lɛsaa yi, tanyie ni lɛkya faata batii latofo fɛ mmle di baalaatɛ mbla ni di bawo kalɛɛkɔ ku lɛkpaka. Mambla nkpo ta mmle baatii katansa ma ni oso. Kafɔɔ kɔtɛ nta ye letofo nlɛ batoofũ letota lɛma kaayi ka mmle kamɛ kofokofoko.
40006003	Nkpo oso nse fɔɔkyakaako piitɛ owo yi, bla ni di osuku wɔ suoto di siɛwo lɛfɔ wɔ bia minko nwɔ minfe ni yi, dilaatofo lɛsaa le fɛɛbla ni.
40006004	Ni lɛsaa le fɛɛbla ni masiɛ di lewofa kamɛ. Ni Teefɔ wɔ kafɔɔ ninnya ni lɛsaa di lewofa kamɛ yi, matafɔ letota biene.
40006005	“Nse biɔpɛ ɔlaa minta Yaa yi, bitambla fɛ mmle baatii ba nimbla ni asaa di anu anu mbla nii. Mambɔmbɔ ɔtaka oyila di Yaa batii kasiisakɔ ku akpaka alɛ batii bamuu kanya ma alɛ bɔɔpɛ ɔlaa manta. Kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ batoofũ letota lɛma kofokofoko.
40006006	Nioso nse fɔɔpɛ ɔlaa fanta Yaa yi, faabuo leyo tenle lɛfɔ kamɛ, faasɛɛ, faapɛ ɔlaa fata Teefɔ wɔ manannya ni. Ni Teefɔ wɔ ninnya ni lɛsaa di kawofakɔ yi, abatafɔ letota biene.
40006007	“Ni nse fɔɔpɛ ɔlaa fanta Yaa yi, tambuɛ sɛlaa se ninanfĩ ni ninwii ku sɛnyɔ fɛ mmle di batii ba ninanfũ banu ni mbla nii. Diekye mannyu alɛ nse bɛɛpɛ ɔlaa bɛɛta afiɔ bɛɛklɛsa yi, ni annu nɛ.
40006008	Bitante fɛ mma, diekye Teeye Yaa n-ye lɛsaa le niefĩ ye ni kofokofoko fiɛ bia biɔkaalɛ nwɔ nii.
40006009	Nkpo oso nnya mmle okle dikpe ni biɛtɔɔpɛ ɔlaa biɛtɔɔta ni Yaa. Bilɛ, ‘Teewo wɔ ninkpe ni di osi, ta balɛɛ leyooto lɛfɔ klekle nwu ku dibu.
40006010	Sɛka kalekɔ lɛfɔ diwa wo kaamɛ. Ta babla fɔ dibiesaa kaasɔ ka mmle suoto fɛ mmle dikpe ni di osi.
40006011	Ta wo miɛ alesaa ya niefĩ wo ni.
40006012	Faayɔ sikpile loo fakye wo, fɛ mmle okle di awo kafɔɔ buɔyɔ buɔkyɛ ni batii ba niɛbla wo ni sikpile.
40006013	Tankpaa wo faakpee di ɔsɔ onyu siene kamɛ, kafɔɔ dikiwo fakyeko kpiletɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ. Diekye lelefɔ ninle sɛka kalekɔ ku osie ku leklekle ninnaa ni kaloo.’
40006014	“Diekye nse biɛyɔ bawo lee sikpile se bɛɛbla ye ni biɛkyɛ ma yi, ni Teeye wɔ ninkpe ni di osi kafɔɔ mayɔ sele ye se biɛɛbla ni, ankyɛ ye.
40006015	Kafɔɔ nse biɛyɔ bikyɛ bawo lee yi, ni Teeye kafɔɔ dilabayɔ siele ye se biɛɛbla ni akyɛ ye.”
40006016	Yesu latuo asaa alɛ, “Nse bionii kanya yi, bitankatu anu fɛ mmle di balaatɛ mbla nii. Diekye mankatu anu alɛ batii kanya mantɛ nsũ alɛ boonii kanya. Kɔtɛ nta ye mintofo bilɛ batoofũ letota lɛma kofokofoko.
40006017	Nse bionii kanya yi, biefoto anu biɛflɛɛ disi,
40006018	mmle okle di batii dilabatofo alɛ bionii ni kanya. Diediki Teeye wɔ manannya ni lete nikatofo. Ni Teeye wɔ ninnya ni asaa ya biɔbla ni di kawofakɔ mata ye letota biene.
40006019	“Bitansiisa lɛsaawɛ biatɛ biata suoto di kasɔ ka mmle suoto. Diekye kaasɔ ka mmle suoto yi, kɔbɔkɔbii ku kɔsanka nkpe manlalaasa nya nii, bayu kafɔɔ nkpe bababuo man-yu nya nii.
40006020	Kafɔɔ yi, bisiisa lɛsaawɛ lee bitɛ bita suoto di Yaa kafa. Nfa yi, kɔbɔkɔbii ku kɔsanka nnaa babalalaasa nya nii. Bayu kafɔɔ nnaa bababuo man-yu nya nii.
40006021	Diekye nfũ di lɛsaawɛ lɛfɔ nte nii, nfa kafɔɔ di otu lɛfɔ nwɛ nɛ.
40006022	“Otii anu nte fɛ kandiɛ ɛɛta suoto sina. Nse anu nlɛ fɔ yi, afɔ otii suoto sina lɛfɔ simuu nkpa.
40006023	Kafɔɔ nse anu diɛlɛ fɔ yi, suoto sina lɛfɔ simuu masiɛ di ditunu kamɛ. Nkpo oso nse lɛkpa le ninsi fɔ ni kaamɛ nle ditunu, ni dibatɛ ninwɔfɔ fɔ osie kanya.
40006024	“Otii kuonwii dilabafuo basaate banyɔ ɔkpɛ ɔbla. Diekye abasĩ onwii ambɔmbɔ onwii. Ee abakyɔɔ onwii kotoko, ansĩ onwii kotoko ɔkyɔɔ. Flɔbafuo Yaa ku lɛsaawɛ ɔkpɛ ɔbla ɔkpɔtɔɔsa.
40006025	Nkpo oso kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, bitantoobu diisi sikitii di nle biale minsiɛ ni nkpa ku nle bianyi ni ku nle biaklee ni sutoto nɛ. Binyu, sɛɛ nkpa diefũ kɔya dilenkee alesaa? Suoto sina kafɔɔ diefũ kɔya silenkee akleesaa?
40006026	Binyu bakansiɛ ba nikɔflɛlɛtɛ mankyi ni, mánkpɛ kofe, mánfee alesaa kafɔɔ bakpee di akpa. Kafɔɔ Teeye wɔ ninkpe ni di osi konyu ma obe lele. Biefũ kɔya bilenkee bakansiɛ?
40006027	Owe nimafuo dii ninwii ɔyɔ ɔkyakaa ninkpa nɔɔ suoto, nse eebu nkpa nɔɔ disi osie kanya?
40006028	“Nkpo oso bitambu diisi sikiitii di akleesaa lee suoto. Aye binyu mmle okle di atoto ya nin-yɛ ni di lepoo kamɛ nkpee ammuɔ ni. Mantaa oleteku ee baaloso abula baata suoto.
40006029	Kafɔɔ kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, bia Ɔka Salomo omu, di lɛsaawɛ nɔɔ nimuu kamɛ, atakpee awu alɛ onyu aawo lepoo kamɛ atoto kpeele ya mmle kaamɛ lɛma onwii.
40006030	Ni nse Yaa lekpe sɛfa se mmle okle ninkpe nkpa sekpeele miɛ, kɔɔsɛɛ babayɔ sĩ mankpe ni di ɔtɔ kamɛ sinfiɛ nii, ni Yaa nwu nkpo dilaanyuma ye ata ye akleesaa lee alenkee sɛfa nwu nkpo? Ofũ onu lee diɛpɔ.
40006031	“Nkpo oso yi, bitansimbu diisi sikitii biatoobuɛ bilɛ, ‘Fɛ bubawɛ lɛsaa munle? Ee munwɛ lɛsaa munnyi, ee munwɛ lɛsaa munklee?’
40006032	Asaa ya mmle suoto di batii ba ninanle ni bafũbanutɛ ntoobu diisi osie kanya nɛ. Teeye wɔ ninkpe ni di osi n-ye alɛ, asaa ya mmle amuu lefi ye.
40006033	Kafɔɔ bita anu asɛɛ ye di Yaa Kafa Sɛka ɔkpɛ suoto alenkee di asaa amuu ɔbla kamɛ, biɛbla nwɔ dibiesaa. Ni Yaa mayɔ asaa amuu bule ankyakaa ye.
40006034	Nkpo oso bitansimbu disi kpinwu di kɔsɛɛ ko nikɔwa ni suoto. Dii nwu nkpo nimmu mabu disi ninta suoto. Dinaa alɛ biɛyɔ atoo bamba biɛkyakaa di dii nwu nkpo ale suoto.
40007001	“Bitankanko batii, alɛ Yaa kafɔɔ dilaakanko ye.
40007002	Diekye Yaa makanko ye fɛ mmle okle biɛkanko ni batii. Lɛklapoosaa le biɛyɔ biɛklapoosa biɛta ni bawo lee, nninwu ke di Yaa mayɔ anklapoosa anta ye nɛ.
40007003	“Lɛ diɛbla fɔɔnya diku biibii le ninsi ni di owo lɛfɔ ninu, kafɔɔ flɔɔnya kawosokuu ka ninsi fɔ ni leele kamɛ?
40007004	Lɛ faatɔkɔ obilee falɛ, ‘Lekoto tɛɛ ndiki fɔ diku biibii nwu ninsi fɔ ni niinu kamɛ.’ Di obe wɔ di kawosokuu nsi ni di afɔ omu lɛfɔ ninu kamɛ?
40007005	Afɔ laatɛ! Lekatũ fadiki kawosokuu ka ninsi ni niinu lɛfɔ kamɛ fiɛ, ni fabafuo ɔnya nwaa, fandiki diku biibii le ninsi ni di obilee ninu kamɛ.
40007006	“Bitan-yɔ lɛsaa le ninte ni klekle biafuki biatɛ di batii ba ninte ni fɛ baweewee anu. Diekye nse biɛbla nkpo ɔtaka babataka mammufũ ye manwee. Bitan-yɔ lɛsaa futu kafɔɔ biatɛ di batii ba ninte ni fɛ aplakuo anu bilɛ bate. Diekye nse biɛyɔ biɛtɛ ma, ɔnanafũ babananafũ ni mankpɔnɔnfɔsa.
40007007	“Bikaalɛ Yaa asaa, abayɔ anta ye. Biwolaa asaa, abata ye minnya. Bipɛ nwɔ kokloo kɔnɛɛ, abasɛkɛtɛ anta ye.
40007008	Diekye otii lele niɛkaalɛ Yaa asaa, an-yɔ antɔɔ. Otii lele niewolaa, antɔɔ annya. Otii lele kafɔɔ niɛpɛ Yaa kokloo kɔnɛɛ, ansɛkɛtɛ antɔɔ.
40007009	“Obi Ote kuonwii nnaa abayɔ difuɔ anta ni obi nɔɔ nse ɛɛkaalɛ nwɔ bloblo.
40007010	Nkpo kafɔɔ anan-yɔ kɔsaanwu aatɔɔ nse ɛɛkaalɛ nwɔ kakpaku nɛ.
40007011	Bia aye ba ninle ni bakpileblatɛ yi, biye mmle okle biayɔ asaa biene minta ni babi lee. Ni lɛ oso nfɛ di Teeye wɔ ninkpe ni di osi ate ni klekle dilaayɔ asaa biene ata batii ba niɛkaalɛ nwɔ ni alenkee!
40007012	Asaa ya biomiɛ bilɛ batii bamba babla bata ye ni yi, aye bibla nkpo okle bita ma. Nle mmle ninle Mose kufiofa ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ asaa ya bootuo ni kasɔ nɛ.
40007013	“Bife di kayoko ka ninle ni kabiibii kamɛ bibuo. Diekye nse biefe di kayoko ka niɛblɛfɛ ni kamɛ, biedu osuku wɔ niɛyɔɔ ni suoto yi, bibabuo di ɔtɔ wɔ ninwɔɔsa ni kamɛ. Nnwu suoto kafɔɔ di batii kpinwu nkyɛ nɛ.
40007014	Kafɔɔ kayoko ka osuku ninte keesifi ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo kamɛ yi, ote kate biibii, osuku ninwu kafɔɔ nte maamaa kukpe osie kafɔɔ kuɔkyɛ. Batii ba nintɔɔnya ni osuku nwu nkpo kafɔɔ baapɔ.
40007015	“Bilolaa binyu nwaa di balaatɛ ba niɛbla ni suoto fɛ Yaa ɔlaa bauɛtɛtɛ. Manwa ɔkyɛ lee fɛle bafoso ba niɛyɔɔ nii. Kafɔɔ nwaako di situ lɛma kamɛ yi, bakplɛle bale.
40007016	Nkpa lɛma letembi bibayɔ minnya ma mintɛ nsũ. Akpofoe dilaafu akpaloo abi otika, nkpo kafɔɔ di kakɔtɔkɔtɔ kowoso dilaafuo kukutu abi otika nɛ.
40007017	Nkpo kafɔɔ di kowoso biene ntika abi biene nɛ. Kowoso lalaale kafɔɔ ntika abi lalaale nɛ.
40007018	Kowoso biene nintika abi lalaale. Nkpo kafɔɔ di kowoso lalaale nintika abi biene nɛ.
40007019	Kowoso lele kafɔɔ ninantika abi biene yi, mambudi kũ man-yu, makpee kũ ɔtɔ.
40007020	Nkpo oso, asaa ya di balaatɛ ba niɛbla ni suoto fɛ Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ bale nii, letembi lɛma bibayɔ mintofo ma.
40007021	“Diele otii lele nikɔlɛɛ mi ni alɛ, ‘Saate, Saate,’ nimakyɛ Yaa kafa. Kafɔɔ batii ba niɛbla ni Teemi wɔ ninkpe ni di osi dibiesaa nimakyɛ nfa.
40007022	Obebe di Yaa lɛkankoyi nwu lewo yi, batii kpinwu matɔkɔ mi alɛ, ‘Saate! Leeyooto lɛfɔ nwu kamɛ, ni buayie Yaa ɔlaa lɛkya, buatososa anwuna kpile nɛ. Ni buabla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ ate ate kafɔɔ di leyooto lɛfɔ nwu kamɛ nɛ.’
40007023	Nfa nfɛ matɔkɔ ma nlɛ, ‘Ninye ye kaakɔkaakɔ! Bikyɛ mi di ɔlɔɔkɔ bisifi aye batii kpile.’
40007024	“Nkpo oso, otii lele nienu sɛlaa nii se mmle, ɛɛyɔ sĩ ɛɛblako ɔkpɛ yi, ate fɛ otii wɔ niebe ni anu eetofo ni leyo di difuɔnkpaa suoto.
40007025	Kanto lanɔɔ, sekle layii, afɛɛfɔ kafɔɔ lafɛ osie kanya di leyo nwu suoto. Kafɔɔ ditabiɛ, diekye baatofo ni di difuɔnkpaa suoto.
40007026	Kafɔɔ otii lele nienu sɛlaa nii se mmle, anan-yɔ sĩ ablako ɔkpɛ yi, ate fɛ otii wɔ niebuu nii, eetofo ni leyo di kɔtɛ suoto.
40007027	Kanto lanɔɔ, sekle layii, afɛɛfɔ kafɔɔ lafɛ di leyo nwu suoto. Ni diabiɛ wududu diapɛ kaasɔ kɔkyɛɛkɔkyɛɛ nɛ.”
40007028	Obe wɔ di Yesu laloo ni sɛlaa se mmle obuɛ yi, diabla batii dikukdi nwu nkpo yaa, di mmle okle aatuo ni asaa.
40007029	Asaa nɔɔ otuo ditate fɛ mmle okle di kufiofa batuotɛ ntuo nii. Kafɔɔ aatuo asaa ku sɛkambi.
40008001	Obe wɔ di Yesu lasoo aakye ni kabokotee nwu suoto yi, batii dikudi kplɛ ninwii latikanko nwɔ.
40008002	Ni di osuɔtɔ onwii niatoofiɛ ni ofiɛ sɛɛle lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, abapɛ akunkyi kaatũ nɔɔ, aase katũ kaasɔ aabuɛ alɛ, “Saate! Nse dilɛ fɔ, faafuo ɔta suoto nii mbla klekle.”
40008003	Yesu ladiki kɔnɛɛ aakpanko nwɔ, aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Letuna, suoto lɛfɔ siklekle!” Nfanwu, ofiɛ nwu layɔɔ osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo.
40008004	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Lolaa fanyu nwaa, tambuɛ ɔlaa kuonwii faatɔkɔ otii kuonwii. Kafɔɔ tɔɔkyɛ falaayɔ suoto lɛfɔ fatuo Yaa Oletatɛ, faata oleɔta asaa ya di Mose kufiofa letuo ni. Nni nimadiki nintuo batii alɛ nwaako, ofiɛ nwu nkpo, ntɔɔyɔɔ fɔ nɛ.”
40008005	Obe wɔ di Yesu labuo ni Kapernaum okpoo kamɛ yi, Roma batii bakpɛtɛ nɔɔfo onwii lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ abatikiti nwɔ lekoto aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ,
40008006	“Saate! Kpɛmblatɛ nii kofiɛ osie kanya ate leeyo diobuo nwɔ alɛ, oloofuo bia ɔtaka.”
40008007	Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Mawa mayɔɔsa nwɔ ofiɛ.”
40008008	Ni baakpɛtɛ nɔɔfo nwu nkpo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Oowo, Saate! Ninsiɛko alɛ faawa mi leyo. Kafɔɔ afɔ yi, buɛ ɔlaa onwii lete, kpɛmblatɛ nii nwu nkpo mawɛ difiɛyɔɔ.
40008009	Diekye ami kafɔɔ nle otii wɔ ninsi ni di banɔɔfo bawo kalɔ, ni di bakpɛtɛ bawo kafɔɔ nsi mi kaalɔ nɛ. Nse lɛtɔkɔ owo nlɛ, ‘Atɔɔkyɛ’ yi, ansifi. Nkpo kafɔɔ nse lɛtɔkɔ owo nlɛ, ‘Awa’ yi, anwa nɛ. Nse lɛtɔkɔ ɔlanle nii nlɛ, ‘Abla lɛsaa’ le, ni ambla nɛ.”
40008010	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanu ni sɛlaa se mmle diabla nwɔ ɔkpɛ, ni aatɔkɔ batii ba niatikanko nwɔ ni alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, ninnya otii kuonwii di Israel batii kamɛ ninkpe ni ofũ onu kplɛ wɔ mmle okle.
40008011	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, batii kpinwu makye kufĩ katunkɔ ku kufĩ kamɛɛkɔ manwa mamasiɛ di opunu katũ ku Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob, di Yaa kafa sɛka kalekɔ nwu kamɛ.
40008012	Kafɔɔ Yaa mayɔ Yuda batii ba di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo nle ni kale an-yu di ditunu kamɛ. Nfa babawi kaku manwee anyɛɛ nɛ.”
40008013	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ bakpɛtɛ nɔɔfo nwu alɛ, “Tɔɔkyɛ leyo. Fɛ mmle okle feefũ feenu nii, dibawa kaanya ninta fɔ nkpo.” Nfanwu, ofiɛ layɔɔ bakpɛtɛ nɔɔfo nwu nkpo kpɛmblatɛ.
40008014	Yesu lakyɛ Petro leyo. Ni aalaanya Petro ɔmaato nte di ɔkla suoto ofiɛ lɛwɔɔfɔ ofiɛ nɛ.
40008015	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakyɛ aalaamufũ nwɔ di kɔnɛɛ nɛ. Nfanwu ofiɛ nwu nkpo layɔɔ nwɔ ni aataka aafũ nwɔ kɔfɔɔ nɛ.
40008016	Di kɔtɔɔfɔ lawo nii, baakpaa batii kpinwu di anwuna kpile nsi ni baawako Yesu nfũ. Ni di Yesu latososa anwuna kpile nwu nkpo aadiki ma kaamɛ ku ɔlaa onwii obuɛ. Ni aayɔɔsa mba niatoofiɛ ni bamuu sifiɛ ninfa nɛ.
40008017	Aabla nle mmle alɛ, ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia labuɛ aatɛ ni kawa kaanya. Alɛ, “Nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ eefũ wo suoto dibuo, eekpee disi kafɔɔ di sifiɛ loo simuu kalɔ.”
40008018	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanya batii dikudi le kpinwu niamana nwɔ beekyi nwɔ nii yi, ni aatɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Bita butaalɛ busifi lekpo le mmle sɛmaa.”
40008019	Nfanwu ni di kufiofa asaa tuotɛ onwii lawa nwɔ ɔkyɛ nɛ. Ni aabatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, kakɔ lele fabakyɛ, matikanko fɔ.”
40008020	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nkpikiti nkpe atuɛ ya kamɛ mansiɛ nii, bakansiɛ nkpe ayo mante nii. Kafɔɔ ami, Otii Obi, nnaa lɛba katɛ ni disi.”
40008021	Osuɔtɔ bamba ninle ni basaateketetɛ nɔɔ onwii labuɛ alɛ, “Saate, tɛɛnkyɛ ninakookaa teemi fiɛ.”
40008022	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Tikankoe. Faadiɛ batii ba ninte ni fɛle bakpi, baakookaa mma bamu bakpi lɛma.”
40008023	Yesu labuo di oklo onwii kamɛ, ni di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ kafɔɔ layie baabuo nɛ. Obe wɔ nfɛ bakyɛ nii,
40008024	nfanwu, kɔfɛɛfɔ siene kunwii niakyako ɔkpɛ di lekpo nwu suoto. Kuatɔɔpɛ ntu kuatookpete di oklo nwu kamɛ, kuamiɛ alɛ kuɔmɛɛ. Kafɔɔ di obe nwu kamɛ, Yesu late aatɔɔkyɔsĩi.
40008025	Basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lakyɛ baalaasɛnkɛsa nwɔ, ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, diki wo! Nfɛ buookpi lo!”
40008026	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Be oso biɔyɛkɛ nkpo? Ofũ onu lee diɛpɔ.” Nfanwu, Yesu lataka ni aamuɛ kɔfɛɛfɔ ku ntu nwu ninkɔkpɛ ni alɛ, “Diɛɔfɛ faate kloklo.” Ninfɛ dialo kanana nɛ.
40008027	Diabla obiala lɛma yaaa. Ni baakaalɛ suoto lɛma alɛ, “Ɔmɛntii okle ninle nwɔ mmle di kɔfɛɛfɔ ku ntu be ninkɔkpɛ ni nnu nwɔ ɔlaa?”
40008028	Obe wɔ di Yesu labuo Gadara kasɔ suoto leekpo nwu nkpo kakyɛ nyɔɔfa, batii banyɔ banwii di anwuna kple kɔkpɛko ni ladie baakye batii kakookaakɔ baawa babakyakako nwɔ. Baatii nwu nkpo lawɛ ni kobe osie kanya oso, otii kuonwii ninsinfuo ofe di osuku nwu nkpo suoto.
40008029	Nfanwu ni baafaa osie kanya baabuɛ alɛ, “Afɔ Yaa Obi, be ninsi di awo ku afɔ ntɛɛ? Ole fatoole katũ fɛɛwa falɛ fɔɔbananfi wo kootoko fiɛ di obe wɔ di Yaa lɛtɛ ni nwo?”
40008030	Aplakuo ɔlambu kplɛ onwii latoole alesaa di ntɛɛ nwu.
40008031	Nioso anwuna kpile nwu latikiti Yesu lekoto alɛ, “Nse fabatososa wo fandiki yi, ni faatososa wo fakpee di aplakuo ɔlambo kplɛ nwu nkpo kamɛ.”
40008032	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya aatɔkɔ nya alɛ, “Bitɔɔkyɛ nya kamɛ.” Ninfɛ aadie ma kaamɛ aasifi aplakuo nwu nkpo kamɛ nɛ. Ninfɛ di aplakuo ɔlambo nwu nkpo latoso kitikiti baakye kobokotee nwu nkpo ɔlɔɔkɔ baalaabuo di lekpo nwu kamɛ baamɛ ntu baakpi nɛ.
40008033	Nioso aplakuo nwu bakpatɛ latoso baasifi okpoo baalaabuɛ lɛsaa le niawa ni di basuɔtɔ ba kamɛ di anwuna kpile nwu lasiɛ ni ku aplakuo nwu suoto baatɔkɔ batii.
40008034	Nkpo oso okpoo nwu nkpo batii bamuu ladie baakyɛ alɛ bɔɔlaakyakako Yesu. Obe wɔ baakyakako nwɔ nii, baatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ adie ma kaasɔ suoto.
40009001	Yesu labuo di oklo nwu nkpo kamɛ aakple aataalɛ lekpo nwu nkpo aasifi okpoo nɔɔ.
40009002	Ninfɛ baakpaa osuɔtɔ onwii niafefee aate ni di ɔkla suoto baawako ɔkyɛ nɔɔ nɛ. Obe wɔ di Yesu lanya ni ofũ onu lɛma yi, ni aatɔkɔ osuɔtɔ nwu niafefee aate ni alɛ, “Obi nii, ta otu kute fɔ. Ntɔɔyɔ sikpile lɛfɔ lɛkyɛ fɔ.”
40009003	Kufiofa batuotɛ bawo lawɛ ninfa, ni baabuɛ baatɔkɔ suoto alɛ, “Otii wɔ mmle kobuɛ mbusuo ɔlaa lo!”
40009004	Yesu latofo disibu lɛma nwu nkpo, ninfɛ aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Be oso biobu disi kpile le mmle okle?
40009005	Sɛlaa se mmle, lɛmɛnle niɛyɔɔ kuobuɛ? Alɛ, ‘Bɛɛyɔ sikpile lɛfɔ bɛɛkyɛ fɔ’ ɛɛ sɛɛ baabuɛ alɛ, ‘Taka faakyɛ’?
40009006	Kamadiki ntuo ye nlɛ, ami, Otii Obi nwu, nkpe osie kaayi ka mmle alɛ kayɔ okpile nkyɛ.” Nkpo oso aatɔkɔ otii nwu niafefee aate ni kaasɔ alɛ, “Taka fayila, faayɔ ɔkla lɛfɔ, faatɔɔkyɛ leyo.”
40009007	Osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo niataka, ni aayɔ ɔkla nɔɔ, aasifi leyo nɛ.
40009008	Obe wɔ baatii lanya ni nle mmle yi, lɛyɛkɛ lamufũ ma, ni baatansa Yaa alɛ ɛɛyɔ osie wɔ mmle okle ɛɛta batii nɛ.
40009009	Yesu ladie ninfa aasifi. Obe wɔ akyɛ oosifi nii, ni aanya akpooto funtɛ onwii baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Mateo lasiɛ di akpooto kafunkɔ nɛ. Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tikankoe!” Nfanwu, ni di Mateo lataka aatikanko nwɔ nɛ.
40009010	Obe wɔ di Yesu latoole ni alesaa di Mateo leyo yi, akpooto bafuntɛ kpinwu ku bakpileblatɛ bawo lawa nfa baakyakaa di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ di alesaa nwu kalekɔ.
40009011	Di Farisi batii bawo lanya ni nle mmle, ni baakaalɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Obe oso di saatuotɛ lee kole alesaa ku akpooto bafuntɛ ku bakpileblatɛ bamba ba mmle?”
40009012	Yesu lanu ɔlaa wɔ baatoobuɛ nii, ni aadiki kanya alɛ, “Fablatɛ diefĩ batii ba ninoofiɛ nii, bafiɛtɛ di fablatɛ lefĩ.
40009013	Bitɔɔkyɛ biɛlaawolaa lɛsaa le di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ kotuo ni alɛ, ‘Sifutulɛ di Yaa komiɛ, diele babɔkɛɛ ɔyɔ ɔta ole.’ Ninwa babienetɛ ɔlɛɛ, bakpiletɛ oso lɛwa.”
40009014	Di n-ya mmle sɛmaa, Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane batikankotɛ nɔɔ lawa Yesu nfũ babakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Obe oso fiɛ di awo ku Farisi batii munnii ni kanya obe obe, fiɛ di basaateketetɛ lefɔ mma mánnii kanya?”
40009015	Ni di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Biefũ bienu bilɛ batii ba bɛɛlɛɛ bɛɛwako ni ɔsanko kayɔkɔ kawi sɛnyaami di obe wɔ di ɔsanko nwu nkpo ɔsa nsi ma ni kaamɛ? Oowo, dilabawa nkpo diidii! Kafɔɔ obe owo kɔwa babakpaa ɔsanko nwu nkpo ɔsa mansifiko nii. Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, babanii kanya.
40009016	“Otii kuonwii nin-yɔ dibula fɔle kakyɛɛ aakaa aatĩi dibula kofole kabɛkɔ. Diekye dibula fɔle nwu nkpo matuniisa lekofole nwu nkpo ninta alɛ, lekofole nwu nkpo mbɛ ninkyakaa.
40009017	“Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di otii kuonwii nin-yɔ nta fɔle aakpete di kɔbɔkɛɛkũ kofole kamɛ nɛ. Diekye nse bɛɛyɔ beekpete yi, kɔbɔkɛɛkũ nwu nkpo mabɛ nta nwu nkpo nwii, kɔbɔkɛɛkũ nwu nkpo kafɔɔ nlalaa. Nkpo oso kɔbɔkɛɛkũ fɔle kamɛ man-yɔ nta fɔle mankpete. Ni dibata alɛ nta nwu ku kɔbɔkɛɛkũ nwu nkpo dilabalala.”
40009018	Di obe wɔ di Yesu latɔɔkakatɛko ma ni yi, Yuda batii kasiisakɔ ɔnɔɔfo onwii lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, abapɛ akunkyi di katũ nɔɔ aabuɛ alɛ, “Obi sankobi nii ntookpi nunua, kafɔɔ wa fabatika nwɔ kɔnɛɛ di suoto, aakple awɛ nkpa.”
40009019	Nkpo oso Yesu lataka aatikanko nwɔ, ni di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ kafɔɔ latikanko nwɔ nɛ.
40009020	Obe wɔ di Yesu latoofe nii, ɔsanko onwii di asaa latoowii ni lefosi alɛɛ anyɔ lafe di Yesu sɛmaa aakpanko nwɔ awu kotokosi.
40009021	Ɔsanko nwu labla nkpo diekye aafũ aanu alɛ, “Nse lɛnya lɛkpanko nwɔ awu kamaa, ofiɛ nwu nkpo mayɔɔ mi.”
40009022	Yesu lamunikĩi aanyu ɔsanko nwu nkpo ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Obi nii, nya otu! Ofũ onu lɛfɔ ntɔɔyɔɔsa fɔ ofiɛ.” Nfanwu ni di ofiɛ nwu nkpo layɔɔ nwɔ nɛ.
40009023	Nni kamaa, Yesu lasifi ɔnɔɔfo nwu nkpo leyo. Ni aanya kaku sinu bakpeetɛ ku mba nikowi kaku ku kudu nɛ.
40009024	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Otii biala adie kayi. Diekye ɔsankobi nwu nkpo diekpi, kafɔɔ ɔkyɔsĩi ɔɔkyɔsĩi.” Ninfɛ baatii nwu nkpo bamuu lɛma, baama nwɔ nɛ.
40009025	Di obe wɔ baatososa batii nwu nkpo bamuu baadiki ni leeyo yi, Yesu labuo ɔsankobi nwu nkpo leyo kamɛ. Ni aamufũ nwɔ kɔɔnɛɛ, ni aasɛnkɛ aasiɛ nɛ.
40009026	Ɔlaa wɔ mmle lakpɛ kuakyaka kasɔ nwu nkpo aba aba.
40009027	Obe wɔ di Yesu ladie ninfa oosifi nii, banumbiɛtɛ banyɔ banwii lataka baatikanko nwɔ, baatooyiisa kudu baatoobuɛ alɛ, “Ɔka Dawid Obi ee! Nya wo nyaami.”
40009028	Obe wɔ di Yesu labuo ni leyo kamɛ yi, banumbiɛtɛ banyɔ nwu nkpo lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Biefũ bienu bilɛ mafuo ye anu otikiti?” Ninfɛ baadiki kanya alɛ, “Yii, buofũ buonu.”
40009029	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakpanko ma anu, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Diwa kaanya dita ye fɛ mmle biefũ bienu ni.”
40009030	Nfanwu anu lɛma niatikiti. Ninfɛ di Yesu lakpee ma kufiofa osie kanya alɛ, “Bitambuɛ nle mmle biatɔkɔ otii kuonwii.”
40009031	Kafɔɔ baadie ni ninfa yi, baasifi baalaayie ɔlaa wɔ mmle lɛkya di Yesu suoto baakyakasa ntɛɛ nwu nkpo kasɔ fɛɛ.
40009032	Di obe wɔ baasuɔtɔ nwu nkpo latoosifi nii, batii banwii lakpaa omumu onwii di ninwuna kpile lasiɛ nii baawako Yesu nfũ.
40009033	Ni di Yesu latososa ninwuna kpile nwu nkpo aadiki di omumu nwu kamɛ nɛ. Nfanwu ni aakyako ɔtɔɔkakatɛ nɛ. Lɛsaa le mmle labla batii ba bamuu niayila ni ninfa yaaa, ni baabuɛ alɛ, “Buunya nle mmle okle di Israel kasɔ suoto bunya!”
40009034	Kafɔɔ Farisi batii labuɛ alɛ, “Anwuna kpile ɔka niɛtɔɔ osie nwu akle ootososa anwuna kpile andiki.”
40009035	Yesu lakyɛ aakyi sekpoo ku nkpayotũ mmuu kamɛ. Aatuo asaa di Yuda batii nsiisakɔ. Aayie ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ suoto. Ni aayɔɔsa batii ba niatoofiɛ ni sifiɛ ate ate sifiɛ fɛɛ nɛ.
40009036	Di obe wɔ aanya ni batii dikudi nwu nkpo yi, ɔlaa lɛma lanu nwɔ kafutu, diekye ditoobuo ma, banaa kyakaakotɛ kafɔɔ. Bate fɛ bafoso ba ninnaa ni kpatɛ.
40009037	Nkpo oso aamunikĩi aatɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Ofiɛɛlɛ nwu mpɔ, kafɔɔ bafiɛlɛtɛ diɛpɔ.
40009038	Nkpo oso bipɛ ɔlaa bita Saate nwu nimba ni ofiɛlɛ nwu nkpo bilɛ, aakyesee bafiɛlɛtɛ mamakyakaako di ofiɛlɛ nwu nkpo kamɛ mansiisa.”
40010001	Yesu lalɛɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lefosi banyɔ nwu nkpo aasiisa ni aata ma osie alɛ baatososa anwuna kpile mandiki baatii kamɛ, manyɔɔsa sifiɛ ate ate kafɔɔ.
40010002	Batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nkpo lefosi banyɔ nwu ayooto ninle n-ya mmle nɛ. Ɔkasale ninle Simon, nwɔ mankple manlɛɛ ni Petro, ku obilɛma Andrea, Yakobo ku obilɛma Yohane ba ninle ni Sebedeo babi
40010003	ku Filipo ku Bartolomeo ku Toma ku akpooto funtɛ Mateo ku Yakobo wɔ ninle Alfeo obi ku Tadeo
40010004	ku Simon wɔ niabɔmbɔ ni kale nɔɔ osie kanya ku Yuda Iskariot wɔ niadiki Yesu aata nii.
40010005	Yesu lakpee basuɔtɔ lefosi banyɔ ba mmle kɔtɔ ku kufiofa ko mmle alɛ, “Bitankyɛ batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii kasɔ ku Samaria batii okpoo kuonwii kafɔɔ kamɛ.
40010006	Kafɔɔ bitɔɔkyɛ Israel batii ba ninte ni fɛ bafoso ba nintooyu ni nfũ.
40010007	Bitɔɔkyɛ biɛlaayie lɛkya bilɛ, ‘Yaa sɛka olebee nwu ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ.’
40010008	Biyɔɔsa bafiɛtɛ sifiɛ, biɛsɛnkɛsa bakpi. Biyɔɔsa batii ba ninkofiɛ ni ofiɛ sɛɛle sifiɛ, bietososa anwuna kpile kafɔɔ bidiki baatii kamɛ. Diele koto biɛta biɛya nle mmle biekyeko ɔkyɛ nii. Nkpo oso ayee biyɔ bita di koto ɔtanfũ kamɛ.
40010009	Bitan-yɔ koto kukunwii biaklee di atofo lee kamɛ.
40010010	Bitan-yɔ asaa ɔkaalɛ kotofo biaklee di osuku lee nwu ɔkyɛ kamɛ. Bitanklee awu nyɔɔfa, ee biaklee ntokota ee ɔkyɛnwoso kuonwii. Kpɛmblatɛ biala yi, nfũ ɔɔbla ni ɔkpɛ anle.
40010011	“Nse biebuo okpoo owo ee kakpaayotũ kawo kamɛ yi, biemiɛ otii biene wɔ nietuna alɛ oofũ ye ni. Biɛkyɛ bilaasiɛ di ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, dilaase di obe wɔ biedie ni ninfa.
40010012	Nse biebuo leyo lewo kamɛ yi, biɛsɛɛsa ma bilɛ, ‘Atoko ɔkyɛ ole ninle ye lele.’
40010013	Nse leyo nwu nkpo batii letuna beefũ ye, ni biɛta atoko ɔkyɛ ole lee lɛsɛɛsa dite ninfa. Kafɔɔ nse baatuna bafũ ye, ni biɛta atoko ɔkyɛ ole lee nwu nkpo lɛsɛɛsa dikple diwa ɔkyɛ lee.
40010014	Nse leyo lewo ee okpoo owo batii diefũ ye ee bakyɔɔ ye ɔlaa kotoko yi, bidie ninfa bisifi, biɛfɛntɛ nkpaasɔ lee kɔtɛ bitɛ ma.
40010015	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, di lɛkakoyi nwu nkpo suoto, Yaa manya Sodom ku Gomora batii nyaami anlenkee okpoo nwu nkpo batii.
40010016	“Binu! Kokyesee ye fɛ bafoso di bakplɛle kamɛ. Nkpo oso bibe anu fɛ kɔsaanwu, kafɔɔ biɛbla buɛɛ fɛ ablonumaa.
40010017	Bilolaa binyu, diekye batii madiki ye manta, mankpaa ye mankyɛnko kakankɔ. Babapɛ ye kafɔɔ di Yuda batii nsiisakɔ.
40010018	Ta ami oso, babakpaa ye mankyɛnko batunletɛ ku baka anu manaakanko ye. Ni biɛtɔkɔ ma ɔlaa biene nwu ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii.
40010019	Nse bɛɛkpaa ye bɛɛkyɛnko kakankɔ yi, bitambu diisi di ɔlaa wɔ bibabuɛ ni suoto, ku mmle bibabuɛ nwu nii. Nse obe lewo alɛ biakakatɛ yi, Yaa omu mata ye ɔlaa wɔ biabuɛ nii.
40010020	Diekye diele aye bamu nimakakatɛ. Teeye wɔ ninle ni Yaa Ninwuna nimakakatɛ ninfenko di suoto lee.
40010021	“Batii mayɔ babi lɛma manta alɛ balo. Balofotɛ kafɔɔ mabla nkpo di babilɛma suoto. Babi mataka di balofotɛ lɛma suoto alɛ balo ma.
40010022	Otii biala makyidi ye ta ami oso. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ niekpee otu ɛɛlaase ni kaayɛntɛkɔ, Yaa matɔɔ nkpa.
40010023	Nse beetikanko ye di okpoo onwii kamɛ yi, bietoso bisifi ɔbamba kamɛ. Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ bilabaloo sɛkpɛ lee ɔbla di Israel sekpoo simuu kamɛ fiɛ di ami, Otii Obi nwu, makple anwa.
40010024	“Saateketetɛ ninlenkee saatuotɛ nɔɔ, nkpo kafɔɔ di ɔlanle ninlenkee saate nɔɔ nɛ.
40010025	Nkpo oso, saateketetɛ biala kamiɛ alɛ aate fɛ saatuotɛ nɔɔ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di ɔlanle kamiɛ alɛ, aate fɛ saate nɔɔ nɛ. Nse bɛɛlɛɛ leyo lewo ɔnɔɔfo alɛ anwuna kpile ɔka mɔ, ni blɔbalɛɛ leyo nwu kamɛ batii kafɔɔ ayooto kpile?
40010026	“Nkpo oso bitanyɛkɛ batii, diekye lɛsaa lele bɛɛyɔ lɛsaa beetĩi ee bɛɛbla beekookaa yi, Yaa madiki ni kayi.
40010027	Lɛsaa lele kafɔɔ bienu biekyeko ɔkyɛ nii diitunu kamɛ yi, bidiki ni kayi. Lɛsaa lele kafɔɔ lɛtɔkɔ ye di kawofakɔ yi, biyie ni lɛkya di lɛkpaka.
40010028	Bitanyɛkɛ batii ba ninlo ni suoto sina, kafɔɔ mananfuo ni ninwuna olo. Kafɔɔ biyɛkɛ Yaa wɔ ninfuo ni otii suoto sina ku ninwuna ɔwɔɔsa di kawɔɔ ɔtɔ kamɛ.
40010029	Kaplɛ kanwii kafuo bia kutĩitĩi kɔnyɔ ɔya. Kafɔɔ kukanwii ninkpa kaapɛ kaasɔ alɛ, Teeye Yaa dieye nwu ole.
40010030	Aye yi, bia disi lee sinwini yi, Yaa n-ye sĩ lɛpɔ.
40010031	Nkpo oso yi, bitanyɛkɛ. Diekye biefũ kɔya bilenke kutĩitĩi kpinkidi.
40010032	“Otii lele niediki eebuɛ di batii anu alɛ, ole mi ale yi, amii madiki nwɔ kanya di Teemi anu di Yaa kafa nlɛ ole mi ale.
40010033	Kafɔɔ nse otii owo lesĩ mi di batii anu alɛ aaye mi yi, ami, masĩ nwɔ di Teemi anu di osi nlɛ ninye nwɔ.
40010034	“Bitanyu bilɛ atoko ɔkyɛ ole lɛyɔ lɛwako kanyi ka mmle. Oowo! Ninwako atoko ɔkyɛ ole. Kafɔɔ kapamii lɛwako.
40010035	Diekye lɛwa le lɛwa ni mata alɛ, ‘obi suɔtɔbi mataka anyila di ote suoto. Obi sankobi kafɔɔ mataka anyila di ɔya suoto. Ɔsanko kafɔɔ mataka anyila di ɔsa nɔɔ ɔya suoto.
40010036	Otii lo nɔɔ kasale yi, abakye di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ leyo nɔɔ kamɛ.’
40010037	“Otii lele niɛbɔmbɔ ote ee ɔya eelenkee mi yi, alaafuo mi saateketetɛ ole. Olele kafɔɔ niɛbɔmbɔ obi suɔtɔbi ee obi sankobi eelenkee mi yi, aasiɛko alɛ aale mi saateketetɛ.
40010038	Otii lele ninan-yɔ atoo nɔɔ atuka, atikanko nnafukpaa nii yi, aasiɛko alɛ aale mi saateketetɛ.
40010039	Otii lele niemiɛ alɛ ɔɔta nkpa nɔɔ yi, abayu mi. Kafɔɔ olele nieyu nkpa nɔɔ ta ami oso yi, abawɛ mi.
40010040	“Otii lele niefũ ye yi, ami eefũ. Otii lele kafɔɔ neifũ mi yi, ni eefũ Yaa wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ kafɔɔ.
40010041	Otii lele niefũ Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ alɛ Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛ ale ni oso yi, abawɛ dibia di Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛ nwu letota kamɛ ankyeko Yaa nfũ. Otii lele kafɔɔ niefũ otii wɔ ninte ni tinini, ta tininitɛ ale ni oso yi, abawɛ dibia di tinintɛ nwu nkpo letota kamɛ ankyeko Yaa nfũ.
40010042	Bitofo nle mmle nwaa bilɛ, otii lele niekusii ntu yɔɔle kakɔkɔɛ kanwii ɛɛta batikankotɛ nii ba mmle ɔyɛntɛle kaamɛ lɛma ta ami oso, Yaa dilabasĩ nwɔ letota biene ɔta.”
40011001	Obe wɔ di Yesu laloo ni batɔkyɛntɛ lefosi banyɔ nwu kufiofa okpee yi, aadie ninifa aasifi aalaatootuo asaa aatooyie ɔlaa nwu lɛkya di sekpoo se niɛtɛɛtɛɛ ni nfa.
40011002	Obe wɔ di Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane lanu di leyo katenkɔ asaa ya di Kristo latɔɔbla ni yi, ni aakpee basaateketetɛ nɔɔ bawo baakyɛ Yesu nfũ nɛ.
40011003	Ni balaakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle otii wɔ di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ alɛ fabawa ni ɛɛ, sɛɛ buatoonyu osuku munta otii bamba?”
40011004	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Bikple biɛlaatɔkɔ Yohane asaa ya biɛnya ni ku n-ya bienu bilɛ lɛbla ni.
40011005	Banumbiɛtɛ nfɛ kɔnya asaa, abafa nfɛ kɔtaka mankyɛ, batii ba ninkofiɛ ni sifiɛ sɛɛle suoto ntɔɔkpa, batokotĩitɛ nfɛ konu, bakpi kɔtaka mansiɛ nkpa, bapiitɛ kafɔɔ nfɛ konu ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo.
40011006	Suoto mayɔɔ batii ba ninanya ni ɔlaa kpile kuonwii di suoto nii.”
40011007	Di obe wɔ di basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo nfɛ kosifi nii yi, Yesu lakakatɛ di Yohane suoto aatɔkɔ batii dikudi nwu nkpo alɛ, “Obe wɔ biadie biakyɛ Yohane nfũ di ɔfaafuu kamɛ, be biatoonyu osuku bilɛ bianya? Lɛkpɛnyi le di kɔfɛɛfɔ latɔɔfɛ ni?
40011008	Be lɛsaa biakyɛ bialaanya? Otii wɔ niakpe ntu aasiɛ ni di asaa biene kamɛ? Binyu, batii nwu nkpo okle yi, baka ayo mansiɛ!
40011009	Aye bitɔkɔ mi, be biakyɛ bialaanya? Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ? Nwaako katɔkɔ ye nii yi, otii wɔ biakyɛ bialaanya ni nlenke bia Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ.
40011010	Diekye Yohane ninle otii wɔ suoto di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Makyesee tɔkyɛntɛ nii anlefɔ katũ analolaa osuku antɛ fɔ.’
40011011	Nwaako katɔkɔ ye ni kafɔɔ, Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane lɛtaka katoo alenke otii lele nintoyisiɛ kayi ka mmle ɛɛbafe. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ ninle ni ɔyɛntɛle di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu kamɛ yi, eekple ɛɛtaka katoo alenke Yohane nwu nkpo.
40011012	Diɛyɔ ni di obe wɔ di Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane lakyako ni Yaa ɔlaa lɛkya oyie diɛbase ni di miɛ yi, batii ba di ninu lɛsɛɛ alɛ boobuo ni Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo yi, bootuo ma dibuo osie kanya. Kafɔɔ mba niinu lɛsɛɛ bɛɛkpɛ ni ku okyiini yi, mma nimabuo nfa nɛ.
40011013	Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ ku Mose kufiofa Yaa ɔlaa baabuɛ baatɛ fiɛ diɛbadu Yohane obe suoto.
40011014	Ni nse bietuna bilɛ biofũ ɔlaa lɛma nwu minnu yi, Yohane ninle Elia wɔ baabuɛ baatɛ alɛ, abawa ni nɛ.
40011015	Otii wɔ kunutoko nkpe nii yi, aanu.
40011016	“Nunua, be lɛsaa kayɔ miɛ akyɛnfɔɔle nkaatɛɛsa ko? Nkpo bate fɛ babisɔ ba ninsi bookpee ni kɔkyɔ di asaa kasunsukɔ nɛ. Bɔɔtɔkɔ dikudi bamba alɛ,
40011017	‘Buasa sɛkafɔɔnu buata ye, kafɔɔ biasĩ otũ. Buakpee sikunu buata ye, kafɔɔ biasĩ kaku owi.’
40011018	Diekye obe wɔ di Yohane lawa nii, aanii kanya, atanyi nta kunwii. Kafɔɔ batii latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Ninwuna kpile ninsi nwɔ!’
40011019	Obe wɔ kafɔɔ di ami, Otii Obi nwu, lɛwa nii, lale, lanyi. Kafɔɔ batii labuɛ alɛ, ‘Banyu lenyatɛ ku tanyintɛ nwu lo! Ale akpooto bafuntɛ ku bakpiletɛ siɛwo!’ Kafɔɔ batii ba bamuu nintikanko ni Yaa ninumbe nkpaamaa, batoodiki beetuo alɛ ninumbe nwaa dile.”
40011020	Seekpoo se di Yesu labla ni sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ kpinwu kamɛ, batii ditakyi di sikpile lɛma. Nkpo oso diakpɛ nwɔ nyaami aabuɛ alɛ,
40011021	“Biyɔɔsa aye Korasin batii! Aye Betsaida batii kafɔɔ biyɔɔsa! Diekye sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ, bɛɛbla ni kaamɛ lee, nse mambla sĩ di Tiro ku Sidon kamɛ yi, nse baakyisa nkpa kofokofoko, baafifia ntɔ di suoto, baanyukũ aboko, baatuo alɛ batookyi siikpile lɛma.
40011022	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, di lɛkankoyi nwu nkpo suoto yi, Yaa manya Tiro ku Sidon sekpoo batii nyaami anlenkee ye.
40011023	Ni aye Kapernaum batii, bienyu bilɛ Yaa matakatɛsa ye asifiko osi? Oowo! Abawakosa ye kasɔ ankpee ye di kawɔɔ ɔtɔ kamɛ. Diekye sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ bɛɛbla ni kaamɛ lee, nse mambla sĩ di Sodom yi, nse okpoo nwu nte diɛbase bia miɛ.
40011024	Kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, di lɛkankoyi nwu nkpo suoto yi, Yaa manya Sodom batii nyaami anlenkee ye.”
40011025	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, Yesu labuɛ alɛ, “Teete, osi ku kasɔ Saate, kɔpɛ fɔ sɛfa, diekye asaa ya fɛɛyɔ feekookaa ni bakũyentɛ ku banumbentɛ, nya fatoodiki feetuo batii ba ninanye ni akũ nɛ.
40011026	Nwaako Teete, nkpo okle foomiɛ falɛ dite nɛ.”
40011027	Ni aakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Teemi lɛyɔ asaa amuu eekpee mi nínɛɛ kamɛ. Otii kuonwii dieye otii wɔ di Obi nwu nle nii, diediki Ote lete ninye. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di otii kuonwii dieye otii wɔ di Ote nle ni nɛ yeidiki Obi lete ninye, ku batii ba di Obi nwu alɛ oodiki antuo nii.
40011028	“Biwa ɔkyɛ nii, aye ba bamuu nintuka atoo nutũle ditoobuo ye ni. Ami mata ye ɔnyɛɛ ɔtɛ.
40011029	Biyɔ ɔkpɛ nii ɔbla bitika di suoto, bietekete bikyeko ɔkyɛ nii. Diekye lɛbla buɛɛ, lɛwakosa suoto kasɔ kafɔɔ di otu nii kamɛ, ni bibawɛ ɔnyɛɛ ɔtɛ.
40011030	Diekye ɔkpɛ wɔ mata ye ni nnaa osie. Atoo nii kafɔɔ lɛbla fɛnflɛ.”
40012001	Obe onwii kamɛ, Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ latoofe di kofe kunwii kamɛ di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto. Kɔka laklee basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo, nkpo oso baafee kofe nwu alesaa awo baafini baatoowee.
40012002	Obe wɔ di Farisi batii lanya ni mmle, ni batɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Nyu lo, basaateketetɛ lɛfɔ ntɔɔbla lɛsaa le di kufiofa nwu nkpo diɛta osuku alɛ baabla ni di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto.”
40012003	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya aakaalɛ ma alɛ. “Diidii biika di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ binya, lɛsaa le di Dawid labla ni di obe wɔ di kɔka laklee nwɔ ni ku batii nɔɔ?
40012004	Aabuo Yaa leyo, nnwɔɔ ku batii nɔɔ baalaayɔ alesaa ya baata ni Yaa ole, baale. Nu Kuufiofa ditata osuku. Yaa olebatatɛ lete ninkpe osuku manle alesaa nwu nkpo fiɛ.
40012005	Sɛɛ biika di Mose kufiofa kamɛ alɛ, di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi biala suoto, nu manambla ɔkpɛ, Yaa olebatatɛ ba ninkpe ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo ntaalɛ kufiofa nwu nkpo kafɔɔ, mankpi lɛpɔɔ?
40012006	Kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, lɛsaa le niefũ kɔya dilenke ni Yaa Olekatakɔ nsi ye kaamɛ ninfũ.
40012007	Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Nyaami ɔnya di ami Yaa komiɛ, diele alɛ biayɔ babɔkɛɛ minta ni ole kowolaa.’ Nse fɛ bienu ɔlaa wɔ mmle kasɔ nwaa yi, nse bitaalo batii ba ninankaatɛ alɛ baakpi lɛpɔɔ, lɛpɔɔ.
40012008	Diekye ami Oti Obi nwu ninle Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi Saate.”
40012009	Obe wɔ di Yesu ladie ni ninfa, ninfɛ aasifi Yuda batii kasiisakɔ kanwii nɛ.
40012010	Ni aalaakyakako osuɔtɔ onwii kɔɔnɛɛ lekpi nwɔ ni nɛ. Batii bawo lawɛ ninfa baatoomiɛ alɛ boolo Yesu lɛpɔɔ. Nioso baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Kufiofa loo lɛta osuku alɛ baayɔɔsa otii ofiɛ di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto?”
40012011	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya, aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Nse diɛwa alɛ onwii lee nkpe foso onwii, ɛɛkpa eebuo diibiɔ kamɛ di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto, ɔlɔbakpee kɔnɛɛ alɛ oodiki nwɔ?
40012012	Mia kafɔɔ otii lefũ kɔya alenke foso. Nkpo oso yi, kufiofa loo lɛta osuku alɛ baanya nyaami di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto.”
40012013	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ osuɔtɔ wɔ kɔɔnɛɛ nɔɔ lakpi ni alɛ, “Dilasa kɔnɛɛ lɛfɔ.” Ninfɛ aayilasa kũ nɛ. Nfanwu, kɔnɛɛ nwu nkpo niakple kualɛ fɛ mmle di kɔnyɔɔfa nte nii.
40012014	Ninfɛ di Farisi batii nwu nkpo lasifi, baalaakpee asi baawo mmle baalo ni Yesu nɛ.
40012015	Di obe wɔ di Yesu lanu disibu kpile le di Farisi batii ladiki ni di suoto nɔɔ, aadie ninfa aasifi, ninfɛ di batii dikudi kpinwu latikanko nwɔ nɛ. Ninfɛ aayɔɔsa bafiɛtɛ bamuu sifiɛ kaamɛ lɛma nɛ.
40012016	Ninfɛ aasĩ ɔlaa aata ma alɛ, batandiki nwɔ kayi baata batii bamba di nni nkpo suoto nɛ.
40012017	Aatɔkɔ ma nkpo okle alɛ Yaa ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ ni diefe ni di Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia suoto kawa kaanya fɛ mmle aabuɛ nii. Aabuɛ alɛ,
40012018	“Nwɔ mmle ninle kpɛmblatɛ nii wɔ lediki ni nɛ. Mbɔmbɔ nwɔ, obuo mi anu nwaa kafɔɔ. Mayɔ Ninwuna nii nkpee nwɔ kaamɛ alɛ abadiki lɛkakanko nii ambuɛ antɔkɔ nnle mmuu.
40012019	Alabananfiko otii kuonwii ɔlaa ee amuɛ otii kuonwii. Alabakakatɛ osie kanya kafɔɔ di akpaka.
40012020	Abatɛ otu kaasɔ buɛɛ anta mba ninnaa ni osie, abawɛ sifutulɛ kafɔɔ anta mba lɛɛkyakaako lefĩ nii. Abayila annyu kafɔɔ alɛ lɛkanko le ninte ni tinini lɛbla ɔkpɛ di osuku kanya.
40012021	Nnwɔɔ suoto kafɔɔ di nnle mmuu mayɔ anu lɛma mantika nɛ.”
40012022	Ninfɛ baatii banwii lakpaa osuɔtɔ onwii niinwuna kpile lasiɛ ni atatoonu, atatoofuo ni ɔtɔɔkakatɛ baawako Yesu nfũ nɛ. Ninfɛ di Yesu latososa ninwuna nwu nkpo diaata alɛ ofiɛ nwu nkpo layɔɔ nwu aafuo ɔtɔɔkakatɛ, aafuo kafɔɔ ɔtɔɔnya nɛ.
40012023	Diabla batii dikudi nwu nkpo niawɛ ni ninfa yaaa di lɛsaa le di Yesu labla ni suoto. Ni baakaalɛ alɛ, “Sɛɛ nnwɔɔ ninle Ɔka Dawid ɔnantii wɔ baabuɛ baatɛ alɛ abawa ni nɛ?”
40012024	Obe wɔ di Farisi batii lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle yi, ni baabuɛ alɛ, “Anwuna kpile ɔka Beelsebul niɛtɔɔ osie wɔ mmle. Nkpo oso oofuo anwuna kpile otososa odiki baatii kamɛ nɛ.”
40012025	Yesu latofo disibu lɛma nwu, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Sɛka kalekɔ lele niɛsɛ bawo di akudi akudi bɛɛtaka bayɛ baawo suoto yi, manyila. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ se okpoo ee leyo lewo kamɛ batii lɛsɛ bawo akudi akudi bɔɔkpɛko bawo yi, mambiɛ.
40012026	Nkpo oso nse dikudi lewo di Satana sɛka kalekɔ kamɛ kɔkpɛko dikudi nyɔɔfa yi, ni dioto alɛ sɛka kalekɔ nwu ntɔɔsɛ suoto, ni baasinkyo ku ɔnɔɔ.
40012027	Biobuɛ bilɛ kotososa anwuna kpile ndiki diekye Beelsebul niɛtɛɛ osie nwu kɔbla nkpo. Ni nse nkpo kute mɔ, owe niɛta batii lee osie bootososa anwuna kpile mandiki baatii kamɛ? Ni lɛsaa le di batii lee kɔbla ni kotuo alɛ ole ye nnaa!
40012028	Diele Beelsebul osie kule. Kafɔɔ Yaa Ninwuna niɛtɛɛ osie kotososa anwuna kpile ndiki baatii kamɛ. Nle mmle kotuo alɛ Yaa sɛka kalekɔ ntɔɔwa ye kamɛ kofokofoko.
40012029	“Nkpe osie wɔ ninlenke ni Satana ole, diekye otii kuonwii dilabafuo sientɛ leyo obuo ɔlɛ nwɔ asaa, diediki eemufũ sientɛ nwu nkpo ɛɛpɛ lekpo fiɛ ɛɛlɛ nwɔ asaa.
40012030	“Otii lele ninan-yɛ mi kamaa yi, ni ɛɛtaka ayɛ mi di suoto. Otii lele ninankyakaakoe busiisa, ni ɔsamiisa, ɔɔsaamiisa.
40012031	Nle mmle oso, kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ Yaa mayɔ okpile lele baatii lɛbla ku ɔlaa kpile lele beebuɛ ankyɛ ma. Kafɔɔ otii lele niebuɛ ɔlaa kpile di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle suoto yi, Yaa dilabayɔ akyɛ nwɔ.
40012032	Otii lele niebuɛ ɔlaa owo eeyila di Otii Obi nwu suoto yi, Yaa man-yɔ ankyɛ nwɔ. Kafɔɔ otii lele niebuɛ ɔlaa owo eeyila di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle suoto yi, Yaa dilabayɔ akyɛ nwɔ di nkpa be mmle kamɛ ee mbe nikɔwa ni kamɛ.
40012033	“Kowoso biene yi, biye bilɛ abi biene kuntika. Kowoso ko ninanlɛ yi, abi ya kuntika ni kafɔɔ ninlɛ. Kowoso biala, abi ya kuotika ni man-yɔ mantofo kowoso ko okle kule nii.
40012034	Aye ba ninle ni batii kpile fɛ kɔsaanwu! Ɔlaa biene kuonwii nindie ye kaanya kamɛ! Asaa ya ninsi ni di otii disibu kamɛ yi, nnya ko andiki ambuɛ nɛ.
40012035	Otii biene yi, asaa biene ya eekookaa ni di asaa nɔɔ katɛkɔ yi, nnya andiki kayi nɛ. Otii kpile kafɔɔ yi, sikpile se eekookaa ni kaamɛ nɔɔ, nsĩ andiki anwako kayi nɛ.
40012036	Komiɛ nlɛ kamɛ kakpa ye klekle nlɛ, di lɛkanko di nwu suoto yi, otii biala ɔlaakuu lele atooyibuɛ yi, abata nwu nkuntaa.
40012037	Aye bamu kanya kamɛ sɛlaa di Yaa mayɔ ankanko ye, anlo ye lɛpɔɔ ee anta ye lɛbɛ.”
40012038	Nfa nfɛ di kufiofa batuotɛ bawo ku Farisi batii bawo latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, buomiɛ bulɛ fabla dituosaa lewo fatuo buɔnya.”
40012039	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nyu mmle di miɛ akyɛnfɔɔle lɛbla ni batii kpile, batikanko ni afiɔ ɔtɔ lo! Biomiɛ bilɛ mbla dituosaa, kafɔɔ, namabla. Dituosaa le lete babadiki mantuo ye minnya ni ninle Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yona lele le okle nɛ.
40012040	Fɛ mmle okle di Yona lale ni ayi atiɛ ku nkyɛ ntiɛ di kakpaku kplɛ nwu kafutu kamɛ yi, nkpo okle di Otii Obi nwu kafɔɔ male ayi atiɛ ku nkyɛ ntiɛ di kasɔ kamɛ nɛ.
40012041	Di lɛkankoyi nwu suoto yi, Niniwe batii mataka manyila makanko ye malo ye lɛpɔɔ, diekye baakyi di sikpile lɛma suoto di obe wɔ baanu ni Yona ɔlaa obuɛ. Kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii onwii nkpe ninfũ ɛɛtaka katoo alenke ni Yona.
40012042	Di lɛkankoyi nwu nkpo suoto yi, Ɔka Sanko wɔ niakye ni kala kasɔ mataka anyila ankanko ye anlo ye lɛpɔɔ. Diekye aakyɛ osuku wɔ niekyo ni fanfan aakye okpoo nɔɔ, aakyɛ Ɔka Salomo nfũ alɛ, ɔɔlaanu ninumbe nɔɔ sɛlaa. Kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii owo nkpe ninfũ ɛɛtaka katoo alenke ni Salomo.
40012043	“Nse beetososa ninwuna kpile lewo beediki di otii kamɛ yi, ninkyɛ nintookyi aba ya niekoso nii, nintoomiɛ kasiɛkɔ. Nse diɛwɛ kasiɛkɔ kukanwii yi,
40012044	nintɔkɔ suoto alɛ, ‘Makple nsifi lɛba kofole le lasiɛ nii.’ Nse eekple ɛɛbanya alɛ leyo nwu kamɛ nte foee, kafɔɔ beefiɛ kamɛ, beelolaa ni yi,
40012045	ninkple ninsifi ninaakpaa anwuna kpile akuɛnsĩ ya ninlenke nwɔ nii, manwa mamasiɛ ninfa. Nse anwuna kpile nwu nkpo ntɔɔbla nkpo eeloo, otii nwu nkpo nkpa be nfɛ amasiɛ ni nlalaa ninlenkee nkpa kasale be aasiɛ nii. Nkpo okle diɔwa ɔbate di miɛ akyɛnfɔɔle kpile ya mmle suoto nɛ.”
40012046	Di obe wɔ di Yesu latɔɔkakatɛko ni batii nwu nkpo yi, Yesu ɔya ku Yesu basuɔtɔbi lɛma lawa nfa. Baabayila kaayi alɛ boomiɛ alɛ bakakatɛko nwɔ.
40012047	Ninfɛ di batii ba onwii niayila ni ninfa onwii lɛma lakyɛ aalaatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nyu, yaafɔ ku babilee n-yɛ kaayi alɛ bɔɔkakatɛkofɔ.”
40012048	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Owe ninle mi ɔya ku babilɛma?”
40012049	Ninfɛ aayɔ kɔnɛɛ aatuo basaateketetɛ nɔɔ aabuɛ alɛ, “Nyu yaami ku babiloo lo!
40012050	Otii lele niɛbla Teemi wɔ ninkpe ni kaatoo dibiesaa yi, nnwɔɔ ninle mi obilɛma suɔtɔbi ku obilɛma sankobi ku yaami nɛ.”
40013001	Dii nwu nkpo Yesu ladie leeyo nwu nkpo aasifi lekpo kotoko. Ni aalaasiɛ ninfa aakyekasɔ aatootuo asaa nɛ.
40013002	Batii ɔlambu wɔ niamana nwɔ baakyi ni laloolo, nioso aabuo di oklo onwii kamɛ aasiɛ. Ni baatii ɔlambu nwu nkpo layila di lekpo kotoko nɛ.
40013003	Ni aatuo ma asaa kpinwu di akpa kamɛ nɛ. Aabuɛ alɛ, “Obe onwii kamɛ, fekpɛntɛ onwii lakyɛ alesaa kubi ɔsa.
40013004	Di obe wɔ aatɔɔsa ni alesaa kubi nwu koofe yi, kowo lakpete di osuku kotoko, ni baakansiɛ lasɛsɛɛ kũ baamɛ nɛ.
40013005	Alesaa kubi nwu nkpo kowo lakpete di lɛkpankplabukii kasɔ suoto, nfũ kɔɔtɛ diɛpɔ ni nwaa. Ta kuubi nwu ditakyɛ ni kasɔ kamɛ nwaa oso, kuawolaa ɔkɔntɔ.
40013006	Nkpo oso obe wɔ kuufĩ labadie nii, kuayɔɔ kuakpi, diekye sidu ninya ditakyɛ kasɔ kamɛ.
40013007	Alesaa nwu nkpo kubi kowo lakpete di kakɔtɔkɔtɔ siwuu kamɛ. Obe wɔ aakɔntɔ nii, kakɔtɔkɔtɔ nwu nkpo lafukuti kaatĩi nya fɛɛ.
40013008	Kafɔɔ alesaa kubi nwu nkpo kowo lakpete di kasɔ nwaa suoto kuatika abi. Awo latika abi kɔlafa. Awo kafɔɔ latika afosi akuɔ, ni di awo kafɔɔ latika afosi atiɛ nɛ.”
40013009	Ninfɛ di Yesu layɛntɛ, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Otii wɔ kuunutoko nkpe nii yi, aanu!”
40013010	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo lawa Yesu ɔkyɛ ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Be lɛsaa oso footuo batii nwu nkpo asaa di akpa kamɛ?”
40013011	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Aye di Yaa lediki Yaa Kafa Lɛsaatofo awofasaa eetuo, diele mma.
40013012	Diekye otii wɔ ninkpe ni asaa ya mmle okle yi, Yaa matɔɔ ankyakaa alɛ aawɛ bia anlenkee mmle oomiɛ nii. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ ninnaa ni asaa nwu nkpo awo yi, kafui ka bia ninkpe nwɔ ni yi, babaklee manfũ nwɔ ni nnɛɛ.
40013013	Lɛsaa le oso kotuo ma ni asaa di akpa kamɛ ninle alɛ, bɔɔnya kafɔɔ bɔɔlɔɔnya asaa batɛ nsũ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ boonu kafɔɔ bloonu kasɔ nɛ.
40013014	Nkpo oso Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ ni ntɔɔwa kaanya fɛ mmle aabuɛ ni alɛ, ‘Bibanu kafɔɔ bilɔbanu kasɔ, bibaanya kafɔɔ bilɔbatofo.
40013015	Diekye batii ba mmle disibu lɛbla buɛɛ, bakpe kafɔɔ setokopĩ, beetĩi anu lɛma kafɔɔ. Nse diele nkpo, se bɔɔnya, se boonu kafɔɔ, se disibu lɛma kafɔɔ ntabasɛkɛtɛ, alɛ baamunikĩi manwa ɔkyɛ nii, alɛ ami Yaa kayɔɔsa ma sifiɛ.’
40013016	Kafɔɔ aye yi, disi nlɛ ye lo! Diekye anu lee kɔnya, atoko lee kafɔɔ konu.
40013017	Diekye nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ kpinwu ku batii ba ninte ni tinini lamiɛ osie kanya alɛ bɔɔnya lɛsaa le biɔnya nii, kafɔɔ batanya. Baamiɛ kafɔɔ osie kanya alɛ boonu lɛsaa le bionu nii, kafɔɔ batanu.”
40013018	Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Nunua yi, bikyɔɔ atoko bienu lɛsaa le di alesaa kubi santɛ suoto lɛkpa le mmle kotuo ni.
40013019	Batii ba nienu ni Yaa Kafa suoto ɔlaa nwu nkpo, kafɔɔ manannu ni kasɔ yi, nkpo bate fɛ alesaa kubi ko niakpete ni di osukuntɛɛ suoto di kpiletɛ nwu nkpo lɛwa eebadiki ni ɔlaa nwu nkpo di situ lɛma kamɛ nɛ.
40013020	Alesaa kubi ko niakpete ni di lɛkpakplabukii kasɔ suoto yi, mma ninle batii ba nienu ni ɔlaa nwu nkpo beefũ nwu beenu ni ninfa ninfa ku suoto lɛyɔɔ nɛ.
40013021	Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ di ɔlaa nwu nkpo diese ni sidu kaamɛ lɛma oso yi, kunsiɛ ma kaamɛ kuaklɛ saa. Nkpo oso nse dibuo ku ditikanko lɛwa ma di suoto ta ɔlaa nwu oso yi, nfanwu mankple nkpaamaa.
40013022	Alesaa kubi ko niabuo ni di kakɔtɔkɔtɔ siwuu kamɛ yi, mma ninle batii ba nienu ni ɔlaa nwu, kafɔɔ bɛɛyɔ disibu lɛma beetika ni di kayi ka mmle asaa kpinwu suoto, ku mmle baawɛ nya ni oso, atoofukuti eetĩi ɔlaa nwu nkpo, kuɔta alɛ kulootika abi.
40013023	Alesaa kubi ko kafɔɔ niakpite ni di kasɔ nwaa suoto ninle batii ba nienu ni ɔlaa nwu beenu ni kasɔ. Beetika abi, bawo kɔlafa, bawo afosi akuɔ, bawo kafɔɔ afosi atiɛ.”
40013024	Yesu lapɛ ma lɛkpa bamba alɛ, “Yaa sɛka kalekɔ ntɛ fɛ nle mmle. Otii onwii lapɛ alesaa kubi biene di kofe nɔɔ kamɛ.
40013025	Dii ninwii kakyɛ, obe wɔ baatii bamuu nfɛ nte nii, lo nɔɔ onwii lakyɛ aalaasa sɛfa kpile sinwii kubi di alesaa kubi biene nwu kamɛ, ni aasifi nɛ.
40013026	Di obe wɔ di alesaa kubi nwu nkpo lakɔntɔ kuamuɔ kuakyako ni okpee yi, ni di sɛfa kpile kubi nwu kafɔɔ lakyako ɔkyɔɔ nɛ.
40013027	“Ninfɛ di kofe nwu nkpo saate bakpɛntɛ nɔɔ lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ babakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Ɔnɔɔfo, diele alesaa kubi biene faapɛ di kofe lɛfɔ nwu kamɛ? Ni fɛ di sɛfa kpile se mmle nwu nkpo lekye?’
40013028	“Ninfɛ di kofe nwu saate ladiki kanya alɛ, ‘Kpiletɛ onwii niɛbla nle mmle.’ “Ninfɛ di bakpɛntɛ nɔɔ nwu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Ni foomiɛ falɛ bukyɛ bualaasifi sɛfa nwu nkpo buyu?’
40013029	“Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, ‘Oowo. Loobia nse biɛkyɛ sɛfa nwu nkpo osifi oyu yi, bibasifi alesaa kubi nwu nkpo kafɔɔ minkpɔtɔɔsa di sɛfa nwu nkpo.
40013030	Aye bita akyuu lɛma anyɔ nwu nkpo ayila dilaase di alesaa nwu nkpo ofiɛlɛbee. Nfa nfɛ matɔkɔ bafiɛlɛtɛ nwu nlɛ, balekatũ basifi sɛfa nwu nkpo baanii sĩ akudi akudi baafiɛ sĩ. Nni kamaa baafiɛlɛ alesaa kubi nwu nkpo balaakpete mi di owu kamɛ.’ ”
40013031	Yesu lakple aapɛ ma lɛkpa bamba ninwii alɛ, “Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nte fɛ mmle okle. Otii onwii layɔ lewosobi biibii ninwii aapɛ koofe nɔɔ.
40013032	Dile lewosobi le niebiibii dilenke ni di alewosobi amuu kamɛ. Kafɔɔ nse kuomuɔ, kumakple kolewoso ko niemuɔ kulenke ni alewoso amuu di kofe nwu kamɛ. Bakansiɛ nwa mamabla ayo lɛma di sɛla nɔɔ suoto.”
40013033	Yesu lakple aapɛ lɛkpa bamba aabuɛ alɛ, “Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nte fɛ mmle okle. Ɔsanko onwii layɔ kɔfa ko man-yɔ mannwɔtɔ ni nnaafũ kafui, aanwɔtɔ nnaafũ kotofo kunwii dialaase di obe wɔ di mmuu lataka ni.”
40013034	Akpa kamɛ di Yesu lafe aatɔkɔ batii nwu nkpo sɛlaa se mmle simuu. Atakakatɛ aata ma, nse diele lɛkpa ɔɔpɛ.
40013035	Aabla nkpo alɛ Yaa Ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ ni kawa kaanya. Aabuɛ alɛ, “Akpa kamɛ makakatɛ nta ma. Mabuɛ asaa ya mananye nii ntɔkɔ ma, diɛyɔ ni di kayi ka mmle kasɔ kayekɔ.”
40013036	Obe wɔ di Yesu ladiki ni batii dikudi nwu nkpo osuku, ni aasifi leyo nɛ. Ninfɛ baasaateketetɛ nɔɔ lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ leeyo, babatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Diki lɛkpa le fɛɛpɛ ni kasɔ di sɛfa kpile suoto kofe fata wo.”
40013037	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kasɔ alɛ, “Otii wɔ niasa ni alesaa kubi biene nwu ninle Otii Obi nwu nɛ.
40013038	Kofe nwu nkpo kafɔɔ ninle kayi nɛ. Alesaa kubi biene nwu ninle batii ba ninle ni Yaa kafa batii nɛ. Sɛfa kpile nwu nkpo ninle batii ba ninle ni kpiletɛ nwu nkpo bale nɛ.
40013039	Kpiletɛ wɔ kafɔɔ niasa ni sɛfa kpile nwu ninle Abonsam nɛ. Alesaa kubi nwu nkpo ofiɛlɛbee kafɔɔ ninle kayi kalookɔ nɛ. Alesaa kubi bafiɛlɛtɛ nwu nkpo ninle Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nɛ.
40013040	“Fɛ mmle okle baasiisa ni sɛfa, baafiɛ sĩ ni di ɔtɔ kamɛ yi, nkpo okle kafɔɔ dibate di kayi kalookɔ nɛ.
40013041	Ami, Otii Obi nwu, makyesee Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nii nkyeko osi, manwa mamasiisa batii ba bamuu ninkɔta batii mbla ni okpile ku batii ba bamuu ninkɔbla ni sikpile di Sɛka kalekɔ nii kamɛ.
40013042	Babafuki ma makpee di kawɔɔ ɔtɔ wɔ nikofiɛ ni bembembe kamɛ. Nfa babawi kaku, manwee anyɛɛ nɛ.
40013043	Kafɔɔ Yaa batii makpa fɛ le kufĩ di Teete lɛma Sɛka kalekɔ kamɛ di osi. Otii wɔ kuunutoko nkpe nii, aanu.
40013044	“Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nte fɛ nle mmle okle. Obe onwii, otii onwii lakyɛ aalaawɛ lɛsaawɛ le niefũ ni kɔyɔ di kofe kunwii kamɛ beekookaa nii. Ni aakple aayɔ lɛsaa nwu nkpo aakookaa nɛ. Di suoto lɛyɔɔ kamɛ, ni aasifi aalaayɔ asaa nɔɔ amuu aasunsũ, ni aasifi aalaaya kofe nwu nkpo nɛ.”
40013045	Yesu lakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Yaa sɛka kalekɔ lekple dite fɛ nle mmle. Asaa sunsutɛ onwii latoomiɛ aniibi ya niefũ ni kɔyɔ osie kanya.
40013046	Obe wɔ aawɛ ni onii wɔ ninlɛ kulenke ni yi, aasifi aalaayɔ asaa nɔɔ ya amuu ninkpe nwɔ ni aasunsũ, aayɔ aalaaya oniibi nwu nkpo.
40013047	“Yaa sɛka kalekɔ lekple dite fɛ nle mmle okle. Kɔkpaku badikitɛ banwii lataa asawu baakpee di lekpo kamɛ, ni baadiki kakpaku ate ate nɛ.
40013048	Obe wɔ di asawu nwu nkpo layii nii, baananfi nya baawako lekpo kotoko, ni baasiɛ kaasɔ baasɛsɛɛ kɔkpaku nwu nkpo nɛ. Baayɔ kubiene baakpete di kakyikyɛ kamɛ, ni baayɔ kɔlalaale kafɔɔ baawii nɛ.
40013049	Nkpo okle diɔwa ɔbate di kayi kalookɔ nɛ. Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ mawa mamadiki babienetɛ mankyeko bakpileblatɛ kamɛ.
40013050	Nse batɔɔyɔ bakpileblatɛ beefuki beekpee di kawɔɔ ɔtɔ kamɛ. Nfa di kaku owi ku anyɛɛ owee mawɛ nɛ.”
40013051	Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Bienu lɛsaa biala lɛtɔkɔ ye ni kasɔ?” Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Yii, buonu kasɔ.”
40013052	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ni nle mmle kotuo alɛ asaa batuotɛ lele nintookple Yaa sɛka kalekɔ asaa teketetɛ kamaa, nfɛ nte fɛ leyo saate wɔ nindiki asaa kofole ku asaa fɔle ankyeko ni asaa nɔɔ katɛkɔ anwako ni kayi.”
40013053	Obe wɔ di Yesu laloo ni akpa nwu nkpo ɔpɛ yi, aadie ninfa aasifi.
40013054	Ninfɛ aakple aasifi nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ okpoo lɛma nɛ. Ninfɛ aalaatuo asaa di kasiisakɔ lɛma nɛ. Batii ba nianu ni asaa nɔɔ otuo, diabla ma yaaa. Ninfɛ baakaalɛ suoto lɛma alɛ, “Ɔfɛ ɛɛwɛ lɛsaatofo le mmle nwu nkpo eekyeko? Ɔfɛ kafɔɔ ɛɛwɛ osie wɔ akle ɔɔblako ni sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ antuo ni?
40013055	Sɛɛ diele nnwɔɔ ninle asaa wolatɛ nwu obi? Diele ɔya kafɔɔ ninle Maria, diele babilɛma suɔtɔbi kafɔɔ ninle Yakobo ku Yosef ku Simon ku Yuda?
40013056	Diele babilɛma sankobi bamuu kafɔɔ ninsiwo kaamɛ ninfũ nɛ? Ni owe niɛtɔɔ lɛsaatofo ku osie wɔ mmle okle?”
40013057	Nioso diawɛ ma osie alɛ baafũ nwɔ, nkpo oso baasĩ nwɔ. Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Batii mbu Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ di kakɔbiala, diediki nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ okpoo lɛma ku kafaabi nɔɔ batii kamɛ lete, manambu nwɔ.”
40013058	Ta batafũ Yesu baanu ni oso yi, atabla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ kpinwu di Nasaret batii kamɛ.
40014001	Di obe nwu kamɛ yi, Herode wɔ niatoole ni sɛka di Galilea kasɔ suoto lanu Yesu leyooto.
40014002	Ni aatɔkɔ batii nɔɔ alɛ, “Otii wɔ mmle yi, Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane nintoo kple ɛɛtaka eekye bakpi kamɛ ɛɛwa. Nkpo oso akpe osie ɔɔbla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ antuo nɛ.”
40014003	Aabuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle diekye Herode wɔ mmle niata baamufũ Yohane, aata baanii nwɔ, baatɛ nwɔ leeyo. Herode labla nle mmle ta Herodia wɔ ninle obilɛma Filipo ɔsɔfɔ oso.
40014004	Diekye lɛsaa le niawa ni ninle alɛ, Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane lasĩ ɔlaa aata Herode alɛ, “Yaa kufiofa diɛta osuku alɛ, faafũ obilee ɔsɔfɔ Herodia fanyɔ.”
40014005	Nkpo oso Herode lamiɛ alɛ oolo Yohane. Kafɔɔ aatɔɔyɛkɛ Yuda batii, diekye baatoobu Yohane fɛ le Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ.
40014006	Dii ninwii, Herode latoole lelofoyi nɔɔ, aalɛɛ batii kpinwu. Ni di Herodia obi sankobi lakyɛ aalaatũ di batii nwu nkpo anu nɛ. Katũ nɔɔ nwu nkpo labuo Herode anu osie kanya.
40014007	Ni aaka ntam aabuɛ alɛ, “Matafɔ lɛsaa lele fɛɛkaalɛ mi!”
40014008	Ninfɛ di ɔsankobi nwu nkpo ɔya latɔɔ disibu di lɛsaa le aakaalɛ ni suoto nɛ. Nkpo oso aakyɛ aalaakaalɛ Herode alɛ, “Komiɛ Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane disi di bɛɛsi bɛnkɛɛ kamɛ nunua.”
40014009	Lɛsaa le mmle di ɔsankobi nwu nkpo lakaalɛ ni labuo ɔka Herode suoto. Kafɔɔ di ntam be aaka ni di banɔɔfo nwu nkpo bamuu anu oso, aata osuku alɛ babla di ɔsankobi nwu nkpo dibiesaa suoto batɔɔ.
40014010	Nioso aakpee otii lakyɛ aalaabudi Yohane disi di leyo katenkɔ.
40014011	Ni aayɔ disi nwu nkpo aakpee di bɛɛsi bɛnkɛɛ kamɛ aawako ɔsankobi nwu nkpo nɛ. Ni di ɔsankobi nwu nkpo kafɔɔ layɔ disi nwu aakyɛnko ɔya nɛ.
40014012	Ni di Yohane basaateketetɛ nɔɔ labayɔ kpi nwu nkpo baasifiko baalaakookaa nɛ. Ni baakyɛ baalaatɔkɔ Yesu nɛ.
40014013	Di obe wɔ di Yesu lanu alɛ batoolo ni Yohane yi, ni aayɔ oklo aadie ninfa aasifi laba le nielo ni baatii nnaa ni nɛ. Obe wɔ baatii lanu nfũ akpe nii, kpinwu lɛma ladie seekpoo lɛma baakyɛ nkpaa, baati nwɔ, baakyɛ ninfa.
40014014	Obe wɔ di Yesu ladie ni di oklo kamɛ, aanya ni batii ɔlambu nwu nkpo, kafutu lanyinyii nwɔ di suoto lɛma. Ni aayɔɔsa mba niatoofiɛ ni bamuu sifiɛ nɛ.
40014015	Di obe wɔ di kɔtɔɔfɔ lawo nii, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ babatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kale nfɛ koloo, nfũ bukpe ni kafɔɔ lekyo ku okpoo. Nkpo oso diki batii ba mmle osuku, baatɔɔkyɛ nkpaayotũ baalaamiɛ lelesaa bale.”
40014016	Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Diefĩ alɛ baasifi. Aye bamu bimiɛ lɛsaa lewo bita ma bale.”
40014017	Ni baasaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Alesaa ya lete bukle ni ninle bloblo akudi anɔɔ ku kɔkpaku sɛnle kɔnyɔ.”
40014018	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biyɔ alesaa nwu biwakoe.”
40014019	Ni aatɔkɔ batii nwu nkpo bamuu alɛ basiɛ kaasɔ di sɛfa kɔnle nwu nkpo suoto. Ninfɛ aayɔ bloblo akudi anɔɔ ku kɔkpaku kɔyɔ nwu nkpo, ni aakplesa anu katoo aanyu osi aapɛ Yaa sɛfa nɛ. Ni aabɛbɛɛ bloblo nwu nkpo kɔkyɛɛ kɔkyɛɛ aata basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nɛ. Ni baasaateketetɛ nɔɔ kafɔɔ layɔ baata batii nwu nkpo nɛ.
40014020	Obiala lɛma lale alesaa nwu nkpo aamiɛ. Nni kamaa, ni basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasiisa kɔkyɛɛ kɔkyɛɛ ko niabu nii baakpete di nkyikyɛ kamɛ nɛ. Baawɛ lefosi nikyikyɛ nnyɔ pɔ.
40014021	Batii ba niale ni alesaa nwu nkpo labla basuɔtɔ nkpe nnɔɔ. Bataka basanko ku babisɔ baakpee kaamɛ.
40014022	Ninfɛ di Yesu lata alɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ layie baabuo di oklo kamɛ alɛ balekatũ bataalɛ basifi lekpo nwu nkpo kakyɛ nyɔɔfa nɛ. Diabu lete nɔɔ ninfa alɛ oodiki batii nwu nkpo osuku.
40014023	Di obe wɔ atoodiki batii nwu nkpo osuku eeloo ni kamaa, lete nɔɔ aakata aasifi kobokote osi alɛ ɔɔlaapɛ ɔlaa anta Yaa. Kale laloo, nioso Yesu lete niabu ninfa.
40014024	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, oklo nwu nkpo ntɔɔkyɛ sitũ nwaa. Lekpo ntu latɔɔkpɛko oklo nwu nkpo, diekye lekpo kɔfɛɛfɔ latɔɔfɛ kuatɔɔkyako oklo nwu nkpo.
40014025	Kolesɛtũ elomu etiɛ ku elomu ekuɔ ntɛɛ yi, Yesu lakyɛ di ntu osi aatoofe basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo nfũ.
40014026	Di obe wɔ kamɛ baanyɔɔ akyɛ di ntu osi ɔɔwa nii, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ ma baabuɛ alɛ, “Kpi dile!” Nkpo oso baayiisa kudu osie kanya!
40014027	Nfanwu Yesu lakakatɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Binya otu! Ami dile! Bitanyɛkɛ!”
40014028	Ninfɛ di Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, nse afɔ dile nwaako, ni faatɛɛ nkyɛ di ntu osi nwa ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ.”
40014029	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Wa!” Ninfɛ di Petro ladie di oklo nwu kamɛ aakyako ɔkyɛ di ntu osi, aatoofe Yesu nfũ nɛ.
40014030	Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ aanya ni kɔfɛɛfɔ ko niatɔɔfɛ ni osie kanya, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ nwɔ, ni aakyako ɔmɛɛ di ntu nkpo kamɛ nɛ. Ni aafaa osie kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Saate, diki mi!”
40014031	Nfanwu ni di Yesu lananfi kɔnɛɛ nɔɔ aamufũ nwɔ, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ofũ onu lɛfɔ diewo! Be oso fonoofũ mi fanu?”
40014032	Banyɔ lɛma baabuo di oklo nwu nkpo kamɛ, ni kɔɔfɛɛfɔ nwu nkpo ladiɛ ɔfɛ nɛ.
40014033	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo di oklo kamɛ lapɛ akunkyi baasumu nwɔ baabuɛ alɛ, “Nwaako, Yaa Obi fale!”
40014034	Obe wɔ baataalɛ lekpo nwu nkpo baalaadu ni kayɛ nyɔɔfa di Genesaret kasɔ suoto yi,
40014035	batii lanya Yesu baatɛ nsũ ninfa. Nkpo oso baakyɛ baalaakpaa bafiɛtɛ ba ninkpe ni di ntɛɛ nwu nkpo fɛɛ baawako Yesu nfũ.
40014036	Ni baatikiti Yesu lekoto alɛ ata bafiɛtɛ bakpanko nwɔ awu kotoko lete pɛ. Batii ba bamuu niakpanko ni awu nɔɔ kotoko yi, sifiɛ lɛma layɔɔ ma.
40015001	Ninfɛ di Farisi batii bawo ku kufiofa asaa batuotɛ bawo lakye Yerusalem baawa Yesu nfũ babakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ,
40015002	“Be oso di basaateketetɛ lɛfɔ diloole afiofa ya di saa bakofo loo lediɛ bɛɛtɛ wo ni? Diekye mánfoto nnɛɛ lɛma fiɛ manle alesaa fɛ mmle di ɔsaabla loo kotuo nii.”
40015003	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Be oso di aye kafɔɔ biesĩ Yaa kufiofa ole, bitikanko saa bakofo loo ɔsaabla nkpaamaa?
40015004	Yaa lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Bu teefɔ ku yaafɔ. Otii lele niɛkpaani ote ee ɔya, dikpe ni beelo nwɔ.’
40015005	Kafɔɔ biotuo bilɛ, nse otii owo nkpe lɛsaa alɛ ɔɔyɔ ankyakaako ote ee ɔya, eebuɛ alɛ, ‘Lɛyɔ lɛsaa le mmle nlɛ kɔta Yaa’ yi,
40015006	diesinfĩ alɛ otii nwu nkpo kabu ote ee ɔya. Di nle mmle ɔbla suoto yi, biesĩ Yaa kufiofa ole, bitikanko bawa lee nwu nkpo ɔsaabla nkpaamaa.
40015007	Aye balaatɛ! Nwaako, ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia labuɛ aatɛ ni di suoto lee ntɔɔwa kaanya. Aabuɛ alɛ.
40015008	‘Batii ba mmle kanya fukiti ko man-yɔ mantansɛɛ, kafɔɔ mambɔmbɔ mi siitu lɛma kamɛ.
40015009	Kasakasa bɔɔbla mi ɔkpɛ. Diekye bakle batii afiofa bootuo fɛle afiofa nii ale.’ ”
40015010	Ninfɛ di Yesu lalɛɛ batii dikudi nwu nkpo aawako ɔkyɛ nɔɔ ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bikyɔɔ atoko, bienu kasɔ!
40015011	Diele alesaa ya di otii nnle ankpee ni kaafutu kamɛ ninta alɛ ankpɔnɔnfɔ. Kafɔɔ sɛlaa se nindie sinkye ni otii kanya kamɛ ninta otii nkpɔnɔnfɔ.”
40015012	Ni baasaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ babatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Faye falɛ sɛlaa se feebuɛ ni lebuo Farisi batii nwu nkpo suoto osi kanya?”
40015013	Yesu ladiki kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Kowoso lele di Teemi wɔ ninkpe ni di osi diɛsɔ yi, abasifi kũ an-yu.
40015014	Nkpo oso bitankpee ma kanya. Banumbiɛtɛ bale bɔɔkpaa banumbiɛtɛ wo lɛma. Nse numbiɛtɛ kafɔɔ kɔkpaa numbiɛtɛ wo nɔɔ yi, akyuu lɛma anyɔ, babanɔɔ mambuo diibiɔ kamɛ.”
40015015	Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Diki lɛkpa nwu nkpo fɛɛpɛ ni kasɔ di alesaa ya ninkponɔfɔsa ni otii suoto fata wo.”
40015016	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ni aye kafɔɔ batii ba ninoonu sɛlaa kasɔ biekple bile?
40015017	Biye bilɛ lɛsaa lele di otii lekpee kaanya kamɛ, kafutu kamɛ ninsifi, nni kamaa, ankyɛ ni an-yu.
40015018	Kafɔɔ sɛlaa se nindie sinkye ni otii kanya kamɛ yi, otii otu kamɛ sinkye. Sɛlaa nwu ninle asaa ya ninta alɛ otii nkpɔnɔnfɔ nɛ.
40015019	Diekye disibu kpile le ninta alɛ otii nlo ni otii, ku lɛsɔnɔkpee ku seteeteelaa ku kayu ku sɛlaa kuafunu ku ditiikpɔnɔnfɔsa yi, otii otu kamɛ ankye.
40015020	Asaa ya mmle ninta otii nkpɔnɔnfɔ nɛ. Kafɔɔ nse otii lele alesaa ananfoto kɔnɛɛ fɛ mmle di Farisi batii kotuo ni yi, nni nkpo nínkpɔnɔnfɔsa otii.”
40015021	Yesu ladie ninfa, ni aasifi ntɛɛ be niɛtɛɛtɛɛ ni sekpoo kplɛ se ninle ni Tiro ku Sidon nɛ.
40015022	Ni di Kana ɔsanko onwii ninkpe ni nintɛɛ nwu nkpo lawa Yesu nfũ, aafaa aatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ, “Saate nii, Ɔka Dawid Obi! Nyɛɛ nyaami! Ninwuna kpile ninwii kɔkpɛko obi nii sankobi, asi diibuo kamɛ osie kanya!”
40015023	Kafɔɔ Yesu ditadiki kanya. Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lawa babatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tososɔɔ aatɔɔkyɛ, diekye atikanko wo, ootĩisa wo atoko.”
40015024	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya aatɔkɔ ɔsanko nwu alɛ, “Israel batii ba ninte ni fɛ bafoso ba nieyu nii, mma ɔkyɛ di Yaa lekpee mi nɛ.”
40015025	Kafɔɔ ɔsanko wɔ mmle lapɛ akunkyi di Yesu nkpaatũ aatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ, “Saate nii, kyakaakoe!”
40015026	Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Diɛlɛ alɛ baayɔ babisɔ alesaa manfuki man-yu baweewee lɛma.”
40015027	Ninfɛ di ɔsanko nwu nkpo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Saate nii, nwaako kulɛ. Kafɔɔ baweewee kafɔɔ nkpe osuku manle alesaa kɔbɛfɛɛ ko ninkpa ni di saate lɛma opunu suoto kumpɛ ni kaasɔ.”
40015028	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle yi, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “O ɔsanko, ofũ onu lɛfɔ lemuɔ lo! Lɛsaa le foomiɛ ni yi, diwa kaanya dita fɔ.” Nkpo oso di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ tutuutu, ni di obi nɔɔ sankobi nwu ofiɛ layɔɔ nwɔ nɛ.
40015029	Yesu ladie ninfa aalaafe di Galilea Lekpo kotoko, ni aalaadu kabokotee kanwii ɔlɔɔkɔ, ni aakata ka aasifi aalaasiɛ nɛ.
40015030	Batii dikudi kpinwu lawa nwɔ ɔkyɛ, ni baakpaa batii ba niefefee basi ni kaasɔ ku mba ninoofuo ni ɔkyɛ nwaa ku banumbiɛtɛ ku bamumu ku bafiɛtɛ bamba kpinwu baawako baabatɛ di anu nɔɔ, ni aayɔɔsa ma sifiɛ nɛ.
40015031	Obe wɔ di batii nwu nkpo lanya bamumu kɔkakatɛ nii, batii ba ninoofuo ni ɔkyɛ nfɛ nkyɛ ni nwaa, batii ba niefefee basi ni kaasɔ ntoosie nii, banumbiɛtɛ kafɔɔ nfɛ kɔnya ni yi, diabla ma yaaa. Ni baatansa Israel Yaa nɛ.
40015032	Yesu lalɛɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ aawako ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Batii ba mmle nwu nkpo ɔlaa konu mi kafutu, diekye batɔɔwɛ di ɔkyɛ nii ayi atiɛ amu kafɔɔ lɛsalɛsaa nnaa ma baale nii. Noomiɛ nlɛ ndiki ma osuku baatɔɔkyɛ leyo ku kɔka. Nse diele nkpo, babalaatokpi kɔka di osuku.”
40015033	Ni di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Fɛ bubawɛ alesaa ɔfaafuu wɔ mmle kamɛ munta banankpantii ba mmle manle mammiɛ?”
40015034	Ni di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Bloblo akudi asɛ bikle?” Ni baasaateketetɛ nwu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Bloblo akudi akuɛnsĩ ku kɔkpaku biibii kɔsɛɛ kowo ko bukle.”
40015035	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ batii nwu nkpo alɛ basiɛ kaasɔ.
