40015036	Ninfɛ di Yesu layɔ bloblo akudi akuɛnsĩ ku kɔkpaku nwu nkpo, ni aapɛ Yaa sɛfa nɛ. Ninfɛ aabɛbɛɛ alesaa nwu nkpo aata basaateketetɛ nɔɔ, ni baasaateketetɛ nwu nkpo kafɔɔ baayɔ baasɛ batii dikudi nwu nɛ.
40015037	Bamuu lɛma baale baamiɛ. Obe wɔ baasaateketetɛ lasiisa ni kufui kufui ko niabu nii, baawɛ nkyikyɛ nkuɛnsĩ pɔ.
40015038	Batii ba niale ni alesaa nwu nkpo labla basuɔtɔ nkpe nna. Bataka basanko ku babisɔ baakpee kaamɛ.
40015039	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki batii dikudi nwu nkpo osuku baasifi, ni aabuo di oklo kamɛ aasifi Magadan ntɛɛ nwu kasɔ suoto nɛ.
40016001	Farisi batii ku Saduki batii bawo lawa Yesu nfũ alɛ bɔbawolaa nwɔ kaanya. Nkpo oso baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Bla dituosaa lewo fatuo wo buotofo bulɛ nwaako Yaa nfũ fɛɛkye.”
40016002	Kafɔɔ Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nse kufĩ nfɛ kofe kamɛɛkɔ diɛ kolo lɛsɛɛ yi, mimbuɛ bilɛ kayi malɛ kɔsɛɛ.
40016003	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ mimbuɛ ku kolesɛtũ bilɛ, ‘Alokonkyɛ lɛsɛɛ kayi lefuu nioso kanto manɔɔ.’ Minfuo mmle kaayi mate ni otofo nse bienyu osi. Kafɔɔ biloofuo atuosaa ya ninkɔwa ni di obe wɔ mmle kamɛ kasɔ onu!
40016004	Aye miɛ akyɛnfɔɔle kpile, bitookple di Yaa nkpaamaa, biomiɛ bilɛ mbla dituosaa ntuo ye. Oowo! Bilabanya dituosaa kuniwii dilenkee Yona lele le okle.” Nkpo oso Yesu ladiɛ ma aasifi.
40016005	Obe wɔ di basaateketetɛ nwu lataalɛ lɛpanta nwu nkpo baalaadu ni kayɛ nyɔɔfa yi, ni baanyuma alɛ baayɔ bloblo kuonwii bakle nɛ.
40016006	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bilolaa binyu nwaa di Farisi batii ku Saduki batii kɔfa ko mankpee ni di nnaafũ kamɛ nintaka ni suoto.”
40016007	Ninfɛ baakyako obuɛ kaamɛ lɛma alɛ, “Mmle munan-yɔ bloblo kuonwii bukle ni oso obuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle?”
40016008	Yesu latofo ɔlaa wɔ baatoobuɛ nii, nioso aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Be oso biobuɛ kaamɛ bilɛ biɛyɔ bloblo kuonwii bikle? Ofũ onu lee lɛtɛ kuɔwa kasɔ lo!
40016009	Ni biifuo otofo? Ni biloonyuma obe wɔ labɛbɛɛ bloblo akudi anɔɔ lasɛ ni batii nkpe nnɔɔ? Nkyikyɛ nsɛ kɔkyɛɛ kɔkyɛɛ ko biasiisa ni layii?
40016010	Diɛkyakaa nii, bloblo akudi akuɛnsĩ ya layɔ lata ni basuɔtɔ nkpe nna mɔ? Nkyikyɛ nsɛ biasiisa kɔkyɛɛ kɔkyɛɛ nwu biayiisa?
40016011	Ni be oso minoofuo otofo bilɛ diele bloblo suoto kɔkakatɛ nta ye nlɛ, ‘Bilolaa binyu nwaa di Farisi batii ku Saduki batii kɔfa ko mankpee ni di nnaafũ kamɛ nintaka ni suoto’?”
40016012	Nfa nfɛ di basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lanu kasɔ alɛ diele kɔfa ko mankpee ni di nnaafũ kamɛ nintaka ni suoto ɔɔkakatɛ anta ma. Kafɔɔ di asaa ya di Farisi batii ku Saduki batii ntuo ni suoto alaka.
40016013	Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasifi ntɛɛ be niɛtɛɛtɛɛ ni Kaesarea Filipi okpoo. Nfa aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Owe baatii kobuɛ alɛ ami, Otii Obi nwu, nle?”
40016014	Ni baadiki kanya alɛ, “Bawo kobuɛ alɛ Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane. Bawo kafɔɔ kobuɛ alɛ Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Elia fale. Fiɛ baawo kafɔɔ kobuɛ alɛ Yeremia ee Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ bamba owo fale.”
40016015	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ni aye mɔ? Owe biobuɛ bilɛ nle?”
40016016	Ninfɛ di Simon Petro ladiki kanya alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Kristo nwu nkpo nɛ, Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa Obi.”
40016017	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Yaa ntoowii fɔ lɛyɔɔ, Simon, Yona obi. Diekye diele otii kuonwii niediki nle mmle eetuo fɔ, kafɔɔ Teemi wɔ ninkpe ni di osi niediki eetuo fɔ.
40016018	Nkpo oso kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ afɔ ninle Petro di lɛsɔdiki ninle ni difuɔnkpaa. Difuɔnkpaa le mmle suoto kamatofo bafũbanutɛ nii dikudi nɛ. Bia kukpi osie dilɔbafuo ma olenkee.
40016019	Kamayɔ Yaa sɛka kalekɔ osie nta fɔ. Lɛsaa lele feenii kaasɔ ka mmle suoto yi, Yaa kafɔɔ manii ni di osi. Lɛsaa lele kafɔɔ feefukuti di kasɔ ka mmle suoto yi, Yaa kafɔɔ mafukuti ni di osi.”
40016020	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakpee basaateketetɛ nɔɔ kufiofa alɛ, “Bitantɔkɔ otii kuonwii bilɛ ami ninle Kristo nwu.”
40016021	Diayɔ ni di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Yesu lakye kasɔ aatɔɔtɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo alɛ, “Dikpe ni lɛkyɛ Yerusalem lɛlaafe diibuo kpinwu kamɛ di okpoo banɔɔfo ku oleɔta banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ. Babalo mi, kafɔɔ dii tiɛfa Yaa masɛnkɛsɛɛ ankyeko bakpi kamɛ nsiɛ nkpa.”
40016022	Ninfɛ di Petro lakpaa Yesu aasifiko ɔlɔɔkɔ aalaasĩ ɔlaa aatɔɔ, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, Yaa ata nle mmle dikyɛ di okyo. Diidii nle mmle dilabawafɔ di suoto!”
40016023	Yesu lamunikĩi aatɔkɔ Petro alɛ, “Abonsam, kyɛ mi di ɔlɔɔkɔ fasifi! Fale disukutĩisaa fɛɛtɛɛ, diekye disibu le fakle ni yi, diele Yaa nfũ diekye. Otii disibu dile.”
40016024	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Nse otii owo komiɛ alɛ awa abatikankoe, ni dikpe nii ansĩ suoto nɔɔ, an-yɔ aatoo nɔɔ, antikankoe.
40016025	Diekye otii lele nikomiɛ alɛ ata nkpa nɔɔ, abayu mi, kafɔɔ otii lele nieyu nkpa nɔɔ ta ami oso yi, nwaako abawɛ mi.
40016026	Obe nfasũ di otii mawɛ nse ɛɛwɛ kayi ka mmle asaa amuu eeyu nkpa nɔɔ? Ee lɛsaa lewo nkpe di otii kafuo ni ɔyɔ ɔkyɛlɛnsa ofũ nkpa nɔɔ?
40016027	Diekye Otii Obi nwu nkpo kamawa di Ote lɛkpa kamɛ ku Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ, abata otii biala koto di nkpa nɔɔ be eesiɛ ni kanya.
40016028	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, batii bawo nsi ye kaamɛ ninfũ, blɔwa ɔbakpi fiɛ babanya Otii Obi nwu nkpo kɔwa fɛ ɔka.”
40017001	Ayi akuɔ sɛmaa, Yesu lakpaa Petro, Yakobo ku obilɛma suɔtɔbi Yohane baasifi kobokote takale kunwii osi. Ni baalaasiɛ ninfa lete lɛma nɛ.
40017002	Di obe wɔ baasiɛ ni ninfa, baanya nii, Yesu letembi ntookyi. Anu nɔɔ lakpa fɛle kufĩ, awu nɔɔ kafɔɔ lapu aatoosese di anu.
40017003	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo batiɛ lanya Mose ku Elia bɔɔkakatɛko Yesu nɛ.
40017004	Nioso Petro latakatɛsa sɛlɔ katoo aatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saate, diɛtɛ dilɛ alɛ buɔwa nfũ! Nse feetuna yi, mapɛ akpanta atiɛ. Alefɔ anwii, Mose ale anwii, Elia ale kafɔɔ anwii.”
40017005	Di obe wɔ ayɛ ɔɔkakatɛ ni yi, dituntũ le niɛkpa ni lawa diabafukuti diatĩi ma di suoto. Ni sɛɛlɔ ladie diituntũ nwu kamɛ siabuɛ alɛ, “Obi nii bɔmbɔtɛ ninle nwɔ mmle nɛ. Nintuna nwɔ di suoto, oobuo mi anu nwaa. Bikyɔɔ nwɔ atoko!”
40017006	Di obe wɔ baasaateketetɛ batiɛ nwu nkpo lanu ni sɛlɔ se mmle yi, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ ma osie kanya, ni baafuusa anu kaasɔ nɛ.
40017007	Ni di Yesu lakple aawa ɔkyɛ lɛma abakpanko ma aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitaka! Bitanyɛkɛ!”
40017008	Ninfɛ baatakatɛsa anu katoo nɛ, batasinya otii kuonwii dilenkee Yesu lete.
40017009	Di obe wɔ nfɛ boosoo mankye ni kobokote nwu nkpo suoto manwa nii, Yesu lakpee ma kufiofa alɛ, “Bitantɔkɔ otii kuonwii dituosaa le beediki beetuo ye ni ninfũ, diɛlaase di obe wɔ bɛɛtakatɛsa ni ami, Otii Obi nwu nkpo, beekyeko ni bakpi kamɛ.”
40017010	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Ni obe oso di kufiofa batuotɛ labuɛ alɛ dikpe ni Elia lelekatũ ɛɛwa fiɛ di asaa ya mmle lɛwa kaanya?”
40017011	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Nwaako dile alɛ Elia lelekatũ ɛɛwa ɛɛba lololaa lɛsaa biala ɛɛtɛ.
40017012	Kafɔɔ kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ Elia ntɔɔwa kofokofoko, kafɔɔ batii diɛnyɔɔ batɛ nsũ, ni baabla nwɔ amumu fɛ mmle dilɛ ma ni nɛ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ bababla Otii Obi nwu amumu nɛ.”
40017013	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo latofo alɛ Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane suoto ɔɔkakatɛtɛ anta ma nɛ.
40017014	Di obe wɔ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasoo baabadu ni batii dikudi nwu nkpo nfũ yi, osuɔtɔ onwii lawa Yesu nfũ aabapɛ akunkyi kaatũ nɔɔ.
40017015	Ni aatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saate, nya obi nii suɔtɔbi wɔ mmle nyaami. Kakpibubu nsi nwɔ kɔɔnwɔtɔ nwɔ osie kanya. Obe lele ɔɔnɔɔ ambuo di ntu ku ɔtɔ kamɛ.
40017016	Lɛkpaa nwɔ lɛwako basaateketetɛ lɛfɔ, kafɔɔ baafuo nwɔ ofiɛ ɔnyɔɔsa.”
40017017	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Aye miɛ akyɛnfɔɔle, be oso minoofũ mi binu, bikpe otokopĩ nkpo? Ɔmɛmbe okle kakpee otu nnanfi ye nnaase? Namasiɛ ye di ɔkyɛ obe lele! Bikpaa obisɔ nwu nkpo biwakoe ninfũ!”
40017018	Ninfɛ di Yesu lasĩ ɔlaa aata ninwuna kpile le niasiɛ ni di obisɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ, ninfɛ diadie nɛ. Nfanwu ni di ofiɛ nwu nkpo layɔɔ nwɔ nɛ.
40017019	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lawa Yesu nfũ babakaalɛ nwɔ buɛɛ alɛ, “Be oso munanfuo ninwuna kpile nwu nkpo otososa odiki?”
40017020	Ni di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Diekye ofũ onu lee diɛpɔ. Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse ofũ onu lee nte fɛ alesaa kubi biibii yɛntɛle yi, biafuo kobokote takale ko mmle ɔtɔkɔ bilɛ, ‘Taka ninfũ fasifi kamaa nwu falaayila!’ Kubasifi. Lɛsalɛsaa kuninwii ɔbla dilaba lenkee ye!
40017021	Nse diele kanya onii ku ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta Yaa, bilaafuo ninwuna le mmle okle otososa odiki.”
40017022	Di obe wɔ baasaateketetɛ nwu nkpo bamuu labasi ni di Galilea yi, Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Babayɔ Otii Obi nwu nkpo mankpee di batii nnɛɛ kamɛ.
40017023	Babalo nwɔ, kafɔɔ dii tiɛfa, Yaa makple ansɛnkɛsa nwɔ ankyeko bakpi kamɛ.” Nioso, basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo labuo nyaami.
40017024	Di obe wɔ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lababuo ni Kapernaum, Yuda batii Olekatakɔ ato bafuntɛ labakaalɛ Petro alɛ, “Saatuotɛ lee kafɔɔ nta Olekatakɔ koto nwu nkpo?”
40017025	Ninfɛ di Petro ladiki kanya alɛ, “Be Oso. Anta!” Nkpo oso obe wɔ di Petro lakyɛ aalaabuo ni leyo, ni di Yesu lalekatũ aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Simon, lɛfɛɛnya? Bawe dikpe ni bɛɛta akpooto ku kale ato bɛɛta kayi ka mmle baka? Kale babi ɛɛ, sɛɛ bafɔɔ?”
40017026	Ninfɛ di Petro ladiki kanya alɛ, “Bafɔɔ.” Ninfɛ di Yesu labuɛ alɛ, “Dilɛ. Nse dinaa alɛ kale babi kata fiɛ!
40017027	Kafɔɔ noomiɛ nlɛ buwolaa batii ba mmle kaanya, tɔɔkyɛ lekpo nwu nkpo kotoko falaataa dadiwa. Kakpaku ka kasale fabadiki ni yi, nyu ka kanya kamɛ, fabanya koto kowo nimawo ni ami ku kole ye fanta ni Olekatakɔ nwu koto. Diki koto nwu, faayɔ falaata koto ko busiko ma ni.”
40018001	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lawa Yesu nfũ babakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Owe ninle otii finle di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ?”
40018002	Ninfɛ di Yesu lalɛɛ obisɔ biibii onwii aabayila ma di anu nɛ.
40018003	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye ntikiti nlɛ, nse biekyisa letembi lee bite fɛ babisɔ yi, diidii, bilababuo Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo.
40018004	Otii wɔ niefũ kɔya alenke ni di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo ninle, otii wɔ niɛwakosa ni suoto kasɔ, eekyi eete fɛ obisɔ wɔ mmle okle.
40018005	“Otii wɔ nimafũ ni obisɔ biibii wɔ mmle okle di leyooto nii kamɛ yi, ami eefũ.
40018006	“Nse Otii owo lɛta alɛ babisɔ ba mmle nwu nkpo onwii lɛma leyu ofũ onu nɔɔ kaamɛ nii, nse bɔɔyɔ kukuɔ dibinte beenii bɛɛsakasa nwɔ siimu beesoosa nwɔ beekpee di lekpo kakyofolekɔ ɛɛmɛ ntu eekpi yi, dibalɛ nwɔ ninlenkee.
40018007	“Kayi ka mmle batii bayɔɔsa di asaa ya nimata batii n-yu ni ofũ onu lɛma. Asaa nwu nkpo nnya obe lele abawa. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ suoto abafe anwa nii, ayɔɔsa!
40018008	“Nkpo oso nse kɔnɛɛ lɛfɔ, ee kɔkpaa lɛfɔ mata alɛ fambla okpile yi, faabudi kũ fayu. Dilɛ dilenke alɛ faayɔ kɔnɛɛ kunwii ee kɔkpaa kunwii fambuo di nkpa nwu kamɛ, alɛ faawɛ nnɛɛ nnyɔ ee nkpaa nnyɔ, man-yɔ fɔ manfuki mankpee di kawɔɔ ɔtɔ wɔ ninnaa ni kaloo kamɛ.
40018009	Nse kafɔɔ, ninu lɛfɔ nikɔta fɔ fambla okpile yi, faadiki ni fayu. Diekye dilɛ dilenke alɛ, faayɔ ninu ninwii fambuo nkpa nwu nkpo kamɛ alɛ, faawɛ anu anyɔ man-yɔ fɔ manfuki mankpee di kawɔɔ ɔtɔ wɔ ninnaa ni kaloo kamɛ.
40018010	“Bilolaa binyu nwaa bilɛ bienyu babisɔ wɛkyɛ wɛkyɛ ba mmle nwu nkpo bilɛ baadie lɛsalɛsa di anu lee. Diekye nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye ntikiti nlɛ, bakpe Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ ba nin-yɛ ni di Teemi wɔ ninkpe ni di osi anu obe lele.
40018011	Diekye ami, Otii Obi nwu, lɛwa nlɛ kɔmadiki batii ba nieyu nii, nta ma nkpa.
40018012	“Lɛ biɛnya, nse otii nkpe bafoso kɔlafa di onwii leyu kaamɛ, ɔlabadiɛ afosi anaasĩ banaasĩ ba niebu ni koobokote osi batoole alesaa asifi alaawolaa onwii nwu nkpo nieyu ni?
40018013	Nwaako nse ɛɛnyɔɔ yi, abanya suoto lɛyɔɔ di onwii nwu nkpo suoto anlenkee afosi anaasĩ banaasĩ nwu nkpo niebu nii.
40018014	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di Teeye wɔ ninkpe ni di osi yi, oloomiɛ alɛ babisɔ ba mmle wɛkyɛ wɛkyɛ onwii lɛma ayu nɛ.
40018015	“Nse ofũonutɛ wo lɛfɔ lɛbla fɔ okpile yi, kyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ falaadiki okpile wɔ ɛɛbla fɔ ni fatuo nwɔ. Faata ɔlaa nwu kusiɛ di batii lee banyɔ ntɛɛ lete. Nse eenu fɔ kasɔ yi, ni minko nwɔ kasiɛ ntookple kɛɛlɛ nɛ.
40018016	Kafɔɔ nse aanu fɔ kasɔ yi, ni faamiɛ otii onwii ee banyɔ fakyakaa di suoto biɛkyɛ, baanuko fɔ ɔlaa nwu nkpo fɛle kamaa bayilatɛ, fɛ mmle okle bɛɛkpana ni Kɔɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ.
40018017	Nse mma kafɔɔ aanu ma kasɔ yi, ni faata ɔlaa nwu kudu bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni kaasiisakɔ nwu nkpo. Nse aanu kasiisakɔ nwu nkpo batii kafɔɔ kasɔ yi, ni faadiɛ nwɔ fɛle otii wɔ ninanfũ anu ni ee kpileblatɛ wɔ ninayikyisa ni nkpa.
40018018	“Nkpo oso kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, lɛsaa lele bienii kaasɔ ka mmle suoto, Yaa n-yɛ ye kamaa di osi. Lɛsaa lele kafɔɔ biefukuti di kasɔ ka mmle suoto, Yaa n-yɛ ye kamaa di osi.
40018019	“Kokple ntɔkɔ ye kafɔɔ nlɛ, nse batii lee banyɔ biɛbla kanya kanwii lɛsaa lele suoto kaasɔ ka mmle, biɛkaalɛ, Teemi wɔ ninkpe ni di osi mabla anta ye.
40018020	Diekye kakɔ lele batii banyɔ ee batiɛ lɛbla onwii leeyooto nii kamɛ, nsi ma nintɛɛ.”
40018021	Ninfɛ di Petro lawa Yesu nfũ aabakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, nse owo nii kɔbla okpile di suoto nii, sɛsɛ kayɔ nkyɛ nwɔ? Sikuɛnsĩ ɛɛ, sɛɛ lɛ?”
40018022	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Diele nkpo! Kafɔɔ faayɔ fankyɛ nwɔ afosi akuɛnsĩ, sikuɛnsĩ.
40018023	“Nle mmle oso Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nte fɛ Ɔka wɔ ninkomiɛ alɛ ablako ni batii nɔɔ ba nikɔblako nwɔ ni ɔkpɛ nkuntaa.
40018024	Di obe wɔ aanya aakye ni kasɔ, ni baakpaa osuɔtɔ onwii ninsiko nwɔ ni koto kpinwu baawako ɔkyɛ nɔɔ nɛ.
40018025	Di obe wɔ di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo nnaa lɛsalɛsaa abayɔ anta ni koto nwu oso, Ɔka nwu nkpo labuɛ alɛ, bayɔ nnwɔɔ ku ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ ku babi ku lɛsaa biala ninkpe nwɔ basunsu bata koto nwu nkpo.
40018026	“Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo lapɛ akunkyi di Ɔka nwu nkpo katũ aatikiti nwɔ lekoto osie kanya alɛ, ‘Wɛ otu fatɛɛ, mata koto nwu nkpo kumuu!’
40018027	Osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo ɔlaa lakpɛ Ɔka nwu nkpo nyaami, nkpo oso aayɔ koto nwu nkpo aakyɛ nwɔ, aadiɛ nwɔ aasifi.
40018028	“Di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle ladie aasifi nii, ni aakyɛ aalaakyakako kpɛntɛ wo nɔɔ wɔ ninsiko nwɔ ni koto kafuii nɛ. Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle lamufũ kpɛntɛ wo nɔɔ nwu nkpo siimu osie kanya aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Tɛɛ koto nii ko kumuu fasikoe ni!’
40018029	“Ninfɛ di kpɛntɛ wo nɔɔ nwu nkpo latikiti nwɔ lekoto aatɔkɔ alɛ, ‘Wɛ otu fatɛɛ, mata fɔ koto nwu nkpo komuu!’
40018030	“Kafɔɔ aasĩ, ni aata baakpaa kpɛntɛ wo nɔɔ nwu nkpo baalaatɛ leeyo alɛ diediki ɛɛta koto nwu nkpo kumuu fiɛ baadiɛ nwɔ.
40018031	Nkpo oso, obe wɔ di bakpɛntɛ bamba lanya ni lɛsaa le di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo labla nii, suoto ditayɔɔ ma ni baasifi baalaatɔkɔ Ɔka nwu nkpo lɛsaa le di osuɔtɔ nwu labla ni fɛɛ nɛ.
40018032	“Nkpo oso Ɔka nwu nkpo lakpee baalaalɛɛ osuɔtɔ nwu baawako nwɔ ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Otii kpile fale. Di obe wɔ faatikiti mi ni lekoto, layɔ koto ko kumuu fasikoe nii lɛkyɛ fɔ.
40018033	Nse nkpo okle dikpe ni afɔɔ fan-yɔ fankyɛ kpɛntɛ wo lɛfɔ nwu fɛ mmle okle lanya fɔ ni nyaami nɛ.’
40018034	Nni nkpo oso ɔblɔ lafiɛ Ɔka nwu nkpo osie kanya, ni aata alɛ bakpaa osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo balaatɛ leeyo, baananfi nwɔ kootoko dilaase di obe wɔ ɛɛta ni koto nwu nkpo kumuu.”
40018035	Ninfɛ di Yesu layɛntɛ ɔlaa nwu alɛ, “Nkpo okle di Teemi wɔ ninkpe ni di osi mabla aye ba ninan-yɔ bikyɛ ni bafũbanutɛ wo lee di situ lee kamɛ nɛ.”
40019001	Obe wɔ di Yesu labuɛ sɛlaa se mmle simuu aaloo nii, ninfɛ aadie di Galilea aasifi Yudea ntɛɛ nwu di Yordan okle sɛmaa nɛ.
40019002	Ni baatii dikudi ninwii kpinwu latikanko nwɔ nɛ, ni aayɔɔsa bamuu lɛma sifiɛ ninfa nɛ.
40019003	Ninfɛ di Farisi batii bawo lawa nwɔ ɔkyɛ baabawolaa nwɔ kaanya nɛ. Ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Mose kufiofa lɛta osuku alɛ osuɔtɔ kafuo ɔsɔfɔ osĩ di lɛsaa lele suoto?”
40019004	Ni di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Biika di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, kaasɔ kakyekɔ osuɔtɔ ku ɔsanko di Yaa labla?
40019005	Ninfɛ di Yaa labuɛ alɛ, ‘Nle mmle oso, osuɔtɔ madie di ote ku ɔya suoto ansifi manko ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ manaabla onwii, banyɔ lɛma mankple suoto sina sinwii.’
40019006	Nle mmle oso, baasinle batii banyɔ, kɔfɔɔ otii onwii nfɛ bale. Nkpo oso, dinaa alɛ otii lɛblasa lɛsaa le di Yaa ntoomufũ ɛɛbla ninwii.”
40019007	Ninfɛ di Farisi batii nwu nkpo lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ni be oso di Mose lata osuku alɛ, osuɔtɔ kafuo ɔsɔfɔ kusinkũ ɔta ansĩ nwɔ antɔɔ ansifi?”
40019008	Ni di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Mose lata ye osuku alɛ biasĩ ɔsanko ta otokopĩ lee oso. Kafɔɔ kaasɔ kayekɔ di Yaa labla ni kayi yi, ditate nkpo.
40019009	Kafɔɔ nunua kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse osuɔtɔ owo lesĩ ɔsɔfɔ ninanle asɔnɔ eekpee, eekple ɛɛlaayɔ ɔsanko bamba, atookpee asɔnɔ.”
40019010	Ninfɛ di Yesu basaateketetɛ latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse nkpo dite di ɔsa ku ɔsɔfɔ ntɛɛ, ni diɛlɛ alɛ, baayɔ bawo.”
40019011	Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Diele otii lele nimafuo asaa otuo ya mmle ofũ, diediki otii wɔ di Yaa lɛyɔ ɛɛta ni lete.
40019012	Diekye lɛsaa le oso di basuɔtɔ bawo nle ni balɛma nkpe ate ate. Bawo yi, nkpo bɛɛtɛ beelofo ma nɛ. Bawo kafɔɔ yi, batii niɛbla nkpo. Fiɛ baawo kafɔɔ mma bamu niɛbla suoto balɛma, ta Yaa sɛka kalekɔ ɔkpɛ nwu oso. Otii wɔ nimafuo ni nle mmle ɔbla yi, aabla.”
40019013	Batii bawo lakpaa babisɔ baawako Yesu Nfũ alɛ atika ma nnɛɛ di suoto aapɛ ɔlaa ata Yaa diisi lɛma. Kafɔɔ basaateketetɛ lasĩ ɔlaa baata batii nwu nkpo.
40019014	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo alɛ, “Bita babisɔ bawa ɔkyɛ nii, bitantũi ma osuku. Diekye batii fɛ babisɔ ba mmle okle kale ninle Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo.”
40019015	Yesu layɔ kɔnɛɛ aatika ma di suoto aapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa diisi lɛma, nni kamaa, ni aasifi aadiɛ ma nɛ.
40019016	Dii ninwii osuɔtɔ onwii lawa Yesu ɔkyɛ aabakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, lɛmɛnsaa biene kabla fiɛ di Yaa katɛɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo?”
40019017	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ. “Be oso fɔɔkaalɛ mi ɔlaa fankyeko lɛsaa biene ɔbla suoto? Yaa lete ninle otii biene. Nse foomiɛ falɛ fawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo yi, ni faale afiofa nɔɔ nwu nkpo.”
40019018	Ni di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Kɔmɛnfiofa?” Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tanlo otii, tankpee asɔnɔ, tan-yu, tanyila sɛlaa kuafunu kamaa,
40019019	bu teefɔ ku yaafɔ, bɔmbɔ owo lɛfɔ, fɛ mmle okle fambɔmbɔ ni suoto lɛfɔ.”
40019020	Ninfɛ di okosopo nwu nkpo latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Ntoole afiofa ya mmle amuu. Lɛsaa lewo lebu kakple mbla ni?”
40019021	Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse foomiɛ falɛ fawo nimu yi, tɔɔkyɛ flaayɔ asaa ya amuu ninkpe fɔ ni fasunsũ, faayɔ koto nwu nkpo fata bapiitɛ, ni fabakple saawɛntɛ di Yaa kafa. Nni kamaa, faawa fabatikankoe.”
40019022	Obe wɔ di okosopo nwu nkpo lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle yi, suoto ditayɔɔ nwɔ, ni aasifi nɛ. Diekye saawɛntɛ aale osie kanya.
40019023	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, dibawɛ osie fiɛ di basaawɛntɛ makyɛ Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo.
40019024	Kokple nse ye lɛtɔkɔ kafɔɔ nlɛ, diɛtɛ diɛyɔɔ diɛta kapupɔnkɔ alɛ aafe di paniɛ dituɛ kamɛ, dilenke alɛ saawɛntɛ kabuo Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo.”
40019025	Di obe wɔ baasaateketetɛ lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle diatɛ diabla ma ɔkpɛ. Nkpo oso baakaalɛ alɛ, “Ni se nkpo kute mɔ, owe nfɛ babata nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo?”
40019026	Ninfɛ di Yesu layu ma di anu tuwĩi aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Otii kuonwii dilabafuo nle mmle ɔbla. Kafɔɔ Yaa nnwɔɔ lɛsalɛsaa nnaa nwɔ osie ku ɔbla.”
40019027	Ninfɛ di Petro lakakatɛ aabuɛ alɛ, “Nyu lo! Buodiɛ lɛsaa loo biala buɔtɛ butikanko fɔ. Ni be bubawɛ?”
40019028	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse Otii Obi nwu nkpo lɛbasiɛ di lɛkakpomii nɔɔ suoto, leeklekle kamɛ, di kayi fɔle ka nikɔwa ni kamɛ, aye lefosi batii banyɔ ba nintikankoe nii, ayee bibasiɛ di akakpomii suoto minkanko Israel batii, lefosi nfaabi nnyɔ nwu nkpo.
40019029	Otii lele kafɔɔ niediɛ ayo ee babilɛma suɔtɔbi ee babilɛma sankobi ee ote ee ɔya ee babi ee afe ɛɛtɛ ta ami oso, abawɛ nya akyuu kɔlafa anlenkeesa bia. Yaa matɔɔ kafɔɔ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
40019030	Kafɔɔ batii ba kpinwu ninle ni batunletɛ, makple bamaakpitɛ. Bamaakpitɛ kafɔɔ makple batunletɛ.
40020001	“Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nte fɛ nle mmle okle. Obe onwii kamɛ, osuɔtɔ onwii lataka ku kolesɛtũ alɛ, ɔlaamiɛ batii bawo manaabla dii kufĩ ɔkpɛ di awosobi ya mambla ni nta kofe mantɔɔ.
40020002	Kofe saate nwu nkpo ku bakpɛntɛ nwu lale ɔkpɛ nwu kɔya. Lɛsɔnu lawa diatɔɔ alɛ abata ma dii kɔkpɛnto koto fututu kunwii. Ni aakpaa ma aasifiko kofe nwu nkpo nɛ.
40020003	“Di obe wɔ diapɛ ni abombo anaasĩ, osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo lakple aadie aakyɛ lɛkpaka, aalaanya basuɔtɔ bawo n-yɛ ninfa blɔbla lɛsalɛsaa.
40020004	Nkpo oso, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, ‘Aye kafɔɔ bitɔɔkyɛ kofe nii bilaabla ɔkpɛ, mata ye koto ko niesiɛko ni ɔkpɛ nwu.’
40020005	Nkpo oso baasifi kofe nwu nkpo. “Aakple aadie aakyɛ lɛkpaka di abombo lefosi anyɔ ku abombo atiɛ kamɛ aalaabla nkpo kafɔɔ.
40020006	Ditoobu kɛkɛɛ di abombo anɔɔ kapɛ nii, aakple aadie aakyɛ lɛkpaka, ni aalaanya basuɔtɔ bamba bawo n-yɛ ninfa. Ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, ‘Be niɛwa fiɛ biɛlalaasa dii kufĩ kumu minambla ɔkpɛ kuonwii?’
40020007	“Ninfɛ baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Otii kuonwii diɛwa abayɔ wo alɛ bubabla ɔkpɛ.’ “Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, ‘Ni bitɔɔkyɛ kofe nii biɛlaabla ɔkpɛ.’
40020008	“Obe wɔ kɔɔtɔɔfɔ lawo nii, ni koofe nwu nkpo saate latɔkɔ kofe nwu nyuntɛ alɛ, ‘Lɛɛ bakpɛntɛ nwu nkpo faata ma koto lɛma. Kyekasɔ di mba niɛnyɛntɛ ni ɔwa falaase di bakasale suoto.’
40020009	“Ninfɛ aayɔ koto fututu ninle ni dii kɔkpɛnto kunwii kunwii aata batii ba niawa ni kɔtɔɔfɔ abombo anɔɔ kamɛ nɛ.
40020010	Nioso obe wɔ diadu ni batii ba niasifi ni kofe nwu nkpo ku olesɛ yi, baanyu alɛ babafũ koto manlenkee bawo lɛma. Kafɔɔ mma kafɔɔ koto nwu nkpo fututu kunwii kunwii baafũ nɛ.
40020011	Di obe wɔ baafũ ni koto nwu nkpo yi, baakyako ɔkakatɛ di kofe nwu nkpo saate suoto alɛ,
40020012	‘Batii ba mmle niɛwa ni kofe lɛyɛntɛle, lebombo ninwii lete bɛɛbla ɔkpɛ. Awo ba niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ dii nimu, kuufĩ lɛpɛ wo nii, koto nwu kunwii fɛɛta wo!’
40020013	“Ninfɛ di kofe nwu nkpo saate latɔkɔ ma alɛ, ‘Basiɛwo, binu kasɔ, nintafaa ye! Munko ye niele ɔkpɛ kɔya bienu suoto kasɔ bilɛ, bibafũ dii kɔkpɛnto ninle koto fututu kunwii.
40020014	Nkpo oso yi, bifũ koto lee biɛtɔɔkyɛ leyo. Ami omu ninlɛ kɔta batii yɛntɛle ba mmle koto okle lɛta ye nii.
40020015	Nkpe osuku mblako koto nii ɔkpɛ mmle okle dilɛ mi nii. Nkpo oso yi, bitanta ɔblɔ lafiɛ ye di sifutulɛ nii se lɛbla ni suoto.’ ”
40020016	Ninfɛ di Yesu layɛntɛ alɛ, “Nioso batii yɛntɛle mawa mamale bakasale, bakasale kafɔɔ mawa mamale bayɛntɛle.”
40020017	Di obe wɔ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ latoofe ni Yerusalem, aalɛɛ ma di ɔlɔɔkɔ.
40020018	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ. “Binu lo! Buofe Yerusalem, nfa babayɔ ami, Otii Obi nwu nkpo mankpee di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ. Babalo nwɔ kukpi lɛpɔɔ.
40020019	Babayɔ nwɔ mankpee di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii nnɛɛ kamɛ, babama nwɔ, babapɛ nwɔ, mampɛ nwɔ sibuɛ mankaasa di kowoso suoto. Kafɔɔ di dii tiɛfa suoto, Yaa masɛnkɛsa nwɔ aakyeko bakpi kamɛ, ansiɛ nkpa.”
40020020	Ninfɛ di Sebedeo ɔsɔfɔ lakpaa babi nɔɔ suɔtɔbi banyɔ aawako Yesu nfũ, abapɛ akunkyi kaatũ nɔɔ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, akyakaako ma.
40020021	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Be lɛsaa foomiɛ?” Ninfɛ di ɔsanko nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Komiɛ nlɛ, fabla fatɛɛ alɛ, nse fɛɛwa sɛka lɛfɔ ole yi, babi nii ba mmle banyɔ yi, onwii masiɛ di oletannɛɛ kyɛ lɛfɔ, onwii kafɔɔ masiɛ di kɔmɛntunnɛɛ kyɛ lɛfɔ.”
40020022	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bieye lɛsaa le biɔkaalɛ nii. Bibafuo dibuo le kamanya ni ɔnya?” Ninfɛ baadiki kanya alɛ, “Yii, bubafuo.”
40020023	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako, bibafuo. Kafɔɔ nnaa osuku ndiki otii wɔ nimasiɛ ni di oletannɛɛ kyɛ nii ku kɔmɛntu nnɛɛ kyɛ nii. Nsiɛkɔ be mmle nwu nkpo yi, dile batii ba nle di Teemi lelolaa ɛɛtɛ ɛɛta nii.”
40020024	Di obe wɔ di basaateketetɛ lefosi bule lanu ni ɔlaa nwu nkpo yi, ɔblɔ lafiɛ ma osie kanya di basuɔtɔbi nwu nkpo banyɔ ninle ni bawo babilɛma suoto.
40020025	Nkpo oso Yesu lalɛɛ ma aasiisa ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biye bilɛ batunletɛ ba nikole ni sɛka di batii ba ninanfũ banu nii, bakpe osie di suoto lɛma mantuo suoto mankpee ma.
40020026	Bitanta diate nkpo okle di kamɛ lee. Nse onwii lee komiɛ alɛ ale ɔnɔɔfo kaamɛ lee yi, ni dikpe ni eele kpɛmblatɛ ɛɛta babule.
40020027	Nse onwii lee kafɔɔ komiɛ alɛ ale ɔkasale yi, ni dikpe ni ɛɛbla suoto fɛ obisɔ ɛɛta babule.
40020028	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di Otii Obi nwu nkpo diɛwa alɛ batii katɔɔbla sɛkpɛ mantɔɔtɔɔ nɛ. Kafɔɔ nnwɔɔ ɛɛwa alɛ ɔɔbla sɛkpɛ anta batii alɛ aayɔ nkpa nɔɔ kafɔɔ antɛ kaasɔ andiki batii kpi.”
40020029	Di obe wɔ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ladie di Yeriko baatoosifi nii, batii dikudi kpinwu latikanko ma.
40020030	Basuɔtɔ banyɔ banwii di anu labiɛ ma ni lasiɛ di osukulɔɔkɔ, ni baanu alɛ Yesu kɔwaalɛ anfe. Ni baakyako ɔfaa osie kanya baabuɛ alɛ, “Ɔka Dawid Obi ee! Nya wo nyaami!”
40020031	Batii dikudi nwu nkpo lasĩ ɔlaa baata banumbiɛtɛ nwu nkpo osie kanya alɛ bamaasa kanya. Kafɔɔ mia nwu nfɛ baatɛ baafaa osie kanya baabuɛ alɛ, “Saate loo! Ɔka Dawid Obi ee! Nya wo nyaami kyu woo!”
40020032	Yesu layila ni aalɛɛ ma aawako ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Be biomiɛ bilɛ mbla nta ye?”
40020033	Ninfɛ baadiki kanya baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, buomiɛ bulɛ fata wo butɔɔnya.”
40020034	Ɔlaa lɛma lakpɛ Yesu nyaami, ni aakpanko ma anu nɛ. Nfanwu ni baakyako ɔnya nɛ. Ninfɛ baatikanko Yesu nɛ.
40021001	Di obe wɔ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ kɔtɛtɛɛ ni Yerusalem, babadu ni Betfage di Nnɔnyi Awoso Kobokote ɔlɔɔkɔ yi, Yesu lakpee basaateketetɛ nɔɔ banyɔ alɛ balekatũ.
40021002	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitɔɔkyɛ kakpaayotũ ka ninte ye ni siitũ kamɛ, bibanya bɔkɛɛ wɔ ninte ni fɛ pɔnkɔ antuka ni aatoo beekpee nwɔ okũ, diibi kafɔɔ n-yɛ nwɔ ni di ɔlɔɔkɔ. Bidiki nwɔ di okũ biɛkpaa ma biwakoe.
40021003	Nse otii owo lɛkaalɛ ye ɔlaa owo yi, biɛtɔkɔ nwɔ bilɛ, ‘Saate nwu nikomiɛ ma.’ Abakplesa ma kafɔɔ anwako ye nunua.”
40021004	Nle mmle lawa kaanya fɛ mmle okle di Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ onwii labuɛ aatɛ ni alɛ,
40021005	“Bitɔkɔ Sion batii bilɛ, ‘Binyu! Ɔka lee kɔwa ɔkyɛ lee. Ɛɛwakosa suoto kasɔ asi di bɔkɛɛ wɔ nintuka ni atoo ku dibi suoto ɔɔwa.’ ”
40021006	Nkpo oso basaateketetɛ banyɔ nwu nkpo, lakyɛ baalaabla fɛ mmle okle di Yesu lakpee ma alɛ balaabla nii.
40021007	Ni baakyɛ baalaakpaa bɔkɛɛ wɔ nintuka ni atoo ku dibi nwu nkpo baawako nwɔ nɛ. Ni baablɛfɛsa abula lɛma baatika di suoto lɛma, ni di Yesu layie aasiɛ ma di suoto nɛ.
40021008	Ni baatii kpinwu di batii dikudi nwu nkpo kamɛ latɔtaa siwidi baadiki abula lɛma baatɛ di osuku suoto. Ni baawo kafɔɔ labudi sɛkaafɛ baatɛ di osuku suoto nɛ.
40021009	Ninfɛ di batii dikudi le niale Yesu katũ ku mba niakpi ni sɛmaa latɔɔtaa siwidi alɛ, “Bitansa Ɔka Dawid Obi nwu! Yaa lekusɛkusɛsa otii wɔ nikɔwa ni di Saate leyooto kamɛ! Bitansa Yaa!”
40021010	Di obe wɔ di Yesu labuo ni Yerusalem, kudu niamu di okpoo omuu. Ni baatii latɔɔkaalɛ alɛ, “Owe dile?”
40021011	Ninfɛ di batii dikudi nwu nkpo labuɛ alɛ, “Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesu wɔ niekye ni Nasaret di Galilea kasɔ suoto dile!”
40021012	Yesu lakyɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ ni aalaatososa batii ba bamuu niatoosunsu ni asaa ku mba niatɔɔya ni asaa ninfa odiki leeyo nwu kamɛ nɛ. Aatutukusa koto babiɛtɛ siipunu aayu. Aatukusa mba ninsi boosunsu ni ablonuma kafɔɔ akpomii aayu.
40021013	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bɛɛkpana di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, ‘Baalɛɛ mi leyo alɛ ɔlaa ɔpɛ katakɔ.’ Kafɔɔ aye, bitɔɔyɔ biɛbla bayu kawofakɔ!”
40021014	Ninfɛ di batii bawo lakpaa banumbiɛtɛ ku abafa baawako nwɔ di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo nɛ. Ni di Yesu layɔɔsa ma sifiɛ nɛ.
40021015	Obe wɔ di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ lanya sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ aabla nii ku mmle okle di babisɔ latɔɔfaa batoobuɛ di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu kamɛ alɛ, “Bitansa Ɔka Dawid Obi nwu nkpo” yi, ɔblɔ lafiɛ ma osie kanya.
40021016	Nkpo oso baakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Foonu ɔlaa wɔ baabisɔ nwu nkpo kobuɛ ni?” Ni di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Lenu. N-ye kafɔɔ nlɛ bitɔɔka di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, ‘Fɛɛbla babisɔ ku babifɔɔle alɛ baayɔ katansa ka niewo ni niimu manta fɔ.’ ”
40021017	Di nni nkpo kamaa, Yesu ladiɛ olebatatɛ banɔɔfo nwu nkpo ku kufiofa batuotɛ aadie di okpoo, aasifi Betania, aalaate nfa.
40021018	Obe wɔ kaale ntɔɔsɛ nii, di Yesu ntɔɔpɛ ankple ansifi ni okpoo ku kuolesɛtũ yi, kɔka laklee nwɔ.
40021019	Ni aanya kolewoso kunwii di osukulɔɔkɔ nɛ, ni aakyɛ kũ ɔlɔɔkɔ nɛ. Kafɔɔ atanya lɛwosobi kuninwii, dilenkee afata lete. Nkpo oso aatɔkɔ kowoso nwu nkpo alɛ, “Diɛyɔ di miɛ diesifi nii, flabasintika abi diidii.” Nfanwu, kolewoso nwu nkpo niayɔɔ.
40021020	Obe wɔ di basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lanya ni nle mmle, diabla ma ɔkpɛ osie kanya. Ni baakaalɛ alɛ, “Lɛ diɛbla fiɛ koolewoso ko mmle lefuo ɔyɔɔ nkpo wla?”
40021021	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse biefũ bienu siitu lee kamɛ, minanta dibla ye ɔtanfũ onu, bibafuo lɛsaa le lɛbla ni kolewoso ko mmle ɔbla. Diele bia nle mmle lete, kafɔɔ, bibafuo kobokote ko mmle ɔtɔkɔ bilɛ, ‘Taka ninfũ falaabuo di lekpo kamɛ,’ dibawa kaanya.
40021022	Lɛsaa lele biɛpɛ ɔlaa biɛkaalɛ Yaa di ofũ onu kamɛ, bibafũ.”
40021023	Yesu lakple aakyɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo. Di obe wɔ ootuo ni asaa, ni di Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku okpoo banɔɔfo lawa nwɔ ɔkyɛ babakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔmɛnsuku fakpe fɔɔbla asaa ya mmle? Owe kafɔɔ niɛta fɔ osuku nwu nkpo?”
40021024	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Bitɛɛ nkaalɛ ye ɔlaa onwii, nse biediki kanya yi, ni amii matɔkɔ ye osuku wɔ nkpe fiɛ kɔbla ni asaa ya mmle nwu nkpo.
40021025	Ɔfɛ di Yohane lawɛ osuku fiɛ aatookpeesa batii Yaa ntu? Yaa nfũ kuakye ɛɛ, sɛɛ batii nfũ kuakye?” Ninfɛ baamumufũ ɔlaa nwu nimanima baanyu alɛ, “Be nfɛ buabuɛ? Nse buobuɛ bulɛ Yaa nfũ kuokye yi, abakaalɛ wo alɛ, ‘Ni be oso bitafũ Yohane bianu mɔ?’
40021026	Kafɔɔ nse buobuɛ bulɛ ‘otii nfũ kuokye’ yi, buɔyɛkɛ bulɛ batii ba mmle mabla wo lɛsaa, diekye bamuu lɛma beefũ beenu alɛ Yohane yi, Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ aale.”
40021027	Nioso baatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Buoye.” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di amii, namatɔkɔ ye otii wɔ niɛtɛɛ ni osuku fiɛ kɔbla ni asaa ya mmle nɛ.
40021028	“Bibu ɔlaa wɔ mmle disi binyu. Osuɔtɔ onwii lawɛ babi suɔtɔbi banyɔ banwii. Ni aakyɛ aalaatɔkɔ ɔnɔɔfo le alɛ, ‘Obi, kyɛ falaabla ɔkpɛ koofe nii miɛ.’
40021029	“Ninfɛ di obi nwu nkpo latɔkɔ ote alɛ, ‘Namafuo ɔkyɛ.’ Kafɔɔ sɛmaa, aakyɛlɛnsa disibu nɔɔ, ni aakyɛ nɛ.
40021030	“Ninfɛ di ote nwu nkpo lakyɛ obi nyɔɔfa nfũ, aalaatɔkɔ nwɔ ɔlaa nwu nkpo okle kafɔɔ. Ni aatuna alɛ, ‘Teete lenu, makyɛ.’ Kafɔɔ atakyɛ.
40021031	“Di babi ba mmle banyɔ kamɛ, owe niabla ote dibiesaa?” Ninfɛ baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Obi nɔɔfo le nwu nkpo.” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, akpooto bafuntɛ ku basɔnɔkpeetɛ makaye Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo obuo.
40021032	Diekye Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane lawa abatuo ye osuku biene wɔ suoto biafe nii, kafɔɔ bitafũ nwɔ bianu. Kafɔɔ akpooto bafuntɛ ku basɔnɔkpeetɛ lafũ nwɔ baanu. Kuntɛ bianya nle mmle, bíekyisa disibu lee bifũ nwɔ binu.”
40021033	Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bikple binu lɛkpa bamba. Fekpɛntɛ onwii lakpɛ awosobi ya man-yɔ mambla ni nta kofe, ni aakpee kɔba aakyisa kofe nwu nkpo nɛ. Aabla lɛba le manka ni awosobi nwu nkpo mandiki ni nta. Aatofo lɛba le niataka ni kle, baayila mantoonyu ni kofe nwu. Ninfɛ aayɔ kofe nwu nkpo aakpee di bakpɛntɛ banwii nnɛɛ kamɛ alɛ batoonyu, ni aadie aasifi osuku nɛ.
40021034	Di obe wɔ di awosobi nwu nkpo ɔtɛsɛbee lawo nii, kofe saate nwu nkpo lakpee bakpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ alɛ bakyɛ kofe nwu banyuntɛ nfũ baalaafũ kalekɔ nɔɔ bawako nwɔ.
40021035	“Kofe nwu nkpo banyuntɛ lamufũ bakpɛmblatɛ ba mmle, baapɛ onwii, baalo onwii, baasafɔ onwii kafɔɔ afuɔ.
40021036	Nni sɛmaa kofe nwu nkpo saate lakple aakpee bakpɛmblatɛ bamba niapɔ baalenkee ni bakasale. Kafɔɔ kofe nwu nkpo banyuntɛ lakple baabla mankpo kafɔɔ laakpa nwu.
40021037	Lɛyɛntɛle, aakpee ma nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ obi, aabuɛ alɛ, ‘Lefũ lenu nlɛ babata obi nii nwu dibu.’
40021038	“Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di kofe nwu nkpo banyuntɛ lanya ni obi nɔɔ nwu nkpo yi, ni baatɔkɔ bawo alɛ, ‘Nnya kofe saate obi wɔ nimale ni atesaa ninle nwɔ mmle nɛ. Biwa biɛta bulo nwɔ di atesaa nɔɔ nwu nkpo akple wo ale.’
40021039	Nioso baamufũ nwɔ baafuki baayu di kɔba nwu nkpo sɛmaa, ni baalo nwɔ nɛ.”
40021040	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ni, nse kofe nwu nkpo saate lɛwa mɔ, be bienyu bilɛ ababla kofe nwu nkpo banyuntɛ?”
40021041	Ninfɛ baadiki nwɔ kanya alɛ, “Abalo kofe banyuntɛ kpile nwu nkpo an-yɔ kofe nwu ankpee di bayuntɛ bamba nnɛɛ kamɛ, mba nimatɔɔ ni kalekɔ nɔɔ di nta awosobi nwu nkpo ɔtɛsɛbee kamɛ di obe kanya.”
40021042	Ni di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Biika di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ binya? Beebuɛ alɛ, ‘Difuɔ le baayotofotɛ lesĩ alɛ diɛlɛ nii, nni nintɔbakple difuɔ le niefĩ dilenke ni nɛ. Saate niɛbla lɛsaa kplɛ le mmle. Nioso diɛbla wo ɔkpɛ osie kanya!’ ”
40021043	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nkpo oso kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, Yaa maklee sɛka kalekɔ nɔɔ nwu nkpo anfũ ye di nnɛɛ kamɛ, an-yɔ anta batii ba nimabla nwɔ ni dibiesaa.
40021044	Otii lele niɛnɔɔ ɛɛpɛ diifuɔ le mmle suoto mafefee kukuii kukuii. Kafɔɔ nse difuɔ nwu nkpo lɛkpa diɛpɛ di otii owo suoto yi, abakuɔ muɛmuɛ.”
40021045	Nioso di Olekatakɔ banɔɔfo ku Farisi batii lanu ni Yesu akpa ya mmle yi, baatofo alɛ mma alaka.
40021046	Nkpo oso baamiɛ alɛ boomufũ nwɔ. Kafɔɔ baayɛkɛ batii dikudi nwu nkpo, diekye batii kpinwu lafũ Yesu fɛle Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ.
40022001	Yesu lakple aatuo ma asaa di akpa kamɛ aabuɛ alɛ,
40022002	Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nte fɛ nle mmle. Di obe onwii kamɛ, ɔka onwii lale ɔsanko ɔyɔ dii aata obi suɔtɔbi nɔɔ.
40022003	Ni aakpee bakpɛmbla nɔɔ alɛ bakyɛ baalaalɛɛ batii ba ɛɛkyaka ni di ɔsanko ɔyɔ nwu nkpo dii kalekɔ bawako. Kafɔɔ baasĩ alɛ bɔlɔɔwa.
40022004	“Nkpo oso aakple aakpee bakpɛmblatɛ bamba alɛ balaatɔkɔ batii nwu nkpo alɛ, ‘Dii ole alesaa nwu ntoobe, lelo nankyue suɔtɔ ku obiibii wɔ ninsi ni lɛla, lɛsaa biala ntoosi. Biwa ɔsanko ɔyɔ dii nwu kalekɔ.’
40022005	“Kafɔɔ batii ba baakyakako ni nkpo, kuonwii lɛma ditakyɔɔ lɛlɛɛ nwu kotoko, baasifi sɛkpɛ lɛma mmɛ. Onwii lasifi kofe, onwii kafɔɔ lasifi asaa kasunsukɔ.
40022006	Bawo kafɔɔ lamufũ bakpɛmblatɛ nwu nkpo, baapɛ ma, ni baalo ma nɛ.
40022007	Ɔblɔ lafiɛ ɔka nwu nkpo osie kanya ni aakyesee bakpɛtɛ nɔɔ baakyɛ baalaalo batii lotɛ nwu nkpo bamuu, ni baakpee okpoo lɛma nwu nkpo ɔtɔ baawɔɔsa nwu nɛ.
40022008	“Ninfɛ aalɛɛ bakpɛntɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, ‘Obi nii ɔsanko ɔyɔ alesaa nwu nkpo ntoosi, kafɔɔ batii ba lɛkyakako ni diesiɛko dii nwu nkpo kalekɔ.
40022009	Nkpo oso nunua yi, bitɔɔkyɛ akpaka biɛlaalɛɛ batii lele biɛnya bilɛ bawa ɔsanko ɔyɔ dii kalekɔ nwu.’
40022010	Nioso bakpɛntɛ nwu nkpo ladie baasifi akpaka baalaalɛɛ batii ba bamuu baanya nii, babienetɛ ku bakpiletɛ baawako. Nioso ɔsanko kayɔkɔ nwu nkpo layii pɔ ku batii.
40022011	“Ni di ɔka nwu nkpo lawa alɛ ɔɔbaanyu batii ba bɛɛkyakako bɛɛwako ni nfa, ni aanya osuɔtɔ onwii diekpee ɔsanko ɔyɔ awo.
40022012	Ni di Ɔka nwu nkpo lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Siɛwo, lɛyiɛbla fiɛ fɛɛwa nfũ fanankpee ɔsanko ɔyɔ awo?’ Kafɔɔ osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo ditafuo kanya odiki.
40022013	“Ninfɛ di ɔka nwu nkpo latɔkɔ bakpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ alɛ, ‘Binii nwɔ nnɛɛ ku nkpaa biefuki nwɔ biyu kaayi diitunu nwu nkpo kamɛ. Nfũ kaaku owi ku anyɛɛ owee nkpe ni.’ ”
40022014	Ninfɛ di Yesu layɛntɛ ku lɛkpa le mmle alɛ, “Yaa lɛlɛɛ batii kpi, kafɔɔ, basɛɛ eediki kaamɛ.”
40022015	Farisi batii bawo lakyɛ baalaabla disibu mmle okle baayɔ Yesu omu kanya kamɛ ɔlaa manwɛ nwɔ nii.
40022016	Nkpo oso baakpee basaateketetɛ lɛma bawo ku batii ba nintikanko ni Herode baakyɛ Yesu nfũ. Obe wɔ baakyɛ ni ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, buye bulɛ nwaakotɛ falɛ, fantuo kafɔɔ Yaa ɔlaa nwu ninle ni nwaako ɔlaa, diekye fánnyu batii di anu faabla lɛsaa. Faayɔ nwu ole di batii sɛlaa se mambuɛ ni kafɔɔ.
40022017	Nkpo oso, tɔkɔ wo disibu lɛfɔ. Kufiofa loo lɛta osuku alɛ buata akpooto munta Roma batii Ɔka Nɔɔfo ɛɛ, sɛɛ dinaa alɛ buɔta?”
40022018	Kafɔɔ Yesu latofo disibu kpile le bakle ni di suoto nɔɔ, nioso aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye anu di anu basaablatɛ! Be oso biɛwa biowolaa mi kaanya?
40022019	Bitɛɛ koto ko min-yɔ mintɔɔta ni akpooto nwu nkpo ninnyu.” Ninfɛ baayɔ koto nwu nkpo baawako nwɔ nɛ.
40022020	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Owe kunyii ku leyooto nintika di koto ko mmle suoto?”
40022021	Ninfɛ baadiki kanya alɛ, “Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare dile.” Nioso Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ni biyɔ lɛsaa le ninle ni Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare lele yi, bita Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare. Biɛyɔ lɛsaa le kafɔɔ ninle ni Yaa lele yi, bita Yaa.”
40022022	Obe wɔ baanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle yi, diabla ma yaaa, ni baasifi baadiɛ nwɔ nɛ.
40022023	Dii nwu nkpo kale, Saduki batii ba nimbuɛ alɛ bakpi dilabasintaka bakye ni bakpi kamɛ lawa Yesu nfũ.
40022024	Ni baabatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, Mose latɔkɔ wo alɛ, nse osuɔtɔ owo lekpi eediɛ ɔsɔfɔ manko nwɔ banaa babi kubanwii yi, osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo obilɛma kafuo kpisɔfɔ nwu nkpo ɔyɔ, manko nwɔ manlofo babi. Ni baayɔ babi nwu nkpo mambla fɛ osuɔtɔ wɔ ninsinaa ni babi.
40022025	Obe onwii, babilɛma suɔtɔbi bakuɛnsĩ banwii lawɛ wo kaamɛ ninfũ. Ni di ɔnɔɔfo le layɔ ɔsanko batalofo babi, ni aabafe aakpi nɛ. Ninfɛ di maatɛle labayɔ kpisɔfɔ nwu nkpo nɛ.
40022026	Lɛsaa nwu nkpo kafɔɔ labla obilɛma suɔtobi nyɔɔfa nwu nkpo ku otiɛfa, dialaase di okuɛnsĩ le suoto. Kuonwii lɛma ditalofo ku ɔsanko nwu nkpo fiɛ baakpi.
40022027	Yɛntɛyɛntɛ, ɔsanko nwu nkpo kafɔɔ labafe aakpi.
40022028	Nimɔ, di dii le baakpi makple mantaka nii, owe lɛma ɔsɔfɔ di ɔsanko nwu nkpo male di obe wɔ baakuɛnsĩ lɛma nwu layɔ nwɔ ni?”
40022029	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Diele nkpo dibate saa. Lɛnya nlɛ bienu ɔlaa wɔ mmle kasɔ, diekye bieye sɛlaa se ninsi ni diɛ Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ, ee Yaa osie.
40022030	Diekye di obe wɔ di bakpi mataka nii, babate fɛ Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ di osi, nioso sɛsa ku sɛsɔfɔ dilabasinwɛ.
40022031	Biika lɛsaa le di Yaa labuɛ aatɔkɔ ye ni diekye ni baakpi okple ɔtaka osiɛ nkpa suoto? Aabuɛ alɛ,
40022032	‘Ami ninle Abraham Yaa ku Isak Yaa ku Yakob Yaa.’ Nle mmle kotuo alɛ, nnwɔɔ ninle batii ba ninkpe ni nkpa Yaa, diele bakpi Yaa ale.”
40022033	Di obe wɔ di batii dikudi nwu nkpo lanu ni asaatuo ya mmle yi, diabla ma ɔkpɛ osie kanya.
40022034	Di obe wɔ di Farisi batii lanu alɛ Yesu sɛlaa kanya didikibi lata alɛ Saduki batii nwu nkpo ditasinfuo ni kanya ɔbɛ yi, baakple baabasi.
40022035	Ni di onwii kaamɛ lɛma ninle ni kufiofa tuotɛ lawolaa Yesu kaanya aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ,
40022036	“Saatuotɛ, kɔmɛnfiofa niefĩ kulenke di Mose afiofa nwu nkpo kamɛ?”
40022037	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Bɔmbɔ Saate Yaa lɛfɔ ku otu lɛfɔ omuu, ku ninwuna lɛfɔ nimuu ku disibu lɛfɔ nimuu.
40022038	Nko mmle ninle kufiofa ko niefĩ kulenke ni, kule ni kɔkasale nɛ.
40022039	Nko niekple kutikanko ni kuodie ni kɔkasale ninle alɛ, ‘Bɔmbɔ owo lɛfɔ fɛ mmle okle fambɔmbɔ ni suoto lɛfɔ.’
40022040	Afiofa ya mmle anyɔ suoto di Mose kufiofa ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ asaa otuo nkyɛ nɛ.”
40022041	Obe wɔ di Farisi batii bawo lasi ni dikudi, Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ,
40022042	“Lɛ ninle ye disibu di Kristo nwu nkpo suoto? Owe leyo kamɛ eekye?” Ni baadiki kanya alɛ, “Ɔka Dawid leyo kamɛ eekye.”
40022043	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Nse nkpo kute mɔ, ni lɛ diɛbla fiɛ di Yaa Ninwuna lata Dawid lalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ Saate? Di Dawid nwu nkpo labuɛ alɛ,
40022044	‘Yaa latɔkɔ Saate nii alɛ, “Siɛ di oletanɛɛkyɛ nii ninfũ dilaase di obe wɔ mayɔ balo lɛfɔ nkpee fɔ ni ninkpaa kalɔ.” ’
40022045	Ni nse Dawid lalɛɛ Kristo nwu nkpo alɛ Saate, ni lɛ diɛbla fiɛ ale Dawid leyo kamɛ obi?”
40022046	Otii kuonwii kaamɛ lɛma ditafuo Yesu ɔlaa nwu nkpo kanya odiki. Diayɔ ni di dii nwu nkpo kamaa, kuonwii ditasinkpee otu aakaalɛ Yesu ɔlaa kuonwii.
40023001	Nni nkpo sɛmaa, Yesu lakakatɛ aata batii dikudi nwu nkpo ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ.
40023002	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Kufiofa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii ninle mba bɛɛta osuku alɛ baadiki ni Mose kufiofa nwu nkpo kasɔ.
40023003	Nkpo oso bibla lɛsaa lele bɛɛtɔkɔ ye, biemufũ biklee osie kanya. Kafɔɔ bitantikanko ɔsaabla lɛma nkpaamaa, diekye baasi nkpa di asaa ya bootuo ni suoto.
40023004	Beekpee atoo ya ninkpe ni onutũ beetukasa batii diisi alɛ batuka. Kafɔɔ mma bamu bolootuna alɛ bɔɔyɔ bia lɛnɛɛbi lɛma ninwii mankyaako batukatɛ nwu alɛ baatuka.
40023005	“Mambla lɛsaa biala baatii kanya ma ni fɛle Yaa bakpɛmblatɛ nwaa bale nii. Asaa ya man-yɔ mannii ni disi ku nnɛɛtũ lɛma lɛbla blɛfɛɛ, bɛɛkpana Kɔkpana Klekle sɛlaa beetika nya di suoto. Bɛɛbla kafɔɔ awu sɛkpaalɛ abinte beetika di awu lɛma suoto.
40023006	Mambɔmbɔ osiɛ di nsiɛkɔ kplɛ di dii nlekɔ ku aba kplɛ osiɛ di Yuda batii nsiisakɔ kamɛ.
40023007	Mammiɛ alɛ batii katɔwakasɔ mantɔɔsɛɛsa ma ku dibu laakpaka, mantɔɔlɛɛ ma kafɔɔ alɛ Basaatuotɛ.
40023008	“Kafɔɔ aye bafũbanutɛ yi, bitanta baalɛɛ ye basaatuotɛ, diekye saatuotɛ onwii lete ninkpe ye. Aye yi, bawo babilɛma bile.
40023009	Bitanlɛɛ otii kuonwii kafɔɔ kaayi ka mmle bilɛ Teete, diekye Teete onwii lete ninkpe ye di osi.
40023010	Bitanta baalɛɛ ye kafɔɔ alɛ Batunletɛ. Diekye otii onwii lete ninle ye tunletɛ, nnwɔɔ ninle Kristo nɛ.
40023011	Kaamɛ lee, nwɔ ninle ni ɔnɔɔfo yi, dikpe nii eele kpɛmblatɛ ɛɛta bayɛntɛle.
40023012	Otii wɔ niɛtakatɛsa ni suoto katoo yi, Yaa mawakosa nwɔ kasɔ. Otii wɔ kafɔɔ niɛwakosa ni suoto kasɔ yi, Yaa matakatɛsa nwɔ katoo.
40023013	“Biyɔɔsa, aye kufiofa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii! Aye anu di anu basaablatɛ! Biɛsɛɛ Yaa sɛka kalekɔ kayokontũ biekpee batii bilɛ batambuo. Aye bamu kafɔɔ biesĩ bilɛ biloobuo. Bietĩi mba kafɔɔ nikokpee ni okyiini alɛ boobuo ni osuku.
40023014	Biyɔɔsa aye kufiofa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii! Aye anu di anu basaablatɛ! Minkyɛ bakpisɔfɔ nfũ bilɛ biɔkyakaako ma, kafɔɔ minkyɔnkyɔ ma minfũ ma asaa ninnɛɛ. Mimpɛ ɔlaa minklɛsa kafɔɔ bilɛ biɔyɔ minkyɔnkyɔ ma. Ta nkpo oso letokonanfi lee matɛ nimpɔ.
40023015	“Biyɔɔsa aye kufiofa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii! Aye anu di anu basaablatɛ! Mintaalɛ lekpo minkyɛ minkyi kayi aba aba mimmiɛ otii onwii minta Yaa. Nse bitɔɔwɛ otii nwu bieloo, mintuo nwɔ asaa anlalaa anlenkee bia aye bamu lee sɛnyɔ, alɛ aakyɛ kawɔɔ ɔtɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ!
40023016	“Biyɔɔsa aye batunletɛ ba di anu lebiɛ ni! Mintuo bilɛ, ‘Nse otii lɛka Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo yi, diɛbla lɛsalɛsaa, kafɔɔ nse otii lɛka koto sɛɛle ko ninte ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, dikpe nii eediki ntam nwu nkpo.’
40023017	Banumbiɛtɛ babuutɛ! Lɛmɛnle niefĩ dilenke, koto sɛɛle nwu ɛɛ, sɛɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ ka niɛta koto sɛɛle nwu nkpo nte ni klekle?
40023018	Biokple mintuo bilɛ, ‘Nse otii owo lɛka oleɔta akyikye nwu nkpo yi, diɛbla lɛsalɛsaa. Kafɔɔ nse ɛɛlɛɛ oleɔta wɔ nintika ni di oleɔta akyikye nwu nkpo suoto yi, ni dikpe nii eediki ntam nwu nkpo.’
40023019	Banumbiɛtɛ biɛtɛ bile nwaako! Lɛmɛnle niefĩ dilenke, oleɔta nwu ɛɛ, sɛɛ oleɔta akyikye ya niɛta oleɔta nwu nkpo nte ni klekle?
40023020	Nkpo oso, nse otii owo lɛlɛɛ oleɔta akyikye nwu nkpo yi, ni atɔɔlɛɛ oleɔta akyikye nwu nkpo ku oleɔta wɔ omuu nintika nya ni di suoto.
40023021	Nse ɛɛlɛɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ kafɔɔ yi, ni atɔɔlɛɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu ku Yaa wɔ ninsi ni ninfa.
40023022	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ nse otii owo lɛka osi yi, ni atɔɔka Yaa lɛkakpomii ku Yaa wɔ omu ninsi ni di lekpomii nwu suoto nɛ.
40023023	“Biyɔɔsa aye kufiofa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii! Aye anu di anu basaablatɛ! Biye mmle okle manta ni apasalɛbi ku kayee ku abulaa dikyuu lefosile nɔɔ manta ni Yaa, kafɔɔ biesĩ kufiofa asaatuo finle ya ninle ni batii ɔtannyu di anu ku nyaami ɔnya ku ote tinini biɛtɛ. Asaa ya mmle dikaatɛ alɛ biɛka ɔbla fiɛ biɛyɔ nnya nkpo kafɔɔ biɛkyakaa nɛ.
40023024	Batunletɛ banumbiɛtɛ! Mindiki kabɔkɔbii biibii di nta anu, kafɔɔ asaa ya mimmɛ ni lemuɔ alenke kapupɔnkɔ!
40023025	“Biyɔɔsa aye kufiofa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii! Aye anu di anu basaablatɛ! Minfoto sipũ lee ku awansaa lee sɛmaa klekle, kafɔɔ kamɛ ninya leyii pɔ ku lɛkpɔnɔnfɔ fɛ mmle okle bieyii ni ku ditiitafaa ku onumbɛbɛɛ.
40023026	Afɔ Farisi otii numbiɛtɛ, foto opũ lɛfɔ kamɛ lɛkasale, ni sɛmaa kafɔɔ makpa.
40023027	“Biyɔɔsa aye kufiofa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii! Aye anu di anu basaablatɛ! Bite fɛ sɛkya se beekpiitaa ni ku akaaloo siɔlɛ ni onyu kaayi osie kanya. Kafɔɔ kamɛ leyii pɔ ku bakpi buule ku akufi.
40023028	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ biɛbla suoto fɛ batii biene baatii anu nɛ, kafɔɔ kamɛ lee leyii pɔ ku sɛlaa kuafunu ku sikpile.
40023029	“Biyɔɔsa aye kufiofa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii! Aye anu di anu basaablatɛ! Mimbla sɛkya biene minta Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ, minlolaa kafɔɔ batii ba niesiɛ ni nkpa biene sɛkya osie kanya.
40023030	Mimbuɛ kafɔɔ bilɛ, ‘Nse minsiɛ nkpa di bawa lee obe kamɛ yi, nse biɛbla onwii ku mma bilo Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nwu nkpo.’
40023031	Kafɔɔ nwaako ɔsaabla lee kodiki kuntuo alɛ batii ba nialo ni Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nwu nkpo banantii bile.
40023032	Nkpo oso yi, bibla bikyɛnko, biɛyɛntɛ lɛsaa le baawa lee lakye ni kasɔ.
40023033	“Batii kpile bile! Bite fɛ basaanwu ku abi! Bienyu bilɛ bibafuo otoso odie di Yaa letokonanfi le abananfi ye ni di ɔtɔ kawɔɔ kamɛ?
40023034	Nle mmle oso, makyesee ye Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ ku banumbentɛ ku kufiofa batuotɛ, bibapɛ bawo minkaasa di kowoso suoto mankpi. Bibapɛ bawo kafɔɔ kowesee di nsiisakɔ lee, mintikanko babamba kafɔɔ mindiki di okpoo minsifiko okpoo bamba kamɛ.
40023035	Di ɔsaabla wɔ mmle oso, batii ba ninte ni tinini bamuu ntɔ be batooyiwii ni kaasɔ suoto, matika ye diisi. Dibakye kasɔ di otii tinini Abel ntɔ suoto, ninaase di Barakia obi nɔɔ Sakaria wɔ bialo ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ kamɛ ku oleɔta akyikye obo.
40023036	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, ntɔ be mmle beewii nii letokonanfi mawa di aye ba ninkpe ni nkpa miɛ disi.
40023037	“O Yerusalem, Yerusalem, afɔ nialo Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ, faasafɔ batii ba kafɔɔ di Yaa lakpee fɔ ni ɔkyɛ aafuɔ faalo! Obe kpinwu ntoomiɛ nlɛ kosiisa babi lɛfɔ di afoko nii kalɔ fɛ mmle okle di kɔɔkɔɔbi ɔya nkpaa abi ankpee ni di afoko nɔɔ kalɔ, kafɔɔ floonu kasɔ!
40023038	Ta nle mmle oso, Yaa madiki okpoo wɔ mmle atoko manwɔɔsa nwu.
40023039	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, biloosinwa mi ɔbanya diediki diɛlaase di obe wɔ biebuɛ bilɛ, ‘Yaa lekusɛkusɛsa otii wɔ nikɔwa ni di Saate leyooto kamɛ.’ ”
40024001	Obe wɔ di Yesu ladie di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo ninfa aatoosifi nii, ni di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ babatootuo nwɔ Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo ku ayo ninya.
40024002	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bilolaa asaa ya mmle nwu nkpo binyu nwaa. Diekye kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ bababiɛ nya amuu, bia difuɔ ku ninwii dilababu ditika di lewo nini suoto alɛ baasamiisa nya batɛ kaasɔ.”
40024003	Di obe wɔ di Yesu lasifi aalaasiɛ ni di Nnɔnyi Awoso Kobokote suoto yi, ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ buɛɛ babakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Tɔkɔ wɔ ɔmɛmbe di asaa ya mmle mawa kaanya? Obe kafɔɔ nimale dituosaa alɛ fɔɔwa, ni kayi kalookɔ kafɔɔ ntoowo?”
40024004	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bilolaa binyu nwaa alɛ otii kuonwii diɛkyɔnkyɔ ye.
40024005	Diekye batii kpinwu mayɔ leyooto nii manwa ɔkyɛ lee, mamatɔkɔ ye alɛ, ‘Ami ninle Kristo nwu!’ Mankyɔnkyɔ batii kpinwu.
40024006	Bibanu kakpɛ kudu sɛɛlɔɔkɔ lee ku kakpɛ sɛlaa fanfa, kafɔɔ bitanta lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ ye. Dikpe nii, asaa ya mmle okle lɛwa kafɔɔ dilootuo alɛ kayi kalookɔ ntoowo.
40024007	Nnle mataka baawo suoto, sɛka nlekɔ kafɔɔ mataka baawo suoto. Nsɔ matũkũ di aba aba. Aka siene kafɔɔ makpɛ di aba aba.
40024008	Asaa ya mmle amuu nte fɛ mmle lɛɛmɛ nkye kasɔ nintoonu ni mɛlakatɛ nintɔɔtɛ nii.
40024009	“Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, balo lee mata mammufũ ye mambla ye amumu, manlo ye bia. Batii bamuu makyidi ye ta ami oso.
40024010	Di obe nwu kamɛ yi, batii kpinwu madiɛ ofũ onu lɛma. Babadiki bawo lɛma manta, mankyidi bawo lɛma kafɔɔ.
40024011	Balaatɛ Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ kpinwu madie mankyɔnkyɔ batii kpinwu.
40024012	Sikpile ɔbla mapɔ osie kanya di batii kamɛ alɛ batii kpinwu ditiibɔmbɔ mawa kasɔ.
40024013	Kafɔɔ otii wɔ nimakpee otu anaase ni kaayɛntɛlekɔ kamawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
40024014	Batii mayie Yaa sɛka kalekɔ ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo lɛkya kaayi kamuu kamɛ, alɛ otii biala kawɛ osuku annu, fiɛ nfɛ di kayi kaloo nwu nkpo mawa.
40024015	“Nse biɛnya abusufɔɔsaa yɛkɛle ya di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Daniel labuɛ aatɛ ni n-yɛ di Kakleklekɔ nwu nkpo yi, ni afɔ wɔ nikɔka ni kukũ ko mmle yi, nu kasɔ nwaa!
40024016	“Ni biɛta batii ba ninkpe ni di Yudia batoso basifi abokote osi balaawofa.
40024017	Otii wɔ kafɔɔ nintika ni di leyo nɔɔ osi, atantɔkɔ alɛ oosoo anwa amayɔ lɛsalɛsa nɔɔ leeyo kamɛ ansifiko.
40024018	Otii wɔ ninkpe ni koofe, atasinkple aatɔkɔ alɛ ooyie ammayɔ akleesaa nɔɔ leeyo.
40024019	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, dibatɛ ninwɛ osie ninta basanko ba ninlaka ni amɛ ku mba nikɔta babi nyɛɛfu nii.
40024020	Bipɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa bilɛ, otoso osifi wɔ mmle nwu nkpo diɛwa di lɛwɔɔfɔ obe ee Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto!
40024021	Diekye dibuo kplɛ le nimawa ni di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ malenkee nle okle nintɔwa diɛbafe ni di obe wɔ kaayi lakye ni kasɔ diɛbase ni diɛ miɛ dii le mmle. Dibuo le mmle okle kafɔɔ dilabasinwa diidii.
40024022	Kafɔɔ Saate lɛkɔkɔlɛ ayi nwu nkpo. Se diele nkpo ɛɛbla se otii kuonwii dilababu. Kafɔɔ ta batii nɔɔ ba eediki ɛɛta ni suoto oso, ɛɛkɔkɔlɛ ayi nwu.
40024023	“Nioso se otii owo lɛtɔkɔ fɔ alɛ, ‘Nyu! Nnya Kristo ninfũ!’ ee ‘Nyɔɔ ninfa!’, tanfũ nwɔ faanu.
40024024	Diekye batii mataka manlaa mambuɛ alɛ mma ninle Kristo nwu nkpo, bawo kafɔɔ mabuɛ alɛ Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ bale. Bababla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni sɛkpɛ ku atuosaa ate ate mantuo alɛ, nse dialɛ yi, baayɔ mankyɔnkyɔ bia batii ba di Yaa lediki eese ni lete.
40024025	Binu! Nkpo oso ntoole katũ lɛtɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle fiɛ di obe nwu mawo nɛ.
40024026	“Nse batii lɛtɔkɔ ye alɛ, ‘Binyu! Akpe di ɔfaafuu’ yi, bitankyɛ nfa. Ee nse bɛɛtɔkɔ ye alɛ, ‘Asi leeyo kamɛ’ yi, bitanfũ bianu.
40024027	Diekye Otii Obi nwu nkpo mawa fɛ mmle okle di kanto mmunaa ankye ni kufĩ katunkɔ amafe ni kufĩ kamɛɛkɔ.
40024028	Nkpo oso bitanyee bilɛ nfũ di lɛsaa lekpi dite nii, nfa di alente nsi nɛ.
40024029	“Diibuo kplɛ nwu nkpo kamaa, kufĩ mata ditunu, kɔwɛntɛ kafɔɔ dilabapu. Awɛntlɛbi kafɔɔ makpa ankye osi, osi asaa kafɔɔ matididi di aba ya atika nii.
40024030	“Nfanwu Otii Obi nwu nkpo dituosaa makyɔɔ di osi, kasɔ ka mmle batii bamuu mawi kaku di obe wɔ baatii manya Otii Obi nwu makyɔɔ ni di alokonkyɛ kamɛ ɔɔwa ku osie kplɛ di leklekle kamɛ.
40024031	Abata manfɛ dikyukyoo kplɛ nwu nkpo. Abakyesee Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ di kayi ka mmle nkyakakɔ nwu nkpo nna, mansiisa batii nɔɔ ba eediki ni mankyeko kaasɔ disi le diɛlase ni diisi le.
40024032	“Bitekete lɛsaa bikyeko kolewoso suoto. Nse obe wɔ biɛnya bilɛ nfɛ kuodie ni sɛla fɔle kuokpee ni afata fɔle yi, mintofo bilɛ kanto ɔnɔɔbee nfɛ kowo.
40024033	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ nse bienya asaa ya mmle nkpo amuu yi, bietofo bilɛ Kristo obe nwu nkpo ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ, nfɛ ayɛ di kayokontũ.
40024034	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ asaa ya mmle amuu mawa fiɛ di batii ba bamuu ninsi ni nkpa nunua maloo okpi.
40024035	Osi ku kasɔ mafe, kafɔɔ sɛlaa nii nsĩ, silabafe diidii.
40024036	“Otii kuonwii dieye dii nwu nkpo ku obe wɔ kamɛ dibale nii. Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ ba ninkpe ni di osi dieye. Bia Obi nwu nkpo omu dieye, Ote lete ninnye.
40024037	Otii Obi nwu nkpo ɔwabee mate fɛ lɛsaa le niawa ni di Noa obe kamɛ.
40024038	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ fiɛ di kanto labanɔɔ aayii ni kayi yi, batii latoole baatoonyi. Basanko ku basuɔtɔ latoodiki bawo baatɔɔyɔ. Baatɔɔyɔ bawo kafɔɔ baatɔɔta asa, dialaase di dii le di Noa labuo ni di oklo nwu nkpo kamɛ.
40024039	Kafɔɔ batatofo lɛsaa le niatɔɔwa nii, dialaase di obe wɔ di kanto lanɔɔ ntu labayɔ ni bamuu lɛma. Nkpo okle dibate nse Otii Obi nwu nkpo lɛwa nɛ.
40024040	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, basuɔtɔ banyɔ matɔɔbla ɔkpɛ koofe Yaa makpaa onwii andiɛ onwii.
40024041	Basanko banyɔ kafɔɔ mawɛ di nnaafũ kakuɔkɔ, Yaa makpaa onwii andiɛ onwii.
40024042	“Nkpo oso bita anu lee ate kesekese, diekye bieye dii le di Saate lee kamawa nii.
40024043	Nse fɛ leyo saate n-ye obe wɔ kamɛ di yu kamawa nii yi, biye bilɛ atabasiɛ ku anu kesekese ansoko nwɔ. Atabata yu nwu nkpo abiɛ kakɔkakɔ abuo nwɔ leyo kamɛ.
40024044	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ dikpe nii biɛta anu lee lete kesekese obe lele nɛ, diekye Otii Obi nwu nkpo kamawa di obe wɔ kamɛ minoonyu osuku bilɛ abawa nii.
40024045	“Nimɔ owe ninle kpɛmblatɛ wɔ niebe ni anu ambla ni asaa di osuku suoto? Nnwɔɔ ninle otii wɔ di saate nɔɔ leyɔ nwɔ eese ni di bakpɛmblatɛ wo nɔɔ kanya alɛ aata ma ni alesaa di obe kanya nɛ.
40024046	Nwaako suoto matɛ sinyɔɔ kpɛmblatɛ nwu nkpo nse saate nɔɔ lɛwa ɛbanyɔɔ alɛ ɔɔbla lɛsaa le aatɔkɔ nwɔ nii.
40024047	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, saate nwu nkpo mayɔ kpɛmblatɛ wɔ mmle anse di asaa nɔɔ amuu kanya.
40024048	Kafɔɔ nse kpɛmblatɛ kpile ale yi, ababuɛ antɔkɔ suoto alɛ, ‘Sua! Saate nii dilabawa nunua!’
40024049	Nkpo oso abakye kasɔ antɔɔpɛ bakpɛmblatɛ wo nɔɔ nwu nkpo. Nse atɔɔkyako ole, onyi ku batasiɛntɛ.
40024050	Nse Saate nwu nkpo ntookple ɛɛwa di dii le ku obe wɔ di kpɛmblatɛ nwu nkpo diloonyu osuku aatɔɔ nii.
40024051	Saate nwu nkpo mananfi kpɛmblatɛ nwu nkpo kootoko osie kanya, antɔɔ kalekɔ nɔɔ di anu di anu basaablatɛ kamɛ. Nfa di kaku owi ku anyɛɛ owee kamawɛ nɛ!
40025001	“Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo mate fɛ mmle okle. Di obe onwii kamɛ, kokpeelebitɛ lefosi kowo layɔ bakandiɛ lɛma alɛ bɔɔlaakyakako ɔkafɔɔsa.
40025002	Banɔɔ kaamɛ lɛma lale babuutɛ. Banɔɔ bule kafɔɔ lale banumbentɛ.
40025003	Babuutɛ nwu nkpo layɔ bakandiɛ lɛma kafɔɔ bataklee nnɔfɔ kunwii baakyakaa.
40025004	Kafɔɔ banumbentɛ nwu nkpo mma baabla nnɔfɔ baakpete di asaa kamɛ baakle baata bakandiɛ lɛma.
40025005	Ɔkafɔɔsa nwu nkpo laklɛ ku ɔwa, nkpo oso kokpeelebitɛ nwu nkpo lakyako sɛkyɔsĩ ɔkpa, ni baakyɔsĩi nɛ.
40025006	“Nkyɛntɛɛ fiɛ kuudu ladie alɛ, ‘Ɔkafɔɔsa nwu ntɔbabuo kyu woo! Bidie biwa biɛbakyakako nwɔ!’
40025007	“Ninfɛ di bakpeelebitɛ lefosi nwu nkpo lataka wla baayiensa bakandiɛ lɛma nɛ.
40025008	Ninfɛ di babuutɛ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ banumbentɛ nwu nkpo alɛ, ‘Bitika wo nnɔfɔ lee nwu nkpo nnwo, diekye bakandiɛ loo ba bukle ni nfɛ konii.’
40025009	“Ninfɛ di banumbentɛ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ ma alɛ, ‘Oo, nnɔfɔ be bukle ni dilabawo awo ku aye. Nkpo oso bitɔɔkyɛ basunsutɛ nfũ biɛlaaya.’
40025010	“Nkpo oso babuutɛ nwu nkpo lasifi nnɔfɔ nwu nkpo kayakɔ. Obe wɔ baasifi ni osifi ni di ɔkafɔɔsa nwu nkpo lawa nɛ. Ninfɛ di kokpeelebitɛ kɔnɔɔ ko nialoolaa ni suoto latikanko nwɔ baabuo ɔsanko nwu kayɔkɔ nɛ, ni baasɛɛ leyo nɛ.
40025011	“Nni sɛmma, kokpeelebitɛ bulɛ nwu nkpo kafɔɔ lawa, ni baabuɛ alɛ, ‘Ɔnɔɔfo, Ɔnɔɔfo! Sɛkɛtɛ wo buobuo!’
40025012	“Ninfɛ di ɔkafɔɔsa nwu nkpo latɔkɔ ma alɛ, ‘Oowo! Ninye ye.’ ”
40025013	Ninfɛ di Yesu layɛntɛ ku lɛkpa nwu alɛ, “Nkpo oso bita anu lee ate kesekese, diekye bieye dii nwu nkpo ee obe wɔ di Otii Obi nwu mawa nii.
40025014	“Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu kamate fɛ nle mmle okle. Obe onwii kamɛ osuɔtɔ onwii lalolaa suoto aatoofe osuku, ni aalɛɛ bakpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ, aayɔ ma aase di asaa nɔɔ kanya nɛ.
40025015	Aata obiala lɛma lɛsaa le aafuo ni okle di osei nɔɔ kanya. Aata onwii koto fututu nkpe nnɔɔ, ɔbamba kafɔɔ aatɔɔ koto nkpe nnyɔ, ɔbamba kafɔɔ aatɔɔ kakpe kanwii. Ni aadie aasifi osuku nɛ.
40025016	Kpɛmblatɛ wɔ niafũ ni koto nkpe nnɔɔ, nfanwu aasifi aalaayɔ koto nɔɔ aakpee di ɔkpɛ ɔbla kamɛ aawɛ koto nkpe nnɔɔ atikasa.
40025017	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di kpɛmblatɛ wɔ niafũ ni koto nkpe nnyɔ lawɛ koto nkpe nnyɔ aatikasa nɛ.
40025018	Kafɔɔ kpɛmblatɛ wɔ niafũ ni koto kakpe kanwii lasifi aalaakutu kasɔ aayɔ Saate nɔɔ koto aakookaa ninfa.
40025019	“Ayi kpinwu sɛmaa, bakpɛmblatɛ nwu nkpo Saate lɛma lakple aawa aabablako ma koto nwu nkpo nkuntaa.
40025020	Kpɛmblatɛ wɔ niafũ ni koto nkpe nnɔɔ, layɔ koto nkpe nnɔɔ bamba aakyakaa, ni aabuɛ alɛ, ‘Ɔnɔɔfo, faatɛɛ koto nkpe nnɔɔ kafɔɔ lɛwɛ nkpe nnɔɔ bamba letikasa.’
40025021	“Ninfɛ di Saate nɔɔ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Oo! Kpɛmblatɛ biene, fɛɛbla lɛsaa di osuku kanya nwaako! Di obe wɔ feelolaa fɛɛbla, feelolaa koto ko mmle kafuii feekle ni oso yi, mayɔ fɔ nse di koto kplɛ kanya. Wa fabasiɛ di suoto lɛyɔɔ nii kamɛ!’
40025022	“Ninfɛ di kpɛmblatɛ wɔ kafɔɔ baata ni koto nkpe nnyɔ lawa ababuɛ alɛ, ‘Ɔnɔɔfo, faatɛɛ koto nkpe nnyɔ, kafɔɔ lɛwɛ nkpe nnyɔ bamba letikasa.’
40025023	“Ninfɛ di Saate nɔɔ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Oo! Kpɛmblatɛ biene, fɛɛbla lɛsaa di osuku kanya nwaako! Di obe wɔ feelolaa fɛɛbla, feelolaa koto koto ko mmle kafuii feekle ni oso yi, mayɔ fɔ nse di koto kplɛ kanya. Wa fabasiɛ di suoto lɛyɔɔ nii kamɛ!’
40025024	“Ninfɛ di kpɛmblatɛ wɔ kafɔɔ baata ni koto kakpe kanwii lawa ababuɛ alɛ. ‘Ɔnɔɔfo, n-ye nlɛ fale otii wɔ di ɔlaa lɛfɔ nkpe ni osie, fanfiɛlɛ ninfũ fanankpɛ nii. Fantɛsɛ ninfũ kafɔɔ fanampɛ ni lɛsalɛsaa.
40025025	Kɔyɛkɛ ni oso, layɔ koto lɛfɔ nwu nkpo lalakutu kasɔ layɔ lakookaa. Nnya lɛsaa lɛfɔ. Fũ!’
40025026	“Ninfɛ di Saate nɔɔ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Afɔ kpɛmblatɛ kpile, fakpe nkyɔkɔ lo! Faye falɛ nfiɛlɛ ninfũ ninankpe ni kowee, ntɛsɛ kafɔɔ ninfũ ninampɛ ni lɛsalɛsaa.
40025027	Ni be oso fanan-yɔ koto nii nwu nkpo falaatɛ di koto katɛkɔ alɛ nse lɛwa kafũ koto nwu nkpo nwɛ lɛsaa ntikasa?’
40025028	“Ninfɛ di Saate nɔɔ nwu nkpo labuɛ alɛ, ‘Bifũ koto nwu nkpo di nnɛɛ nɔɔ biɛyɔ bita otii wɔ ninkle ni koto nkpe lefosi.’
40025029	Diekye otii wɔ ninkpe ni lɛsaa yi, nnwɔɔ babakple mankyakaa mampɔɔsa nɛ. Alɛ lɛsaa le ninkpe nwɔ ni kakple nimpɔ ninlenkee. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ ninnaa ni lɛsaa yi, kɛɛkɛɛ wɔ bia ninkpe nwu nii yi, babakle manfũ nwɔ ninnɛɛ kamɛ.
40025030	Kpɛmblatɛ wɔ mmle diesinlɛ ata lɛsalɛsaa ɔblako, nkpo oso biyɔ nwɔ bifuki binyu kaayi di ditunu nwu nkpo kamɛ. Nfa abawi kaku anwee anyɛɛ nɛ.
40025031	“Nse Otii Obi nwu nkpo lɛwa fɛ Ɔka, di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ lɛmana nwɔ beekyi yi, abasiɛ di lɛkakpomii nɔɔ suoto.
40025032	Abasiisa nnle mmuu batii di anu nɔɔ, nse atɔɔsɛ ma ntɛɛ di akyuu anyɔ fɛ mmle okle di babɔkɛɛkpatɛ nsɛ ni batie ku bafoso ntɛɛ.
40025033	Abata batii biene nyila di oletanɛɛkyɛ nɔɔ, anta batii kpile kafɔɔ nyila di ɔmɛtukyɛ nɔɔ.
40025034	“Nse Ɔka nwu nkpo ntɔɔtɔkɔ batii ba nin-yɛ nwɔ ni di oletanɛɛkyɛ alɛ, ‘Biwa, aye ninle batii ba di Teemi lewii ni lɛyɔɔ nɛ! Biwa biɛbasiɛ di sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo di Yaa lelolaa ɛɛta ye ni, diɛyɔ ni di kayi kasɔ kakyekɔ.
40025035	Diekye di obe wɔ kɔɔka laklee mi nii, biatɛɛ alesaa lale. Obe wɔ di otukɔnsɔ laklee mi nii, biatɛɛ ntu lanyi. Obe wɔ kafɔɔ lababuo ye ni kɔfɔɔ, biafũ mi ku otu biene.
40025036	Obe wɔ lakyɛ ni lɛkyɔtɔ, biatɛɛ asaa laklee. Obe wɔ latoofiɛ nii, bianyu mi. Obe wɔ kafɔɔ late ni leeyo, biawa biabanyu mi.’
40025037	“Nfa nfɛ di batii biene nwu nkpo makaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Saate, ɔmɛmbe buanya fɔ kɔka laklee fɔ buata fɔ alesaa faale, ee ɔmɛmbe di otukɔnsɔ laklee fɔ buata fɔ ntu faanyi?
40025038	Ɔmɛmbe faabuo wo kɔfɔɔ buafũ fɔ ku otu biene, ee faakyɛ lɛkyɔtɔ buata fɔ asaa faaklee?
40025039	Ɔmɛmbe faatoofiɛ buawa buabasɛɛsa fɔ, ee faate leeyo katenkɔ buawa buabanyu fɔ?’
40025040	“Nfa nfɛ di Ɔka nwu nkpo madiki kanya alɛ, ‘Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, di obe wɔ biɛnya biɛbla nle mmle biɛta ni babiloo ba mmle yɛntɛle onwii lɛma kamaa, ami biɛbla biɛta.’
40025041	“Nfa nfɛ abatɔkɔ batii ba nin-yɛ nwɔ ni di ɔmɛtukyɛ alɛ, ‘Bikyɛ mi di ɔlɔɔkɔ bisifi aye ba di Yaa lɛkpaani ntika ni di suoto! Bitɔɔkyɛ kawɔɔ ɔtɔ wɔ ninnaa ni kaloo di Yaa lelolaa ɛɛtɛ ɛɛta ni Abonsam ku batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ kamɛ!
40025042	Diekye kɔka laklee mi, kafɔɔ bitatɛɛ alesaa lale. Otukɔnsɔ laklee mi, kafɔɔ bitatɛɛ ntu lanyi.
40025043	Labuo ye kɔfɔɔ, kafɔɔ bitafũ mi. Lakyɛ lɛkyɔtɔ, bitatɛɛ asaa laklee. Latoofiɛ bitawa biabasɛɛsɛɛ. Late leeyo kafɔɔ bitawa biabanyu mi.’
40025044	“Nfa nfɛ babakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Saate, ɔmɛmbe buanya fɔ kɔka laklee fɔ, ee otukɔnsɔ laklee fɔ, ee faabuo wo kɔfɔɔ, ee faakyɛ lɛkyɔtɔ, ee faatoofiɛ, ee faate leeyo fiɛ butakyakaako fɔ?’
40025045	“Nfa nfɛ di Ɔka nwu nkpo matɔkɔ ma alɛ, ‘Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ di obe wɔ bitabla dibiene biata ni babiloo ba mmle yɛntɛle yi, ami bitabla biata.’ ”
40025046	Yesu layɛntɛ alɛ, “Batii ba mmle nwu nkpo masifi dibuo le ninnaa ni kaloo kamɛ. Batii biene kafɔɔ masifi nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo kamɛ.”
40026001	Di obe wɔ kamɛ di Yesu ntooloo ni asaa ya mmle amuu otuo yi, aatɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ,
40026002	“Biye bilɛ ditoobu ayi anyɔ bubale ni Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii nwu nkpo. Babayɔ Otii Obi nwu nkpo manta mampɛ mankaasa di kowoso suoto.”
40026003	Ninfɛ di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku okpoo banɔɔfo balaasi di Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo Kaiafa leyo nɛ.
40026004	Ni baalaabla disibu mmle okle babamufũ ni Yesu di lɛwofa kamɛ manlo nwɔ ni nɛ.
40026005	Ni baabuɛ baatɔkɔ bawo alɛ, “Ditanwa alɛ buɔbla lɛsaa le mmle di ayi ya buole ni kamɛ. Se diele nkpo, batii manya ɔblɔ mantaka wo di suoto.”
40026006	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, Yesu lakyɛ Simon wɔ niafiɛ ni ofiɛ sɛɛle leyo di Betania.
40026007	Yesu lawɛ di Betania okpoo diɛ Simon wɔ niafiɛ ni ofiɛ sɛɛle leyo. Ɔbe wɔ di Yesu lasiɛ aatoole ni alesaa, ɔsanko onwii lawa nfa. Aaklee difuɔ kylɔkylɔ lebo ninwii di nnɔnyi kɔnɔkɔnɔ be niefũ ni kɔya osie kanya lasiɛ ni kaamɛ. Ni aanyɛɛnɛ nnɔnyi nwu nkpo aakpete di Yesu disi nɛ.
40026008	Obe wɔ baasaateketetɛ nɔɔ lanya ni nle mmle yi, ditaayɔɔ ma kafutu, ni baakaalɛ alɛ, “Be lɛsaa oso ɛɛlalaasa nnɔnyi be mmle, nkpo okle?
40026009	Baafuo nnɔnyi be mmle osunsũ ku kɔya kplɛ, man-yɔ koto nwu nkpo manta bapiitɛ fiɛ!”
40026010	Yesu lanu ɔlaa wɔ baatoobuɛ nii, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Be oso biokpee ɔsanko wɔ mmle kubuɛ? Lɛsaa biene ninle nle mmle ɛɛbla ɛɛtɛɛ nii nɛ.
40026011	Bapiitɛ nsi ye kaamɛ obe lele. Kafɔɔ ami, diele obe lele kamawɛ ye kaamɛ.
40026012	Nnɔnyi be mmle di ɔsanko wɔ mmle lɛyɔ eekpete mi ni di suoto yi, ololaa eelolaa mi ɛɛta okookaabee nii.
40026013	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, kakɔ lele beeyie ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle lɛkya di kayi ka mmle kamɛ yi, lɛsaa le di ɔsanko wɔ mmle lɛbla nii, bababuɛ nwu man-yɔ mannyuma nwɔ.”
40026014	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ lefosi banyɔ nwu nkpo onwii lɛma wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Yuda Iskariot ladie aasifi olebatatɛ banɔɔfo nfũ nɛ.
40026015	Ni aalaakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Be bibatɛɛ nse lediki Yesu lɛta ye?” Ninfɛ baaka koto fututu afosi atiɛ baatɔɔ nɛ.
40026016	Diayɔ di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ diasifi nii, Yuda latoomiɛ osuku wɔ suoto abafe andiki Yesu anta nii.
40026017	Diɛ Bloblo wɔ Ninantaka ni Dii ole kamɛ, di dii kasale suoto yi, basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lawa Yesu nfũ babakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔfɛ foomiɛ falɛ bulaawa Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii ole alesaa nwu buta fɔ?”
40026018	Ni aakpee ma osuɔtɔ onwii nfũ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitɔɔkyɛ okpoo kamɛ biɛlaatɔkɔ nwɔ bilɛ, ‘Saatuotɛ alɛ, “Obe nii ntoowo. Ami ku basaateketetɛ nii, leyo lɛfɔ bubale Okpi Diisi Ofe alesaa nwu nkpo.” ’ ”
40026019	Nkpo oso basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo labla fɛ mmle okle di Yesu latɔkɔ ma nii, baalaawa Okpi Diisi Ofe alesaa nwu nkpo baase.
40026020	Di obe wɔ kɔɔtɔɔfɔ lawo nii, Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lefosi batii banyɔ nwu nkpo lasiɛ kaasɔ alɛ boole alesaa.
40026021	Obe wɔ boole ni alesaa nwu nkpo, Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii onwii kaamɛ lee madiki mi anta.”
40026022	Ɔlaa nwu nkpo lakpanko basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo di otu kamɛ osie kanya ni baakyako nwɔ ɔkaalɛ onwii onwii alɛ, “Saate, nwaa n-ye nlɛ diele ami falaka, sɛɛ ami dile?”
40026023	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Otii wɔ niekpee ni kɔnɛɛ kaasɛfɛ ku ami, nimadiki mi anta.
40026024	Ami, Otii Obi nwu nkpo, makpi fɛ mmle okle di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ labuɛ nii. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ nimadiki ami, Otii Obi nwu nkpo, anta nii, ayɔɔsa. Nse bia batanlofo nwɔ, nse dilɛ nwɔ dilenke!”
40026025	Ninfɛ di Yuda wɔ niadiki nwɔ aata ni kafɔɔ lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, nwaa n-ye nlɛ diele ami falaka, sɛɛ ami dile?” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nnwu fatoobuɛ nɛ.”
40026026	Di obe wɔ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nsi boole ni alesaa yi, ni aayɔ bloblo nɛ. Ni aapɛ Yaa sɛfa, aafee nwɔ, aayɔ aata basaateketetɛ nɔɔ, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bifũ bile. Nle mmle ninle suoto nii sina nɛ.”
40026027	Ninfɛ aayɔ opũ, ni aapɛ Yaa sɛfa, aayɔ aata ma aabuɛ alɛ, “Bamuu lee bifũ binyi.
40026028	Nle mmle ninle ntɔ nii be bɛɛyɔ beese ni kaanya di Yaa kanya ninii le eenii ni ku batii nɛ. Beewii mi kaasɔ di batii kpinwu disi alɛ Yaa kayɔ sikpile lɛma ankyɛ ma.
40026029	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, namasinnyi nta be mmle okle diidii diɛlaase di dii le di ami ku aye bubanyi ni nta fɔle di Teemi sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ.”
40026030	Ninfɛ baasa onu onwii baatansa Yaa, ni baadie baasifi Nnɔnyi Awoso Kobokote suoto nɛ.
40026031	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Miɛ kakyɛ yi, bamuu lee bibatoso mindiɛ mi nimbu lete nii. Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ labuɛ alɛ, ‘Yaa malo bafosokpatɛ nwu nkpo se bafoso nwu bamuu ntɔɔsamii.’
40026032	Kafɔɔ nse beekple bɛɛsɛnkɛsɛɛ bɛɛwako nkpa kamɛ yi, male ye katũ nsifi Galilea.”
40026033	Ninfɛ di Petro latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Mintɛ bawo nii bamuu matoso mandiɛ fɔ yi, ami diidii namatoso ndiɛ fɔ!”
40026034	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ Petro alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, kakyɛ ka mmle fiɛ di kɔɔkɔ mabo nii, fababuɛ sitiɛ simu falɛ faaye mi.”
40026035	Petro ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nse bia olo alɛ booloe munko fɔ yi, diidii namabuɛ nlɛ ninye fɔ.” Basaateketetɛ bule bamuu kafɔɔ labuɛ nkpo.
40026036	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo lasifi lɛba le bɔɔlɛɛ ni Getsemane. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bisiɛ ninfũ ninkyɛ sitũ naapɛ ɔlaa nta Yaa.”
40026037	Ni aakpaa Petro ku Sebedeo babi banyɔ nwu nkpo aakyakaa di suoto nɛ. Ditaklɛ ni aabuo nyaami, aakyako otũtũkũ di suoto nɔɔ kamɛ nɛ.
40026038	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Konu dibuo di otu nii kamɛ osie kanya fɛle kukpi ninkle mi. Aye bisiɛ ninfũ bietoonyunkoe.”
40026039	Ninfɛ aakyɛ sitũ kɛɛkɛ nɛ, ni aapɛ akunkyi aafuusa anu kaasɔ aapɛ ɔlaa alɛ, “Teete, nse diaalɛ yi, faata dibuo opũ wɔ mmle nwu nkpo kufe mi. Kafɔɔ diele mmle okle komiɛ nii, kafɔɔ bla di dibiesaa lɛfɔ suoto.”
40026040	Ni aakple aawa basaateketetɛ nɔɔ batiɛ nwu nkpo nfũ nɛ, aabanya ma baatɔɔkyɔsĩi. Ninfɛ aakaalɛ Petro alɛ, “Ni bilaafuo osiɛ otoonyunkoe lebombo ninwii pɛ?
40026041	Bita anu lee ate kesekese biɛpɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa alɛ bilaabuo di ɔsɔ onyu kamɛ. Ninwuna komiɛ ɔbla, kafɔɔ suoto sina nnaa osie.”
40026042	Nni sɛmaa Yesu lakple aasifi lɛnyɔɔfa aalaapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa alɛ, “Teete, nse dibuo le mmle dilabawaalɛ mi dife, dikaatɛ alɛ lefe ni kaamɛ, dile fɔ dibiesaa yi, faata diwa kaanya.”
40026043	Obe wɔ aakple aawa ni basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo nfũ, aabanya ma baatɔɔkyɔsĩi, batafuo bia anu otikiti.
40026044	Yesu lakple aadiɛ ma aatɛ, aasifi aalaapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa ditiɛfa aabuɛ sɛlaa se okle aabuɛ abafe nii.
40026045	Ninfɛ aakple aawa basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo nfũ, aabakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Sɛkyɔsĩ biɔkyɔsĩi mintɛ ɔnyɛɛ nkpo nɛ? Binyu! Obe nwu ntoowo alɛ baayɔ ami Otii Obi nwu nkpo mankpee di bakpileblatɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ.
40026046	Bitaka buosifi. Binyu, otii wɔ nikodiki mi anta ni ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ.”
40026047	Yesu lakple aayila aatɔɔkakatɛ ko ma fiɛ di Yuda wɔ ninle ni lefosi batii banyɔ nwu nkpo onwii lɛma lawa. Batii dikudi le di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ ku okpoo banɔɔfo ladiki ni latikanko nwɔ baatɔɔwa. Baaklee nwosoku ku mpamii.
40026048	Otii wɔ niadiki Yesu aata ni latɔkɔ ma aatɛ alɛ, “Otii wɔ kamaminiko mbla ni atuu yi, nnwɔɔ ninle nwɔ biowolaa ni nɛ. Biemufũ nwɔ.”
40026049	Di Yuda lanya ni Yesu, ni aakyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ aalaatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, atoko ɔkyɛ ole disiɛko fɔ.” Ninfɛ aaminiko nwɔ aabla nwɔ aatuu nɛ.
40026050	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Siɛwo, lɛsaa le oso fɛɛwa ni ta dipɛsɛwa!” Ninfɛ di batii nwu nkpo ladie baawa Yesu nfũ, ni baamufũ nwɔ, baakle kpinkpĩ nɛ.
40026051	Ni baatii ba niawɛ ni di Yesu ɔkyɛ, onwii lɛma ladiki kapamii nɔɔ di kotofo kamɛ aasafɔ Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo kpɛmblatɛ kotoko aakpa nɛ.
40026052	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kplesa kapamii lɛfɔ fakpee ninfũ feediki ni. Batii ba niɛyɔ ni kapamii yi, kapamii kanya manka.
40026053	Sɛɛ bieye bilɛ kafuo Teemi ɔlɛɛ nkaalɛ lɛkyakaako, nfanwu ankyesee mi batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ ba ninkpe ni kaatoo, mba ninlenke akudi lefosi anyɔ?
40026054	Kafɔɔ nse bɛɛwa bɛbakyakaakoe, ni lɛyibabla fiɛ di ɔlaa wɔ Kɔɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ ɛɛtɛ alɛ diawa ni, kawa kaanya?”
40026055	Nni kamaa, ni di Yesu lamunikĩi aakaalɛ batii dikudi nwu nkpo alɛ, “Be oso di mpamii ku nwosoku bikle biɛwa mi omufũ fɛle kpileblatɛ nɔɔfo nle? Lasiɛ di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo dii biala latuo batii asaa, kafɔɔ bitatɔkɔ bilɛ biomufũ mi.
40026056	Asaa ya mmle amuu lɛwa kaanya alɛ diata alɛ sɛlaa se di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ lakpana ni di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ kawa kaanya.” Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ bamuu latoso baadiɛ nwɔ nɛ.
40026057	Ninfɛ di batii ba niamufũ ni Yesu lakpaa nwɔ baasifiko Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo Kaiafa leyo nɛ, nfũ di kufiofa batuotɛ ku okpoo banɔɔfo lasi nii.
40026058	Petro latikanko nwɔ sɛɛmaa fanfa aalaabuo Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo nwu leyo kaflɔnkɔ di bawo kalɛɛkɔ. Aakyɛ aalaasiɛ di asaa banyuntɛ ɔlɔɔkɔ aatoonyu mmle okle di ɔsaabla nwu nkpo mate kunfe nii.
40026059	Olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku bakantɛ nwu nkpo niawɛ ni ninfa bamuu lamiɛ alɛ boobudi kanya mantika di Yesu suoto mmle okle baafuo nwɔ ni olo.
40026060	Kafɔɔ batawɛ ɔlaa kuonwii di suoto nɔɔ, nu batii kpinwu ladie baabudi nwɔ kanya. Lɛyɛntɛle, batii banyɔ banwii ladie,
40026061	bababuɛ alɛ, “Otii wɔ mmle labuɛ alɛ, ‘Kamabiɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ ka mmle, ninni kamaa, mayɔ ayi atiɛ nse ni letofo.’ ”
40026062	Ninfɛ di Oletatɛ ɔnɔɔfo lataka aayila aakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Feenu ɔlaa wɔ beebuɛ ni di suoto lɛfɔ? Ɔmɛnlaa ninkpe fɔ fambuɛ?”
40026063	Kafɔɔ Yesu lamaasa kanya, atabuɛ ɔlaa kuonwii. Ninfɛ di Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo lakple aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛka Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa lekpete fɔ nlɛ tɔkɔwo, nse afɔ ninle Kristo nwu nkpo, Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa Obi.”
40026064	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Ɛɛ! Nwu fatoobuɛ fɛ mmle kute ni nɛ. Kafɔɔ kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, diɛyɔ di nua diesifi nii, bibanya Otii Obi nwu nkpo nsi di Yaa wɔ ninlenke ni oletanɛɛkyɛ. Bibanyɔɔ kafɔɔ eekye osi ɔɔwa di alokonkyɛ kamɛ!”
40026065	Obe wɔ di Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, ni aabɛ awu nɔɔ aabuɛ alɛ, “Bienu! Ebuɛ mbusuo ɔlaa! Diesinfĩ alɛ otii kuonwii kayila ɔlaa owo kamaa!
40026066	Lɛ biɛnya?” Ni baamuu lɛma baadiki kanya alɛ, “Eekpi lɛpɔɔ, dikpe ni eekpi!”
40026067	Ninfɛ baatufa sita baakpete nwɔ di anu, ni baapɛ nwɔ nɛ. Bawo kafɔɔ lapɛ nwɔ nnɛɛ di atokosi.
40026068	Ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Kristo nwu nɛ? Tɔkɔ wo, otii wɔ niɛpɛ fɔ ni!”
40026069	Kafɔɔ Petro lasiɛ kaayi di leyo nwu kaflɔnkɔ fiɛ di Olebatatɛ ɔnɔɔfo kpɛmblatɛ ɔsankobi onwii lawa abatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔɔ fatikanko Yesu wɔ niekye ni Galilea kasɔ!”
40026070	Kafɔɔ Petro lasĩ di batii nwu nkpo bamuu anu aabuɛ alɛ, “Ninye ɔlaa kuonwii nkyeko ɔlaa wɔ foobuɛ ni suoto.”
40026071	Ninfɛ aadie aalaayila di kaflɔnkɔ nwu nkpo kayokontũ nɛ. Ninfɛ di kpɛmblatɛ ɔsankobi bamba lanya Petro, ni aatɔkɔ basuɔtɔ ba niayila ni ninfa alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle kafɔɔ latikanko Yesu Nasaret Otii nwu nkpo.”
40026072	Ninfɛ di Petro lakple aasĩ aaka di asaa aabuɛ alɛ, “Ninye osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo kama!”
40026073	Ditaklɛ saa, ni di basuɔtɔ ba niayila ni ninfa lawa Petro nfũ babatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nwaako, afɔɔ, onwii lɛma fale. Diekye mmle okle fɔɔkakatɛ nii, ditoodiki dietuo klekle.”
40026074	Ninfɛ di Petro labuɛ alɛ, “Lɛka nlɛ nwaako kobuɛ! Yaa ananfi mi kootoko nse ɔlaa kɔlaa! Ninye osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle.” Nfanwu, ni di kɔɔkɔ labo nɛ.
40026075	Ninfɛ di Petro lanyuma alɛ Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Fiɛ di kɔɔkɔ mabo nii, fabasĩ mi sitiɛ fambuɛ falɛ, faaye mi.” Nkpo oso aadie aasifi kayi aalaawi kaku osie kanya.
40027001	Kaleesɛ ku kolesɛtũ, olebatatɛ ku okpoo banɔɔfo bamuu, baabla disibu alɛ babalo Yesu.
40027002	Bapɛ nwɔ lekpo ni baakpaa nwɔ baalaakpee di Roma Abaa Nɔɔfo Pilato nnɛɛ kamɛ nɛ.
40027003	Obe wɔ di Yuda wɔ niadiki Yesu aata ni lanu alɛ beelo nwɔ ni kukpi lɛpɔɔ, diabuo nwɔ suoto osie kanya. Nioso aakplesa koto fututu afosi atiɛ nwu nkpo aakyɛnko olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku okpoo banɔɔfo nwu nkpo.
40027004	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Lɛbla okpile di obe wɔ lediki otii wɔ ninambla ni okpile lɛta nlɛ balo nii.” Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nnwu nkpo diɛkaako wo. Ɔlaa lɛfɔ kule!”
40027005	Ninfɛ di Yuda layɔ koto nwu nkpo aawii di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo ninfa, ni aasifi aalaakpee suoto okũ nɛ.
40027006	Ni di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo nwu nkpo lakyɛ baalaasɛsɛɛ koto nwu nkpo ni babuɛ alɛ, “Yinaa alɛ buɔyɔ koto ko mmle buɔkpɔtɔɔsa di nko ninte ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ lɛlakaa kamɛ, diekye otii ntɔ koto kule. Kufiofa loo kafɔɔ diɛta osuku.”
40027007	Di obe wɔ baakpee ni asi baawo, baatuna alɛ babayɔ koto nwu nkpo man-ya dibukii blatɛ kasɔ, nfa kafɔɔ babatookookaa bafɔɔ nɛ.
40027008	Nle mmle oso, bia miɛ bɔɔlɛɛ kasɔ nwu nkpo alɛ Ntɔ Kasɔ nɛ.
40027009	Nioso ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa Ɔlaabuɛtɛtɛ Yeremia labuɛ aatɛ ni lawa kaanya nwaako. Aabuɛ alɛ, “Baayɔ koto fututu afosi atiɛ ko di Israel batii latuna alɛ baata ni diisi nɔɔ,
40027010	baaya dibukii blatɛ kasɔ fɛ mmle di Saate latɔkɔ mi nii.”
40027011	Baakpaa Yesu baalaase di Roma batii abaa ɔnɔɔfo Pilato anu. Ni aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Yuda batii Ɔka nwu nɛ?” Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nnwu fatoobuɛ nɛ.”
40027012	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku okpoo banɔɔfo nwu nkpo layila baatoobudi nwɔ ni kanya yi, Yesu ditakpee ma kanya.
40027013	Ninfɛ di Pilato lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ni floonu sɛlaa se boobuɛ mantika fɔ ni di suoto?”
40027014	Kafɔɔ Yesu lasĩ atabɛ kanya adiki ɔlaa kuonwii kanya. Nioso diabla abaa nɔɔfo nwu nkpo ɔkpɛ.
40027015	Di Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii ole biala yi, Roma batii abaa ɔnɔɔfo wɔ mmle ndiɛ Yuda batii leyo batentɛ lele baatii nwu lɛkaalɛ ni anta ma.
40027016	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, leyo tentɛ onwii lawɛ ma baatii n-ye nwɔ ni osie kanya ta ɔsaabla nɔɔ lalaale oso. Baatɔɔlɛɛ nwɔ Baraba.
40027017	Nioso obe wɔ baatii dikudi labasi nii, Pilato lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Owe biomiɛ bilɛ ndiɛ nta ye? Baraba ɛɛ, sɛɛ Yesu wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Kristo?”
40027018	Aakaalɛ ma ɔlaa nwu nkpo diekye aatofo alɛ onunsɛɛ kanya oso di Yuda banɔɔfotii lakpaa Yesu baawako nwɔ.
40027019	Di obe wɔ di Pilato lawɛ ni di kakankɔ, ɔsɔfɔ lakpee nwɔ otii alɛ, “Diki nnɛɛ lɛfɔ di otii wɔ ninambla ni okpile ɔlaa kamɛ. Diekye kɔsa kukakyɛ, diɛ alaafɔ nii kamɛ, diabuo mi ta nnwɔɔ oso.”
40027020	Kafɔɔ olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku okpoo banɔɔfo nwu nkpo lakpee batii dikudi nwu nkpo ɔtɔ alɛ, baakaalɛ Pilato alɛ adiɛ Baraba ata ma, aalo Yesu.
40027021	Ninfɛ di Pilato lakaalɛ batii dikudi nwu nkpo alɛ, “Batii ba mmle banyɔ, ɔmɛnle lɛma biomiɛ bilɛ ndiɛ nta ye?” Ninfɛ baadiki kanya alɛ, “Baraba!”
40027022	Ni di Pilato lakple aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Obe biomiɛ bilɛ mbla Yesu wɔ manlɛɛ ni Kristo nwu?” Ninfɛ di bamuu lɛma baakyako ɔfaa obuɛ alɛ, “Pɛ nwɔ sibuɛ fakaasa koowoso suoto nɛ!”
40027023	Kafɔɔ Pilato lakple aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ɔmɛnkpile ɛɛbla fiɛ?” Kafɔɔ mia nfɛ baakple baatɔɔfaa osie kanya baatoobuɛ alɛ, “Pɛ nwɔ sibuɛ fakaasa koowoso suoto nɛ!”
40027024	Di obe wɔ di Pilato lanya alɛ ɔlɔbasinfuo ni lele kuniwii ɔbla, kafɔɔ kudu nfɛ nimadie ni yi, ni aayɔ ntu, aafoto nnɛɛ nɔɔ di batii nwu nkpo dikudi anu, aabuɛ alɛ, “Nnɛɛ nii diesi di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle kukpi kamɛ lo! Oleye kule lo!”
40027025	Ninfɛ di batii dikudi nwu nkpo bamuu labuɛ alɛ, “Kukpi nɔɔ lɛkpaani ditika di awo ku babiloo disi!”
40027026	Ninfɛ di Pilato ladiɛ Baraba aata ma nɛ. Kafɔɔ obe wɔ aata baapɛ Yesu ku mpile baaloo nii, ni aayɔ nwɔ aakpee ma ninnɛɛ alɛ balaapɛ nwɔ bakaasa di kowosa suoto nɛ.
40027027	Ninfɛ di Pilato bakpɛtɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo lakpaa Yesu baasifiko abaa nwu kaflɔnkɔ, ninfɛ di bakpɛtɛ nwu nkpo bamuu lamana nwɔ baakyi nɛ.
40027028	Ninfɛ baaklee nwɔ akpeele baadiki di suoto, ni baayɔ awu sɛɛle ya niefũ ni kɔya wua baakpa nwɔ nɛ.
40027029	Ni baabla sɛkansi lɛkakoto baatũkũsɔɔ nɛ. Ninfɛ baayɔ ɔkyɛnwoso onwii baakleesɔɔ di koletanɛɛ nɔɔ nɛ. Ninfɛ baapɛ akunkyi kaatũ nɔɔ baama nwɔ baatɔɔtaa siwidi alɛ, “Yii yiiduu! Yuda batii Ɔka, asiɛ nkpa aklɛ!”
40027030	Ni baatufa sita baakpete nwɔ di suoto nɛ, ni baafũ owoso ninnɛɛ nɔɔ baatɔɔpɛ nwɔ diisi nɛ.
40027031	Di obe wɔ baaloo nwɔ ni ɔma, baadiki nwɔ awu sɛɛle nwu di suoto baakplesa awu nɔɔ amu baakpee nwɔ. Ninfɛ baakpaa nwɔ baasifiko alɛ bɔɔlaapɛ nwɔ sibuɛ mankaasa koowoso suoto nɛ.
40027032	Di obe wɔ batoodie boosifi nii, ni baakyakako osuɔtɔ onwii baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Simon nɛ. Aakye Kirene kasɔ. Ninfɛ di bakpɛtɛ nwu nkpo layila nwɔ di suoto alɛ afũ Yesu kowoso nwu nkpo atuka nɛ.
40027033	Ni baakpaa Yesu baalaadu lɛba le manlɛɛ ni Golgota lɛɛsɔdiki ninle ni alɛ Otii Disi Dikufi.
40027034	Ninfɛ baayɔ nta be bɛɛkpɔtɔɔsa ni ku kɔfa lonle baata Yesu alɛ anyi nɛ. Kafɔɔ obe wɔ aatu aanyu nii, aasĩ mi onyi.
40027035	Ninfɛ di bakpɛtɛ nwu nkpo lapɛ nwɔ sibuɛ baakaasa koowoso suoto nɛ. Nni kamaa, baayɔ awu nɔɔ baasɛ bawo di obe wɔ baawii ni atrebi baatofo n-ya di obiala lɛma kayɔ nii.
40027036	Nni kamaa, ni baasiɛ ninfa baatoonyu nwɔ nɛ.
40027037	Ni baayɔ kataabookyɛɛ baapɛ baakaasa di lɛkantosi nɔɔ, ni baakpana lɛsaa le oso beelo nwɔ nii alɛ, “Nnya Yesu Yuda Batii Ɔka Nwu Ninle Nwɔ Nɛ.”
40027038	Baapɛ bayu banyɔ kafɔɔ sibuɛ baakaasa di awoso suoto diɛ Yesu ɔlɔɔkɔ. Onwii lakaa diɛ oletanɛɛkyɛ nɔɔ, onwii kafɔɔ lakaa diɛ ɔmɛntukyɛ.
40027039	Batii ba niatoofe ni ninfa bamuu latũkunsa asi, baatufa Yesu baabuɛ alɛ,
40027040	“Afɔ niabuɛ falɛ fababiɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ ka mmle, fanse ni letofo di ayi atiɛ kamɛ nɛ! Nse Yaa Obi fale nwaako, faasoo koowoso nwu fawa, faafũ suoto lɛfɔ nkpa buonyu!”
40027041	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ ku okpoo banɔɔfo nwu nkpo kafɔɔ lama nwɔ alɛ,
40027042	“Aafũ batii bamba nkpa, kafɔɔ oloofuo suoto nɔɔ odiki. Diele nnwɔɔ ninle Yuda batii Ɔka nwu nkpo nɛ? Asoo koowoso nwu nkpo suoto awa buofũ nwɔ bunu!
40027043	Eetika Yaa disi, ɔɔlɛɛ suoto kafɔɔ alɛ Yaa Obi ale. Nse nwaako Yaa mbɔmbɔ nwɔ yi, ni aabafũ nwɔ buonyu!”
40027044	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di bayu banyɔ ba baapɛ baakaasa ni di awoso suoto ku nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ latufa nwɔ nɛ.
40027045	Kakũ lefosi elomu ɛnyɔ lebe, kayi kamuu lawɔfɔ, dialaase di kɔtɔɔfɔ elomu etiɛ kamɛ.
40027046	Di kɔtɔɔfɔ elomu etiɛ kamɛ okle, Yesu lafaa osie kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Lɛsɔdiki ninle alɛ, “Yaa nii, Yaa nii, be oso feediɛ mi nnɛɛ nkpo?”
40027047	Batii ba bawo niayila ni ninfa, baanu ni ɔlaa nwu nkpo labuɛ alɛ, “Ɔɔlɛɛ Elia!”
40027048	Nfanwu onwii kaamɛ lɛma latoso aalaayɔ oleteku aanyɔ di nta nyankale kamɛ, aayɔ aatũ di owoso suoto, aamiɛ alɛ ɔɔyɔ ankyɔɔ nwɔ annyi.
40027049	Kafɔɔ batii bamba labuɛ alɛ, “Bita buyila buonyu, nse Elia kamawa amadiki nwɔ di kowoso suoto.”
40027050	Yesu lakple aafaa lɛyɛntɛle, ninfɛ niinwuna nɔɔ ladie nɛ.
40027051	Nfanwu, dibula le ninsaka ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ niabɛ di akyuu anyɔ diakye di osi dialaase kaasɔ. Kasɔ kafɔɔ latukũ, afuɔ labibiɛ.
40027052	Sɛkya kafɔɔ labɛ siatikiti, Yaa batii klekle ba nintookpi bɛɛbafe ni bawo lataka baakye bakpi kamɛ.
40027053	Baadie di sɛkya lɛma kamɛ obe wɔ di Yesu lakple aataka aakye ni bakpi kamɛ yi, baasifi Yerusalem okpoo klekle nwu nkpo kamɛ baalaadiki suoto baatuo batii kpinwu.
40027054	Di obe wɔ di bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo ku bakpɛtɛ nwu nkpo niayila baatonyu ni Yesu lanya mmle okle kaasɔ latukũ ni ku aasaa ya amuu niabla ni yi, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ ma osie kanya! Ninfɛ baabuɛ alɛ, “Nwaako, Yaa Obi ninle otii wɔ mmle!”
40027055	Basanko ba kpinwu kafɔɔ niatikanko Yesu baatɔɔkyakaako nwɔ ni, baakye ni Galilea lawɛ ninfa. Baayila kaakyonkɔ baatoonyu asaa ya niatɔɔwa nii.
40027056	Basanko nwu nkpo bawo kaamɛ lɛma niale Maria Magdalene, Maria wɔ ninle ni Yakobo ku Yosef ɔya ku Sebedeo ɔsɔfɔ.
40027057	Obe wɔ kɔɔtɔɔfɔ lawo nii, osuɔtɔ onwii niale ni saawɛntɛ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Yosef lawa, aakye Arimatea. Yesu saateketetɛ aale.
40027058	Aakyɛ Pilato nfũ alɛ ayɔ Yesu kpi atɔɔ. Ninfɛ di Pilato lata osuku alɛ balaayɔ kpi nwu nkpo batɔɔ nɛ.
40027059	Ninfɛ di Yosef lasifi aalaayɔ kpi nwu nkpo, ni aayɔ dibula fututu aamiminisa nwɔ di suoto nɛ.
40027060	Ninfɛ aayɔ nwɔ aalaakokaa di ofuɔntuu ɔkya fɔle wɔ aakutu aata ni suoto kamɛ nɛ. Ninfɛ aamunusa difuɔ dibinte ninwii aatĩi ofuɔntuu nwu kanya nɛ. Ni aasifi nɛ.
40027061	Ninfɛ di Maria Magdalene ku Maria nyɔɔfa lasiɛ ninfa baakyɔɔ ɔkya nwu nkpo anu nɛ.
40027062	Kaleesɛ niale ni Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi yi, olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku Farisi batii lalɛɛ bawo di Pilato nfũ.
40027063	Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, buonyuma bulɛ obe wɔ di laatɛ nwu nkpo lasiɛ ni nkpa yi, aabuɛ alɛ, ‘Nse lekpi yi, makple ntaka nkye bakpi kamɛ di ayi atiɛ kamɛ.’
40027064	Nkpo oso ta falɛ basaanyuntɛ lɛlaayila beenyu ɔkya nwu nkpo osie kanya diɛlaase di ayi atiɛ kamɛ. Nse faata babla nle mmle yi, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ makyɛ manayu nwɔ mansifiko, manatɔkɔ batii alɛ, ‘Atɔɔtaka eekye bakpi kamɛ.’ Nse diɛwa ninkpo yi, sɛlaa kuafunu se babakple malaa ni malenkee lɛkasale.”
40027065	Ninfɛ di Pilato latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bita bakpɛtɛ bakyɛ balaayila banyu ɔkya nwu nkpo fɛ mmle dikaatɛ ni.”
40027066	Ninfɛ baakyɛ baalaatĩi ɔkya nwu nkpo kanya osie kanya baatɛ nwu nsũ nɛ. Ninfɛ baadiki bakpɛtɛ baase baatoonyu ɔkya nwu nkpo nɛ.
40028001	Obe wɔ di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi ntɔbafe nii, di Kɔsida kolesɛtũ, Maria Magdalene ku Maria wɔ nyɔɔfa lakyɛ alɛ bɔɔlaanyu Yesu ɔkya nwu nkpo.
40028002	Nfanwu, kasɔ latũkũ osie kanya. Ni di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii lasoo aakye osi aawa, abamunusa difuɔ nwu nkpo di ɔkya kanya, ni aasiɛ ni di suoto nɛ.
40028003	Suoto nɔɔ odiki otuo late fɛ ɔplalaa nimunaa, awu nɔɔ kafɔɔ lapu fɛle oleteku.
40028004	Lɛyɛkɛ lamufũ basaanyuntɛ nwu nkpo osie kanya, baakyako otũtũkũ baaklee baabla fɛ bakpi.
40028005	Ninfɛ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ basanko nwu alɛ, “Bitanyɛkɛ. N-ye nlɛ Yesu wɔ baapɛ sibuɛ baakaasa ni koowoso suoto biowolaa.
40028006	Anaa ninfũ. Atɔɔtaka akpe nkpa fɛ mmle aatɔkɔ ye nii. Biwa biɛbanyu lɛba le baatɛ nwu ni.
40028007	Kanunua bipɛsɛwa biɛtɔɔkyɛ bilaatɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ bilɛ, ‘Aatɔɔtaka eekye bakpi kamɛ. Atoole ye katũ oofe Galilea. Nfa bibanyɔɔ nɛ.’ Binyuma ɔlaa wɔ lɛtɔkɔ ye ni!”
40028008	Nkpo oso baapɛsɛwa baakyɛ di ɔkya nwu katũ baasifi. Baatɔɔyɛkɛ, kafɔɔ suoto latɔyɔɔ ma baatoso alɛ bɔɔlaatɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ɔlaa nwu nkpo.
