40028009	Nfanwu, Yesu lakyakako ma di osuku. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Atoko ɔkyɛ ole disiɛko ye.” Ninfɛ baakpukuti baatɛɛtɛ nwɔ, baamufũ nwɔ nkpaa, baasumu nwɔ nɛ.
40028010	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitanyɛkɛ. Bitɔɔkyɛ biɛlaatɔkɔ babiloo bilɛ, batɔɔkyɛ Galilea, babanyɛɛ ninfa.”
40028011	Di obe wɔ di basanko nwu nkpo ntɔɔkyɛ boosifi nii, basaanyuntɛ nwu nkpo bawo niatoonyu ni ɔkya nwu nkpo, baasifi okpoo kamɛ baalaatɔkɔ olebatatɛ banɔɔfo asaa ya amuu niawa ni ninfa.
40028012	Ninfɛ di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo nwu nkpo ku okpoo banɔɔfo, lalɛɛ bawo baabla disibu nɛ. Ni baata basaanyuntɛ nwu nkpo koto dikudi kplɛ ninwii nɛ,
40028013	ni baatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bibuɛ bilɛ obe wɔ bite biɔkyɔsĩi ni ku kakyɛ, ni baasaateketetɛ nɔɔ labayu nwɔ baasifiko nɛ.
40028014	Nse Abaa Nɔɔfo lenu ɔlaa wɔ mmle kafɔɔ yi, bubablako nwu ɔkpɛ, muntɔɔ annu kasɔ bulɛ, diele aye ninkyɛnko.”
40028015	Basaanyuntɛ nwu nkpo lafũ koto nwu nkpo baabla fɛ mmle okle baakpee ma nii. Nioso ɔlaa lɛma nwu nkpo labiɛ kuabuo di Yuda batii kamɛ diɛbase bia miɛ.
40028016	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lefosi onwii nwu nkpo, lakata baasifi Galilea di kobokote ko suoto di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ basifi ni nɛ.
40028017	Di obe wɔ baanyɔɔ nii, baase akunkyi kaasɔ baasumu nwɔ. Kafɔɔ batii bawo kaamɛ lɛma ditafũ baanu alɛ nnwɔɔ diale.
40028018	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakpukuti aatɛɛtɛɛ ma ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Yaa lɛyɔ osi ku kasɔ osie omuu eekpee mi di nnɛɛ kamɛ.
40028019	Nkpo oso bitɔɔkyɛ kayi ka mmle nnle mmuu kamɛ, biɛlaabla batii basaateketetɛ nii. Biekpeesa ma Yaa ntu di Ote, Obi, ku Ninwuna Klekle leyooto kamɛ.
40028020	Bietuo ma bilɛ bakyɔɔ asaa ya amuu letuo ye ni atoko. Nwaako kamasiɛko ye obe lele ninaadu bia kayi ka mmle kalookɔ.”
41001001	Nnya ɔlaa biene wɔ niekye ni Yesu Kristo Yaa obi suoto kasɔ kakyekɔ.
41001002	Binyu! Diawa fɛ mmle di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia lakpana aatɛ ni kofokofoko alɛ, “Makyesee tɔkyɛntɛ nii anle fɔ katũ, aanaalolaa osuku antɛ fɔ.
41001003	Otii nwu matooyie lɛkya di ɔfaafuu antoobuɛ alɛ, ‘Bilolaa osuku bitɛ bita Saate nwu ɔwabee. Bikyɛkyɛsa abaya abafe ni bitɛ nwɔ.’ ”
41001004	Tɔkyɛntɛ nwu niale Yohane nɛ. Aawɛ di ɔfaafuu aabatookpeesa batii Yaa ntu. Aatɔɔtakɔ ma alɛ, “Bidiɛ sikpile lee ɔbla baakpeesa ye Yaa ntu, ni Yaa mayɔ sikpile lee ankyɛ ye.”
41001005	Batii kpinwu lakye Yudea kasɔ ku Yerusalem okpoo kplɛ baakyɛ ɔfaafuu baalaanu Yohane ɔlaa. Baadiki sikpile lɛma baabuɛ ni aakpeesa ma Yaa ntu di Yordan okle kamɛ nɛ.
41001006	Di obe wɔ mmle kamɛ Yohane lakpee kapupɔnkɔ sinwini awu, ni aayɔ bɔkɛɛ kukũ okũ aatika ofiamɛ nɛ. Alesaa nɔɔ niale akpakyekyee ku bablɔ.
41001007	Ɔlaa wɔ aatoobuɛ ninle alɛ, “Otii wɔ nimawa ni sɛɛmaa nii nlenke mi. Ale Otii wɔ ninansiɛko alɛ bia kadiki nwɔ ni ntokota fɛ kpɛmblatɛ.
41001008	Ami ntu kɔyɔ nkpeesa ye Yaa ntu, kafɔɔ nnwɔɔ abayɔ Ninwuna Klekle ankpeesa ye kaamɛ.”
41001009	Ditaklɛ, Yesu lakye Nasarɛt diɛ Galilea kasɔ aawa, ni di Yohane lakpeesa nwɔ Yaa ntu di Yordan okle kamɛ nɛ.
41001010	Nfanwu di Yesu latoodie ni di ntu nwu kamɛ, aanya kolo lasɛkɛtɛ, ni di Ninwuna Klekle latoosoo di suoto nɔɔ fɛ mmle di lɛlaapɔɔ nsoo ni nɛ.
41001011	Ni baanu sɛɛlɔ lakye osi siabuɛ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Obi nii wɔ suoto ninantuna ni nɛ, foobuo mi anu nwaa.”
41001012	Nfanwu Ninwuna Klekle lakpaa nwɔ aasifiko ɔfaafu.
41001013	Ni aasiɛ ninfa lete nɔɔ ayi afosi ana Satana lasɔ nwɔ aanyu nse abatikanko nwɔ. Babɔkɛɛ ba ninkpe ni kobe lawɛ ninfa, kafɔɔ di obe nwu kamɛ Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ lakye osi baabakpee nwɔ osie.
41001014	Obe wɔ baatɛ ni Yohane leeyo katenkɔ sɛmaa, Yesu lakyɛ Galilea kasɔ aalaatoobuɛ ɔlaa biene wɔ niekye ni Yaa nfũ.
41001015	Aatoobuɛ alɛ, “Obe biene nwu ntoowo, Yaa sɛka ole bee ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ, bidiɛ sikpile ɔbla biefũ ɔlaa biene nwu binu!”
41001016	Obe wɔ di Yesu latoofe ni di Galilea lekpo ɔlɔɔkɔ, aanya kɔkpaku badikitɛ banyɔ banwii, Simon ku obilɛma Andrea baatoodiki kɔkpaku ku asawu.
41001017	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biwa biɛbatikankoe, matuo ye mmle mandiki ni batii.”
41001018	Nfanwu ni baadiɛ asawu lɛma, baatikanko nwɔ nɛ.
41001019	Aakyɛ ni sitũ kɛɛkɛ, ni aanya babilɛma banyɔ banwii ninle ni Sebedeo babi Yakobo ku Yohane, baasiɛ di oklo kamɛ baatoololaa asawu lɛma.
41001020	Di Yesu lanya ma nii, ni aalɛɛ ma alɛ batikanko nwɔ nɛ. Ni baadiɛ ote lɛma Sebedeo ku bakpɛntɛ nɔɔ di oklo kamɛ baatikanko nwɔ nɛ.
41001021	Ni baasifi Kapernaum okpoo nɛ. Obe wɔ di Yuda batii Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi nwu lawo nii, Yesu lasifi kasiisakɔ lɛma, ni aalaakya ko batii asaa otuo nɛ.
41001022	Asaa nɔɔ otuo labla ma ɔkpɛ, diekye aatuo ma asaa fɛ otii wɔ ninkpe ni otumi, ninanle ni fɛ mmle di kufiofa batuotɛ ntuo nii.
41001023	Nfanwu osuɔtɔ onwii di ninwuna kpile lasiɛ nii lawɛ kaamɛ lɛma,
41001024	ni aafaa osie kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Be foomiɛ di ɔkyɛ loo, afɔ Yesu Nasaret Otii ntɛɛ? Ɔwɔɔsa fɛɛwa wo? N-ye otii wɔ fale nii! Afɔ ninle Otii Klekle wɔ di Yaa lekyesee ni nɛ!”
41001025	Ni di Yesu lamuɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Lo kanana, faadie nwɔ kaamɛ!”
41001026	Ni di ninwuna kpile nwu latũkunsa osuɔtɔ nwu osie kanya, ni aafaa osie kanya, ni diadie nɛ.
41001027	Diabla batii ba niayila ni ninfa bamuu ɔkpɛ diata baatɔɔkaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Be nɛ? Asaa otuo fɔle ale? Ɛɛyɔ otumi ootososa anwuna kpile annu!”
41001028	Ta nkpo oso Yesu leyooto lakyaka Galilea kasɔ kamuu.
41001029	Nfanwu di Yesu ku batii nɔɔ ladie ni kaasiisakɔ nwu, baakpaa Yakobo ku Yohane baasifi Simon ku Andrea leyo.
41001030	Baabuo ni nfa batii bawo latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, Simon ɔmaato nte ofiɛ lɛwɔɔfɔ ofiɛ.
41001031	Nioso Yesu lakyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ aalaamufũ nwɔ kɔɔnɛɛ aatakatɛsa, ni di ofiɛ layɔɔ nwɔ nɛ, ni aataka aanyu ma kanya nɛ.
41001032	Obe wɔ kuufĩ ntɔɔmɛɛ nii, baakpaa bafiɛtɛ kpinwu ku mba di anwuna kpile nsi ni baawako Yesu ɔkyɛ alɛ ayɔɔsa ma sifiɛ.
41001033	Ni diɛ okpoo nwu batii bamuu labasi diɛ kayokontũ nwu baatoonyu nɛ.
41001034	Ni aakya batii ba bamuu niatoofiɛ ni sifiɛ ate ate sifiɛ. Ni aatososa anwuna kpile atata nya osuku alɛ akakatɛ, diekye anwuna kpile nwu latofo otii wɔ okle ale nii.
41001035	Yesu lataka kuyitatũ aadie leeyo aasifi lɛba le nialo ni lete nɔɔ, aalaapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa.
41001036	Sɛmaa Simon ku bawo nɔɔ lakyɛ baalaatowolaa Yesu.
41001037	Obe wɔ baanyɔɔ nii, baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Otii biala kowolaa fɔ!”
41001038	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bita busifi sekpoo bibii bamba se niɛtɛɛtɛɛ ni, ninaabuɛ Yaa ɔlaa ninfa kafɔɔ nta ma, diekye nni oso lɛwa nɛ.”
41001039	Nioso aakyɛ aatookyi nsiisakɔ lɛma nwu diɛ Galilea kasɔ aatoobuɛ Yaa ɔlaa, aatootososa anwuna kpile baatii suoto.
41001040	Ni di osuɔtɔ onwii niatoofiɛ ni ofiɛ sɛɛle lawa Yesu ɔkyɛ aalaapɛ akunkyi, aatootikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ, “Nse dilɛ fɔ, faafuo ɔta suoto nii mbla klekle.”
41001041	Ɔlaa nɔɔ lakpɛ nwɔ nyaami, ni di Yesu ladiki kɔnɛɛ aakpanko nwɔ, aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Letuna, suoto lɛfɔ siklekle!”
41001042	Nfanwu, ofiɛ sɛɛle nwu layɔɔ nwɔ suoto nɔɔ laklekle.
41001043	Ni di Yesu ladiki nwɔ osuku aakpee nwɔ kufiofa alɛ,
41001044	“Nyu, tanaabuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle faatɔkɔ otii kuonwii, tɔɔkyɛ falaadiki suoto fatuo Yaa oletatɛ, faata ole di mmle di Mose lekpee kufiofa ɛɛtɛ ni di suoto okleklesa suoto, diatuo alɛ ɔfiɛ nwu ntɔɔyɔɔ fɔ ni.”
41001045	Kafɔɔ aasifi nii, aalaatoobuɛ ɔlaa nwu aatɔɔkyakasa osie kanya, ta nkpo oso Yesu ditasinfuo kayi otoodie di okpoo kuonwii kamɛ. Ɔfaafuu aatoosiɛ, kafɔɔ batii lakple baakye aba aba batɔɔwa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ.
41002001	Ayi asɛɛ sɛmaa Yesu lakple aasifi Kapernaum okpoo. Di obe kakui kamɛ batii lanu alɛ akpe leeyo.
41002002	Ni baatii kpinwu lasi diɛ leyo le aabuo nii, diata alɛ baalaadu bia kayokontũ, bawo ditasinwɛ kayilakɔ. Ni aabuɛ Yaa ɔlaa aata ma nɛ.
41002003	Ni baatii bana latuka fiɛtɛ onwii niafefee nii baatɔɔwako ɔkyɛ nɔɔ nɛ.
41002004	Batii lɛpɔ oso batawɛ osuku baatɛɛtɛɛ Yesu di leyo le kamɛ aawɛ nii, nioso baasifi baalaayie lɛkya osi baalaadufu kutuɛ, baasoosa fiɛtɛ nwu ku ɔkla nɔɔ wɔ suoto aate nii baatɛ kaasɔ di Yesu anu.
41002005	Di Yesu lanya ni ofũ onu lɛma oso aatɔkɔ fefeetɛ nwu alɛ, “Obi nii, ntɔɔyɔ sikpile lɛfɔ bɛɛkyɛ fɔ.”
41002006	Obe nwu kamɛ Yuda batii kufiofa batuotɛ bawo lasiɛ ninfa, baatoobu di disi lɛma kamɛ alɛ,
41002007	“Lɛ oso ɔɔkakatɛ nkpo? Eebuɛ mbusuo ɔlaa di Yaa suoto. Yaa lete nikafuo sikpile ɔyɔ ɔkyɛ!”
41002008	Nfanwu Yesu latofo disbu lɛma ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Be oso biobu disi kpile nkpo?
41002009	Lɛmɛnle niɛyɔɔ dilenke, alɛ baatɔkɔ otii wɔ niefefee ate ni alɛ, ‘Bɛɛyɔ sikpile lɛfɔ bɛɛkyɛ fɔ’ ɛɛ sɛɛ baabuɛ alɛ, ‘Taka, faayɔ ɔkla lɛfɔ faakyɛ’?
41002010	Ta biatofo bilɛ, Otii Obi, nkpe otumi kaasɔ ka alɛ aayɔ sikpile ankyɛ nii.” Ni aatɔkɔ otii wɔ niefefe ate ni alɛ,
41002011	“Kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ taka! Yɔ ɔkla lɛfɔ, faasifi leyo!”
41002012	Nfanwu otii wɔ niafefee aate ni niataka aayɔ ɔkla nɔɔ, aadie ma kaamɛ aasifi. Diabla bamuu lɛma ɔkpɛ ni baatansa Yaa baabuɛ alɛ, “Buunya nnle mmle okle bunya!”
41002013	Ni di Yesu lakple aadie ninfa aasifi Galilea lekpo kotoko ni baatii kpinwu lawa nwɔ ɔkyɛ ninfa ni aatuo ma asaa nɛ.
41002014	Obe wɔ aatoofe ni lekpo nwu kotoko ninfɛ aanya Lewi, Alfeo obi, asi di akpooto kafunkɔ oofũ akpooto, ni di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tikankoe!” Nfanwu ni aataka aatikanko nwɔ nɛ.
41002015	Dii nwu kɔtɔɔfɔ Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakyɛ Lewi leyo alɛ, bɔɔlaaleko nwɔ alesaa. Batii kpinwu latikanko nwɔ, batii ba niatikanko nwɔ ni nkpo bawo niale akpooto bafuntɛ ku bakpileblatɛ.
41002016	Nioso obe wɔ di kufiofa batuotɛ ba ninle ni Farisi batii lanya alɛ Yesu kole ni alesaa ku bakpiletɛ ku akpooto bafuntɛ, baakaalɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Lɛ oso ole alesaa ku akpooto bafuntɛ ku bakpileblatɛ bamba ba mmle?”
41002017	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ boobuɛ nii, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Fablatɛ diefĩ batii ba ninoofiɛ nii, bafiɛtɛ di fablatɛ lefĩ. Ninwa babienetɛ ɔlɛɛ, bakpileblatɛ oso lɛwa.”
41002018	Di obe nwu kamɛ, di Yohane basaateketetɛ ku Farisi basaateketetɛ nnii ni kanya oso, ni baatii bawo lawa baabakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Obe oso fiɛ diɛ Yohane basaateketetɛ ku Farisi basaateketetɛ nnii ni kanya fiɛ baasaateketetɛ lɛfɔ ninannii kanya?”
41002019	Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Lɛ di ɔkafɔɔsa basiɛwo kanii kanya obe wɔ di ɔkafɔɔsa nkpe ma ni di ɔkyɛ? Balaafuo kanya onnii di obe wɔ akpe ma ni di ɔkyɛ.
41002020	Kafɔɔ obe kɔwa babakpaa ɔkafɔɔsa mansifiko nii, obe nwu kamɛ babanii kanya nɛ.
41002021	Kuonwii nín-yɔ dibula fɔle kakyɛɛ aakaa aatĩi dibula kofole kabɛkɔ. Se ɛɛbla nkpo, dibula fɔle nwu matuunii ninsifi lekofole kabɛkɔ nwu ninfoofoosa ninkyakaa.
41002022	Kuonwii nín-yɔ nta fɔle aakpete di kɔbɔkɛɛkũ kotofo kofole kamɛ, se diɛwa ninkpo, nta fɔle nwu mata kotofo nwu mbɛ, ninta alɛ nta ku kotofo nwu nlalaa. Kɔbɔkɛɛkũ fɔle kamɛ man-yɔ nta fɔle mankpete.”
41002023	Di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi, Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ latoofe di atita kofe kunwii kamɛ. Ni di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ, lafee atita nwu kɔɔne awo baatoowee nɛ.
41002024	Ta nkpo oso Farisi batii bawo Lakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Nyu! Be oso baasaateketetɛ lɛfɔ kɔbla nkpo, kuufiofa loo ninanta ni osuku di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto?”
41002025	Ni di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Sɛɛ biika lɛsaa le diɛ Ɔka Dawid ku batii nɔɔ labla ni di Kɔkpana Klekle kamɛ binya, obe wɔ kɔɔka lakle ma ni?
41002026	Mmle aabuo ni Yaa Olekatakɔ diɛ obe wɔ di Abiatar lale ni Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo. Aadiki bloblo klekle wɔ mananta osuku alɛ otii wɔ ninanle ni Yaa oletatɛ kale ni aale ni, aayɔ owo aata manko bawo nɔɔ ba kafɔɔ niakyɛ ni bale ni?”
41002027	Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Otii dibiene oso di Yaa lɛbla Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi, ni diele Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi oso ɛɛbla otii.
41002028	Nioso ami, Otii Obi, ninle Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi Saate.”
41003001	Yesu lakple aakyɛ Yuda batii kasiisakɔ kanwii, otii onwii kɔɔnɛɛ nɔɔ lakatu ni lawɛ ninfa.
41003002	Di obe nwu kamɛ, Yesu balo lawɛ ninfa. Baatoonyu osuku alɛ abayɔɔsa osuɔtɔ nwu ofiɛ di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi nwu suoto mmle baayɔ ni ɔlaa di suoto nɔɔ.
41003003	Yesu latɔkɔ osuɔtɔ nwu kɔɔnɛɛ lɛkatu ni alɛ, “Taka fawa sitũ ninfũ.”
41003004	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ batii nwu niawɛ ni ninfa alɛ, “Kufiofa lɛta osuku alɛ, baabla dibiene di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi ɛɛ sɛɛ dikpile? Baafũ otii nkpa ɛɛ sɛɛ baadiɛ nwɔ ankpi?” Kafɔɔ baalo kanana.
41003005	Yesu lanyunyu ma aafenko ku ɔblɔ. Disi osie lɛma oso kafutu lanyiyii nwɔ, ni aatɔkɔ fiɛtɛ nwu alɛ, “Yilasa kɔnɛɛ lɛfɔ!” Ni aayilasa kɔnɛɛ nɔɔ nɛ. Nfanwu ni kualɛ nɛ.
41003006	Nioso Farisi batii ladie baalaakpee asi baawo ku Herodes batikankotɛ nɔɔ bawo mmle baalo ni Yesu.
41003007	Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ladie ninfa baasifi Galilea lɛpanta kotoko. Ni batii kpinwu niakye ni Galilea latikanko ma nɛ.
41003008	Batii dikudi kafɔɔ lakye Yudea, Yerusalem, Idumea ku Yordan okle sɛmaa kuɛ Tiro ku Sidon ntɛɛ nwu baawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ. Diekye baanu Yesu sɛkpɛ kplɛ se aatɔɔbla nii.
41003009	Ta batii dikudi nwu lɛpɔ oso Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ bamiɛ oklo owo batɔɔ aasiɛ kaamɛ mmle baatii dikudi nwu dilaba pimpi nwɔ ni.
41003010	Aakya batii kpinwu sifiɛ, nioso diata alɛ bafiɛtɛ ba niakyɛ ni nfa latikanko baatoomiɛ osuku alɛ bɔɔkpanko nwɔ siifiɛ lɛma nyɔɔ ma.
41003011	Batii bawo lawɛ ninfa di anwuna kpile lasiɛ ma ni kaamɛ. Nioso nse diɛwa alɛ bɛɛnya Yesu, manɔɔ nwɔ di nkpaatũ, manyiisa kudu mambuɛ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Yaa obi!”
41003012	Kafɔɔ Yesu lakpee anwuna kpile nwu kufiofa osie kanya alɛ batanta batii latofo otii wɔ okle ale nii.
41003013	Nni sɛmaa Yesu lasifi kabokotee osi. Nfa aalaadiki basaateketetɛ ba omiɛ ni nɛ.
41003014	Aadiki lefosi batii banyɔ ba aata ni leyoto alɛ batɔkyɛntɛ. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ntoodiki ye nlɛ biatikankoe obe lele. Makpee ye kafɔɔ minaatoobuɛ mi ɔlaa biene.
41003015	Mata ye otumi kafɔɔ mintososa anwuna kpile.”
41003016	Nya batii ba di Yesu ladiki ni. Mma ninle Simon wɔ di Yesu lata ni leyoto alɛ Petro
41003017	ku Yakobo ku obilɛma suɔtɔbi Yohane mba ninle ni Sebedeo babi ba di Yesu lata ma ni leyoto alɛ Boanege, lɛɛsɔ diki nɔɔ ninle ni ɔplalaa.
41003018	Banyɛntɛle kafɔɔ ninle Andrea ku Filipo ku Bartolomeo ku Mateo ku Toma ku Yakobo wɔ ninle ni Alfeo obi ku Tadeo ku Simon wɔ niabɔmbɔ ni kale nɔɔ osie kanya
41003019	kuɛ Yuda Iskariot wɔ niadiki Yesu aata nii.
41003020	Yesu ladie ni ninfa, aawa leyo ninwii kamɛ. Ni baati kpinwu lakple baabasi ninfa nɛ. Batii lɛpɔ oso Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ditawɛ kayaa baale alesaa.
41003021	Baanantii nɔɔ lanu nii, baakyɛ alɛ bɔɔlaakpaa nwɔ, diekye batii latoobuɛ alɛ, “Disi kamɛ kɔkpɔtɔɔ nwɔ!”
41003022	Kufiofa batuotɛ ba niakye Yerusalem baawa ni labuɛ alɛ, “Anwuna kpile ɔka Beelsebul ninsi di Yesu kamɛ. Nni suoto anfe antososa anwuna kpile baatii kamɛ nɛ!”
41003023	Nioso Yesu lalɛɛ ma aawako ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, ni aakakatɛ aata ma di akpa kamɛ alɛ, “Lɛ di Abonsam kafuo suoto otososa odiki baatii kamɛ?
41003024	Nse sɛka kalekɔ kawo lɛsɛ kɛtaka keeyila di suoto nɔɔ, ni sɛka kalekɔ nwu dilabafuo oyila.
41003025	Nkpo kafɔɔ sɛ leyo lewo lɛsɛ di akyuu anyɔ bɔɔkpɛko bawo ni leyo nwu dilabafuo oyila.
41003026	Nioso se Abonsam sɛka kalekɔ lɛsɛ ɛtaka eyila di suoto nɔɔ, kalaansifuo oyila, ni kalookɔ ni ka nɛ.
41003027	“Kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii kuonwii dilaafuo sientɛ leyo kamɛ obuo ɔlɛ nwɔ asaa, diediki ɛɛka nwɔ omufũ onii fiɛ aafuo nwɔ asaa ɔlɛ.
41003028	“Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ Yaa mayɔ otii okpile lele ɛɛbla ku sibusufuɔlaa se eebuɛ ni di suoto nɔɔ ankyɛ nwɔ.
41003029	Kafɔɔ olele nimabuɛ obusufɔlaa di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle suoto, Yaa dilabayɔ akyɛ nwɔ diidii, diekye eekpi lɛpɔɔ, ɛɛbla okpile wɔ nnaa ni kaloo.”
41003030	Yesu labuɛ sɛlaa se mmle, diekye baatoobuɛ alɛ, ninwuna kpile nsi nnwɔɔ Yesu.
41003031	Di obe nwu kamɛ Yesu ɔya ku Yesu basuɔtɔbi lɛma labayila kaayi, ni baakpee otii alɛ balɛɛ nwɔ bata ma.
41003032	Batii dikudi lasiɛ baamana nwɔ baakyi, ni baalaatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nyu, yaafɔ ku babilee n-yɛ kaayi boowolaa fɔ!”
41003033	Ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Bawe ninle yaami omu ku babiloo bamu?”
41003034	Ni aanyu batii ba ninsi bɛɛmana nwɔ beekyi ni, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Binyu, yaami ku babiloo ninle mba ninsi ni ninfũ nɛ!
41003035	Otii lele nikɔbla Yaa dibeesaa, nnwɔɔ ninle obiloo ku yaami nɛ.”
41004001	Yesu lakple aakye asaa katuosɔ diɛ Galilea Lekpo kotoko, batii dikudi lamana nwɔ baakyi. Batii nwu lɛpɔ oso aalaayie aasiɛ di oklo wɔ niatika ni di ntu osi. Batii dikudi nwu kafɔɔ layila di lekpo nwu kotoko.
41004002	Atuo asaa kpinwu diɛ akpa kamɛ. Di asaa otuo nɔɔ kamɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ,
41004003	“Binu lo! Obe onwii alesaa kubi santɛ onwii lakyɛ kofe aalaasa alesaa kubi.
41004004	Obe wɔ ɔɔsa ni alesaa kubi nwu nkpo koofe, kowo lakpete di osuku suoto, ni baakansiɛ lasɛsɛɛ kũ baamɛ nɛ
41004005	kowo kafɔɔ lakpete di afuɔ kasɔ, nfũ kɔɔtɛ diɛpɔ nii. Kɔtɛ ɔtampɔ oso, aawolaa ɔkɔntɔ.
41004006	Obe wɔ kuufĩ labadie nii aayɔɔ, aafiɛ diekye sidu nɔɔ diɛkyɛ kasɔ ta afuɔ nwu oso.
41004007	Kowo kafɔɔ labuo kakɔtɔkɔtɔ siiwuu kamɛ, ɔɔkɔntɔ anwa nii, siiwuu nwu kafɔɔ lakɔntɔ siafukuti siatĩi nya, nioso atafuo otika.
41004008	Alesaa kubi nwu kowo kafɔɔ lakpete di kasɔ biene suoto. Nnya aakɔntɔ, aamuɔ aatika abi. Awo latika afosi atiɛ, awo afosi akuɔ, awo kafɔɔ latika kɔlafa.”
41004009	Yesu layɛntɛ ku sɛlaa se mmle alɛ, “Otii wɔ kuunutoko nkpe nii yi, aanu!”
41004010	Obe wɔ di Yesu lete nfɛ nsi nii, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ku lefosi batii banyɔ nwu lawa babakaalɛ nwɔ akpa nwu kasɔ.
41004011	Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Yaa lediki asaa ya ninsi ni di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ ɛɛta ye. Kafɔɔ batii ba nsi ni sɛɛlɔɔkɔ, mma yi, akpa kamɛ babanu sɛlaa.
41004012	Nioso, ditɔɔwa fɛ mmle bɛɛkpana ni Kɔɔkpana Klekle kamɛ alɛ, ‘Babanya, mankple manya, kafɔɔ blɔbanya batɛnsũ. Babanu, mankple manu, kafɔɔ blɔbanu kasɔ. Nse beenu kasɔ, bɛɛnya bɛɛtɛ nsũ, babakyi siitu lɛma kamɛ, Yaa n-yɔ sikpile lɛma ankyɛ ma!’ ”
41004013	Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Biénu lɛkpa le mmle kasɔ? Ni lɛ bibafuo akpa bule amuu kasɔ onu?
41004014	Alesaa kubi santɛ kɔsa Yaa ɔlaa nwu.
41004015	Batii bawo nte fɛ alesaa kubi ko niakpete ni di osuku kotoko, nse beenu ɔlaa nwu, nfanwu Abonsam nwa amadiki ɔlaa nwu di situ lɛma kamɛ ansifiko.
41004016	Batii bamba kafɔɔ nte fɛ kubi ko niakpete ni di afuɔ kasɔ. Nfanwu nse beenu ɔlaa nwu manfũ nwu ku suoto lɛyɔɔ.
41004017	Kafɔɔ ɔlaa nwu sidu nimmufũ kaasɔ nwaa. Obe kakuii kamɛ ko manfũ nwu manu. Diekye nse nimiina ee ditikanko lɛwa ma di suoto di ɔlaa nwu ofũ onu kamɛ, mankple nkpaamaa.
41004018	“Batii bawo kafɔɔ nte fɛ kubi ko niakpete ni di kakɔtɔkɔtɔ siwuu kamɛ. Mma ninle batii ba ninu ni ɔlaa biene nwu,
41004019	kafɔɔ kayi ka mmle amiina ku koto onumbɛbɛɛ, ku asaa bamba ɔkɔnsɔ oklee nfukuti kuntĩi ɔlaa nwu alɛ, kunfuo abi otika.
41004020	“Batii bawo kafɔɔ nte fɛ kubi ko niakpete ni kaasɔ nwaa suoto. Baanu ɔlaaa biene nwu, baafũ nwu baanu baatika abi. Awo afosi atiɛ, awo afosi akuɔ, awo kafɔɔ kɔlafa.”
41004021	Yesu lakple aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Nse bɛɛsɔ kandiɛ man-yɔ lɛsaa mantĩi nwɔ? Ee mpa kalɔ manse wɔ? Diele lɛsaa suoto man-yɔ mantika alɛ aakpa nwaa?
41004022	Lɛsaa lele beekookaa Yaa madiki ni kayi, lɛsaa lele kafɔɔ beetĩi Yaa matikiti ni.
41004023	Otii wɔ kunutoko nkpe ni, alolaa anu nwaa!”
41004024	Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bikyɔɔ atoko nwaa di sɛlaa se bionu ni suoto! Diekye leklapoosaa le biɛyɔ biɛklapoosa biɛta ni bawo lee, nninwu ke di Yaa mayɔ anklapoosa anta ye nɛ, bia lele ye malenkee.
41004025	Diekye otii wɔ niɛkyɔɔ mi ni ɔlaa kotoko abawɛ lɛsɔnu ankyakaa. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ ninankyɔɔ mi ni ɔlaa kotoko kɛɛkɛɛ wɔ aye nii, Yaa maklee anfũ nwɔ ni nnɛɛ.”
41004026	Yesu lakple abuɛ alɛ, “Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nte fɛ mmle di otii nsa ni kamɔɔ kubi koofe.
41004027	Nse kale ntooloo otii nwu naate ankyɔsĩi, nse kale ntɔɔsɛ antaka, kafɔɔ aaye mmle diɛ kamɔɔ kubi nwu mbla fiɛ kunkɔntɔ kuntika ni abi ambe nii.
41004028	Kasɔ kamu ninta kamɔɔ kubi nwu mmuɔ kantika abi lɛnya. Lɛkasale kankɔntɔ, afata ndie. Sɛmaa kanlaka amɛ kandie kufuo, nni sɛmaa kansiɛ abi kanyi ntu kambe.
41004029	Nse abi nwu ntoobe, fɛkpɛntɛ nwu n-yɔ kasaka diekye ofiɛlɛ bee ntoowo.”
41004030	Yesu lakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Be suoto kayɔ Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nkaatɛɛsa? Lɛmɛnkpa kayɔ ndiki ni kasɔ?
41004031	Dite fɛ lewosobi biibii lewo. Fiɛ babapɛ ni nii, ninle lewosobi biibii diɛ awosobi kamɛ kaasɔ ka mmle suoto.
41004032	Kafɔɔ nse bɛɛpɛ ni nintaka, nimuɔ ninlenkee awoso amuu. Kundie sɛla kplɛ, kunwɛ oyududu, ninwa alɛ bakansiɛ mbla ayo diɛ oyududu nɔɔ kalɔ masiɛ.”
41004033	Yesu latɔkɔ batii nwu ɔlaa biene di akpa ya mmle okle kamɛ, ni mmle okle baanu nwɔ ni kasɔ.
41004034	Akpa lete kamɛ anfe ankakatɛ anta batii, kafɔɔ nse manko basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lete basi andiki asaa amuu kasɔ anta ma.
41004035	Diɛ dii nwu nkpo kɔtɔɔfɔ, Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Bita butaalɛ busifi lekpo le mmle sɛmaa.”
41004036	Nioso baadiɛ batii dikudi nwu baasifi baalaabuo di oklo wɔ di Yesu labuo aasiɛ nii, ni baakpaa nwɔ baasifi nɛ. Seklo bamba kafɔɔ layila ninfa.
41004037	Nfanwu kɔfɛɛfɔ siene lakyako ɔfɛ, ntu kɔpɛ nimbuo diɛ oklo kamɛ diɛta alɛ ntu laloo oklo kamɛ oyii baamɛɛ nii.
41004038	Di obe nwu kamɛ Yesu omu lasiɛ diɛ oklo nwu sɛmaa lɛkyɛ, aatika disi di sumuyɛ aatɔɔkyɔsĩi. Ni baasaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasɛnkɛsɔɔ baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, faayɔ nwu ole falɛ buoloo okpi?”
41004039	Nioso Yesu lasɛnkɛ. Aataka aayila nii, aamuɛ kɔfɛɛfɔ nwu aabuɛ alɛ, “Diɛ ɔfɛ!” Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ lɛkpo nwu alɛ, “Te kloklo!” Kɔfɛɛfɔ nwu ladiɛ ɔfɛ, ni dialo kanana nɛ.
41004040	Ni di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Be oso biɔyɛkɛ nkpo? Biefũ mi binu?”
41004041	Lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ ma osie kanya ni baakaalɛ nimanima alɛ, “Omɛntii okle ninle nwɔ di kɔfɛɛfɔ ku lɛkpo nnu nwɔ ɔlaa?”
41005001	Nni sɛmaa, Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lataalɛ baalaadu Galilea lekpo nwu kakyɛ nyɔɔfa di Gadara batii kasɔ.
41005002	Obe wɔ di Yesu lasoo ni di oklo kamɛ, otii onwii niinwuna kpile lasiɛ ni ladie aakye sifuɔntuu se kamɛ mankookaa ni bakpi aabakyakako Yesu.
41005003	Nfa ninle osuɔtɔ nwu kasiɛkɔ nɛ, otii kuonwii ninfuo kɔnyɛnɛ kukunwii ɔyɔ onii nwɔ.
41005004	Obe lele se beekpee nwɔ sɛkpɛnkyɛ ninnɛɛ ku ninkpaa anfee sĩ. Nse kafɔɔ beenii nwɔ ku abɔɔsaa kɔnyɛnɛ ambudi kũ. Sientɛ kuonwii ditawɛ anfuo nwɔ ni olenkee.
41005005	Ansiɛ di batii kakookakɔ ku abokote kakũ ku kakyɛ aakyɛ aatookyi, antooyiisa kudu obe lele. An-yɔ afuɔ antɔɔkyankya suoto.
41005006	Obe wɔ aanya ni Yesu kaakyonkɔ aatoso aalaapɛ akunkyi kaatũ nɔɔ.
41005007	Ni aayiisa kudu osie kanya alɛ, “Be ɔlaa ninsi di awo ku afɔ ntɛɛ, Yesu, Yaa wɔ ninlenke ni obi! Yaa oso, kotikiti fɔ lekoto, tannanfi mi kotoko!”
41005008	Aabuɛ sɛlaa se mmle diekye Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ ninwuna kpile die nwɔ kaamɛ!”
41005009	Ni di Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛ manlɛɛ fɔ?” Aadiki kanya alɛ, “Leyooto nii ninle dikudi, diekye buɔtɛ bupɔ!”
41005010	Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle di ninwuna kpile nsi nii, latikiti Yesu lekoto osie kanya alɛ atantososa anwuna nwu aadiki nintɛɛ nwu.
41005011	Di obe nwu kamɛ aplakuo ɔlambu kplɛ onwii latoole asaa di kabokotee ɔlɔkɔ.
41005012	Nioso anwuna kpile nwu di osuɔtɔ nwu kamɛ latikiti Yesu lekoto alɛ, “Diki wo osuku buɔlaabuo diɛ aplakuo nwu kamɛ!”
41005013	Ni aadiki nya osuku nɛ. Nfanwu anwuna kpile nwu ladie di osuɔtɔ nwu suoto aalaabuo di aplakuo nwu kamɛ. Aplakuo ɔlambu nwu omuu, nikawo ni fɛ nkpe nnyɔ latoso kitikiti aakye kabokotee nwu kalɔ aalaabuo leekpo nwu kamɛ aamɛ ntu aakpi.
41005014	Nioso batii ba kɔkpa ni aplakuo nwu latoso baasifi baalaabuɛ ɔlaa wɔ niawa ni baakyakasa afe ku sekpoo. Ni baatii ladie baakyɛ alɛ bɔɔlaanyu lɛsaa le niawa nii.
41005015	Obe wɔ baalaadu ni Yesu nfũ baanya otii wɔ kamɛ diɛ anwuna kpile dikudi nwu lasiɛ ni lakpee awu aasiɛ kasɔ, obe nwu ditɔɔkpa nwɔ. Nioso lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ bamuu lɛma.
41005016	Batii ba niakasa ni otii wɔ kamɛ diɛ anwuna kpile nwu lasiɛ ni ɔnya latɔkɔ batii bamuu lɛsaa le niawa ni di osuɔtɔ nwu ku aplakuo nwu suoto.
41005017	Nioso batii nwu latikiti Yesu lekoto baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ adie ma kaasɔ.
41005018	Obe wɔ di Yesu latoobuo ni diɛ oklo kamɛ, otii wɔ kamɛ di anwuna kpile lasiɛ ni saa, latikiti nwɔ lɛkoto alɛ, tɛɛ ntikankofɔ.
41005019	Kafɔɔ Yesu ditatɔɔ osuku. Ni ɔtɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tɔɔkyɛ leyo baatii lɛfɔ nfũ faadiki lɛsaa le di Saate lɛbla ɛɛta fɔ ni fabuɛ, faatɔkɔ ma ku mmle ɛɛnya fɔ ni nyaami.”
41005020	Nioso osuɔtɔ nwu lasifi aalaabuɛ lɛsaa le di Yesu labla aatɔɔ ni diɛ ekpoo nwu lefosi aafenko. Diabla batii ba nianu ni ɔkpɛ.
41005021	Ɔbe wɔ di Yesu lasiɛ oklo aawaalɛ aakple aasifi ni lekpo sɛmaa, batii dikudi lakple baabasi nwɔ di suoto di lekpo kotoko.
41005022	Yuda batii kasiisakɔ ɔnɔɔfo onwii manlɛɛ ni Yairo lawa nfa. Aanya ni Yesu, aapɛ akunkyi ninkpaatũ nɔɔ.
41005023	Aatikiti nwɔ lekoto osie kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Obi sankobi nii koloo okpi. Lekoto wa faabatika nwɔ kɔnɛɛ di suoto di ofiɛ kuyɔɔ nwɔ, aawɛ nkpa.”
41005024	Nioso Yesu latikanko nwɔ baakyɛ. Batii dikudi latikanko nwɔ baamana nwɔ kpinkpĩ baakyi, Yesu lasiɛ ma nintɛɛ.
41005025	Ɔsanko onwii kafɔɔ lawɛ ma kaamɛ, asaa latoowii nwɔ fɛɛ lefosi alɛɛ anyɔ amu.
41005026	Diabuo nwɔ ku suoto kɔfa omiɛ di bafatɛ kpinwu nnɛɛ, aalalaasa koto nɔɔ kumuu, kafɔɔ ofiɛ nwu katoo ko kua tɔɔtaka.
41005027	Obe wɔ di ɔsanko nwu lanu ni Yesu lɛkpanko, aafe di Yesu sɛmaa baatii dikudi nwu kamɛ aakpanko Yesu awu.
41005028	Aabla nkpo diekye aabuɛ aatɔkɔ suoto alɛ, “Nse lɛkpanko nwɔ awu kamaa, ofiɛ mayɔɔ mi.”
41005029	Nfanwu aakpanko ni Yesu awu nwu, asaa owii nwu labudi. Nioso aatofo di suoto nɔɔ kamɛ alɛ ofiɛ nwu ntɔɔyɔɔ nwɔ.
41005030	Nfanwu, Yesu latofo alɛ osie owo ledie nwɔ di suoto. Aakyi aakalɛ batii dikudi nwu alɛ, “Owe niɛkpanko mi awu?”
41005031	Asaabateketɛ nɔɔ latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nyu mmle batii dikudi lɛmana fɔ kpinkpi beekyi ni, fiɛ fɔɔkaalɛ falɛ owe niɛkpanko fɔ awu?”
41005032	Kafɔɔ Yesu latookpekpe anu aatoowolaa otii wɔ niabla ni lɛsaa nwu.
41005033	Difu lapɛ ɔsanko nwu, diekye aatofo lɛsaa le niɛwa ni di suoto kamɛ, nioso aayɔ lɛyɛkɛ ku ditũtũkũ aalaapɛ akunkyi di Yesu nkpaatũ ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ nwaako wɔ ninsi ni di ɔlaa nwu kamɛ nɛ.
41005034	Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Obi sankobi nii, ofũ onu lɛfɔ lediki fɔ. Tɔɔkyɛ di suoto lɛyɔɔ kamɛ. Ofiɛ lɛfɔ nwu kuyɔɔ fɔ.”
41005035	Obe wɔ di Yesu lakple aatɔɔkakatɛ ni, batɔkyɛntɛ lakye Yuda batii kasiisakɔ nɔɔfo Yairo leyo baawa alɛ, “Obi sankobi lɛfɔ nwu ntookpi nioso ɔnɔɔfo, tansinkpɛnsa Saatuotɛ dibuo okpee.”
41005036	Di Yesu lanu ni ɔlaa nwu aatɔkɔ ɔnɔɔfo nwu alɛ, “Tanyɛkɛ, afɔ fũ fanu!”
41005037	Yesu ditatuna alɛ kuonwii atikanko nwɔ diediki Petro ku Yakobo ku obilɛma Yohane.
41005038	Obe wɔ baawa ni Yairo leyo Yesu lanya alɛ batii lesi ninfa boowi kaku ku kudu osie kanya.
41005039	Di Yesu labuo ni leyo kamɛ, ninfɛ aabuɛ alɛ, “Be ninle kudu ku kaku nwu biowi ni? Ɔbisɔ nwu diekpi ɔkyɔsĩi ɔɔkyɔsĩi!”
41005040	Batii nwu lama nwɔ ni aata batii bamuu ladie, ni akpaa obi ote, obi ɔya ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ batiɛ nwu ni baasifi nfũ diɛ obisɔ nwu lakpi aate ni nɛ.
41005041	Ni di Yesu lamufũ obisɔ nwu kɔɔnɛɛ aabuɛ seele lɛma alɛ, “Talita koumo!” Lɛsɔdiki ninle alɛ, “Okpeele, taka!”
41005042	Nfanwu ɔsankobi nwu lataka aakyɛ. Lefosi alɛɛ anyɔ obi aale. Diatɛ diabla batii nwu ɔkpɛ osie kanya.
41005043	Yesu lakpee ma kufiofa osie kanya alɛ batanta otii kuonwii lanu, ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, bamiɛ lelesaa batɔɔ ale.
41006001	Yesu ladie niinfa aawa okpoo lɛma, ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ.
41006002	Di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi lawo nii, aakyako asaa otuo di Yuda batii kasiisakɔ. Asaa otuo nɔɔ labla batii ba nianu ni ɔkpɛ, ni baakaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Ɔfɛ di otii wɔ lanu sɛlaa se mmle eekyeko? Lɛmɛnsaatofo okle ninle nle mmle bɛɛtɔɔ ni! Lɛ ɔbla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ nkpo?
41006003	Diele nnwɔɔ ninle Maria obi, saawolatɛ nwu? Diele babilɛma ninle Yakobo, Yose, Yuda, ku Simon? Babi lɛma sankobi kafɔɔ nsi wo kaamɛ.” Nioso baasĩ nwɔ.
41006004	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Batii mbu Yaa Ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ di kakɔ biala diediki okpoo lɛma, kafaabi nɔɔ ku babi lɛma kamɛ manambu nwɔ.”
41006005	Nioso atafuo lɛsaa le niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ ɔbla ninfa. Diediki bafiɛtɛ basɛɛ afuo kɔnɛɛ otika aatakatɛsa ma siifiɛ.
41006006	Batii nɔɔ ɔtanfũ onu labla Yesu ɔkpɛ. Yesu lakyi nkpayetũ be niawɛ ni di ntɛɛ nwu aatootuo batii ɔlaa biene.
41006007	Aalɛɛ batɔkyɛntɛ lefosi banyɔ nwu aasiisa, ni aasɛ ma banyɔ banyɔ aakpee ma kɔtɔ. Aata ma osie diɛ anwuna kpile suoto.
41006008	Ni aakpee ma kufiofa alɛ, di osuku lɛma ɔkyɛ kamɛ batanklee lɛsalɛsaa diediki ɔkyɛnwoso, batanklee alesaa, kotofo ko mankaalɛ ni asaa, batanklee koto.
41006009	Bakpe ntokota kafɔɔ batanklee osi awu nyɔɔfa.
41006010	Aatɔkɔ ma kafɔɔ alɛ, “Nse kakɔ lele beefũ ye kɔfɔɔ, bisiɛ ninfa dilaase di obe wɔ bibadie ni di okpoo nwu.
41006011	Nse biɛɛkyɛ okpoo wɔ baatii diefũ ye nii, ee baanu ye nii ɔlaa, biesifi bidiɛ ma, kafɔɔ biɛfɛntɛ nkpaasɔ lee kɔtɛ bitɛ ma. Nni nimatuo alɛ baasĩ ye ofũ nɛ.”
41006012	Nioso baakyɛ baalaabuɛ Yaa ɔlaa baata batii alɛ, bikyi siikpile lee suoto, bietikanko Yaa sisuku.
41006013	Baatososa anwuna kpile kpinwu baatii suoto, baafifia bafiɛtɛ kpinwu nnɔnyi, baayɔɔsa ma sifiɛ.
41006014	Yesu leyooto lakyaka ntɛɛ nwu, Ɔka Herodes lanu, ni baatii bawo latoobuɛ alɛ, “Yohane Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ nwu bɛɛtakatɛsa beekyeko bakpi kamɛ, nioso akpe osie ɔɔbla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ nɛ.”
41006015	Batii bawo kafɔɔ labuɛ alɛ, “Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Elia dile!” Babamba alɛ, “Yaa Ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ wɔ niedie ni saa Yaa Ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ owo ale!”
41006016	Di Herodes lanu ni sɛlaa se mmle, aabuɛ alɛ, “Yohane wɔ lata baabudi ni disi bɛɛtakatɛsa beekyeko bakpi kamɛ nɛ!”
41006017	Kaasɔ kakyekɔ, Herodes omu niata baamafũ Yohane baatɛ leeyo ta Herodia oso, diekye Herodes lafũ Herodia wɔ nle ni obi lɛma Filipo ɔsɔfɔ aayɔ.
41006018	Ni diɛ Yohane latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kufiofa diɛta osuku alɛ faafũ obilee ɔsɔfɔ fanyɔ!”
41006019	Nioso, Yohane ɔlaa latoobuo Herodia suoto, ni aakyidi Yohane nɛ, aamiɛ alɛ oolo nwɔ, kafɔɔ atafuo ta Herodes oso.
41006020	Diekye Herodes n-ye alɛ Yohane nle otii biene ku otii klekle nkpo oso anyɛkɛ nwɔ, annyu alɛ lɛsalɛsaa diɛbla nwɔ kuntɛ sɛlaa nɔɔ ntofo nwɔ osie kanya ambɔmbɔ sĩ onu.
41006021	Dii ninwii lɛsaa le di Herodia komiɛ ni lawa kaanya. Herodes lale lelofoyi dii nɔɔ. Aatũ opunu, aakyakako banɔɔfo ku Galilea okpoo banɔɔfo ku kakpɛ kanya bayilatɛ banɔɔfotii aawa alesaa kalekɔ.
41006022	Herodia obi sankobi lakyɛ alesaa nwu kalekɔ, ni aatũ, diabuo Herodes ku batii ba aakyakako ni anu nwaa. Ɔka Herodes latɔkɔ ɔsankobi nwu alɛ, “Kaalɛ mi lɛsaa lele ninlɛ fɔ, amii mata fɔ!”
41006023	Aaka ntam aatɔɔ alɛ, “Mayɔ lɛsaa lele fɛɛkaalɛ mi nta fɔ, diɛlaase ni bia sɛɛka nii kalekɔ kakyɛ!”
41006024	Ɔsankobi nwu ladie aalaakaalɛ ɔya alɛ, “Be ninkaalɛ?” Aatɔkɔ nwu alɛ, “Kaalɛ Yohane Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ disi!”
41006025	Nfanwu ɔsankobi nwu lapɛsɛwa aawa ɔka Herodes ɔkyɛ, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Komiɛ nlɛ budi Yohane Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ disi, faayɔ fakpee di bɛɛsi kamɛ fatɛɛ nunua!”
41006026	Ɔlaa nwu labuo Ɔka Herodes suoto osie kanya, kafɔɔ diɛ ntam be aaka ni ku batii ba aakyakako ni oso, aata miɛ alɛ ɔwaalɛ ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ nii.
41006027	Nfanwu Ɔka Herodes lata disi buditɛ osuku alɛ akyɛ aalaabudi Yohane disi awako. Ni aakyɛ aalaabudi Yohane disi diɛ leyo katenkɔ nɛ.
41006028	Aayɔ disi nwu aakpee di bɛɛsi aawako, aayɔ aata ɔsankobi nwu. Ɔsankobi nwu kafɔɔ layɔ aakyɛnko ɔya.
41006029	Obe wɔ di Yohane basaateketetɛ lanu nii, baakyɛ baalaayɔ kpi nɔɔ nwu baalaakookaa.
41006030	Batɔkyɛntɛ nwu di Yesu lakpee ni kɔtɔ lakple baawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, baabatɔkɔ nwɔ asaa ya baabla ni ku n-ya baatuo nii.
41006031	Nle mmle sɛmaa, batii kpinwu latɔɔwa ɔkyɛ lɛma diata alɛ batawɛ osuku bale alesaa, nioso Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biwa buɔlatɛ ɔnyɛɛ kɛɛkɛɛ.”
41006032	Ni baabuo di oklo kamɛ baasifi lɛba le nialo ni nɛ.
41006033	Kafɔɔ batii lanya ma baatɛ nsũ nioso baakye sekpoo ate ate baatoso baatikanko ma baasifi nfũ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ latoofe nii, diata alɛ batii nwu lakasa ma obuo.
41006034	Obe wɔ di Yesu ladie ni diɛ oklo kamɛ aanya ni batii dikudi kplɛ nwu, ɔlaa lɛma lanu nwɔ kafutu, diekye baate fɛ bafoso ba di kpatɛ nnaa nii, ni aatuo ma asaa kpinwu nɛ.
41006035	Kɔɔtɔɔfɔ lawo nii, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lawa babatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nfũ bukpe ni lekyo ku okpoo, kale kafɔɔ nfɛ koloo.
41006036	Diki ma osuku baasifi sekpoo biibii ku nkpaayotũ be niɛmana wo diekyi ni baalaamiɛ alesaa baya bale.”
41006037	Kafɔɔ Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye bamu bimiɛ alesaa bita ma bale!” Ni baabuɛ alɛ, “Ni ɔkyɛ buakyɛ munaayɔ otii awɛntɛ anɛ kɔkpento munaaya alesaa muwako ma manle?”
41006038	Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitɔɔkyɛ biɛlaanyu bilɛ bloblo akudi asɛ ninte ye?” Baakple baabatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Bloblo akudi anɔɔ ku kɔkpaku sɛnle kɔnyɔ ko kule.”
41006039	Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ bata batii nwu basiɛ akudi akudi sɛɛfa lɛkɛtɛɛ kɔnle nwu suoto.
41006040	Nioso baasiɛ diɛ akudi kanya, akudi awo kɔlafa, awo kafɔɔ afosi anɔɔ.
41006041	Yesu layɔ bloblo akudi anɔɔ ku kɔkpaku nwu kɔnyɔ, ni aanyu osi aakusɛkusɛsa nya. Aabɛbɛɛ bloblo nwu aata basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ basɛ bata batii nwu, ni aabɛbɛɛ kɔkpaku nwu kɔnyɔ kafɔɔ aata batii nwu bamuu nɛ.
41006042	Obiala lɛma lale aamiɛ.
41006043	Obe wɔ baasaateketɛ nɔɔ lasiisa ni bloblo ku kɔkpaku kɔkyɛɛ ko niabu nii, baawɛ lefosi nkyikyɛ nkplɛ nnyɔ.
41006044	Batii ba niale ni alesaa nwu basuɔtɔ lɛpɔ lawo nkpe nnɔɔ.
41006045	Nfanwu Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, babuo di oklo kamɛ wla baatɔɔsɔ okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Betsaida di lekpo nwu sɛmaa. Ninfɛ aadiki batii dikudi nwu kafɔɔ osuku nɛ.
41006046	Nni kamaa, Yesu omu kafɔɔ lasifi kabokotee osi aalaapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa.
41006047	Kɔɔtɔfɔ lawo nii, oklo nwu kafɔɔ ntoodu lɛpanta nwu ntɛɛ. Yesu lete nfɛ niabu di kasɔ nwu suoto.
41006048	Yesu lanya alɛ oklo nwu ɔwa kɔwɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ osie, diekye kɔfɛɛfɔ latɔɔkyakako ma. Di kuyitatũ elomu etiɛ kamɛ aakyɛ di ntu osi aatoofe ɔkyɛ lɛma, aamiɛ alɛ ɔɔwaalɛ ma anfe.
41006049	Obe wɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lanyɔɔ akyɛ ni di ntu osi ɔɔwa nii, ni baayiisa kudu alɛ, kpi ale!
41006050	Bamuu lɛma baanyɔɔ nii, ɔfɔɔ lasifi ma. Ni di Yesu lakakatɛ ko ma aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bita situ lee site, biitanyɛkɛ! Ami dile.”
41006051	Ni aayie aabuo di oklo nwu kamɛ di anu lɛma, ni diɛ afɛɛfɔ nwu ladiɛ ɔfɛ nɛ. Diatɛ diabla ma ɔkpɛ osie kanya!
41006052	Diekye batanu kasɔ di lɛsaatuo le ninsi ni diɛ bloblo wɔ aata ma baale ni kamɛ, ditabudi ma diekye batafũ baanu.
41006053	Obe wɔ baataalɛ ni lekpo nwu baalaadu ni kakyɛ nyɔɔfa, baalaasoo diɛ Genesaret okpoo. Ni baapɛ oklo nwu lekpo nɛ.
41006054	Obe wɔ batosoo ni diɛ oklo nwu kamɛ batii lanya Yesu baatɛ nsũ.
41006055	Nioso baatoso baalaatɔkɔ batii di ntɛɛ nwu, ta nkpo oso kakɔ lele beenu alɛ Yesu nkpe, mankɛnkɛ bafiɛtɛ ku atensaa lɛma manwako Yesu nfũ.
41006056	Kakɔ lele di Yesu lɛkyɛ, nkpayetũ woo, sekpoo woo, ee sefensuku, mankɛnkɛ bafiɛtɛ mamatɛ di asaa kayakɔ aba aba, mantikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ, ata bafiɛtɛ nwu bakpanko awu nɔɔ kotoko. Batii ba niakpanko nwɔ ni awu kotoko, sifiɛ layɔɔ ma.
41007001	Farisi batii ku kufiofa batuotɛ bawo lakye Yerusalem baawa baabamana Yesu baakyi.
41007002	Baanya alɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasiɛ baatoole ni alesaa, bawo ditafoto nnɛɛ fɛ mmle diɛ Farisi batii letuo batii alɛ batofoto nii.
41007003	Baafuo otofo ta Farisi batii ku Yuda batii latɔɔbla bawa lɛma amanle ya baadiɛ baatɛ ma nii. Nioso diediki beefoto nnɛɛ lɛma fɛ mmle baatuo ma nii, fiɛ manle alesaa.
41007004	Se bɛɛya lɛsaa lele di asaa kasunsukɔ, dikpe ni beefoto nnɛɛ lɛma fiɛ beele. Manle afiofa ya kpinwu bɛɛtaka bɛɛbatũ nii, fɛ mmle manfoto ni nkɔkɔɛ ku awambukii ku ntu adubukii.
41007005	Nioso Farisi batii nwu ku basaatuotɛ nwu lakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Lɛ oso diɛ batikankotɛ lɛfɔ dilɔbla bawa loo amanle? Manle asaa kuntɛ baafoto nnɛɛ kafɔɔ!”
41007006	Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nwaako ɔlaa wɔ di Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia labuɛ ni di balaatɛ lee suoto kute nkpo. Fɛ mmle bɛɛkpana bɛɛtɛ alɛ, ‘Batii ba mmle kanya fukiti ko man-yɔ mantansɛɛ, kafɔɔ mámbɔmbɔ mi siitu lɛma kamɛ.
41007007	Kasakasa bɔɔbla mi ɔkpɛ. Diekye bakle batii afiofa bootuo fɛle afiofa nii ale.’
41007008	Dietuo alɛ batɔɔyɔ Yaa afiofa beekookaa, bɛɛyɔ batii ablasaa bootuo ye.”
41007009	Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biefe diɛ kakyɔnkyɔ osuku biediɛ Yaa afiofa biɛtɛ, biɔbla diɛ aye bamu lee saa amanle.
41007010	Diɛ ɔtɛ onyu kamɛ, Mose lakpee kufiofa alɛ, ‘Bu teefɔ ku yaafɔ. Otii lele niɛkpaani ote ee ɔya, dikpe ni beelo nwɔ.’
41007011	Kafɔɔ biotuo bilɛ, nse otii owo nkpe lɛsaa alɛ ɔɔkyakaako ote ee ɔya, aafuo obuɛ alɛ, ‘Lɛsaa le nlɛ kɔta ye nii, ntoodiki ni lɛtɛ fɛ lɛsaa klekle nlɛ man-yɔ nta Yaa ole.’
41007012	Bilɔɔta ma osuku bilɛ bata balofotɛ lɛma asaa ya niefĩ ma nii!
41007013	Ote ko dite fɛle biɛyɔ bawa lee amanle biɔlalaasa Yaa afiofa. Mimbla asaa bamba kpinwu fɛ n-ya mmle okle.”
41007014	Nni kamaa, Yesu lakple aalɛɛ batii dikudi nwu alɛ batɛɛtɛɛ nwɔ. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bamuu lee bikyɔɔ mi atoko, bienu ɔlaa wɔ matɔkɔ ye ni kasɔ.
41007015	Lɛsaa lele di otii léle eekpee kaafutu dilaata alɛ akpɔnɔnfɔ di Yaa anu. Kafɔɔ asaa ya nindie ankye ni otii otu kamɛ, nnya ninkpɔnɔnfɔsa nwɔ nɛ.
41007016	Bienu kasɔ.”
41007017	Nni kamaa, obe wɔ aadiɛ ma aasifi ni leyo ninwii, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, adiki ɔlaa nwu kasɔ ata ma.
41007018	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ni ayee bienu kasɔ? Ɔlaa wɔ mmle diɛkpa kamɛ alɛ lɛsaa lele di otii lele eekpee kaafutu kamɛ dilaafuo nwu ɔkpɔnɔnfɔsa?
41007019	Diekye diele otii otu kamɛ nimbuo, kafɔɔ kafutu nɔɔ kamɛ nimbuo fiɛ ankyɛ ni andiki.” Nioso ɔlaa wɔ di Yesu kobuɛ ni ninfũ, kotuo alɛ alesaa amuu nlɛ alɛ baale.
41007020	Aakple aabuɛ aakyakaa alɛ, “Lɛsaa le nindie ninkye ni otii otu kamɛ, nni ninta ambla okpile nɛ.
41007021	Diekye otii otu kamɛ di disibu kpile nkye, nni ninta otii mbla asaa ya ninanlɛ ni nɛ. Asaa nwu awo ninle otetee ku kayu ku batii olo kuɛ
41007022	lɛsɔnɔkpee, onumbɛbɛɛ, disi osie ku ditii kyɔnkyɔ, suoto sĩna ɔkɔnsɔ akleesaa otikanko, batii odu okutu, onunsɛɛ, suoto katoo ɔtakatɛsa ku abuusaa ɔbla.
41007023	Sikpile se mmle simuu nindie sinkye otii kamɛ nɛ, nsĩ kafɔɔ ninta otii nkpɔnɔnfɔ nɛ.”
41007024	Sɛmaa, Yesu ladie aasifi kasɔ ka niɛtɛɛtɛ ni okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Tiro. Aabuo leyo ninwii, kafɔɔ atamiɛ alɛ otii atofo alɛ akpe ninfa, atafuo owofa kafɔɔ.
41007025	Ɔsanko onwii, obi sankobi, ninwuna kpile lasiɛ nwɔ. Ɔsanko nwu lanu Yesu lɛkpanko ninfa, ni aati nwɔ aakyɛ aalaapɛ akunkyi di nkpaatũ nɔɔ.
41007026	Ninfɛ aatikiti Yesu lekoto alɛ atososa ninwuna nwu di obi suoto. Ɔsanko nwu Hela otii aale, kafɔɔ baalofo nwɔ di Foinike kasɔ.
41007027	Kafɔɔ Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Ta bata babisɔ alesaa bale bamiɛ fiɛ. Diekye diɛlɛ alɛ baayɔ babisɔ alesaa manta baweewee alɛ bale.”
41007028	Nfa diɛ ɔsanko nwu kafɔɔ kokpee nwɔ kanya alɛ, “Ao, Saate, baweewee ba nsi ni diɛ opunu kalɔ di alesaa kalekɔ, nwɛ osuku manle alesaa ya baabisɔ kole oowiwii ni kaasɔ.”
41007029	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ta, kanya didiki le feediki ni ninfũ oso, tɔɔkyɛ leyo. Fabalaanya falɛ ninwuna kpile nwu ntoodie di obi lɛfɔ suoto.”
41007030	Ninfɛ di ɔsanko nwu lasifi leyo nɛ. Nfa aalaanya alɛ obi nɔɔ nwu nte kaatenkɔ nɔɔ ninwuna kpile nwu ntoodie diesifi.
41007031	Yesu ladie di Tiro ntɛɛ nwu aafe di Sidon, aasifi Galilea lɛpanta sɛmaa aalaata di ntɛɛ be diɛ ekpoo lefosi nkpe nii.
41007032	Nfa di batii banwii lakyeko osuɔtɔ wɔ ninoonu nii, onoofuo ni ɔkakatɛ nwaa kafɔɔ baawako Yesu nɛ. Baatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ atika nwɔ kɔnɛɛ, aayɔɔsa nwɔ ofiɛ.
41007033	Nioso Yesu lakpaa nwɔ aasifiko lɛba le nielo nii baatii nnaa nii, ni di Yesu lakpee anɛɛ nɔɔ diɛ osuɔtɔ nwu atoko kamɛ nɛ. Aatufa sita aatika kɔɔnɛɛ, ayɔ aatusa osuɔtɔ nwu di ɔkplalomii.
41007034	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakplesa anu katoo aanyu osi ni aanwuna aadieko nwaa, ni aatɔkɔ osuɔtɔ nwu seele lɛma alɛ, “Hefata,” kasɔ ninle alɛ, “Tikiti!”
41007035	Nfanwu, osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle atoko niatikiti, ɔkpalalomii nɔɔ okũ labudi ninfɛ aakyako ɔkakatɛ nwaa nɛ.
41007036	Yesu lasĩ aata batii ba niayila ni ninfa alɛ batantɔkɔ otii kuonwii lɛsaa le baanya ni ninfa. Kafɔɔ batanu, bamuu lɛma baasifi baalaatoobuɛ mmle diawa nii.
41007037	Batii ba bamuu nianu ni sɛlaa nwu, diabla ma yaaa! Ni baabuɛ alɛ, “Anlolaa asaa amuu ambla! Anta bamumu nkakatɛ, batokotĩitɛ kafɔɔ nnu!”
41008001	Ditaklɛ saa fiɛ baatii kpinwu labasi ninfa. Ta lɛsalɛsaa ditabu ma baale ni oso, Yesu lalɛɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ baawa nwɔ katũ ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ,
41008002	“Batii ba ɔlaa konu mi kafutu diekye batɔɔwɛ di ɔkyɛ nii ayi atiɛ amu. Kafɔɔ lɛsalɛsaa diebu baawɛ manle nii.
41008003	Nse lediɛ ma nlɛ batɔɔkyɛ, loo babalaatookpi kɔka diɛ osuku. Diekye bawo lekye nkyonkɔ.”
41008004	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Di ɔfaafuu wɔ mɔ, ɔfɛ di otii mawɛ alesaa anta batii ba mmle alɛ bale bamiɛ?”
41008005	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Bloblo akudi asɛ bikle?” Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Bloblo akudi akuɛnsĩ bukle.”
41008006	Yesu latɔkɔ bamuu lɛma alɛ basiɛ kaasɔ. Ninfɛ aayɔ bloblo akudi akuɛnsĩ nwu, aapɛ Yaa sɛfa, ninfɛ aabɛbɛɛ nwɔ kɔkyɛɛ kɔkyɛɛ aata basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ bayɔ bata batii nwu bamuu. Mma kafɔɔ, baayɔ baasɛ ma fɛɛ.
41008007	Baanya alɛ kɔkpaku kɔsɛɛ kafɔɔ labu nii, Yesu layɔ kũ kafɔɔ ninfɛ aapɛ sɛfa nɛ. Aayɔ kũ aata basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ bayɔ basɛ ma kafɔɔ.
41008008	-
41008009	Batii ba lale alesaa nwu baamiɛ. Basuɔtɔ lete lɛpɔ labla nkpe nna. Baale baaloo nii, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasiisa kufii ko niabu nii baawɛ nkyikyɛ nkplɛ nkuɛnsĩ. Sɛmaa, Yesu ladiki ma osuku baasifi.
41008010	Ninfɛ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ labuo di oklo kamɛ baataalɛ ntu baasifi kasɔ ka bɔɔlɛɛ ni Dalmanuta.
41008011	Farisi batii lawa Yesu ɔkyɛ alɛ bɔɔbakaalɛ nwɔ sɛlaa mansɔ nwɔ mannyu. Nioso baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ abla atuosaa atuo ma baanya alɛ Yaa nfũ eekye.
41008012	Kafɔɔ Yesu lanwuna faa, ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Obe lɛsaa oso diɛ nunua babi komiɛ alɛ batɔɔnya atuosaa? Oowo, kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ nɔɔmatuo ye lɛsaa le biomiɛ bilɛ binya ni ninfũ!”
41008013	Ninfɛ aasifi aadiɛ ma aakple aalaabuo di oklo kamɛ aataalɛ lɛpanta nwu aasifi kakyɛ nyɔɔfa.
41008014	Obe wɔ baatoofe nii, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ layee batakelee bloblo, dikudi ninwii ko niabu diɛ oklo kamɛ.
41008015	Ninfɛ di Yesu laka ma alɛ, “Bilolaa binyu biemufũ suoto lee biklee di Ɔka Herodes ku Farisi batii mmɔle nyankale suoto.”
41008016	Basaateketɛ nɔɔ labuɛ baata baawo alɛ, “Ta nle munankle bloblo apɔ ni oso oobuɛ ɔlaa nwɔ nɛ?”
41008017	Kafɔɔ Yesu latofo ɔlaa wɔ baatoobu ni oso aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Obe oso biobuɛ bloblo ɔwɛnlaa? Diɛbase ni di nunua, biifuo ɔnya ɔtɛ nsũ, biinu kasɔ? Atoko nkpe ye opĩ nwaa!
41008018	Bikpe anu, kafɔɔ bilɔɔnya! Bikpe atoko, kafɔɔ biloonu!
41008019	Bitanya obe wɔ labɛbɛɛ bloblo akudi anɔɔ lata ni batii nkpe nnɔɔ baale ni? Nkyikyɛ nsɛ di kɔkyɛɛ kɔkyɛɛ ko niabu ni layii?” Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nkyikyɛ lefosi nnyɔ.”
41008020	Yesu lakple aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Di obe wɔ kafɔɔ lasɛ ni bloblo akudi akuɛnsĩ lata ni batii nkpe nna, kɔkyɛɛ kɔkyɛɛ nwu niabu nii, nkyikyɛ nsɛ kuayii?” Baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nkyikyɛ nkuɛnsĩ.”
41008021	Ni aakple aakalɛ ma alɛ, “Ni bia nua biinu kasɔ?”
41008022	Obe wɔ baakyɛ baalaadu ni Betsaida, batii banwii lakpaa numbiɛtɛ onwii baawako Yesu nfũ, ni baatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ akpanko nwɔ nɛ.
41008023	Ninfɛ di Yesu lamufũ nwɔ kɔɔnɛɛ aakpaa nwɔ aadieko di okpoo ntɛɛ. Ni aafiɛ nwɔ sita di anu, aayɔ nnɛɛ aatika nwɔ di anu, aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Fɔɔnya lɛsaa lewo?”
41008024	Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu latakatɛsa anu aanyu osi aabuɛ alɛ, “Yii kɔnya batii, kafɔɔ bate fɛɛ awoso. Bakyɛ bookyi.”
41008025	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakple aakpanko osuɔtɔ nwu anu nɛ. Di obe nyɔɔfa wɔ mmle kamɛ, osuɔtɔ nwu latikiti anu nwaa aanyu, diakpa nwɔ aakyako asaa ɔnya klekle.
41008026	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki nwɔ osuku alɛ atɔɔkyɛ leyo nɔɔ, kafɔɔ ataasinkple aalaafe diɛ okpoo nwu kamɛ.
41008027	Nni kamaa Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ladie ninfa baasifi nkpayotũ be niɛkaako ni Kaesarea di Filipi. Baakyɛ ni diɛ osuku, Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitɔkɔ mi ɔmɛntiikle baatii kobuɛ alɛ nle?”
41008028	Baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Batii bawo kobuɛ alɛ, Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane fale. Bawo kafɔɔ kobuɛ alɛ Elia fale. Bawo kafɔɔ kobuɛ alɛ Yaa Ɔlaabuɛtɛtɛ onwii lɛma fale.”
41008029	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakple aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ni aye mɔ? Owe biefũ bienu bilɛ nle?” Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Kristo wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ nɛ.”
41008030	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakpee ma kufiofa alɛ batantɔkɔ kuonwi ɔlaa wɔ mmle baye beekyeko nwɔ ni suoto.
41008031	Ni di Yesu lakyako basaateketetɛ nɔɔ asaa otuo nɛ. Aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Dikpe nii Otii Obi lefe diibuo kpinwu kamɛ diɛ okpoo banɔɔfo ku Yaa olebatatɛ ku kufiofa batuotɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ mansĩ nwɔ. Babalo nwɔ, kafɔɔ, di dii tiɛfa, abakple ansɛnkɛ.”
41008032	Aatɔkɔ ma sɛlaa se mmle klekle aaloo nii, ninfɛ di Petro lakpaa Yesu aasifiko ɔlɔɔkɔ ni aalaasĩ ɔlaa nwu aatɔɔ nɛ.
41008033	Kafɔɔ di Yesu lamunikĩi aanyu ni basaateketetɛ nɔɔ, aasĩ ɔlaa nwu aata Petro alɛ, “Abonsam kyɛ mi di ɔlɔɔkɔ!” Ni aakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Disibu lɛfɔ nwu diekye Yaa nfũ kafɔɔ otii nfũ diekye!”
41008034	Nioso Yesu lalɛɛ batii dikudi nwu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nse otii owo komiɛ alɛ awa abatikankoe, ni dikpe nii ansĩ suoto nɔɔ, an-yɔ aatoo nɔɔ, antikankoe.
41008035	Diekye otii lele nialɛ ɔɔta nkpa nɔɔ, abayu mi, kafɔɔ otii lele nieyu nkpa nɔɔ diisi nii ta ɔlaa nii biene oso, abawɛ nkpa.
41008036	Lɛmɛntota dibiene di otii mawɛ nse ɛɛwɛ kayi ka mmle asaa amuu eeyu nkpa nɔɔ?
41008037	Ee obelɛsaa di otii kayɔ ankyɛlɛnsa anfũ nkpa nwaa nwu?
41008038	Nse otii owo lenunsɔ mi ku ɔlaa nii di Yaa ɔtanyɛkɛ di ayi kpile ya mmle kamɛ, ni ami, Otii Obi nwu, kafɔɔ manunsɔ nwɔ, nse lekple lɛwa di Teemi leklekle kamɛ ku Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ klekle.”
41009001	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, batii bawo kaamɛ lee dilɔbakpi, diediki bitɔɔnya bilɛ Yaa sɛka ole ntɔɔwa ku osie fiɛ.”
41009002	Ayi akuɔ sɛmaa, Yesu lakpaa Petro ku Yakobo ku Yohane baakyɛ kobokote takale kunwii osi. Lete lɛma niawɛ ninfa. Obe wɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ latoonyu nii, kakyi kanwii lawa di Yesu suoto.
41009003	Awu nɔɔ lapu fututu osie kanya aatoosese di anu aalenke mmle diɛ otii kafoto lɛsaa nindie ni nintu.
41009004	Ninfɛ diɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ batiɛ nwu lanya Yaa Ɔlaa Babuɛtɛtɛ Mose ku Elia lakyɔɔ baatɔɔkakatɛko Yesu.
41009005	-
41009006	Lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ Petro ku bawo nɔɔ diata alɛ, batatofo be baatoobuɛ. Ninfɛ di Petro latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, nfũ loo lɛwa lɛtɛ dilɛ. Diki wo osuku buɔpɛ akpaayo atiɛ. Anwii alefɔ, anwii Mose, anwii kafɔɔ Elia.”
41009007	Ninfɛ di dituntũ ninwii labatĩi ma ku kunyĩi nɔɔ, ninfɛ sɛɛlɔ sinwii ladie di dituntũ nwu kamɛ diabuɛ alɛ, “Nnya obi nii bɔmbɔtɛ ninle nwɔ nɛ. Bikyɔɔ nwɔ atoko bienu nwɔ ɔlaa!”
41009008	Nfanwu baanyunyu nii, batasinya kuonwii dilenkee Yesu lete niayila ma diɛ ɔlɔɔkɔ.
41009009	Baakye kobokote osi boosoo manwa nii, Yesu lakpee ma kufiofa alɛ, “Bitantɔkɔ kuonwii lɛsaa le biɛnya ni ninfũ, diɛlase diɛ obe wɔ di ami, Otii Obi nwu, mataka nkye ni bakpi kamɛ.”
41009010	Baakyɔɔ ɔlaa nwu atoko, kafɔɔ se nima nima basi, mantɔɔkaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Ɔtaka Baakpi kamɛ kasɔ mɔ?”
41009011	Ninfɛ baakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Lɛ oso di kufiofa batuotɛ labuɛ alɛ Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Elia kakasa Kristo ɔwa?”
41009012	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako baabuɛ Elia maka Kristo katũ ole amalolaa asaa antɛ. Kafɔɔ bɛɛkpana Kɔɔkpana Klekle kamɛ alɛ Otii Obi nwu mafe diibuo kpinwu kamɛ. Babasĩ nwɔ kafɔɔ. Lɛ oso bienyu bilɛ baabuɛ nkpo?
41009013	Kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, Elia ntɔɔwa ɛɛbafe kofokofoko. Kafɔɔ batii ditafũ nwɔ, baabla nwɔ nle ninlɛ ma nii, fɛ mmle baakpana baatɛ ni di suoto nɔɔ.”
41009014	Obe wɔ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ batiɛ ba mmle lakple baawa ni bawo lɛma kamɛ, baanya alɛ batii kpinwu lamana ma baakyi, baatɔɔnanfi sɛlaa ku kufiofa batuotɛ bawo.
41009015	Obe wɔ baatii nwu lanya alɛ Yesu nfɛ kɔwa nii, diabala ma ɔkpɛ, ninfɛ baatoso baalaakyakako nwɔ baasɛɛsa nwɔ nɛ.
41009016	Yesu lakaalɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Obe sɛlaa biyɛ biɔnanfi?”
41009017	Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ onwii di batii nwu kamɛ latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, lɛkpaa obi nii lɛwako ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ, ta niwuna kpile nsi nwɔ ni oso, oloofuo ɔkakatɛ.
41009018	Obe lele nse ninwuna nwu kɔkpɛko nwɔ, annɔɔ ampɛ kaasɔ, afuuta ntoodie nwɔ kaanya, antoowee anyɛɛ, eebensa suoto tii. Ninfɛ lɛkpaa nwɔ lɛwako basaateketetɛ lɛfɔ nfũ nlɛ batososa ninwuna nwu di suoto nɔɔ, kafɔɔ baafuo.”
41009019	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ee! Miɛ akyɛnfɔɔle lee, ofũ onu lee diɛpɔ! Sɛsɛ bilɛ nsiɛ ye kaamɛ fiɛ biefũ binu. Ee lɛ ninkle ye naase fiɛ bibanu asaa kasɔ? Bikpaa obisɔ nwu biwakoe!”
41009020	Ninfɛ baakpaa nwɔ baawako Yesu nfũ nɛ. Diɛ ninwuna kpile nwu lanya ɔnya Yesu, diawanyinsa obisɔ nwu, aanɔɔ aapɛ kaasɔ aakyako osisikiti, afuuta latoodie nwɔ kaanya.
41009021	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ obisɔ nwu ote alɛ, “Diɛkyako nwɔ ni ɔbla mmle ditɔɔkɛlɛ?” Osuɔtɔ nwu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Sibisɔ nɔɔ ke diakyako nwɔ ɔbla.
41009022	Obe lele ninwuna le mmle komiɛ alɛ dilo nwɔ kokooko. Se diɛwa nkpo, ninta alɛ antɔɔnɔɔ antoobuo di ɔtɔ ee ntu kamɛ. Lekoto, nya wo nyaami faakyakaako wo, se lɛsaa le faafuo ni ɔbla dile!”
41009023	Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛ oso fɔɔtɔkɔ mi falɛ se kafuo? Lɛsalɛsaa nnaa otii wɔ niefũ mi eenu ni osie.”
41009024	Nfanwu, obisɔ nwu ote labuɛ osie kanya alɛ, “Nkpe ofũ onu kafɔɔ kuɔpɔ. Kyakaakoe ninwɛ ofũ onu nkyakaa!”
41009025	Obe wɔ nfɛ di Yesu lanya alɛ batii kpinwu nfɛ kɔtɛɛtɛ nwɔ nii, ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ninwuna kpile nwu alɛ, “Afɔ ninwuna le ninanta batii lanu ni ku ɔtankakatɛ, kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ die di obisɔ nwu kamɛ, diidii kafɔɔ tamasimbuo nwɔ kaamɛ!”
41009026	Ninfɛ ninwuna le mmle layiisa kudu osie kanya, diawanyinsa obisɔ nwu diatɛ kaasɔ fiɛ diadie diasifi. Obisɔ wɔ late ninfa fɛ le okpi atookpi. Batii ba niayila ni ninfa latoobuɛ alɛ, “Eekpi.”
41009027	Kafɔɔ Yesu lamufũ obisɔ nwu kɔɔnɛɛ aatakatɛsa aase.
41009028	Sɛmaa obe wɔ di Yesu lalabuo ni leyo, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakyɛ baalaakaalɛ nwɔ buɛɛ alɛ, “Lɛ oso butafuo ninwuna kpile nwu otososa di obisɔ nwu kamɛ?”
41009029	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Diediki otii kɔpɛ ɔlaa anta Yaa, annii kanya wlawla fiɛ abafuo ninwuna le mmle okle otososa odiki di otii kamɛ.”
41009030	Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ladie ninfa baafe di Galilea kasɔ. Yesu ditamiɛ alɛ otii kuonwii atofo nfũ akpe nii,
41009031	diekye aatootuo basaateketetɛ nɔɔ asaa. Aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Otii onwii madiki Otii Obi kálɔ anta batii alɛ balo nwɔ. Ni kafɔɔ dii tiɛfa, abakple ansɛnkɛ ansiɛ nkpa.”
41009032	Kafɔɔ batanu ɔlaa wɔ aatɔkɔ ma ni kasɔ, baayɛkɛ batakaalɛ nwɔ ɔlaa nwu kasɔ.
41009033	Baalabuo ni Kapernaum, baalabuo leyo. Nfa di Yesu lakaalɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Obe ɔlaa biɛtɔɔ nanfi ko bawo biɔwa ni?”
41009034	Kafɔɔ batadiki kanya. Diekye baatɔɔwa nii baatɔɔ nanfi alɛ bootofo otii wɔ nii lenke ni kaamɛ lɛma.
41009035	Ninfɛ di Yesu lasiɛ ni kaasɔ, aalɛɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lefosi banyɔ nwu ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Olele nikomiɛ alɛ ale ɔkasale ni aabla suoto fɛ anaa kayilakɔ, aakyakaako bawo nɔɔ.”
41009036	Ninfɛ aata obisɔ onwii lawa aabayila sĩitũ lɛma. Aakpaa obisɔ wɔ aatika l'aatĩ nɔɔ ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ,
41009037	“Otii lele niefũ obisɔ fɛ nwɔ mmle okle ta ami oso, ami eefũ. Otii lele niefũ mi, diele lete nii eefũ. Kafɔɔ ku Teemi wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ eefũ.”
41009038	Ninfɛ di Yohane latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, buɔnya osuɔtɔ onwii kotososa anwuna kpile baatii suoto leeyoto lɛfɔ kamɛ. Buatɔkɔ nwɔ bulɛ adiɛ, diekye aasi wo kaamɛ.”
41009039	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitantĩi nwɔ osuku, diekye otii wɔ ni kɔbla ni sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ di leeyooto nii kamɛ, di nni kamaa, ɔlɔbamunikĩi wla akple abuɛ ɔlaa kpile di suoto nii.
41009040	Diekye otii wɔ ninantaka ayila wo ni di suoto, awo ku nnwɔɔ, onwii bule.
41009041	“Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse otii lɛta ye ntu kakɔkwɛɛ kanwii bienyi ta ami Kristo bale bile ni oso, Yaa dilabasĩ nwɔ letota biene ɔta.
41009042	“Kafɔɔ se otii owo lɛta babisɔ ba mmle niefũ mi beenu nii, onwii lɛma lekple diɛ ofũ onu nɔɔ sɛmaa, otii nwu dibabuo nwɔ osie kanya! Se bɛɛyɔ okũ beenii difuɔ dibinte bɛɛsaka nwɔ siimuu, beefuki nwɔ beekpee di leekpo kamɛ, dialɛ nwɔ ninlenkee.
41009043	-
41009044	“Nioso se kɔnɛɛ lɛfɔ kunwii kɔlalaasa fɔ ofũ onu, nu kasɔ faabudi kũ fayu! Dilɛ dilenke alɛ faayɔ kɔnɛɛ kunwii fambuo di nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo, alɛ faawɛ nnɛɛ nnyɔ, Yaa n-yɔ fɔ anfuki ankpee di ɔtɔ wɔ nikofiɛ kunaa ni kaloo kamɛ.
41009045	-
41009046	Se loo kɔkpaa lɛfɔ kafɔɔ nikɔlalaasa fɔ ofũ onu, faabudi kũ fayu. Se nkpaa nnyɔ ɔwɛ alɛ baafuki fɔ mankpee diɛ ɔtɔ wɔ ninnaa ni kaloo kamɛ oso, fakpe kɔkpaa kunwi fasi nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo, dilɛ dilenke.
41009047	Se loo ninu lɛfɔ ninwii kafɔɔ nikɔlalaasa fɔ ofũ onu, faadiki ni fayu. Dibalɛfɔ ninlenkee alɛ faayɔ ninu ninwii fambuo Yaa sɛka kalekɔ, alɛ faawɛ anu anyɔ alɛ baafuki fɔ mankpee di ɔtɔ kplɛ wɔ nikofiɛ kunaa ni kaloo kamɛ.
41009048	Nfa suoto beebuɛ alɛ, ‘Bakunnwɔɔ ba ninlalasa ni asaa ninfa, manankpi ni diidii! Ɔtɔ wɔ kafɔɔ ninfiɛ ni asaa ninfa, diidii kunnii.’
41009049	Diekye babayɔ ɔtɔ mankleklesa batii bamuu suoto, fɛ mmle man-yɔ mba mankleklesa oleɔta kafɔɔ.
41009050	“Mba nlɛ. Kafɔɔ nse ditooyu ɔmɛnɛfɛ ni mi, be baakple man-yɔ mankpee mi ɔmɛnɛfɛ? Nioso bita mba ɔkpɛ biene disiɛ ye kaamɛ, biesiɛ ku bawo lee di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ.”
41010001	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladie ninfa, aasifi Yudea kasɔ, aataalɛ Yordan okle. Batii kpinwu lakple baawa baabamana nwɔ baakyi ninfa, ninfɛ aatootuo ma Yaa ɔlaa fɛ mmle ambla ni ɔbla nɛ.
41010002	Farisi batii bawo lawa Yesu ɔkyɛ alɛ bɔɔkyɔɔ nwɔ okũ. Baakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Kufiofa loo lɛta osuku alɛ osuɔtɔ kasĩ ɔsɔfɔ?”
41010003	Ni di Yesu ladiki kanya, aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Obe kufiofa diɛ Mose lɛta ye?”
41010004	Ni baata ntale alɛ, “Mose lɛta osuku alɛ, osuɔtɔ wɔ nialɛ ansimbɔ ni ɔsɔfɔ, aakpana kukũ antɔɔ letofo fiɛ aasĩ nwɔ.”
41010005	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Mose lakpana nle mmle aata ye di osuku wɔ mmle suoto diekye biesĩ bilɛ, baatantuo ye lɛsaa.
41010006	Diɛ kayi kasɔkakyekɔ, Yaa labla osuɔtɔ ku ɔsanko.
41010007	Nioso Kɔɔkpana klekle kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Nle mmle oso, osuɔtɔ madie di ote ku ɔya suoto ansifi manko ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ manaabla onwii,
41010008	banyɔ lɛma mankple suoto sina sinwii.’ Di Yaa anu, otii onwii nfɛ bale. Diele batii banyɔ.
41010009	Nioso batii ba di Yaa ntɔɔbla ni onwii kasɔ ka suoto, otii atamblasa ma ntɛɛ!”
41010010	Sɛmaa obe wɔ baakyɛ ni leyo, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakaalɛ nwɔ ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aakyeko ni kufiofa nwu suoto.
41010011	Yesu ladiki kamɛ aata ma alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ wɔ niesĩ ni ɔsɔfɔ eekple ɛɛlayɔ ni ɔbamba, ntookpee asɔnɔ, ɛɛbla ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ nwu kofole okpile.
41010012	Nkpo nwu ke se ɔsanko lesĩ ɔsa ɛɛkyɛ asi ko osuɔtɔ bamba, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ atookpee asɔnɔ, ɛɛbla ɔsa nɔɔ nwu kofole okpile.”
41010013	Di obe nwu kamɛ tutuutu, batii banwii lakpaa babi lɛma baawako Yesu ɔkyɛ alɛ atika ma nnɛɛ di suoto aakusɛkusɛ ma. Kafɔɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lalɔnko ma.
41010014	Di Yesu lanya ni nkpo, ɔblɔ lafiɛ nwɔ, ni aatɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Bita babisɔ bawa ɔkyɛ nii, bitantĩi ma osuku. Diekye batii fɛ babisɔ ba mmle okle kale ninle Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo.
41010015	Nwaa kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii wɔ ninanfũ ni Yaa sɛka kalekɔ fɛ mmle di obisɔ nwakosa ni suoto kasɔ dilabuo nfa diidii.”
41010016	Ninfɛ aasiisa babisɔ ba niawɛ ni ninfa dikudi aatika ma nnɛɛ di suoto aata ma dikusɛkusɛ nɛ.
41010017	Obe wɔ di Yesu lataka alɛ ooyefe ni osuku, osuɔtɔ onwii latoso aabadu nwɔ aapɛ akunkyi kaatũ nɔɔ, aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ Biene, be kabla fiɛ kawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo?”
41010018	Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Be oso fɔɔlɛɛ mi otii biene? Otii kuonwii nnaa ale ni bienetɛ, diediki Yaa lete.
41010019	Faye Yaa afiofa amuu. ‘Tanlo otii, tankpee asɔnɔ, tan-yu, tanlaa faatika di otii suoto, tankyɔnkyɔ otii faafũ nwɔ asaa, bu teefɔ ku yaafɔ.’ ”
41010020	Osuɔtɔ wɔ lakple aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, diɛyɔ ni di sibisɔ nii, diɛbase ni bia miɛ, kole afiofa ya mmle amuu.”
41010021	Yesu lanyu nwɔ ku lɛbɔmbɔ ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛsaa ninwii ko niebu fɔ ɔbla. Tɔɔkyɛ faalaayɔ asaa ya amuu niikpe fɔ ni fasunsũ, faayɔ koto nwu fata bapiitɛ, se fatookple saawɛntɛ di Yaa kafa. Nni kamaa faabatikankoe nfɛ!”
41010022	Obe wɔ di osuɔtɔ wɔ lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ, nnɛɛ lafee nwɔ aakyɛ aasifi ku sɛnyaami diekye asaa lawɛ nwɔ kpinwu.
41010023	Yesu lamunikĩi aanyu basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Dibawɛ osie fiɛ diɛ basaawɛntɛ mafuo Yaa sɛka kalekɔ obuo.”
41010024	Ɔlaa wɔ lata basaateketetɛ nɔɔ disi obu. Kafɔɔ Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Babi nii, binyu mmle dikpe osie diɛta ni basaawɛntɛ alɛ baawɛ osuku mambuo ni Yaa sɛka kalekɔ!
41010025	Nfa lɛma obuo mawɛ ma osie dilenke alɛ, kapupɔnkɔ kabuo di pandiɛ dituɛ anfe!”
41010026	Aatɔkɔ ma ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, diata ma disibu osie kanya! Ninfɛ baatɔɔkaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Ni owe mɔ, nimawɛ didiki?”
41010027	Ninfɛ di Yesu lanyu ma tuwĩi ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Otii kuonwii dilaafuo nle mmle ɔbla. Kafɔɔ nnwɔɔ Yaa, abafuo lɛsaa lele ɔbla.”
41010028	Ninfɛ di Petro lakakatɛ aabuɛ alɛ, “Ni awo mɔ? Nyu, buodiɛ asaa loo amuu buɔtɛ buɔwa butikanko fɔ.”
41010029	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakakatɛ aabuɛ alɛ, “Nwaa kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ bibawɛ asaa ya ninlenkee ni n-ya biediɛ biɛtɛ nii. Diekye otii lele niediɛ leyo nɔɔ ɛɛtɛ, ee babi lɛma, ee ɔya, ee ote, ee babi nɔɔ, ee kofe, ta ami ku ɔlaa biene nwu oso,
41010030	aawɛ asaa nwu anlenkee kɔlafa nɔɔ kaasɔ ka suoto. Abawɛ ayo ku babi lɛma ku baya ku babi ku afe. Kafɔɔ, abawɛ atikanko. Nni kamaa abawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo di kayi ka fɔle nimawa ni kamɛ.
41010031	Kafɔɔ batii kpinwu ba ninle ni katũ male bayɛntɛle. Bayɛntɛle kafɔɔ male bakasale.”
41010032	Di obe wɔ baakyɛ di osuku baatoofe ni Yerusalem okpoo, Yesu lale katũ fiɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ latika. Ditutukũ lamufũ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ, lɛyɛkɛ kafɔɔ lapɛ batii ba niatikanko ma nii. Yesu lakple aalɛɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lefosi banyɔ nwu di ɔlɔɔkɔ aalaatɔkɔ ma lɛsaa le nimawa nwɔ ni di suoto.
41010033	Aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Binu! Buofe Yerusalem lɛba le babalaayɔ ami, Otii Obi, mankpee ni di Yaa olebatatɛ ku kufiofa batuotɛ nnɛɛ. Babalo mi lɛpɔɔ manyɔ mi mankpee di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii nnɛɛ,
41010034	mma kafɔɔ babakpee mi sinunsɔ, mantufa sita mankpete mi, mampɛ mi ku mpile, manloe. Kafɔɔ di dii tiɛfa suoto, mataka nsiɛ nkpa.”
41010035	Ni di Sebedeo babi dile ni Yakobo ku Yohane lawa Yesu nfũ baabatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, buomiɛ bulɛ bla lɛsaa ninwii fata wo.”
41010036	Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Be lɛsaa dile?”
41010037	Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse fɛbasiɛ di lɛkakpomii lɛfɔ nwu di Yaa kafa leeklekle kamɛ, buomiɛ bulɛ faata wo mumasiɛ fɔ di ɔlɔɔkɔ. Onwii loo di oletanɛɛkyɛ lɛfɔ, onwii kafɔɔ di ɔmɛntukyɛ lɛfɔ.”
41010038	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bieye lɛsaa le biɔkaalɛ nii! Biefũ bienu bilɛ bibafuo dibuo kakɔkɔɛ ka ntu manyi ni, onyi? Bibafuo ntu okpeesa amanle ya makpe ni dibuo kamɛ kaasɔ ka mmle okpe?”
41010039	Ni baatuna alɛ, “Bubafuo.” Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ɛɛ, bibanyi kakɔkɔɛ ka ntu be manyi nii, ku ntu okpeesa amanle ya okle makpe nii.
41010040	Kafɔɔ nnaa osuku ndiki otii wɔ nimasiɛ ni di oletanɛɛkyɛ nii ee ɔmɛntukyɛ nii. Teemi omu mayɔ anta batii ba atoololaa ɛɛtɛ ni kofokofoko.”
41010041	Obe wɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lefosi ba niabu ni lanu ni ɔlaa nwu, baanya ɔblɔ di Yakobo ku Yohane suoto.
41010042	Nioso Yesu lalɛɛ bamuu aasiisa aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye bamu biye bilɛ abaa banɔɔfotii ninanle ni Yuda batii, nkpe otumi di baatii bamuu kaasɔ suoto. Banɔɔfotii nwu kafɔɔ kotuo suoto maakpee ma.
41010043	Kafɔɔ bitanta diate nkpo kaamɛ lee. Nse onwii kaamɛ lee komiɛ alɛ ale ɔnɔɔfo kaamɛ lee yi, ni dikpe ni eele kpɛmblatɛ ɛɛta babule.
41010044	Se onwii kaamɛ lee komiɛ alɛ ale ɔkasale, ni aale ɔlanle ata batii bamuu.
41010045	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ bia di Otii Obi nwu nkpo diɛwa alɛ batii katɔɔbla sɛkpɛ mantɔɔtɔɔ nɛ. Kafɔɔ nnwɔɔ ɛɛwa alɛ ɔɔbla sɛkpɛ anta batii alɛ aayɔ nkpa nɔɔ kafɔɔ antɛ kaasɔ andiki batii kpi.”
41010046	Nle sɛmaa Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lalaabuo Yeriko. Baatoodie ni di okpoo nwu kamɛ, batii kpinwu latikanko ma. Obe wɔ baakyɛ ni di osuku, baafe numbiɛtɛ onwii bɔɔlɛɛ ni Bartimeo, Timeo obi aale. Aasiɛ kaasɔ aatɔɔkaalɛ asaa di osukulɔɔkɔ.
41010047	Obe wɔ aanu alɛ Yesu Nasaret Otii nikofe nii, aayiisa kudu abuɛ alɛ, “Yesu! Dawid leyo kamɛ obi! Nyɛɛ nyaami!”
41010048	Batii kpinwu ba niatoofe ni ninfa lasĩ ɔlaa baatɔɔ alɛ, adiɛ kudu oyiisa. Kafɔɔ mia aatɛ aayiisa kudu alɛ, “Dawid leyo kamɛ obi ee! Nyɛɛ nyaami kyu woo!”
41010049	Di Yesu lanu nwɔ ni lɛlɛɛ, ni aayila, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Bilɛɛ nwɔ bitɛɛ.” Ninfɛ baalɛɛ numbiɛtɛ nwu baabuɛ alɛ, “Ta suoto siyɔɔ fɔ! Taka pla, diekye ɔɔlɛɛ fɔ.”
41010050	Kakuinwu, aafuki awu nɔɔ wua aayu aayefe aalaadu Yesu.
41010051	Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Obe foomiɛ falɛ mabla nta fɔ?” Numbiɛtɛ wɔ mmle latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, ta anu atikiti mi nintɔɔnya!”
41010052	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tɔɔkyɛ. Ofũonu lɛfɔ ntoo diki fɔ.” Kakuinwu, anu nɔɔ latikiti aakyako asaa ɔnya. Ninfɛ aatikanko Yesu, baasifi bamuu lɛma nɛ.
41011001	Di obe wɔ baatɛɛtɛɛ ni Yerusalem baabadu ni Betfage ku Betania ntɛɛ nwu, baabadu kobokote ko bɔɔlɛ ni Nnɔnyi Awoso Kobokote. Nfa di Yesu lakyesee basaateketetɛ nɔɔ banyɔ alɛ batɔɔsɔ.
41011002	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Se biedu okpoo kasale wɔ bibabuo nii, bibanya bilɛ beekpee bɔkɛɛ wɔ ninte ni fɛ pɔnkɔ dibi okũ di otii kuonwii diisiɛ nwɔ ni di suoto. Bidiki nwɔ di okũ, biɛkpaa ni biwakoe.
41011003	Se otii owo lɛkaalɛ ye alɛ, ‘Lɛ oso biɛkpaa ni?’ Bitɔkɔ nwɔ bilɛ Saate komiɛ ni ɔkpɛ ɔbla ko, abakplesa anwako nunua.”
41011004	Nioso batii ba mmle banyɔ lakyɛ baalaanya alɛ beekpee bɔkɛɛ wɔ ninte ni fɛ pɔnkɔ okũ beese di osuɔtɔ onwii kayoko di osukulɔɔkɔ. Obe wɔ baatodiki ni ni di okũ,
41011005	batii ba banwii niayila ni ninfa lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Obe biɔbla, be biodiki lɛpɔnkɔbi nwu mimblako?”
41011006	Ni baabuɛ fɛ mmle di Yesu latɔkɔ ma ni nɛ. Ni baasuɔtɔ nwu kafɔɔ ladiɛ ma baasifiko ni nɛ.
41011007	Obe wɔ baakpaa bɔkɛɛ nwu baawako ni Yesu, baadiki abula lɛma baatika di bɔkɛɛ nwu suoto, ninfɛ di Yesu layie aasiɛ nwɔ kaamaa nɛ.
41011008	Batii kpinwu lafukuti abula lɛma baatɛ di osuku, bawo kafɔɔ labudi afata di osukulɔɔkɔ baatɛ diɛ osuku nwu suoto alɛ anafu afe.
41011009	Batii ba niale ni katũ ku mba niatikanko ni sɛɛmaa latɔɔtaa siwidi alɛ, “Hosiana! Di kusɛkusɛ ninle nwɔ nikɔwa ni di Saate leyooto kamɛ!
41011010	Bikusɛkusɛsa Ɔka Dawid sɛka kalekɔ ka nikɔwa ni! Biɛtansa Yaa kaatoo!”
41011011	Aabuo ni Yerusalem, Yesu lakyɛ Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ. Aalaanyunyu asaa ya amuu niayila ni ninfa aafenko. Kafɔɔ ta kale nfɛ latooloo ni oso, aadie aasifi Betania ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lefosi banyɔ nwu baalaate nfa.
41011012	Di obe wɔ kaale ntɔɔsɛ batoodie di Betania bɔɔwa nii, kɔka laklee Yesu.
41011013	Aanya kaakyonkɔ alɛ kolewoso kunwii n-yɛ ku afata kpinwu bɔɔlɛɛkũ ni figi kowoso. Nioso aakyɛ aalaanyu nse kutika abi di osi. Kafɔɔ obe wɔ aadu ni kowoso nwu kalɔ, aanya alɛ kuotika abi kuanwii. Afata ko niatika. Obe wɔ kubakple kunkpee ni diiwo saa.
41011014	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ kowoso nwu alɛ, “Kuonwii dilaasinkpee lewosobi lɛfɔ kaanya diidii!” Basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lanu alɛ aabuɛ nkpo.
41011015	Baakyɛ baalabuo ni Yerusalem, Yesu lakyɛ Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ ninfɛ aakyako mba niatoosunsu ni asaa ku mba niatɔɔya ni asaa ninfa ototososa odiki leeyo nwu kamɛ. Aatutukusa koto babiɛtɛ siipunu aayu. Aatukusa mba ninsi boosunsu ni ablonumaa kafɔɔ akpomii aayu.
41011016	Nioso atatuna alɛ otii kuonwi atuka lɛsalɛsaa afenko di Yaa Olekatakɔ anu ninfa.
41011017	Ninfɛ aatuo ma asaa aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bɛɛkpana di kɔkpana kelekele kukũ kamɛ alɛ, ‘Baalɛɛ mi leyo alɛ ɔlaa ɔpɛ katakɔ.’ Kafɔɔ aye, bitɔɔyɔ biɛbla bayu kawofakɔ!”
41011018	Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ ba niawɛ ni ninfa lanu ɔlaa wɔ di Yesu labuɛ nii. Nioso baatoomiɛ osuku wɔ baafe baalo nwɔ nii. Kafɔɔ baatɔɔyɛkɛ ta mmle di asaa otuo nɔɔ labla ni ɔkpɛ oso.
41011019	Kɔɔtɔɔfɔ nkpaa lawo nii, Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ladie diɛ okpoo nwu kamɛ.
41011020	Kaleesɛ ku kuyitatũ, batooyefe osuku boosifi nii, baanya alɛ kolewoso nwu ntookpi ku sidu nɔɔ kuyɛ.
41011021	Petro lanyuma lɛsaa le niawa nii, ninfɛ aatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, nyu kowoso ko faakpaani ni ntɔɔyɔɔ!”
41011022	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bifũ Yaa binu.
41011023	Kɔtɛ nta ye letofo nlɛ otii lele niɛtɔkɔ kobokote ko alɛ kutaka kulabuo diɛ lekpo kamɛ, di otu nɔɔ dietĩi nwɔ osuku, eefũ eenu, dibawa kanya ninkpo nintɔɔ.
41011024	Nioso kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse biɛpɛ ɔlaa biɛta Yaa, lɛsaa lele biɛkaalɛ nwɔ, biefũ bienu bilɛ bibawɛ, Yaa kafɔɔ mabla anta ye.
41011025	Se biɛwakosa asi kasɔ bilɛ biɔpɛ ɔlaa minta Yaa, biɛnya bilɛ otii owo lɛbla ye okpile, biyɔ bikyɛ nwɔ mmle diɛ Teeye kaatoo kafɔɔ kayɔ sikpile lee ankyɛ ye ni.
41011026	Kafɔɔ se biɛyɔ bikyɛ nwɔ, Teeye kaatoo kafɔɔ dilɔbayɔ sikpile lee akyɛ ye.”
41011027	Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakple baakyɛ Yerusalem. Obe wɔ di Yesu nkyɛ ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ, Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ ku okpoo banɔɔfo lakyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ.
41011028	Ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔmɛnsuku fakpe fɔɔbla asaa ya mmle? Owe kafɔɔ niɛta fɔ osuku nwu nkpo?”
41011029	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Bitɛɛ nkaalɛ ye ɔlaa onwii, nse biediki kanya yi, ni amii matɔkɔ ye osuku wɔ nkpe fiɛ kɔbla ni asaa ya mmle nwu nkpo.
41011030	Bitɔkɔ mi, ɔfɛ di Yohane lawɛ osuku fiɛ aatookpeesa batii Yaa ntu? Yaa nfũ kuakye ɛɛ, sɛɛ batii nfũ kuakye?”
41011031	Ninfɛ baamumufũ ɔlaa nwu nimanima baanyu alɛ, “Be nfɛ buabuɛ? Nse buobuɛ bulɛ Yaa nfũ kuokye yi, abakaalɛ wo alɛ, ‘Ni be oso bitafũ Yohane bianu mɔ?’
41011032	Kafɔɔ nse buobuɛ bulɛ ‘Otii nfũ kuokye’ yi!” Bɔɔyɛkɛ nwu kafɔɔ obuɛ diekye bamuu lɛma beefũ beenu alɛ Yohane yi, Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ aale.
41011033	Nioso baatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Buoye.” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di amii, namatɔkɔ ye otii wɔ niɛtɛɛ ni osuku fiɛ kɔbla ni asaa ya mmle nɛ.”
41012001	Ninfɛ di Yesu lapɛ ma lɛkpa alɛ, “Obe onwii, osuɔtɔ onwii lakpɛ awosobi ya man-yɔ mambla ni nta kofe. Aakpee kɔba aakyisa kofe nwu. Aakutu dibiɔ di kasɔ nwu ntɛɛ di nfũ abatoodiki ni awosobi nwu nta. Aatofo lɛba le niataka ni kle, baayila mantoonyu ni kofe nwu. Ninfɛ aayɔ kofe nwu nkpo aakpee di bakpɛntɛ banwii nnɛɛ kamɛ alɛ batoonyu, ni aadie aasifi osuku nɛ.
41012002	Di obe lawo alɛ baatɛsɛ ni awosobi nwu, aakpee kpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ alɛ, akyɛ aalaafũ kalekɔ nɔɔ awako nwɔ.
41012003	Kafɔɔ kofe nwu banyuntɛ lamufũ kpɛmblatɛ nwu, baapɛ nwɔ, baatososɔɔ aasifi nnɛɛ fukiti.
41012004	Nni sɛmaa, kofe saate wɔ mmle lakple aakpee kpɛmblatɛ bamba. Aakyɛ nii, kofe banyuntɛ ba mmle lapɛ nwɔ baapila nwɔ disi baakpee nwɔ sinunsɔ nwaa.
41012005	Osuɔtɔ wɔ lakple aakpee kpɛmblatɛ bamba, baalo nwɔ. Aakple aakpee babamba. Baapɛ bawo, baalo kafɔɔ babule.
41012006	“Otii wɔ niabu aakple ankpee nwɔ ni niale obi nɔɔ wɔ ambɔmbɔ nii. Lɛyɛntɛle aakple aakpee obi nɔɔ nwu. Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ suoto alɛ, ‘Lefũ lenu nlɛ babata obi nii nwu dibu.’
41012007	Kafɔɔ kofe nwu nkpo banyuntɛ latɔkɔ bawo alɛ, ‘Nnya kofe saate obi wɔ nimale ni atesaa ninle nwɔ mmle nɛ. Biwa biɛta bulo nwɔ di atesaa nɔɔ nwu nkpo akple wo ale!’
41012008	Nioso baamufũ obi nwu, baalo nwɔ. Baafuki nwɔ baayu diɛ kɔba nwu sɛmaa.”
41012009	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ batii nwu alɛ, “Lɛ bienyu bilɛ kofe saate nwu mabla? Matɔkɔ ye! Abakyɛ nfa aanaalo kofe banyuntɛ nwu an-yɔ kofe nɔɔ ankpee baatii bamba nnɛɛ.
41012010	N-ye nlɛ bitɔka di Kɔkpana Klekle kamɛ lɛba le beebuɛ alɛ, ‘Difuɔ le baayotofotɛ lesĩ nii, nni nintookple difuɔ le niemufũ leyokɔ dikle ni nɛ.
41012011	Saate niɛbla lɛsaa kplɛ le mmle. Nioso diɛbla wo ɔkpɛ osie kanya.’ ”
41012012	Obe wɔ baanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, Yuda batii batunletɛ lamiɛ osie kanya alɛ boomufũ Yesu. Diekye baatofo alɛ mma oso aapɛ lɛkpa nwu. Kafɔɔ baayɛkɛ batii dikudi le niayila ni ninfa. Nioso baadiɛ nwɔ baasifi.
41012013	Sɛmaa, baakyesee Farisi batii bawo ku Herodes batikankotɛ bawo baakyɛ Yesu nfũ alɛ, baalaawolaa nwɔ kaanya di sɛlaa ɔkaalɛ kamɛ.
41012014	Baadu nwɔ nii, baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, buye bulɛ nwaako ɔlaa fambuɛ obe lele. Fanyɛkɛ otii, nkpo kafɔɔ fanannyu otii di anu nɛ. Kafɔɔ fantuo batii bamuu osuku wɔ ninkpaa otii kunsifiko ni Yaa nfũ. Nioso tɔkɔ wo se dilɛ alɛ buata akpooto munta Roma Batii Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare. Buta ɛɛ, butanta?”
41012015	Kafɔɔ Yesu lanya kakyɔnkyɔ osuku wɔ suoto baakyɛ nii, nioso aabuɛ alɛ, “Be oso biomiɛ bilɛ bikyɔɔ mi okũ? Biyɔ koto nwu biwakoe ninnyu.”
41012016	Baayɔ koto nwu kunwii baawako nwɔ. Ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Owe disi ku leyooto nintika?” Ni baadiki kanya alɛ, “Kaesare nintika.”
41012017	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nioso biyɔ lɛsaa le ninle ni Kaesare lele bitɔɔ. Biɛyɔ lɛsaa le ninle ni Yaa lele kafɔɔ bita Yaa.” Ta nni oso, kanya ditasimbɛ ma, diekye diabla ma ɔkpɛ.
41012018	Ni di Saduki batii ba nimbuɛ alɛ nse otii lekpi alaasintaka akye ni bakpi kamɛ lawa Yesu nfũ baabakaalɛ nwɔ ɔlaa nɛ.
41012019	Baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, Mose lakpana kufiofa ko mmle ɛɛtɛ wo alɛ, nse osuɔtɔ owo lekpi eediɛ ɔsɔfɔ ɛɛtɛ, manko nwɔ banaa obi, osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo obilɛma kayɔ kpisɔfɔ nwu nkpo manlofo babi. Ni babi nwu nkpo, batii manya ma fɛ osuɔtɔ wɔ ninnaa ni babi.
41012020	Obe onwii, babilɛma suɔtɔbi bakuɛnsĩ banwii lawɛ. Ɔkasale layɔ ɔsanko aakpi obe wɔ manayilofo ni babi.
41012021	Ɔnyɔɔfa kafɔɔ layɔ nwɔ, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ aakpi diɛ obe wɔ manko ɔsanko nwu bayilofo ni obi kuonwii. Obilɛma tiɛfa kafɔɔ labayɔ ɔsanko nwu, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ aabafe aakpi di obe wɔ manayilofo ni obi.
41012022	Ta nkpo oso bakuɛnsĩ lɛma nwu layɔ ɔsanko wɔ onwii baaloo. Bamuu lɛma baakpi di obe wɔ batalofo ni obi ku ɔsanko nwu. Yɛntɛyɛntɛ, ɔsanko nwu kafɔɔ labakpi.
41012023	Nimɔ, di dii le baakpi makple mantaka nii, owe lɛma ɔsɔfɔ di ɔsanko nwu nkpo male di obe wɔ baakuɛnsĩ lɛma nwu layɔ nwɔ ni?”
41012024	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Diele nkpo dibate saa. Lɛnya nlɛ bienu ɔlaa wɔ mmle kasɔ, diekye bieye sɛlaa se ninsi ni diɛ Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ, ee Yaa osie.
41012025	Obe wɔ di bakpi mataka nii, babate fɛ Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ di osi, nioso sɛsa ku sɛsɔfɔ dilabasinwɛ.
41012026	Kafɔɔ fɛ bakpi okple ɔtaka ɔlaa, Mose lakpana lɛsaa di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ aakyeko dibuu le niatoofiɛ ni suoto. Sɛɛ biloonyuma? Nfa aakpana alɛ, Yaa latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Ami ninle Abraham Yaa, ku Isak Yaa, ku Yakob Yaa nɛ.’
41012027	Nle mmle kotuo alɛ, nnwɔɔ ninle batii ba ninkpe ni nkpa Yaa, diele bakpi Yaa ale. Katɔkɔ ye nii, aye biɛtɛ bieyu!”
41012028	Ni diɛ kufiofa tuotɛ onwii layila ninfa aanu ɔlaa wɔ baatoobuɛ nii. Ni aanu alɛ Yesu lalolaa ɔlaa nwu kanya aadiki nwaa. Ninfɛ aatɛɛtɛ Yesu aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Kɔmɛnfiofa ninle kufinle di afiofa nwu amuu kamɛ?”
41012029	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kufiofa ko niefĩ kulenke ni amuu ninle, ‘O Israel batii, bilolaa binu! Saate Yaa onwii ko ale, lete nɔɔ kafɔɔ ko ninkpe nɛ.
41012030	Nioso dikpe nii fɛɛbɔmbɔ Saate lɛfɔ Yaa, ku otu lɛfɔ omuu, ku ninwuna lɛfɔ nimuu, ku disibu lɛfɔ nimmuu, ku osie lɛfɔ omuu.’
41012031	Kufiofa ko niekple kutikanko ni nko ninle alɛ, ‘Bɔmbɔ owo lɛfɔ fɛ mmle okle fambɔmbɔ ni suoto.’ Kufiofa kukunwii nsinnaa kulenke ni n-ya mmle.”
41012032	Ninfɛ di kufiofa tuotɛ nwu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, fɛɛkakatɛ nwaa! Nwaa dile fɛ mmle feebuɛ ni alɛ, Saate lete ninle Yaa, ni Yaa bamba kuonwii nsinnaa dilenkee ni nnwɔɔ.
41012033	Nioso dikpe ni otii lɛbɔmbɔ Yaa ku otu nɔɔ omuu ku disibu nɔɔ nimuu ku osie nɔɔ omuu. Dikpe ni kafɔɔ, ambɔmbɔ owo nɔɔ fɛ mmle okle ambɔmbɔ ni suoto nɔɔ. Dilɛ alɛ otii katikanko afiofa ya mmle anlenkee alɛ ɔɔyɔ babɔkɛɛ ku oleɔta alɛ ɔɔta Yaa.”
41012034	Diɛ Yesu lanya osuku biene wɔ di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle ladiki ni kanya, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Faakyo di Yaa kafa nwu saa.” Nni kamaa, kuonwii ditasinkpee otu aakaalɛ Yesu ɔlaa kuonwii.
41012035	Obe wɔ di Yesu latootuo ni ɔlaa biene nwu di Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ, aakaalɛ ɔlaa alɛ, “Lɛ diawa fiɛ kuufiofa batuotɛ labuɛ alɛ Kristo wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ, Dawid leyo kamɛ obi ale?
41012036	Dawid nwu omu, Ninwuna Klekle niakpaa nwɔ ni abuɛ alɛ, ‘Yaa latɔkɔ Saate nii alɛ, “Siɛ di oletanɛɛkyɛ nii, dilaase di, obe wɔ fabatakatɛsa nkpaa fantika ni di balo lɛfɔ suoto.” ’
41012037	Obe wɔ di Dawid omu lalɛɛ Kristo nwɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ alɛ Saate nii, lɛ nfɛ di Kristo nwu, makple anle nwɔ obi?” Batii kpinwu layila ninfa ku suoto lɛyɔɔ baatoonu sɛlaa se di Yesu layila aatoobuɛ nii.
41012038	Di Yesu latootuo ni batii nwu asaa, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bilolaa binyu di kufiofa batuotɛ suoto. Manklee asaa kplɛ mantookyikyii akpaka mmle baatii kasɛɛsa ma ni ku dibu.
41012039	Mammiɛ alɛ boosiɛ diɛ banɔɔfotii nsiɛkɔ di bawokalɛɛkɔ ku asaa kalekɔ di siipunu kplɛ ntũ.
41012040	Mantafaa bakpisɔfɔ kafɔɔ manfũ ma asaa amuu ninnɛɛ. Mambla fɛ balɛ baatii anu, manklɛsa ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta Yaa di akpaka. Letoko nanfi lɛma mapɔ ninlenkee batii bamuu ale!”
41012041	Yesu lakyɛ aalaasiɛ di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu ninfũ manta ni asaa, aatoonyu mmle di batii kofe mankpee ni ato di asaa ɔta lekpeesa kamɛ. Basaawɛntɛ kpinwu lata ato kplɛ alɛ bootuo suoto.
41012042	Kafɔɔ kpisɔfɔ piitɛ onwii labafe aalaakpee mplɛ nnyɔ.
41012043	Ni di Yesu lalɛɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ aasiisa aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɛ ntɔkɔ ye nlɛ, kpisɔfɔ piitɛ wɔ mmle niɛta koto alenke di batii ba bamuu niɛta ni koto kamɛ.
41012044	Diekye batii ba bamuu niɛta ni asaa, di lɛsaawɛ lɛma kamɛ nle ninlɛ ma ni bɛɛyɔ bɛɛbata. Kafɔɔ ɔsanko wɔ mmle di dipii nɔɔ kamɛ, lɛsaa le ninkpe nwɔ aale ansiɛ ni nkpa nimuu ɛɛyɔ ɛɛbata nɛ.”
41013001	Obe wɔ di Yesu ladie ni di Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ oosifi nii, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ onwii latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, nyu afuɔ nwaa ya bɛɛyɔ beetofo ni ayo ya kplɛ ku mmle beetofo nya ni. Diɔlɛ onyu lo!”
41013002	Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Lolaa ayo biene ya mmle fanyu nwaa, diekye afuɔ ya mmle kuninwii dilɔɔbabu ditika leewo suoto alɛ blɔbabiɛ nya bakpakpaa bawii!”
41013003	Di obe wɔ di Yesu lasifi aalaasiɛ ni di Nnɔnyi Awoso Kobokote suoto yi, nfa aanyu Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu di osuku kakyɛ nyɔɔfa. Ninfɛ di Petro ku Yakobo ku Yohane ku Andrea lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ buɛɛ baabakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ,
41013004	“Saate, tɔkɔ wo, ɔmɛmbe di nle mmle mawa? Be nimale dituosaa le bubayɔ muntofo bulɛ, obe nwu ntoowo ni?”
41013005	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bilolaa binyu nwaa alɛ otii kuonwii lakyɔnkyɔ ye.
41013006	Batii kpinwu mayɔ leyooto nii manwa ɔkyɛ lee, mamatɔkɔ ye alɛ, ‘Ami dile,’ man-yɔ mankyɔnkyɔ batii kpinwu.
41013007	Bitanta diabla ye ɔkpɛ se bienu kakpɛ kudu di ɔlɔɔkɔ lee ee kakyonkɔ. Dikpe ni asaa ya mmle okle lɛwa. Kafɔɔ dietuo alɛ kayi kalookɔ ntoowo.
41013008	Nnle mataka baawo suoto, sɛka nlekɔ kafɔɔ mataka baawo suoto. Nsɔ matũkũ di aba aba. Aka siene kafɔɔ makpɛ di aba aba. Asaa ya mmle nte fɛ mmle lɛɛmɛ nkye kasɔ nintoonu ni mɛlakatɛ nintɔɔtɛ nii.
41013009	“Dikpe nii, bielolaa bienyu. Babamufũ ye mansifiko nkankɔ. Babapɛ ye di Yuda batii bawo nsiisakɔ. Ta ami oso, bibayila di baka ku batunletɛ anu, mintɔkɔ ma Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo.
41013010	Kafɔɔ fiɛ di kayi kaloo mawa nii, dikpe nii beebuɛ Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu bɛɛtɔkɔ batii bamuu kaayi.
41013011	Di obe wɔ babamufũ ye mansifiko ni kakankɔ, bitambu diisi di ɔlaa wɔ biofe ni obuɛ olesakatũ. Se obe nwu lewo, biebuɛ ɔlaa lele di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle mata ye ni. Diekye diele aye bamu ɔlaa bibabuɛ. Ninwuna Klekle nimata ye ɔlaa wɔ bibabuɛ nii.
41013012	“Batii mayɔ babilɛma manta alɛ balo. Balofotɛ kafɔɔ mabla nkpo di babi lɛma suoto. Babi mataka di balofotɛ lɛma suoto alɛ balo ma.
41013013	Batii bamuu makyidi ye ta ami oso. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ niekpee otu ɛɛlaase ni kaayɛntɛlekɔ, kamawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
41013014	“Binu ɔlaa wɔ matɔkɔye ni nwaa obebe biɛnya abusufɔɔsaa yɛkɛle n-yɛ di lɛba le ninankaatɛ alɛ aayila nii, ni biɛta batii ba ninkpe ni di Yudia batoso basifi abokote osi balaawofa.
41013015	Otii wɔ kafɔɔ nintika ni di leyo nɔɔ osi, atantɔkɔ alɛ oosoo anwa amayɔ lɛsalɛsa nɔɔ leeyo kamɛ ansifiko.
41013016	Otii wɔ ninkpe ni koofe, atasinkple aatɔkɔ alɛ ooyie ammayɔ akleesaa nɔɔ leeyo.
41013017	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, dibatɛ ninwɛ osie ninta basanko ba ninlaka ni amɛ ku mba nikɔta babi nyɛɛfu nii.
41013018	Bipɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa bilɛ, obe nwu kutanwa di lɛwɔɔfɔ obe!
41013019	Diekye dibuo le nimawa ni diɛ obe nwu kamɛ malenkee nle okle nintɔwa diɛbafe ni di obe wɔ kaayi lakye ni kasɔ diɛbase ni diɛ miɛ dii le mmle. Dibuo le mmle okle kafɔɔ dilabasinwa diidii.
41013020	Kafɔɔ Saate lɛkɔkɔlɛ ayi nwu nkpo. Se diele nkpo ɛɛbla se otii kuonwii dilababu. Kafɔɔ ta batii nɔɔ ba eediki ɛɛta ni suoto oso, ɛɛkɔkɔlɛ ayi nwu.
41013021	“Nioso se otii owo lɛtɔkɔ fɔ alɛ, ‘Nyu! Nnya Kristo ninfũ!’ ee ‘Nyɔɔ ninfa!’, tanfũ nwɔ faanu!
41013022	Diekye batii mataka manlaa mambuɛ alɛ mma ninle Kristo nwu nkpo, bawo kafɔɔ mabuɛ alɛ Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ bale. Bababla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni sɛkpɛ ku atuosaa ate ate mantuo alɛ, nse dialɛ yi, baayɔ mankyɔnkyɔ bia batii ba di Yaa lediki eese ni lete.
41013023	Nioso bilolaa binyu! Nkpo oso ntoole katũ lɛtɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle simuu fiɛ di obe nwu mawo nɛ.
41013024	“Ayi ya nimawa ni diibuo nwu sɛmaa, ‘Kufĩ mata ditunu, kɔwɛntɛ kafɔɔ dilabapu.
41013025	Awɛntlɛbi kafɔɔ makpa ankye osi, osi asaa kafɔɔ matididi di aba ya atika nii.’
41013026	“Nni kamaa batii manya Otii Obi nwu makyɔɔ di alokonkyɛ kamɛ ɔɔwa ku osie kplɛ di leklekle kamɛ.
41013027	Abakyesee Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ kaayi ka mmle nkyakakɔ nwu nkpo nna, mansiisa batii nɔɔ ba eediki ni mankyeko kaasɔ disi le diɛlase ni diisi le.
41013028	“Bitekete lɛsaa bikyeko kolewoso suoto. Nse kuodie sɛlamii fɔle kuodie atoto kuokpee afata fɔle kamaa, bietofo bilɛ kanto ɔnɔɔ bee nfɛ kowo.
41013029	Nkpo kafɔɔ se nfɛ diɛwa alɛ asaa ya lɛtɔkɔ ye ni nfɛ kɔkyɔɔ, ni bietofo bilɛ ni kayi kalookɔ nfɛ kɔtɛɛtɛɛ katoodu ni kayokontũ lɛfɔ tintĩ!
41013030	Nwaa kɔta ye mintofo nlɛ asaa ya mmle amuu mawa fiɛ di kale lee batii bamuu maloo okpi.
41013031	Osi ku kasɔ kamuu mafe, kafɔɔ ɔlaa nii nnwu, kulabafe diidii.
41013032	“Otii kuonwii dieye dii nwu nkpo ku obe wɔ kamɛ dibale nii. Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ ba ninkpe ni di osi dieye. Bia Obi nwu nkpo omu dieye, Ote lete ninnye.
41013033	Bilolaa binyu, biɛta anu lee ate kesekese, ta bieye dii le diɛ obe nwu mawo nii.
41013034	Ote di bate fɛ mmle diɛ otii ndie ni di okpoo nɔɔ alɛ ɔɔkyɛ ni osuku, andiɛ ni bakpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ leeyo. Aata obiala ɔkpɛ wɔ abatɔɔbla nii. Nni kamaa, aatɔkɔ otii wɔ nikonyu nwɔ ni ayo kayoko kplɛ alɛ alolaa kayoko anyu nwaa.
41013035	“Ta nninkpo oso ayee bilolaa suoto. Diekye bieye obe wɔ diɛ Saate lee mawa ammabuo nii. Diafuo ole alɛ kakũ, ee nkyɛntɛɛ, ee obe wɔ diɛ bakɔɔkɔ mbo nii, ee oyita.
41013036	Se loo eefua ɛɛwa, mmle ninamate alɛ ɛɛbatũ ye bisi biɔkyɔsĩi nii.
41013037	Lɛsaa le kɔtɔkɔ ye ni ninfũ, nni nwu ko nkle kɔtɔkɔ batii bamuu nɛ. Nni oso kafɔɔ bialolaa suoto nɛ.”
41014001	Ditoobu ayi anyɔ fiɛ di Yuda batii male ni ayi lɛma ya manlɛɛ ni Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii ku Bloblo wɔ Ninantaka Ni Olebee, man-yɔ mannyuma ni odie lɛma di Egipte. Olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ lawɛ ninfa baatoomiɛ osuku wɔ baawofa mamufũ Yesu manlo nii.
41014002	Ni baabuɛ baatɔkɔ bawo alɛ, “Ditanwa alɛ buɔbla lɛsaa le mmle di ayi ya buole ni kamɛ. Se diele nkpo, batii manya ɔblɔ mantaka wo di suoto.”
41014003	Yesu lawɛ di Betania okpoo diɛ Simon wɔ niafiɛ ni ofiɛ sɛɛle leyo. Ɔbe wɔ di Yesu lasiɛ aatoole ni alesaa, ɔsanko onwii lawa nfa. Aaklee difuɔ kylɔkylɔ lebo ninwii di nnɔnyi kɔnɔkɔnɔ be niefũ ni kɔya osie kanya lasiɛ ni kaamɛ. Ɔsanko wɔ mmle latikiti lebo nwu aanyɛɛnɛ nnɔnyi nwu aakpete di Yesu disi.
41014004	Lɛsaa nwu lafiɛ batii ba niayila ni ninfa bawo ɔblɔ diata baabuɛ alɛ, “Be lɛsaa oso ɛɛlalaasa nnɔnyi be mmle, nkpo okle?
41014005	Aafuo ɔyɔ osunsũ anwɛ lɛlɛɛ nɔɔ ɔkpɛ koto an-yɔ anta bapiitɛ.” Ta nnle mmle oso, baasĩ ɔlaa baatɔɔ ninfa osie kanya.
41014006	Kafɔɔ Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bidiɛ nwɔ! Be oso biokpee ɔsanko wɔ mmle kubuɛ? Lɛsaa biene ninle nle mmle ɛɛbla ɛɛtɛɛ nii nɛ.
41014007	Bapiitɛ nsi ye kaamɛ obe lele. Obe lele mimbɔ biafuo ma ɔkyakaako. Kafɔɔ ami, diele obe lele kamawɛ ye kaamɛ.
41014008	Ɔsanko wɔ lɛbla lɛsaa le aafuo ni ɔbla. Ɛɛyɔ nnɔnyi kɔnɔkɔnɔ be mmle eekpete mi, oololaa mi anta okookaa bee nii.
41014009	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, kakɔ lele beeyie ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle lɛkya di kayi ka mmle kamɛ yi, lɛsaa le di ɔsanko wɔ mmle lɛbla nii, bababuɛ nwu man-yɔ mannyuma nwɔ.”
41014010	Ninfɛ di Yuda Iskariot, dile ni Yesu basaateketetɛ onwii lɛma, lakyɛ olebatatɛ banɔɔfo nfũ aalaatɔkɔ ma alɛ abadiki Yesu anta ma nɛ.
41014011	Suoto layɔɔ ma nwaa diɛ ɔlaa wɔ aabatɔkɔ ma ni oso, mma kafɔɔ baabuɛ alɛ babatɔɔ koto. Nioso Yuda nfɛ lawɛ ninfa aatoomiɛ osuku wɔ suoto abafe andiki Yesu anta ma nii.
41014012	Diɛ Bloblo wɔ Ninantaka ni Dii ole kamɛ, di dii kasale le suoto manlo ni Okpi Diisi Ofe lefosobi, Yesu basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔfɛ foomiɛ falɛ bulaawa Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii ole alesaa nwu buta fɔ?”
41014013	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki banyɔ kaamɛ lɛma aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bikyɛ okpoo, osuɔtɔ onwii mawa amakyakako ye atuka ntu dibukii. Bitikanko nwɔ biɛlaabuo leyo le kamɛ ababuo ni.
41014014	Biɛkaalɛ leyo nwu saate bilɛ, ‘Saatuotɛ alɛ bukaalɛ fɔ nii, lɛmɛnyo kamɛ di ami ku basaateketetɛ nii, bubasiɛ munle Okpi Diisi Ofe alesaa?’
41014015	Abatuo ye leyo dibinte ninwii beetofo beetika ni di osi, nfũ beelolaa, beese ni asiɛsaa. Biwa mmiɛ dii nwu alesaa ninfa bita wo.”
41014016	Basaateketetɛ ba ladie baasifi okpoo nwu, baalaanya lɛsaa biala fɛ mmle di Yesu latɔkɔ ma ni. Ni baawa Okpi Diisi Ofe alesaa nwu ninfa baase nɛ.
41014017	Obe wɔ di kɔtɔɔfɔ lawo nii, Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu lefosi banyɔ lasifi baalaabuo nfa.
41014018	Obe wɔ nfɛ baasiɛ baatoole ni alesaa di opunu katũ, Yesu labuɛ alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii onwii kaamɛ lee madiki mi anta, nũ busi buole alesaa mmle.”
41014019	Ɔlaa nwu lata ma disibu, ninfɛ baatɔɔkaalɛ nwɔ onwii onwii alɛ, “Nwaa, n-ye nlɛ diele ami falaka, sɛɛ ami dile?”
41014020	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Onwii leefosi banyɔ lee kamɛ dile. Munko nwɔ niekpee kɔnɛɛ kaasɛfɛ ninfũ nɛ.
