41014021	Ami, Otii Obi nwu nkpo, makpi fɛ mmle okle di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ labuɛ nii. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ nimadiki ami, Otii Obi nwu nkpo, anta nii, ayɔɔsa. Nse bia batanlofo nwɔ, nse dilɛ nwɔ dilenke!”
41014022	Di obe wɔ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nsi boole ni alesaa yi, ni aayɔ bloblo nɛ. Ni aapɛ Yaa sɛfa, aafee nwɔ, aayɔ aata basaateketetɛ nɔɔ, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bifũ bile. Nle mmle ninle suoto nii sina nɛ.”
41014023	Ninfɛ aayɔ opũ, ni aapɛ Yaa sɛfa, aayɔ aata bamuu lɛma baanyi.
41014024	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nle mmle ninle ntɔ nii be bɛɛyɔ beese ni kaanya di Yaa kanya ninii le eenii ni ku batii nɛ. Beewii mi kaasɔ di batii kpinwu disi.
41014025	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, noosinwa nta be mmle onyi diɛlase di dii le makple nyi ni nta fɔle diɛ Yaa sɛka kalekɔ.”
41014026	Ninfɛ baasa onu onwii baatansa Yaa, ni baadie baasifi Nnɔnyi Awoso Kobokote suoto nɛ.
41014027	Nfa di Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Bamuu lee bibatoso mindiɛ mi. Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ labuɛ alɛ, ‘Yaa malo bafosokpatɛ nwu nkpo se bafoso nwu bamuu ntɔɔsamii.’
41014028	Kafɔɔ nse beekple bɛɛsɛnkɛsɛɛ bɛɛwako nkpa kamɛ yi, male ye katũ nsifi Galilea.”
41014029	Ninfɛ di Petro latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Mintɛ bawo nii bamuu matoso mandiɛ fɔ yi, ami diidii namatoso ndiɛ fɔ!”
41014030	Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ Petro alɛ, “Kɔta fɔ fantofo nwaa nlɛ miɛ kakyɛ fiɛ di kɔɔkɔ mabo ni sɛnyɔ afɔ omu fababuɛ sitiɛ simu falɛ faaye mi.”
41014031	Petro lakple aatɔkɔ nwɔ osie kanya aalenkee lɛkasale alɛ, “Nse bia olo alɛ booloe munko fɔ yi, diidii namabuɛ nlɛ ninye fɔ.” Basaateketetɛ bule bamuu kafɔɔ labuɛ nkpo.
41014032	Nni kamaa baalaadu lɛba le bɔɔlɛɛ ni Getsemane. Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Bisiɛ ninfũ ninaapɛ ɔlaa nta Yaa.”
41014033	Ni aakpaa Petro ku Yakobo ku Yohane aasifiko nɛ. Otu latɔɔpɛ nwɔ, aakyako otũtũkũ kpakpa.
41014034	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Konu dibuo di otu nii kamɛ osie kanya fɛle kukpi ninkle mi. Aye bisiɛ ninfũ bietoonyu.”
41014035	Aakyɛ ni sitũ kɛɛkɛ, aapɛ akunkyi, ni aafuusa anu kaasɔ aatikiti Ote lekoto alɛ, “Se dialɛ, ni, dibuo obe wɔ mmle dife mi.”
41014036	Ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Teete nii! Fanfuo asaa amuu ɔbla. Se feetuna, faatekete dibuo opũ wɔ mmle di suoto nii. Kafɔɔ tambla nle ninlɛ mi nii, bla dibiesaa lɛfɔ.”
41014037	Ninfɛ aakple aawa basaateketetɛ nɔɔ batiɛ nwu nfũ, aabatũ ma bɔɔkyɔsĩi. Ni aatɔkɔ Petro alɛ, “Simon, sɛkyɔsĩ bikle? Ni bilaafuo osiɛ otoonyunkoe lebombo ninwii pɛ?”
41014038	Ni aakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bita anu lee ate kesekese biɛpɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa mmle minaabuo ni diɛ ɔsɔ onyu kamɛ. Ninwuna komiɛ ɔbla, kafɔɔ suoto sina nnaa osie.”
41014039	Aakple aasifi aalaapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa fɛ mmle aabuɛ ni lɛkasale.
41014040	Obe wɔ aakple aawa ni basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo nfũ, aabanya ma baatɔɔkyɔsĩi, batafuo bia anu otikiti. Nioso batafuo ɔlaa kuonwii obuɛ ɔtɔkɔ Yesu.
41014041	Aakple aawa ni ditiɛfa, aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Sɛkyɔsĩ biɔkyɔsĩi mintɛ ɔnyɛɛ nkpo nɛ? Nfɛ dilɛ! Obe ntoowo! Batɔɔyɔ ami, Otii Obi nwu, beekpee diɛ bakpileblatɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ. Binyu, nfɛ bakyɛ diɛ osuku bɔɔwa.
41014042	Bitaka buɔlaakyakako ma. Binyu! Otii wɔ niediki mi ɛɛta ni nleko ma katũ.”
41014043	Yesu lakple aayila aatɔɔkakatɛ ko ma fiɛ di Yuda wɔ ninle ni lefosi batii banyɔ nwu nkpo onwii lɛma lawa. Batii dikudi le di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ ku okpoo banɔɔfo ladiki ni latikanko nwɔ baatɔɔwa. Baaklee nwosoku ku mpamii.
41014044	Otii wɔ niadiki Yesu aata ni latɔkɔ ma aatɛ alɛ, “Otii wɔ kamaminiko mbla ni atuu yi, nnwɔɔ ninle nwɔ biowolaa ni nɛ. Biemufũ nwɔ, biɛkpaa nwɔ bisifiko, biɛta anu lee atika nwɔ di suoto.”
41014045	Obe wɔ diɛ Yuda labadu ni nfa, ni aakpukuti aatɛɛtɛ Yesu, aalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ!” Ni aaminiko nwɔ aabla nwɔ aatuu nɛ.
41014046	Ninfɛ baamufũ Yesu nɛ, baakle nwɔ kpinkpĩ.
41014047	Kafɔɔ batii ba niayila ni di Yesu ɔlɔɔkɔ onwii lɛma ladiki kapamii nɔɔ aasafɔ Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo kpɛmblatɛ onwii kotoko aakpa nɛ.
41014048	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Be oso di mpamii ku nwosoku bikle biɛwa mi omufũ fɛle kpileblatɛ nɔɔfo nle?
41014049	Lasiɛ di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo dii biala latootuo batii asaa, kafɔɔ bitatɔkɔ bilɛ biomufũ mi. Kafɔɔ fɛ mmle di Yaa Kɔkpana Klekle lebuɛ nii, dikpe nii, ninwa kaanya.”
41014050	Ninfɛ diɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ bamuu latoso baadiɛ nwɔ nɛ.
41014051	Di obe wɔ mmle kamɛ, okosopo onwii lakpa kabulɛɛ fututu lete aatikanko Yesu aatoonyu ɔsaabla nwu omuu. Basaanyuntɛ nwu lamiɛ alɛ boomufũ okosopo nwu. Kafɔɔ kabulɛɛ fututu nɔɔ nwu ko baafuo ɔwɛ. Diekye aasikitisa suoto,
41014052	aadie ma ninnɛɛ. Ninfɛ aatoso aasifi ku lɛkyɔtɔ nɛ. Aadiɛko ma kabulɛɛ nɔɔ nwu.
41014053	Ninfɛ baakpaa Yesu baasifiko Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo leyo nɛ. Nfa diɛ Yaa olebatatɛ ku okpoo banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ lasi nɛ.
41014054	Petro latikanko nwɔ sɛɛmaa fanfa aalaabuo Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo nwu leyo kaflɔnkɔ di bawo kalɛɛkɔ. Aalaasiɛ di asaa banyuntɛ ɔlɔɔkɔ, aatɔɔwɔfɔ ɔtɔ.
41014055	Olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku bakantɛ nwu nkpo niawɛ ni ninfa bamuu lamiɛ alɛ boobudi kanya mantika di Yesu suoto mmle baafuo nwɔ ni olo. Kafɔɔ batawɛ ɔlaa kuonwii di suoto nɔɔ.
41014056	Batii kpinwu lababuɛ sɛlaa baatika nwɔ di suoto kafɔɔ nnya lɛma ditabla kanwii.
41014057	Batii bawo kafɔɔ labayila baalaa sɛlaa kuafunu baatika di Yesu suoto alɛ,
41014058	“Buanu aabuɛ alɛ, ‘Mabiɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ ka mmle bɛɛyɔ nnɛɛ beetofo nii. Diɛ ayi atiɛ kamaa, makple ntofo lɛbamba ninanle batii nietofo nii.’ ”
41014059	Batii ba mmle kafɔɔ, nnya lɛma ditabla kanwii di sɛlaa se baabuɛ ni di suoto nɔɔ.
41014060	Ninfɛ di Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo lataka aayila siitũ lɛma aakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Feenu ɔlaa wɔ beebuɛ ni di suoto lɛfɔ? Ɔmɛnlaa ninkpe fɔ fambuɛ?”
41014061	Kafɔɔ Yesu lamaasa kanya atabuɛ ɔlaa kuonwii. Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo nwu lakple aakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Kristo nwu di Yaa lɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ ale ni Yaa Klekle Obi nɛ?”
41014062	Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ami nɛ. Diɛyɔ di nua diesifi nii, bibanya Otii Obi nwu nkpo nsi di Yaa wɔ ninlenke ni oletanɛɛkyɛ. Bibanyɔɔ kafɔɔ eekye osi ɔɔwa di alokonkyɛ kamɛ!”
41014063	Ninfa nwu, Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo niabɛ awu nɔɔ ku ɔblɔ aabuɛ alɛ, “Falɛ obee ye? Diesinfĩ alɛ otii kuonwii kayila ɔlaa owo kamaa!
41014064	Bienu mbusuo ɔlaa wɔ eebuɛ ni di Yaa suoto? Ɔmɛnlaa ninkpe ye mimbuɛ?” Ni bamuu lɛma baabuɛ alɛ, eekpi lɛpɔɔ, dikpe nii beelo nwɔ.
41014065	Batii bawo kaamɛ lɛma lakyako sita otufa okpete Yesu. Baanii nwɔ anu, baakyako nwɔ ɔpɛ ku nnɛɛ lɛma. Ni baatɔɔtɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Faye ni lɛsaa biala, tɔkɔ wo otii wɔ niɛpɛ fɔ ni!” Ninfɛ di basaanyuntɛ nwu kafɔɔ lakpaa nwɔ baalaapɛ nɛ.
41014066	Di obe nwu kamɛ Petro lakple aawɛ di bawo kalɛɛkɔ nwu fiɛ di Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo kpɛmblatɛ sankobi nɔɔ onwii lawa nfa.
41014067	Obe wɔ aanya alɛ Petro nsi ɔɔwɔfɔ ni ɔtɔ, ni aakyako nwɔ onyu tuwĩi aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔɔ faatikanko Yesu Nasaret Otii nwu!”
41014068	Ninfɛ di Petro labɛ ɔnyasie aabuɛ alɛ, “Obeeye? Ami noonu ɔlaa wɔ foobuɛ ni ninfũ kasɔ!” Ninfɛ aataka aadie di kayoko nɛ. Nfanwu aadu ni kayoko, kɔɔkɔ niabo.
41014069	Okpeele wɔ mmle lakple aabanya Petro ninfa, ni aakple aatɔɔtɔkɔ batii ba niayila ni ninfa alɛ, “Onwii lɛma ale!”
41014070	Kafɔɔ Petro lakple abe ɔnyasie. Ditale obe fiɛ diɛ batii ba niayila ni ninfa latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Flafuo ɔnyasie obe falɛ diele onwii lɛma fale diekye afɔɔ Galilea kasɔ feekye.”
41014071	Ninfɛ di Petro labuɛ alɛ, “Lɛka nlɛ nwaako kobuɛ! Yaa ananfi mi kootoko nse ɔlaa kɔlaa! Ninye osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle ɔlaa biobuɛ nii!”
41014072	Nfanwu kɔɔkɔ niabo lɛnyɔɔfa, ninfɛ di Petro lanyuma mmle di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Fiɛ di kɔɔkɔ mabo ni sɛnyɔ, fababuɛ sitiɛ falɛ faaye mi.” Obe wɔ diabudi nwɔ nii, aawi kaku.
41015001	Dii nwu kuyitatũ Yaa olebatatɛ lakyakako okpoo banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ kuɛ bakantɛ bamuu. Obe wɔ batoosiɛ beebu ni ɔlaa nwu disi ku mmle baabla ko nwɔ ni ɔkpɛ, baanii Yesu baakpaa nwɔ baasifiko Roma abaa ɔnɔɔfo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Pilato ɔkyɛ.
41015002	Nfa diɛ Pilato lakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Yuda batii Ɔka nwu nɛ?” Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nnwu fatoobuɛ nɛ.”
41015003	Yaa olebatatɛ nwu layɔ sɛlaa kpinwu baatika di Yesu suoto.
41015004	Nioso Pilato lakple aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Floobuɛ ɔlaa kuonwii? Kyɔɔ atoko faanu sɛlaa se boobuɛ fɔ ni di suoto!”
41015005	Kafɔɔ Yesu ditabɛ kanya, nioso diabla Pilato ɔkpɛ!
41015006	Di Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii ole biala yi, Pilato ndiɛ Yuda batii leyo batentɛ lele, baatii nwu lɛkaalɛ ni anta ma.
41015007	Di obe nwu kamɛ, baamufũ osuɔtɔ onwii bɔɔlɛɛ ni Baraba baalaatɛ leeyo ku batii nɔɔ. Ta kudu lɛma okpee ku batii olo di obe wɔ baataka baayila ni di Roma batii ɔka suoto.
41015008	Obe wɔ baatii labasi nii, baanyumasa Pilato leyo batentɛ ba andiɛ antɔɔta ma ni obe lele di dii nwu ole kamɛ.
41015009	Ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Biomiɛ bilɛ ndiɛ Yuda Batii Ɔka nwu nta ye?”
41015010	Pilato lakaalɛ ma nkpo ta aatofo alɛ onunsɛɛ kanya oso di Yaa olebatatɛ nwu lakpaa Yesu baawako nwɔ.
41015011	Kafɔɔ Yaa olebatatɛ nwu lamunikĩisa batii dikudi nwu disibu mmle diɛ Pilato kadiɛ Baraba bonwu anta ma nii.
41015012	Pilato lakple aakaalɛ batii dikudi nwu alɛ, “Obe biomiɛ bilɛ mbla otii wɔ biɔlɛɛ ni Yuda batii Ɔka nwu ninfũ?”
41015013	Ninfɛ baayiisa kudu baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Pɛ nwɔ sibuɛ fakaasa koowoso suoto!”
41015014	Kafɔɔ Pilato lakple aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ɔmɛnkpile ɛɛbla fiɛ?” Kafɔɔ mia nfɛ baakple baatɔɔfaa osie kanya baatoobuɛ alɛ, “Pɛ nwɔ sibuɛ fakaasa koowoso suoto!”
41015015	Ta Pilato komiɛ alɛ suoto siyɔɔ ma ni oso, aadiɛ Baraba aata ma. Ni aata baapɛ Yesu nwaa ku mpile, ni aayɔ nwɔ aakpee ma ninnɛɛ alɛ balaapɛ nwɔ sibuɛ bakaasa koowoso suoto nɛ.
41015016	Bakpɛtɛ nwu lakpaa Yesu baasifiko Roma batii abaa banɔɔfo leyo diɛ bawo kalɛɛkɔ, ni baalɛɛ bakpɛtɛ bule alɛ bawa nɛ.
41015017	Ninfɛ baayɔ awu sɛɛle ya niefũ ni kɔya wua baakpa nwɔ fɛ ɔka, ni baabla sɛkansi lɛkakoto baatũkũsɔɔ nɛ.
41015018	Ni baayila baatookpee nwɔ sinunsɔ alɛ, “Yii yiiduu! Yuda batii Ɔka, asiɛ nkpa aklɛ!”
41015019	Baayɔ kawesee baatɔɔpɛ nwɔ diisi, baatufa sita baakpete nwɔ di suoto. Ninfɛ baapɛ akunkyi kaatũ nɔɔ baawakosa asi kasɔ baatɔɔ.
41015020	Obe wɔ batooloo nwɔ ni ɔma, baadiki nwɔ awu sɛɛle nwu di suoto baakplesa awu nɔɔ baakpee nwɔ. Ninfɛ baakpaa nwɔ baasifiko alɛ bɔɔlaapɛ nwɔ sibuɛ mankaasa koowoso suoto nɛ.
41015021	Obe wɔ baatoofe nii, baakyakako osuɔtɔ onwii bɔɔlɛɛ ni Simon, aakye kakpayotũ kanwii ɔɔwa Yerusalem. Ninfɛ di bakpɛtɛ nwu nkpo layila nwɔ di suoto alɛ afũ Yesu kowoso nwu nkpo atuka nɛ. Simon nwu lakye Kireni kasɔ. Babi nɔɔ kafɔɔ niale Aleksandro ku Rufo.
41015022	Ni baakpaa Yesu baalaadu lɛba le manlɛɛ ni Golgota lɛɛsɔdiki ninle ni alɛ Otii Disi Dikufi.
41015023	Nfa baayɔ nta be bɛɛkpɔtɔɔsa ni ku kɔfa lonle nimata alɛ ɔlɔbanu ni dibuo baatɔɔ alɛ anyi, kafɔɔ Yesu ditanyi.
41015024	Ninfɛ di bakpɛtɛ nwu nkpo lapɛ nwɔ sibuɛ baakaasa koowoso suoto nɛ. Nni kamaa, baayɔ awu nɔɔ baasɛ bawo di obe wɔ baawii ni atrebi baatofo n-ya di obiala lɛma kayɔ nii.
41015025	Baapɛ Yesu sibuɛ baakaasa koowoso suoto ku oyita elomu ɛnaasĩ.
41015026	Baapɛ kataaboo kakyɛɛ sibuɛ baakaasa nwɔ diɛ lɛkantosi baakpana lɛsaa le oso baalo nwɔ nii alɛ, “Nnwɔɔ ninle Yuda Batii Ɔka nɛ.”
41015027	Baapɛ bayu banyɔ kafɔɔ sibuɛ baakaasa di awoso suoto diɛ Yesu ɔlɔɔkɔ. Onwii lakaa diɛ oletanɛɛkyɛ nɔɔ, onwii kafɔɔ lakaa diɛ ɔmɛntukyɛ.
41015028	Diawa ninkpo fɛle mmle baakpana ni diɛ Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “Baalo nwɔ manko bakpileblatɛ.”
41015029	Batii ba niatoofe ni ninfa bamuu latũkunsa asi, baatufa Yesu baabuɛ alɛ, “Ɛhɛɛ! Afɔ niabuɛ falɛ fababiɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ ka mmle, fanse ni letofo di ayi atiɛ kamɛ nɛ!
41015030	Soo koowoso nwu fawa, faafũ suoto lɛfɔ nkpa buonyu!”
41015031	41 Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ nwu nkpo lama nwɔ baatoobuɛ kaamɛ lɛma alɛ, “Aafũ batii bamba nkpa kafɔɔ oloofuo suoto nɔɔ odiki!
41015032	Se nwɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Yuda Batii Ɔka, dile ni Kristo wɔ di Yaa lɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ ale nwaako, aasoo di kowoso suoto awa buofũ nwu bunu!” Batii ba banyɔ baakaasa ni di awoso suoto ku nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ latufa nwɔ.
41015033	Kakũ lefosi elomu ɛnyɔ lebe, kayi kamuu lawɔfɔ. Dialaase di kɔtɔɔfɔ elomu etiɛ kamɛ.
41015034	Di kɔtɔɔfɔ elomu etiɛ kamɛ okle, Yesu lafaa osie kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Lɛsɔdiki ninle alɛ, “Yaa nii, Yaa nii, be oso feediɛ mi nnɛɛ nkpo?”
41015035	Batii ba bawo niayila ni ninfa, baanu ni ɔlaa nwu nkpo labuɛ alɛ, “Bikyɔɔ atoko! Ɔɔlɛɛ Elia.”
41015036	Nfanwu onwii kaamɛ lɛma latoso aalaayɔ oleteku aanyɔ di nta nyankale kamɛ, aayɔ aatũ di owoso suoto, aamiɛ alɛ ɔɔyɔ ankyɔɔ nwɔ annyi. Kafɔɔ batii bule labuɛ alɛ, “Bita buyila buonyu, nse Elia kamawa amadiki nwɔ di kowoso suoto!”
41015037	Yesu lakple aafaa osie kanya ninfɛ aakpi nɛ.
41015038	Nfanwu, dibula le ninsaka ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ niabɛ di akyuu anyɔ diakye di osi dialaase kaasɔ.
41015039	Di bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo wɔ niayila ni di kowoso nwu katũ lanu mmle di Yesu lafaa fiɛ aakpi nii, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Nwaako, Yaa Obi ninle otii wɔ mmle!”
41015040	Basanko bawo kafɔɔ layila kaakyonkɔ baatoonyu asaa ya niatɔɔwa nii. Bawo niale Maria Magdalene ku Salome ku Maria wɔ babi ninle ni Yakobo bisɔ ku Yose.
41015041	Di obe wɔ di Yesu lawɛ ni di Galilea kasɔ, mma niatootikanko nwɔ baatɔɔ kyakaako nwɔ nɛ. Basanko kpinwu ba latikanko nwɔ baakyɛ ni Yerusalem ke layila ninfa.
41015042	Asaa ya mmle amuu lawa fiɛ diadu Yuda batii Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi. Nfɛ diofe ni kɔɔtɔɔfɔ,
41015043	Yuda batii ɔnɔɔfotii onwii bɔɔlɛɛ ni Yosef eekye ni Arimatea, lakpee otu aakyɛ aalanya Roma batii ɔnɔɔfo Pilato. Yosef wɔ mmle ninle otii wɔ niatookpee ni osie diɛ Yaa sɛka kalekɔ ɔwabee nɛ. Obe wɔ aadu ni Pilato nfũ, aatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ atɔɔ osuku aalaayɔ Yesu kpi alaakookaa, fiɛ di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi diwo.
41015044	Diabla Pilato ɔkpɛ obe wɔ aanu alɛ Yesu lawolaa ni okpi nkpo. Nioso aalɛɛ bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo wɔ niayila ni kaanya ninfa aakaalɛ nwɔ aanu nkaakyonkɔse nwaa Yesu ntookpi.
41015045	Di ɔnɔɔfo nwu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ kute ni nkpo, Pilato lata Yosef osuku alɛ alaayɔ kpi nwu akookaa.
41015046	Ninfɛ di Yosef lasifi aalaayɔ Yesu kpi nwu nkpo, ni aayɔ dibula fɔle le aaya ni aamiminisa nwu di suoto nɛ. Ni aayɔ aalaakookaa di ofuɔntuu kamɛ beekutu ni di kabokotee ɔlɔɔkɔ. Ninfɛ aamunusa difuɔ aatĩi ofuɔntuu nwu kanya nɛ.
41015047	Obe nwu kamɛ, Maria Magdalene ku Maria dile ni Yosef ɔya layila baatonyu lɛba le baakookaa ni Yesu.
41016001	Kaleesɛ dile ni Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi kɔtɔɔfɔ, Maria Magdalene ku Maria dile ni Yakobo ɔya ku Salome lakyɛ baalaaya kɔfa kɔnɔkɔnɔ alɛ babalaafifia di Yesu kpi suoto.
41016002	Nioso kaasɛ ni Kɔsida kolesɛtũ, baataka baakyɛ di ɔkya katũ.
41016003	-
41016004	Baatoofe nii baatɔɔkaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Owe bubawɛ abamunusa difuɔ le kplɛ di akya kanya anta wo?” Baakaalɛ bawo ta difuɔ nwu lamuɔ nwaa. Kafɔɔ baadu ni nfa, baanya alɛ batoomunusa difuɔ nwu beekyisa.
41016005	Nioso baabuo ni di ɔkya nwu kamɛ, baanya alɛ okosopo onwii nsi diɛ oletanɛɛkyɛ. Aaklee abula fututu! Ɔfɔɔ lasifi ma.
41016006	Ninfɛ di okosopo nwu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitanyɛkɛ. N-ye nlɛ Yesu Nasaret Otii wɔ baakasa ni koowoso suoto biowolaa. Anaa ninfũ! Atɔɔtaka, akpe nkpa! Binyu! Nnya nfũ baatɛ nwɔ ni.
41016007	Nioso bitɔɔkyɛ biɛlaa tɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ku Petro bilɛ, ‘Yesu ntoole ye katũ oofe Galilea kasɔ. Nfa bibanyɔɔ nɛ, fɛ mmle aatɔkɔ ye aatɛ nii.’ ”
41016008	Diabla basanko ba ɔkpɛ, ni baakyɛ di ɔkya nwu katũ ku lɛyɛkɛ baatoso baasifi nɛ. Baakyɛ di osuku baatoosifi nii, batatɔkɔ otii ɔlaa kuonwii, ta lɛyɛkɛ lamufũ ma ni oso.
41016009	Obe wɔ di Yesu lataka aakye ni baakpi kamɛ di Kɔsida kolesɛtũ, Maria Magdalene aaka suoto odiki otuo, nwɔ kamɛ aatososa ni anwuna kpile akuɛnsĩ di obe onwii kamɛ.
41016010	Aakyɛ aalaatɔkɔ Yesu batikakotɛ nɔɔ alɛ, Yesu ntɔɔtaka di obe wɔ basi boowi kaku ta kukpi nɔɔ oso.
41016011	Obe wɔ di Maria latɔkɔ ma alɛ, Yesu ntɔɔtaka akpe nkpa ni ɛɛnyɔɔ nii, batafũ nwɔ baanu.
41016012	Nni sɛmaa, Yesu ladiki suoto aatuo basaateketetɛ nɔɔ banyɔ, obe wɔ baakye Yerusalem boofe ni sekpoo nwu. Batatofo nwɔ di kasɔ kakyekɔ.
41016013	Kafɔɔ sɛmaa baabatofo nii, baakple baasifi baalaatɔkɔ babule. Kafɔɔ batafũ ma baanu.
41016014	Lɛyɛntɛle, Yesu ladiki suoto aatuo basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lefosi onwii di obe wɔ basi boole ni alesaa. Aananfiko ma ɔlaa ta banaa ni ofũ onu oso, bakpe kafɔɔ otokopĩ kpã ta batafũ batii ba nianyɔɔ nii baanu di obe wɔ atɔɔtaka, akpe ni nkpa.
41016015	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitɔɔkyɛ kayi kamuu biɛlaayie Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya diɛ batii bamuu kamɛ.
41016016	Otii wɔ nimafũ ɔlaa biene nwu annu nii, eefũ ni Yaa ntu okpeesa, Yaa madiki nwɔ di sikpile letokonanfi kamɛ. Otii wɔ kafɔɔ ninaanfũ anu nii, Yaa malo nwɔ lɛpɔɔ.
41016017	Yaa mata bafũbanutɛ osie mambla ablasaa ya niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ kpinwu. Babatososa anwuna kpile di leyooto nɔɔ kanya. Bababuɛ sele ate ate.
41016018	Se beemufũ asaanwu ee beenyi kɔfa kpile, dilababla ma lɛsalɛsaa. Se beetika nnɛɛ lɛma di bafiɛtɛ suoto, babawɛ osie.”
41016019	Di Saate Yesu lakakatɛ aata basaateketetɛ nɔɔ aaloo ni sɛmaa, Yaa lakpaa nwɔ aasifiko osi, ni aasiɛ di oletanɛɛkyɛ nɔɔ nɛ.
41016020	Batikankotɛ nɔɔ kafɔɔ lakyi kakɔ biala baabuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu. Saate lɛma lasiɛ ma kaamɛ aadiki atuo alɛ ɔlaa nɔɔ nwu ɔlaa biene kule di ablasaa ate ate ya baatɔɔbla ni di otumi nɔɔ kanya.
42001001	Obiloo Tiofilo, batii kpinwu lekpee ɔnyɛɛ bɛɛbla mmle baafuo nii, bɛɛkpana lɛsaa biala niawa ni kaamɛ loo bɛɛtɛ.
42001002	Baakpana nya baatɛ fɛ mmle baatii ba nianya ni asaa ya mmle ku anu lɛma kaasɔ kakyekɔ latɔkɔ wo nii, ku mba kafɔɔ nia buɛ nwu nii.
42001003	Nkpo oso, bienetɛ Tiofilo, ta nntoobuo di asaa ya mmle kamɛ nwaa lɛnyu ni diɛyɔ ni kaasɔ kakyekɔ oso, ntɔɔbla disibu nlɛ, dilɛ alɛ kakpana nya fɛ mmle diawa ni klekle nta fɔ.
42001004	Kɔbla nle mmle ta mmle faatofo ni onukware omuu wɔ ninsi ni di asaa ya baatootuo fɔ ni suoto.
42001005	Di obe wɔ kamɛ di Herode latoole ni sɛka di Yudea kasɔ suoto, Yaa oletatɛ onwii lawɛ baatɔɔlɛɛ nwɔ ni Sakaria. Aakye olebatatɛ dikudi le manlɛɛ ni Abia kamɛ. Sakaria wɔ mmle ɔsɔfɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ Elisabet nɛ. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ aakye Yaa oletatɛ wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Aaron kafaabi kamɛ.
42001006	Ɔsa ku ɔsɔfɔ wɔ mmle, baasiɛ nkpa biene di Yaa anu. Baale kafɔɔ Saate afiofa nwu amuu, baakyɛ di sisuku nɔɔ suoto.
42001007	Batii ba mmle ditawɛ obi kuonwii, diekye Elisabet ɔlɛma aale. Banyɔ lɛma kafɔɔ batoobe beefũ alɛɛ kpinwu.
42001008	Dii ninwii, Sakaria latɔɔbla ɔkpɛ nɔɔ fɛ oletatɛ di Yuda batii Olekatakɔ, diekye dikudi lɛma suoto nfɛ diadu.
42001009	Diekye, di olebatatɛ ɔsaabla kanya, baawii atrebi baadiki Sakaria alɛ akyɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ aalaafiɛ odufii di Yaa oleɔta akyikye suoto.
42001010	Obe wɔ aawɛ ni ninfa aatoofiɛ ni odufii nwu, batii dikudi bule kafɔɔ lawɛ kaayi baatɔɔpɛ ɔlaa baatɔɔta Yaa.
42001011	Ninfɛ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii lakyɔɔ di oleɔta akyikye oletanɛɛkyɛ, aadiki suoto aatuo nwɔ di obe wɔ ayɛ ofiɛ ni olufii nwu.
42001012	Di Sakaria lanyɔɔ nii, aabla tro, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ nwɔ osie kanya.
42001013	Kafɔɔ Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Sakaria, tanyɛkɛ! Yaa ntoonu fɔ ɔlaa ɔpɛ, ɔsɔfɔ lɛfɔ Elisabet malofo obi suɔtɔbi anta fɔ. Faatika nwɔ leyooto falɛ Yohane.
42001014	Suoto mayɔɔ fɔ osie kanya se beelofo nwɔ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di suoto mayɔɔ batii kpinwu nɛ.
42001015	Aba le otii finle di Yaa anu. Atannyi wanyi ee nta siene kunwii. Ni dibayɔ ni di olofobee nɔɔ, Ninwuna Klekle mayii nwɔ kamɛ pɔ.
42001016	Nnwɔɔ nimakplesa Israel batii kpinwu anwako Saate Yaa lɛma nfũ nɛ.
42001017	Abale Saate katũ anwa di osie ku sɛkambi kamɛ fɛ mmle di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Elia late nii. Di lɛwa nɔɔ kamɛ abalolaa babi ku bate ntɛɛ. Abata batokopĩtɛ disibu nkyi mambu disi fɛ batii klekle. Abalolaa kafɔɔ Saate batii nɔɔ mansiɛ mansoko nwɔ.”
42001018	Ninfɛ di Sakaria lakaalɛ Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu alɛ, “Be nimata nfũ ɔlaa wɔ mmle nnu? Diekye ntoobe kofokofoko, ɔsɔfɔ nii kafɔɔ ntoobe laakpa nwu.”
42001019	Ninfɛ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ami ninle Gabriel wɔ ninyila ni di Yaa anu nɛ. Nnwɔɔ niekpee mi alɛ, matɔkɔ fɔ ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle nɛ.
42001020	Kafɔɔ faafũ mi ɔlaa wɔ mmle nimawa ni kaanya di obe biene kamɛ fanu. Ta nkpo oso fabakple omumu flabasinfuo ɔkakatɛ, diɛlase di obe wɔ kamɛ di ɔlaa wɔ mmle kɔtɔkɔ fɔ ni lɛwa ni kaanya.”
42001021	Di obe wɔ kamɛ diɛ asaa ya mmle amuu latɔwa nii, diabla batii ba niayila ni kaayi baasoko ni Sakaria ɔkpɛ. Diekye batatofo lɛsaa le oso aatɔɔklɛ ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo.
42001022	Obe wɔ nfɛ di Sakaria ladie ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu, atafuo ma ɔkakatɛko. Nioso nnɛɛ nfɛ aatoowiwii aayɔ aatɔɔkakatɛko ma. Nioso batatofo alɛ, odiki otuo aanya.
42001023	Obe wɔ di Sakaria ɔkpɛ ɔbla ntooloo ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu, aadie ninfa aasifi leyo.
42001024	Ni di obe owo kamɛ, ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ Elisabet labalaka lɛmɛ, aawofasa suoto awɛntɛ anɔɔ amu, atadie kayi.
42001025	Ninfɛ di Elisabet labuɛ alɛ, “Nunua, Yaa ntoole mi sibualɛ, atootekete mi sinunsɔ di suoto di batii anu.”
42001026	Di awɛntɛ akuɔ kamɛ nfɛ di Elisabet nlaka ni lɛmɛ, Yaa lakpee tɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ Gabriel alɛ akyɛ okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Nasaret, di Galilea kasɔ suoto.
42001027	Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ wɔ mmle layɔ kanya aakyɛnko kakpeelebitɛ ka baakaalɛ baata ni osuɔtɔ wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Yosef, aakye ni ɔka Dawid kɔna kamɛ. Kakpeelebitɛ nwu leyooto niale Maria nɛ.
42001028	Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu lawa Maria nfũ aabatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kɔsɛɛsa fɔ! Saate nwu nsiko fɔ, eekusɛkusɛsa fɔ kafɔɔ.”
42001029	Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ wɔ mmle ɔlaa wɔ aatɔkɔ ni Maria latɔɔ disibu, diekye atanu ɔlaa nwu kasɔ.
42001030	Ninfɛ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Maria, tanyɛkɛ, diekye Yaa ntoole fɔ sibualɛ.
42001031	Fabalaka lɛmɛ, fanlofo obi suɔtɔbi, fantika nwɔ leyooto falɛ Yesu.
42001032	Abale otii kplɛ, babalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ Yaa wɔ ninlenke ni petee Obi. Saate nɔɔ Yaa mase nwɔ sɛka fɛ mmle aase ni ɔwa nɔɔ Dawid.
42001033	Abale sɛka di Yakob kɔna kamɛ obe lele. Diidii sɛka kalekɔ nɔɔ nnaa kaloo.”
42001034	Nfa nfɛ di Maria lakaalɛ Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu alɛ, “Lɛ nfɛ di nle mmle mawa kaanya, ninanye ni osuɔtɔ?”
42001035	Nfa nfɛ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Ninwuna Klekle mawafɔ di suoto, Yaa wɔ ninlenke ni osie kafɔɔ matikafɔ di suoto. Ta nkpo oso Obi Klekle nwu fɔɔwa ni ɔbalofo, baalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ, Yaa omu Obi.
42001036	Nunua, komiɛ nlɛ fatofo falɛ, leyo lee kamɛ ɔsanko wɔ ninle ni Elisabet bɔɔlɛɛ ni ɔlɛma, nfɛ alaka lɛmɛ, nu atoobe nkpo. Kɔwɛntɛ kuɔnle nɔɔ nfɛ asi ni nɛ.
42001037	Diekye lɛsalɛsaa nnaa Yaa osie ku ɔbla.”
42001038	Ninfɛ di Maria latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nyu lo, Saate kpɛmblatɛ nle. Abla aatɛɛ fɛ mmle okle feebuɛ ni.” Ninfɛ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu lasifi aadiɛ nwɔ nɛ.
42001039	-
42001040	Di ayi nwu kamɛ Maria lataka aapɛsɛwa aalolaa suoto, aakyɛ okpoo onwii di Yudea kasɔ di kabokoee suoto, aalaabuo Sakaria leyo, aasɛɛsa Elisabet.
42001041	Diawa alɛ obe wɔ di Elisabet lanu ni Maria lɛsɛɛsa, obi wɔ ninsi nwɔ ni kaafutu kamɛ lakpɛ. Nfanwu Ninwuna Klekle niayii Elisabet kamɛ pɔ.
42001042	Ninfɛ aakakatɛ aabuɛ osie kanya alɛ, “Beekusɛkusɛsa fɔ di basanko bamuu kamɛ, beekusɛkusɛsa kafutu lɛfɔ kamɛ obi kafɔɔ!
42001043	Sɛmɛmbualɛ ninle nse, alɛ, Saate nii ɔya kawa amasɛɛsɛɛ?
42001044	Di obe wɔ kamɛ fɛɛkyako mi ni ɔsɛɛsa, nfanwu obi wɔ ninsi mi ni kaafutu kamɛ niɛkyako ɔkpɛ ku suoto lɛyɔɔ.
42001045	Suoto siyɔɔ fɔ osie kanya, diekye feefũ feenu falɛ ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa lɛkakatɛ eekyeko ni suoto lɛfɔ mawa kaanya.”
42001046	Maria lataka aabuɛ alɛ, “Otu nii kɔtansa Saate nwu.
42001047	Suoto kɔyɔɔ ninwuna nii di Yaa wɔ ninle mi ni Dikitɛ suoto,
42001048	diekye eenyuma mi, ami wɔ ninle nwɔ ni kpɛmblatɛ ninandie ni lɛsalɛsaa. Nioso diɛyɔ ni di nua diesifi nii, ana ya nikɔwa ni sɛɛmaa, mawa mamalɛɛ mi suoto lɛyɔɔ otii,
42001049	Diekye di lɛsaa le di Yaa wɔ ninklenke nii, lɛbla ɛɛtɛɛ ni oso. Leyooto nɔɔ ninle klekle nɛ.
42001050	Nyaami nɔɔ ɔnya nte diɛta mba ninyɛkɛ nwɔ nii, diɛyɔ ni kɔɔna diesfi ni kɔɔna,
42001051	Eediki osie nɔɔ kayi, ɛɛsamiisa batii ba nintakatɛsa ni suoto lɛma katoo ku disibu lɛma nimuu,
42001052	Ɛɛtakatɛsa baka siene laakpomii lɛma suoto, ni ɛɛtakatɛsa mba niɛwakosa ni suoto lɛma kasɔ katoo nɛ.
42001053	Ɛɛta batii ba di aka nkle ni lele alesaa biene beemiɛ, kafɔɔ ɛɛta basaawɛntɛ lesifi ku kɔka.
42001054	Eenyuma ntam nɔɔ be aaka aata ni bawa loo, ni atɔɔwa alɛ ɔɔbadiki bakpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ Israel nɛ.
42001055	Atoonyuma alɛ ootuo nyaami nɔɔ ɔnya di Abraham suoto ku banantii nɔɔ diesifi ni, dinnaa ni kaloo.”
42001056	Maria lasiɛ di Elisabet nfũ fɛ awɛntɛ atiɛ fiɛ aakple aasifi leyo nɔɔ.
42001057	Di obe lawo alɛ Elisabet kalofo nii, ni aalofo obi suɔtɔbi nɛ.
42001058	Ni di Elisabet bawo nɔɔ ku banatii nɔɔ lanu mmle okle di Yaa lele nwɔ ni sibualɛ, ni baamuu lɛma lanyako nwɔ suoto lɛyɔɔ nɛ.
42001059	Obe wɔ di obi nwu nkpo lafũ ni ayi anɛ, baawa alɛ bɔɔbabudi nwɔ lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ, ni baamiɛ alɛ bɔɔyɔ ote Sakaria leyooto mantika nwɔ nɛ.
42001060	Kafɔɔ ɔya ditatunako ma, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Batika nwɔ leyooto bilɛ, Yohane.”
42001061	Ninfɛ baananfiko nwɔ ɔlaa baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔnantii lee kuonwii diloole leyooto le mmle okle fiɛ de?”
42001062	Nioso, baawiwii nnɛɛ baakaalɛ obisɔ nwu ote alɛ, lɛmɛnyooto omiɛ alɛ bayɔ batika obi nɔɔ nwu.
42001063	Ninfɛ di Sakaria lakaalɛ alɛ batɔɔ lɛkpanafuɔ, ni aakpana aatika alɛ, “Leyooto nɔɔ ninle Yohane.” Diabla bamuu lɛma ɔkpɛ osie kanya.
42001064	Nfanwu, Sakaria lakple aakyako ɔkakatɛ, ni aakyako Yaa ɔtansa nɛ.
42001065	Lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ manko mba ninsi bakaako ni bawo. Batii labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle baakyakasa sekpoo se simuu ninkpe ni di Yudea kobokotee kamɛ.
42001066	Batii ba bamu nianu ni sɛlaa se mmle latoobu diisi baatɔɔkaalɛ alɛ, “Ɔmɛntiikle di obisɔ wɔ mmle kɔwa ɔbale?” Diekye diakpa kɔmɛ alɛ, Yaa otumi ntika nwɔ di suoto.
42001067	Diawa alɛ Yaa Ninwuna Klekle layii Yohane ote Sakaria kamɛ, ni aabuɛ Yaa ɔlaa alɛ,
42001068	“Bita butansa Saate, Israel Yaa nwu diekye atɔɔwa kale nɔɔ ɔkyakaako, ɛɛwa ma kafɔɔ odiki.
42001069	Atɔɔta wo Dikitɛ wɔ ninkpe ni osie nwɔ niekye ni kpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ Dawid kɔna kamɛ.
42001070	Yaa labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle aatɛ kofokofoko diefe ni di ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nɔɔ suoto alɛ,
42001071	abadiki wo ankyeko bakpileblatɛ ku batii ba niekyidi wo ni bamuu nnɛɛ kamɛ.
42001072	Aabuɛ alɛ abanya bawa loo nyaami abanyuma kafɔɔ kanya ninii klekle le aanii ni ku mma.
42001073	Aaka ntam aata ɔwa loo Abram osie kanya alɛ,
42001074	abadiki wo ankyeko bakyiditɛ loo nnɛɛ kamɛ, abata mambla nwɔ ɔkpɛ kafɔɔ di ɔtanyɛkɛ kamɛ.
42001075	Alɛ ababla wo klekle, munte tinini di anu nɔɔ di nkpa loo mmuu disiɛbi kamɛ.
42001076	Kafɔɔ, afɔ obi nii, babalɛɛfɔ alɛ Yaa wɔ ninlenke ni ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ. Fabale Saate nwu katũ, fanlolaa osuku fantɛ fanta ɔwabee nɔɔ.
42001077	Fabata batii nɔɔ kafɔɔ ntofo alɛ babawɛ didiki, ku sikpile lɛma se babayɔ mankyɛ ma ni oso.
42001078	Yaa loo lɛyɔɔ buɛɛ, annya nyaami. Abakyesee wo dikitɛ wɔ ninkpa ni fɛ mmle kuufĩ nkpa nii.
42001079	Abata lɛkpa le mmle nwa di batii ba ninsi ni di ditunu kamɛ di kukpi lɛyɛkɛ nkle ma nii alɛ, abakpaa wo anfenko di atoko ɔkyɛ ole osuku suoto.”
42001080	Nioso obisɔ nwu lamuɔ di suoto sina kamɛ ku Yaa Ninwuna kamɛ osie kanya. Aasiɛ di ɔfaafuu di lɛba le baatii diesi ni diaalase di obe wɔ aadiki ni suoto kayi di Israel kafaabi anu.
42002001	Di obe nwu kamɛ, Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare Augusto lata otumi alɛ baka batii bamuu ba ninkpe ni di Roma sɛka kalekɔ kamɛ.
42002002	Di batii ɔka kasale wɔ mmle kamɛ, abaa ɔnɔɔfo wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Kirenio niatoole sɛka di Siria kasɔ suoto.
42002003	Nkpo oso otii biala lasifi okpoo nɔɔ alɛ balaaka nwɔ.
42002004	Nioso Yosef kafɔɔ ladie di Nasaret okpoo di Galilea kasɔ aasifi Betlehem di Yudea kasɔ suoto, nfũ baalofo ni ɔka Dawid. Yosef lasifi nfa diekye Dawid ɔnantii aale.
42002005	Manko Maria wɔ baakaalɛ baatɔɔ ni niasifi nfa alɛ balaaka ma. Aalaka lɛmɛ kafɔɔ.
42002006	Obe wɔ baawɛ ni di Betlehem, Maria obe lawo alɛ aalofo.
42002007	Ni aalofo obi suɔtɔbi nɔɔ kasale nɛ. Ni aayɔ sikplakpi aamiminisa nwɔ, aayɔ nwɔ aatensa di lɛsaa le mankpee ni babɔkɛɛ alesaa kamɛ nɛ. Diekye batawɛ leyo di bafɔɔ kafunkɔ.
42002008	Diawa alɛ bafoso bakpatɛ banwii lawɛ nintɛɛ nwu kasɔ suoto, baatoonyu bafoso lɛma ku kakyɛ.
42002009	Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii ladiki suoto aatuo ma, ni di Saate leklekle lakpa diakpete ma di suoto nɛ. Ta nkpo oso baayɛkɛ osie kanya,
42002010	kafɔɔ Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitanyɛkɛ, ɔlaa biene nkyɛnko, nwɔ nimata ye ni suoto lɛyɔɔ osie kanya ku batii bamuu.
42002011	Di miɛ dii le mmle suoto, batoolofo Saate wɔ ninle ni Kristo bɛɛtaye di ɔka Dawid okpoo kamɛ.
42002012	Lɛsaa le bibanya mintɛ ni nsũ, diotuo alɛ kute ni nkpo ninle alɛ, bibanya beemiminisa obifɔɔle nwu ku sikplakpi, bɛɛyɔ nwɔ beetensa di bafoso lɛsaa le manle ni alesaa kamɛ.”
42002013	Nfanwu, Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ dikudi kplɛ ninwii niakye osi baakyɔɔ babakyakaa di nwɔ nkpo suoto baatɔɔtansa Yaa alɛ,
42002014	“Leklekle baata Yaa di osi fanfan, di suoto lɛyɔɔ diwa di batii ba suoto di Yaa mbɔmbɔ ni kaayi!”
42002015	Di obe wɔ di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nwu lakple baasifi ni osi baadiɛ ma ni, bafoso bakpatɛ nwu labuɛ baatɔkɔ suoto lɛma alɛ, “Bita bukyɛ Betlehem buɔlaanyu lɛsaa le niɛwa ni, di Saate nwu ntɔɔtɔkɔ wo ni.”
42002016	Nioso baapɛsɛwa baakyɛ baalanya Maria ku Yosef ku obifɔɔle nwu niate ni di babɔkɛɛ alesaa lekpeesaa nwu kamɛ.
42002017	Nioso obe wɔ baanyɔɔ ni nkpo, baabuɛ lɛsaa biala di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu latɔkɔ ma aakyeko ni obisɔ nwu suoto.
42002018	Batii ba bamuu nianu ni bafoso bakpatɛ ba mmle ɔlaa wɔ baabuɛ nii, diabla ma ɔkpɛ.
42002019	Maria lamufũ sɛlaa se mmle simuu aakpee diisi, aatoobusĩ disi osie kanya.
42002020	Ninfɛ baafoso bakpatɛ ba mmle lakple baasifi, ni baatɔɔtansa Yaa di asaa ya amuu baanu, baanya ni suoto nɛ. Diekye diawa kaanya tutuutu fɛ mmle di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu latɔkɔ ma nii.
42002021	Di ayi anɛ kamaa, obe wɔ di obe lawo alɛ baabudi ni obisɔ nwu lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ, ni baatika nwɔ leyooto alɛ Yesu, fɛ mmle di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu labuɛ aatɛ ni fiɛ baalaka nwɔ ni lɛmɛ.
42002022	Obe wɔ di obe lawo alɛ Yosef ku Maria kabla suoto okleklesa amanle fɛ mmle di Mose kufiofa letuo nii. Ni baakpaa obifɔɔle nwu nkpo kafɔɔ baasifiko Yerusalem alɛ, bɔɔyɔ nwɔ manakpee di Saate nnɛɛ kamɛ nɛ.
42002023	Fɛ mmle bɛɛkpana beekpee ni di Yaa kufiofa kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “Obi suɔtɔbi kasale lele beelofo, baadiki nwɔ lete base bata Saate nwu.”
42002024	Nioso baakyɛ alɛ bɔɔlaayɔ Abronuma anyɔ ee alaapɔɔ anyɔ manta Yaa ole, fɛ mmle di Saate nwu kufiofa lebuɛ nii.
42002025	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, osuɔtɔ onwii baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Simeon lawɛ di Yerusalem. Aale otii biene wɔ ninyɛkɛ ni Yaa, aasiɛ aatoonyu osuku aatɔɔta Israel didiki. Yaa Ninwuna Klekle lasiɛko nwɔ,
42002026	ni diatɔɔ aatoofo alɛ ɔlabakpi, diediki diɛlase di obe wɔ atɔɔnya ni Saate Dikitɛ nwu baabuɛ alɛ babalofo nii.
42002027	Yaa Ninwuna Klekle lakpaa Simeon diasifiko Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu. Obe wɔ baalofotɛ ba mmle lakpaa obifɔɔle nwu baawako alɛ bɔɔbla fɛ mmle kuufiofa nwu lebuiɛ ni mantɔɔ nii,
42002028	ninfɛ di Simeon lafũ obifɔɔle nwu aaklee ninnɛɛ, ni aapɛ Yaa sɛfa alɛ,
42002029	“Saate, nunua, fatɔɔnya fɛɛbla di ntam be faaka ni kanya oso, diki ami, kpɛmblatɛ lɛfɔ, osuku aatɔɔkyɛ di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ.
42002030	Ami omu, ntoodiki anu nii lɛnya Dikitɛ lɛfɔ nwu,
42002031	nwɔ fɛɛta falɛ awa ni di nnle batii anu.
42002032	Nnwɔɔ ninle lɛkpa le nimadiki dibiesaa lɛfɔ kayi anta ni batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii nɛ. Annanfi dibu kafɔɔ anwako ni Israel batii lɛfɔ kale kamɛ nɛ.”
42002033	Sɛlaa se di Simeon labuɛ ni di obifɔɔle nwu suoto labla Yosef ku Maria ɔkpɛ.
42002034	Ni di Simeon lakusɛkusɛsa ma, aatɔkɔ ɔya Maria alɛ, “Obisɔ wɔ mmle Yaa niekyesee nwɔ ale didiki ku kawɔɔ ɛɛta batii kpinwu di Israel. Ale nsũ be niekye ni Yaa nfũ baatii kpinwu mataka manyila nwɔ ni di suoto.
42002035	Alɛ abadiki batii disi kamɛ sɛwofalaa kayi antuo. Afɔ kafɔɔ, diefe ni di nle mmle kamɛ oso, fabanu otu kamɛ dibuo fɛ kapamii kobe piɔ̃piɔ̃ bakle bootofo fɔ di otu kamɛ.”
42002036	-
42002037	Ɔsanko onwii lawɛ aale ni Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ, nnwɔɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ Hana nɛ. Ɔsanko nwu ote niale Fanuel, aakye Aser kafaabi kamɛ. Alɛɛ akuɛnsĩ ko manko ɔsa baayɔ bawo fiɛ aakpi aadiɛ nwɔ. Ni kamaa aale kpisɔfɔ alɛɛ afosi anɛ alɛɛ ana. Obe lele ankyɛ Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ kakũ ku kakyɛ anaatɔɔtansa Yaa, annii kanya, antɔɔpɛ ɔlaa antɔɔta Yaa.
42002038	Di obe nwu kamɛ tutuutu, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ aawa aabapɛ Yaa sɛfa, ni aakakatɛ aakyeko obisɔ nwu nkpo suoto aata batii ba bamuu ninsi boonyu osuku manta ni Yerusalem didiki nɛ.
42002039	Di obe wɔ di Yosef ku Maria ntooloo ni amanle nwu ɔbla fɛ mmle di Yaa kufiofa kukũ letuo nii, baakple baasifi okpoo lɛma di Nasaret, di Galilea kasɔ suoto.
42002040	Obisɔ nwu lamuɔ, aawɛ suoto osie, aawɛ kafɔɔ ninumbe osie kanya. Yaa sibualɛ latika nwɔ di suoto.
42002041	Lɛlɛɛ biala, Yesu balofotɛ nkyɛ Yerusalem manaale dii le manlɛɛ ni alɛ, Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii.
42002042	Nioso obe wɔ di Yesu lafũ ni lefosi alɛɛ anyɔ baakpaa nwɔ baakyɛ dii nwu kalekɔ di Yerusalem, fɛ mmle mambla ni saa.
42002043	Di obe wɔ batooloo ni dii nwu nkpo ole, baakple baatoosifi okpoo lɛma, kafɔɔ Yesu lakple aasiɛ di Yerusalem. Balofotɛ nɔɔ ditatofo.
42002044	Baanyu alɛ asi baatii nwu kamɛ, nkpo oso baakyɛ dii kufĩ osuku fiɛ baakyako nwɔ owolaa di basiɛwo nɔɔ ku batii nɔɔ kamɛ.
42002045	Obe wɔ batanyɔɔ nii, baakple baasifi Yerusalem baalaatoowolaa nwɔ.
42002046	Di dii tiɛfa kamɛ, ni baakyɛ baalaanyɔɔ di Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ nɛ. Aasiɛ ku Yuda batii basaatuotɛ bawo aatoonu ma, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ aatɔɔkaalɛ ma sɛlaa.
42002047	Batii ba bamuu nianu nwɔ ni sɛlaa, diabla ma kpo, diekye di lɛɛsɔnu kplɛ le aayɔ aatoodiki ni sɛlaa se baatɔɔkaalɛ nwɔ ni kasɔ oso.
42002048	Obe wɔ di Yesu balofotɛ lanyɔɔ nii, diabla ma yaaa. Ni di ɔya lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Obi, obe oso fɛɛbla wo nkpo? Ami ku Teefɔ ditɔɔbla wo ninunsɛɛ buokyi munwolaa fɔ.”
42002049	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Be oso biokyi minwolaa mi? Bieye bilɛ Teemi leyo dikpe ni lesiɛ?”
42002050	Kafɔɔ batanu ɔlaa wɔ aatɔkɔ ma ni kasɔ.
42002051	Ninfɛ di Yesu latikanko ma baasifi Nasaret nɛ. Aawakosa suoto kasɔ aata ma. Ɔya lamufũ sɛlaa se mmle aakpee diisi aatoobu sĩ disi osie kanya.
42002052	Yesu lalolaa aamuɔ aawɛ suoto osie. Aawɛ kafɔɔ ninumbe. Aabuo batii ku Yaa anu osie kanya.
42003001	-
42003002	Di lefosi alɛɛ anɔɔ ya kamɛ di ɔka nɔɔfo Kaesare Tiberio latoole ni sɛka, Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛ Yohane wɔ ninle ni Sakaria obi lafũ ɔlaa aakyeko Yaa nfũ di obe wɔ aasiɛ ni di ɔfaafuu kamɛ. Ni di Pontio Pilato lale Abaa ɔnɔɔfo di Yudea kasɔ suoto nɛ. Herode kafɔɔ latoole sɛka di Galilea kasɔ suoto. Di obe nwu kamɛ tutuutu, Herode obilɛma Filipo kafɔɔ latoole sɛka di kasɔ ka bɔɔlɛɛ ni Iturea ku Trakoniti ntɛɛ nwu suoto. Ni di ɔka Lisania kafɔɔ latoole sɛka di Abilene kasɔ suoto nɛ. Di obe wɔ mmle kamɛ kafɔɔ, ni di Hana ku Kaiafa lale Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo nɛ.
42003003	Ninfɛ di Yohane lakyɛ aakyi Yordan okle sɛmaa ku ntɛɛ nwu mmuu aatoobuɛ Yaa ɔlaa alɛ, “Bikyi siikpile lee kamɛ biefũ Yaa ntu okpeesa, di Yaa ayɔ sikpile lee akyɛ ye.”
42003004	Fɛ mmle bɛɛkpana bɛɛtɛ ni di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “Otii onwii kɔfaa di ɔfaafuu kamɛ ambuɛ alɛ, ‘Bilolaa osuku bitɛ Saate nwu ɔwabee. Biɛkyɛkyɛsa abaya abafe ni bitɛ nwɔ.
42003005	Bietĩi abaya amuu niekyofo ni. Biebiɛ kafɔɔ abokote ku kobokotee amuu bitɛ kaasɔ. Bieyilasa sisuku se niɛkɔnkɔ ni. Biɛkylɔkylɔsa abaya kafɔɔ niekukyukukyu ni.
42003006	Kayi batii bamuu manya Yaa Didiki!’ ”
42003007	Batii kpinwu ladie baawa alɛ Yohane akpeesa ma Yaa ntu. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye kɔsaanwu kɔna! Owe niɛka ye alɛ biatoso di Yaa lɛkanko le nikɔwa ni kamɛ?
42003008	Bibla asaa ya nimatuo alɛ bitookyi ni siikpile lee kamɛ. Biediɛ obuɛ ɔtɔkɔ suoto lee bilɛ Abraham banantii bile. Diekye kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, Yaa mafuo afuɔ ya mmle ɔyɔ ɔbla banantii anta Abraham.
42003009	Nunua bia yi, batɔɔyɔ kafɛ beese di awoso sidu suoto kofokofoko. Kowoso lele ninantika abi biene yi, bababudi kũ, man-yɔ kũ mankpee di ɔtɔ kamɛ.”
42003010	Ninfɛ baatii nwu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ni be nfɛ buabla nunua?”
42003011	Ninfɛ aadiki kanya, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Otii lele nikpe osi awu anyɔ, ayɔ anwii ata otii wɔ ninnaa ni kuanwii. Otii wɔ kafɔɔ nikpe ni alesaa, asɛko owo nɔɔ wɔ di alesaa nnaa ni.”
42003012	Akpooto bafuntɛ bawo kafɔɔ lawa alɛ, bakpeesa ma Yaa ntu. Ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, be dikpe ni buɔbla?”
42003013	Ninfɛ di Yohane latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitanfũ akpooto bialenkeesa n-ya bɛɛta ye alɛ biafũ nii.”
42003014	Bakpɛtɛ bawo kafɔɔ lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ni awo mɔ? Be dikpe ni buɔbla?” Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitan-yɔ suoto osie biafũ koto di otii kuonwii nnɛɛ, ee bitambudi otii kuonwii kanya di osuku kpile suoto. Bita ato lee ya biofũ ni sɛɛkpɛ mmɛ abuoye anu.”
42003015	Batii osuku onyu lakyako katoo ɔtaka, ni baatoobu alɛ, loo Yohane ninle Kristo wɔ boonyu ni osuku alɛ abawa ni nɛ.
42003016	Nioso Yohane latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ami, ntu kɔyɔ nkpeesa ye. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ nikɔwa ni sɛɛmaa nii nlenkee mi. Otii wɔ ninansiɛko alɛ bia kadiki nwɔ ni ntokota. Nnwɔɔ, abayɔ Ninwuna Klekle ku ɔtɔ ankpeesa ye.
42003017	Akle kɔfɛɛ nɔɔ di nnɛɛ kamɛ, abafɛɛlɛ ni kamɔɔ andiki ni kufuo kaamɛ, an-yɔ kamɔɔ abi ankpete di owu kamɛ. Kafɔɔ kufuo nkũ, abafiɛ kũ di ɔtɔ wɔ ninaanii ni diidii kamɛ.”
42003018	Yohane latɔkɔ batii nwu Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu di sisuku ate ate suoto, ni aaka ma alɛ, bakyisa nkpa, di nkpa lɛma disiɛbi kamɛ.
42003019	Kafɔɔ Yohane lasĩ ɔlaa aata Herode wɔ niale ni abaa ɔnɔɔfo, diekye aafũ obilɛma ɔsɔfɔ wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Herodia aayɔ, ku sikpile bamba se kpinwu aabla ni oso.
42003020	Nioso okpile wɔ ninlenke ni di Herode lakple aabla ni, ninle alɛ, aamufũ Yohane aatɛ leeyo.
42003021	Obe wɔ di Yohane ntooloo ni batii Yaa ntu okpeesa, aakpeesa Yesu kafɔɔ. Obe wɔ di Yesu latɔɔpɛ ɔlaa aatɔɔta ni Yaa, kolo lasɛkɛtɛ.
42003022	Ninfɛ di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle lasoo nwɔ di suoto fɛ mmle di lɛlaapɔɔ nsoo ni nɛ. Ninfɛ baanu sɛlɔ lakye osi siabuɛ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle obi nii wɔ suoto ninantuna ni nɛ. Foobuo mi anu nwaa.”
42003023	Yesu lafũ fɛ alɛɛ afosi atiɛ di obe wɔ aakye ni ɔkpɛ nɔɔ kasɔ. Batii lanyu alɛ Yosef obi ale. Yosef ote niale Eli.
42003024	Eli ote niale Mattat, Mattat ote niale Lewi, Lewi ote niale Melki, Melki ote niale Yanai, Yanai ote niale ni Yosef.
42003025	Yosef ote niale Matatia, Matatia ote niale Amos, Amos ote niale Nahaum, Nahaum ote niale ni Esli, Esli ote niale Nagai.
42003026	Nagai ote niale Mahat, Mahat ote niale ni Matatia, Matatia ote niale Semein, Semein ote niale Yosef, Yosef ote niale ni Yuda.
42003027	Yuda ote niale Yohanan, Yohanan ote niale Resa, Resa ote niale Sorobabel, Sorobabel ote niale Sealtiel, Sealtiel ote kafɔɔ niale Neri.
42003028	Neri ote niale Melki, Melki ote niale Adi, Adi ote niale Kosam, Kosam ote niale Elmadam, Elmadam ote niale Er.
42003029	Er ote niale Yosua, Yosua ote niale Elieser, Elieser ote niale Yorim, Yorim ote niale Matat, Matat ote niale Lewi.
42003030	Lewi ote niale Simeon, Simeon ote niale Yuda, Yuda ote niale Yosef, Yosef ote niale Yonam, Yonam ote niale Eliakim.
42003031	Eliakim ote niale Melea, Malea ote niale Mena, Mena ote niale Matata, Matata ote niale Natan, Natan ote niale Dawid.
42003032	Dawid ote niale Yisai, Yisai ote niale Obed, Obed ote niale Boas, Boas ote niale Salomo, Salomo ote niale Nahason.
42003033	Nahason ote niale Aminadab, Aminadab ote niale Adimin, Adimin ote niale Arni, Arni ote niale Hesron, Hesron ote niale Peres, Peres ote niale Yuda.
42003034	Yuda ote niale Yakob, Yakob ote niale Isak, Isak ote niale Abraham, Abraham ote niale Tera, Tera ote niale Nahor,
42003035	Nahor ote niale Serug, Serug ote niale Regu, Regu ote niale Peleg, Peleg ote niale Eber, Eber ote niale Sala.
42003036	Sala ote niale Kainan, Kainan ote niale Arfaksad, Arfaksad ote niale Sem, Sem ote niale Noa, Noa ote niale Lamek.
42003037	Lamek ote niale Metusala, Metusala ote niale Henok, Henok ote niale Yared, Yared ote niale Mahalaleel, Mahalaleel ote niale Kainan.
42003038	Kainan ote niale Enos, Enos ote niale Set, Set ote niale Adam, Adam ote kafɔɔ niale Yaa nɛ.
42004001	Obe wɔ di Yesu ladie ni di Yordan okle nwu kamɛ, aayii pɔ ku Ninwuna Klekle. Ni di Ninwuna nwu lakpaa nwɔ aasifiko ɔfaafuu kamɛ,
42004002	lɛɛba le di Abonsam lasɔ nwɔ aanyu ni ayi afosi ana amu. Di obe nwu kamɛ, Yesu ditale lɛsalɛsaa, nioso kɔka lakle nwɔ osie kanya di ayi nwu kayɛntɛkɔ.
42004003	Ninfɛ di Abonsam latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse Yaa obi fale, ni tɔkɔ difuɔ le mmle falɛ dikple alesaa.”
42004004	Kafɔɔ Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Diele alesaa lete suoto di otii nsiɛ nkpa.’ ”
42004005	Nni kamaa, Abonsam lakpaa nwɔ aalaase di lɛba le niataka ni suoto. Ni aatuo nwɔ kayi asaa ku sɛka nlekɔ mmuu di onumpoo lɛpɛ kamɛ nɛ.
42004006	Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kamayɔ kayi kamuu otumi wɔ mmle ku kamɛ lɛsaawɛ nta fɔ, diekye ami bɛɛyɔ bɛɛta, otii lele kafɔɔ ninlɛ mi kafuo nwɔ ɔyɔ ɔta.
42004007	Nioso asaa ya amuu makple fɔ ale nse fabase katũ kasɔ fantɛɛ.”
42004008	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Saate Yaa lɛfɔ lete faase katũ kaasɔ fanta. Lete nɔɔ kafɔɔ faatansa.’ ”
42004009	Nni kamaa, Abonsam lakpaa Yesu aasifiko Yerusalem aalaatika nwɔ di Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ lɛkya kapiɔ̃piɔ̃kɔ, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse Yaa obi fale, faayefe fakye ninfũ fasifi kasɔ.
42004010	Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Yaa mata batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ nyila mannyu fɔ.’
42004011	‘Babaklee fɔ di nnɛɛ lɛma kamɛ di osi alɛ, bia falaatuula diifuɔ kuninwii suoto.’ ”
42004012	Kafɔɔ Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Tansɔ Saate Yaa lɛfɔ faanyu.’ ”
42004013	Obe wɔ di Abonsam lasɔ Yesu di sisuku se mmle suoto aaloo nii, aayidiɛ nwɔ kɛɛkɛ aasifi.
42004014	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakple aasifi Galilea nɛ. Yaa Ninwuna Klekle otumi lasiɛ nwɔ kaamɛ. Ni di suoto nɔɔ ɔlaa lakyaka ntɛɛ nwu nɛ.
42004015	Aatuo asaa di Yuda batii nsiisakɔ, obiala latansa asaa nɔɔ otuo.
42004016	Nni kamaa, Yesu lakyɛ Nasaret ninle ni okpoo wɔ baaklee nwɔ aamuɔ nii. Ni di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto, aakyɛ Yuda batii kasiisakɔ fɛ mmle ambɔmbɔ ni ɔbla. Ni aataka aayila alɛ ɔɔka asaa di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ nɛ.
42004017	Ninfɛ baayɔ Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia kukũ baatɔɔ nɛ. Ni aatikiti kukũ nwu aanya lɛba le bɛɛkpana ni alɛ,
42004018	“Saate Ninwuna ntika mi di suoto, diekye eediki mi alɛ, kayɔ ɔlaa biene nwu nwako bapiitɛ. Eekyesee mi kafɔɔ alɛ kayie lɛkya nta batii ba beemufũ bɛɛpɛ ni akpo alɛ baawɛ difukiti. Ku mba di anu lebiɛ nii, alɛ baanya. Ku batii ba beenyinka bɛɛtɛ ni kaasɔ ku dibuo alɛ, baawɛ ɔnyɛɛ ɔtɛ.
42004019	Alɛ kata mantofo kafɔɔ alɛ obe ntoowo di Saate madiki ni batii nɔɔ.”
42004020	Ninfɛ di Yesu latĩi kukũ nwu nkpo, aakplesa aata tɔkyɛntɛ nwu, ni aasiɛ kaasɔ nɛ. Batii ba bamuu niawɛ ni di kasiisakɔ nwu lakyako nwɔ onyu tuwĩi.
42004021	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lɛba le mmle biene lɛka ni ninfũ, nintɔɔwa kaanya miɛ dii le mmle nɛ.”
42004022	Sɛlaa nɔɔ se aabuɛ ni lamufũ di batii nwu situ osie kanya, ku mmle aablako ni ɔkplalomii nɔɔ ɔkpɛ, diabla batii nwu ɔkpɛ. Ni baakaalɛ alɛ, “Diele nnwɔɔ ninle Yosef obi nwu nkpo nɛ?”
42004023	Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “N-ye nlɛ bibapɛ mi lɛkpa le mmle bilɛ, ‘Fablatɛ, bla suoto kɔfa.’ Bibakple mintɔkɔ mi kafɔɔ bilɛ, ‘Asaa ya okle bianu bilɛ labla ni di Kapernaum, mbla nya kafɔɔ di okpoo nii.’ ”
42004024	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, mánfũ Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ okpoo.
42004025	Binu! Nwaako diale alɛ bakpisɔfɔ kpinwu lawɛ di Israel kasɔ suoto di obe wɔ di Elia lawɛ nii. Di kanto ladiɛ ni ɔnɔɔ alɛɛ atiɛ ku ɔfã, di kɔka kplɛ lawa ni kaasɔ nwu kamuu suoto.
42004026	Kafɔɔ, Yaa ditakyesee Elia alɛ akyɛ kuonwii lɛma nfũ. Kafɔɔ aakyesee nwɔ aakyɛ bakpisɔfɔ nfũ di Sarep okpoo kamɛ di Sidon kasɔ suoto.
42004027	Nkpo nwu kafɔɔ baatii kpinwu latoofiɛ ofiɛ sɛɛle di Israel kasɔ di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Elia obe kamɛ nɛ. Kafɔɔ kuonwii ditawɛ difiɛyɔɔ kaamɛ lɛma, dilenkee Naeman wɔ niakye ni Siria kasɔ lete niawɛ difiɛyɔɔ.”
42004028	Obe wɔ baatii ba niawɛ ni di kasiisakɔ nwu lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, ɔblɔ lafiɛ ma osie kanya di Yesu suoto.
42004029	Ni baataka, baananfi Yesu baadieko di okpoo nwu baasifiko kobokote ko suoto baabudi ni okpoo nwu kobembe, alɛ bootukusɔɔ mankpee di kɔwɛ kamɛ nɛ.
42004030	Kafɔɔ Yesu lafe ma nintɛɛ aasifi.
42004031	Nni nkpo kamaa, Yesu lasifi Kapernaum okpoo kamɛ di Galilea kasɔ suoto. Ni di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto aalaakya ko batii asaa otuo nɛ.
42004032	Asaa nɔɔ otuo labla ma ɔkpɛ, diekye aatuo nya ku otumi.
42004033	Otii onwii lawɛ di Yuda batii kasiisakɔ nwu niinwuna kpile lasiɛ nii. Ni aafaa osie kanya aabuɛ alɛ,
42004034	“Oo! Be foomiɛ di ɔkyɛ loo, afɔ Yesu Nasaret Otii? Ɔwɔɔsa fɛɛwa wo? N-ye otii wɔ fale nii! Afɔ ninle Otii Klekle wɔ di Yaa lekyesee ni nɛ!”
42004035	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakpee ninwuna nwu kufiofa alɛ, “Lo kanana! Faadie nwɔ kaamɛ!” Ninfɛ di ninwuna kpile nwu lanwanyisa nwɔ aatɛ kaasɔ di batii nwu anu nɛ. Ni aadie nwɔ kaamɛ aasifi nɛ, kafɔɔ lɛsalɛsaa ditabla osuɔtɔ nwu.
42004036	Diabla batii nwu bamuu yaaa, ni baakaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Ɔmɛnlaa ninle nwɔ? Otii wɔ mmle lɛyɔ otumi ku osie kplɛ antososa anwuna kpile andiki di batii suoto.”
42004037	Nioso Yesu leyooto lakyaka ntɛɛ nwu sekpoo simuu kamɛ.
42004038	Yesu ladie di Yuda batii kasiisakɔ, ni aasifi Simon leyo nɛ. Simon ɔmaato late aatoofiɛ kɔbɔ ofiɛ osie kanya. Ninfɛ baata Yesu latofo nɛ.
42004039	Ninfɛ aakyɛ aalaayila diɛ atensaa nɔɔ ɔlɔɔkɔ ni aasĩ ɔlaa aata ofiɛ nwu nɛ. Nfanwu, ofiɛ nwu layɔɔ nwɔ, ni aataka aanyu ma kanya nɛ.
42004040	Obe wɔ kuufĩ ntɔɔmɛɛ nii, batii ba bamuu baafiɛtɛ ate ate nkpe ni lakpaa ma baawako Yesu nfũ. Ni aatika ma nnɛɛ di suoto aayɔɔsa bamuu lɛma sifiɛ nɛ.
42004041	Anwuna kpile kpinwu kafɔɔ ladie baatii kamɛ baatooyiisa kudu alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Yaa obi nwu nɛ!” Kafɔɔ Yesu ditata anwuna kpile nwu osuku alɛ abuɛ ɔlaa kuonwii, diekye baatofo alɛ nnwɔɔ ninle Kristo wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ nɛ.
42004042	Kaale lasɛ nii, Yesu ladie di okpoo nwu aasifi lɛba le nialo nii, batii nwu lakyako nwɔ owolaa. Obe wɔ baanyɔɔ nii, baamiɛ alɛ se atansifi aadiɛ ma fiɛ.
42004043	Kafɔɔ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Dikpe nii lɛkyɛ lɛlaabuɛ Yaa sɛka kalekɔ ɔlaa biene nwu di sekpoo bamba kamɛ, diekye nni oso di Yaa lekyesee mi nɛ.”
42004044	Nkpo oso aabuɛ Yaa ɔlaa di Yuda batii nsiisakɔ nwu mmuu di kasɔ nwu suoto.
42005001	Dii ninwii, Yesu layila di lekpo le bɔɔlɛɛ ni alɛ Genesaret kotoko. Ni baatii dikudi nwu latoosisikiti alɛ bɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ nwɔ mmle baanu ni Yaa ɔlaa wɔ ababuɛ nii.
42005002	Yesu lanya ekolo ɛnyɔ n-yɛ di lekpo nwu kotoko ninfa, kɔkpaku badikitɛ ladiɛ sĩ bɛɛkyɛ boofoto asawu lɛma.
42005003	Ninfɛ di Yesu layie aabuo di oklo onwii kamɛ, nwɔ ninle ni Simon ole. Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ atukusa oklo nwu kuɔkyɛ ntu kamɛ kɛkɛɛ. Oklo nwu kamɛ di Yesu lasiɛ aatuo batii dikudi nwu asaa nɛ.
42005004	Obe wɔ aatuo ma asaa aaloo nii, Yesu latɔkɔ Simon alɛ, “Tukusa oklo nwu fakyɛnko sitũ nintu nwu kamɛ lɛɛba le niekyofo ni, di afɔ ku basiɛwo lɛfɔ biɛtaa asawu bidiki kɔkpaku.”
42005005	Ni di Simon labuɛ alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, kakyɛ ka kpe buɔbla ɔkpɛ ku ninunsɛɛ, kafɔɔ butadiki lɛsalɛsaa. Kafɔɔ bubataa asawu nwu fɛ mmle feebuɛ nii.”
42005006	Baataa asawu nwu, ni baadiki kɔkpaku kpinwu diata alɛ asawu lɛma lakyako ɔbɛbɛɛ.
42005007	Nioso, baawii nnɛɛ baalɛɛ basiɛwo lɛma diɛ oklo nyɔɔfa kamɛ alɛ bawa babakyakaako ma. Baawa babadiki kɔkpaku baayiisa eklo ɛnyɔ be mmle kamɛ pɔ alɛ kɛkɛɛ niabu di eklo nwu kamɛɛ ni nintu kamɛ.
42005008	Obe wɔ di Simon Petro lanya lɛsaa le niawa nii, ni aapɛ akunkyi di Yesu katũ, aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, tantɛɛtɛɛ mi, diekye kpileblatɛ nnle!”
42005009	Kɔkpaku ko kpinwu baadiki ni ninfa oso, dibla nnwɔɔ ku basiɛwo nɔɔ ɔkpɛ osie kanya.
42005010	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ diabla Simon basiɛwo ba ninle Sebedeo babi, Yakobo ku Yohane ɔkpɛ nɛ. Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ Simon alɛ, “Tanyɛkɛ. Diɛyɔ ni di nua diesifi nii, batii dikitɛ nfɛ fabale.”
42005011	Nni kamaa, baananfi seklo nwu baase di lekpo kotoko, ni baadiɛ lɛsaa biala baatɛ, baasifi baalaatikanko Yesu nɛ.
42005012	Obe onwii, Yesu lakyɛ okpoo onwii kamɛ, nfũ di osuɔtɔ onwii lawɛ aatoofiɛ ni ofiɛ sɛɛle. Obe wɔ di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle lanya ni Yesu, ni aapɛ akunkyi di Yesu katũ aatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ, “Saate! Nse dilɛ fɔ, faafuo ɔta suoto nii mbla klekle.”
42005013	Yesu ladiki kɔnɛɛ aakpanko nwɔ, aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Letuna, suoto lɛfɔ siklekle!” Nfanwu, ni di ɔfiɛ nwu layɔɔ nwɔ nɛ.
42005014	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakpee nwɔ kufiofa alɛ, “Tantɔkɔ otii kuonwii. Kafɔɔ tɔɔkyɛ falaayɔ suoto lɛfɔ fatuo Yaa oletatɛ, faata ole di mmle di Mose lekpee kufiofa ɛɛtɛ ni di suoto okleklesa suoto, diatuo alɛ ɔfiɛ nwu ntɔɔyɔɔ fɔ ni.”
42005015	Kafɔɔ Yesu leyooto lakyaka kayi osie kanya. Diata alɛ batii kpinwu latɔɔwa alɛ bɔbatoonu nwɔ asaa otuo anyɔɔsa ma sifiɛ.
42005016	Kafɔɔ obe obe, andie ankyɛ lɛba le nielo ni anaatɔɔpɛ ɔlaa antɔɔta Yaa.
42005017	Dii ninwii obe wɔ di Yesu latotuo ni asaa, Yuda batii dikudi le bɔɔlɛɛ ni Farisi batii ku kufiofa batuotɛ bawo lakye Galilea ku Yudea ku Yerusalem kasɔ aba aba baawa nfa. Ni di Yaa Ninwuna lasiɛ di Yesu kamɛ alɛ ɔɔyɔɔsa batii sifiɛ nɛ.
42005018	Nfanwu, batii banwii niakpaa osuɔtɔ onwii niafefee aate ni di ɔkla suoto baawako. Baatoomiɛ osuku wɔ baayɔ nwɔ mambuoko ni leyo le di Yesu lawɛ nii, man-yɔ osuɔtɔ nwu mantɛ ni di anu nɔɔ.
42005019	Kafɔɔ batii lɛpɔ nwu oso, batafuo osuku ɔwɛ. Nle mmle oso, baatuka nwɔ baalaayie lɛkya osi. Ni baadufu kutuɛ di lɛkya nwu suoto baasoosa fiɛtɛ nwu ku ɔkla nɔɔ wɔ suoto aate nii, baatɛ di Yesu anu di batii nwu ntɛɛ nɛ.
42005020	Di Yesu lanya ni ofũ onu lɛma oso, ni aatɔkɔ osuɔtɔ nwu alɛ, “Siɛwo nii, ntɔɔyɔ sikpile lɛfɔ lɛkyɛ fɔ!”
42005021	Ninfɛ di Farisi batii ku kufiofa batuotɛ lakyako bawo ɔkaalɛ alɛ, “Owe ninle nwɔ mmle nikobuɛ ni mbusuo ɔlaa wɔ mmle? Yaa lete nikafuo sikpile ɔyɔ ɔkyɛ!”
42005022	Obe wɔ di Yesu latofo ni disibu lɛma, ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Be oso biobu sɛlaa se mmle okle disi?
42005023	Lɛmɛnle niɛyɔɔ dilenke di sɛlaa se mmle obuɛ kamɛ, ‘Bɛɛyɔ sikpile lɛfɔ bɛɛkyɛ fɔ’ ɛɛ sɛɛ baabuɛ alɛ, ‘Taka faakyɛ’?
42005024	Kamadiki ntuo ye nlɛ ami, Otii Obi nkpe, otumi kaasɔ ka mmle suoto n-yɔ okpile nkyɛ.” Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ otii wɔ niekpi ni kakyɛkakyɛ alɛ, “Kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, taka faayɔ ɔkla lɛfɔ faatɔɔkyɛ leyo!”
42005025	Nfanwu, osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo niataka aayila baati nwu anu, aayɔ atensaa nɔɔ ya suoto aate nii, aasifi leyo, aakyako Yaa ɔtansa.
42005026	Lɛsaa le mmle labla batii nwu bamuu ɔkpɛ! Nioso lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ bamuu lɛma, ni baatansa Yaa, baabuɛ alɛ, “Be mɔ lɛsaa kplɛ buɔnya miɛ nkpo?”
42005027	Nni kamaa, Yesu ladie leeyo nwu kamɛ, ni aanya akpooto funtɛ onwii baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Lewi, aasiɛ di akpooto kafunkɔ. Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tikankoe!”
42005028	Nfanwu, Lewi ladiɛ lɛsaa biala aatɛ, ni aataka aatikanko nwɔ nɛ.
42005029	Lewi lata baawa alesaa biene leeyo nɔɔ, aatũ opunu kplɛ aata Yesu. Baakyakako akpooto bafuntɛ kpinwu ku batii bamba kafɔɔ.
42005030	Farisi batii ku kufiofa batuotɛ ba niawɛ ni di alesaa nwu kalekɔ lakye kasɔ baatɔɔnanfiko Yesu basaateketetɛ ɔlaa alɛ, “Be oso biole minwee ku akpooto bafuntɛ ku bakpileblatɛ bamba ba mmle?”
42005031	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Fablatɛ diefĩ batii ba ninoofiɛ nii, bafiɛtɛ di fablatɛ lefĩ.
42005032	Ninwa babienetɛ ɔlɛɛ, bakpiletɛ oso lɛwa.”
42005033	Batii bawo lakaalɛ alɛ, “Lɛ diɛwa fiɛ di Yohane basaateketetɛ nnii kanya mampɛ ɔlaa manta Yaa wlawla, Farisi batii basaateketetɛ kafɔɔ mbla nkpo, kafɔɔ bale fɔ mma obe lele manle manyi?”
42005034	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Biefũ bienu bilɛ batii ba bɛɛkyakako bɛɛwako ni ɔsanko kayɔkɔ kaanii kanya di obe wɔ di ɔsanko nwu nkpo ɔsa nkpe ma ni di ɔkyɛ? Oowo! Diidii dilaafuo ɔwa nkpo!
42005035	Kafɔɔ, dii lewo kɔwa, babakpaa ɔsanko nwu ɔsa di ɔkyɛ lɛma mansifiko nii. Nfa nfɛ babakyako kanya onii nɛ.”
42005036	Nni kamaa, Yesu lapɛ ma lɛkpa le mmle alɛ, “Otii konwii nimbɛ dibula fɔle aakaa aatĩi lekofole kabɛkɔ. Nse otii owo lɛbla nkpo, abalalaasa dibula fɔle nwu. Ni kafɔɔ, lekofole nwu nkpo ku lɛfɔle nwu nkpo dilabakaatɛɛ bia.
42005037	Nkpo kafɔɔ kuonwii nin-yɔ nta fɔle aakpete di bɔkɛɛ kukũ kotofo kofole kamɛ nɛ. Diekye nse diɛwa nkpo, nta fɔle nwu nkpo mafuu ninta alɛ, kɔbɔkɛɛkũ kotofo nwu nkpo mbɛ, nta nwu nkpo kafɔɔ nwii nyinlalaa.
42005038	Nioso dikaatɛ alɛ baayɔ nta fɔle mankpete di kɔbɔkɛɛkũ fɔle kamɛ.
42005039	Diɛkyakaa nii, otii kuonwii ninyi nta kofole, nfɛ oosiɛ nii aakple aakaalɛ nfɔle. Nse diele nkpo ɔlaa wɔ ababuɛ ni ko ninle alɛ, ‘Nkofole nwu nlɛ dilɛnke nfɔle!’ ”
42006001	Di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi ninwii suoto, Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ latoofe di atita kofe kunwii kamɛ. Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu lakyako atita nwu ofee, baafini nya baakyako owee nɛ.
42006002	Ninfɛ di Farisi batii bawo lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Be oso biɔbla lɛsaa le di kufiofa loo diɛta ni osuku alɛ babla ni di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto?”
42006003	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Biika lɛsaa le di Dawid labla ni ku bawo nɔɔ di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ binya, di obe wɔ kɔɔka laklee ma ni?
42006004	Dawid lakyɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ kamɛ aalaayɔ alesaa ya baata ni Yaa ole, aale ni. Aayɔ awo kafɔɔ aata bawo nɔɔ lale ni. Nu kuufiofa loo diɛta osuku alɛ otii bamba kale ni alesaa nwu nkpo. Diediki Yaa oletatɛ lete pɛ nikale ni.”
42006005	Ninfɛ di Yesu labuɛ aanyɛntɛ alɛ, “Ami, Otii Obi, ninle Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi Saate.”
42006006	Di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi bamba suoto Yesu lakyɛ Yuda batii kasiisakɔ, aalaatuo asaa. Osuɔtɔ onwii lawɛ ninfa di koletanɛɛ nɔɔ lakatu nii.
42006007	Kufiofa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii bawo lawɛ ninfa baatoomiɛ osuku wɔ baafe man-yɔ ni ɔlaa di Yesu suoto oso, baadiki anu baase nwɔ baatoonyu, nse, abayɔɔsa ofiɛ di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi nwu suoto.
42006008	Di Yesu latofo ma ni disibu nwu oso, ni aatɔkɔ osuɔtɔ nwu kɔɔnɛɛ lɛkatu ni alɛ, “Taka, fawa sitũ ninfũ.” Ni di osuɔtɔ nwu lataka aakyɛ aalaayila ma diɛ anu nɛ.
42006009	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Be di kufiofa loo lɛta osuku alɛ buabla di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto? Dilɛ alɛ buabla dibiene di lɛnyɛɛtɔyi suoto ɛɛ, buabla dikpile? Ee dilɛ alɛ buafũ batii nkpa ɛɛ, sɛɛ buawɔɔsa mi?”
42006010	Yesu lanyu batii nwu bamuu aafenko, ni aatɔkɔ osuɔtɔ nwu alɛ, “Yilasa kɔnɛɛ lɛfɔ.” Ni aayilasa kũ nɛ, nfanwu kɔnɛɛ nɔɔ nwu lakple kualɛ.
42006011	Ɔblɔ lafiɛ batii nwu bamuu ni baakyako disi obu di lɛsaa le babafuo ni Yesu ɔbla.
42006012	Di obe nwu kamɛ, Yesu lasifi kabokotee kanwii osi, alɛ ɔɔlaa pɛ ɔlaa anta Yaa. Aawɛ ninfa kakyɛ kamuu, aatɔɔpɛ ɔlaa aatɔɔta Yaa.
42006013	Obe wɔ kaale lasɛ nii, aalɛɛ basaatekete nɔɔ bamuu aasiisa, ni aadiki lefosi batii banyɔ kaamɛ lɛma, aata ma leyooto alɛ, batɔkyɛntɛ.
42006014	Mma ninle, Simon wɔ aata ni leyooto alɛ, Petro ku obilɛma suɔtɔbi Andrea ku Yakobo ku Yohane ku Filipo ku Bartolomeo,
42006015	ku Mateo ku Toma ku Yakobo wɔ ninle ni Alfeo obi ku Simon wɔ manlɛɛ ni alɛ otii wɔ nimbɔmbɔ ni okpoo nɔɔ.
42006016	Ku Yakobo obi Yuda ku Yuda Iskariot wɔ niabakple ni otii dikitatɛ.
42006017	Di obe wɔ di Yesu ku batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ lasosoo baakye ni kabokotee nwu osi, baabayila lɛɛba le ninte ni yaaa. Ni di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ kpinwu bawo lawɛ ninfa ku batii dikudi kplɛ ninwii le niakye ni Tiro ku Sidon.
42006018	Baawa alɛ, bɔɔbanu asaa ya di Yesu kotuo nii, anyɔɔsa ma sifiɛ ate ate se boofiɛ nii. Batii ba di anwuna kpile latɔɔhaa ni kafɔɔ lawa aayɔɔsa bamuu lɛma sifiɛ.
42006019	Batii ba mmle bamuu lakpee ɔnyɛɛ baakpanko nwɔ, mmle siifiɛ lɛma kayɔɔ ma nii. Diekye osie owo latoodie di Yesu suoto kamɛ diatɔɔyɔɔsa batii bamuu sifiɛ.
42006020	Yesu latakatɛsa anu aanyu basaateketetɛ nɔɔ, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Suoto siyɔɔ aye bapiitɛ, dikye Yaa sɛka kalekɔ ninle ye kale!
42006021	Suoto siyɔɔ aye ba kɔɔka nkle ni nunua diekye aye nimamiɛ nɛ! Suoto siyɔɔ aye ba nikowi ni nunua, diekye aye nimama nɛ!
42006022	Suoto siyɔɔ ye nse batii lekyidi ye, beesĩ ye, beetufa ye, beebuɛ kafɔɔ alɛ batii kpile bile ta ami, Otii Obi, oso!
42006023	“Binya suoto lɛyɔɔ nse n-ya mmle amuu kɔwa, bietũ ku suoto lɛyɔɔ, diekye Yaa mata ye letota kplɛ di Yaa kafa. Diekye asaa ya mmle okle di bawa lɛma layɔ baabla Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nɛ.
42006024	Aye ba ninle ni basaawɛntɛ biyɔɔsa, diekye bitɔɔwɛ suoto lɛyɔɔ lee ninfũ!
42006025	Aye ba nintoole biemiɛ ni nunua biyɔɔsa, diekye kɔka kɔwa ye ɔbaklee! Aye ba nikɔma ni miɛ, biyɔɔsa diekye biɔwa sɛnyaami obuo ku kaku owi!
42006026	Biyɔɔsa, aye ba baatii kɔtansa ni miɛ, diekye nkpo okle kafɔɔ di bawa lɛma latansa balaatɛ Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nɛ.
42006027	“Kafɔɔ aye ba nikonu mi ni ɔlaa, kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, bibɔmbɔ balo lee, biɛbla dibiene bita ma.
42006028	Batii ba ninkpaani ye nii, bikaalɛ dikusɛkusɛ bita ma. Batii ba kafɔɔ nikɔbla ye ni amumu, bipɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa diisi lɛma.
42006029	Nse otii owo kafɔɔ lɛpɛ fɔ kɔnɛɛ kootokosi, faamunikĩisa kɔnyɔɔfa kafɔɔ fatɔɔ apɛ. Nse otii owo lefũ fɔ osi awu kplɛ, faadiɛko nwɔ kalɔ ale kafɔɔ.
42006030	Otii lele niɛkaalɛ fɔ lɛsaa, faatɔɔ. Nse otii owo lɛyɔ fɔ lɛsaa, tambuɛ falɛ dikpe ni eekplesa ni ɛɛwako.
42006031	Lɛsaa le biomiɛ bilɛ batii babla bata ye nii, nni okle biɛɛbla bita ma nɛ.
42006032	“Nse mimbɔmbɔ batii ba nimbɔmbɔ ye ni lete, ni lɛmɛnkusɛkusɛ bibawɛ? Bia bakpileblatɛ mbɔmbɔ batii ba nimbɔmbɔ ma nii.
42006033	Ni nse batii ba nimbla ye ni dibiene lete mimbla dibiene minta, sɛmɛnfa babapɛ ye? Bia bakpileblatɛ mbla nkpo.
42006034	Ni nse minfɛnsa asaa minta batii ba lete biye bilɛ babakplesa manwako ye nii, lɛmɛnkusɛkusɛ bibawɛ? Bia bakpileblatɛ nfɛnsa asaa manta bawo alɛ baakplesa manwako ma!
42006035	Kafɔɔ, bibɔmbɔ balo lee, biɛbla dibiene bita ma. Bifɛnsa ma asaa, kafɔɔ bitantika anu bilɛ babakplesa manwako ye kokooko. Nse biɛbla nkpo, bibawɛ letota kplɛ. Ni babalɛɛ ye alɛ Yaa wɔ ninlenke ni babi. Diekye Yaa nkpe sifutulɛ ɛɛta batii ba di asaa nimbuo ni anu ku basiensietɛ.
42006036	Binya nyaami fɛ mmle okle di Teeye nnya ni nyaami.
42006037	“Bitankanko bawo lee, ni Yaa kafɔɔ dilɔbakanko ye. Bitanlo bawo lee lɛpɔɔ, ni Yaa kafɔɔ dilɔbalo ye lɛpɔɔ. Biyɔ bikyɛ bawo lee, ni Yaa kafɔɔ mayɔ ankyɛ ye.
42006038	Bita batii asaa, ni Yaa kafɔɔ mata ye asaa. Nwaako, Yaa mata siwu lee nyii pɔ di sifutulɛ nɔɔ kanya. Diekye leklapoosaa le biɛyɔ biɛklapoosa biɛta ni bawo lee, nninwu okle di Yaa mayɔ anklapoosa anta ye nɛ.”
42006039	Ninfɛ di Yesu lapɛ ma lɛkpa alɛ, “Numbiɛtɛ dilɔbafuo numbiɛtɛ wo nɔɔ katũ oleko, se diele nkpo, ni banyɔ lɛma babakpa mambuo diibiɔ kamɛ.
42006040	Saateketetɛ kuonwii ninlenkee saatuotɛ nɔɔ. Kafɔɔ nse saateketetɛ ntooloo asaa nɔɔ otekete, ote ante fɛ mmle di saatuotɛ nɔɔ nte nii.
42006041	“Lɛ diɛbla fɔɔnya diku biibii le ninsi ni di owo lɛfɔ ninu, kafɔɔ fɔlɔɔnya kawosoku ka ninsi fɔ ni leele kamɛ?
42006042	Lɛ dibawa alɛ faatɔkɔ owo lɛfɔ falɛ, ‘Lekoto, owo nii, tɛɛ ndiki fɔ diku niinu.’ Kafɔɔ fɔlɔɔnya kawosoku ka ninsi fɔ ni niinu kamɛ? Afɔ laatɛ! Lekatũ fadiki kawosoku ka ninsi ni niinu lɛfɔ kamɛ fiɛ, ni fabafuo ɔnya nwaa, fandiki diku biibii le ninsi ni di obilee ninu kamɛ.
42006043	“Kowoso biene níntika abi lalaale, kowoso lalaale kafɔɔ níntika abi biene.
42006044	Kowoso biala, abi ya ootika ni man-yɔ mantofo kũ. Mántɛsɛ akpaloo abi di kukutuwoso suoto, nkpo kafɔ manantɛsɛ akutu di akpaloo dikũmii suoto nɛ.
42006045	Otii biene yi, asaa biene ya eekookaa ni di otu nɔɔ kamɛ andiki asaa biene kayi ankyeko. Kafɔɔ otii kpile nnwɔɔ, asaa kpile ya eekookaa ni di otu nɔɔ kamɛ andiki asaa kpile ankyeko. Diekye asaa ya nintooyii ni otii otu kamɛ, nnya ambuɛ nɛ.
42006046	“Be lɛsaa oso biɔlɛɛ mi Saate, kafɔɔ mimbla di lɛsaa le kɔtɔkɔ ye ni suoto?
42006047	Otii lele niɛwa ɔkyɛ nii, annu mi ɔlaa, ambla nwu di suoto, matuo ye otii wɔ ale nii.
42006048	Ate fɛ otii wɔ nikotofo ni leyo, eekutu ni kasɔ diekyofo nii, ese ni lɛsɔse nɔɔ di afuɔ suoto. Nse okle leyii, kuobiɛ kuɔbasa di seyoyiɛ nwu suoto, leyo nwu nimbla lɛsalɛsaa, diekye diɛwɛ lɛba biene diyɛ.
42006049	Kafɔɔ otii wɔ ninnu mi ni ɔlaa anaamufũ nwu aaklee nii, ate fɛ otii wɔ nietofo ni leyo di kɔtɛ suoto lɛɛsɔse nɔɔ nnaa ni osie. Nioso nse okle leyii kuobiɛ kuɔbasa leyo nwu, nimbiɛ osie kanya wududu ninkaa kaasɔ!”
42007001	Obe wɔ di Yesu latɔkɔ batii sɛlaa se mmle simuu aaloo nii, ni aasifi Kapernaum nɛ.
42007002	Roma batii bakpɛtɛ nɔɔfo onwii lawɛ ninfa, aawɛ kpɛmblatɛ onwii ambɔmbɔ ni osie kanya. Kpɛmblatɛ wɔ mmle latoofiɛ osie kanya diabu kɛɛkɛɛ aakpi nii.
42007003	Nioso obe wɔ aanu ni Yesu lɛkpanko, aakpee Yuda batii banɔɔfo bawo alɛ bakyɛ baalaatɔkɔ nwɔ aawa abayɔɔsa kpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ nwu ofiɛ atɔɔ.
42007004	Obe wɔ baatii ba mmle lawa ni Yesu nfũ, baatikiti nwɔ lekoto osie kanya alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle lesiɛko alɛ faatɔɔ lɛkyakaako,
42007005	diekye ambɔmbɔ kale loo. Nnwɔɔ nietofo Yuda batii kasiisakɔ ɛɛta wo nɛ.”
42007006	Nioso Yesu lataka aatikanko ma. Obe wɔ di Yesu nfɛ kɔtɛɛtɛɛ ni bakpɛtɛ nɔɔfo nwu leyo, ni aakpee basiɛwo nɔɔ alɛ bakyɛ baalaatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saate, tankpee suoto dibuo. Diekye ami, ninsiɛko alɛ, faawa mi leyo.
42007007	Nkpo kafɔɔ ninasiɛko alɛ kawa fɔ anu nɛ. Nkpo oso afɔ buɛ ɔlaa onwii pɛ, kpɛmblatɛ nii mawɛ osie.
42007008	Diekye ami kafɔɔ nsi di ɔnɔɔfo wɔ ninlenke mi ni kalɔ. Ni baakpɛtɛ nsi mi kaalɔ. Nse lɛtɔkɔ onwii nlɛ, ‘Akyɛ nfũ,’ ni ankyɛ nɛ. Nse lɛtɔkɔ ɔbamba nlɛ, ‘Awa ninfũ,’ ni anwa nɛ. Nse lɛtɔkɔ kpɛmblatɛ nii nlɛ, ‘Bla nle,’ ni ambla nɛ.”
42007009	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ nii, diabla nwɔ ɔkpɛ. Ninfɛ aamunikĩi aatɔkɔ batii dikudi le niatikanko nwɔ ni alɛ, “Kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, diidii ninnya ofũ onu wɔ mmle okle di Israel batii kamɛ nnya!”
42007010	Obe wɔ baatii ba baakpee ni kɔtɔ lakple baalaabuo ni leyo, baanya alɛ kpɛmblatɛ nwu sitoosie nwɔ.
42007011	Ninkpo kamaa, Yesu lakyɛ okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Nain kamɛ. Basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ku batii dikudi kpinwu latikanko nwɔ.
42007012	Obe wɔ aadu ni okpoo nwu kasũkunya, aakyakako batii kodie bakle kpi boofenko kakookaakɔ. Otii wɔ niakpi nii, obisuɔtɔbi onwii nwu pɛ aale aata kpisɔfɔ nwu nɛ. Batii dikudi kpinwu di okpoo nwu kamɛ lawɛ di kpisɔfɔ nwu ɔkyɛ.
42007013	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanya ni ɔsanko wɔ mmle, aakpɛ nwɔ nyaamii. Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Diɛ owi.”
42007014	Ninfɛ di Yesu lafe kaamɛ lɛma aalaakpanko kpi alakaa nwu nɛ. Ninfɛ baatii ba niatuka ni kpi nwu nkpo layila nɛ. Ni di Yesu labuɛ alɛ, “Okosopo! Kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ taka!”
42007015	Nfanwu kpi nwu nkpo niataka aasiɛ, aakyako ɔkakatɛ. Ni di Yesu lakpaa nwɔ aata ɔya nɛ.
42007016	Lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ batii nwu bamuu osie kanya, ni baatansa Yaa nɛ. Ta nkpo oso baabuɛ alɛ, “Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ kplɛ nintɔɔwa wo kamɛ! Yaa ntoosoo ɛwa batii nɔɔ odiki!”
42007017	Yesu suoto ɔlaa wɔ mmle lakpɛ kuakyaka Yuda kasɔ nwu suoto ku aba bule amuu.
42007018	Obe wɔ di Yohane basaateketetɛ latɔkɔ ni Yohane sɛlaa se mmle, nfanwu aalɛɛ batii banyɔ kaamɛ lɛma.
42007019	Ni aakpee ma Saate nwu nfũ alɛ balaakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle otii wɔ alɛ abawa ni ɛɛ, sɛɛ buatoonyu osuku muntɔɔta otii bamba?”
42007020	Nioso obe wɔ baawa ni Yesu nfũ, baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ntu kpeesatɛ Yohane lekpee wo alɛ buwa buɔbakaalɛ fɔ alɛ, ‘Afɔ ninle otii wɔ aabuɛ alɛ abawa ni ɛɛ, sɛɛ buanyu osuku munta otii bamba?’ ”
42007021	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Yesu ntɔɔyɔɔsa batii kpinwu sifiɛ, ate ate, eetososa anwuna kpile baatii suoto, eetikiti kafɔɔ banumbiɛtɛ kpinwu anu.
42007022	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya aatɔkɔ Yohane basaateketetɛ nwu alɛ, “Bikple biɛlaatɔkɔ Yohane asaa ya biɛnya ni ku n-ya bienu ni bilɛ, banumbiɛtɛ nfɛ kɔnya asaa, abafa nfɛ kɔtaka ankyɛ, batii ba nikofiɛ ni sifiɛ sɛɛle suoto ntɔɔkpa, batokotĩitɛ nfɛ konu, bakpi kɔtaka mansiɛ nkpa, bapiitɛ kafɔɔ nfɛ konu ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo.
42007023	Suoto mayɔɔ batii ba ninanya ni ɔlaa kpile kuonwii di suoto nii.”
42007024	Obe wɔ di Yohane basaateketetɛ ntoosifi beeloo nii, Yesu lakye kasɔ aatɔɔkakatɛ aatɔɔta batii dikudi nwu nkpo di Yohane suoto alɛ, “Obe wɔ biadie biakyɛ ni Yohane nfũ di ɔfaafuu kamɛ, be biatoonyu osuku bilɛ bianya? Lɛkpɛnyi le di kɔfɛɛfɔ latɔɔfɛ ni?
42007025	Be lɛsaa biadie biakyɛ bialaanya? Otii wɔ niakpe ntu aasiɛ ni di asaa biene kamɛ? Batii ba ninlolaa suoto mansiɛ ni di suoto lɛyɔɔ kamɛ yi, baka ayo mansiɛ.
42007026	Aye bitɔkɔ mi, be biakyɛ bialaanya? Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ? Nwaako katɔkɔ ye nii, otii wɔ biakyɛ bialaanya ni nlenke bia Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ.
42007027	Diekye Yohane ninle otii wɔ di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Makyesee tɔkyɛntɛ nii anlefɔ katũ, analolaa osuku antɛ fɔ.’ ”
42007028	Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Yohane nlenke Otii biala beelofo ni kaayi ka mmle kamɛ. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ ninle ni ɔyɛntɛle di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ, nlenke Yohane.”
42007029	Batii nwu nkpo bamuu lanu Yohane ɔlaa biene wɔ aabuɛ nii, kyenkye akpooto bafuntɛ lafũ Yaa dibiesaa baanu, ninfɛ aakpeesa ma Yaa ntu nɛ.
42007030	Kafɔɔ Farisi batii ku kufiofa batuotɛ lasĩ Yaa dibiesaa, nioso Yohane ditakpeesa ma Yaa ntu.
42007031	Yesu lakple aabuɛ aakyakaa alɛ, “Nunua, be lɛsaa kayɔ miɛ akyɛnfɔɔle nkaatɛɛsa ko?
42007032	Nkpo bate fɛ babisɔ ba ninsi bookpee ni kɔkyɔ di asaa kasunsukɔ nɛ. Bɔɔtɔkɔ dikudi bamba alɛ, ‘Buasa sɛkafɔɔnu buata ye, kafɔɔ biasĩ otũ. Buakpee sikunu buata ye, kafɔɔ biasĩ kaku owi.’
42007033	Ntu kpeesatɛ Yohane lawa, aanii kanya, atanyi nta kafɔɔ diidii, biatɔkɔ nwɔ bilɛ, ‘Ninwuna kpile ninsi nwɔ!’
42007034	Ni di ami, Otii Obi, kafɔɔ lɛwa, lele, lenyi. Ni biobuɛ bilɛ, ‘Banyu lenyatɛ ku tanyintɛ nwu lo! Ale akpooto bafuntɛ ku bakpileblatɛ siɛwo!’
42007035	Kafɔɔ batii ba bamuu nintikanko ni Yaa ninumbe nkpaamaa, batoodiki beetuo alɛ ninumbe nwaa dile.”
42007036	Farisi otii onwii lalɛɛ Yesu alɛ awa abale ko nwɔ alesaa. Nioso Yesu lakyɛ leyo nɔɔ aalaasiɛ alɛ ooleko nwɔ alesaa.
42007037	Ɔsanko onwii lawɛ di okpoo nwu kamɛ, aale sɔnɔkpeetɛ. Nioso obe wɔ aanu alɛ Yesu lɛwa akpe ni di Farisi otii nwu leyo oole ni alesaa, aayɔ lebo kylɔkylɔ ninwii di nnɔnyi kɔnɔkɔnɔ layii ni aawako.
42007038	Aabayila di Yesu ɔlɔɔkɔ, aatoowi kaku aatookpete di Yesu nkpaatũ. Ni di ɔsanko nwu nkpo layɔ disi nɔɔ sinwini aatoosunsũ nnumɛɛ be niakpete ni di Yesu nkpaa nɛ. Aafĩfĩɔ nwɔ nkpaatũ, ni aanyɛɛnɛ nnɔnyi kɔnɔkɔnɔ nwu kafɔɔ aakpete nwɔ ninkpaatũ nɛ.
42007039	Obe wɔ di Farisi otii wɔ niakyakako ni Yesu lanya ni nle mmle, aabuɛ di disi nɔɔ kamɛ alɛ, “Nse otii wɔ mmle Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ ale nwaako, se dikpeni antofo ɔsanko wɔ mmle otiikle wɔ ale ni fiɛ ɛɛwa ɔɔkpanko nwɔ nii!”
42007040	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Simon, nkpe ɔlaa komiɛ nlɛ ntɔkɔfɔ nii.” Ninfɛ di Simon labuɛ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, tɔkɔ mi ɔlaa wɔ kule ni.”
42007041	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakye kasɔ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Otii onwii lawɛ aatɔɔfɛnsa ato, aatɔɔta batii, ni baatii banyɔ banwii lasiɛko nwɔ koto nɛ. Onwii lasiɛko koto ko nikawo ni fɛ otii kɔwɛntɛto. Ɔnyɔɔfa kafɔɔ lasiɛko fɛ awɛntɛ lefosi kɔkpɛnto.
42007042	Batii ba mmle banyɔ kuonwii dilɔbafuo koto nwu nkpo ɔta. Nkpo oso, ato fɛnsatɛ nwu layɔ ato ya baasiɛko nwɔ ni aakyɛ ma. Baatii ba mmle kamɛ, ɔmɛnle lɛma feenyu falɛ ababɔmbɔ ato fɛnsatɛ nwu anlenkee?”
42007043	Ninfɛ di Simon labuɛ alɛ, “Lefũ lenu nlɛ otii wɔ koto nimpɔ kulenke nii.” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Feelolaa feebuɛ, nkpo kute nɛ.”
42007044	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu lamunikĩi aanyu ɔsanko nwu, ni aatɔkɔ Simon alɛ, “Fɔɔnya ɔsanko wɔ mmle? Obe wɔ lɛwa ni leyo lɛfɔ, faatɛɛ ntu nfoto nkpaa, kafɔɔ ɔsanko wɔ mmle lɛyɔ nnumɛɛ nɔɔ eefoto mi nkpaa ɛɛyɔ disi sinwini nɔɔ eesunsũ mi.
42007045	Faafũ mi fabla mi atuu ku suoto lɛyɔɔ. Kafɔɔ diɛyɔ ni di obe wɔ lɛbabuo ni nfũ, ayidiɛ mi nkpaatũ ofĩfĩɔ.
42007046	Faatɛɛ nnɔnyi falɛ nkpee diisi. Kafɔɔ ɔsanko wɔ mmle lɛyɔ nnɔnyi kɔnɔkɔnɔ eekpeete mi ninkpaatũ.
42007047	Nkpo oso kɔtɔkɔfɔ nlɛ, di lɛbɔmbɔ kplɛ le eediki eetuo mi ni oso, diotuo alɛ batɔɔyɔ sikpile nɔɔ se kpinwu ɛɛbla ni bɛɛkyɛ nwɔ. Otii wɔ kafɔɔ bɛɛyɔ sikpile kɛɛkɛɛ bɛɛkyɛ nii, lɛbɔmbɔ nɔɔ kafɔɔ kɛɛkɛɛ ninle.”
42007048	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ɔsanko nwu alɛ, “Batɔɔyɔ sikpile lɛfɔ bɛɛkyɛ fɔ.”
42007049	Obe wɔ baatii ba niasiɛ ni di alesaa kalekɔ nwu ninfa lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ di Yesu labuɛ nii, baakaalɛ suoto alɛ, “Owe ninle nwɔ ninfũ oofuo bia batii sikpile ɔyɔ ɔkyɛ ma ni?”
42007050	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ɔsanko nwu alɛ, “Ofũ onu lɛfɔ ntoodiki fɔ, nioso tɔɔkyɛ ku atoko ɔkyɛ ole.”
42008001	Obe owo kamaa, Yesu lakyɛ aatookyi sekpoo ku nkpayotũ kamɛ, aatoobuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ suoto. Lefosi batii banyɔ ba kafɔɔ aadiki ni latikanko nwɔ.
42008002	Basanko ba di Yesu layɔɔsa ni sifiɛ ate ate ku mba aatososa ni anwuna kpile aadiki ni kaamɛ lɛma kafɔɔ latikanko nwɔ. Di kamɛ lɛma onwii lasiɛ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Maria Magdalene, nwɔ kamɛ di Yesu latososa ni anwuna kpile akuɛnsĩ.
42008003	Ɔsanko bamba kafɔɔ kaamɛ lɛma niale nwɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Yohana, ɔsa baatɔɔlɛɛ Kusa, aale ni Herode kakankɔ asaa nyuntɛ nɔɔfo nɛ. Basanko bamba kpinwu ku nwɔ kafɔɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Susana latikanko Yesu, baatɔɔyɔ mma bamu asaa ya baatɔɔwɛ nii baatɔɔkyakaako Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ.
42008004	Batii kpinwu lakye sekpoo ate ate baatɔɔwa Yesu nfũ. Ni di obe wɔ baatii kpinwu ntɔɔbasi nii, Yesu lapɛ ma lɛkpa le mmle alɛ,
42008005	“Alesaa kubi santɛ onwii lakyɛ aalaasa alesaa kubi. Obe wɔ ɔɔsa ni kubi nwu koofe kamɛ, kowo lakpete di osuku suoto batii lananafu kũ, bakansiɛ kafɔɔ labasɛsɛɛ kũ baale.
42008006	Kowo kafɔɔ lakpete di afuɔ kasɔ. Di obe wɔ kuakɔntɔ nii, kutawɛ ntu ku kasɔ nwaa kuayila. Nkpo oso kuayɔɔ kuakpi.
42008007	Alesaa kubi nwu kowo lakpete di siwuu sɛfa kamɛ. Ni siiwuu sɛfa nwu lamuɔ siafukiti siatĩi alesaa kubi nwu kumuu nɛ.
42008008	Alesaa kubi nwu kowo kafɔɔ lakpete di kasɔ biene suoto. Kuakɔntɔ kuamuɔ kuatika abi alafa alafa.” Di Yesu latoobuɛ ni sɛlaa se mmle, aanyɛntɛ alɛ, “Otii wɔ kuunutoko nkpe nii yi, aanu!”
42008009	Yesu basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakaalɛ nwɔ lɛkpa nwu nkpo kasɔ.
42008010	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye beediki lɛsaatofo le niewofa ni di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ beetuo. Kafɔɔ batii bule akpa kamɛ bɛyɔ bɛɛta ma alɛ, ‘Babanya asaa, kafɔɔ blɔbanya batɛ nsũ. Babanu kafɔɔ, blɔbanu kasɔ.’
42008011	“Lɛkpa nwu lɛsɔdiki ninle nle mmle nɛ. Alesaa kubi nwu nkpo baasa ni ninle Yaa ɔlaa nɛ.
42008012	Alesaa kubi nwu nkpo niakpete ni di osuku suoto ninle batii ba, nse beenu ɔlaa nwu nkpo, Abonsam nwa amadiki nwu di situ lɛma kamɛ, mmle manaafũ banu alɛ Yaa kadiki ma anta ma ni nkpa.
42008013	Nko kafɔɔ niakpete ni di afuɔ kasɔ suoto, ninle batii ba nse beenu ɔlaa nwu nkpo, manfũ nwu ku suoto lɛyɔɔ. Kafɔɔ kumbuo ma kaamɛ nwaa. Manfũ nwu manu di obe kakuii kamɛ. Nkpo oso nse ɔsɔ onyu lɛwa ma di suoto, mankple nkpaamaa.
42008014	Alesaa kubi ko kafɔɔ niakpete ni di siwuu sɛfa kamɛ ninle, batii ba nienu ni ɔlaa nwu nkpo, kafɔɔ kayika mmle nimiina ku lɛsaawɛ ku kayi suoto omɛnɛfɛ okpee nfukiti nintĩi ma, mámmuɔ baatika abi.
42008015	Alesaa kubi ko niakpete ni di kasɔ biene suoto, ninle batii ba nse beenu ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo, mammufũ nwu manklee ku situ biene. Manwakosa suoto kasɔ mankpee okyiini ninaadu obe wɔ beetika ni abi.
42008016	“Otii kuonwii ninsɔ kandiɛ, aayɔ lɛsaa aatĩi nwɔ. Ee aayɔ ase di mpa kalɔ. Kafɔɔ antakatɛsa kandiɛ nwu antika lɛɛba le niɛtaka nii, alɛ aakpa anta batii ba nikɔwa ni leyo nwu kamɛ.
42008017	Lɛsaa lele niewofa kaakɔ lele, babadiki ni kayi. Lelele kafɔɔ beetĩi bɛɛtɛ diitunu kamɛ, babanya ni mandiki ni manwako lɛkpa kamɛ.
42008018	“Bilolaa atoko bikyɔɔ di sɛlaa se bianu ni suoto. Otii wɔ nienu, eenu ni kasɔ, abakple annu kasɔ anlenkee bia. Otii wɔ ninankyɔɔ ni atoko, kɛɛkɛɛ wɔ eenyu alɛ eenu nii bia, babakle manfũ nwɔ ninnɛɛ mansifiko.”
42008019	Yesu ɔya ku Yesu basuɔtɔbi lɛma lawa nwɔ ɔnya, kafɔɔ batafuo nwɔ ɔnya, ta batii dikudi nwu oso.
42008020	Ninfɛ baatii bawo lakyɛ baalaatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Yaafɔ ku babilee suɔtɔbi n-yɛ kaayi boomiɛ alɛ banya fɔ.”
42008021	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ bamuu lɛma alɛ, “Yaami ku babiloo suɔtɔbi ninle batii ba nikonu ni Yaa ɔlaa bɔɔbla nwu ni di suoto nɛ.”
42008022	Dii ninwii, Yesu labuo di oklo kamɛ ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bita butaalɛ busifi lekpo le mmle sɛmaa.” Nkpo oso baayefe osuku baakyako osifi.
42008023	Obe wɔ batika ni di ntu osi bɔɔkyɛ nii, Yesu lakyɔsĩi. Nfanwu, kɔfɛɛfɔ siene kunwii niakyako ɔfɛ di ntu nwu osi, ntu lakyako ɔpɛ obuo di oklo nwu kamɛ. Nioso diata alɛ baasiɛ di kukpi ku nkpa ntɛɛ.
42008024	Nioso basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo lakyɛ baalaasɛnkɛsa Yesu, baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, ɔnɔɔfo! Nfɛ buokpi lo!” Ninfɛ di Yesu lataka aayila aamuɛ kɔfɛɛfɔ ku ntu nwu nikɔkpɛ ni suoto, ni diate kloklo dialo kanana nɛ.
42008025	Ni aakaalɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Fɛ di ofũ onu lee nkpe?” Kafɔɔ oyila ko baayila baatoonyu yaaa, lɛyɛkɛ kafɔɔ lapɛ ma. Ni baatɔɔkaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Ɔmɛntii okle ninle nwɔ? Ankakatɛ anta kɔfɛɛfɔ ku ntu be nikɔkpɛ ni alɛ ankyɔɔ nwɔ atoko!”
42008026	Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lataalɛ baalaadu Galilea lekpo kotoko kakyɛ nyɔɔfa di Gadara kasɔ suoto.
42008027	Obe wɔ di Yesu lasoo ni di oklo, osuɔtɔ onwii di anwuna kpile nsi ni ladie aakye okpoo nwu kamɛ abakyakako nwɔ. Ditɔɔklɛ di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle disinkpee ni awu, ánsiɛ kafɔɔ leeyo. Sɛkya kamɛ ko ansiɛ.
42008028	Di obe wɔ aanya ni Yesu, aayiisa kudu osie kanya aapɛ akunkyi di Yesu katũ. Ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Yesu, Yaa wɔ ninlenke ni Obi! Ɔmɛnlaa ninsi munkofɔ ntɛɛ? Kotikiti fɔ lekoto, tannanfi mi kootoko.”
42008029	Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle labuɛ nkpo, diekye Yesu lamuɛ ninwuna kpile nwu ninsi nwɔ ni kaamɛ alɛ, “Didie nwɔ kaamɛ!” Obe kpinwu kamɛ ninwuna kpile nwu mmufũ osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo, nse beekpee nwɔ nkɔkyɔ ninnɛɛ ku nkpaa, anfefee mi kafɔɔ. Ninwuna nwu nkpaa nwɔ ninsifiko ɔfaafuu kamɛ.
42008030	Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛ manlɛɛ fɔ?” Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Ami manlɛɛ dikudi nɛ.” Aabuɛ nkpo diekye anwuna kpile nwu nsi nwɔ kaamɛ apɔ.
42008031	Ninfɛ di anwuna nwu nkpo latikiti Yesu lekoto alɛ, atantososa ma aakpee di lɛba le manfuki anwuna kpile mankpee ni di dibiɔ le ninaani kase, diibuo nsi ni kaamɛ.
42008032	Aplakuo ɔlambu kplɛ onwii latoole alesaa di kabokotee nkpaa ninfa. Ni di anwuna kpile nwu latikiti Yesu lekoto alɛ, ata ma balaabuo di aplakuo nwu kamɛ. Ninfɛ di Yesu lata ma osuku nɛ.
42008033	Nfanwu anwuna kpile nwu ladie di osuɔtɔ nwu kamɛ aalaabuo di aplakuo nwu kamɛ. Ni di aplakuo ɔlambu nwu latoso kitikiti aakye kabokotee nwu nkpaa aalaakpa aabuo diɛ lekpo kamɛ aamɛmɛɛ ntu aakpi nɛ.
42008034	Obe wɔ baatii ba niatɔɔkpa ni aplakuo nwu lanya lɛsaa le niawa nii, baatoso baasifi sekpoo simuu ku afe kamɛ baalaabuɛ ɔlaa nwu baakyakasa.
42008035	Nioso batii ladie baakyɛ alɛ bɔɔlaanyu lɛsaa le niawa nii. Di obe wɔ babadu ni Yesu nfũ, baanya osuɔtɔ wɔ di Yesu latososa ni anwuna kpile nwu aadiki ni kaamɛ nsi di Yesu nkpaatũ. Ditɔɔkpa nwɔ eekpee awu asi kloklo. Bamuu lɛma, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ ma.
42008036	Batii ba nianya mmle okle diawa nii, latɔkɔ batii bule mmle okle diabla fiɛ diakpa ni osuɔtɔ wɔ kamɛ diɛ anwuna kpile lasiɛ nii.
42008037	Nkpo oso ntɛɛ nwu batii bamuu di Gadara kasɔ lawa babatikiti Yesu lekoto alɛ, adie ma kaasɔ suoto asifi, diekye baayɛkɛ. Nkpo oso Yesu labuo di oklo kamɛ aasifi.
42008038	Osuɔtɔ wɔ kamɛ di Yesu latososa anwuna kpile nwu aadiki ni kaamɛ, latikiti Yesu lekoto alɛ, “Tɛɛ ntikanko fɔ.” Kafɔɔ Yesu ditatuna ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ,
42008039	“Tɔɔkyɛ leyo, faalaabuɛ lɛsaa le di Yaa lɛbla ɛɛta fɔ ni.” Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo lakple aasifi okpoo nwu kamɛ aalaatoobuɛ lɛsaa le di Yesu labla atɔɔ ni nɛ.
42008040	Di obe wɔ di Yesu lakple aataalɛ lekpo nwu aasifi nii, batii nwu nkpo lafũ nwɔ osie kanya, diekye bamuu lɛma baatoonyu nwɔ osuku.
42008041	Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ onwii baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Yairo, ale ni Yuda batii kasiisakɔ ɔnɔɔfo lawa abapɛ akunkyi di Yesu nkpaatũ aatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ, awa baakyɛ leyo nɔɔ,
42008042	diekye obi nɔɔ sankobi onwii wɔ ninkpe nwɔ ni, atoofũ ni fɛ lefosi alɛɛ anyɔ, latookpi. Obe wɔ di Yesu layefe osuku oofe nii, batii kpinwu latikanko nwɔ baamana nwɔ kpinkpĩ baakyi.
42008043	Baatii nwu nkpo kamɛ, ɔsanko onwii diɛ asaa latoowii ni osie kanya fɛ lefosi alɛɛ anyɔ lasiɛ kaamɛ. Ɔsanko wɔ mmle ntɔɔlalaasa koto nɔɔ kumuu di bafatɛ sɛkyɛ alɛ diayɔɔ nwɔ, kafɔɔ kuonwii ditafuo nwɔ kɔfa ɔbla.
42008044	Nioso aafe di Yesu sɛmaa di batii nwu kamɛ, aalaakpanko nwɔ awu kotokosi. Nfanwu, asaa owii nwu niabudi.
42008045	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ alɛ, “Owe niɛkpankoe?” Kafɔɔ kuonwii ditabuɛ alɛ nnwɔɔ niɛkpanko nwɔ. Ninfɛ di Petro lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, nyu mmle okle baatii nwu lɛmana fɔ kpinkpĩ beekyi ni!”
42008046	Kafɔɔ Yesu labuɛ alɛ, “N-ye nlɛ otii lɛkpankoe, diekye osie owo ledie mi kaamɛ.”
42008047	Obe wɔ di ɔsanko nwu lanya alɛ Yesu ntootofo lɛsaa le aabla nii, atafuo suoto owofasa. Aadie aawa aabapɛ akunkyi di Yesu katũ ku ditũtũkũ di batii nwu anu. Ninfɛ aadiki aabuɛ lɛsaa le oso aakpanko nwɔ nii, ku mmle di ofiɛ nwu layɔɔ nwɔ ni ninfanwu nɛ.
42008048	Nkpo oso Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Obi nii sankobi, ofũ onu lɛfɔ ntɔɔyɔɔsa fɔ ofiɛ. Tɔɔkyɛ di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ.”
42008049	Di obe wɔ di Yesu lekple akle ɔlaa nwu oobuɛ nii, tɔkyɛntɛ onwii niakye Yuda batii kasiisakɔ ɔnɔɔfo Yairo leyo aawa lɛba nwu. Ni aabatɔkɔ nwɔ kanya alɛ, “Obi lɛfɔ sankobi nwu ntookpi kofokofoko. Nioso taansinkpɛnsa saatuotɛ ninwuna odiki!”
42008050	Kafɔɔ di Yesu lanu ni ɔlaa nwu nkpo, aatɔkɔ Yairo alɛ, “Tanyɛkɛ. Afɔ fũ fanu falɛ obi lɛfɔ nwu dibayɔɔ nwɔ.”
42008051	Obe wɔ di Yesu labuo ni Yairo leyo yi, atata osuku alɛ otii kuonwii abuo leyo nwu kamɛ ku nnwɔɔ, diediki Petro ku Yakobo ku ɔsankobi nwu ote ku ɔya lete aata osuku baabuo.
42008052	Batii bamuu ninfa layila baatoowi kaku ta obisɔ nwu oso. Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitansinwi kaku, obisɔ nwu diekpi ɔkyɔsĩi ɔɔkyɔsĩi.”
42008053	Ninfɛ baatii nwu bamuu lama nwɔ nɛ, diekye baye alɛ atookpi.
42008054	Ninfɛ di Yesu lamufũ nwɔ di kanɛɛtũ, ni aalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Obi nii, taka!”
42008055	Nfanwu ɔsankobi nwu ninwuna niakple diabuo, aasɛnkɛ. Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, bamiɛ lɛsaa batɔɔ ale.
42008056	Lɛsaa le mmle labla ɔsankobi nwu balofotɛ ɔkpɛ, kafɔɔ Yesu lakpee ma kufiofa alɛ, batantɔkɔ otii kuonwii lɛsaa le niɛwa nii.
42009001	Nni kamaa, Yesu lalɛɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lefosi banyɔ nwu asiisa, ni aadiki ma osuku aata ma kafɔɔ otumi alɛ baayɔ mantososa anwuna kpile amuu, manyɔɔsa sifiɛ ate ate kafɔɔ.
42009002	Ninfɛ aakpee ma alɛ batɔɔkyɛ baalaabuɛ Yaa sɛka kalɛkɔ sɛlaa bata batii, baayɔɔsa bafiɛtɛ sifiɛ.
42009003	Fiɛ nfɛ babasifi nii, Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitan-yɔ lɛsalɛsaa biaklee di osuku nwu biofe ni kamɛ. Bitanklee ɔkyɛnwoso, ee asaa ɔkaalɛ kotofo ee alesaa ee koto. Bitanklee bia osi awo nyɔɔfa.
42009004	Kakɔ lele beefũ ye, biesiɛ leeyo nwu nkpo dilaase di dii le bibadie ni di okpoo nwu nkpo kamɛ.
42009005	Nse baafũ ye di okpoo owo kamɛ, nfɛ biodie ninfa minsifi, biɛfɛntɛ nkpaasɔ lee kɔtɛ bitɛ ma. Nni nimatuo alɛ baasĩ ye ofũ nɛ.”
42009006	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lasifi, baakyɛ baalaakyi nkpayotũ mmuu kamɛ, baabuɛ Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu baayɔɔsa kafɔɔ batii sifiɛ kaakɔ biala.
42009007	Obe wɔ di Herode wɔ niatoole ni sɛka di Galilea kasɔ lanu ni asaa ya niatɔɔwa nii, aakpɔkpɔtɔ. Diekye batii bawo latoobuɛ alɛ, Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane nintookple ɛɛtaka eekye bakpi kamɛ ɛɛwa.
42009008	Batii bamba kafɔɔ latoobuɛ alɛ, Elia ntookple ɛɛwa. Ni baawo kafɔɔ latoobuɛ alɛ Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ owo nintookple ɛɛtaka ɛɛwa ninkpa.
42009009	Ni di Herode labuɛ alɛ, “Ami niata baabudi Yohane disi, ni owe ninle otii wɔ mmle suoto konu sɛlaa se mmle nkyeko ni?” Nkpo oso Herode latoomiɛ osuku wɔ abafe annya ni Yesu.
42009010	Obe wɔ baasaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lakple baawa nii, baatɔkɔ Yesu asaa ya amuu baabla nii. Ninfɛ di Yesu lakpaa lete lama aasifiko okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Betsaida nɛ.
42009011	Obe wɔ baatii kpinwu lanu nii, ni baatikanko nwɔ baakyɛ nfa nɛ. Yesu kafɔɔ lafũ ma, ni aakakatɛ aata ma di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ suoto nɛ. Ni aayɔɔsa mba niatoofiɛ ni kaamɛ lɛma sifiɛ nɛ.
42009012	Obe wɔ kuufĩ nfɛ kofe ni ɔmɛɛ, ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lefosi banyɔ nwu nkpo lawa Yesu nfũ baabatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ta batii nwu nkpo batɔɔkyɛ nkpayotũ ku afe ya baatii nte ni, ɛɛtɛtɛɛ wo ni kamɛ, baalaamiɛ alesaa ku ntenkɔ. Diekye lɛba le bukpe nii ayo nnaa ninfũ.”
42009013	Kafɔɔ Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye bamu bimiɛ alesaa bita ma bale.” Nfa nfɛ baatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Alesaa ya bukle ni ninfũ ninle bloblo akudi anɔɔ ku kɔkpaku kɔnyɔ, sɛɛ foomiɛ falɛ bukyɛ buɔlaaya alesaa buwako banankpantii ba?”
42009014	Basuɔtɔ ba niawɛ ni ninfa kabla fɛ nkpe nnɔɔ. Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu alɛ, “Bita batii nwu nkpo basiɛ kaasɔ akudi akudi. Diikudi ninwii dibla fɛ batii afosi anɔɔ.”
42009015	Di basaateketetɛ nwu labla nkpo baalo nii,
42009016	ninfɛ di Yesu layɔ bloblo akudi anɔɔ ku kɔkpaku kɔnyɔ nwu nkpo, ni aatakatɛsa anu aanyu osi nɛ. Ninfɛ aapɛ Yaa sɛfa diisi lɛnya nɛ. Ninfɛ abɛbɛɛ nya aayɔ aata basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ basɛ bata batii nwu nɛ.
42009017	Bamuu lɛma baale baamiɛ, ni basaateketetɛ nwu lasiisa kɔkyɛɛ kɔkyɛɛ ko niabu ni nɛ. Kuayii lefosi nkyikyɛ nnyɔ.
42009018	Dii ninwii obe wɔ di Yesu lete latɔɔpɛ ɔlaa aatɔɔta ni Yaa, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ. Ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Owe baatii kobuɛ alɛ nnle?”
42009019	Ninfɛ baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Batii bawo kobuɛ alɛ Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane fale. Bawo kafɔɔ kobuɛ alɛ, Elia fale. Fiɛ baawo kafɔɔ kobuɛ alɛ, aaa Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ onwii nintookple ɛɛtaka ɛɛwa ninkpa.”
42009020	Ninfɛ aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ni aye mɔ, owe biobuɛ bilɛ nnle?” Ninfɛ di Petro ladiki kanya alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Kristo wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ nɛ.”
42009021	Ninfɛ di Yesu laakpee ma kufiofa osie kanya alɛ, batantɔkɔ otii kuonwii ɔlaa wɔ mmle.
42009022	Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Dikpe ni, ami, Otii Obi nwu, lefe di dibuo kamɛ di okpoo banɔɔfo ku olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ, beesĩ mi, beelo mi. Kafɔɔ di dii tiɛfa kamɛ, Yaa makple ansɛnkɛsɛɛ ankyeko bakpi kamɛ anwako nkpa.”
