42022010	Ninfɛ aadiki kanya alɛ, “Nse biebuo Yerusalem okpoo kamɛ, osuɔtɔ onwii mawa amakyakako ye atuka ntu dibukii. Bitikanko nwɔ biɛlaabuo leyo le kamɛ ababuo ni.
42022011	Biɛkaalɛ leyo nwu saate bilɛ, ‘Saatuotɛ alɛ bukaalɛ fɔ nii, “Lɛmɛnyo kamɛ di ami ku basaateketetɛ nii, bubasiɛ munle Okpi Diisi Ofe alesaa?” ’
42022012	Abatuo ye leyo dibinte ninwii beetofo beetika ni di osi, nfũ beelolaa, beese ni asiɛsaa. Biwa miɛ dii nwu alesaa ninfa bita wo.”
42022013	Baakyɛ baalaanya fɛ mmle di Yesu latɔkɔ ma nii. Ni baawa Okpi Diisi Ofe alesaa nwu ninfa baase nɛ.
42022014	Di obe nwu lawo nii, Yesu ku batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ lasiɛ kaasɔ di opunu katũ babale ni alesaa.
42022015	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Dile mi dibiesaa alɛ kaleko ye Okpi Diisi Ofe alesaa ya mmle fiɛ kafe diibuo kamɛ.
42022016	Diekye kɔtɔkɔ ye ntikiti nlɛ, noosinwa nya ɔbale diɛlaase di obe wɔ di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu lɛwa nii.”
42022017	Nni kamaa, ni di Yesu layɔ opũ ni aapɛ Yaa sɛfa aabuɛ alɛ, “Bifũ nle mmle bienyi bita baawo.
42022018	Diekye kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ diɛyɔ ni nunua diesifi nii, noosinwa nta be mmle okle onyi diediki Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu lɛwa.”
42022019	Ninfɛ aayɔ bloblo ni aapɛ Yaa sɛfa nɛ. Ni aafee, aayɔ aata ma, aabuɛ alɛ, “Nle mmle ninle suoto nii sina se bɛɛyɔ bɛɛta ni diisi lee nɛ. Bibla nle mmle, biɛyɔ bitoonyuma mi.”
42022020	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ, di alesaa nwu nkpo kamaa, aayɔ opũ nwu, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Opũ wɔ mmle ninle kanya ninii fɔle le di Yaa lɛyɔ ntɔ nii eese ni kaanya, beewii ni kaasɔ di disi lee nɛ.
42022021	Kafɔɔ binyu lo, otii wɔ nimadiki mi anta ni lekpee kɔnɛɛ kaasɛfɛ ninfũ oolekoe alesaa.
42022022	Ami, Otii Obi nwu nkpo, makpi fɛ mmle di Yaa lɛtɛ nii. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ nimadiki mi anta nii, ayɔɔsa!”
42022023	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu lakyako bawo ɔkaalɛ alɛ, owe mɔ kaamɛ lɛma nimabla lɛsaa le mmle okle.
42022024	Kananfi kanwii lababuo di basaateketetɛ nwu kamɛ alɛ, owe lɛma boonyu alɛ alenke baamuu lɛma kamɛ.
42022025	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii, baka lɛma kole sɛsaate di batii lɛma suoto. Batunletɛ ba mmle nkpe lɛyooto mammiɛ alɛ batii ba mmle katɔɔlɛɛ ma ni dile ni basiɛwo.
42022026	Kafɔɔ diele nkpo dikpe ni ninte kaamɛ lee. Kafɔɔ nwɔ ninle ni ɔnɔɔfo kaamɛ lee dikpe nii ambla suoto fɛle obisɔ. Nwɔ kafɔɔ ninle ni tunletɛ kabla suoto fɛle kpɛmblatɛ.
42022027	Owe ninle ɔnɔɔfo, nwɔ ninsiɛ ni kaasɔ anle ni alesaa ɛɛ, sɛɛ nwɔ ninse ni opunu? Kamɛ lɛkpa klekle alɛ nwɔ ninsi oole ni alesaa ninle ɔnɔɔfo. Kafɔɔ nsi ye kaamɛ fɛle kpɛmblatɛ.
42022028	Biakpee situ biatikankoe di abuo nii amuu kamɛ.
42022029	Nioso fɛ mmle di Teemi lɛtɛɛ otumi alɛ kale ni sɛka, nkpo okle kafɔɔ mata ye otumi nwu nɛ.
42022030	Bibale alesaa minnyi di alesaa nii kalekɔ di sɛka nii kalekɔ. Bibasiɛ di akakpomii suoto minnle sɛka di Israel nfaabi lefosi nnyɔ nwu suoto.”
42022031	Yesu latɔkɔ Simon Petro alɛ, “Simon, Simon, Satana lɛkaalɛ osuku alɛ ɔɔsɔ ye annyu, ansɛ abiene andiki di alalaale kamɛ fɛ mmle di fekpɛntɛ nfɛɛlɛ kufuo andiki ni kaamɔɔ kamɛ.
42022032	Kafɔɔ ntɔɔpɛ ɔlaa lɛta Yaa diisi lɛfɔ Simon, alɛ ofũ onu lɛfɔ dilaayu. Alɛ nse fɛɛpɛ feekple fɛɛwa ɔkyɛ nii, faakpee babilee suɔtɔbi osie.”
42022033	Ninfɛ di Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, lelolaa suoto nlɛ munko fɔ buate leeyo, nkpi ku afɔ!”
42022034	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Petro, kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, kakyɛ ka mmle fiɛ di kɔɔkɔ mabo nii, fababuɛ sitiɛ simu falɛ faaye mi.”
42022035	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Obe onwii kamɛ lakpee ye ni kɔtɔ, bitaklee ni koto katofoe ku kokpetetofo ku ntokota, lɛsaa lewo lafĩ ye?” Ninfɛ baadiki kanya alɛ, “Lɛsalɛsaa ditafĩ wo.”
42022036	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Kafɔɔ nunua otii lele ninkpe koto katofoe kawo ee kokpetetofo kowo, aayɔ aklee. Otii wɔ kafɔɔ ninnaa ni kapamii, ayɔ awu nɔɔ asunsũ alaaya kapami kawo.
42022037	Diekye kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, Kɔkpana Klekle ɔlaa wɔ kuobuɛ nii alɛ, ‘Bababu nwɔ mankpee di bakpileblatɛ kamɛ,’ dikpe nii diɛwa kaanya. Diekye ɔlaa wɔ bɛɛkpana ni di suoto nii, nwaako nfɛ diɔɔwa kaanya.”
42022038	Ni basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, nnya mpamii nnyɔ!” Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Mminkpo mpɔ.”
42022039	Yesu ladie di okpoo aasifi Nnɔnyi Awoso Kobokote osi fɛ mmle ambla nii. Ni baasaateketetɛ nɔɔ kafɔɔ latikanko nwɔ nɛ.
42022040	Obe wɔ baadu ni lɛba nwu nkpo, Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Bipɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa alɛ bilaabuo di ɔsɔ onyu kamɛ.”
42022041	Ni aadiɛ ma aakyɛ sitũ kɛɛkɛ, ni aapɛ akunkyi aapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa nɛ.
42022042	Ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Teete, nse dilɛfɔ, ni faata dibuo opũ wɔ mmle kufe mi. Kafɔɔ diele dibiesaa nii, ta dibiesaa lɛfɔ diwa kaanya.”
42022043	Ninfɛ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii lakyɔɔ aakye osi abakpee nwɔ osie nɛ.
42022044	Ni aakple aapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa osie kanya ku dibuo di otu kamɛ. Apipi ya niatoosoo aatookpete ni kaasɔ late fɛ ntɔ.
42022045	Obe wɔ di Yesu laloo ni ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta Yaa, aataka aawa basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nfũ, aabanya ma baatɔɔkyɔsĩi. Ta lɛhaale niatika ma ni di suoto oso.
42022046	Ninfɛ aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Be lɛsaa oso biɔkyɔsĩi? Bitaka biɛpɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa mmle minaabuo ni di ɔsɔ onyu kamɛ.”
42022047	Obe wɔ di Yesu n-yɛ ɔɔkakatɛ nii, batii dikudi ninwii niakye baawa. Yuda wɔ niale ni saateketetɛ di lefosi banyɔ nwu kamɛ nialeko ma katũ. Ni aakyɛ Yesu nfũ alɛ ɔɔlaaminko nwɔ ambla nwɔ aatuu nɛ.
42022048	Kafɔɔ Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Yuda, atuu ɔbla fɔɔyɔ fandiki ami, Otii Obi nwu, fanta?”
42022049	Obe wɔ di basateketetɛ nwu lanya lɛsaa le nimawa nii, baakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Saate, bublako mpamii loo ɔkpɛ?”
42022050	Ninfɛ di saateketetɛ onwii layɔ kapamii aasafɔ Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo kpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ koletanɛɛ kotoko aakpa nɛ.
42022051	Kafɔɔ Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Oowo! Tambla nkpo!” Ninfɛ di Yesu layɔ kɔnɛɛ aatika di kpɛmblatɛ nwu nkpo kotoko, ni kuakple kuate fɛ mmle kuate ni nɛ.
42022052	Ni di Yesu lakaalɛ olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku Olekatakɔ banyuntɛ banɔɔfo ku okpoo banɔɔfo nwu niawa nwɔ ni omufũ alɛ, “Be oso di mpamii ku nwosoku bikle biɛwa mi omufũ fɛle kpileblatɛ nɔɔfo nle?
42022053	Lasiɛ di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo dii biala, kafɔɔ bitatɔkɔ bilɛ biomufũ mi. Kafɔɔ Yaa niɛta ye osuku wɔ mmle. Ni di Satana ditunu kamɛ otumi kole sɛka nunua nɛ.”
42022054	Baamufũ Yesu ni baakpaa nwɔ baasifiko Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo leyo nɛ. Petro latikanko nwɔ sɛɛmaa fanfa.
42022055	Batii bawo lakutaa ɔtɔ di leyo nwu nkpo kaflɔnkɔ, ni di Petro kafɔɔ lakyɛ aalaasiɛ ma kaamɛ aatɔɔwɔfɔ ɔtɔ nwu nɛ.
42022056	Obe wɔ di ɔsanko kpɛmblatɛ onwii lanya Petro nsi ni di ɔtɔ nwu katũ, ni aanyu nwɔ tuwĩi aakyɔɔ nwɔ lɛnɛɛ aabuɛ alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle kafɔɔ Yesu tikankotɛ ale.”
42022057	Kafɔɔ Petro lasĩ aabuɛ alɛ, “Ɔsanko, diidii ninye nwɔ!”
42022058	Di obe kakuii sɛmaa, osuɔtɔ onwii kafɔɔ lanya Petro ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔɔ onwii lɛma fale!” Kafɔɔ Petro lakple aadiki kanya alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ, kpa woo! Ninye nwɔ!”
42022059	Diabla ni fɛ lebombo ninwii sɛmaa, osuɔtɔ bamba onwii lakple aabuɛ osie kanya aatika difuɔ alɛ, “Ɔlaa ɔnanfi kuonwii nnaa alɛ osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle diele Yesu tikankotɛ, diekye Galilea otii ale!”
42022060	Kafɔɔ Petro ladiki kanya alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ, ninye ɔlaa wɔ foobuɛ nii!” Nfanwu ayɛ ɔɔkatatɛ nii, kɔɔkɔ niabo.
42022061	Nfanwu di Saate lamunikĩi aanyu Petro tuwĩi nɛ. Ninfɛ di Petro lanyuma ɔlaa wɔ di Saate latɔkɔ nwɔ ni alɛ, “Fiɛ di kɔɔkɔ mabo ni ku kakyɛ ka, fababuɛ sitiɛ simu falɛ faaye mi.”
42022062	Ni di Petro ladie aasifi kayi aalaawi kaku osie kanya nɛ.
42022063	Batii ba niatoonyu ni Yesu, baama nwɔ, baapɛ nwɔ kafɔɔ.
42022064	Baanii nwɔ anu baapɛ nwɔ, ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Owe niɛpɛ fɔ? Tɔkɔ wo!”
42022065	Ni baatufa nwɔ kafɔɔ di sisuku bamba kpinwu suoto nɛ.
42022066	Obe wɔ kaale lasɛ nii, okpoo banɔɔfo ku olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ labasi, ni baakpaa Yesu baawako bawokalɛɛkɔ nwu nkpo nɛ.
42022067	Di bawo kalɛɛkɔ nwu, ni baakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Tɔkɔwo nsɛ afɔ ninle Kristo wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ.” Ninfɛ aadiki kanya alɛ, “Mintɛ lɛtɔkɔ ye, bilɔɔwa mi ɔbafũ onu.
42022068	Ni nse lɛkaalɛ ye ɔlaa owo kafɔɔ, bilɔɔwa mi kanya okpee.
42022069	Kafɔɔ diɛyɔ ni di nua diesifi nii, ami, Otii Obi nwu, masiɛ di Yaa wɔ ninlenke ni oletanɛɛkyɛ.”
42022070	Ninfɛ bamuu lɛma baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Nioso afɔ ninle Yaa Obi nwu nɛ?” Ninfɛ aadiki kanya alɛ, “Aye bamu nikobuɛ bilɛ nnwɔɔ nle nɛ.”
42022071	Ni baabuɛ alɛ, “Diesinfĩ alɛ otii kuonwii kayila ɔlaa owo kamaa! Awo bamu butoonu ɔlaa wɔ eebuɛ nii!”
42023001	Nfanwu batii dikudi nwu lataka baakpaa Yesu baasifiko Pilato nfũ.
42023002	Nfa baakyako nwɔ kanya obudi alɛ, “Buomufũ osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle ɔɔkyɔnkyɔ batii loo anfenko di osuku lalaale suoto. Ɔɔtɔkɔ ma alɛ batanta akpooto lɛma baata Roma Batii Ɔka Kplɛ, ni aatɔkɔ ma kafɔɔ alɛ nnwɔɔ ninle Kristo wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ, ni ɔka ale.”
42023003	Ni di Pilato lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Yuda batii Ɔka nwu nɛ?” Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nnwu fatoobuɛ nɛ.”
42023004	Ni di Pilato latɔkɔ olebatatɛ ku batii dikudi nwu nkpo alɛ, “Ninya okpile kuonwii di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle suoto baalo nwɔ ni lɛpɔɔ.”
42023005	Kafɔɔ baayila osie kanya baabuɛ alɛ, “Asaa otuo nɔɔ kokpee kudu di Yuda batii kamɛ. Aakye kasɔ di Galilea, ni atɔɔwa ɛɛbadu nfũ kafɔɔ nɛ.”
42023006	Obe wɔ di Pilato lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, aakaalɛ alɛ, “Ni osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle Galilea otii ale?”
42023007	Nkpo oso obe wɔ aatofo alɛ Yesu lekye ni Galilea kale kakyɛ ka di Herode kole ni sɛka, ni aakyesee nwɔ Herode nfũ nɛ. Herode wɔ mmle lawɛ di Yerusalem di obe nwu kamɛ.
42023008	Suoto layɔɔ Herode di obe wɔ aanya ni Yesu. Diekye atoonu nwɔ leyooto kofokofoko, aatoomiɛ kafɔɔ alɛ aanyɔɔ. Aatoonyu osuku kafɔɔ alɛ aanya Yesu kɔbla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ.
42023009	Nkpo oso Herode lakaalɛ Yesu sɛlaa kpinwu, kafɔɔ Yesu ditadiki ɔlaa kuonwii kanya.
42023010	Nioso olebatatɛ ku kufiofa batuotɛ ladie baawa sitũ bababudi Yesu kanya, osie kanya.
42023011	Herode ku bakpɛtɛ nɔɔ lama Yesu osie kanya baatufa nwɔ. Ni baayɔ awukyɔ biene biene anwii baakpee nwɔ, ni baakplesɔɔ baasifiko Pilato nfũ nɛ.
42023012	Dii nkpo kale, Herode ku Pilato lakple basiɛwo. Diekye saa, bawo balo baale.
42023013	Pilato lalɛɛ olebatatɛ, okpoo banɔɔfo ku batii bamuu aasiisa.
42023014	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biɛkpaa osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle biɛwakoe bilɛ, ɔɔkyɔnkyɔ ye afenko di osuku lalaale suoto. Ntoowolaa ɔlaa nwu kamɛ di anu lee. Kafɔɔ ninnya okpile kuonwii di sɛlaa se biebuɛ bietika nwɔ ni di suoto.
42023015	Herode kafɔɔ diɛnya okpile kuonwi di suoto nɔɔ fiɛ ɛɛkplesa nwɔ eekyesee wo. Otii wɔ mmle diɛbla okpile kuonwii baalo nwɔ lɛpɔɔ manta ni kukpi.
42023016	Nkpo oso mata mampɛ nwɔ, nindiɛ nwɔ ansifi.”
42023017	Di Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii ole biala kamɛ, Pilato lɛblasaa dile andiɛ leyotentɛ onwii anta ma.
42023018	Nfa nfɛ baamuu lɛma baayiisa kudu osie kanya alɛ, “Lo nwɔ! Faadiɛ Baraba fata wo!”
42023019	Baraba wɔ mmle, baatɛ nwɔ leeyo di kudu kowo aakpee ni di okpoo kplɛ kamɛ aalo ni batii bawo oso.
42023020	Pilato lamiɛ alɛ oodiɛ ni Yesu oso, aakple aalaakakatɛ aata batii nwu nkpo.
42023021	Kafɔɔ baakple baayiisa kudu baalenkeesa kɔkasale alɛ, “Pɛ nwɔ sibuɛ fakaasa koowoso suoto! Pɛ nwɔ sibuɛ fakaasa koowoso suoto!”
42023022	Ninfɛ di Pilato lakple aakaalɛ ma ditiɛfa alɛ, “Ɔmɛnkpile ɛɛbla fiɛ? Ninnya lɛsaa le ɛɛbla ni oso kalo nwɔ lɛpɔɔ alɛ aakpi nii! Mata mampɛ nwɔ kowesee nindiɛ nwɔ ansifi.”
42023023	Kafɔɔ mia nfɛ baakple baatɔɔfaa osie kanya baatoobuɛ alɛ, “Dikpe nii fɛɛta bɛɛpɛ Yesu sibuɛ bɛɛkaasa koowoso suoto.” Lɛyɛntɛle kudu lɛma nwu labalenkee Pilato nnɛɛ.
42023024	Nkpo oso Pilato lababudisa ɔlaa nwu nkpo fɛ mmle baatii nwu komiɛ nii.
42023025	Ni aadiɛ otii wɔ boomiɛ ni aata ma nɛ. Nwɔ baatɛ ni leeyo ta kudu ko aakpee, aalo ni batii oso. Ni aadiɛ Yesu aakpee ma ninnɛɛ kamɛ alɛ balaabla nwɔ fɛ mmle boomiɛ ni.
42023026	Bakpɛtɛ lakpaa Yesu baasifiko. Ni di obe wɔ bakyɛ di osuku boofe nii, baakyakako Kirene otii onwii baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Simon aakye kakpaayotũ ɔɔwa Yerusalem. Ni baayilasa nwɔ, baanyinka nwɔ alɛ afũ Yesu kowoso nwu atuka. Ni aafũ aatikanko Yesu nɛ.
42023027	Batii dikudi lewo latikanko Yesu di nkpaamaa, basanko bawo kafɔɔ lasiɛ ma kaamɛ baatoowi kaku baatɔɔtɔɔ.
42023028	Ninfɛ di Yesu lamunikĩi aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Yerusalem basanko, bitanwi biatɛɛ, kafɔɔ biwi bita suoto ku babilee.
42023029	Diekye ayi awo kɔwa baatii mabuɛ alɛ, ‘Suoto siyɔɔ ɔlɛma ku olofofɔtɔ wɔ kamɛ di obi didie ni diidii ku lɛnyɛɛ le manayinyɛɛfu ni diidii!’
42023030	Obe nwu ninle obe wɔ batii matɔkɔ abokote alɛ, ‘Bibiɛ bikpete wo!’ Mantɔkɔ kobokotee kafɔɔ alɛ, ‘Biwofasa wo!’
42023031	Diekye nse kowoso kɔɔnle kofiɛ mmle okle mɔ, ni lɛ kookosole mafiɛ?”
42023032	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, bakpɛtɛ nwu lakpaa basuɔtɔ banyɔ banwii ninle ni bakpileblatɛ baakyakaa di Yesu, boofenko olo.
42023033	Obe wɔ baadu ni lɛba le bɔɔlɛɛ ni Otii Disi Dikufi, baapɛ Yesu sibuɛ baakaasa koowoso suoto ninfa, ku bakpileblatɛ banyɔ. Baapɛ onwii baakaasa di Yesu oletanɛɛkyɛ, ɔnyɔɔfa kafɔɔ di ɔmɛntukyɛ.
42023034	Ni di Yesu labuɛ alɛ, “Teete, yɔ fakyɛ ma, diekye baaye lɛsaa le bɔɔbla nii.” Nni kamaa, baayɔ awu nɔɔ baasɛ bawo di obe wɔ baawii ni atrebi baatofo n-ya di obiala lɛma kayɔ nii.
42023035	Batii dikudi nwu nkpo layila baatoonyu nwɔ. Ni di Yuda batii batunletɛ nwu kafɔɔ layila baatɔɔma Yesu baatoobuɛ alɛ, “Aafũ batii bamba nkpa, bita afũ suoto nɔɔ kafɔɔ, nse nnwɔɔ ninle Kristo wɔ di Yaa lɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ!”
42023036	Nkpo okle di bakpɛtɛ nwu kafɔɔ lama Yesu nɛ. Baayɔ nta nyankale baakyɛnko nwɔ alɛ anyi.
42023037	Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse afɔ ninle Yuda batii ɔka, faafũ suoto lɛfɔ nkpa buonyu!”
42023038	Di lɛkantosi nɔɔ, baakpana sɛlaa se mmle alɛ, “Nnya Yuda Batii Ɔka ninle nwɔ nɛ.”
42023039	Bakpileblatɛ banyɔ ba baapɛ baakasa ni koowoso suoto onwii lɛma latufa Yesu alɛ, “Diele afɔ ninle Kristo wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ? Diki suoto faadiki wo kafɔɔ ɛɛ!”
42023040	Kafɔɔ ɔnyɔɔfa lasĩ ɔlaa aatɔɔ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Fɔlɔɔyɛkɛ Yaa? Beelo fɔ lɛpɔɔ fɛ mmle okle beelo nwɔ ni lɛpɔɔ.
42023041	Kafɔɔ awo lɛpɔɔ le beelo wo nii, lesiɛko wo. Diekye lɛsaa le buɔbla ni letokonanfi buofũ nɛ. Kafɔɔ nnwɔɔ aabla okpile kuonwii.”
42023042	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Yesu, nyuma mi nse feebuo sɛka lɛfɔ ole kamɛ.”
42023043	Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, miɛ wɔ mmle, munko fɔ bubabuo Paradiso kamɛ.”
42023044	Di obe wɔ diapɛ ni fɛ kakũ lefosi elomu ɛnyɔ, kufĩ ladiɛ ɔpɛ, kayi kamuu lawɔfɔ, dialaase di kɔtɔɔfɔ elomu etiɛ kamɛ.
42023045	Ni di dibula le niasaka ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ labɛ di nkyɛ nnyɔ nɛ.
42023046	Ni di Yesu lafaa osie kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Teete, leyɔ ninwuna nii, lekpee di nnɛɛ lɛfɔ kamɛ.” Obe wɔ aabuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle aaloo nii, ni aakpi nɛ.
42023047	Baakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo nwu lanya lɛsaa le niawa nii, ni aatansa Yaa aabuɛ alɛ, “Nwaako otii wɔ mmle, otii biene ale.”
42023048	Obe wɔ baatii ba niawa ni nfa alɛ bɔɔbaanyu lɛsaa le nikɔwa ni lanya ni lɛsaa le niawa nii, baakple baasifi ayo, baayɔ nnɛɛ baatika nintɛɛ ku sɛyaami.
42023049	Batii ba bamuu ninye ni Yesu ku basanko ba niatikanko nwɔ baakye ni Galilea layila kaakyonkɔ baatoonyu asaa.
42023050	Osuɔtɔ onwii lawɛ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Yosef. Aakye Arimatea di Yudea kasɔ suoto. Aale otii biene wɔ baatii mbu ni osie kanya. Aasiɛ aatoonyu osuku obe wɔ di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ mawa nii.
42023051	Mintɛ aale Yuda batii Bakantɛ onwii lɛma yi, atatunako ma di disibu le baabla ni ku lɛsaa le baabla ni suoto.
42023052	Aakyɛ Pilato nfũ aalaafũ Yesu kpi.
42023053	Ni aasoosa kpi nwu nkpo di kowoso suoto aayɔ dibula fututu aamiminisa nwɔ di suoto. Ni aayɔ nwɔ aalaakookaa di ofuɔnntuu ɔkya wɔ kamɛ manayikookaa ni otii kuonwii kaamɛ diidii nɛ.
42023054	Dii nwu nkpo Fiida diale, baatoololaa suoto baatɔɔta Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi kale ɔsɛ.
42023055	Basanko ba niatikanko Yesu baakye ni Galilea latikanko Yosef baakyɛ baalaanyu ɔkya nwu ku mmle baayɔ Yesu baakookaa ni kaamɛ.
42023056	Ni baakple baasifi leyo, baalaabla kɔfa kɔnɔkɔnɔ ku nnɔnyi be man-yɔ manfifia ni di kpi suoto baatɛ. Ni baatɛ ɔnyɛɛ di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto fɛ mmle di Yuda batii kufiofa nwu letuo ni nɛ.
42024001	Di Kɔsida kolesɛtũ, basanko nwu lakyɛ ɔkya nwu katũ, baaklee kɔfa kɔnɔkɔnɔ ko baabla baase nii.
42024002	Ni baanya alɛ baamunusa difuɔ nwu di ɔkya kanya nɛ.
42024003	Nkpo oso baabuo di ɔkya nwu kamɛ, kafɔɔ batanya Saate Yesu kpi nwu.
42024004	Lɛsaa nwu labla ma yaaa. Nfanwu batii banyɔ banwii niakyɔɔ baakpee asaa fututu ya nikosesee ni di anu.
42024005	Basanko nwu layɛkɛ osie kanya, ni baawakosa asi kasɔ baata batii nwu nɛ. Ni baatii nwu lakaalɛ, ma alɛ, “Be oso biowolaa otii wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa baakpi kamɛ?
42024006	Anaa ninfũ. Atɔɔtaka! Binyuma ɔlaa wɔ aatɔkɔ ye ni, di obe wɔ aawɛ ni di Galilea alɛ,
42024007	‘Dikpe nii, bɛɛyɔ Otii Obi nwu beekpee di bakpileblatɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ. Bɛɛpɛ nwɔ sibuɛ bɛɛkaasa koowoso suoto. Ni ayi atiɛ kamaa, abakple antaka ankye bakpi kamɛ.’ ”
42024008	Ni baasanko nwu lanyuma sɛlaa nɔɔ nwu nkpo nɛ.
42024009	Baakple ni di ɔkya nwu katũ, baabuɛ sɛlaa se mmle simuu baatɔkɔ batɔkyɛntɛ lefosi onwii nwu ku babule bamuu.
42024010	Basanko nwu niale Maria Magdalene ku Yohana ku Maria wɔ ninle ni Yakobo ɔya. Mma ku basanko bamba niatɔkɔ batɔkyɛntɛ nwu sɛlaa se mmle nɛ.
42024011	Kafɔɔ batɔkyɛntɛ nwu lanyu alɛ, sɛlaa se baasanko nwu lebuɛ nii, sɛlaakuu sile batafũ sĩ baanu.
42024012	Kafɔɔ Petro lataka aatoso aakyɛ ɔkya nwu katũ. Obe wɔ aadu ni nfa aakɛnsa aanyu ɔkya nwu kamɛ, kafɔɔ akookaabula lete aanya, atansinnya lɛsalɛsaa. Ni aakple aasifi leyo, diabla nwɔ yaaa di lesaa le niawa ni suoto.
42024013	Di dii nwu nkpo kale kafɔɔ, Yesu batikankotɛ banyɔ banwii latoofe kakpaayotũ kanwii manlɛɛ ni Emaus kamɛ. Diawo fɛ akɔ akuɛnsĩ diedie ni di Yerusalem.
42024014	Baatɔɔkakatɛko bawo di lɛsaa biala niawa ni suoto.
42024015	Obe wɔ bakyɛ bɔɔkakatɛ mambuo ni sɛɛlaa nwu kamɛ yi, Yesu omu lakpukuti aatɛɛtɛɛ ma, baakyako ɔkyɛ.
42024016	Baanyɔɔ, kafɔɔ batatofo alɛ nnwɔɔ diale.
42024017	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ɔmɛnlaa bikyɛ biobuɛ di osuku?” Ni baayila baabla anu ku sɛnyaami.
42024018	Ni di onwii kaamɛ lɛma bɔɔlɛɛ ni Kleopa lakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Lete lɛfɔ ninle ɔfɔɔ di Yerusalem, fananye asaa ya niɛwa ni ninfa di ayi asɛɛ ya mmle kamɛ?”
42024019	Ni di Yesu lakaalɛ alɛ, “Be lɛsaa niawa?” Ni baadiki kanya alɛ, “Asaa ya niawa ni di Yesu Nasaret Otii suoto. Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ aale. Nnwɔɔ di Yaa ku batii bamuu lɛnya alɛ, nwaako akpe otumi di asaa nɔɔ ɔbla ku sɛlaa nɔɔ obuɛ kamɛ nɛ.
42024020	Yuda batii Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku okpoo banɔɔfo loo layɔ nwɔ baakpee di Roma abaa ɔnɔɔfo nnɛɛ kamɛ, aalo nwɔ kukpi lɛpɔɔ baakaasɔɔ koowoso suoto baalo.
42024021	Nse nnwɔɔ buotika anu bulɛ ale otii wɔ nimadiki ni Israel batii bamuu nɛ. Ni nni nkpo kamaa, miɛ ninle dii tiɛfa di sɛlaa se mmle lawa ni nɛ.
42024022	Basanko bawo kafɔɔ lɛbatɔkɔ wo ɔlaa wɔ niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ. Diekye bɛɛkyɛ ɔkya nwu katũ miɛ ku kolesɛtũ ko mmle.
42024023	Kafɔɔ baanya kpi nɔɔ. Beekple bɛɛwa bɛɛbatɔkɔ wo alɛ Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ bawo lediki suoto beetuo ma. Ni bɛɛtɔkɔ ma alɛ, Yesu nkpe nkpa nɛ.
42024024	Batii bawo lɛkyɛ ɔkya nwu katũ bɛɛlaanya fɛ mmle baasanko nwu lɛbabuɛ nii, kafɔɔ baanyɔɔ.”
42024025	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biébe anu! Lɛ oso di ofũ onu lee lɛbla buɛɛ di asaa ya di Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ nwu latɔkɔ ye ni suoto?
42024026	Bieye bilɛ dikpe ni Kristo wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ kafe diibuo le mmle kamɛ fiɛ ababuo di sɛka nɔɔ klekle nwu kamɛ?”
42024027	Ni di Yesu ladiki kɔsa aata ma di sɛlaa se beebuɛ ni di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ di suoto nɔɔ nɛ. Diɛyɔ ni di Mose obe diɛlase ni di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛ bamuu obe suoto.
42024028	Obe wɔ nfɛ bɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ ni kakpaayotũ ka boofe nii, Yesu labla fɛ ɔɔwaalɛ anfe sitũ.
42024029	Kafɔɔ baasĩ baatɔɔ baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kufĩ nfɛ mamɛɛ ni oso, akple aate di ɔkyɛ lɛma.” Nkpo oso aatikanko ma alɛ ɔɔlaate di ɔkyɛ lɛma.
42024030	Aasiɛ kaasɔ alɛ oole alesaa ku mma. Ni aayɔ bloblo aapɛ Yaa sɛfa, ni aafee aayɔ aata ma nɛ.
42024031	Nfanwu anu lɛma niasɛkɛtɛ baanya Yesu baatɛ nsũ, kafɔɔ aayu di anu lɛma.
42024032	Ni baatoobuɛ baatɔɔtɔkɔ bawo alɛ, “Obe wɔ ɛɛtɔɔkakatɛ kowo ni di osuku eetoodiki Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kasɔ ɛɛtɔɔta wo nii, suoto diɛtɔɔyɔɔ wo di otu kamɛ?”
42024033	Nfanwu ni baataka baakple baasifi Yerusalem nɛ. Ni baanya batɔkyɛntɛ batii lefosi onwii nwu ku batii bamba beesi basi nɛ.
42024034	Ni baatɔkɔ batii nwu banyɔ alɛ, “Nwaako Saate nwu ntɔɔtaka eekye bakpi kamɛ, atoodiki suoto eetuo Simon.”
42024035	Ninfɛ di batii nwu banyɔ kafɔɔ latɔkɔ ma lɛsaa le niawa ni di osuku suoto ku mmle baanyɔɔ baatɛ ni nsũ di obe wɔ aafee bloblo aata ma nii.
42024036	Obe wɔ baatii nwu nkpo banyɔ nkle ɔlaa lɛma boobuɛ manayiloo nii, nfanwu Yesu niadie aayila ma kaamɛ. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Atoko ɔkyɛ ole disiɛko ye.”
42024037	Lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ ma osie kanya alɛ kpi bɔɔnya.
42024038	Kafɔɔ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Be oso diisibu lee kɔkpɔkpɔtɔ nkpo? Be oso minofũ binu?
42024039	Binyu mi nnɛɛ ku nkpaa. Biɛkpankoe kafɔɔ binyu, bietofo bilɛ ami dile. Diekye kpi nnaa suoto sina ku akufi, fɛ mmle biɔnya bilɛ nkpe nii.”
42024040	Aabuɛ nwu aaloo nii, ni aatuo ma nnɛɛ ku nkpaa nɔɔ nɛ.
42024041	Suoto latɔɔyɔɔ ma osie kanya, di lɛsaa nwu labla ma ni ɔkpɛ, batafuo ofũ onu. Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Lelesaa lewo nkpe ye ninfũ?”
42024042	Ni baayɔ kakpaku fiɛle kawo baatɔɔ nɛ.
42024043	Ni aafũ aawee di anu lɛma nɛ.
42024044	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nle mmle ninle asaa ya latɔkɔ ye ni di obe wɔ lawɛ ni di ɔkyɛ lee nɛ. Lɛsaa lele bɛɛkpana beekyeko suoto nii di Mose kufiofa kukũ kamɛ, Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ akũ kamɛ ku sinu akũ kamɛ ntɔɔwa kaanya.”
42024045	Ni aasɛkɛtɛ ma disibu baanu Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kasɔ nɛ.
42024046	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bɛɛkpana bɛɛtɛ alɛ Kristo wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ mafe diibuo kamɛ, abataka ankye bakpi kamɛ di dii tiɛfa suoto.
42024047	Ni leeyooto nɔɔ kamɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ kayie lɛkya manta nnle mmuu alɛ baakyisa situ, alɛ Yaa kayɔ sikpile lɛma ankyɛ ma. Lɛkya le mmle oyie makye kasɔ di Yerusalem.
42024048	Aye ninle sɛlaa se mmle kamaa bayilatɛ kaakɔ lele nɛ.
42024049	Ami omu mayɔ lɛsaa le di Teemi lebuɛ ɛɛtɛ alɛ abata ye ni nkyesee ye. Kafɔɔ bisiɛ di Yerusalem okpoo kamɛ diɛlaase di obe wɔ di otumi makye osi kumabuo ye ni kaamɛ.”
42024050	Nni kamaa, Yesu lakpaa basateketetɛ nwu adieko di Yerusalem okpoo kamɛ aasifiko Betani ɔlɔɔkɔ. Ni aakplesa nnɛɛ katoo aatama dikusɛkusɛ nɛ.
42024051	Di obe wɔ ɔɔta ma ni dikusɛkusɛ ninfa, ni baabla baawo suoto nɛ, ni di Yaa lakpaa nwɔ aasifiko osi nɛ.
42024052	Ninfɛ baapɛ akunkyi basumu nwɔ, ni baakple baasifi Yerusalem ku suoto lɛyɔɔ nimu nɛ.
42024053	Ni baatɔɔkyɛ Yaa Olekatakaɔ wlawla baalaatɔɔtansa Yaa nɛ.
43001001	Kaasɔ kakyeko fiɛ bababla ni kayi ka mmle yi, Ɔlaa nwu lawɛ. Nnwu ku Yaa niawɛ. Ɔlaa nwu nkpo kafɔɔ ninle Yaa nɛ.
43001002	Diayɔ ni kaasɔ kakyekɔ yi, Ɔlaa nwu ku Yaa niawɛ.
43001003	Ɔlaa nwu suoto di Yaa lafe aabla lɛsaa biala nɛ. Lɛsalɛsaa kuninwii nnaa alɛ diele Ɔlaa nwu nkpo suoto beefe fiɛ bɛɛbla ni nii.
43001004	Ɔlaa nwu kamɛ di nkpa lɛtaa diekye nɛ. Nkpa nwu nkpo kafɔɔ lɛyɔ lɛkpa diɛwako batii bamuu.
43001005	Lɛkpa le mmle kafɔɔ lɛkpa di ditunu kamɛ. Ditunu kafɔɔ diefuo lɛkpa le mmle otĩi.
43001006	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Yaa lakyesee otii onwii. Leyooto nɔɔ ninle Yohane nɛ.
43001007	Nnwɔɔ niawa aabakakatɛ aata batii di lɛkpa nwu nkpo suoto nɛ, alɛ batii bamuu kanu ɔlaa nɔɔ nwu alɛ, baafũ mannu.
43001008	Diele Yohane wɔ mmle ninle lɛkpa nwu nkpo. Nnwɔɔ ɔwa ko aawa aabakakatɛ di lɛkpa nwu nkpo suoto.
43001009	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, lɛkpa le nimu nimu ninkpa ninta ni batii bamuu nfɛ kɔwa kayi ka mmle kamɛ.
43001010	Ɔlaa nwu nkpo lawɛ kaayi ka mmle kamɛ, kafɔɔ kayi ka mmle ditatofo nwɔ, nu ninnwɔɔ suoto di Yaa lafe aabla kayi ka mmle.
43001011	Aawa nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ batii nfũ, kafɔɔ batii nɔɔ nwu nkpo ditafukuti nnɛɛ baafũ nwɔ.
43001012	Kafɔɔ batii ba bamuu niafũ nwɔ nii, baafũ nwɔ kafɔɔ baanu nii, ɛɛta ma osuku alɛ, baale Yaa babi.
43001013	Batalofo batii ba mmle fɛ mmle okle di osuɔtɔ ku ɔsanko nnya bawo fiɛ manlofo ni babi, ee otii dibiesaa kanya. Kafɔɔ Yaa omu nfɛ nietuna alɛ baale nwɔ babi.
43001014	Ɔlaa nwu nkpo lɛbakple otii kuasiɛ wo kaamɛ, nwaako ole ku sibualɛ leyii nwɔ kamɛ pɔ. Buanya kafɔɔ Lɛkpa nɔɔ. Lɛkpa le aafũ aakyeko ni Ote nfũ ta Obi onwii ale nwɔ ni oso.
43001015	Yohane lakakatɛ aata batii aakyeko nwɔ suoto, aafaa aabuɛ alɛ, “Nnya otii wɔ mmle suoto labuɛ nlɛ, ‘Otii wɔ nikɔwa ni sɛɛmaa nii lɛtaka katoo alenke mi, diekye akpe kofokofoko fiɛ nfɛ bɛɛbabla mi.’ ”
43001016	Ta sibualɛ ku nwaako ɔlaa nwu leyii nwɔ ni kamɛ oso, obe lele oowii wo lɛyɔɔ.
43001017	Lɛkasale, Yaa layɔ kufiofa nɔɔ nwu aafenko di Mose suoto aata wo. Kafɔɔ eele wo sibualɛ ku nwaako ɔlaa nwu nkpo diefe ni di Yesu Kristo suoto.
43001018	Otii kuonwii diinya Yaa anya diidii. Diediki Obi nwu nkpo onwii ninkyɛkyɛ ni ku Yaa, akpe ni di Ote nfũ, nnwɔɔ niediki nwɔ eetuo batii nɛ.
43001019	Yuda batii batunletɛ lakpee olebatatɛ ku Lewi batii bawo baakye Yerusalem alɛ, bakyɛ baalaakaalɛ Yohane alɛ, nnwɔɔ owe ale.
43001020	Yohane ditasĩ kanya odiki, ni aatɔkɔ ma aatikiti alɛ, “Diele ami ninle Kristo nwu nkpo.”
43001021	Ninfɛ di olebatatɛ nwu lakple baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ni owe fale mɔ? Afɔ ninle Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Elia?” Ninfɛ di Yohane ladiki kanya alɛ, “Diele nnwɔɔ nle.” Ninfɛ baakple baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ wɔ baabuɛ baatɛ alɛ abawa ni nɛ?” Ninfɛ aadiki kanya alɛ, “Oowo.”
43001022	Nkpo oso baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ni tɔkɔwo otii wɔ fale ni. Diekye dikpe ni buɔkplesa kanya buɔkyɛnko batii ba niekpee wo ni kɔtɔ. Ɔmɛnlaa fakpe fambuɛ di suoto lɛfɔ?”
43001023	Ninfɛ di Yohane ladiki kanya aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, fɛ mmle okle di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia lakpana aatɛ nii, “Ami ninle otii wɔ sɛlɔ nikɔfaa ni di ɔfaafuu kamɛ simbuɛ ni alɛ, bilolaa osuku bitɛ bita Saate nwu ɔwabee nɛ.”
43001024	Ninfɛ di batii ba baakpee ni kɔtɔ baakye ni Farisi batii kamɛ,
43001025	baakaalɛ Yohane alɛ, “Nni, nse faale Kristo, ee Elia, ee Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ nwu nkpo mɔ, ni lɛ oso fookpeesa batii Yaa ntu?”
43001026	Ninfɛ di Yohane ladiki kanya alɛ, “Ami yi, kokpeesa batii Yaa ntu, kafɔɔ otii onwii n-yɛ kaamɛ lee minanye nwɔ nii.
43001027	Nnwɔɔ ninle otii wɔ nintikankoe ni sɛɛmaa abawa ni nɛ, otii wɔ ninansiɛko alɛ bia kadiki nwɔ ni ntokokata sikũ.”
43001028	Asaa ya mmle amuu lawa di Betania okpoo diɛ Yordan okle sɛmaa. Nfa di Yohane latokpeesa batii Yaa ntu nɛ.
43001029	Di kale lasɛ nii, Yohane lanya Yesu latɔɔwa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, ni aabuɛ aatɔkɔ batii ba niayila nwɔ ni di ɔlɔɔkɔ alɛ, “Nnya Yaa Oleɔta Lefosobi nwu nkpo niɛwa ni kayi ka mmle alɛ ɔbatekete ni batii sikpile di suoto lɛma!
43001030	Nnwɔɔ ninle otii wɔ suoto latɔɔkakatɛ ni di obe wɔ labuɛ nlɛ, ‘Otii onwii kɔwa sɛmaa nii, nnwɔɔ ɛɛtakakatoo aleneke mi, diekye, akpe kofokofoko fiɛ bia bɛɛbabla mi.’
43001031	Ami omu kafɔɔ ntatofo nlɛ nnwɔɔ nɛ. Kafɔɔ lɛwa kokpeesa batii Yaa ntu alɛ kadiki nwu ntuo Israel batii bamuu.”
43001032	Ninfɛ di Yohane lakple aabuɛ di suoto nɔɔ alɛ, “Lanya Yaa Ninwuna kosoo ninkye osi, fɛ mmle di lɛlaapɔɔ nsoo nii, diabasiɛ nwɔ di suoto.
43001033	Kaasɔ kakyekɔ yi, ntatofo nwɔ. Kafɔɔ Yaa wɔ niekpee mi alɛ makpeesa ni batii nɔɔ ntu yi, aatɔkɔ mi alɛ, ‘Otii wɔ suoto fabanya Ninwuna nii lesoo diɛbasiɛ ni di suoto nɔɔ yi, nnwɔɔ ninle otii wɔ nimakpeesa ni batii ku Ninwuna Klekle nɛ.’
43001034	Nkpo oso amii ntɔɔnya. Nioso nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye ntikiti nlɛ nnwɔɔ ninle Yaa Obi nwu nkpo nɛ.”
43001035	Kaleesɛ yi, Yohane ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ banyɔ lakple baayila ninfa.
43001036	Obe wɔ aanya Yesu latoofe ni yi, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Nnya Yaa Oleɔta Lefosobi nwu nkpo!”
43001037	Obe wɔ di Yohane basaateketetɛ banyɔ nwu nkpo lanu aabuɛ ni ɔlaa nwu nkpo yi, ni baasifi baalaatikanko Yesu nɛ.
43001038	Obe wɔ di Yesu lamunikĩi aanya alɛ batikanko nwɔ nii, ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Obe lɛsaa biowolaa?” Ni baadiki kanya, baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Rabi,” leyooto le mmle lɛsɔdiki ninle alɛ Saatuotɛ, “Lekoto, ɔfɛ fasi?”
43001039	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biwa biɛbanyu.” Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ diabla fɛ kɔtɔɔfɔ abombo ana. Nkpo oso baatikanko nwɔ baakyɛ baalaanyu nfũ asi nii, ninfɛ baayɛntɛ nwɔ osiɛko dii nwu nkpo kale nɛ.
43001040	Basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo nianu ni Yohane ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ fiɛ baatikanko ni Yesu onwii lɛma niale Andrea wɔ niale ni Simon Petro obilɛma nɛ.
43001041	Nfanwu ni aanya obilɛma Simon nɛ, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Butɔɔnya Mesia nwu nkpo.” Ɔlaa wɔ mmle kasɔ ninle alɛ Kristo wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ nɛ.
43001042	Ninfɛ aakpaa Simon aakyɛnko Yesu nɛ. Obe wɔ di Yesu lanyu ni Simon, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Simon, Yohane Obi nɛ. Kafɔɔ nunua yi, babatɔɔlɛɛ fɔ alɛ Kefas,” ee Petro, ayooto ya mmle lɛsɔdiki ninle alɛ difuɔnkpaa nɛ.
43001043	Obe wɔ kaale lasɛ nii, Yesu labla disibu alɛ ɔɔkyɛ Galilea kasɔ suoto. Ni aanya osuɔtɔ onwii manlɛɛ ni Filipo nɛ, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Wa fabatikankoe.”
43001044	Filipo wɔ mmle lakye Betsaida, okpoo wɔ di Andrea ku Petro kafɔɔ lakye nii.
43001045	Obe wɔ di Filipo lakyɛ aalaanya ni Natanael, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Butɔɔnya otii wɔ suoto di Mose ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ lakpana asaa baakyeko ni di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ. Nnwɔɔ ninle Yesu wɔ niekye ni Nasaret nɛ. Yosef obi ale.”
43001046	Ninfɛ di Natanael lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛsaa biene lewo kafuo odie okye Nasaret fiɛ?” Ninfɛ di Fililpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ yi, wa fabanyu!”
43001047	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanya Natanael kɔwa ni ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, ni aabuɛ aakyeko di suoto nɔɔ alɛ, “Nnya Israel obi omu omu ninle nwɔ mmle nɛ. Kakyɔnkyɔ kukanwii diesi nwɔ kaamɛ.”
43001048	Obe wɔ di Natanael lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, ni aakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Lɛ diɛbla fiɛ faye mi?” Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ntɔɔnya fɔ kofokofoko di kubue nwu nkpo kalɔ fiɛ di Filipo lalɛɛ fɔ.”
43001049	Ninfɛ di Natanael ladiki kanya aabuɛ aatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, nwaako afɔ ninle Yaa Obi nwu nkpo nɛ. Israel Batii Ɔka ninle afɔ!”
43001050	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ta mmle lɛtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ lɛnya fɔ ni di kubue nwu nkpo kalɔ oso fatoofũ feenu? Ni fabanya asaa kplɛ ya niɛtaka katoo alenke ni nle mmle.”
43001051	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, fabanya mmle okle di kolo masɛkɛtɛ nii, di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ matooyie mantoosoo ni di ami, Otii Obi nwu, suoto.”
43002001	Di ayi atiɛ sɛmaa, baayɔ ɔsanko di okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Kana di Galilea kasɔ suoto. Yesu ɔya lakyɛ nfa.
43002002	Ni baakyakako Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ kafɔɔ di ɔsanko nwu nkpo kayɔkɔ nɛ.
43002003	Obe wɔ di nta be baatɔɔblako ni ɔkpɛ laloo nii, ninfɛ di Yesu ɔya lakyɛ Yesu nfũ aalaatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nta be bɔɔblako ni ɔkpɛ ntooloo ma.”
43002004	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ɔya alɛ, “Mma, diele afɔ nimatɔkɔ mi lɛsaa le dikpe ni lɛbla nii. Diekye obe wɔ dikaatɛ alɛ lɛta ni lɛkyakaako diiwo.”
43002005	Ninfɛ di Yesu ɔya lakyɛ aalaatɔkɔ bakpɛmblatɛ ba niatɔɔblako ni nta nwu nkpo ɔkpɛ alɛ, “Lɛsaa lele ɛɛtɔkɔ ye alɛ bibla yi, biɛbla.”
43002006	Yuda batii ɔsaabla kuale alɛ baafoto suoto fiɛ baabuo ayo. Nkpo oso baase afuɔ sɛpɔɔlɔ kplɛ akuɔ ninfa, di ntu adubukii fɛ ana ee anɔɔ nikayii ni ninwii kamɛ.
43002007	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ bakpɛmblatɛ nwu alɛ, “Bidu ntu biyiisa sɛpɔɔlɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ.” Nkpo oso baadu ntu baakpete sĩ kaamɛ siayii tɛkɛtɛkɛ.
43002008	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ bakpɛmblatɛ nwu alɛ, “Bikusii ntu nwu nwo bikyɛnko osuɔtɔ nwu nin-yɛ ni di ɔsaabla nwu kanya.” Ninfɛ baakusii mi baakyɛnko nwɔ nɛ.
43002009	Obe wɔ di ɔnɔɔfo nwu nin-yɛ ni di ɔsaabla nwu nkpo kanya latu ntu be nintookple ni nta aanyu nii, atatofo nfũ di nta nwu nkpo lakye nii. Kafɔɔ bakpɛmblatɛ nwu nkpo niakusii mi nii, mma, baatofo. Nkpo oso ɔnɔɔfo nwu nkpo lalɛɛ ɔsanko nwu nkpo ɔsa,
43002010	ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Otii biala n-yɔ nta biene anta batii manyi, nse nfɛ boosiɛ fiɛ nfɛ an-yɔ mbe ninanlɛ ni anwako ma manyi. Kafɔɔ afɔ mianwu nfɛ fɛɛyɔ mbiene fɛɛwako nɛ.”
43002011	Nle mmle di Yesu labla ni di Kana okpoo di Galilea kasɔ ninle ɔkpɛ wɔ niabla ni ɔkpɛ kasale aabla ni aayɔ aadiki ni lɛkpa nɔɔ aatuo ni nɛ. Ni di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lafũ nwɔ baanu nɛ.
43002012	Di nle mmle sɛmaa, Yesu ku ɔya ku babilɛma suɔtɔbi ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasifi Kapernaum, baalaasiɛ ninfa ayi asɛɛ awo.
43002013	Ditoobu ayi asɛɛ di Yuda batii Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii olebee nfɛ mawo nii, Yesu lakyɛ Yerusalem.
43002014	Obe wɔ aakyɛ ni Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ, aalaanya batii kosunsũ banankyue ku bafoso ku ablonumaa. Aanya kafɔɔ batii ba nikobiɛ ni ato nsi di sipunu lɛma katũ.
43002015	Nkpo oso aayɔ sikũ aaloso mpile, ni aatososa batii nwu nkpo ninkosunsũ ni babɔkɛɛ nwu ku banankyue ku bafoso nwu nkpo aadiki di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu kamɛ nɛ. Ni aatukusa koto babiɛtɛ sipunu nwu aayu, aasamiisa koto nwu nkpo kafɔɔ nɛ.
43002016	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ batii ba niatoosunsũ ni ablonumaa alɛ, “Bidieko ma ninfũ bisifiko! Biediɛ Teemi leyo ɔyɔ ɔbla asaa kasunsukɔ!”
43002017	Nfa nfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lanyuma ɔlaa wɔ bɛɛkpana ni Kɔɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “O Yaa, lɛbɔmbɔ nii di Leyo lɛfɔ suoto lɛta ninu lɛsɛɛ mi.”
43002018	Ta nle mmle oso, Yuda batii batunletɛ lawa Yesu nfũ babakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛmɛntuosaa faafuo ɔbla otuo wo alɛ fakpe osuku fambla lɛsaa le mmle?”
43002019	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Bibiɛ Yaa Leyo le mmle bitɛ kaasɔ, di ayi atiɛ kamɛ yi, makple nse ni letofo.”
43002020	Ninfɛ baakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Be foobuɛɛ? Obe wɔ bɛɛyɔ alɛɛ afosi ana alɛɛ akuɔ beetofo ni Leyo le mmle, fabayɔ ayi atiɛ fanse ni letofo?”
43002021	Batanu ɔlaa wɔ mmle kasɔ. Diekye leyo le suoto di Yesu latɔɔkakatɛ ni niale suoto nɔɔ sina nɛ.
43002022	Nioso, sɛmaa, obe wɔ di Yaa lasɛnkɛsa Yesu aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ fiɛ nfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lanyuma alɛ aabuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle. Nkpo oso baafũ Kɔkpana Klekle kamɛ sɛlaa se bɛɛkpana ni ku ɔlaa wɔ di Yesu labuɛ ni baanu.
43002023	Obe wɔ di Yesu lawɛ ni di Yerusalem di Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii olebee nwu kamɛ yi, batii kpinwu lafũ nwɔ baanu, di obe wɔ baanya ni sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ ate ate se aabla ni oso.
43002024	Kafɔɔ Yesu omu ditadiɛ suoto nnɛɛ ata ma, diekye aatofo batii nwu bamuu.
43002025	Nkpo oso ditafĩ alɛ otii kuonwii katɔkɔ nwɔ batii ba okle bale nii, diekye nnwɔɔ omu aye otii letembi kaasɔ ka mmle suoto.
43003001	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, Yuda batii tunletɛ onwii lawɛ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Nikodemo. Aasiɛ di dikudi le baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Farisi batii kamɛ.
43003002	Dii ninwii kakyɛ, aamaa buɛɛ aawa Yesu nfũ, ni aabaakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, buye bulɛ Yaa nfũ feekye. Diekye otii kuonwii dilabafuo sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ, fɔɔbla ni ɔbla, nse Yaa diesiko nwɔ.”
43003003	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, nse baase otii lelofo yi, ɔlɔbafuo Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ ɔnya.”
43003004	Ninfɛ di Nikodemo lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Be foobuɛɛ? Lɛ nse otii ntoomuɔ baakple manse nwɔ lelofo, sɛɛ okple aakple ansifi ɔya kafutu kamɛ, mankple manse nwɔ lelofo lɛnyɔɔfa?”
43003005	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, nse baase otii lelofo di ntu ku Yaa Ninwuna kamɛ, ɔlɔbafuo Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ obuo.
43003006	Diekye otii wɔ beefe di suoto sina kamɛ beelofo ni yi, suoto sina kamɛ otii ale. Kafɔɔ nwɔ beelofo ni di Yaa Ninwuna kamɛ yi, ninwuna kamɛ otii ale.
43003007	Nkpo oso tanta diabla fɔ ɔkpɛ alɛ lɛtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ dikpe nii beese ye lelofo.
43003008	Kɔfɛɛfɔ nfɛ kunfe nfũ ninlɛkũ nii. Fannukũ diwi, kafɔɔ fántofo nfũ kuokye nii, ku nfũ kuofe nii. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ dite ku otii wɔ beelofo ni di Ninwuna kamɛ nɛ.”
43003009	Ninfɛ di Nikodemo lakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Lɛ ninle mmle kamafuo ɔwa kaanya?”
43003010	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ kplɛ fale di Israel batii kamɛ. Ni be oso floonu asaa ya mmle kasɔ?
43003011	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ munkakatɛ di asaa ya buye ni suoto, asaa ya butɔɔnya ni kafɔɔ mun-yɔ kanya loo mundiki mumbuɛ. Kafɔɔ kuonwii lee dilootuna alɛ afũ ɔlaa wɔ lɛkya buoyie ni anu.
43003012	Nse lɛkakatɛ di kayi ka mmle asaa suoto lɛta fɔ fananfũ mi fanu mɔ, ni lɛ dibabla nse lekakatɛ lɛta fɔ di Yaa kafa asaa suoto fiɛ fabafũ mi fannu?
43003013	Otii kuonwii diikata akyɛ osi anya, dilenkee ami, Otii Obi nwu lete niakye osi aawa kasɔ ka mmle nwu suoto.
43003014	“Fɛ mmle okle di Mose latakatɛsa kɔsaanwu ko baayɔ lɛbɔɔsaa baabla ni aasaka ni koowoso suoto di ɔfaafuu kamɛ yi, nkpo okle kafɔɔ dikpe ni bɛɛtakatɛsa ami, Otii Obi nwu nkpo katoo nɛ,
43003015	alɛ otii lele niefũ mi eenu, aawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
43003016	“Diekye Yaa ntɛ ambɔmbɔ kayi ka mmle osie kanya, ni ɛɛyɔ Obi nɔɔ onwii nwu ɛɛta alɛ, otii lele niefũ nwɔ eenu, alaawɔɔ. Kafɔɔ, aawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
43003017	Diekye Yaa diekyesee Obi nɔɔ nwu alɛ abakanko batii kaayi ka mmle alo ma lɛpɔɔ. Kafɔɔ alɛ diefe ni di Obi nɔɔ nwu suoto, batii kawɛ didiki.
43003018	“Batii ba niefũ Yaa Obi nwu beenu nii, Yaa dilaakanko ma alo ma lɛpɔɔ. Kafɔɔ batii ba ninanfũ nwɔ banu nii, batookpi lɛpɔɔ kofokofoko, diekye baafũ Yaa Obi nwu nkpo onwii banu.
43003019	Lɛsaa le oso baakanko ma manlo ma ni lɛpɔɔ ninle alɛ, lɛkpa ntookye osi diɛwa kayi ka mmle kafɔɔ batii kɔbɔmbɔ ditunu manlenkee lɛkpa nwu nkpo, diekye ɔsaabla lɛma lɛbla dikpile.
43003020	Diekye otii lele nimbla sikpile yi, ankyidi lɛkpa nwu, nioso ánwa lɛkpa nwu nkpo nfũ, diekye ɔɔyɛkɛ alɛ nse ɛɛwa lɛkpa nwu nkpo nfũ yi, babadiki ɔsaabla nɔɔ kayi.
43003021	Kafɔɔ otii wɔ nimbla ni lɛsaa di osuku kanya yi, anwa lɛkpa nwu nkpo nfũ alɛ, lɛkpa nwu nkpo kadiki nintuo alɛ nwaako, ambla asaa di Yaa dibiesaa kanya.”
43003022	Di nle mmle sɛmaa, Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasifi Yudea ntɛɛ nwu baalaawɛ ninfa obe owo aatookpeesa batii Yaa ntu.
43003023	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Yohane kafɔɔ lawɛ di Aenon wɔ niatɛɛtɛɛ ni Salim aatookpeesa batii Yaa ntu, diekye ntu lawɛ ninfa diapɔ. Nioso batii kpinwu latɔɔkyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ ninfa aatookpeesa ma Yaa ntu.
43003024	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, bayimufũ Yohane batɛ leeyo.
43003025	Dii ninwii ɔlaa ɔnanfi labuo di Yohane basaateketetɛ bawo ku Yuda otii onwii ntɛɛ di suoto ofoto ɔsaabla suoto.
43003026	Nkpo oso baakyɛ Yohane nfũ baalaakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, foonyuma osuɔtɔ wɔ niawɛ ni di ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ, faadiki nwɔ faatuo wo ni di Yordan okle kakyɛ nyɔɔfa? Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ nfɛ ookpeesa batii Yaa ntu, batii bamuu nfɛ kosifi ɔkyɛ nɔɔ!”
43003027	Ninfɛ di Yohane ladiki kanya alɛ, “Otii kuonwii dilabafuo lɛsalɛsaa kuninwii ɔwɛ, nse diele Yaa niɛtɔɔ.
43003028	Aye bamu bionyuma bilɛ latɔkɔ ye nlɛ, ‘Diele ami ninle Kristo nwu nkpo, kafɔɔ ami yi, okyesee ko di Yaa lekyesee mi alɛ kale nwɔ katũ.’
43003029	Ɔkafɔɔsa ole ninle ɔkafɔɔsɔfɔ. Kafɔɔ nse ɔkafɔɔsa siɛwo wɔ nin-yɛ ni di ɔlɔɔkɔ eenu ɔkafɔɔsa sɛlɔ yi, suoto n-yɔɔ nwɔ osie kanya. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di amii, ntoonu nwɔ ni sɛlɔ, suoto lɛyɔɔ nii ntɔɔbla nimu nɛ.
43003030	Nioso, dikpe nii nnwɔɔ ɛɛtaka katoo, amii dikpe nii lɛwa kasɔ.
43003031	“Otii wɔ niekye osi ɛɛwa ni lɛtaka katoo alenke bamuu. Otii wɔ kafɔɔ niekye ni kasɔ ka mmle suoto, kasɔ ka mmle otii ko ale, kasɔ ka mmle suoto asaa kafɔɔ suoto lete ankakatɛ. Otii wɔ niekye osi ɛɛwa ni nlenke asaa amuu.
43003032	Oobuɛ lɛsaa le ɛɛnya ni ku nle eenu nii, kafɔɔ otii kuonwii diefũ nwɔ ɔlaa anu.
43003033	Batii ba niefũ nwɔ ɔlaa beenu nii, kodiki mantuo klekle alɛ Yaa ɔlaa nte nkpo.
43003034	Otii wɔ di Yaa lekyesee ni kodiki Yaa ɔlaa ambuɛ, diekye Yaa lɛyɔ Ninwuna nɔɔ eekpee nwɔ kaamɛ pɔ.
43003035	Yaa mbɔmbɔ Obi nwu nkpo, ni ɛɛyɔ lɛsaa biala eekpe nwɔ di nnɛɛ kamɛ nɛ.
43003036	“Otii lele niefũ Obi nwu eenu, akpe nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo. Otii lele kafɔɔ niesĩ Obi nwu atoko ɔkyɔɔ dilabawɛ nkpa, ni Yaa letokonanfi kafɔɔ matika nwɔ di suoto.”
43004001	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, Farisi batii lanu alɛ Yesu nfɛ kokpeesa batii Yaa ntu, basaateketetɛ nɔɔ kafɔɔ nfɛ latɔɔpɔ baatoolenkee Yohane bale.
43004002	Nwaako baabuɛ nii, Yesu omu ditakpeesa otii kuonwii Yaa ntu, kafɔɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ niatookpeesa batii.
43004003	Nioso obe wɔ di Yesu lanu ɔlaa wɔ baatoobuɛ nii, ninfɛ aadie di Yudea kasɔ suoto aakple aasifi Galilea nɛ.
43004004	Di osuku nɔɔ nwu nkpo ɔkyɛ kamɛ, dikpe nii eefe di Samaria kasɔ suoto.
43004005	Ninfɛ di Yesu lalaadu Sikar wɔ ninle ni Samaria okpoo onwii kamɛ nɛ. Okpoo nwu lɛtɛɛtɛɛ kasɔ ka di ɔwa lɛma Yakob layɔ aata ni obi nɔɔ Yosef.
43004006	Ntu dibiɔ le di Yakob lakutu ni late ninfa. Obe wɔ di Yesu labadu ni ntu dibiɔ nwu nkpo nfa, ditoobuo nwɔ ni di osuku nwu nkpo ɔkyɛ kamɛ, aasiɛ ni di ɔlɔɔkɔ. Diabla fɛ kakũ lefosi abombo anyɔ kamɛ.
43004007	Di obe nwu kamɛ Samaria ɔsanko onwii lawa alɛ ɔɔbadu ntu. Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tɛɛ ntu nnyi.”
43004008	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Yesu basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lafe okpoo alɛ bɔɔlaaya alesaa manwako.
43004009	Ninfɛ di ɔsanko nwu nkpo lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Be oso di afɔ Yuda otii fɔɔkaalɛ ami Samaria otii ntu?” Aakaalɛ nwɔ ɔlaa nwu nkpo diekye Yuda batii ku Samaria batii nimbla asaa anwii.
43004010	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nse fɛ oye faye lɛsaa le di Yaa nta ni ku otii wɔ nikɔkaalɛ fɔ alɛ tɔɔ ntu anyi nii, nse bia afɔ nitɔbakaalɛ nwɔ, anta fɔ ntu be ninta ni nkpa.”
43004011	Ninfɛ di ɔsanko nwu nkpo labuɛ alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, ntu didusaa nnaafɔ, dibiɔ le mmle kafɔɔ lekyofo, ni ɔfɛ fabawɛ ntu be ninta ni nkpa fankyeko?
43004012	Ɔwa loo Yakob niakutu dibiɔ le mmle aata wo, nnwɔɔ omu ku babi ku banankyue nɔɔ lanyi ntu di dibiɔ le mmle kamɛ. Obuɛ foobuɛ falɛ fɛɛtakakatoo falenke nwɔ ɛɛ, sɛɛ lɛ?”
43004013	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Otii lele nienyi ntu di dibiɔ le mmle kamɛ yi, otukɔnsɔ makple kunklee nwɔ.
43004014	Kafɔɔ otii lele nienyi ntu be kamatɔɔ ni yi, otukɔnsɔ dilabasinklee otii nwu nkpo diidii. Ntu nwu nkpo kamatɔɔ ni makple ntu kataakɔ di kamɛ nɔɔ nintɔɔ nkpa ntu, nintɔɔ kafɔɔ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.”
43004015	Ninfɛ di ɔsanko nwu latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, ni tɛɛ ntu nwu nkpo nnwo, mmle okle di otukɔnsɔ dilabasinklee mi ni diidii. Ni namasinwa nfũ mmle kafɔɔ nlɛ kamadu ntu.”
43004016	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tɔɔkyɛ faalaalɛɛ ɔsa lɛfɔ biɛwa.”
43004017	Ninfɛ di ɔsanko nwu latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Nnaa kɔsa.” Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kute nkpo nse feebuɛ falɛ fanaa kɔsa.
43004018	Nwaako feebuɛ. Diekye fatɔɔyɔ basa banɔɔ diɛbafe. Bia minko nwɔ ninsi ni nunua wɔ mmle aale fɔ kɔsa kumu kumu.”
43004019	Ninfɛ di ɔsanko nwu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, ntɔɔnya nlɛ Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ fale!
43004020	Awo Samaria batii yi, buye bulɛ kobokote ko mmle suoto di bawa loo latoosumu Yaa. Kafɔɔ aye Yuda batii biobuɛ bilɛ Yerusalem lete dikpe nii, beesumu Yaa.”
43004021	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔsanko, fũ ɔlaa wɔ mmle kɔtɔkɔ fɔ ni fanu. Obe kɔwa batii bamuu dilabasinwakosa asi kasɔ bata Yaa di kobokote ko mmle suoto, ee Yerusalem.
43004022	Aye Samaria batii yi, bieye lɛsaa le biosumu nii. Kafɔɔ awo Yuda batii yi, buye otii wɔ buosumu nii. Diekye, didiki yi, awo Yuda batii kamɛ diekye.
43004023	Kafɔɔ obe kɔwa, obe nwu nkpo kafɔɔ ntoowo di batii ba ninsumu ni Yaa di osuku kanya, kamasumu Teete nwu di Yaa Ninwuna kamɛ ku nwaako ole kamɛ. Diekye batii ba mmle okle di Yaa komiɛ alɛ batansɔɔ nɛ.
43004024	Obe wɔ di Yaa nle ni Ninwuna oso, dikpe ni batii ba nikosumu nwɔ nii, basumu nwɔ di Ninwuna kamɛ ku nwaako ole kamɛ.”
43004025	Ninfɛ di ɔsanko nwu latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “N-ye nlɛ otii wɔ bɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ manlɛɛ ni Kristo kamawa. Nse ɛɛwa yi, abatɔkɔ wo lɛsaa biala.”
43004026	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Ami wɔ mmle nikɔkakatɛko fɔ ni ninfũ mmle yi, ami ninle otii nwu nkpo nɛ.”
43004027	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, Yesu basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakple, nioso diabla ɔkpɛ alɛ ɔɔkakatɛko ɔsanko nwu nkpo. Kafɔɔ kuonwii lɛma ditafuo ɔsanko nwu ɔkaalɛ alɛ, “Be foomiɛ” ee bakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Be oso fɔɔkakatɛ ko nwɔ?”
43004028	Ɔsanko nwu ladiɛ ditubukii nɔɔ nwu nkpo ninfa, aakple aasifi okpoo aalaatɔkɔ batii alɛ,
43004029	“Biwa biɛbanyu otii wɔ niɛtɔkɔ mi ni lɛsaa biala ntooyibla lɛnya ni! Sɛɛ nnwɔɔ ninle Kristo nwu nkpo?”
43004030	Nkpo oso batii nwu nkpo ladie di okpoo nwu nkpo kamɛ baakyɛ alɛ bɔɔlaanyu Yesu.
43004031	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ kafɔɔ, Yesu basaateketetɛ latootikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, bale alesaa!”
43004032	Kafɔɔ Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nkpe alesaa male ni, minanye nii.”
43004033	Nkpo oso basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakye kasɔ baatɔɔkaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Sɛɛ otii owo ntɔɔwako nwɔ alesaa awo eele?”
43004034	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Alesaa nii ninle alɛ kabla otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ dibiesaa, alɛ kaloo ɔkpɛ wɔ eekpee mi alɛ mabla ni ɔbla.
43004035	Aye nimbuɛ bilɛ, ‘Awɛntɛ ana kamaa, se ofiɛlɛbee ntoowo.’ Kafɔɔ kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, bitakatɛsa anu bienyu kofe nwu nkpo, alesaa nwu nkpo ntɔɔsɛɛ, dikpe nii nfɛ manfiɛlɛ nya nii.
43004036	Otii wɔ nikofiɛlɛ ni yi, nnwɔɔ di Yaa nta koto, ansiisa alesaa nwu nkpo kafɔɔ anta nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo nɛ. Nkpo oso otii wɔ nimpɛ ni ku otii wɔ ninfiɛlɛ nii yi, akyuu lɛma anyɔ manya suoto lɛyɔɔ osie kanya.
43004037	Nkpo oso ɔlaa nwu nkpo mambuɛ alɛ, ‘Otii onwii mpɛ, ɔbamba kafɔɔ nfiɛlɛ ni yi, kute nkpo.’
43004038	Ami yi, lekpee ye nlɛ, biakyɛ minaafiɛlɛ alesaa di nfũ minankpɛ dibuo ye nii. Batii bamba lɛbla ɔkpɛ ninfa diebuo ma. Kafɔɔ aye yi, biɔwɛ kowee di ɔkpɛ lɛma ɔbla kamɛ.”
43004039	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, Samaria batii kpinwu niakye ni okpoo nwu nkpo lafũ Yesu baanu. Diekye ɔsanko nwu nkpo latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ɛɛtɔkɔ mi lɛsaa biala ntooyibla lɛnya nii.”
43004040	Nioso obe wɔ di Samaria batii nwu nkpo lawa ni Yesu nfũ yi, baatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ asiɛ ma diɔkyɛ, nioso aasiɛ di ɔkyɛ lɛma ayi anyɔ.
43004041	Nioso batii bamba kpinwu lakple baafũ Yesu baanu, ta sɛlaa nɔɔ se aabuɛ ni oso.
43004042	Ni baatɔkɔ ɔsanko nwu alɛ, “Butoofũ buoonu nfɛ, diele di sɛlaa se fɛɛtɔkɔ wo ni oso, diekye awo bamu loo butoonu nwɔ ɔlaa, butootofo kafɔɔ bulɛ, nwaako nnwɔɔ ninle kayi ka mmle dikitɛ.”
43004043	Di Yesu lale ni ayi anyɔ ninfa, ni aadie aasifi Galilea kasɔ suoto nɛ.
43004044	Nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ aabuɛ alɛ, “Mámbu Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ kuonwii di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ okpoo.”
43004045	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di Yesu labuo ni Galilea, batii nwu ninfa lafũ nwɔ osie kanya, diekye obe wɔ baakyɛ ni Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii kalekɔ di Yerusalem yi, baanya asaa ya amuu aabla ni ninfa.
43004046	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakple aasifi Kana di Galilea kasɔ, di lɛba le ayɔ ntu aabla ni nta nɛ. Abaa ɔnɔɔfotii onwii lawɛ ninfa di Kapernaum di obi nɔɔ suɔtɔbi latoofiɛ nii.
43004047	Obe wɔ di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo lanu alɛ Yesu ntookple di Yudea ɛɛwa ni Galilea, ni aakyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ aalaatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ awa abayɔɔsa obi nɔɔ nwu nkpo nikoloo ni okpi ofiɛ.
43004048	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse biɛ́nya sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ ku atuosaa mínfũ bianu.”
43004049	Ninfɛ di ɔnɔɔfotii nwu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, lekoto wa wla fabanyu obi nii nwu mmle okle anamakpi ni.”
43004050	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tɔɔkyɛ, obi lɛfɔ nwu nkpo mawɛ nkpa.” Ni di ɔnɔɔfotii nwu nkpo lafũ Yesu ɔlaa wɔ aatɔkɔ nwɔ ni aanu, ni aasifi nɛ.
43004051	Obe wɔ nfɛ akyɛ di osuku oosifi ni leyo, ni baakpɛntɛ nɔɔ lawa baabakyakako nwɔ baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ obi lɛfɔ nwu nkpo ntɔɔtaka di ofiɛ.
43004052	Ninfɛ aakaalɛ ma alɛ ɔmɛmbe kamɛ aataka di ofiɛ? Ninfɛ baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kɔsa kakũ olomu onwii kamɛ di lɛwɔɔfɔ ofiɛ nwu nkpo layɔɔ nwɔ.”
43004053	Ninfɛ di obisɔ nwu nkpo ote lanyuma alɛ, di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ tutuutu di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Obi lɛfɔ nwu nkpo mawɛ nkpa.” Nkpo oso ɔnɔɔfotii wɔ mmle ku leyo nɔɔ kamɛ batii bamuu lafũ Yesu baanu.
43004054	Nle mmle niale ɔkpɛ wɔ niabla ni ɔkpɛ nyɔɔfa di Yesu labla ni di obe wɔ aakye Yudea aawa ni Galilea kasɔ nɛ.
43005001	Nle mmle sɛmaa, Yesu lakple aakyɛ Yerusalem di obe wɔ di Yuda batii kole ni dii lɛma ninwii.
43005002	Di bafoso kayoko ɔlɔɔkɔ di Yerusalem, lɛpanta ninwii nte manlɛɛ ni Betesda di Hebri sele kamɛ. Bɛɛpɛ akpanta anɔɔ beekyisa lɛpanta nwu nkpo.
43005003	Bafiɛtɛ ɔlambu kplɛ late di akpanta nwu nkpo kalɔ baale ni banumbiɛtɛ ku mba di nkpaa lɛma lekpi nii ku mba niekpi ni kakyɛkakyɛ. Baate baasoko ntu nwu nkpo ɔbakaa.
43005004	(Diekye Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii nwa amabakaa ntu nwu nkpo di obe obe. Fiɛtɛ lele niɛkasa obuo di ntu nwu nkpo kamɛ di obe wɔ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ lɛbabakaa mi nii, ofiɛ lele kule, kunyɔɔ fiɛtɛ nwu nkpo.)
43005005	Osuɔtɔ onwii lawɛ ninfa aatoofiɛ ni alɛɛ afosi atiɛ alɛɛ anɛ amu.
43005006	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanyɔɔ nii, aatofo alɛ osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle ntoote diofiɛ diɛklɛ. Nioso aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Foomiɛ falɛ ofiɛ lɛfɔ nwu nkpo kuyɔɔ fɔ?”
43005007	Ninfɛ di fiɛtɛ nwu nkpo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, otii kuonwii nnaa mi abakyakaakoe an-yɔ mi ankpee ni di lɛpanta nwu nkpo kamɛ nse bɛɛbakaa ntu nwu. Nse kɔkpɛ nlɛ kanaabuo yi, otii bamba nle mi katũ, anka mi ɔlaabuo.”
43005008	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Taka! Faayɔ ɔkla lɛfɔ, faakyɛ.”
43005009	Nfanwu ofiɛ layɔɔ osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo, aayɔ ɔkla nɔɔ, aakyako ɔkyɛ. Dii le di ɔlaa wɔ mmle lawa nii, Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi diale.
43005010	Nkpo oso Yuda batii banɔɔfotii latɔkɔ osuɔtɔ nwu di Yesu layɔɔsa ni ofiɛ alɛ, “Miɛ Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi dile, kufiofa loo diɛta osuku alɛ faaklee ɔkla lɛfɔ.”
43005011	Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ wɔ niɛyɔɔsɛɛ ni ofiɛ niɛtɔkɔ mi alɛ n-yɔ ɔkla nii ninkyɛ.”
43005012	Ninfɛ baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Owe ninle otii nwu niɛtɔkɔfɔ alɛ, ‘Yɔ ɔkla lɛfɔ faakyɛ ni’?”
43005013	Kafɔɔ osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo baayɔɔsa ni ofiɛ dieye otii wɔ di Yesu nle nii. Diekye batii dikudi niawɛ ninfa nkpo, Yesu kafɔɔ ntooyu ma kaamɛ.
43005014	Di nni nkpo sɛmaa, Yesu lanya osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo di Yaa Olekatakɔ, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nyu lo! Nunua fatoosie nii, tansimbla okpile. Nse diele nkpo, ni lɛsaa le ninlenke ni nle mmle nikamabla fɔ.”
43005015	Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo lasifi aalaatɔkɔ Yuda batii banɔɔfotii nwu nkpo alɛ, Yesu ninle otii nwu nkpo niayɔɔsa nwɔ ni ofiɛ.
43005016	Nkpo oso Yuda batii nwu nkpo lakyako Yesu otikanko, diekye Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto aayɔɔsa nwɔ ofiɛ.
43005017	Kafɔɔ Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Obe lele Teemi kɔbla ɔkpɛ, nkpo oso dikpe ni amii lɛbla.”
43005018	Ɔlaa wɔ mmle aabuɛ ni lakple diata alɛ Yuda batii banɔɔfotii lamiɛ osie kanya alɛ boolo nwɔ. Diele alɛ aataalɛ ni Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi kufiofa nwu nkpo lete oso, kafɔɔ aabuɛ alɛ Yaa ninle nwɔ Kote. Ni nle mmle kotuo alɛ, oonyu suoto nɔɔ alɛ manko Yaa bakyɛkyɛ.
43005019	Nioso Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, Yaa Obi nwu dilaafuo lɛsalɛsaa ɔbla di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ kamɛ. Kafɔɔ lɛsaa le ɛɛnya Ote kɔbla nii, nni ambla nɛ.
43005020	Diekye Ote nwu mbɔmbɔ Obi nwu. Nioso lɛsaa lele di Ote nwu omu kɔbla, aantuo Obi nwu nimuu. Abatuo nwɔ bia asaa kplɛ ya ninlenke ni n-ya mmle alɛ bamuu lee dibabla ye yaaa.
43005021	Fɛ mmle okle di Ote nwu nsɛnkɛsa bakpi anta ma ni nkpa yi, nkpo okle kafɔɔ di Obi nwu nta mba eediki ni nkpa nɛ.
43005022	Ote nwu nkpo omu nínkanko otii kuonwii. Kafɔɔ ɛɛyɔ lɛkanko biala eekpee di Obi nwu nkpo nnɛɛ kamɛ niimu
43005023	alɛ, batii bamuu kabu Obi nwu nkpo, fɛ mmle okle boobu ni Ote. Otii lele ninambu Obi nwu nkpo yi, ni aambu Ote wɔ kafɔɔ niekyesee nwɔ nii.
43005024	“Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, otii lele nienu mi ɔlaa, eefũ otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ eenu yi, akpe nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo. Blabakanko nwɔ, kafɔɔ atoofe kuukpi kamɛ, eebuo nkpa fɔle nwu kamɛ kofokofoko.
43005025	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye, obe kɔwa, obe nwu nkpo kafɔɔ ntɔɔwa kofokofoko di bakpi manu ni Yaa Obi nwu nkpo sɛlɔ, mba nimanu nii, mataka mansiɛ nkpa.
43005026	Fɛ mmle okle di Ote nwu nkpo omu ninle ni nkpa kataakɔ yi, nkpo okle kafɔɔ ɛɛbla Obi nɔɔ nwu alɛ aale nkpa kataakɔ nɛ.
43005027	Ɛɛtɔɔ osuku alɛ aakanko, diekye Otii Obi nwu ale.
43005028	“Bitanta nle mmle labla ye ɔkpɛ. Diekye obe kɔwa di bakpi bamuu manu nwɔ ni sɛlɔ,
43005029	mandie di sɛkya lɛma kamɛ. Mba niɛbla ni dibiene mataka mansiɛ nkpa, mba kafɔɔ niɛbla ni sikpile babataka manfũ lɛpɔɔ olo.
43005030	“Ninfuo lɛsalɛsaa kuninwii ɔbla di ami omu osie nii kamɛ. Nkanko di mmle okle lete di Yaa lɛtɔkɔ mi ni kanya. Nkpo oso lɛkanko nii lewo. Diekye nimmbla nle ninlɛ mi nii, kafɔɔ nle ninlɛ ni otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ.
43005031	“Nse lediki suoto nii kanya yi, ni suoto nii kanya odiki nwu nkpo diewo nimu.
43005032	Kafɔɔ otii onwii nkpe oodiki mi ni suoto kanya, n-ye kafɔɔ nlɛ, kanya ka oodiki ni di suoto nii nte nkpo.
43005033	“Biekpee batii bɛɛkyɛ Yohane nfũ bɛɛlaakaalɛ nwɔ sɛlaa beekyeko suoto nii, ɛɛtɔkɔ ma kafɔɔ ɔlaa nwɔ ninte ni nkpo.
43005034	Diele kafɔɔ alɛ komiɛ otii kaayi ka mmle alɛ aadiki mi kanya. Lebuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle alɛ biawɛ didiki.
43005035	Yohane late fɛ kandiɛ baasɔ aayila aatɔɔkpa nii, biatuna bilɛ biɔnya ni suoto lɛyɔɔ di lɛkpa nɔɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ di obe kakui kamɛ.
43005036	“Kafɔɔ ami yi, suoto kanya ka ninkpe mi kodiki ni lɛtaka katoo dilenke nka di Yohane ladiki nii. Diekye sɛkpɛ se di Teemi lekpee mi ni di nnɛɛ kamɛ alɛ kabla nloo ni kɔbla ni kotuo alɛ, nnwɔɔ niekpee mi kɔtɔ.
43005037	Teemi wɔ kafɔɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ, nikodiki mi suoto kanya. Diidii biinu nwɔ sɛlɔ ee binyɔɔ kafɔɔ anu ku anu.
43005038	Bieemufũ ɔlaa nɔɔ nwu nkpo kafɔɔ bikpee di situ lee kamɛ. Diekye bieefũ otii wɔ eekpee ye ni binu.
43005039	Biotekete Kɔkpana Klekle Akũ kamɛ sɛlaa obe lele ku disibu bilɛ bibawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo. Kɔkpana nwu nkpo kafɔɔ kodiki mi suoto kanya.
43005040	Kafɔɔ biesĩ bilɛ bilɔɔwa ɔkyɛ nii alɛ kata ye nkpa.
43005041	“Noomiɛ batii kɔlɛɛ kaasɔ ka mmle suoto,
43005042	diekye n-ye batii ba okle bile nii, n-ye kafɔɔ nlɛ binaa lɛbɔmbɔ biɛta Yaa di situ lee kamɛ.
43005043	Lɛwa di Teemi leyooto kamɛ kafɔɔ biefũ mi. Kafɔɔ nse otii bamba lɛwa di leyooto nɔɔ nimu kamɛ yi, bibafukuti nnɛɛ lee minfũ nwɔ.
43005044	Lɛ dibabla fiɛ bibafuo mi ofũ onu, di obe wɔ biomiɛ kɔlɛɛ minkyeko ni aye bamu bawo nfũ, minoomiɛ kɔlɛɛ bikyeko ni nwɔ lete ninle ni Yaa nfũ?
43005045	“Bitanyu bilɛ ami ninle otii wɔ nimalo ye lɛpɔɔ nta ni Teemi. Kafɔɔ Mose wɔ kufiofa bietika ni anu nimalo ye lɛpɔɔ!
43005046	Nse nwaako biefũ Mose bienu yi, nse bitabafũ mi kafɔɔ minnu, diekye ami suoto di Mose nwu nkpo lɛkpana asaa eekyeko.
43005047	Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ minanfũ lɛsaa le ɛɛkpana ni binu nii, lɛ dibabla fiɛ bibafũ sɛlaa se kobuɛ ni minnu?”
43006001	Di nni nkpo sɛmaa, Yesu lataalɛ lekpo le manlɛɛ ni Galilea lekpo, obe owo kafɔɔ manlɛɛ ni Tiberia lekpo aasifi kakyɛ nyɔɔfa.
43006002	Batii kpinwu latikanko nwɔ diekye baanya sɛkpɛ kplɛ se aabla aayɔɔsa ni mba niatoofiɛ ni sifiɛ.
43006003	Ninfɛ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ layie baasifi kobokote osi baalaasiɛ kaasɔ ninfa.
43006004	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ Yuda batii Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii ole bee ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ.
43006005	Obe wɔ di Yesu latakatɛsa anu aanyu aanya alɛ batii dikudi kpinwu kɔwa ni ɔkyɛ nɔɔ yi, ni aakaalɛ Filipo alɛ, “Ɔfɛ bubawɛ alesaa munya munta batii ba mmle nwu nkpo manle?”
43006006	Yesu labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle alɛ ɔɔyɔ ansɔ Filipo annyu, diekye nnwɔɔ omu aye lɛsaa le ɔwa ni ɔbabla.
43006007	Ninfɛ di Filipo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nse buɔyɔ bia batii alafa anyɔ dii kɔkpɛnto buɔɔya alesaa buɔta batii ba mmle nkpo bamuu yi, dilabawo ma bale bia kafui kafui!”
43006008	Ninfɛ di Yesu tikankotɛ nɔɔ onwii kaamɛ lɛma ninle ni Andrea, Simon Petro obilɛma, labuɛ alɛ,
43006009	“Okosopo onwii nsi ninfũ akle ni abloblo kudi anɔɔ ku kɔkpaku kɔnyɔ. Kafɔɔ be di nle mmle mabla banankpantii ba mmle nwu nkpo?”
43006010	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Bita batii nwu nkpo bamuu basiɛ kaasɔ.” Sɛfa kɔɔnle lɛkɛtɛɛ kpinwu lawɛ ninfa. Batii nwu nkpo bamuu lasiɛ kaasɔ. Basuɔtɔ ba niawɛ ni kaamɛ lɛma labla fɛ batii nkpe nnɔɔ.
43006011	Ninfɛ di Yesu lafũ bloblo nwu nkpo, ni aapɛ Yaa sɛfa, ni aasɛ aata batii nwu nkpo bamuu niasiɛ ni ninfa nɛ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ aasɛ kɔkpaku nwu nkpo aata bamuu lɛma, obiala lawɛ aawee fɛ mmle okle oomiɛ nii.
43006012	Di obe wɔ bamuu lɛma batoole beemiɛ nii, Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Bisiisa kɔkyɛɛkɔkyɛɛ nwu nkpo niebu ni alɛ kukanwii dilalalaa.”
43006013	Nkpo oso baasiisa bloblo akudi anɔɔ nwu nkpo baatii nwu lale ni kɔkyɛɛkɔkyɛɛ nɔɔ kuayii lefosi nkyikyɛ nnyɔ pɔ.
43006014	Obe wɔ baatii nwu nkpo lanya ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle niabla ni ɔkpɛ di Yesu labla nii, baabuɛ alɛ, “Nwaako, nnya nwɔ mmle ninle Yaa Ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ wɔ nikɔwa ni kayi ka mmle nɛ.”
43006015	Yesu latofo alɛ boomiɛ alɛ bamufũ nwɔ osie kanya bayɔ nwɔ base ɔka. Nkpo oso aadie ma kaamɛ lete nɔɔ aakple aasifi abokote suoto.
43006016	Obe wɔ kɔɔtɔɔfɔ lawo nii, Yesu basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasoo baakyɛ lekpo kotoko.
43006017	Ninfɛ baayie baabuo di oklo kamɛ, baataalɛ baakple baakyɔɔ anu Kapernaum nɛ. Kale laloo, kafɔɔ Yesu diikple awa ɔkyɛ lɛma.
43006018	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, kofɛɛfɔ siene kunwii lakyako ɔfɛ, lekpo ntu nwu nkpo kafɔɔ lakyako ɔkpɛ osie kanya.
43006019	Di obe nwu kamɛ, basaateketetɛ nwu ntɔɔwa oklo di ntu nwu osi bɛɛkyɛ fɛ akɔ atiɛ diɔkyɛ ni di lɛɛnafa kamɛ, ni baanya Yesu nkyɛ di ntu osi ɔɔwa oklo nwu nfũ nɛ. Nni nkpo oso, ɔfɔɔ lasifi ma!
43006020	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitanyɛkɛ! Ami dile.”
43006021	Ni di otu lɛma late nɛ. Ni baakpaa Yesu baakpee di oklo kamɛ nɛ. Nfanwu, ni baadu nfũ boofe ni nɛ.
43006022	Obe wɔ kaale lasɛ nii, batii ba niasiɛ ni di lekpo nwu kakyɛ nyɔɔfa, baatofo alɛ oklo onwii niayila di lekpo nwu kotoko. Baatofo kafɔɔ alɛ Yesu ditasiɛ di nwu nkpo kaamɛ aakyakaa ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ fiɛ baayefe osuku. Diekye basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lete niabuo nwu kaamɛ baasifi.
43006023	Di obe nwu kamɛ, seklo bamba se niakye ni Tiberia okpoo lawa siabayila di lekpo kotoko, di lɛba le niɛtɛɛtɛɛ ni nfũ baatii nwu nkpo lale ni bloblo di obe wɔ di Saate lapɛ ni Yaa sɛfa.
43006024	Nkpo oso, obe wɔ di batii nwu nkpo lanya alɛ Yesu ee basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nnaa ni ninfa oso, baabuo di seklo nwu nkpo kamɛ baasifi Kapernaum baalaatoowolaa nwɔ.
43006025	Obe wɔ baatii nwu lanya ni Yesu di lekpo nwu nkpo kakyɛ nyɔɔfa, ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, ɔmɛmbe fɛɛwa nfũ?”
43006026	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, bloblo wɔ lata ye biale biamiɛ ni oso biowolaa mi. Diele sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ bianya labla ni kasɔ bienu ni oso.
43006027	Bitankpɛ biata alesaa ya nimalalaa nii, kafɔɔ bikpɛ bita alesaa ya ninkpe ɛɛta ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo. Nnya ninle alesaa ya di Otii Obi nwu kamata ye ni nɛ. Diekye nnwɔɔ ninle otii wɔ di Yaa Ote lese lɛnɛɛ eediki ni nɛ.”
43006028	Nioso batii nwu lakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Ni be ninle lɛsaa le buabla ni diatuo alɛ buɔbla ni Yaa dibiesaa?”
43006029	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Lɛsaa le di Yaa komiɛ alɛ bibla ni ninle alɛ, biafũ otii wɔ eekyesee ni minnu.”
43006030	Ninfɛ baakple baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Be ninle ɔkpɛ wɔ niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ fababla fantuo alɛ buafũ fɔ munnu ni? Nwu ninle ɔmɛnle?
43006031	Waawa loo anɛ lale alesaa ya manlɛɛ ni mana di ɔfaafuu kamɛ, fɛ mmle okle di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ ni alɛ, ‘Aata ma alesaa ya niekye ni Osi baale.’ ”
43006032	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, diele Mose niata ye alesaa ya niekye ni osi biale. Kafɔɔ Teemi ninta ye alesaa amuamu ya niekye ni osi.
43006033	Diekye alesaa ya di Yaa lɛta ni ninle otii wɔ niekye osi ɛɛwa ni, ɔɔta ni batii kaayi nkpa.”
43006034	Nkpo oso baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, ta wo alesaa ya mmle nwu nkpo obe lele.”
43006035	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ami ninle alesaa nwu nkpo ninkpe ni nkpa nɛ. Otii lele niɛwa ɔkyɛ nii, diidii kɔka dilabaklee nwɔ. Otii lele kafɔɔ niefũ mi eenu, diidii otukɔnsɔ dilabaklee nwɔ.
43006036	Kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, bitɔɔnyɛɛ, kafɔɔ biloofũ mi binu.
43006037	Otii lele di Teemi lɛyɔ ɛɛtɛɛ kamawa ɔkyɛ nii. Olele kafɔɔ niɛwa ɔkyɛ nii namasĩ nwɔ diidii.
43006038	Diekye diele okye lekye osi lewa nlɛ kɔbabla ami omu dibiesaa. Kafɔɔ ɔwa lɛwa nlɛ kɔbabla otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ dibiesaa.
43006039	Otii wɔ kafɔɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ dibiesaa dile alɛ, batii ba bamuu ɛɛyɔ ɛɛtɛɛ nii, kuonwii lɛma dilaayu, kafɔɔ alɛ kasɛnkɛsa bamuu lɛma mansiɛ nkpa di dii yɛntɛle nwu nkpo suoto.
43006040	Diekye lɛsaa le di Teemi komiɛ ni ninle alɛ batii ba bamuu niɛnya ni Obi nwu, beefũ kafɔɔ beenu nii kawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo. Ni masɛnkɛsa ma mansiɛ nkpa di dii yɛntɛle nwu nkpo suoto.”
43006041	Nfa nfɛ di Yuda batii nwu lakye kasɔ baatoonwununuu nwɔ di suoto nɛ, diekye aabuɛ alɛ, “Ami ninle alesaa ya niakye osi lawa ni nɛ.”
43006042	Nkpo oso baakaalɛ alɛ, “Diele Yesu wɔ mmle ninle Yosef obi nwu nkpo nɛ, sɛɛ lɛ? Buye nwɔ ote ku ɔya de! Lɛ nfɛ diɛwa fiɛ oobuɛ alɛ nnwɔɔ niekye osi ɛɛwa?”
43006043	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bidiɛ ɔkakatɛ di kamɛ lee.
43006044	Otii kuonwii dilabafuo ɔkyɛ nii ɔwa diediki Teemi wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ niɛnanfi nwɔ ɛɛwako ɔkyɛ nii. Alɛ ami kasɛnkɛsa nwɔ ansiɛ nkpa di dii yɛntɛle nwu nkpo suoto.
43006045	Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ onwii lɛkpana alɛ, ‘Yaa omu nimatuo batii bamuu asaa.’ Nkpo oso, otii lele niɛkyɔɔ Ote nwu nkpo atoko, eetekete asaa eekyeko ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, anwa ɔkyɛ nii.
43006046	Nle mmle dilootuo alɛ otii biala ntɔɔnya Ote nwu nkpo. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ niekye ni Yaa nfũ ninle otii wɔ lete nintɔɔnya ni Ote nwu.
43006047	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii wɔ niefũ eenu nii, nkpe nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
43006048	Ami ninle alesaa ya ninta ni nkpa nɛ.
43006049	Waawa lee anɛ lale alesaa ya manlɛɛ ni mana di ɔfaafuu kamɛ, kafɔɔ baakpi.
43006050	Kafɔɔ alesaa ya niekye osi ɛɛwa nii nle n-ya okle alɛ otii lele niele nya, ɔlɔbakpi.
43006051	Ami ninle alesaa ya ninkpe ni nkpa niakye osi aawa ni nɛ. Nse otii owo lele alesaa ya mmle, abasiɛ nkpa ninnaa ni kaloo. Alesaa ya mmle ninle suoto nii sina nɛ. Nsĩ kamayɔ nta alɛ kayi ka mmle batii kawɛ nkpa nɛ.”
43006052	Nle mmle oso Yuda batii nwu nkpo lakye kasɔ baatɔɔnanfi ɔlaa osie kanya kaamɛ lɛma alɛ, “Lɛ di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle mayɔ suoto sina nɔɔ anta wo alɛ bule?”
43006053	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse biele Otii Obi nwu suoto sina, binyi nwɔ ntɔ, ni bilabawɛ nkpa di kamɛ lee.
43006054	Otii lele niele suoto nii sina nwu, eenyi ntɔ nii nwu nkpo kafɔɔ, ni akpe nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo, ni kamasɛnkɛsa nwɔ ansiɛ nkpa di dii yɛntɛle nwu nkpo suoto.
43006055	Diekye suoto nii sina nwu nkpo ninle alesaa nwu amuamu, ntɔ nii nwu kafɔɔ ninle dinyinsaa nimunimu.
43006056	Otii lele niele mi suoto sina nwu eenyi mi ntɔ nwu kafɔɔ nsi mi kaamɛ, ami kafɔɔ nsi nwɔ kaamɛ.
43006057	Fɛ mmle okle di Teemi wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa lekpee mi ni kɔtɔ, di nnwɔɔ kamɛ nkpe ni nkpa oso yi, nkpo okle kafɔɔ di otii wɔ niele mi ni suoto sina kafɔɔ masiɛ nkpa ta ami oso nɛ.
43006058	Nya alesaa ya niakye osi aawa nii, aate fɛ nnyankpo okle di waawaa lee anɛ lale ni baakpi nii. Nkpo oso otii lele niele alesaa ya mmle masiɛ nkpa ninnaa ni kaloo.”
43006059	Asaa ya mmle di Yesu labuɛ aatuo asaa di Yuda batii kasiisakɔ di Kapernaum nɛ.
43006060	Obe wɔ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ kpinwu lanu ni sɛlaa se mmle yi, baabuɛ alɛ, “Asaatuo ya mmle nkpe osie! Owe nimafuo nya ofũ?”
43006061	Otii kuonwii ditatɔkɔ Yesu ɔlaa kuonwii kafɔɔ aatofo alɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ latoonwununu di sɛlaa se mmle suoto. Nioso aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Sɛlaa se mmle kototofo ye di atokoɛ?
43006062	Ni se diɛwa alɛ biɛɛnya Otii Obi nwu kokple ansifi osi di lɛba le aawɛ ni saa mɔ, ni lɛ dibate ye?
43006063	Lɛsaa le ninta ni nkpa ninle Yaa Ninwuna nɛ. Otii osie nwu diesi di lɛsalɛsaa kuninwii kamɛ. Sɛlaa se ntoobuɛ lɛta ye ni ninwako Yaa Ninwuna nkpa.
43006064	Kafɔɔ batii kpinwu kaamɛ lee diefũ banu.” Yesu labuɛ sɛlaa se mmle diekye kaasɔ kakyekɔ aatofo batii ba ninamafũ banu nii, ku otii wɔ nimadiki nwɔ anta nii.
43006065	Ninfɛ aakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Nle mmle oso latɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii kuonwii dilabafuo ɔkyɛ nii ɔwa diediki Ote nwu nkpo nietuo nwɔ osuku.”
43006066	Nle mmle oso Yesu basaateketetɛ nɔɔ kpinwu lakple nkpaamaa, batasintuna alɛ bootikanko nwɔ.
43006067	Nkpo oso, Yesu lamunikĩi aakaalɛ batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ lefosi banyɔ nwu nkpo kafɔɔ alɛ, “Aye kafɔɔ biomiɛ bilɛ bikple nkpaamaa ɛɛ, sɛɛ lɛ?”
43006068	Ninfɛ di Simon Petro ladiki kanya alɛ, “Saate, owe nfũ nfɛ buofe? Afɔ ninkpe sɛlaa se ninta ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaaloo.
43006069	Nunua, butoofũ buonu buɔnya kafɔɔ buɔtɛnsũ bulɛ afɔ ninle Otii Klekle wɔ niekye ni Yaa nfũ.”
43006070	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ami niediki lefosi batii lee banyɔ, kafɔɔ onwii nle Abonsam kaamɛ lee.”
43006071	Yesu latoobuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle di Yuda suoto, nnwɔɔ niale Simon Iskariot obi nɛ. Diekye di lefosi batii banyɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ, nnwɔɔ niadiki Yesu aata nɛ.
43007001	Di nle mmle sɛmaa, Yesu lakyɛ aakyi di Galilea kasɔ suoto. Atamiɛ alɛ ɔɔkyɛ ankyi di Yudea kasɔ suoto. Diekye, Yuda banɔɔfotii latoomiɛ osuku alɛ boolo nwɔ.
43007002	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Yuda batii akpanta kalɔ osiɛ ayi ole bee ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ.
43007003	Nkpo oso Yesu babilɛma latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Die ninfũ faatɔɔkyɛ Yudea kasɔ suoto alɛ basaateketetɛ lɛfɔ kanya fɔ ɔsaabla.
43007004	Diekye otii kuonwii ninkookaa lɛsaa le ɔɔbla nii nse oomiɛ alɛ batii batofo nwɔ nwaa. Di obe wɔ fɔɔbla ni aasaa ya mmle nwu nkpo okle yi, diki suoto fatuo kayi batii bamuu baatofo fɔ!”
43007005	Baatɔkɔ nwɔ sɛlaa se mmle diekye babilɛma suɔtɔbi bamu ditafũ nwɔ baanu.
43007006	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Obe nii diiwo. Kafɔɔ aye yi, obe lele nkaatɛko ye.
43007007	Diekye aye yi, kayi ka mmle batii dilabafuo ye okyidi. Kafɔɔ ami yi, beekyidi mi, diekye kodiki ntɔkɔ ma klekle nlɛ ɔsaabla lɛma diɛɛlɛ.
43007008	Aye yi, bitɔɔkyɛ Ayi nwu nkpo kalekɔ. Ami nɔɔwa nfa, diekye obe nii diiwo saa.”
43007009	Obe wɔ aatɔkɔ ma nkpo okle aaloo ni yi, nnwɔɔ omu aakple aasiɛ di Galilea ninfa.
43007010	Obe wɔ di babilɛma suɔtɔbi ntoosifi ni ayi nwu nkpo kalekɔ beeloo ni yi, Yesu kafɔɔ lakyɛ, atakyɛ alɛ batii banyɔɔ kafɔɔ aakyɛ di lɛwofa kamɛ.
43007011	Yuda batii banɔɔfotii latowolaa nwɔ di ayi nwu nkpo kalekɔ baatɔɔkaalɛ alɛ, “Ɔfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo nkpe?”
43007012	Batii latoobuɛ sɛwɛɛwɛɛ baakakatɛ kpinwu di Yesu suoto. Batii bawo labuɛ alɛ, “Otii biene ale.” Batii bamba kafɔɔ labuɛ alɛ, “Oowo! Otii kpile ale. Ɔɔkyɔnkyɔ batii anfenko di osuku kpile suoto.”
43007013	Kafɔɔ otii kuonwii ditafuo odiki obuɛ osie kanya diekye baatɔɔyɛkɛ Yuda batii banɔɔfotii.
43007014	Obe wɔ nfɛ di ayi nwu nkpo ole nfɛ kodu ni ntɛɛ yi, Yesu lakyɛ Yuda batii Olekatakɔ aalaatuo batii asaa.
43007015	Asaa nɔɔ otuo labla Yuda batii banɔɔfotii ɔkpɛ, ni baakaalɛ alɛ, “Lɛ diɛbla fiɛ di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle n-ye lɛsaa nkpo okle, di obe wɔ anankyɛ ni asaa kateketekɔ kukanwii?”
43007016	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Asaa ya kotuo ni diele ami omu asaa otuo ale. Kafɔɔ Yaa wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ ale ale.
43007017	Otii lele nikomiɛ alɛ abla Yaa dibiesaa matofo nse asaa ya kotuo ni Yaa nfũ eekye ee ami omu osie nii kamɛ lɛyɔ kɔkakatɛ.
43007018	Otii lele ninkakatɛ di nnwɔɔ omu osie nɔɔ kamɛ yi, ni oomiɛ alɛ ayɔ katansa ata nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ suoto. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ nikomiɛ alɛ atansa ni otii wɔ niekpee nwɔ ni kɔtɔ yi, ambla asaa di osuku kanya, ni aanlaa kafɔɔ.
43007019	Diele Mose niayɔ kufiofa nwu nkpo aata ye, sɛɛ lɛ? Kafɔɔ otii kuonwii kaamɛ lee diloole kufiofa nwu nkpo. Ni be oso biomiɛ bilɛ biloe?”
43007020	Ninfɛ di batii nwu nkpo latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Ninwuna kpile ninsi fɔ kaamɛ! Owe nikomiɛ alɛ alo fɔ?”
43007021	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Lɛsaa ninwii le lɛbla, ninfɛ diɛbla bamuu lee yaaa nɛ.
43007022	Mose lakpee ye kufiofa alɛ biabudi babi lee asɔkɔsɔkɔ. Kafɔɔ diele nnwɔɔ niakye kasɔ, waawa lee anɛ niakye kasɔ bia saa obe kamɛ. Kafɔɔ mimbudi babi lee asɔkɔsɔkɔ di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto.
43007023	Ni nse mimbudi babi lee asɔkɔsɔkɔ di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto alɛ bilaataalɛ Mose kufiofa nwu nkpo, ni be oso biɔnyakee ɔblɔ ta lɛyɔɔsa ni otii ofiɛ diɛyɔɔ nwɔ ni di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto?
43007024	Nse biɔkanko yi, bitannyu otii di anu biaka lɛka! Kafɔɔ yi, bika di mmle di ɔlaa nwu nte ni.”
43007025	Ninfɛ di batii ba bawo niakye ni Yerusalem okpoo, baakaalɛ alɛ, “Diele osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle di Yuda banɔɔfotii komiɛ alɛ balo ni nɛ?
43007026	Binyu! Nnwɔɔ nin-yɛ di lɛkpaka ɔɔkakatɛ nɛ! Otii kuonwii kafɔɔ dilɔɔkaalɛ nwɔ ɔlaa kuonwii! Sɛɛ kamɛ ntɔɔkpa ma klekle nfɛ alɛ nnwɔɔ ninle Kristo nwu nkpo?
43007027	Kafɔɔ nse Kristo nwu nkpo lɛwa yi, otii kuonwii dilabatofo nfũ eekye nii. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ mmle nnwɔɔ bamuu loo buye nfũ eekye nii.”
43007028	Di obe wɔ di Yesu latootuo ni asaa di Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo ninfa yi, aatakatɛsa sɛlɔ katoo aakaalɛ alɛ, “Obuɛ biobuɛ bilɛ biye mi, biye nfũ kafɔɔ lekye ni? Diele ami omu osie nii kamɛ lɛwa! Otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ ninlaa. Aye bieye nwɔ.
43007029	Kafɔɔ ami n-ye nwɔ. Diekye ɔkyɛ nɔɔ lekye, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ niekpee mi kɔtɔ.”
43007030	Nle mmle oso, baamiɛ alɛ boomufũ nwɔ. Kafɔɔ otii kuonwii ditafuo nwɔ ɔkpanko, diekye obe nɔɔ diiwo.
43007031	Kafɔɔ kaamɛ lɛma batii bawo kpinwu lafũ nwɔ baanu baatɔɔkaalɛ alɛ, “Ni nse Kristo nwu nkpo lɛwa, ababla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ɔkpɛ silenke ni nse di otii wɔ mmle lɛbla ni?”
43007032	Di obe wɔ di Farisi batii lanu ni sɛlaa se baatii kobuɛ ni di Yesu suoto oso yi, baabla onwii ku olebatatɛ banɔɔfo, baakpee asaa banyuntɛ alɛ bakyɛ blaamufũ Yesu.
43007033	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Makple nsiɛ di ɔkyɛ lee di obe kakui kamɛ, nni kamaa se ntoosifi otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ nfũ.
43007034	Bibawolaa mi kafɔɔ bilɔbanyɛɛ, diekye lɛba le kamasiɛ nii, bilɔbafuo nfa ɔwa.”
43007035	Ninfɛ di Yuda batii nwu lakaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Ɔfɛ di otii wɔ mmle kofe oso fiɛ, bulɔbanyɔɔ? Sɛɛ abasifi Hela batii sekpoo di nfũ baatii loo nsi ni anaatuo Hela batii asaa?
43007036	Be alaka di obe wɔ eebuɛ alɛ ‘Bibawolaa mi, kafɔɔ bilɔbanyɛɛ. Nfũ kafɔɔ kamasiɛ nii, bilabafuo nfa ɔwa?’ ”
43007037	Dii yɛntɛle le di ayi nwu nkpo boole kamɛ, dile dii finle, Yesu lataka aayila aatakatɛsa sɛlɔ katoo aabuɛ alɛ, “Otii lele di otukɔnsɔ nkle, awa ɔkyɛ nii, abanyi ntu.
43007038	Fɛ mmle okle di Kɔkpana Klekle lebuɛ ni di otii wɔ niefũ mi eenu ni suoto alɛ, ‘Ntu be nikɔtaa ninansɔɔ ni diidii, ninta alɛ otii nsiɛ ni nkpa, ntu nwu nkpo kamatoobiɛ nintoofe di otu nɔɔ kamɛ.’ ”
43007039	Yesu labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle di Ninwuna le baatii ba niefũ nwɔ beenu ni kamafũ ni suoto. Diekye di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, bayiyɔ Ninwuna nwu nkpo bata. Diekye Yesu diibuo di Sɛka ole nɔɔ nwu nkpo lɛkpa kamɛ.
43007040	Obe wɔ baatii nwu nkpo lanu ni Yesu sɛlaa se mmle yi, bawo kaamɛ lɛma labuɛ alɛ, “Nwaako Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ nwu nkpo ninle otii wɔ mmle.”
43007041	Babamba kafɔɔ labuɛ alɛ, “Nnwɔɔ ninle Kristo nwu nɛ.” Bawo kafɔɔ labuɛ alɛ, “Kristo nwu nkpo diele Galilea abadie ankye!
43007042	Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, Kristo nwu nkpo Ɔka Dawid leyo kamɛ abakye. Babalofo nwɔ di Betlehem, di okpoo wɔ di Dawid lasiɛ nii.”
43007043	Ta Yesu oso, batii nwu nkpo lasɛ.
43007044	Bawo lamiɛ alɛ boomufũ nwɔ, kafɔɔ otii kuonwii ditafuo nwɔ ɔkpanko.
43007045	Obe wɔ di Basaanyuntɛ nwu nkpo lakple baasifi ni Farisi batii ku olebatatɛ banɔɔfo nwu nkpo nfũ yi, baakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Obe oso minammufũ nwɔ biwako?”
43007046	Ninfɛ di basaanyuntɛ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Diidii buunu otii kuonwii akakatɛ nwaa fɛ mmle okle di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle lɛkakatɛ nii!”
43007047	Ninfɛ di Farisi batii nwu nkpo lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Aye kafɔɔ osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo lɛkyɔnkyɔ ye?
43007048	Bitoyinu ɔnɔɔfotii owo ee Farisi otii owo ntoyifũ nwɔ eenu?
43007049	Batii dikudi le mmle nimuu dieye Mose kufiofa nwu nkpo. Nkpo oso lɛkpaani ntikanko ma!”
43007050	Farisi otii wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Nikodemo nintoyikyɛ ni Yesu nfũ lasiɛ ma kaamɛ, ninfɛ aakaalɛ ma alɛ,
43007051	“Kufiofa loo lɛta osuku alɛ baalo otii lɛpɔɔ di obe wɔ manayilɛɛ nwɔ banu nwɔ ni kanya kamɛ ɔlaa di lɛsaa le ɛɛbla ni suoto?”
43007052	Ninfɛ ninnwɔɔ kafɔɔ baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ kafɔɔ Galilea feekye ɛɛ, sɛɛ lɛ? Buo diakũ kamɛ fanyu! Fabanya falɛ Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ kuonwii dilabakye Galilea awa diidii.”
43007053	(Ninfɛ di obiala lɛma lasifi ayo lɛma nɛ.)
43008001	Kafɔɔ Yesu nnwɔɔ aasifi kobokote ko manlɛɛ ni Nnɔnyi Awoso Kobokote osi.
43008002	Obe wɔ kaale lasɛ ni ku kuyitatũ yi, Yesu lakple aasifi Yuda batii Olekatakɔ. Ninfɛ di batii nwu nkpo bamuu lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ babasiɛ baamana nwɔ baakyi, ni aasiɛ kaasɔ aakyako ma asaa otuo nɛ.
43008003	Ninfɛ di kufiofa asaa batuotɛ ku Farisi batii lakpaa ɔsanko onwii baamufũ oodie ni ɔsa kamaa nnɛɛ nnɛɛ baawako babase nwɔ di bamuu lɛma anu nɛ.
43008004	Ninfɛ baatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, buomufũ ɔsanko wɔ mmle nnɛɛ nnɛɛ osuɔtɔ bamba kotenko nwɔ.
43008005	Di kufiofa loo kanya yi, Mose lɛta wo osuku alɛ dikpe ni buasafɔ ɔsanko wɔ mmle okle afuɔ munlo. Ni lɛ di afɔ foobuɛ?”
43008006	Baakaalɛ Yesu ɔlaa wɔ mmle alɛ bɔɔyɔ manwolaa nwɔ kaanya mmle okle baalo nwɔ ni lɛpɔɔ. Kafɔɔ ninfɛ aawa kasɔ aayɔ lɛnɛɛ nɔɔ aakyako asaa ɔkpana kaasɔ nɛ.
43008007	Obe wɔ baayila ninfa bɔɔkaalɛ nwɔ ni akaalɛ yi, ninfɛ aatakatɛsa suoto aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Olele kaamɛ lee ninayibla okpile diidii yi, aaka nwɔ difuɔ oyu ɔsafɔ.”
43008008	Ninfɛ aakple aawa kasɔ aayɔ lɛnɛɛ nɔɔ aakyako asaa ɔkpana kaasɔ nɛ.
43008009	Obe wɔ baanɔɔfo nwu nkpo lanu ni ɔlaa nwu yi, ni baakyako osifi onwii onwii fɛ mmle okle balekatũ batika ni nɛ. Ni diabu Yesu ku ɔsanko nwu lete ninfa nɛ.
43008010	Ninfɛ di Yesu latakatɛsa suoto, ni aakaalɛ ɔsanko nwu alɛ, “Ɔsanko, fɛ baatii nwu nkpo ntoofe? Kuonwii lɛma diebu aalo fɔ ni lɛpɔɔ?”
43008011	Ninfɛ di ɔsanko nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, oowo lo!” Nkpo oso, Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nii ni ami kafɔɔ, noolo fɔ lɛpɔɔ. Nioso, tɔɔkyɛ. Kafɔɔ, taasinkple faalaasiɛ faatɔɔbla sikpile.”
43008012	Di nni nkpo sɛmaa, Yesu lakple aabuɛ aatɔkɔ batii nwu nkpo alɛ, “Ami ninle kayi ka mmle lɛkpa. Otii lele nietikanko mi, abawɛ lɛkpa le ninta ni nkpa. Diidii kafɔɔ ɔlɔbakyɛ di ditunu kamɛ.”
43008013	Ninfɛ di Farisi batii nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ omu lɛfɔ nikodiki suoto kanya. Nkpo oso suoto lɛfɔ kanya odiki nwu nkpo diedie lɛsalɛsaa.”
43008014	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Kuntɛ kodiki suoto kanya yi, suoto nii kanya nwu kodiki ni nte nkpo. Diekye n-ye nfũ lekye nii, n-ye nfũ kafɔɔ kofe nii. Aye bieye nfũ lekye nii, ee nfũ kofe nii.
43008015	Aye yi, sitiinyu kanya minkanko. Kafɔɔ ami yi, ninkanko otii kuonwii.
43008016	Nse bia nlɛ kɔkanko yi, lɛkanko nii ntabakyɛ di osuku kanya. Diekye diele lete nii ninkanko. Teemi wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ, munko nwɔ ninkanko nɛ.
43008017	Bɛɛkpana di kufiofa lee kamɛ alɛ, nse batii banyɔ kanya nkaatɛ di ɔlaa owo suoto yi, ni ɔlaa nwu nte nkpo.
43008018	Ami yi, ndiki suoto nii kanya. Teemi wɔ kafɔɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ kafɔɔ ndiki mi suoto kanya.”
43008019	Ninfɛ baakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Ɔfɛ di Teefɔ nwu nkpo nkpe?” Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bieye mi. Bieye Teemi kafɔɔ. Diekye nse oye biye mi yi, nse bitabatofo Teemi kafɔɔ.”
43008020	Yesu labuɛ sɛlaa se mmle di obe wɔ ootuo ni asaa di Yaa Olekatakɔ di lɛba le niɛtɛɛtɛɛ ni nfũ manta ni koto. Kafɔɔ otii kuonwii ditafuo nwɔ omufũ diekye obe nɔɔ diiwo.
43008021	Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ami yi, kamasifi. Bibawolaa mi, kafɔɔ bibakpi di sikple lee kamɛ. Lɛba le kafɔɔ kofe nii bilabafuo nfa ɔwa.”
43008022	Nioso Yuda batii banɔɔfotii lakaalɛ alɛ, “Suoto oofe olo oso oobuɛ alɛ, ‘Bilabafuo lɛba le kofe ni ɔwa’?”
43008023	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye yi, kasɔ ka mmle suoto biekye. Kafɔɔ ami yi, osi lekye lɛwa. Aye yi, kayi ka mmle batii bile. Kafɔɔ ami yi, diele kayi ka mmle otii nle.
43008024	Nioso latɔkɔ ye nlɛ, bibakpi di sikpile lee kamɛ nɛ. Nse biefũ binu bilɛ nle otii wɔ nnle nii, nwaako bibakpi di sikpile lee kamɛ.”
43008025	Ninfɛ baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Owe fale?” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Lɛsaa le lɛtɔkɔ ye kaasɔ kakyekɔ nlɛ nle ni yi, nni nwu kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ nle nɛ.
43008026	Nkpe sɛlaa kpinwu kabuɛ di suoto lee nlo ye ni lɛpɔɔ ta nkpa lee oso fiɛ. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɛ ninlaa. Nioso ɔlaa wɔ lenu lekye ko ni ɔkyɛ nɔɔ yi, nwu lete lɛkya koyie nta kayi batii nɛ.”
43008027	Batanu kasɔ alɛ Yesu yi, Ote suoto aatɔɔkakatɛ aatɔɔta ma.
43008028	Nioso aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Obe wɔ bibatakatɛsa ni Otii Obi nwu katoo yi, obe nwu nkpo bibatofo bilɛ ami ninle otii wɔ lebuɛ nlɛ nnle ni nɛ. Nimbla lɛsalɛsaa kafɔɔ di ami omu osie nii kamɛ. Lɛsaa le kafɔɔ di Teemi lekpeemi alɛ mbuɛ nii, nni nimbuɛ nɛ.
43008029	Otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ kafɔɔ nsikoe. Aadiɛ mi lete, diekye obe lele mbla lɛsaa le nimbuo nwɔ ni anu.”
43008030	Obe wɔ di Yesu labuɛ ni sɛlaa se mmle okle oso yi, batii kpinwu lafũ nwɔ baanu.
43008031	Nkpo oso Yesu latɔkɔ Yuda batii ba niafũ nwɔ baanu ni alɛ, “Nse biemufũ asaa otuo nii bieklee, ni nwaako basaateketetɛ nii bile.
43008032	Ni bibatofo nwaako ɔlaa nwu, ni ɔlaa nwu nkpo mata ye minwɛ kayaa.”
43008033	Ninfɛ baatii nwu latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Abraham banantii bule, diidii kafɔɔ buukple otii kuonwii ɔlanle. Ni be oso foobuɛ falɛ bubawɛ kayaa?”
43008034	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, otii lele nikɔbla okpile yi, ale ɔlanle ɛɛta okpile.
43008035	Ɔlanle nínle saate nɔɔ atesaa. Kafɔɔ obi ninle ote atesaa obe lele.
43008036	Nkpo oso nse Yaa Obi nwu lɛtafɔ kayaa yi, ni fɛɛwɛ kayaa kamu kamu.
43008037	N-ye nlɛ Abraham banantii bile. Kafɔɔ biomiɛ bilɛ bilo mi, diekye biloofũ asaa otuo nii ya kotuo ye ni binu.
43008038	Lɛsaa le di Teemi letuo mi ni yi, nni suoto kɔkakatɛ nɛ. Aye kafɔɔ lɛsaa le di teeye lɛtɔkɔ ye ni yi, nni biɔbla nɛ.”
43008039	Ninfɛ baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Abraham ninle wo kote.” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nse nwaako Abraham babi bile yi, bitababla asaa fɛ mmle okle aabla nii.
43008040	Kafɔɔ ami wɔ nikɔtɔkɔ ye ni nwaako ɔlaa nwu lenu lekyeko ni Yaa nfũ yi, ami biomiɛ bilɛ bilo nɛ. Abraham ditabla nle mmle okle.
43008041	Asaa ya di teeye omu labla nii, nnya biɔbla nɛ.” Ninfɛ baatɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Buole basɔnɔbi. Kote kunwii ninkpe wo, nkũ ninle Yaa nɛ.”
43008042	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nse nwaako Yaa ninle ye Kote yi, nse bitababɔmbɔ mi, diekye Yaa nfũ lekye lɛwa. Ninwa ku ami omu osie, nnwɔɔ niekyesee mi.
43008043	Be oso minoonu lesaa le kobuɛ ni kasɔ? Diekye ɔlaa nii kototofo ye di atoko.
43008044	Diekye teeye ninle Abonsam, nioso biomiɛ bilɛ bitikanko teeye dibiesaa nɛ. Diayɔ ni bia kaasɔ kakyekɔ, batii lotɛ ale. Diidii kafɔɔ ayitikanko onukwale, diekye onukwale diesi nwɔ kaamɛ. Nse ɛɛlaa kafɔɔ nkpa nɔɔ letembi oodiki kayi antuo, diekye laatɛ ale. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ ninle balaatɛ bamuu kote nɛ.
43008045	Ta ami kobuɛ ni onukwale oso, nkpo oso minoofũ mi binu nɛ.
43008046	Owe lee nkafuo mi okpile lɛpɔɔ olo? Ni nse kobuɛ onukwale mɔ, be oso minoofũ mi binu?
43008047	Otii wɔ niekye ni Yaa nfũ yi, ankyɔɔ Yaa ɔlaa atoko. Kafɔɔ, aye minankye ni Yaa nfũ oso yi, minkyɔɔ nwɔ ɔlaa atoko.”
43008048	Ninfɛ di Yuda batii nwu lakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Nse buobuɛ bulɛ Samaria otii fale, mmia kafɔɔ ninwuna kpile nsi fɔ kaamɛ, diele nwaako ɔlaa kule?”
43008049	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ninwuna kpile diesi mi kaamɛ. Ami kɔyɔ dibu nta Teemi, kafɔɔ aye biɔlalaasa mi leyooto.
43008050	Noomiɛ dibu nta suoto. Kafɔɔ otii onwii nkpe oomiɛ ni antɛɛ nii, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ ninkanko di osuku kanya nɛ.
43008051	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye, otii lele niɛkyɔɔ mi asaa otuo atoko dilabakpi diidii!”
43008052	Ninfɛ di Yuda batii nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Mia nfɛ butootofo nwaako bulɛ, ninwuna kpile ninsi fɔ nɛ. Diekye Abraham lakpi, Yaa kanya badikitɛ kafɔɔ lakpi, kafɔɔ foobuɛ falɛ, otii lele niɛkyɔɔ fɔ asaa otuo atoko dilabakpi diidii!
43008053	Teewo Abraham lakpi, ni obuɛ foobuɛ falɛ fɛɛtaka katoo falenke nwɔ? Yaa kanya badikitɛ kafɔɔ lakpi. Ni ɔmɛntii okle foonyu falɛ fale?”
43008054	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nse nlɛ kɔtansa suoto yi, suoto nii ɔtansa nwu nkpo dilabadie lɛsalɛsaa. Teemi ninle otii wɔ nikɔtansɛɛ nii, otii wɔ biobuɛ bilɛ nnwɔɔ ninle ye ni Yaa.
43008055	Mmia kafɔɔ bieye nwɔ. Kafɔɔ ami n-ye nwɔ. Nse lebuɛ nlɛ ninye nwɔ yi, ni ntookple laatɛ fɛle aye. N-ye nwɔ, kɔkyɔɔ nwɔ kafɔɔ ɔlaa atoko.
43008056	Teeye Abraham lanya suoto lɛyɔɔ alɛ abanya ɔwabee nii. Aanya nwu kafɔɔ, suoto layɔɔ nwɔ.”
43008057	Ninfɛ di Yuda batii latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Fayifũ alɛɛ afosi anɔɔ, ni obuɛ foobuɛ falɛ fatɔɔnya Abraham nɛ?”
43008058	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, fiɛ babalofo ni Abraham, ami nfɛ nkpe.”
43008059	Obe wɔ aatɔkɔ ma ni ɔlaa nwu nkpo, ninfɛ baatii nwu nkpo layɔ afuɔ alɛ bɔɔsafɔ nwɔ nɛ. Kafɔɔ Yesu lawofasa suoto, ni aadie di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu kamɛ ninfa aasifi nɛ.
43009001	Obe onwii kamɛ di Yesu lakyɛ aatoofe nii, aakyakako osuɔtɔ onwii niabiɛ ni anu, diayɔ ni bia kalofokɔ nɔɔ.
43009002	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, owe niabla okpile oso beelofo osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle numbiɛtɛ? Nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ okpile kule ɛɛ, sɛɛ balofotɛ nɔɔ niabla okpile?”
43009003	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle anu ya niebiɛ nwɔ ni yi, diele nnwɔɔ niabla okpile ee balofotɛ nɔɔ niabla ni okpile oso. Kafɔɔ eebiɛ anu alɛ baadiki Yaa osie mantuo batii diefe ni di suoto nɔɔ.
43009004	Di obe wɔ kaale diiloo nii, dikpe nii, buɔbla otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ ɔkpɛ. Diekye kale kɔwa ɔbaloo di otii kuonwii dilabasinfuo ni ɔkpɛ ɔbla.
43009005	Di obe wɔ lɛnya nkpe ni kaayi ka mmle, ami ninle kayi ka mmle lɛkpa.”
43009006	Obe wɔ di Yesu labuɛ nkpo aaloo nii, ni aatufa sita aakpete kaasɔ aanwɔtɔ kɔtɛ, ni aayɔ kɔtɛ nwu nkpo aafifia di osuɔtɔ nwu anu nɛ.
43009007	Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tɔɔkyɛ falaafoto anu di lɛpanta le bɔɔlɛɛ ni Siloa kamɛ.” Siloa lɛsɔdiki ninle alɛ beekpee nwɔ. Nkpo oso osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle lasifi aalaafoto anu. Aapɛ aakple aawa nii, nfɛ ɔɔnya.
43009008	Ninfɛ di basiɛwo nɔɔ ku mba ninyɔɔ ansiɛ antɔɔkaalɛ ni asaa, latɔɔkaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Diele osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle ninsiɛ antɔɔkaalɛ ni asaa nɛ, sɛɛ lɛ?”
43009009	Bawo labuɛ alɛ nnwɔɔ dile. Bawo kafɔɔ labuɛ alɛ, “Oowo, diele nnwɔɔ dile. Otii niedie nwɔ.” Nkpo oso, osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo omu labuɛ alɛ, “Ami dile!”
43009010	Ninfɛ baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛ diɛwa fiɛ nfɛ fɔɔnya?”
43009011	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Yesu nianwɔtɔ kɔtɛ aafifia mi di anu, ni aatɔkɔ mi alɛ, ntɔɔkyɛ Siloa ninaafoto anu, ninfɛ lasifi nɛ. Lalaaloo ni anu ofoto, ni lakyako ɔnya nɛ.”
43009012	Ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo nkpe?” Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ninye.”
43009013	Ninfɛ baatii nwu lakpaa osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo di anu labiɛ ni baakyɛnko Farisi batii nfũ nɛ.
