43009014	Dii le di Yesu lanwɔtɔ kɔtɛ aafifia ni di osuɔtɔ nwu anu aatikiti ni yi, Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi diale.
43009015	Nkpo oso Farisi batii kafɔɔ baakaalɛ osuɔtɔ nwu mmle diɛwa fiɛ nfɛ ɔɔnya nii. Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Kɔtɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu lanwɔtɔ aafifia mi di anu ni lalaafoto anu nɛ. Ni lɛkyako ɔnya nɛ.”
43009016	Ninfɛ di Farisi batii nwu bawo labuɛ alɛ, “Otii wɔ niabla ni lɛsaa le mmle yi, diele Yaa nfũ eekye. Diekye aabla di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi kufiofa suoto.” Ninfɛ di bawo kafɔɔ labuɛ alɛ, “Kafɔɔ lɛ di kpile blatɛ kafuo sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ ɔbla otuo?” Ninfɛ kaasɛ labuo di batii nwu nkpo ntɛɛ.
43009017	Nioso Farisi batii nwu lakple baakaalɛ osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo alɛ, “Foobuɛ falɛ nnwɔɔ nietikiti fɔ ni anu, ni lɛ foobuɛ di suoto nɔɔ?” Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ ale.”
43009018	Bia nle Yuda batii nwu ditafuo ofũ onu alɛ osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo numbiɛtɛ aale fiɛ atookple ɔɔnya, dialaase di obe wɔ baalɛɛ balofotɛ nɔɔ.
43009019	Ninfɛ baakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Obi lee ninle nwɔ nɛ? Nnwɔɔ bilɛ bielofo ni numbiɛtɛ nɛ? Ni lɛ diɛbla fiɛ nfɛ ɔɔnya?”
43009020	Ninfɛ di balofotɛ nɔɔ ladiki kanya alɛ, “Buye bulɛ obi loo ale, buolofo ni numbiɛtɛ.
43009021	Kafɔɔ mmle diɛbla fiɛ nfɛ ɔɔnya nii, buoye. Otii wɔ kafɔɔ nietikiti nwɔ ni anu yi, buoye nwɔ. Nioso bikaalɛ nwɔ, atoomuɔ aafuo ni suoto kanya odiki!”
43009022	Balofotɛ nwu labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle diekye baatɔɔyɛkɛ Yuda batii banɔɔfotii nwu nkpo. Diekye baabuɛ baatɛ alɛ otii lele niediki eebuɛ ku kanya nɔɔ alɛ Yesu ninle Kristo nwu nkpo yi, babadiki nwɔ di Yuda batii kasiisakɔ nwu.
43009023	Nkpo oso di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo balofotɛ nɔɔ lababuɛ alɛ, “Atoomuɔ aafuo ni suoto kanya odiki, bikaalɛ nwɔ.”
43009024	Banɔɔfotii nwu lakple baalɛɛ osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo baalofo ni numbiɛtɛ lɛnyɔɔfa, baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ka di Yaa falɛ bababuɛ nwaako! Awo buye bulɛ kpile blatɛ ninle otii wɔ nietikitifɔ ni anu!”
43009025	Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Kpile blatɛ ale woo, aale kpile blatɛ woo, ninye. Lɛsaa le lete n-ye ni ninle alɛ, saa, anu labiɛ mi, kafɔɔ nunua nfɛ kɔnya!”
43009026	Ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Be aablafɔ? Lɛ aabla fiɛ aatikiti fɔ anu?”
43009027	Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye kofokofoko kafɔɔ biloonu. Be oso biomiɛ bilɛ nkple ntɔkɔ ye? Sɛɛ ayee biomiɛ bilɛ bikple nwɔ basaateketetɛ?”
43009028	Ninfɛ di banɔɔfotii nwu nkpo lakpaani osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ ko nikale nwɔ saateketetɛ. Awo yi, Mose basaateketetɛ bule.
43009029	Buye bulɛ Yaa lakakatɛ aata Mose. Kafɔɔ otii wɔ mmle, buoye bia nfũ eekye nii!”
43009030	Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu ladiki kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Ɔmɛnlaa ninle nwɔ? Bieye nfũ eekye nii, kafɔɔ nnwɔɔ nietikiti mi anu nɛ!
43009031	Buye bulɛ Yaa ninkyɔɔ bakpileblatɛ atoko. Kafɔɔ batii ba ninkyɔɔ nwɔ ni ɔlaa atoko mambla nwɔ ni dibiesaa, mma ankyɔɔ atoko nɛ.
43009032	Diɛyɔ ni kaayi ka mmle kasɔ kakyekɔ, diidii buunu bulɛ otii kuonwii letikiti otii wɔ beelofo ni numbiɛtɛ anu.
43009033	Nse otii wɔ mmle diele Yaa nfũ eekye, alaafuo lɛsalɛsaa le mmle ɔbla.”
43009034	Ninfɛ di banɔɔfotii nwu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Beelofofɔ di sikpile kamɛ feemuɔ! Afɔ nikomiɛ falɛ fatuo wo asaa ɛɛ, sɛɛ lɛ?” Ninfɛ baadiki nwɔ di Yuda batii kasiisakɔ nwu nɛ.
43009035	Yesu lanu alɛ baadiki osuɔtɔ nwu di kasiisakɔ lɛma kamɛ. Nioso, aanyɔɔ nii, ni aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Feefũ Otii Obi nwu feenu?”
43009036	Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, tɔkɔ mi otiikle wɔ ale ni, mmle okle kafũ nwɔ nnu ni.”
43009037	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Fatɔɔnyɔɔ kofokofoko. Nnwɔɔ ninle otii wɔ nikɔkakatɛkofɔ ni nɛ.”
43009038	Ni di osuɔtɔ nwu labuɛ alɛ, “Saate, lefũ lenu!” Ninfɛ aapɛ akunkyi di Yesu katũ aatansa nwɔ nɛ.
43009039	Ninfɛ di Yesu labuɛ alɛ, “Lɛwa kayi ka mmle nlɛ kɔmakanko alɛ, batii ba di anu lebiɛ ni ka-nya. Alɛ mba nikɔnya ni kafɔɔ anu kabiɛ ma.”
43009040	Farisi batii ba niawɛ ni ninfa lanu ɔlaa wɔ di Yesu labuɛ nii, ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Beeye! Awo kafɔɔ banumbiɛtɛ bule?”
43009041	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nse banumbiɛtɛ bile yi, se biekpi lɛpɔɔ. Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ biobuɛ bilɛ biɔnya ni kamaa, biekpi lɛpɔɔ.”
43010001	Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, otii lele ninanfe di kayoko abuo lefosoyo nwu nkpo kamɛ, eeyie di kɔba nwu suoto eebuo yi, yu ku asaa lalaasatɛ ale.
43010002	Kafɔɔ otii wɔ nimafe ni di kayoko nwu nkpo ambuo nii, nnwɔɔ ninle bafoso nwu kpatɛ omu nɛ.
43010003	Kayoko nyuntɛ nsɛkɛtɛ kayoko antɔɔ. Bafoso nwu nkpo nnu nwɔ sɛlɔ. Nse ɛɛlɛɛ ma ku leyooto le eetika ma nii, ankpaa ma andieko.
43010004	Nse ɛɛkpaa ma eedieko yi, anleko ma katũ, bafoso nwu nkpo ntikanko nwɔ, diekye baye nwɔ sɛlɔ.
43010005	Blɔbatikanko otii bamba, babatoso nwɔ, diekye baaye nwɔ sɛlɔ.”
43010006	Yesu lapɛ ma lɛkpa le mmle, kafɔɔ batanu lɛsaa le aatɔkɔ ma ni kasɔ.
43010007	Nkpo oso Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, ami ninle kayoko nwu nkpo lɛta bafoso nwu nɛ.
43010008	Batii ba bamuu niale mi katũ baawa nii, bayu ku asaa balalaasatɛ baale. Nkpo oso bafoso nwu nkpo ditanu ma sɛlɔ.
43010009	Ami ninle kayoko nwu nkpo. Otii lele niefe di suoto nii eebuo, abawɛ nkpa. Ababuo andie, anwɛ alesaa biene kalekɔ.
43010010	Yu nnwɔɔ ɔwa anwa amayu, anlo, anlalasa asaa. Kafɔɔ ami ɔwa lɛwa nlɛ batii kawɛ nkpa, nkpa be niewo ni niimu kamɛ.
43010011	“Ami ninle bafosokpatɛ biene nwu letuna nlɛ kokpi ni baafoso nwu nkpo disi nɛ.
43010012	Otii wɔ beefũ kooto kanya ɔɔkpa ni bafoso, baafoso nwu nkpo diele nnwɔɔ omu bale oso, nse ɛɛnya ɔkplɛle kɔwa yi, antoso andiɛ bafoso nwu nkpo. Nkpo oso, ɔkplɛle nwu mmufũ bafoso nwu nkpo, ansamiisa ma ta aale ni bafoso nwu nkpo kpatɛ omu omu oso.
43010013	Otii wɔ mmle ntoso ansifi, diekye koto kanya beefũ nwɔ ɔɔbla ɔkpɛ nwu nkpo. Diekye bafoso nwu nkpo ɔlaa dietika nwɔ di otu.
43010014	-
43010015	“Ami ninle bafosokpatɛ biene nwu. Fɛ mmle okle di Teete n-ye mi, di ami kafɔɔ n-ye nwɔ nii, nkpo okle kafɔɔ n-ye bafoso nii, mma kafɔɔ baye mi nɛ. Ni letuna nlɛ kokpi diisi lɛma nɛ.
43010016	Bafoso bamba nkpe bale mi ni bale manansi ni di bafoso kɔba ko mmle kamɛ. Dikpe ni lɛkpaa ma lɛwako bɛɛbanu mi sɛlɔ, bamuu lɛma beekple bafoso banwii, beesiɛ di bafosokpatɛ onwii kalɔ.
43010017	“Teete mbɔmbɔ mi, diekye letuna nlɛ kɔyɔ nkpa nii nta, sɛmaa, ninkple nfũ mi.
43010018	Diele otii kuonwii niefũ mi nkpa ninnɛɛ, kafɔɔ ami omu nietuna nlɛ kɔyɔ nta. Nwaako, nkpe osuku n-yɔ nkpa nii nta, nkpe osuku kafɔɔ nkple nfũ mi. Nle mmle di Teemi lekpee mi alɛ mbla nɛ.”
43010019	Yesu sɛlaa se mmle aabuɛ ni oso, kasɛ lakple kaabuo di Yuda batii ntɛɛ.
43010020	Batii kpinwu kaamɛ lɛma latoobuɛ alɛ, “Ninwuna kpile ninsi nwɔ kaamɛ. Oobuo afĩi kafɔɔ! Be oso nfɛ buakple munyila muntɔɔkyɔɔ nwɔ atoko?”
43010021	Kafɔɔ batii bamba latoobuɛ alɛ, “Otii wɔ di ninwuna kpile nsi nii, dilaafuo ɔkakatɛ fɛ mmle! Lɛ nfɛ di ninwuna kpile mafuo ɔta alɛ numbiɛtɛ nnya?”
43010022	Yuda batii latoole dii lɛma le manlɛɛ ni Olekatakɔ Okleklesa Dii, baatɔɔta Yaa di Yerusalem. Lɛwɔɔfɔ obe kamɛ diale.
43010023	Ni di Yesu lakyɛ aatoofe di Yaa Olekatakɔ lɛba le bɔɔlɛɛ ni Salomo ablalakyi nɛ.
43010024	Ninfɛ di Yuda batii labamana nwɔ baakyi, ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛ oso feediɛ wo buobu diisi nkpo? Tɔkɔ wo! Kubio afɔ ninle Kristo nwu nkpo?”
43010025	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye ɔlaa wɔ mmle kofokofoko, kafɔɔ biloofũ mi binu. Asaa ya kɔbla nfe ni di Teemi osie kamɛ kodiki mi suoto kanya fiɛ.
43010026	Kafɔɔ biloofũ binu, diekye biekye bafoso nii nwu nkpo kamɛ.
43010027	Bafoso nii nnu mi sɛlɔ. N-ye ma, mma kafɔɔ batikankoe.
43010028	Nioso lɛta ma nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo, blɔbawɔɔ diidii. Kuonwii kafɔɔ dilabafuo ma ɔkpafɛ ofũ mi ninnɛɛ kamɛ.
43010029	Teemi niɛyɔ ma eekpee mi di nnɛɛ kamɛ, eemuɔ kafɔɔ alenke lɛsaa biala. Kuonwii kafɔɔ dilabafuo ma ɔkpafɛ ofũ di Teete nnɛɛ kamɛ diidii.
43010030	Ami ku Teete, onwii bule.”
43010031	Ninfɛ di Yuda batii nwu nkpo lakple baayɔ afuɔ alɛ bɔɔsafɔ Yesu nɛ.
43010032	Ninfɛ di Yesu labuɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ntɔɔbla sɛkpɛ biene kpinwu di anu lee letuo ye, nse di Teete lekpee mi alɛ mbla nii. Ɔmɛnle suoto oso biomiɛ bilɛ bisafɔ mi afuɔ?”
43010033	Ninfɛ di Yuda batii nwu nkpo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Buloomiɛ bulɛ busafɔ fɔ afuɔ di ɔkpɛ biene kuonwii suoto, kafɔɔ mbusuo ɔlaa wɔ feebuɛ ni oso! Diekye otii ko fale kafɔɔ fɔɔbla suoto falɛ Yaa fale!”
43010034	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Bɛɛkpana di kufiofa lee Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, Yaa lebuɛ alɛ, ‘Bite fɛ Yaa.’
43010035	Buye kafɔɔ bulɛ, ɔlaa wɔ Kɔɔkpana Klekle lebuɛ nii, kute nkpo obe lele. Yaa kafɔɔ lalɛɛ batii ba niafũ ni ɔlaa biene nwu alɛ, ‘Bite fɛ Yaa.’
43010036	Kafɔɔ ami yi, Teete niediki mi eekpee mi kayi ka mmle. Ni be oso nfɛ buobuɛ bilɛ, lebuɛ mbusuo ɔlaa ta lebuɛ nlɛ Yaa Obi nle?
43010037	Nse diele lɛsaa le di Teemi komiɛ alɛ mbla ni kɔbla yi, ni bitanfũ mi bianu.
43010038	Kafɔɔ nse nni kɔbla yi, kuntɛ biefũ mi binu yi, ni biefũ sɛkpɛ se kɔbla ni binu. Ni bibatofo, minnu kasɔ kafɔɔ bilɛ, Teete nwu nkpo nsi mi kaamɛ, ami kafɔɔ nsi nwɔ kaamɛ.”
43010039	Yuda batii nwu nkpo lamiɛ alɛ bookple mammufũ Yesu, kafɔɔ aadie ma kaamɛ aasifi.
43010040	Ni di Yesu lasifi aakple aalaataalɛ Yordan okle, aasifi lɛba le di Yohane Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ latookpeesa ni batii Yaa ntu saa, aalaasiɛ ninfa.
43010041	Batii kpinwu lawa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ bababuɛ alɛ, “Yohane ditabla ɔkpɛ wɔ niabla ni ɔkpɛ kuonwii aatuo. Kafɔɔ sɛlaa se simuu aabuɛ ni di otii wɔ mmle suoto lɛwa kaanya nkpo.”
43010042	Ninfɛ baatii kpinwu lafũ Yesu baanu ninfa nɛ.
43011001	Osuɔtɔ onwii baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Lasaro lakye okpoo wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Betania, latoofiɛ. Babilɛma sankobi banyɔ banwii niale ni Maria ku Marta kafɔɔ lasiɛ di okpoo nwu nkpo kamɛ.
43011002	Maria wɔ mmle niale otii wɔ niayɔ nɔnyi kɔnɔnkɔnɔ aakpete ni di Saate nkpaatũ aayɔ disi sinwini nɔɔ aasunsũ ni nɛ. Obilɛma suɔtɔbi niale Lasaro wɔ niatoofiɛ ni nɛ.
43011003	Babilɛma sankobi nwu nkpo latika Yesu kanya alɛ, “Saate, siɛwo lɛfɔ bɔmbɔtɛ kofiɛ.”
43011004	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanu ni kanya ka mmle, aabuɛ alɛ, “Lasaro ofiɛ wɔ mmle dilabale nwɔ kukpi kaloo. Kafɔɔ nle mmle lɛwa kaanya alɛ baayɔ mantakatɛsaa Yaa leyooto katoo. Diefe ni di nle mmle kamɛ kafɔɔ, baayɔ mantakatɛsa Yaa Obi nwu nkpo katoo.”
43011005	Yesu labɔmbɔ Marta ku obilɛma sankobi ku Lasaro osie kanya.
43011006	Kafɔɔ aafũ kanya alɛ Lasaro kofiɛ nii, aasiɛ ninfũ aawɛ ni ayi anyɔ aakyakaa.
43011007	Nni nkpo sɛmaa, ni aatɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Bita bukple busifi Yudea nfɛ.”
43011008	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Saatuotɛ, kɔsanklo ko mmle di Yuda batii nwu nkpo ninfa lamiɛ alɛ bɔɔsafɔ fɔ afuɔ! Ni fookple fammiɛ falɛ fɔɔkyɛ nfa nɛ?”
43011009	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Diele lefosi ambombo anyɔ ninsi di dii kufĩ kamɛ? Nse otii nkyɛ di dii kamɛ diɛkpa ni oso yi, ántuula. Diekye kayi lɛkpa ntɔɔ antɔɔnya.
43011010	Kafɔɔ nse akyɛ ku kakyɛ yi, antuula. Diekye, lɛkpa nsinnaa.”
43011011	Obe wɔ di Yesu labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle aaloo nii, aakple aabuɛ aakyakaa alɛ, “Siɛwo loo Lasaro kɔkyɔsĩi, kafɔɔ makyɛ naasɛnkɛsa nwɔ.”
43011012	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ladiki kanya alɛ, “Saate, nse ɔkyɔsĩi ɔɔkyɔsĩi yi, ni dibayɔɔ nwɔ.”
43011013	Ɔlaa wɔ di Yesu latobuɛ ninle alɛ Lasaro ntookpi, kafɔɔ basaateketetɛ lanyu alɛ sɛkyɔsĩ fukuti suoto aatɔɔkakatɛ.
43011014	Nioso Yesu latɔkɔ ma aatikiti alɛ, “Lasaro ntookpi.
43011015	Kafɔɔ, aye oso, dilɛ alɛ ntawɛ ninfa fiɛ aakpi, ta mmle okle biafũ mi minnu nii. Bita bukyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ.”
43011016	Ninfɛ di Toma wɔ bɔɔlɛɛni Lɛtabi latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ wo nɔɔ alɛ, “Bita awo kafɔɔ bukyɛ ku Saatuotɛ buɔlaakpi ku nnwɔɔ.”
43011017	Obe wɔ di Yesu lakyɛ aalaabuo nii, aanu alɛ dii nwu nkpo niale dii naafa baakookaa ni Lasaro nɛ.
43011018	Diedie ni di Betania diesifi ni Yerusalem, ditakyo. Lekyo kate fɛ akɔ anyɔ.
43011019	Nioso Yuda batii kpinwu lakyɛ alɛ bɔɔlaakpee Maria ku Marta kɔnɛɛ kaafutu, ta obilɛma suɔtɔbi nwu nkpo kukpi oso.
43011020	Obe wɔ di Marta lanu alɛ Yesu nfɛ kɔwa nii, ni aadie aalaakyako nwɔ nɛ. Kafɔɔ Maria lasiɛ leeyo.
43011021	Ninfɛ di Marta latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saate, nse fɛ faanwɛ ninfũ se obiloo diekpi!
43011022	Kafɔɔ bia nle n-ye nlɛ, lɛsaa lele fɛɛkaalɛ Yaa, ababla anta fɔ.”
43011023	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Obilee mataka ansiɛ nkpa.”
43011024	Ninfɛ di Marta ladiki kanya alɛ, “N-ye nlɛ abakple antaka di obe wɔ baakpi makple mantaka ni di Dii Yɛntɛle nwu nkpo suoto.”
43011025	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ami ninle otii wɔ nintakatɛsa ni baakpi nta ma ni nkpa nɛ. Otii lele niefũ mi eenu, kuntɛ eekpi, abasiɛ nkpa.
43011026	Otii lele kafɔɔ ninkpe nkpa eefũ mi eenu yi, diidii kafɔɔ ɔlɔbakpi. Feefũ nle mmle feenu?”
43011027	Obe wɔ di Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ ni nkpo, ni di Marta ladiki kanya alɛ, “Yii, Saate, lefũ lenu nlɛ afɔ ninle Kristo, Yaa Obi wɔ beebuɛ bɛɛtɛ ni kofokofoko alɛ abawa ni kayi nɛ.”
43011028	Obe wɔ di Marta labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle aaloo nii, ni aakple aasifi aalaalɛɛ obilɛma Maria buɛɛ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saatuotɛ ntɔbabuo, ɔɔkaalɛ fɔ disi kafɔɔ.”
43011029	Obe wɔ di Maria lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, ni aapɛsɛwa aadie aalaakyakako nwɔ nɛ.
43011030	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Yesu lakple aayila di lɛba le di Marta lakyɛ aalaakyakako nwɔ nii. Diekye ayibuo kakpayotũ nwu kamɛ.
43011031	Obe wɔ di Yuda batii ba niawɛ ni leeyo ku Maria baatookpee nwɔ ni kɔnɛɛ kaafutu lanya alɛ aataka wla aadie nii, baatikanko nwɔ. Diekye baanyu alɛ, ɔkya katũ oofe, aanaawi kaku.
43011032	Obe wɔ di Maria lalaadu ni lɛba le di Yesu layila ni, aanyɔɔ nii, nfanwu, ni aapɛ akunkyi kaatũ nɔɔ aabuɛ alɛ, “Saate, nse fɛ faanwɛ ninfũ nse obiloo diekpi!”
43011033	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanya mmle okle di Maria latoowi ni ku mmle okle di Yuda batii ba kafɔɔ niatikanko nwɔ ni latoowi ko nwɔ nii, diakpanko nwɔ otu, ni aabla hũ di suoto nɔɔ kamɛ nɛ.
43011034	Ni aakaalɛ alɛ, “Ɔfɛ biakookaa nwɔ?” Ninfɛ baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, wa fabanyu.”
43011035	Ninfɛ di Yesu lawi nɛ.
43011036	Ninfɛ di Yuda batii nwu nkpo labuɛ alɛ, “Binyu mmle okle ambɔmbɔ nwɔ ni lo!”
43011037	Kafɔɔ batii bawo kaamɛ lɛma labuɛ alɛ, “Aatikiti numbiɛtɛ anu. Ni be oso nfɛ atafuo ɔbla alɛ, Lasaro atankpi?”
43011038	Diakple diakpanko Yesu di otu osie kanya, ni aakyɛ aalaadu ɔkya nwu niale ni ofuɔntuu, baayɔ difuɔ baatĩi ni kanya nɛ.
43011039	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bikyisa difuɔ nwu di ɔkya nwu nkpo kanya.” Ninfɛ di Marta, kpi nwu nkpo obilɛma sankobi latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, abakpete! Diekye miɛ ninle dii naafa buokookaa nwɔ ni nɛ!”
43011040	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ Marta alɛ, “Nintɔkɔfɔ nlɛ nse feefũ feenu, fabanya Yaa osie wɔ ninkpe nwɔ ni?”
43011041	Ni baatii nwu nkpo lakyisa difuɔ nwu nkpo di ɔkya nwu kanya nɛ. Ninfɛ di Yesu latakatɛsa anu aanyu osi ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Teete, kɔpɛ fɔ sɛfa alɛ nse lɛlɛɛ fɔ fantuna mi.
43011042	N-ye nlɛ obe lele fantuna mi. Kafɔɔ kobuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle ta batii ba mmle nin-yɛ ni ninfũ oso, alɛ baatofo alɛ afɔ niekpee mi.”
43011043	Obe wɔ aabuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle aaloo nii, ni aafaa osie kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Lasaro yee, die fawa!”
43011044	Nfanwu, ni aadie aawa nɛ. Akookaasaa ya baakookaa nwɔ ni lamimini nwɔ nnɛɛ ku nkpaa. Dibula le kafɔɔ baayɔ baamiminisa nwɔ anu latĩi nwɔ anu. Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bifukuti nwɔ asaa nwu di suoto, aatɔɔkyɛ.”
43011045	Obe wɔ di Yuda batii ba niawa ni Maria nfũ lanya lɛsaa le di Yesu labla nii, kpinwu lafũ nwɔ baanu.
43011046	Kafɔɔ bawo lasifi Farisi batii nfũ baalaatɔkɔ ma lɛsaa le di Yesu labla nii.
43011047	Nkpo oso Farisi batii ku olebatatɛ banɔɔfo lakyaka ku Yuda batii batunletɛ ni baakaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Lɛ buɔbla? Diekye osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle ntɔɔbla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ kpinwu!
43011048	Nse buodiɛ nwɔ ɛɛkyɛ sitũ mmle okle yi, ni otii biala kamafũ nwɔ anu. Ni Roma batunletɛ mataka wo di suoto mamabiɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ loo ka mmle, ku Kale loo kamuu!”
43011049	Ni di onwii kaamɛ lɛma baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Kaiafa, aale ni Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo di lɛlɛɛ nwu kamɛ latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Lɛsɔnu lee lekyo lo!
43011050	Bieye bilɛ dilɛ dilenke alɛ otii onwii kakpi di kale kamuu disi alɛ batii bamuu kawɔɔ ni ɛɛ, sɛɛ lɛ?”
43011051	Nwaako baabuɛ nii, atabuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ suoto nɔɔ kamɛ. Kafɔɔ fɛ mmle aale Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo di lɛlɛɛ nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, ni aabuɛ ɔlaa aatɛ alɛ Yesu kɔwa ɔbakpi di Yuda batii bamuu disi nɛ.
43011052	Diele kafɔɔ alɛ aakpi di lete lɛma disi. Kafɔɔ alɛ aasiisa Yaa babi ba niɛsasami ni di kayi ka mmle aba aba ambla ma onwii.
43011053	Dieyɔ di dii nwu nkpo diasifi nii, ni di Yuda batii batunletɛ lakyako osuku omiɛ alɛ boolo Yesu nɛ.
43011054	Ta nle mmle oso, Yesu ditasinfuo ɔkyɛ otoofe di Yuda batii kamɛ lɛɛkpaka. Nkpo oso aadie ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ baalaasiɛ di okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Efraim, diɛtɛɛtɛɛ ni ɔfaafuu kamɛ.
43011055	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Yuda batii Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii olebee ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ. Nioso batii kpinwu lakye kaasɔ nwu nkpo aba aba baakyɛ Yerusalem alɛ bɔɔlaabla suoto okleklesa ɔsaabla fiɛ di dii nwu nkpo olebee nwo.
43011056	Obe wɔ baasi ni di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo baatoowolaa Yesu, baatɔɔkaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Lɛ biɛɛnya, sɛɛ alabafuo dii le mmle nwu nkpo kalekɔ ɔwaɛ?”
43011057	Ni di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku Farisi batii lata letofo alɛ, nse otii owo n-ye nfũ di Yesu nkpe nii, aawa ababuɛ baakyɛ baalaamufũ nwɔ.
43012001	Ditoobu ayi akuɔ fiɛ di Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii ole nwu mawo nii, Yesu lakyɛ Lasaro nfũ di Betania okpoo, dile ni osuɔtɔ wɔ di Yesu lasɛnkɛsa ni kuukpi kamɛ.
43012002	Ni baawa alesaa baata Yesu ninfa nɛ. Marta niatɔɔsɛ alesaa nwu nkpo. Lasaro kafɔɔ lasiɛ di batii ba niatoole ni alesaa nwu nkpo kamɛ ku Yesu.
43012003	Ninfɛ di Maria layɔ nnɔnyi kɔnɔkɔnɔ be niefũ ni kɔya osie kanya lebo kplɛ baayɔ lɛsaa le bɔɔlɛɛ ni nard baabla nii aabakpete di Yesu nkpaatũ, ni aayɔ disi sinwini nɔɔ aasunsũ nɛ. Ni di nnɔnyi nwu nkpo ɔkɔnɔ lafũ leyo nwu nkpo kamɛ nɛ.
43012004	Ninfɛ di Yesu saateketetɛ onwii kaamɛ lɛma bɔɔlɛɛ ni Yuda Iskariot, nwɔ nimadiki nwɔ anta nii, labuɛ alɛ,
43012005	“Be lɛsaa oso manaayɔ nnɔnyi be mmle baasunsũ bawɛ batii alafa atiɛ dii kɔkpɛnto, bayɔ koto nwu nkpo bata bapiitɛ?”
43012006	Aabuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle, diele alɛ aayɔ nwu ni ole di bapiitɛ suoto oso, kafɔɔ ta yu aale ni oso. Diekye nnwɔɔ nfũ di koto katofoe lɛma lawɛ nɛ. Aatooyu koto nwu nkpo kowo kaamɛ.
43012007	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Bidiɛ nwɔ! Biɛtɔɔ aablako lɛsaa le eekookaa ɛɛta ni lekookaayi nii ɔkpɛ.
43012008	Bapiitɛ nsi ye kaamɛ obe lele. Kafɔɔ ami, diele obe lele kamawɛ ye kaamɛ.”
43012009	Obe wɔ di Yuda batii kpinwu lanu alɛ Yesu ntɔɔwa akpe ni di Betania, baakyɛ nfa. Diele alɛ Yesu lete oso baakyɛ nfa, kafɔɔ alɛ bɔɔlaanyu Lasaro wɔ aatakatɛsa aakyeko ni kukpi kamɛ.
43012010	Nkpo oso olebatatɛ banɔɔfo labla disibu alɛ babalo Lasaro kafɔɔ.
43012011	Diekye nnwɔɔ oso, Yuda batii latoosĩ ma, balaatoofũ Yesu baatoonu.
43012012	Kaleesɛ, batii dikudi le niawa ni Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii kalekɔ nwu nkpo lanu alɛ, Yesu nfɛ kɔwa Yerusalem.
43012013	Nkpo oso baabudi sɛkaafɛ, ni baadie baakyɛ baalaakyakako nwɔ, baatɔɔtaa siwidi alɛ, “Hosiana! Bitansa otii wɔ nikɔwa ni di Saate leyooto kamɛ! Bitansa Israel Batii Ɔka nwu!”
43012014	Yesu lawɛ bɔkɛɛ wɔ ninte ni fɛ lɛpɔnkɔbi aasiɛ ni di suoto fɛ mmle okle di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ labuɛ ni alɛ,
43012015	“Aye Sion batii, bitanyɛkɛ! Binyu Ɔka lee ninsi di bɔkɛɛ wɔ ninte ni fɛ lɛpɔnkɔbi suoto ɔɔwa nɛ.”
43012016	Basaateketetɛ nɔɔ ditanu lɛsaa le mmle kasɔ kaasɔ kakyekɔ. Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di Yaa latakatɛsa Yesu aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ aatɔɔ ni dibu yi, nfa nfɛ baanyuma alɛ Kɔkpana Klekle labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle aakyeko suoto nɔɔ, nni batɔɔbla bɛɛtɔɔ nɛ.
43012017	Batii ba niayila ni di Yesu ɔkyɛ fiɛ aalɛɛ Lasaro aakyeko ni ɔkya kamɛ, aasɛnkɛsa nwɔ aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ, baakyɛ baalaabuɛ lɛsaa le niawa ni baakyakasa.
43012018	Lɛsaa le oso di batii dikudi nwu nkpo lakyɛ baalaakyakako ni Yesu niale alɛ, baanu ɔkpɛ wɔ niabla ni ɔkpɛ wɔ aabla nii.
43012019	Farisi batii latɔkɔ bawo alɛ, “Biɔnya, dilɔɔlɛ dita wo saa! Binyu batii bamuu kaayi ntoodie batikanko nwɔ!”
43012020	Hela batii bawo lasiɛ di batii ba niakyɛ Yerusalem alɛ bɔɔlaatɔ ni Yaa di Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii nwu nkpo kamɛ.
43012021	Ni baakyɛ Filipo nfũ, nwɔ niakye ni Betsaida di Galilea kasɔ, baalaatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo, buomiɛ bulɛ bunya Yesu.”
43012022	Ninfɛ di Filipo lakyɛ aalaanya Andrea nɛ, ni baanyɔ lɛma baakyɛ baalaatɔkɔ Yesu nɛ.
43012023	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Obe nwu nkpo ntoowo alɛ baakpee Otii Obi nwu nkpo dibu kplɛ.
43012024	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse bayipɛ dititabi kaasɔ dibuu yi, dititabi ninwii lete dile. Kafɔɔ nse batɔɔpɛ ni kaasɔ diebuu yi, fiɛ nfɛ nimakpɛ ninkple atitabi kpinwu.
43012025	Otii lele niɛbɔmbɔ nkpa nɔɔ, abayu mi. Kafɔɔ otii lele niekyidi nkpa nɔɔ kaayi ka mmle yi, abakookaa mi anta nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
43012026	Otii lele nikomiɛ alɛ abla mi ɔkpɛ yi, aatikankoe. Diekye nfũ nkpe nii, nfa kafɔɔ di kpɛmblatɛ nii nwu nkpo kamawɛ nɛ. Otii biala kafɔɔ niɛbla mi ɔkpɛ yi, Teemi makpee nwɔ dibu.
43012027	“Nunua yi, otu nii kowi kaku. Be nfɛ nimbuɛ? Mbuɛ nlɛ, ‘Teete, tanta dibuo le mmle lawa mi di suoto’ ɛɛ, sɛɛ lɛ? Kafɔɔ nkpo oso lɛwa nɛ, alɛ kafe ni kaamɛ.
43012028	Teete, takatɛsa leyooto lɛfɔ katoo!” Ninfɛ di sɛlɔ lakye osi siabuɛ alɛ, “Ntɔɔtakatɛsa ni katoo kofokofoko. Kamakple ntakatɛsa ni katoo kafɔɔ.”
43012029	Batii dikudi le niayila ni ninfa lanu sɛlɔ nwu nkpo, ni baawo labuɛ alɛ kanto niekpududuu. Bawo kafɔɔ labuɛ alɛ, “Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ owo niɛkakatɛ ko nwɔ.”
43012030	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Diele ami oso di sɛlɔ se mmle ledie, kafɔɔ aye oso siedie.
43012031	“Obe ntoowo alɛ Yaa kakanko kayi ka mmle. Obe kafɔɔ ntoowo alɛ aatososa nwɔ nikole ni kayi ka mmle sɛka.
43012032	Nse batɔɔkɛnkɛ mi kaasɔ ka mmle suoto beesifiko osi yi, kamananfi batii bamuu nwako ɔkyɛ nii.”
43012033	Yesu labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle alɛ ɔɔyɔ antuo kukpi ko okle ɔɔwa ni ɔbakpi.
43012034	Ninfɛ di batii dikudi nwu nkpo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Buye di kufiofa loo kamɛ alɛ, Kristo nwu nkpo kamasiɛ nkpa ninnaa ni kaloo. Lɛ oso nfɛ foobuɛ falɛ Otii Obi nwu babatakatɛsa nwɔ katoo? Owe ninle Otii Obi nwu nkpo?”
43012035	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Lɛkpa nwu nkpo masiɛ ye kaamɛ di obe kakui kamɛ. Nioso obe wɔ di lɛkpa nwu nkpo nkpe nii yi, bidiki nkpaa bikyɛ. Nse diele nkpo, kale maloo ye. Otii wɔ kafɔɔ ninkyɛ ni diitunu kamɛ yi, aaye nfũ oofe nii.
43012036	Nkpo oso bifũ lɛkpa nwu nkpo binu di obe wɔ dikpe ye ni diɔkyɛ, alɛ biakple lɛkpa kamɛ batii.” Obe wɔ di Yesu labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle aaloo nii, ninfɛ aasifi aadiɛ ma aalaawofasa suoto nɛ.
43012037	Nu di Yesu labla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ɔkpɛ di anu lɛma yi, batafũ nwɔ baanu.
43012038	Ta mmle okle di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ ni kawa ni kaanya oso. Aabuɛ alɛ, “Saate, owe niefũ ɔlaa wɔ buabuɛ ni aanu? Owe kafɔɔ di Saate ladiki osie nɔɔ aatuo?”
43012039	Ta nkpo oso batafuo ofũ onu, diekye Yesaia lakple aabuɛ alɛ,
43012040	“Yaa lebiɛ ma anu, alɛ blaanya asaa ku anu lɛma. Ɛɛta ma bɛɛwɛ setokopĩ, alɛ blaanu sɛlaa. Yaa labuɛ alɛ, ‘Blabamunikĩi bawa ɔkyɛ nii, alɛ kayɔɔsa ma sifiɛ.’ ”
43012041	Yesaia labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle, diekye aanya Yesu leklekle, ni aabuɛ ɔlaa aakyeko suoto nɔɔ nɛ.
43012042	Nu diate nkpo, Yuda batii batunlete kpinwu lafũ Yesu baanu. Kafɔɔ batafuo odiki obuɛ di lɛkpaka. Diekye baatɔɔyɛkɛ alɛ Farisi batii matososa ma di kasiisakɔ lɛma nwu nkpo kamɛ.
43012043	Diekye mambɔmbɔ alɛ batii katansa ma manlenkee alɛ, Yaa katansa ma.
43012044	Yesu labuɛ ku sɛlɔ siene alɛ, “Otii lele niefũ mi eenu yi, diele lete nii eefũ eenu. Kafɔɔ ku otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kafɔɔ eefũ eenu.
43012045	Otii lele niɛnyɛɛ yi, ɛɛnya otii wɔ kafɔɔ niekpee mi nii.
43012046	Lɛwa kayi ka mmle fɛle lɛkpa. Alɛ otii lele niefũ mi eenu yi, ɔlɔbasiɛ di ditunu kamɛ.
43012047	“Nse otii owo lenu mi ɔlaa anankyɔɔ nwu atoko yi, diele ami nimalo nwɔ lɛpɔɔ. Diekye ninwa kayi ka mmle nlɛ kamalo batii lɛpɔɔ, kafɔɔ ɔwa lɛwa nlɛ kɔmata ma nkpa.
43012048	Otii lele niesĩ mi ananfũ mi ɔlaa anu yi, otii wɔ nimalo nwɔ ni lɛpɔɔ nkpe. Sɛlaa se lebuɛ ni nimalo nwɔ lɛpɔɔ di dii yɛntɛle nwu nkpo suoto.
43012049	Diekye nwaako katɔkɔ ye nii, diele ami omu osie layɔ lakakatɛ. Kafɔɔ Teete wɔ niekpee mi ni niatɛɛ ɔlaa wɔ dikpe ni kabuɛ ni ku mmle labuɛ nwu nii.
43012050	N-ye nlɛ sɛlaa nɔɔ nwu nkpo ninta nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo. Nkpo oso sɛlaa se labuɛ nii, labuɛ sĩ fɛ mmle okle di Teete lakpee mi alɛ mbuɛ sĩ nii.”
43013001	Fiɛ kaale masɛ manle ni Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii nwu nkpo yi, Yesu latofo alɛ obe ntoowo alɛ nfɛ aadie kaasɔ ka mmle suoto, ansifi Ote nfũ. Aabɔmbɔ batii ba niale nwɔ ni bale kaasɔ ka mmle suoto obe lele. Aabɔmbɔ ma aalaase kaayɛntɛlekɔ.
43013002	Kɔtɔɔfɔ nwu nkpo, Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasiɛ baatoole alesaa. Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ Abonsam ntɔɔyɔ eekpee di Yuda wɔ niale ni Simon Iskariot obi disi kamɛ kofokofoko alɛ aadiki Yesu anta.
43013003	Yesu latofo alɛ Ote lɛyɔ osie omuu eekpee nwɔ di nnɛɛ kamɛ. Aatofo alɛ Yaa nfũ aakye, ɔkyɛ nɔɔ kafɔɔ ookple anfe.
43013004	Nkpo oso aataka di alesaa nwu nkpo kalekɔ, aadiki osi awu nɔɔ aatɛ, aayɔ ɔsa aanii ɔtɔ.
43013005	Ninfɛ aanyɛɛnɛ ntu aakpete di bɛɛsi kamɛ, ni aakyako basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nkpaa ofoto nɛ. Ni aayɔ ɔsa wɔ aanii ni ɔtɔ aatoosunsũ ma nkpaa nɛ.
43013006	Obe wɔ di Yesu labadu ni Simon Petro suoto yi, Petro lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, ami nkpaa fɔɔwa ɔbafoto?”
43013007	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Floonu lɛsaa le kɔbla ni kasɔ, kafɔɔ sɛmaa yi, fabanu kasɔ.”
43013008	Ninfɛ di Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Diidii, namata fɔ fafoto mi nkpaa!” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse faatɛɛ osuku nfotofɔ nkpaa yi, ni flabasinfuo mi saateketetɛ ole.”
43013009	Nkpo oso, Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, nse nkpo kute, ni tanfoto mi nkpaa lete. Foto mi nnɛɛ ku disi kafɔɔ!”
43013010	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Otii lele nintookpe ntu kamaa, atoodie ntu okpe, nkpaa lete nfɛ aafoto. Aye yi, bitoodie klekle, diediki otii onwii lete.”
43013011	Diekye Yesu latofo otii wɔ nimadiki nwɔ anta nii, nkpo oso aabuɛ alɛ, “Bamuulee biedie klekle, diediki otii onwii lete.”
43013012	Obe wɔ di Yesu ntooloo ma ni nkpaa ofoto yi, aakplesa osi awu nɔɔ nwu nkpo aakpee, ni aakple aalaasiɛ kaasɔ nɛ. Ni aakaalɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo alɛ, “Bienu lɛsaa le lɛbla lɛta ye ni kasɔ?
43013013	Minlɛɛ mi bilɛ Saatuotɛ ku Saate. Osuku kule minlɛɛ mi nkpo, diekye otii nwu okle nle nɛ.
43013014	Nse, ami Saate lee ku Saatuotɛ, ntoofoto ye nkpaa yi, ni dikpe ni ayee, biefoto bawo nkpaa.
43013015	Ntɔɔbla ɔtɛ onyu lɛta ye alɛ, ayee biabla fɛ mmle okle lɛbla lɛta ye nii.
43013016	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, kpɛmblatɛ kuonwii dielenke saate nɔɔ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di tɔkyɛntɛ ninlenkee otii nwɔ niekpee nwɔ ni kɔtɔ nɛ.
43013017	Nunua nfɛ biye ni lɛsaa le dikpe ni biɛbla nii, suoto mayɔɔ ye nse biɛyɔ biekpee di ɔkpɛ ɔbla kamɛ.
43013018	“Ɔlaa wɔ mmle kobuɛ nii, diele bamuu lee nlaka. Diekye n-ye mba lediki nii. Dikpe ni Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ sɛlaa se bɛɛkpana ni lɛwa kaanya alɛ, ‘Otii wɔ munko nwɔ buokpee kɔnɛɛ kaasɛfɛ buole ni lɛtaka eeyila mi di suoto.’
43013019	“Kole katũ ntɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle ntɛ fiɛ simawa kaanya. Nse siɛbaawa kaanya yi, ni bibafũ mi minu bilɛ nle Otii wɔ nnle nii.
43013020	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii lele niefũ otii wɔ lekpe ni kɔtɔ yi, ami eefũ. Otii lele kafɔɔ niefũ mi yi, eefũ otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ.”
43013021	Obe wɔ di Yesu labuɛ sɛlaa se mmle aaloo nii, aabuo nyaami osie kanya di otu kamɛ. Ni aadiki kanya alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii onwii kaamɛ lee madiki mi anta.”
43013022	Diabla basaateketetɛ nwu ɔkpɛ, ni baamunikĩi baatoonyu bawo di anu nɛ. Diekye batatofo owe lɛma di Yesu lalaka.
43013023	Basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo onwii lɛma, nwɔ di Yesu mbɔmbɔ ni lasiɛ di Yesu ɔlɔɔkɔ tintintĩ.
43013024	Ninfɛ di Simon Petro lamunaasa anu aakpee nwɔ alɛ, “Kaalɛ nwɔ otii wɔ alaka ni.”
43013025	Ta nkpo oso saateketetɛ nwu nkpo lakɛnsa simu aakyɛnko Yesu ɔlɔɔkɔ, ni aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, owe dile?”
43013026	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Otii wɔ kamayɔ alesaa nnyɔ kuutu nta nii, nnwɔɔ nɛ.” Ninfɛ aabɛ alesaa nwu kakyɛ aanyɔ kuutu aayɔ aata Yuda wɔ ninle ni Iskariot obi nɛ.
43013027	Nfanwu di Yuda lafũ ni alesaa nwu nkpo, ni di Satana layie aabuo nwɔ kaamɛ nɛ. Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Pɛsɛwa, faabla lɛsaa le falɛ fɔɔbla ni.”
43013028	Kafɔɔ kuonwii lɛma di alesaa kalekɔ nwu nkpo ditanu kasɔ lɛsaa le oso di Yesu latɔkɔ ni Yuda ɔlaa nwu nkpo.
43013029	Basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo bawo lanyu alɛ di Yuda ninkle ma ni koto katofoe oso, loo Yesu ɔtɔkɔ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, atɔɔkyɛ alaaya asaa ya babayɔ manle ni dii nwu nkpo awako. Ee alaayɔ koto kowo akyɛnko bapiitɛ.
43013030	Di Yuda lafũ alesaa nwu nkpo aaloo nii, nfanwu, ni aadie aasifi nɛ. Obe nwu nkpo kafɔɔ kale ntooloo.
43013031	Di obe wɔ di Yuda ntoosifi nii, ninfɛ di Yesu labuɛ alɛ, “Nunua batɔɔtakatɛsa Otii Obi nwu leyooto katoo, diefe ni di suoto nɔɔ kafɔɔ batɔɔtakatɛsa Ote leyooto katoo.
43013032	Ni nse batɔɔtakatɛsa Yaa leyooto katoo diefe ni di Obi nwu suoto, ni Yaa kafɔɔ matakatɛsa Obi nwu nkpo leyooto katoo diefe ni di suoto nɔɔ. Ababla ni kafɔɔ ku nkye.
43013033	“Babi nii, namasinsiɛ diɛ ɔkyɛ lee nklɛ. Bibawolaa mi. Sɛlaa se latɔkɔ ni Yuda batii banɔɔfo, nsinwu kafɔɔ kɔtɔkɔ ye nunua nlɛ, ‘Lɛba le kofe nii, bilabafuo nfa ɔkyɛ.’
43013034	“Nunua yi, kufiofa fɔle kɔta ye. Bibɔmbɔ bawo! Fɛ mmle okle labɔmbɔ ye nii, nkpo okle yekpe ni biɛbɔmbɔ bawo nɛ.
43013035	Nse mimbɔmbɔ bawo yi, ni batii bamuu manya alɛ kubio basaateketetɛ nii bile.”
43013036	Ninfɛ di Petro lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, ɔfɛ foofe?” Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛba le kofe ni nunua yi, flɔbafuo mi otikanko ɔwa. Kafɔɔ sɛmaa yi, fabatikankoe fanwa.”
43013037	Ninfɛ di Petro lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, be oso ninaafuo fɔ otikanko nunua? Lelolaa suoto nlɛ kakpi bia diisi lɛfɔ!”
43013038	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Kubio feelolaa suoto falɛ faakpi diisi nii? Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, fiɛ di kɔɔkɔ mabo nii, fababuɛ sitiɛ simu falɛ, faaye mi.”
43014001	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ alɛ, “Bitanta otu lapɛ ye. Bifũ Yaa binu, biefũ ami kafɔɔ binu.
43014002	Mbuokɔ kpinwu nkpe di Teemi leyo, kosifi ninaalolaa lɛba ntɛ ye. Nse kuote nkpo yi, namatɔkɔ ye.
43014003	Nse ntɔlalolaa lɛba lɛtɛ ye leloo yi, makple nwa makpaa ye nsifiko ɔkyɛ nii, alɛ nfũ nkpe nii yi, aye kafɔɔ bibasiɛ ninfa.
43014004	Biye osuku wɔ nintika kuosifi ni nfũ kofe nii.”
43014005	Ni di Toma lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, munanye nfũ foofe nii, lɛ dibabla fiɛ bubatofo osuku nwu nkpo?”
43014006	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ami ninle osuku nwu, onukware nwu, ku nkpa nwu nɛ. Otii kuonwii dilɔbafuo Teete nfũ ɔkyɛ diediki eefe di suoto nii.
43014007	Nse fɛ biye mi yi, nse biye Teete nwu kafɔɔ. Kafɔɔ diɛyɔ ni nunua, nfɛ biye nwɔ, bitɔɔnyɔɔ kafɔɔ.”
43014008	Ninfɛ di Filipo latɔkɔ Yesu alɛ, “Saate, tuo wo Teete nwu nkpo, nse nfɛ dipɔ wo.”
43014009	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Filipo, obe kpinwu wɔ ntoosiɛko ni bamuu lee diɛbase bia nua, be oso fanayitofo mi? Otii lele nintɔɔnyɛɛ yi, atɔɔnya Teete nwu kafɔɔ. Ni be oso fookple fambuɛ falɛ, ‘Tuo wo Teete nwu nkpo’?
43014010	Sɛɛ Filipo, faafũ fanu falɛ nsi di Teete nwu nkpo kamɛ, Teete nwu nkpo kafɔɔ nsi mi kaamɛ? Sɛlaa se latɔkɔ ye ni yi, siékye ɔkyɛ nii. Kafɔɔ Teete wɔ ninsi mi ni kaamɛ nikɔbla ɔkpɛ nɔɔ.
43014011	Bifũ mi binu nse lɛtɔkɔ ye nlɛ nsi di Teete kamɛ, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ asi mi kaamɛ. Nse biéfũ sɛlaa se mmle binu yi, ni bifũ binu ta sɛkpɛ se kɔbla ni oso.
43014012	“Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ otii lele niefũ mi eenu, ababla asaa ya lɛbla nii. Nwaako ababla bia n-ya ninlenke nii, diekye nfɛ kosifi Teete nfũ.
43014013	Lɛsaa lele kafɔɔ biɛkaalɛ di leyooto nii kamɛ kamabla, alɛ baatakatɛsa Teete leyooto katoo diefe ni di Obi nwu suoto.
43014014	Lɛsaa lele biɛkaalɛ mi leeyooto nii kamɛ, kamabla nta ye.”
43014015	Yesu lakpe aabuɛ alɛ, “Nse mimbɔmbɔ mi yi, bibale mi afiofa.
43014016	Ni kamakaalɛ Teete anta ye Kyakaakotɛ bamba wɔ nimasiɛko ye ni obe lele.
43014017	Nnwɔɔ ninle Ninwuna le nindiki antuo ɔlaa nukwale di Yaa suoto nɛ. Kayi ka mmle dilabafuo nwɔ ɔnya ee atofo nwɔ. Kafɔɔ aye biye nwɔ, diekye akpe ye diɔkyɛ, asi ye kaamɛ kafɔɔ.
43014018	Nse lesifi yi, namadiɛ ye fɛ bakuɛbi. Kamakple nwa ɔkyɛ lee.
43014019	Di obe kakui kamɛ kayi ka mmle dilabasinyɛɛ. Kafɔɔ aye bibanyɛɛ. Ta nkpe ni nkpa kafɔɔ oso ayee, bibasiɛ nkpa.
43014020	Nse dii nwu nkpo lewo yi, bibatofo bilɛ nsi di Teemi kamɛ, ayee kafɔɔ bisi mi kaamɛ, fɛ mmle okle nsi ye ni kaamɛ.
43014021	“Otii lele niefũ mi afiofa eele nya yi, nnwɔɔ ninle otii wɔ nimbɔmbɔ mi ni nɛ. Teemi kafɔɔ mabɔmbɔ otii wɔ nimbɔbɔ mi nii. Ami kafɔɔ kamabɔmbɔ nwɔ ndiki suoto nii kafɔɔ ntuo nwɔ.”
43014022	Yuda, diele nwɔ ninle ni Iskariot labuɛ alɛ, “Saate, lɛ dibawa alɛ fabadiki suoto fantuo wo alɛ kayi ka mmle batii dilabanya fɔ?”
43014023	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Otii lele nimbɔmbɔ mi yi, abakyɔɔ mi asaa otuo kotoko. Teemi kamabɔmbɔ nwɔ, nse Teemi ku ami omu, butɔɔwa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ buɔbadiki nwɔ kasiɛ.
43014024	Otii lele kafɔɔ ninambɔmbɔ mi yi, ankyɔɔ mi asaa otuo kotoko. Asaa otuo ya kafɔɔ bienu mi letuo ni yi, aale ami omu asaa otuo, kafɔɔ Teete wɔ niekpee mi ni asaa otuo ale.
43014025	“Ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle di obe wɔ lekple nkpe ye ni diɔkyɛ.
43014026	Kyakaakotɛ wɔ ninle ni Ninwuna Klekle di Teete makyesee ye ni di leyooto nii kamɛ, kamatuo ye lɛsaa biala, anta ye minyuma sɛlaa se simuu ntɔɔtɔkɔ di nii.
43014027	“Atoko ɔkyɛ ole ninle lɛsaa le kodiɛko ye nii. Ami omu atoko ɔkyɛ ole kɔyɔ nta ye. Nɔɔyɔ nta ye fɛ mmle okle di kayi nn-yɔ kanta nii. Bitanta otu lapɛ ye biabu diisi, bitanyɛkɛ.
43014028	Bienu lebuɛ lɛtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, ‘Nfɛ kosifi, kafɔɔ makple nwa ye ɔkyɛ.’ Nse mimbɔmbɔ mi yi, suoto kamayɔɔ ye alɛ nfɛ kokple nsifi Teete nfũ. Diekye ɛɛtakakatoo alenke mi.
43014029	Ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle simuu fiɛ sibawa kaanya, ni nse siɛbawa kaanya yi, bibafũ minnu.
43014030	Namasinfuo okple ɔkakatɛko ye ɔkyɛnko sitũ, diekye kayi ka mmle tunletɛ nfɛ kɔwa. Anaa osie kuonwii di suoto nii,
43014031	Kafɔɔ dikpe ni kayi ka mmle letofo alɛ mbɔmbɔ Teete nwu nkpo, nkpo oso kɔbla lɛsaa biala fɛ mmle okle eekpee mi ni nɛ. “Yoo, biwa buɔɔkyɛ ninfũ busifi.”
43015001	“Ami ninle kolewoso nwaa nwu nkpo nɛ, Teemi kafɔɔ ninle alewoso nwu kofe kpɛntɛ.
43015002	Ɔla lele ninka mi di suoto kunootika abi kamaa, ambudi nwu an-yu. Olele kafɔɔ nikotika abi, ambɛblɛ nwu alɛ kuaklekle kuntika abi kumpɔɔsa.
43015003	Batookleklesa ye suoto kofokofoko di asaa ya letuo ye ni suoto oso.
43015004	Bibla onwii ku ami, ni amii mabla onwii ku aye. Diekye ɔla kuonwii ninfuo abi otika di nwu omu suoto, nse kuɔɔka di kowoso suoto. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di ayee, bilɔbafuo abi otika nse biɛɛbla onwii ku ami nɛ.
43015005	“Ami ninle kolewoso nwu nkpo, ni di ayee bile sɛla nɛ. Olele niɛbla onwii ku ami, di amii labla onwii ku nnwɔɔ yi, abatika abi kpinwu. Diekye bilabafuo lɛsalɛsaa ɔbla nse ninsi kaamɛ.
43015006	Otii lele ninambla onwii ku ami yi, mambudi nwɔ man-yu fɛ owosola kunkoso. Mansiisa sewosola nwu nkpo mankpee sĩ ɔtɔ sinfiɛ.
43015007	Nse biɛbla onwii ku ami, di ɔlaa ni kafɔɔ nsi ye kaamɛ yi, ni biɛkaalɛ lɛsaa lele biomiɛ, kamabla nta ye.
43015008	Nse biotika abi kpinwu yi, dibata batii ntakatɛsa Teemi leyooto katoo. Ni diotuo kafɔɔ alɛ basaateketetɛ nii bile.
43015009	Mbɔmbɔ ye fɛ mmle okle di Teete mi mbɔmbɔ mi nii. Nkpo oso bisiɛ di lɛbɔmbɔ nii nwu kamɛ alɛ kabɔmbɔ ye obe lele.
43015010	Nse biole mi afiofa yi, ni bibasiɛ mi di lɛbɔmbɔ nwu kamɛ, fɛ mmle okle lele ni Teemi afiofa lesiɛ nwɔ ni di lɛbɔmbɔ kamɛ.
43015011	“Ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle alɛ suoto lɛyɔɔ nii kasiɛ ye kaamɛ, alɛ suoto lɛyɔɔ lee kafɔɔ kawo nimu.
43015012	Kufiofa ko kokpee ye ni ninle nko mmle nɛ. Bibɔmbɔ bawo fɛ mmle okle labɔmbɔ ye ni.
43015013	Lɛbɔmbɔ le niɛtaka katoo dilenke ni ninle alɛ otii kayɔ nkpa nɔɔ antɛ kaasɔ anta baawo nɔɔ disi.
43015014	Nse biɛbla di kufiofa nii ko mmle suoto, ni basiɛwo nii bile.
43015015	Noosinlɛɛ ye nlɛ bakpɛmblatɛ nii bile, diekye kpɛmblatɛ dieye lɛsaa le di saate nɔɔ kɔbla nii. Nunua kɔlɛɛ ye nlɛ basiɛwo, diekye ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye lɛsaa biala lenu lekyeko ni Teemi nfũ.
43015016	Diele aye niediki mi, kafɔɔ ami niediki ye nlɛ, bitɔɔkyɛ biɛlaatika abi kpinwu. Alɛ abi ya bibatika nii, baanya nya obe lele. Alɛ Teete nwu kamata ye lɛsaa lele biɛkaalɛ nwɔ di leyooto nii kamɛ.
43015017	Nkpo oso kufiofa ko kokpee ye ni ninle alɛ, bibɔmbɔ bawo.”
43015018	Yesu lakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Nse kayi batii lekyidi ye yi, bitofo bilɛ batoole katũ beekyidi mi.
43015019	Nse fɛ onwii biɛbla ku kayi ka mmle batii di ɔsaabla lɛma kamɛ yi, bataba bɔmbɔ ye fɛle balema. Kafɔɔ lediki ye lekyeko ni kayi ka mmle batii kamɛ, minasinle ma ni bale oso yi, nkpo oso beekyidi ye nɛ.
43015020	Binyuma ɔlaa wɔ latɔkɔ ye ni nlɛ, ‘Kpɛmblatɛ kuonwii dielenke saate nɔɔ.’ Nse baakpɛ mi kamaa, ni ayee, babakpɛ ye. Nse mankyɔɔ mi asaa otuo atoko yi, se aye kafɔɔ batabakyɔɔ ye ale atoko.
43015021	Kayi batii mababla ye asaa ya mmle amuu ta balemi bile ni oso. Diekye baaye otii wɔ niekpee mi ni kɔtɔ.
43015022	Nse nfɛ ntanwa labakakatɛ lata ma yi, nse batabalo ma okpile lɛpɔɔ. Kafɔɔ nunua mmle nfɛ dite nii, basinnaa osuku ɔkaalɛ kuonwii di sikpile lɛma suoto.
43015023	Otii lele niekyidi mi kamaa, eekyidi Teemi kafɔɔ.
43015024	Nse fɛ ntambla ɔkpɛ wɔ di otii kuonwii diibla anya ni kaamɛ lɛma yi, nse baakpi okpile lɛpɔɔ ku ninwii. Kafɔɔ mmle nfɛ dite nii, batɔɔnya asaa ya amuu lɛbla nii, kafɔɔ beekyidi ami ku Teemi.
43015025	Dikpe nii asaa ya mmle amuu lɛwa kaanya fɛ mmle okle bɛɛkpana ni Kɔɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, ‘Beekyidi mi kasakasa.’
43015026	“Kamakyesee ye kyakaakotɛ wɔ niekye ni Teete nfũ ninle ni Ninwuna Klekle le nindiki antuo ɔlaa nukwale di Yaa suoto nɛ. Nse ɛɛwa, abadiki mi suoto kanya anta ye nɛ.
43015027	Aye kafɔɔ bibadiki mi suoto kanya minta batii, diekye bitɔɔwɛ di ɔkyɛ nii diɛyɔ ni bia kasɔ kakyekɔ.”
43016001	“Ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle simuu, mmle okle di nnɛɛ dilaafee ye ni di ofũ onu lee kamɛ.
43016002	Babatososa ye mandiki di nsiisakɔ lɛma kamɛ. Obe kafɔɔ kɔwa, otii onwii kamalo ye, annyu alɛ Yaa ɔkpɛ ɔɔbla.
43016003	Batii mabla ye asaa ya mmle, diekye baaye Teete nwu ee ami.
43016004	Kafɔɔ ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle alɛ nse obe nwu nkpo lewo bɛɛbla nya yi, ni bibanyuma bilɛ latɔkɔ ye. “Ntatɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle kaasɔ kakyekɔ diekye lawɛ di ɔkyɛ lee.
43016005	Kafɔɔ nunua yi, nfɛ kosifi otii wɔ niekpee mi ni nfũ. Kafɔɔ kuonwii lee diɛkaalɛ mi nfũ kofe nii.
43016006	Kafɔɔ nunua ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye nii, situ lee ntooyii pɔ ku sɛnyaami.
43016007	Kafɔɔ nwaako kɔtɔkɔ nii, dilɛ diɛta ye alɛ lesifi. Diekye nse ninsifi, kyakaakotɛ nwu nkpo dilabawa ye ɔkyɛ. Kafɔɔ nse lesifi, kamanaa kyesee nwɔ anwa.
43016008	Nse ɛɛwa, abadiki ntuo batii kaayi alɛ beekpi lɛpɔɔ siikpile suoto. Babatofo mmle kafɔɔ manankyɛ ni tinini, mantofo alɛ Yaa makanko ma kafɔɔ.
43016009	Babakpi lɛpɔɔ ta okpile oso, diekye baafũ mi banu.
43016010	Babatofo kafɔɔ alɛ baakyɛ tinini. Diekye, nfɛ kokple nsifi Teete nfũ. Bilabasinnyɛɛ kafɔɔ.
43016011	Mantofo alɛ Yaa makanko ma kafɔɔ, diekye Yaa ntoolo otii wɔ ninle ni kayi ka mmle tunletɛ lɛpɔɔ kofokofoko.
43016012	“Nkpe sɛlaa kpinwu katɔkɔ ye nii, kafɔɔ nunua wɔ mmle yi, bilabafuo simuu kasɔ onu.
43016013	Kafɔɔ nse Yaa Ninwuna le nindiki antuo ni ɔlaa nukwale di Yaa suoto lɛwa, abaleko ye katũ anta ye mintofo onukware nwu nkpo omuu. Diekye ɔlɔbakakatɛ di nnwɔɔ omu osie kamɛ, kafɔɔ abakakatɛ di nle eenu nii, antɔkɔ ye kafɔɔ asaa ya amuu nimawa nii.
43016014	Abata mantakatɛsa mi leyooto katoo, diekye abayɔ ɔlaa wɔ lebuɛ ni antɔkɔ ye.
43016015	Lɛsaa biala ninle Teete lele yi, ami nimba. Nkpo oso lɛtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, Ninwuna nwu nkpo mayɔ ɔlaa wɔ lebuɛ ni antɔkɔ ye.”
43016016	Yesu lakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Di obe kakui kamɛ yi, bilabasinnyɛɛ. Kafɔɔ dilabaklɛ bibakple minnyɛɛ.”
43016017	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ bawo lakaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Ɔlaa wɔ mmle obuɛ ni kasɔ mɔ? Diekye eebuɛ alɛ di obe kakui kamɛ bulabasinnyɔɔ. Kafɔɔ di obe kakuii kamɛ kafɔɔ bubakple munyɔɔ. Eekple eebuɛ kafɔɔ alɛ, ‘Diekye nfɛ kosifi Teete nfũ.’
43016018	Ɔlaa wɔ eebuɛ alɛ, ‘Di obe kakui kamɛ’ ni be diotuo? Buoye be alaka!”
43016019	Yesu latofo alɛ basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lamiɛ alɛ bɔɔkaalɛ nwɔ ɔlaa di nni nkpo suoto. Nkpo oso, aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Le buɛ nlɛ, ‘Di obe kakui kamɛ bilabasinnyɛɛ, di obe kakui kamɛ kafɔɔ, bibakple minnyɛɛ.’ Nwu suoto biɔkaalɛ bawo sɛlaa nɛ?
43016020	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, bibawi kaku mimbuo sɛnyaami, kafɔɔ kayi batii mma, suoto nimayɔɔ ma. Bibabuo sɛnyaami, kafɔɔ sɛnyaami lee nwu nkpo makyi ninkple ye suoto lɛyɔɔ.
43016021	Nse lɛmɛ ntoobe ɔsanko yi, ambuo nyaami, diekye obe nɔɔ ntoowo abanu ni dibuo. Kafɔɔ nse atoolofo obi nwu nkpo yi, aanyee dibuo nwu nkpo. Diekye suoto kɔyɔɔ nwɔ alɛ atoolofo obi ɛɛwako kayi ka mmle.
43016022	Nkpo okle dite ye nɛ. Nunua yi, bitoobuo sɛnyaami, kafɔɔ makple nnya ye nii, situ lee mayii ku suoto lɛyɔɔ. Suoto lɛyɔɔ le okle di otii kuonwii dilabafuo ye ni ofũ ninnɛɛ diidii.
43016023	“Nse obe nwu nkpo lewo yi, bilabakaalɛ mi lɛsalɛsaa. Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, Teete mata ye lɛsaa lele biɛkaalɛ nwɔ di leyooto nii kamɛ.
43016024	Diɛbase bia nua, biikaalɛ lɛsalɛsaa di leyooto nii kamɛ. Bikaalɛ, babata ye, di suoto lɛyɔɔ lee dibla nimu.
43016025	“Ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle lefenko di akpa kamɛ. Kafɔɔ obe kɔwa ninɔmasin-yɔ akpa nkakatɛ nta ye nii. Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, kamakakatɛ nta ye klekle di Teete suoto.
43016026	Nse obe nwu nkpo lewo yi, bibakaalɛ nwɔ lɛsaa di leyooto nii kamɛ. Diele obuɛ kobuɛ nlɛ, ami kamakaalɛ nwɔ diisi lee.
43016027	Diekye Teete nwu nkpo omu mbɔmbɔ ye. Ambɔmbɔ ye diekye mimbɔmbɔ mi, biefũ bienu kafɔɔ bilɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ lakye.
43016028	Nwaako Teete nfũ lakye lawa kayi ka mmle, nfɛ kokple ndie kaayi ka mmle nsifi Teete nwu nkpo nfũ.”
43016029	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ nwu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nunua nfɛ fɔɔkakatɛ fanta wo klekle ninanle ni akpa kamɛ.
43016030	Nunua, nfɛ buye bulɛ faye lɛsaa biala, diesinfĩ alɛ otii kuonwii kakple ankaalɛ fɔ ɔlaa kuonwii. Nle mmle lete ntɔɔta wo buofũ buonu bulɛ Yaa nfũ feekye.”
43016031	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Bitoofũ bienu nfɛ?
43016032	Obe kɔwa, babasamiisa bamuu lee, obiala lee nsifi ni nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ leyo mindiɛ mi nii. Obe nwu kafɔɔ ntoowo. Kafɔɔ nwaako diele lete nii ninsi, diekye Teete nsikoe.
43016033	Ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye ɔlaa wɔ mmle, mmle okle di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kasiɛko ye nii, ta mmle okle biɛbla ni onwii ku ami oso. Kayi ka mmle batii mata dibuo mbuo ye. Kafɔɔ bikpee otu! Diekye ntoolenkee kayi ka mmle!”
43017001	Di obe wɔ di Yesu labuɛ salaa se mmle aaloo nii, ni aatakatɛsa anu aanyu osi ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Teete, obe nwu nkpo ntoowo. Takatɛsa Obi lɛfɔ nwu leyooto katoo, di Obi lɛfɔ nwu kafɔɔ atakatɛsa fɔ leyooto katoo.
43017002	Diekye fɛɛtɔɔ osie di batii bamuu suoto falɛ, aata mba fɛɛyɔ fɛɛtɔɔ ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
43017003	Nkpa nwu nkpo ninnaa ni kaloo ɔwɛ ninle alɛ, batii katofo alɛ leete lɛfɔ pɛ ninle ni onukware Yaa, mantofo Yesu Kristo wɔ feekyesee nii.
43017004	Ntɔɔtakatɛsa fɔ leyooto katoo baatii kamɛ kaasɔ ka mmle suoto. Diekye ntooloo ɔkpɛ wɔ feekpee mi falɛ mbla ni ɔbla.
43017005	Teete, nunua yi, kple fatakatɛsɛɛ leyooto katoo di anu lɛfɔ fɛ mmle okle late ni di obe wɔ lawɛ di ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ fiɛ faabla ni kayi.
43017006	“Ntoodiki fɔ letuo batii ba feediki fɛɛtɛɛ ni kaayi ka mmle kamɛ. Balefɔ bale, ni fɛɛyɔ ma fɛɛtɛɛ nɛ. Batɔɔkyɔɔ fɔ ɔlaa atoko.
43017007	Nunua kafɔɔ, nfɛ baye alɛ, lɛsaa biala fɛɛyɔ feekpee mi di nnɛɛ kamɛ, ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ diekye.
43017008	Ntɔɔyɔ ɔlaa lɛfɔ wɔ faayɔ faakpee mi ni ninnɛɛ falɛ nta ma ni lɛta ma, baafũ nwu kafɔɔ. Nfɛ baye kafɔɔ alɛ nwaako ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ lakye, beefũ beenu kafɔɔ alɛ afɔ niakpee mi kɔtɔ.
43017009	Kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta diisi lɛma. Nɔɔpɛ ɔlaa nta di kayi kamuu batii disi, kafɔɔ mba fɛɛyɔ feekpee mi ni ninnɛɛ kamɛ disi kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta. Diekye balefɔ bale.
43017010	“Batii ba bamuu ninkpe mi nii, bale fɔ bale, mba kafɔɔ ninkpe fɔ nii, bale mi bale. Mma kamɛ bɛɛtakatɛsa leyooto nii katoo nɛ.
43017011	Nunua kafɔɔ, nfɛ kokple nwa ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ. Ninsinsi kaayi ka mmle kamɛ, kafɔɔ mma basi. Teete Klekle, nyu ma ku leyooto lɛfɔ osie, dile ni leyooto le fɛɛtɛɛ nii. Di mmle okle baabla ni onwii, fɛ mmle okle di ami ku afɔ buɔbla ni onwii.
43017012	Di obe wɔ lawɛ ni di ɔkyɛ lɛma yi, lanyu ma ku leyooto lɛfɔ nwu osie, dile ni leyooto le fɛɛtɛɛ nii. Laklee ma alɛ kuonwii lɛma ditayu, diediki nwɔ lete dikaatɛ alɛ ɛɛwɔɔ ni, Kɔɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ sɛlaa kawa ni kaanya.
43017013	“Nunua nfɛ kɔwa ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ. Nioso kobuɛ sɛlaa se mmle kaayi ka mmle kamɛ nɛ, mmle okle baawɛ ni suoto lɛyɔɔ nii siitu lɛma kamɛ ninwo ni nimu.
43017014	Ntɔɔyɔ ɔlaa lɛfɔ nwu nkpo lɛta ma. Ta nkpo oso kayi ka mmle lekyidi ma, diekye baasinle kayi ka mmle bale, fɛ mmle okle ninanle ni kayi ka mmle ole.
43017015	“Diele ɔkaalɛ kɔkaalɛ nlɛ faadiki ma kaayi ka mmle kamɛ. Kafɔɔ kɔkaalɛ nlɛ faanyu ma fandiki ma di Kyiditɛ nwu nkpo nnɛɛ kamɛ.
43017016	Fɛ mmle okle ninanle ni kayi ka mmle ole yi, nkpo okle di mma kafɔɔ mananle kayi ka mmle bale nɛ.
43017017	Bla ma klekle fata suoto di onukware nwu nkpo kamɛ. Ɔlaa lɛfɔ nwu ninle onukware nɛ.
43017018	Kokpee ma kayi batii nfũ, fɛ mmle okle feekpee mi ni kayi batii nfũ.
43017019	Ta mma oso, labla suoto nii klekle lata fɔ, di mmle okle di mma kafɔɔ baabla ni suoto klekle di onukware nwu kamɛ.
43017020	“Nɔɔpɛ ɔlaa nta di lete lɛma disi, kafɔɔ ku mba nimafũ mi mannu ni di ɔlaa biene lɛfɔ nwu nkpo babatɔkɔ ma ni suoto.
43017021	Teete, kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta nlɛ bamuu lɛma baabla onwii. Ta ma basiɛ wo kaamɛ, fɛ mmle okle fasi mi ni kaamɛ, di ami kafɔɔ nsi fɔ ni kaamɛ. Ta ma babla onwii alɛ kayi batii matofo alɛ kubio afɔ niekpee mi kɔtɔ.
43017022	“Leyooto biene le fɛɛyɔ fɛɛtɛɛ nii, nninwu okle lɛyɔ lɛta ma nɛ, alɛ baabla onwii, fɛ mmle okle munko fɔ buɔbla ni onwii.
43017023	Ami nsi ma kaamɛ, afɔɔ fasi mi kaamɛ, alɛ baabla onwii niimu kamɛ, mmle okle kaayi batii matofo alɛ nwaako afɔ niekpee mi kɔtɔ, fambɔmbɔ ma kafɔɔ fɛ mmle okle fambɔmbɔ mi nii.
43017024	“Teete, afɔ niɛyɔ ma fɛɛtɛɛ, nioso komiɛ nlɛ bawɛ ninfũ nkpe nii, alɛ baanya mmle okle fɛɛtakatɛsɛɛ ni leyooto katoo, dile ni leyooto le fɛɛtɛɛ nii. Diekye faabɔmbɔ mi fiɛ bia fɛɛbabla kayi.
43017025	“Teete, fate tinini. Kayi ka mmle batii dieye fɔ, kafɔɔ ami n-ye fɔ. Batii ba mmle kafɔɔ n-ye alɛ, afɔ niekpee mi kɔtɔ.
43017026	Lediki fɔ letuo ma. Kamakple ntɔɔbla nkpo, mmle okle di lɛbɔmbɔ le fakpe fatɛɛ nii kamasiɛ ma ni kaamɛ, alɛ ami kafɔɔ kasiɛ ma ni kaamɛ.”
43018001	Obe wɔ di Yesu lapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa aaloo nii, manko basaateketetɛ nɔɔ baasifi baalaataalɛ kaklee ka baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Kedron. Nnɔnyi awoso kɔba kunwii lawɛ ninfa, ninfɛ di Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ lasifi baalaabuo kũ kaamɛ nɛ.
43018002	Yuda wɔ niadiki nwɔ aata ni kafɔɔ n-ye nfa, diekye Yesu ku basaateketetɛ nɔɔ latɔɔkyaka ninfa obe lele.
43018003	Nioso Yuda kafɔɔ lakyɛ kɔba nwu nkpo kamɛ, aalaakpaa Roma batii bakpɛtɛ dikudi ku Olekatakɔ banyuntɛ ba di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku Farisi batii lakpee nii. Baaklee bakandiɛ ku nka ku akpɛsaa.
43018004	Di obe wɔ di Yesu latofo asaa ya amuu nimawa nwɔ ni di suoto oso yi, ni aadie aawa sitũ aabaakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Owe biowolaa?”
43018005	Ninfɛ baadiki kanya alɛ, “Yesu Nasaret Otii nwu buowolaa.” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nyɛɛ ninfũ!” Yuda wɔ niadiki nwɔ aata ni kafɔɔ layila ma kaamɛ.
43018006	Obe wɔ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nyɛɛ ni ninfũ” yi, bamuu lɛma baakple sɛmaa sɛmaa baanɔɔ baapɛ kaasɔ.
43018007	Yesu lakple aakaalɛ ma lɛyɔɔfa alɛ, “Owe biowolaa?” Ninfɛ baabuɛ alɛ, “Yesu Nasaret Otii nwu.”
43018008	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ntɔɔtɔkɔ ye kofokofoko nlɛ nyɛɛ ninfũ.” Ninfɛ di Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nse nwaako ami biowolaa yi, ni biɛta batii ba mmle osuku baatɔɔkyɛ.”
43018009	Yesu labuɛ ɔlaa nwu nkpo mmle okle di ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ ni kawa ni kaanya. Aabuɛ alɛ, “Teete, batii ba bamuu fɛɛyɔ fɛɛtɛɛ nii, ninta kuonwii lɛma ayu.”
43018010	Simon Petro laklee kapamii ninfa. Ninfɛ aadiki ka aasafɔ Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo kpɛmblatɛ koletanɛɛ kotoko aakpa nɛ. Kpɛmblatɛ nwu nkpo leyooto niale Malkus nɛ.
43018011	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ Petro alɛ, “Kplesa kapamii lɛfɔ nwu nkpo fakpee di kotofo ko kamɛ feediki ka ni! Foonyu falɛ dibuo opũ wɔ di Teemi lɛyɔ ɛɛtɛɛ nii, namanyi nwu?”
43018012	Ninfɛ di Roma batii bakpɛtɛ ku ɔnɔɔfo lɛma ku Yuda batii asaa banyuntɛ lamufũ Yesu baanii nɛ.
43018013	Ninfɛ baakpaa nwɔ lɛkasale baakyɛnko Hana nfũ nɛ. Hana wɔ mmle niale Kaiafa ɔlɔ nɛ. Kaiafa wɔ mmle kafɔɔ niale Oletatɛ Banɔɔfo Nɔɔfo di lɛlɛɛ nwu nkpo kamɛ nɛ.
43018014	Kaiafa wɔ mmle niata Yuda batii batunletɛ disibu alɛ dilɛ dilenke alɛ otii onwii kakpi di nnle mmuu disi.
43018015	Simon Petro ku saateketetɛ bamba onwii latikanko Yesu sɛɛmaa. Kafɔɔ saateketetɛ nwu nkpo yi, Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo nwu nkpo n-ye nwɔ nwaa, nkpo oso aatikanko Yesu baakyɛ baalaabuo Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo nwu nkpo kaflɔnkɔ.
43018016	Kafɔɔ Petro nnwɔɔ, aayila kaayi di kayoko kplɛ ɔlɔɔkɔ. Ninfɛ di saateketetɛ bamba nwu nkpo lakple aadie aakyɛ kayi aalaakakatɛko ɔsankobi wɔ niayila ni di kayoko nwu kanya, ni aata Petro kafɔɔ labuo leyo nwu nkpo kaflɔnkɔ nɛ.
43018017	Nfa nfɛ di ɔsankobi nwu niayila ni kaayoko nwu kanya lakaalɛ Petro alɛ, “Afɔ kafɔɔ diele osuɔtɔ nwu nkpo saateketetɛ onwii lɛma fale?” Ninfɛ di Petro labuɛ alɛ, “Kpa woo! Ninsi ma kaamɛ.”
43018018	Lɛwɔɔfɔ lawɛ, nkpo oso bakpɛmblatɛ nwu nkpo ku basaanyuntɛ nwu lakutaa akaa ɔtɔ baamana nwu baakyi baatɔɔwɔfɔ nwu. Nkpo oso Petro kafɔɔ lakyɛ aalaayila ma di ɔlɔɔkɔ aatɔɔwɔfɔ ɔtɔ nwu.
43018019	Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo lakaalɛ Yesu sɛlaa aakyeko basaateketetɛ nɔɔ suoto ku asaa nɔɔ otuo suoto.
43018020	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Obe lele latɔɔkakatɛ latɔɔta batii bamuu lɛɛkpaka. Latuo asaa kafɔɔ di Yuda batii nsiisakɔ ku Olekatakɔ lɛma, nfa di batii nwu bamuu masi nɛ. Ntabuɛ ɔlaa kuonwii kafɔɔ di lɛwofa kamɛ.
43018021	Ni be oso di ami nfɛ fɔɔkaalɛ sɛlaa? Kaalɛ batii ba nianu mi ni lɛkakatɛ. Mma yi, baye sɛlaa se labuɛ nii.”
43018022	Obe wɔ di Yesu labuɛ ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle yi, basaanyuntɛ nwu nkpo onwii lɛma lapɛ Yesu kɔnɛɛ kootokosi aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔmɛnsuku fakpe fandiki Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo kanya mmle okle?”
43018023	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse lebuɛ ɔlaa wɔ ninanlɛ ni yi, faabuɛ fatɔkɔ otii biala ninfũ. Kafɔɔ nse ɔlaa wɔ kobuɛ ni ninte nkpo mɔ, ni be oso fɔɔpɛ mi?”
43018024	Ninfɛ di Hana lata baakpaa Yesu di lekpo le kamɛ baapɛ nwɔ ni baasifiko Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo Kaiafa nfũ nɛ.
43018025	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, Petro lakple aayila aatɔɔwɔfɔ ɔtɔ nwu. Ninfɛ di batii nwu nkpo lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Diele osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle saateketetɛ onwii lɛma fale?” Ninfɛ di Petro lasĩ abuɛ alɛ, “Kpa woo! Ninsi ma kaamɛ.”
43018026	Ninfɛ di Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo kpɛmblatɛ onwii wɔ ninle ni otii wɔ kotoko di Petro labudi ni obilɛma lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Diele afɔ lanya mimko nwɔ di kɔba nwu nkpo kamɛ nɛ?”
43018027	Ninfɛ di Petro lakple aasĩ aabuɛ alɛ, “Kpa woo!” Nfanwu, ni di kɔɔkɔ labo nɛ.
43018028	Kolesɛtũ yi, baakpaa Yesu baadieko di Kaiafa leyo baasifiko Roma batii abaa nɔɔfo leyo. Kafɔɔ Yuda batii banɔɔfotii ditabuo leyo nwu kamɛ. Diekye baamiɛ alɛ suoto lɛma sibla klekle mmle okle babafuo ni kukpi diisi ofe dii nwu nkpo ole.
43018029	Ta nkpo oso Pilato ladie aakyɛ ɔkyɛ lɛma kaayi aalaakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ɔmɛnlaa biɛwako di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle suoto?”
43018030	Ninfɛ baadiki kanya alɛ, “Nse aabla okpile kuonwii yi, nse buɔkpaa nwɔ buwako ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ.”
43018031	Ninfɛ di Pilato latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nse nkpo yi, ni aye bamu bikpaa nwɔ bisifiko biɛlaakanko nwɔ di kufiofa lee kanya.” Ninfɛ di Yuda batii batunletɛ latɔkɔ Pilato alɛ, “Baata wo osuku alɛ bualo otii kuonwii kukpi lɛpɔɔ.”
43018032	Nle mmle nwu lawa alɛ, sɛlaa se di Yesu labuɛ aatɛ ni di kukpi ko okle ɔɔwa ni ɔbakpi kawa kaanya.
43018033	Ninfɛ di Pilato lakple aasifi leyo, ninfɛ aalɛɛ Yesu aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ ninle Yuda Batii Ɔka nwu nɛ?”
43018034	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ omu lɛfɔ nikɔkaalɛ mi ɔlaa wɔ mmle ɛɛ, sɛɛ batii bawo niɛtɔkɔ fɔ suoto ni ɔlaa?”
43018035	Ninfɛ di Pilato kafɔɔ ladiki kanya alɛ, “Foonyu falɛ Yuda otii nle? Afɔ omu lɛfɔ kale batii bamu ku olebatatɛ banɔɔfo niɛkpaa fɔ bɛɛwakoe. Be fɛɛbla?”
43018036	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu kɔtɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Sɛka kalekɔ nii diekye kayi ka mmle kamɛ. Nse fɛ kayi ka mmle kamɛ di sɛka kalekɔ nii lekye yi, nse batikankotɛ nii ntabakpɛ mantɛɛ, se baayɔ mi bakpee di Yuda banɔɔfotii nnɛɛ kamɛ. Kafɔɔ sɛka kalekɔ nii diekye kayi ka mmle kamɛ.”
43018037	Obe wɔ aatɔkɔ nwɔ ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, ni di Pilato lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ni Ɔka fale?” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ nikobuɛ falɛ Ɔka nle. Beelofo mi bɛɛwako kayi ka mmle bɛɛta lɛsaa ninwii, ninle ni alɛ, kadiki onukware nwu nkpo ntuo. Otii lele ninye onukware nwu nkpo kamaa, ankyɔɔ mi atoko.”
43018038	Ninfɛ di Pilato lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Be ninle onukware nwu?” Obe wɔ di Pilato labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle aaloo nii, ninfɛ aadie aasifi Yuda batii nwu nkpo nfũ kaayi ni aalaatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Ninnya okpile kuonwii di suoto nɔɔ kayila nlo nwɔ ni lɛpɔɔ.
43018039	Kafɔɔ di ɔsaabla lee kanya, nse biole Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii nwu nkpo, dikpe nii lediɛ leyo tentɛ onwii lɛta ye. Nioso, biomiɛ bilɛ ndiɛ Yuda Batii Ɔka nwu nkpo nta ye?”
43018040	Ninfɛ di bamuu lɛma baafaa baabuɛ alɛ, “Kpa woo! Diele nnwɔɔ, kafɔɔ Baraba buomiɛ!” Kafɔɔ Baraba wɔ mmle lataka aayila di abaa suoto.
43019001	Nkpo oso Pilato lata baakpɛtɛ lakpaa Yesu baasifiko baalaapɛ nwɔ osie kanya ku mpile.
43019002	Ni baayɔ sɛkansi baabla lekoto baatũkũsɔɔ diisi nɛ. Ninfɛ baayɔ awu sɛɛle ya niefũ ni kɔya wua baakpa nwɔ fɛ ɔka nɛ.
43019003	Ninfɛ baatɔɔtaa siwidi alɛ, “Yii yiiduu! Yuda batii Ɔka nfɛ kɔwa kyu woo!” Nse bɛɛtɔkɔ nwɔ nkpo kamaa, faanya nii, batɔɔpɛ nwɔ kɔnɛɛ kootokosi.
43019004	Nni nkpo sɛmaa, Pilato lakple aadie aakyɛ kayi di batii dikudi nwu nkpo nfũ aalaatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Binyu! Kamakpaa nwɔ nwako anu lee, bibanya bilɛ, nínya okpile kuonwii di suoto nɔɔ eesiɛko alɛ baalo nwɔ ni kukpi lɛpɔɔ.”
43019005	Nioso Yesu ladie aawa kayi ninfa, aatũkũ sɛkansi lekoto, aakpee kafɔɔ awu sɛɛle wua. Ninfɛ di Pilato latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Binyu! Nnya otii nwu ninle nwɔ nɛ!”
43019006	Obe wɔ di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku Olekatakɔ basaanyuntɛ lanyɔɔ nii, baafaa baabuɛ alɛ, “Pɛ nwɔ sibuɛ fakaasa koowoso suoto! Pɛ nwɔ fakaasa koowoso suoto!” Ninfɛ di Pilato latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye bamu bikpaa nwɔ bisifiko, biɛlaapɛ nwɔ sibuɛ bikaasa koowoso suoto. Ami, ninnya okpile kuonwii di suoto nɔɔ kalo nwɔ ni kukpi lɛpɔɔ.”
43019007	Nfa nfɛ di batii dikudi nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Bukpe kufiofa nikotuo alɛ aakpi nii, diekye oobuɛ alɛ Yaa Obi ale.”
43019008	Di obe wɔ di Pilato lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle yi, lɛyɛkɛ lakple diapɛ nwɔ osie kanya.
43019009	Ninfɛ aakple aasifi leyo aalaakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Ɔfɛ feekye?” Kafɔɔ Yesu ditatɔɔ ntale kunwii.
43019010	Ninfɛ di Pilato lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛɛ! Flookpee mi kanya? Sɛɛ faaye falɛ nkpe otumi kadiɛ fɔ, ee nta mampɛ fɔ sibuɛ mankaasa koowoso suoto?”
43019011	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse diele fɛ ɔta bɛɛta fɔ osie nwu nkpo beekyeko osi yi, nse faawɛ otumi nwu nkpo di suoto nii. Nkpo oso otii wɔ niɛyɔ mi eekpee fɔ ni ninnɛɛ kamɛ okpile nlenke ole fɔ.”
43019012	Di obe wɔ di Pilato lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle yi, aamiɛ osuku wɔ suoto aafe andiɛ ni Yesu. Kafɔɔ batii nwu nkpo lafaa baabuɛ alɛ, “Nse feediɛ nwɔ, ni diotuo alɛ faasinle Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare siɛwo! Diekye otii lele niɛbla suoto ɔka kamaa, ni ɛɛtaka ayɛ di Ɔka Kplɛ suoto!”
43019013	Di obe wɔ di Pilato lanu ni sɛlaa se mmle yi, ninfɛ aakpaa Yesu aadieko nɛ. Ninfɛ di nnwɔɔ omu aalaasiɛ di lɛkankokpomii suoto nɛ, di lɛba le bɔɔlɛɛ ni afuɔ kasiisakɔ. Di Hebri sele kamɛ manlɛɛ lɛba nwu nkpo alɛ Gabata.
43019014	Dii nwu nkpo lale suoto ololaa dii diata Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii ole nwu nkpo. Diabla fɛ kakũ lefosi ɛnyɔ. Ninfɛ di Pilato latɔkɔ Yuda batii nwu nkpo alɛ, “Nnya Ɔka lee nwu nkpo!”
43019015	Kafɔɔ mia nfɛ baakple baatɔɔfaa osie kanya baatoobuɛ alɛ, “Kpaa nwɔ fasifiko! Kpaa nwɔ fasifiko! Pɛ nwɔ sibuɛ fakaasa koowoso suoto!” Ninfɛ di Pilato lakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Biomiɛ bilɛ mpɛ Ɔka lee nwu nkpo sibuɛ nkaasa koowoso suoto?” Ninfɛ di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo nwu nkpo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Ɔka kuonwii nnaa wo dilenkee Roma Batii Ɔka Kplɛ nwu nkpo!”
43019016	Obe wɔ baabuɛ ɔlaa nwu baaloo nii, ninfɛ di Pilato kafɔɔ layɔ Yesu aakpee ma di nnɛɛ kamɛ alɛ balaapɛ nwɔ sibuɛ bakaasa koowoso suoto nɛ. Nkpo oso, bakpɛtɛ nwu lakpaa Yesu baasifiko.
43019017	Baata nnwɔɔ omu aatuka kowoso ko suoto babapɛ nwɔ mankaasa ni aalaadunko lɛba le baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Otii Disi Dikufi. Di Hebri sele kamɛ manlɛɛ ni Golgota.
43019018	Nfa baapɛ nwɔ sibuɛ baakaasa koowoso suoto nɛ. Baapɛ basuɔtɔ banyɔ banwii kafɔɔ sibuɛ baakaasa di awoso bamba suoto, di Yesu oletanɛɛkyɛ ku ɔmɛntunɛɛkyɛ.
43019019	Pilato lata baakpana lɛsaa bakaasa di Yesu kowoso nwu nkpo osi. Sɛlaa se aakpana ni ninle nse mmle nɛ. Yesu Nasaret Otii nwu, Yuda Batii Ɔka.
43019020	Yuda batii kpinwu laka lɛsaa le mmle, diekye lɛba le baakaasa ni Yesu koowoso suoto ditakyo ku okpoo kplɛ nwu nkpo. Diɛkyakaa nii, baakpana sɛlaa se mmle di Roma, Hebri ku Griki batii sele kamɛ.
43019021	Nioso olebatatɛ banɔɔfo lasĩ ɔlaa nwu, ni baatɔkɔ Pilato alɛ, “Tankpana falɛ, ‘Yuda Batii Ɔka,’ kafɔɔ kpana falɛ, ‘Otii wɔ mmle kobuɛ alɛ, “Ami ninle Yuda Batii Ɔka.” ’ ”
43019022	Ninfɛ di Pilato ladiki kanya alɛ, “Lɛsaa le ntɔɔkpana nii, ntɔɔkpana kofokofoko.”
43019023	Di obe wɔ baakpɛtɛ nwu ntɔɔkaasa Yesu koowoso suoto beeloo nii, ni baayɔ akleesaa baasɛ di akyuu ana nɛ, baakpɛtɛ nwu obiala lɛma layɔ dikyuu ninwii nɛ. Kafɔɔ awu anwii labu. Awu nwu nkpo diele ɔkaa baakaa nya, kafɔɔ oloso baaloso nya baakyeko simu baalaase kaalɔ.
43019024	Ninfɛ di bakpɛtɛ nwu latɔkɔ bawo alɛ, “Bitanta buabɛ awu ya mmle nkpo. Kafɔɔ bita buwii atrebi bunyu owe ale abale.” Nle mmle nwu nkpo lawa kaanya alɛ, Kɔkpana Klekle ɔlaa wɔ beebuɛ bɛɛtɛ ni kawa kaanya. Baabuɛ baatɛ alɛ, “Bɛɛyɔ mi akleesaa bɛɛsɛ bawo. Beewii kafɔɔ atrebi di awu ya ninkpee ntɛ ni kasɔ.” Nni ninle lesaa le kafɔɔ di baakpɛtɛ nwu ntɔɔbla ni nɛ.
43019025	Batii ba niayila ni di Yesu kowoso nwu nkpo baapɛ nwɔ sibuɛ baakaasa ni ɔlɔɔkɔ niale, Yesu ɔya ku ɔya obilɛma ku Maria wɔ ninle ni Klopa ɔsɔfɔ ku Maria Magdalene.
43019026	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanya saateketetɛ wɔ ambɔmbɔ ni nwaa ku ɔya n-yɛ nii, ni aatɔkɔ ɔya alɛ, “Mma, nnya obi lɛfɔ!”
43019027	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ saateketetɛ nwu nkpo alɛ, “Nyu, nnya mma lɛfɔ!” Diayɔ ni di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, ni di saateketetɛ nwu nkpo lakpaa Yesu ɔya aasifiko leyo nɔɔ, aalaasiɛ di ɔkyɛ nɔɔ nɛ.
43019028	Yesu latofo nfɛ alɛ, lɛsaa biala ntooloo. Ta mmle di Yaa ɔlaa wɔ baabuɛ baatɛ ni kawa ni kaanya oso, Yesu labuɛ alɛ, “Otu kɔnsɔ nkle mi.”
43019029	Lɛba le di ɔlaa wɔ mmle lawa nii, ntu lekpetesa kplɛ ninwii layila ninfa, di nta nyankale layii kamɛ diayila nii. Nkpo oso, baayɔ oleteku baanii di owoso onwii suoto bɔɔlɛɛ ni hisope baalaanyɔ di nta nwu nkpo kamɛ, ni baatakatɛsa baakyɔɔ Yesu kaanya nɛ.
43019030	Obe wɔ di Yesu lanyi nta nwu nkpo aaloo nii, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Kutooloo.” Ninfɛ aawakosa disi kasɔ ni ninwuna nɔɔ ladie nɛ.
43019031	Ninfɛ di Yuda batii batunletɛ latɔkɔ Pilato alɛ ata ma osuku baalaafee basuɔtɔ ba baapɛ bakaasa ni di kowoso suoto nkpaa, baatekete bakpi lɛma di kowoso suoto. Baakaalɛ nle mmle diekye Fiida diale, batamiɛ kafɔɔ alɛ bakpi lɛma kasaka di kowoso suoto dilaadu Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi nwu nkpo suoto. Diekye Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi nwu nkpo dii finle dile diɛta ma.
43019032	Ta nkpo oso bakpɛtɛ nwu lakyɛ baalaafee otii kasale nkpaa, ni baakyɛ baalaafee ɔnyɔɔfa kafɔɔ nle nɛ. Dile ni mba baakaasa ni awoso suoto di Yesu ɔlɔɔkɔ.
43019033	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ baakyɛ Yesu nfũ, baanya alɛ atookpi kofokofoko. Ta nkpo oso batafee nwɔ nkpaa.
43019034	Kafɔɔ bakpɛtɛ nwu nkpo onwii lɛma ladiki lɛkplɔ nɔɔ aatofo Yesu di ɔfankyi. Ninfɛ di ntɔ ku ntu ladie nɛ.
43019035	Otii wɔ nianya ni lɛsaa le mmle niawa nii, niɛkpana ɔlaa eekyeko nwu di suoto ɔɔta wo. Ɔlaa lele ɛɛtɔkɔ wo kute nkpo. Aye kafɔɔ alɛ ɔlaa wɔ oobuɛ ni nte nkpo. Oobuɛ nwu antɔkɔ ye alɛ biafũ minu.
43019036	Nle mmle lawa kaanya nkpo alɛ Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ ɔlaa wɔ eebuɛ ɛɛtɛ kawa kaanya alɛ, “Bɔlɔbafee nwɔ dikufi kuniwii.”
43019037	Bɛɛkpana kafɔɔ di lɛba bamba alɛ, “Batii manya otii wɔ beetofo ni lɛkplɔ di ɔfankyi.”
43019038	Nle mmle sɛmaa, Yosef wɔ niakye ni okpoo wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Arimatea, lakyɛ Pilato nfũ aalaatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ, adiɛko nwɔ Yesu kpi. Yosef wɔ mmle lale Yesu saateketetɛ, kafɔɔ di lewofa kamɛ, diekye aatɔɔyɛkɛ Yuda batii banɔɔfo. Ni di Pilato latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ aafuo kpi nwu nkpo ɔbafũ, ni aalaafũ nwɔ aasifiko nɛ.
43019039	Ni di Nikodemo wɔ niakasa ni Yesu nfũ ɔkyɛ ku kakyɛ latikanko Yosef nwu nkpo nɛ. Ninfɛ aayɔ kɔfa ko man-yɔ manlolaa ni kpi, bɛɛyɔ klobo ku kɔfa kɔnɔnkɔnɔ ko manlɛɛ ni aloe kpinwu aaklee nɛ. Kɔfa nwu nkpo lɛpɔ kawo fɛ bakiloo afosi atiɛ.
43019040	Ninfɛ baasuɔtɔ ba mmle banyɔ lalolaa Yesu kpi nwu ku kɔfa nwu, baayɔ dibula fututu baamiminisa nwɔ di suoto fɛ mmle di Yuda batii mbla ni kpi fiɛ mankookaa nii.
43019041	Kɔba kunwii lawɛ di lɛba le baalo ni Yesu. Di kɔba nwu kamɛ, ɔkya fɔle onwii late ninfa manayikookaa ni otii kuonwii kaamɛ diidii.
43019042	Di obe wɔ di dii nwu nkpo kaleesɛ nimale ni Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi, fiɛ di ɔkya nwu nkpo latɛɛtɛɛ ni nfa oso yi, ni baayɔ Yesu baakookaa ninfa nɛ.
43020001	Kɔsida kolesɛtũ di obe wɔ kaayi diikpa nii, Maria Magdalene lakyɛ ɔkya nwu katũ, ni aalaanya alɛ difuɔ le baayɔ baatĩi ni ɔkya nwu kanya baamunusa ni baakyisa.
43020002	Ninfɛ aatoso aasifi Simon Petro ku saateketetɛ wɔ di Yesu mbɔmbɔ ni nfũ nɛ. Ni aalaatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Batii bawo lɛkyɛ bɛɛlaaklee Saate nwu beediki di ɔkya kamɛ, buoye nfũ kafɔɔ bɛɛyɔ nwɔ bɛɛlaatɛ nii!”
43020003	Ninfɛ di Petro ku saateketetɛ bamba nwu nkpo ladie baatoofe ɔkya nwu katũ nɛ.
43020004	Akyuu lɛma anyɔ baatootoso kafɔɔ, saateketetɛ bamba nwu nkpo latoso aalaafe Petro, aaka nwɔ ɔkya nwu nkpo katũ ɔlaadu.
43020005	Aawakasɔ aakɛnsa aanyu ɔkya nwu nkpo kamɛ, aanya abula fututu nwu, kafɔɔ atabuo di ɔkya nwu kamɛ.
43020006	Simon Petro latikanko nwɔ di nkpaamaa aabadu nfa, ni aafe nwɔ aabuo di ɔkya nwu nkpo kamɛ, ni aanya abula fututu nwu nkpo niate ni ninfa nɛ.
43020007	Dibula le baayɔ baanii ni Yesu disi late ninfa. Kafɔɔ ditate di abula fututu nwu nkpo ɔlɔɔkɔ. Nni baakatu ni baatɛ lete di ɔlɔɔkɔ.
43020008	Ninfɛ di saateketetɛ wɔ niakasa ni ɔkya nwu nkpo katũ odu kafɔɔ labuo di ɔkya nwu kamɛ nɛ. Aanya akookaasaa nwu nkpo okle, ni aafũ aanu nɛ.
43020009	Diekye di obe nwu kamɛ yi, bayinu Yaa ɔlaa wɔ niabuɛ alɛ dikpe ni Yesu lekple ɛɛtaka eekye ni kukpi kamɛ kasɔ.
43020010	Ninfɛ di basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo lakple baasifi ayo lɛma nɛ.
43020011	Maria layila di ɔkya nwu kotoko aatoowi kaku. Obe wɔ aatoowi ni nkpo, ni aawakasɔ alɛ oonyu ɔkya nwu kamɛ nɛ.
43020012	Ninfɛ aanya Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ banyɔ lakpee asaa fututu, baasiɛ ninfũ baayɔ Yesu baatɛ ni nɛ. Onwii lasiɛ di lɛkantosi nɔɔ, ɔnyɔɔfa kafɔɔ lasiɛ di nkpaalɔ nɔɔ.
43020013	Ninfɛ baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔsanko, be oso foowi kaku?” Ninfɛ aadiki kanya alɛ, “Batii bawo labayɔ Saate nii beesifiko. Ninye nfũ kafɔɔ bɛɛyɔ nwɔ bɛɛlaatɛ nii!”
43020014	Obe wɔ aabuɛ ɔlaa nwɔ mmle aaloo nii, ninfɛ aamunikĩi aanyu sɛmaa nɛ, ni aanya alɛ Yesu n-yɛ, kafɔɔ atatofo alɛ Yesu diale.
43020015	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ɔsanko, be oso foowi kaku? Owe foowolaa?” Kafɔɔ Maria lanyu alɛ otii wɔ nikonyu ni lɛba nwu dile. Nkpo oso aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Teete, lekoto, nse afɔ niɛyɔ nwɔ feesifiko yi, faatuo mi nfũ fɛɛyɔ nwɔ fɛɛlaatɛ ni, ninkyɛ naakpaa nwɔ.”
43020016	Nfa nfɛ di Yesu lalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Maria!” Ninfɛ aamunikĩi aanyu Yesu, ni aalɛɛ nwɔ di Hebri sele kamɛ alɛ, “Rabuni!” Lɛsɔdiki ninle alɛ Saatuotɛ.
43020017	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Diɛ mi ɔkpanko, diekye ninkple nsifi Teete nwu nfũ di osi. Kafɔɔ tɔɔkyɛ babiloo nfũ faalaatɔkɔ ma falɛ, kokple nsifi Teemi ku Yaa nii nfũ di osi. Ale ni aye kafɔɔ Teeye ku Yaa lee.”
43020018	Nkpo oso, Maria Magdalene lakyɛ aalaatɔkɔ basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo alɛ atɔɔnya Saate nwu. Ni aatɔkɔ ma sɛlaa se simuu di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ ni nɛ.
43020019	Di Kɔsida nwu nkpo kɔtɔɔfɔ yi, basaateketetɛ nwu lasi dikudi di leyo ninwii kamɛ, baasɛɛ leyo nwu ta baatɔɔyɛkɛ ni Yuda batii batunletɛ nwu nkpo oso. Nfanwu, ninfɛ di Yesu lawa aabayila ma nintɛɛ nɛ. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Atoko ɔkyɛ ole disiɛko ye.”
43020020	Obe wɔ aabuɛ ɔlaa nwu nkpo aaloo nii, ni aatuo ma nnɛɛ ku ɔfankyi nɔɔ nɛ. Ni di suoto lɛyɔɔ layii basaateketetɛ nwu kamɛ pɔ di obe wɔ baanyɔɔ ni nɛ.
43020021	Nni nkpo sɛmaa, Yesu lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Atoko ɔkyɛ ole disiɛko ye. Fɛ mmle okle di Teete lekpee mi ni kɔtɔ, nkpo okle di ami kafɔɔ kokpee ye nɛ.”
43020022	Ninfɛ aanwuna aakpete ma di suoto aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bifũ Ninwuna Klekle nwu nkpo.
43020023	Nse biɛyɔ batii sikpile biɛkyɛ ma yi, ni Yaa kafɔɔ ntɔɔyɔ ɛɛkyɛ ma. Nse biɛɛyɔ bikyɛ ma yi, ni Yaa kafɔɔ diɛyɔ akyɛ ma.”
43020024	Di obe wɔ kamɛ di Yesu lawa ma ni ɔkyɛ yi, basaateketetɛ lefosi banyɔ nwu nkpo onwii wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Toma, mankple manlɛɛ nwɔ ni Lɛtabi, ditawɛ ma kaamɛ.
43020025	Nkpo oso obe wɔ aawa nii, basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Butɔɔnya Saate nwu!” Ninfɛ di Toma latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nse ninnya sibuɛ mpɛkɔ nwu nkpo ninnɛɛ nɔɔ n-yɔ lɛnɛɛ nii nkpee kaamɛ, ee n-yɔ kɔnɛɛ nii nkpee di ɔfankyi nɔɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, namafũ nnu diidii.”
43020026	Nnanwɔkyi onwii sɛmaa, basaateketetɛ ba mmle lakple baasi leeyo kamɛ, nni nkpo Toma nfɛ lasiɛ ma kaamɛ. Baasɛɛ leyo nwu nkpo, kafɔɔ Yesu lawa aabayila ma nintɛɛ, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Atoko ɔkyɛ ole disiɛko ye.”
43020027	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ Toma alɛ, “Bayɔ lɛnɛɛ lɛfɔ fakpee ninfũ, faanyu mi nnɛɛ kamɛ. Faayɔ kɔnɛɛ lɛfɔ fakpanko mi ɔfankyi nwu. Diɛ ɔtanfũ onu lɛfɔ nwu nkpo, faafũ fanu!”
43020028	Ninfɛ di Toma ladiki kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Saate nii ku Yaa nii!”
43020029	Ninfɛ di Yesu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ta fɛɛnyɛɛ ni oso feefũ feenu. Babakusɛkusɛsa batii ba ninanyɛɛ ni fiɛ beefũ beenu nii!”
43020030	Yesu lakple aabla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ kpinwu di basaateketetɛ nɔɔ anu, kafɔɔ baakpana bakpee di kukũ ko mmle kamɛ.
43020031	Kafɔɔ bɛɛkpana n-ya mmle bɛɛtɛ alɛ biafuo ofũ onu bilɛ Yesu ninle Kristo nwu nkpo, Yaa Obi nwu nkpo. Di nnwɔɔ ofũ onu wɔ mmle kamɛ yi, bibawɛ nkpa.
43021001	Di nle mmle sɛmaa yi, Yesu lakple aadiki suoto aatuo basaateketetɛ nɔɔ di Tiberia Lekpo ɔlɔɔkɔ. Nnya mmle okle aadiki suoto aatuo ni.
43021002	Dii ninwii, Yesu basaateketetɛ banwii lasi, mma ninle Simon Petro ku Toma wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Lɛtabi ku Natanael wɔ niakye ni Kena di Galilea kasɔ suoto ku Sebedeo babi ku basaateketetɛ bamba banyɔ.
43021003	Ninfɛ di Petro latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Kɔkyɛ naadiki kɔkpaku.” Nfanwu, ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Awoo, buɔwa munkyɛ.” Nkpo oso bamuu lɛma baalaabuo di oklo kamɛ baasifi. Kafɔɔ dii nwu nkpo kakyɛ, batadiki kakpaku kukanwii.
43021004	Obe wɔ nfɛ kuufĩ kotũ nii, Yesu lawa aabaayila di lekpo nwu nkpo katũ. Kafɔɔ basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo ditatofo alɛ Yesu diale.
43021005	Ninfɛ aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Bakosopo, ni, biediki lɛsalɛsaa?” Ninfɛ baadiki kanya alɛ, “Oowo lo!”
43021006	Ninfɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bitaa asabu lee nwu nkpo bikpee di oklo nwu nkpo oletanɛɛkyɛ, bibadiki lɛsaa.” Nkpo oso baataa asabu nwu nkpo. Baadiki kɔkpaku kpinkidi alɛ, batasinfuo asabu nwu ɔtɔɔnanfi.
43021007	Ninfɛ di saateketetɛ wɔ di Yesu mbɔmbɔ ni latɔkɔ Petro alɛ, “Saate dile!” Obe wɔ di Petro lanu alɛ Saate dile nii, ni aayɔ osi awu wua nɔɔ aaminisa di ɔtɔ nɛ, diekye aadiki nya aatɛ. Ni aayefe aabuo di ntu kamɛ nɛ.
43021008	Kafɔɔ basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo bule, baasiɛ di oklo kamɛ baatɔɔnanfi asabu nwu nkpo niayii ni ku kɔkpaku baatɔɔwako lekpo kotoko. Batakyo ku lekpo kotoko, nkpo diate fɛ nnɛɛ ditika afosi anɔɔ nɛ.
43021009	Di obe wɔ baadie di oklo kamɛ baabadu ni kasɔ, baanya akaa ɔtɔ beekutaa nii, di kɔkpaku kowo latika nii, bloblo owo kafɔɔ late ninfa.
43021010	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biyɔ kɔkpaku lee ko biediki ni kowo biwako.”
43021011	Ninfɛ di Simon Petro layie aabuo di oklo kamɛ, ni aananfi asabu nwu nkpo aawako lekpo kotoko nɛ. Kɔkpaku kplɛ layii asabu nwu nkpo kamɛ kuoawo kɔlafa afosi anɔɔ kɔkpaku kutiɛ. Nu kɔɔkpaku nwu nkpo lapɔ nkpo, asabu nwu nkpo ditabɛ.
43021012	Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Biwa biɛbale alesaa.” Basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo kuonwii lɛma ditafuo otu okpee ɔkaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Afɔ owe dile?” Diekye baatofo alɛ Saate nwu diale.
43021013	Nioso Yesu lakyɛ aalaayɔ bloblo, ni aayɔ aata ma nɛ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ aayɔ kɔkpaku nwu aata ma nɛ.
43021014	Nle mmle niale ditiɛfa di Yesu ladiki suoto aatuo ni basaateketetɛ nɔɔ, di obe wɔ aataka aakye ni kukpi kamɛ nɛ.
43021015	Di obe wɔ batoole alesaa beeloo nii, Yesu lakaalɛ Simon Petro alɛ, “Simon, Yohane obi, fambɔmbɔ mi fanlenkee mba mmle?” Ninfɛ aadiki kanya alɛ, “Yii, Saate! Faye falɛ mbɔmbɔ fɔ.” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Toonyu afosobi nii.”
43021016	Yesu lakple aakaalɛ nwɔ lɛnyɔɔfa alɛ, “Simon, Yohane obi, fambɔmbɔ mi?” Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Yii, Saate! Faye falɛ, mbɔmbɔ fɔ.” Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Toonyu bafoso nii.”
43021017	Yesu lakple aakaalɛ nwɔ ditiɛfa alɛ, “Simon, Yohane obi, fambɔmbɔ mi?” Ɔlaa wɔ mmle labuo Petro suoto, diekye ditiɛfa niale nni nkpo di Yesu lakaalɛ alɛ, “Fambɔmbɔ mi?” Nioso, aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate! Faye lɛsaa biala. Faye kafɔɔ falɛ mbɔmbɔ fɔ!” Ninfɛ di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Toonyu bafoso nii.
43021018	Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, obe wɔ fale ni okosopo yi, fantaka fanlolaa suoto fansifi lɛba le ninlɛ fɔ nii. Kafɔɔ nse fataba be yi, fabatakatɛsa nnɛɛ lefɔ fankyɔɔ, otii bamba nnii fɔ, mankpaa fɔ mansifiko lɛba le fonoomiɛ falɛ fakyɛ nii.”
43021019	Ɔlaa wɔ mmle di Yesu labuɛ ni yi, ootuo mmle okle di Petro kamakpi nii, an-yɔ dibu anta ni Yaa. Nle sɛmaa, ni di Yesu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tikankoe!”
43021020	Petro lamunikĩi aanyu sɛmaa, ni aanya saateketetɛ wɔ di Yesu mbɔmbɔ ni ntikanko ma sɛɛmaa nɛ. Saateketetɛ nwu niale nwɔ niasiɛ aakaako ni Yesu di kɔtɔɔfɔ alesaa nwu nkpo kalekɔ aakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Saate, owe nimadiki fɔ anta?” ni nɛ.
43021021	Obe wɔ di Petro lanyɔɔ nii, ni aakaalɛ Yesu alɛ, “Saate, ni wɔ mmle mɔ, be nimawa nwɔ di suoto?”
43021022	Ninfɛ di Yesu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Nse nlɛ asiɛ nkpa dilaadu obe wɔ kamawa nii, ɔmɛnle ninle fɔ ole? Afɔ yi, tikankoe!”
43021023	Nioso ɔlaa wɔ mmle labiɛ kuabuo di Yesu basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo kamɛ alɛ, saateketetɛ wɔ mmle dilaba kpi. Kafɔɔ Yesu ditabuɛ alɛ, ɔlɔbakpi. Ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ ni ninle alɛ, “Nse nlɛ asiɛ nkpa dilaadu obe wɔ kamawa nii, ɔmɛnle ninle fɔ ole?”
43021024	Nnwɔɔ ninle saateketetɛ wɔ nikɔkakatɛ ni di sɛɛlaa se mmle suoto nɛ. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ niɛkpana sĩ ɛɛtɛ nɛ. Buye kafɔɔ bulɛ sɛlaa se simuu eebuɛ ni nte nkpo.
43021025	Asaa bamba kpinwu nkpe di Yesu labla nii. Nse fɛ ɔkpana alɛ bɔɔkpana lɛsaa biala le aabla ni mantɛ ninwii ninwii yi, lefũ lenu nlɛ, kayi ka mmle batii ditabawɛ akũ ya mmle nwu nkpo amuu katɛkɔ.
44001001	-
44001002	Obiloo Teofilo, diɛ kukũ nii kasale kamɛ, lakpana latɔkɔfɔ asaa ya amuu di Yesu labla ni diayɔ ni di obe wɔ aakye ni ɔkpɛ nɔɔ kasɔ dialaase ni di obe wɔ di Yaa lakpaa nwɔ aasifiko ni osi. Fiɛ aakpaa nwɔ aasifiko ni osi, Yesu latuo batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ ba aadiki ni asaa, diafe ni di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle osie kamɛ.
44001003	Diɛ ayi afosi ana kamɛ kuukpi nɔɔ kamaa, aadiki suoto aatuo ma siisuku ate ate suoto diatuo alɛ nwaako akpe ni nkpa. Mma nianyɔɔ nii, aakakatɛko ma di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ suoto.
44001004	Di obe wɔ baasi nii, aakpee ma kufiofa aabuɛ alɛ, “Bitandie di Yerusalem, kafɔɔ yi, bisiɛ bisoko Yaa Ninwuna le nikɔwa ni, nle suoto latɔkɔ ye nlɛ Teemi labuɛ aatɛ alɛ abata ye nii.
44001005	Yohane nnwɔɔ yi, ntu, mmi aayɔ aakpeesa batii Yaa Ntu nɛ. Kafɔɔ di ayi asɛɛ kamɛ yi, Yaa mayɔ Ninwuna Klekle nɔɔ ankpeesa ye.”
44001006	Obe wɔ di batɔkyɛntɛ ku Yesu lakple baakyaka nii yi, baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, nunua foomiɛ falɛ fakplesa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo fata Israel?”
44001007	Ni di Yesu latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Diefĩ alɛ biatofo obe wɔ ee ayi ya di Teemi labuɛ ee ɛɛtɛ ni di osie nɔɔ kanya alɛ nle mmle mawa nii.
44001008	Kafɔɔ se Ninwuna Klekle nwu nkpo lɛwa ye di suoto yi, abakpee ye osie minle mi suoto ɔlaa babuɛtɛ di Yerusalem ku Yudea kasɔ kamuu ku Samaria sekpoo, diɛlaase ni di kasɔ kayɛntɛlekɔ.”
44001009	Diɛ lɛkakatɛ le mmle sɛmaa, Yaa lakpaa nwɔ aasifiko osi, ni baayila baatoonyu nwɔ tuwĩi dialaase di obe wɔ aayu ma ni di anu di alokoonkyɛ kamɛ nɛ.
44001010	Baayila baatoonyu ni osi tuwĩi oosifi ni yi, nfanwu basuɔtɔ banyɔ banwii lakpee asaa fututu baayila ma di ɔlɔɔkɔ,
44001011	ni baasuɔtɔ nwu nkpo latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Galilea batii, be oso biyɛ bionyu osi nkpo? Yesu wɔ di Yaa lɛkpaa eekyeko ni ɔkyɛ lee eesifiko ni osi yi, nkpo okle kafɔɔ abakple ankye osi anwa fɛ mmle bienyɔɔ eesifi ni osi nɛ.”
44001012	Nni kamaa, batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nkpo lakple di kobokote ko bɔɔlɛɛ ni nnɔnyi awoso kobokote osi baasifi Yerusalem okpoo kamɛ. Diedie ni ninfa diɛlaabuo ni okpoo lewo lɛkɔ ninwii.
44001013	Obe wɔ baalaabuo ni okpoo kamɛ, baayie baasifi baalaabuo leyo le mansiɛ nii. Batii ba niawɛ ni ninfa niale Petro ku Yohane ku Yakobo ku Andrea ku Filipo ku Toma ku Bartolomeo ku Mateo ku Yakobo nwɔ ninle ni Alfeo obi ku Simon wɔ niabɔmbɔ ni kale nɔɔ osie kanya ku Yakobo obi Yuda.
44001014	Batii ba mmle latoosi obe lele ku basanko bawo ku Yesu ɔya Maria ku Yesu basuɔtɔbi lɛma ku disibu ninwii baatɔɔpɛ ɔlaa baatɔɔta Yaa.
44001015	Diɛ ayi nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, mba niafũ baanu ni labasi, lɛpɔ lɛma lawo fɛ batii kɔlafa afosi anyɔ. Ninfɛ di Petro lataka aayila aatɔkɔ ma alɛ,
44001016	“Babiloo, asaa ya baakpana ni di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ yi, dikpe nii ɛɛwa kanya fɛ mmle di Yaa Ninwuna lafe ni di Ɔka Dawid suoto aabuɛ aatɛ ni di Yuda suoto, otii wɔ nialeko ni batii ba niamufũ ni Yesu katũ.
44001017	Yuda lasiɛ diikudi loo le mmle kamɛ, di Yesu ladiki nwɔ alɛ, se aabla ni batɔkyɛntɛ ɔkpɛ.”
44001018	Kafɔɔ aabla okpile, aafũ koto ko baata baaya ni kasɔ ka suoto aalaakpi nii. Lɛba le aakpa aapɛ ni kaasɔ, aabiɛ diɛ sɛfɔtɔ nɔɔ ladie siawii ni kaayi.
44001019	Kukpi nɔɔ ko mmle ɔlaa lakyaka Yerusalem, batii bamuu lanu. Nioso bɔɔlɛɛ lɛba le aakpi ni seele lɛma alɛ Akeldama, lɛsɔdiki nɔɔ kotuo alɛ ntɔ kasɔ.
44001020	Nioso Petro lakakatɛ abuɛ kafɔɔ alɛ, “Bɛɛkpana di Dawid Sinu Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, ‘Leyo nɔɔ dite difukuti. Kuonwii kafɔɔ atansiɛ ni kaamɛ.’ Bɛɛkpana kafɔɔ alɛ, ‘Bita otii bamba ayila di ɔkpɛ nɔɔ kanya.’
44001021	-
44001022	Nioso, dikaatɛ alɛ, otii owo kabuo wo kaamɛ fɛ ɔlaa nwu nkpo kamaa yilatɛ di Saate loo Yesu ɔtaka diɛ bakpi kamɛ. Dikaatɛ alɛ eele otii wɔ niasiɛ ni diikudi loo le mmle kamɛ diɛyɔ ni di obe wɔ diawo ku Yesu buakyɛ buatookyi ni, diɛyɔ di obe wɔ di Yohane latoobuɛ ni Yaa Ntu Okpeesa ɔlaa, diɛlaase ni di obe wɔ di Yaa lakpaa Yesu di ɔkyɛ loo aasifiko ni osi.”
44001023	Nioso baadiki batii banyɔ, mma niale Matias ku Yosef wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Barsaba, baakple baatɔɔlɛɛ nwɔ ni kafɔɔ Yusto.
44001024	-
44001025	Nioso baapɛ ɔlaa baata Yaa alɛ, “Saate loo, afɔ nin-ye otii biala disibu kamɛ. Nioso tuo wo otii wɔ feediki ni baatii ba mmle banyɔ kamɛ alɛ aabla ni ɔkpɛ fɛ tɔkyɛntɛ di Yuda kanya, nwɔ niediɛ ɔkpɛ nɔɔ ɛɛtɛ eesifi ni lɛba le ninlɛ nwɔ ni.”
44001026	Ninfɛ baawii atrebi di batii ba mmle banyɔ disi alɛ boonyu alɛ, owe suoto di batika, ni diatika di Matias suoto nɛ. Nioso baayɔ nwɔ baakyakaa di batii lefosi onwii nwu suoto.
44002001	Nioso obe wɔ di dii le bɔɔlɛɛ ni Pentekoste dii nwu lawo ni yi, bafũbanutɛ bamuu lakyɛ baalaasi lɛɛba ninwii.
44002002	Nfanwu, baanu sɛlɔ sewo lakye osi fɛ mmle di afɛɛfɔ kplɛ nfɛ nii. Ninfɛ sɛɛlɔ nwu nkpo layii leyo le kamɛ baawɛ ni nɛ.
44002003	Ni baanya lɛsaa fɛ ɔtɔ ɔkplalomii labasoo di obiala lɛma suoto nɛ.
44002004	Ninfɛ di Yaa Ninwuna labuo baamuu lɛma kamɛ nɛ, ni baakyako sele ate ate obuɛ fɛ mmle okle di Ninwuna Klekle lata ma ni osuku nɛ.
44002005	Di obe nwu kamɛ, Yuda batii ba ninyɛkɛ ni Yaa niakye ni kayi ka mmle aba aba, lawɛ di Yerusalem.
44002006	Nioso baanu ni sɛlɔ kplɛ nwu, batii kpinwu latoso baakyɛ nfa. Obe wɔ di obiala lɛma lanu alɛ, bafũbanutɛ nwu nkpo, nin-yɛ boobuɛ ma ni sele ate ate yi, diabla ma ɔkpɛ.
44002007	Nioso, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ ma, baakpɔkpɔtɔ kafɔɔ, ni baakyako suoto ɔkaalɛ alɛ, “Batii ba mmle bamuu, diele Galilea batii bale?
44002008	Ni lɛ diɛbla fiɛ buonu ma lɛkakatɛ di sekpoo loo sele kamɛ?
44002009	-
44002010	Bule Partia batii ku Media batii ku Elam batii, ni bawo kafɔɔ lekye Mesopotamia ku Yudea ku Kapadokia ku Ponto ku Asia ku Frigia ku Panfilia ku Egipte ku Libia abaya ninkaako ni Kirene ku bafɔɔ ba niekye ni Roma bale ni Yuda batii ku batii ba nitoobuo ni di Yuda batii akudi kamɛ
44002011	ku Kreta batii ku Arabia batii. Kafɔɔ awo badudu buonu bulɛ boobuɛ Yaa sɛkpɛ kplɛ se ɔɔbla nii, di sele loo kamɛ.”
44002012	Nioso, diabla ma ɔkpɛ baayila ninfa, baatɔɔkaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Ɔmɛnlaa ninle nwɔ nɛ?”
44002013	Kafɔɔ batii bawo niayila ni ninfa lama ma alɛ, “Nta nikosiɛnsa ma diele lɛsalɛsaa.”
44002014	Nfa nfɛ di Petro lataka ayila ku batɔkyɛntɛ lefosi onwii nwu, ni aatakatɛsa sɛlɔ katoo abuɛ alɛ, “Aye Yuda batii ku aye ba ninkpe ni di Yerusalem, komiɛ nlɛ ndiki sɛlaa se mmle kasɔ nta ye, nioso bikyɔɔ mi atoko nwaa.
44002015	Diele nta baatii ba mmle kosiɛ. Aye bamu biɔnya bilɛ olesɛ olomu ɛnaasĩ nintɔɔpɛ.
44002016	Kafɔɔ asaa ya biɔnya ni mmle yi, nnya ninle sɛlaa se di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yoel labuɛ aatɛ nii.
44002017	Aabuɛ alɛ, ‘Yaa lebuɛ alɛ, “Diɛ ayi yɛntɛle kamɛ, kamakyesee Ninwuna nii di batii bamuu suoto. Babi lee suɔtɔbi ku basankobi mabuɛ mi ɔlaa, bakosopo lee kafɔɔ manya awofasaa. Banɔɔfo lee kafɔɔ masɛ alaafɔ.
44002018	Nwaako, diɛ ayi nwu nkpo kamɛ, mayɔ Ninwuna nii nkpee di bakpɛmblatɛ nii, basuɔtɔ ku basanko kamɛ. Bababuɛ mi ɔlaa.
44002019	Ni kafɔɔ matuo atuosaa di osi, mabla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ kaasɔ. Bibanya ntɔ ku ɔtɔ ku kɔyɔ kpinwu ndie.
44002020	Kufĩ makyi kumbla tunutunu, kɔwɛntɛ kafɔɔ masɛɛ fɛ ntɔ. Fiɛ nfɛ di Saate dii kplɛ nwu ku lɛklɛɛyi nwu nkpo kamawa.
44002021	Di obe nwu kamɛ, otii lele niɛlɛɛ Saate diɛ nyaami ɔnya kamɛ mawɛ nkpa.” ’ ”
44002022	Ninfɛ di Petro lakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Israel batii woloo, binu! Yesu Nasaret Otii nwu ninle nwɔ di Yaa ladiki nii. Yaa lafe di suoto nɔɔ aadiki nle mmle aatuo di sɛkpɛ se niabla ni ɔkpɛ ku atuosaa ya aabla aatuo ni ku osie nɔɔ kaamɛ lee, fɛ mmle okle di bamuu lee biye nii.
44002023	Kafɔɔ di Ote omu osuku ɔta kamɛ ku mmle ɛɛtɛ ni kanya, aadiɛ nwɔ aata ye, ni biafe di bakpileblatɛ suoto bialo nwɔ di obe wɔ biapɛ nwɔ sibuɛ biakaasa ni di kowoso suoto.
44002024	Kafɔɔ Yaa lakple aatakatɛsa nwɔ aakyeko bakpi kamɛ, aadie aakye di kukpi nnɛɛ kamɛ, diekye kukpi nkɔnii ditafuo nwɔ omufũ oklee.
44002025	Nioso di Ɔka Dawid labuɛ nwɔ suoto ɔlaa alɛ, ‘Lanya Saate nwu n-yɛ mi di anu obe lele. Ta ayɛ di oletanɛɛkyɛ nii asũ mi ni oso, nɔɔyɛkɛ.
44002026	Ta nle mmle oso, otu nii kamɛ leyii pɔ ku suoto lɛyɔɔ, mayɔ sɛlɔ nii ntansa nwɔ obe lele! Kuntɛ kamakpi yi, kamasiɛ nkpa di osuku onyu kamɛ.
44002027	Diekye flabadiɛ ninwuna nii kafɔɔ disiɛ kuukpi kamɛ. Diɛkyakaa nii, flabatuna falɛ otii klekle lɛfɔ abuu di ɔkya kamɛ.
44002028	Afɔ nietuo mi nkpa lɛfɔ osuku nwu, osiɛ di anu lɛfɔ kafɔɔ ntɛɛ suoto lɛyɔɔ nwaa.’
44002029	“Nioso, babiloo, kɔtɔkɔ ye ntikiti nlɛ, ɔwa loo Dawid lakpi, baakookaa nwɔ, kafɔɔ ɔkya nɔɔ lekple kute wo kaamɛ bia mmiɛ.
44002030	Kafɔɔ Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ aale. Aatofo ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ aaka ntam alɛ, abata Dawid ɔnantii male sɛka fɛ mmle okle di Dawid lale nii.
44002031	Diekye Dawid latofo ni nle mmle aalesa ni katũ oso, aabuɛ aatɛ alɛ, Kristo mataka ankye kukpi kamɛ. Blabadiɛ nwɔ aka kukpi kamɛ, nkpo kafɔɔ diɛ suoto sina nɔɔ dilababuu di ɔkya kamɛ nɛ.
44002032	Yesu wɔ mmle di Yaa lɛtakatɛsa eekyeko bakpi kamɛ nɛ. Ta nwaa ɔlaa kule ni oso, ni baamuu loo buoodiki nwu kayi mumbuɛ nɛ.
44002033	Nunua wɔ mmle yi, Ote Yaa ntɔɔtakatɛsɔɔ katoo, asi diɛ oletanɛɛkyɛ nɔɔ, ni ɛɛyɔ Ninwuna Klekle nɔɔ ɛɛtɔɔ fɛ mmle okle aabuɛ aatɛ nii. Nni aatɔɔyɔ eekpete wo di suoto nɛ. Nioso biɔnya, minnu ɔsaabla wɔ nikɔbla ni ninfũ nɛ.
44002034	-
44002035	Diele Dawid omu niataka aakyɛ osi. Kafɔɔ aabuɛ alɛ, ‘Saate Yaa latɔkɔ Saate nii alɛ, “Siɛ diɛ oletannɛɛkyɛ nii diɛlaase di obe wɔ lɛyɔ balo lɛfɔ lekpee ni di nkpaa lɛfɔ kalɔ.” ’
44002036	Nioso komiɛ nlɛ aye Israel batii bamuu biatofo bilɛ, Yaa niɛbla alɛ Yesu, nwɔ di aye biakaasa ni koowoso suoto bialo ni kale Saate ku nwɔ di Yaa lɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ.”
44002037	Obe wɔ di batii ba mmle lanu ni Petro sɛlaa se mmle yi, diakpanko ma di situ lɛma kamɛ. Nioso baakaalɛ nwɔ ku batɔkyɛntɛ wo nɔɔ alɛ, “Babiloo, blesaa buɔɔbla?”
44002038	Ni di Petro latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Dikpe ni beikyi siitu lee kamɛ biediɛ sikpile ɔbla, biemunikĩi biɛwa Saate nwu nfũ, biefũ Yaa ntu okpeesa nwu di Yesu Kristo leyooto kamɛ, di mmle okle di Yaa kamayɔ sikpile lee ankyɛ ye nii, minfũ ni Yaa Ninwuna Klekle fɛ mmle okle di Saate labuɛ aatɛ nii.
44002039	Diekye ntam be mmle nte dita ye ku babi lee ku mba nimakye ni fanfa ku batii ba bamuu di Saate loo Yaa kamalɛɛ anwako ni ɔkyɛ nɔɔ.”
44002040	Petro lakakatɛ ko ma aaklɛsa, aatikiti ma lekoto, aaka ma abuɛ alɛ, “Bidiki suoto lee bikyeko letokonanfi le nikɔwa ni kamɛ, di miɛ bakpileblatɛ suoto!”
44002041	Nle mmle oso, batii kpinwu kaamɛ lɛma lafũ Petro ɔlaa nwu baanu, ni baakpeesa ma Yaa ntu di Yesu leyooto kamɛ nɛ. Lɛpɔ lɛma kate fɛ batii nkpe ntiɛ. Mma niale mba baayɔ baakyakaa ni di mba niefũ beenu ni suoto dii nwu nɛ.
44002042	Baayɔ obe lɛma omuu baata batɔkyɛntɛ nwu, baatuo ma asaa, baatɔɔpɛ ɔlaa baatɔɔta Yaa, baatɔɔkpɔtɔ kafɔɔ baatoole alesaa, baasiɛ di onwii ɔbla kamɛ.
