44002043	Sɛkpɛ kplɛ se di Yaa labla aafenko ni di batɔkyɛntɛ nwu suoto oso, diabla batii nwu bamuu ɔkpɛ, baayɔ dibu baata Yaa.
44002044	Bafũbanutɛ ba mmle latɔɔkyaka obe lele, baatɔɔsɛko bawo kafɔɔ asaa lɛma.
44002045	Man-yɔ suoto lɛma asaa mansunsũ, man-yɔ koto nwu mansɛ manta ma fɛ mmle diefĩ ni obiala lɛma.
44002046	Baatɔɔkyɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ dii biala, baatoosi kafɔɔ akudi akudi baatoole oko di ayo lɛma ku suoto lɛyɔɔ ku otu biene.
44002047	Baatɔɔpɛ Saate sɛfa, baatɔɔtansa nwɔ kafɔɔ. Nioso batii bamuu layɔ dibu baata ma. Dii biala, Yaa layɔ batii ba niɛwɛ ni didiki aatɔɔkyakaa ma.
44003001	Dii ninwii, Petro ku Yohane lakyɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ di obe wɔ di Yuda batii nkyɛ manaapɛ ɔlaa manta ni Yaa, diabla fɛ kakũ elomu etiɛ kamɛ.
44003002	Obe wɔ baadu ni Yaa Olekatakɔ kayokontũ ka bɔɔlɛɛ ni alɛ, kɔɔlɛ ni onyu, nfa baanya osuɔtɔ onwii lefefee ate diayɔ ni di kalofokɔ nɔɔ kamɛ. Baatii nɔɔ nkpaa nwɔ manaatɛ ninfa dii biala alɛ atɔɔkaalɛ ato di batii ba nikobuo ni Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu.
44003003	Obe wɔ aanya Petro ku Yohane latoobuo ni Olekatakɔ nwu yi, aakaalɛ ma alɛ batikɔɔ koto kowo.
44003004	Ninfɛ bayila baatoonyu nwɔ tuwĩi, ni di Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nyu wo!”
44003005	Ninfɛ di osuɔtɔ nwu latakatɛsa anu aatoonyu ma, aatoonyu osuku alɛ babatikɔɔ lɛsaa nɛ.
44003006	Ni di Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Koto kukunwii diete mi mata fɔ! Kafɔɔ, mata fɔ lɛsaa le ninkpe mi nii! Kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ di Yesu Kristo Nasaret Otii leyooto kamɛ nlɛ, taka faakyɛ!”
44003007	Ninfɛ di Petro lamufũ osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle di koletanɛɛ nɔɔ aatɔɔ aataka aayila. Nfanwu nkpaa ku anankpokufi nɔɔ amuu niawɛ osie.
44003008	Ninfɛ aakple katoo aayefe, aayila di nkpaa nɔɔ suoto nɛ. Ni aakyako ɔkyɛ aatoofenfe, oyeyefe, aatɔɔtansa Yaa nɛ. Ni aatikanko ma aabuo di Yaa Olekatakɔ nwu nɛ.
44003009	Batii ba niawɛ ni ninfa, baanyɔɔ akyɛ, baanu kafɔɔ mmle ɔɔtansa ni Yaa.
44003010	Obe wɔ baatofo alɛ, nnwɔɔ niale ato kaalɛtɛ wɔ niasiɛ ni di Kayoko ka nikɔlɛ ni onyu ɔlɔɔkɔ, diabla ma ɔkpɛ di lɛsaa le niawa nwɔ ni di suoto.
44003011	Nfanwu batii kpinwu latoso baakyɛ ɔkyɛ lɛma di lɛba le baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Salomo lɛkpata kamɛ di Yaa Olekatakɔ. Baakyɛ baalanya alɛ osuɔtɔ nwu nkle Petro ku Yohane kpinkpĩ, ofiɛ nɔɔ ɔyɔɔ kafɔɔ labla ma ɔkpɛ!
44003012	Obe wɔ di Petro lanya ni batii nwu yi, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Israel batii, belɛsaa oso lɛsaa le mmle lɛbla ye ɔkpɛ nkpo, bionyu wo nkpo tuwĩi? Bitannyu bilɛ awo bamu osie ee leklekle loo kanya buɔɔyɔ buɔɔyɔɔsa otii wɔ mmle ofiɛ!
44003013	Diekye Yaa layɔ dibu aata Obi nɔɔ Yesu. Yaa wɔ mmle ninle Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob kafɔɔ Yaa nɛ. Fɛ mmle kafɔɔ ale ni bawa loo Yaa. Nnwɔɔ Obi nɔɔ Yesu di aye biayɔ biata bilɛ balo nɛ. Biasĩ nwɔ kafɔɔ di Pilato anu biabuɛ bilɛ bieye nwɔ, diɛ obe wɔ di Pilato latɛ alɛ see odiɛ nwɔ ni fiɛ.
44003014	Mintɛ Yesu nle otii tinini ku klekletɛ, aye biasĩ nwɔ, ni biatuna bilɛ adiɛ batii lotɛ nwu, aayɔ otii biene nwu ase kaanya nɛ.
44003015	Bialo otii wɔ ninta ni nkpa. Kafɔɔ Yaa lakple aasɛnkɛsa nwɔ aakyeko bakpi kamɛ! Awo bamu buanyɔɔ ku anu loo!
44003016	Di Yesu leyooto kamɛ ni di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle biye ni biɔnya ni ninfũ ntɔɔwɛ difiɛyɔɔ nɛ. Diekye di Yesu ofũ onu kamɛ, ni di Yaa ntɔɔyɔɔ sɔɔ ofiɛ di anu lee nɛ.
44003017	“Babiloo, n-ye nlɛ di ɔtantofo kamɛ ni di aye ku banɔɔfo lee biabla lɛsaa le mmle okle nɛ.
44003018	Kafɔɔ, Yaa labuɛ aafenko di ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nɔɔ suoto kofokofoko alɛ, dikpe nii Kristo nɔɔ lefe diibuo le mmle okle kamɛ. Osuku wɔ suoto eefe ɛɛta ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nɔɔ ɔlaa lɛwa ni kaanya nɛ.
44003019	-
44003020	Nioso, bikyi siikpile ɔbla suoto, bietikanko Yaa, mmle okle aafoto ye ni sikpile di suoto minwɛ ni ɔnyɛɛɔtɛ wɔ niekye ni Yaa nfũ, ta mmle okle aakyesee ye ni Kristo Yesu wɔ eediki ɛɛta ye ni.
44003021	Dikpe nii Yesu lesiɛ di osi diɛlaase di obe wɔ di Ote lelolaa asaa amuu ɛɛtɛ fɛ mmle di ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nɔɔ klekle labuɛ baatɛ ni kofokofoko.
44003022	Fɛ mmle di Mose labuɛ alɛ, ‘Saate lee Yaa madiki ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ onwii ankyeko kamɛ lee fɛ mmle eediki mi nii. Nioso binu nwɔ ɔlaa lele abatɔkɔ ye ni.
44003023	Kafɔɔ otii lele ninanu nwɔ ɔlaa, Yaa madiki nwɔ baatii nɔɔ kamɛ, anwɔɔsɔɔ.’
44003024	“Nwaako, Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ bamuu diɛyɔ ni di Samuel diesifi ni mba niawa ni sɛɛmaa nɔɔ, baabuɛ baatɛ di asaa ya nikɔwa ni di miɛ ayi ya mmle nwu nkpo suoto.
44003025	Yaa wɔ niabla ni kanya ninii le mmle ku bate lee diafe ni di ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nɔɔ suoto. Aye ninle kanya ninii le mmle baletɛ nɛ. Fɛ mmle aatɔkɔ ni Abraham alɛ, diefe ni di ɔnantii nɔɔ suoto, abakusɛkusɛsa kayi ka mmle kamuu.
44003026	Nioso di Yaa ladiki Obi nɔɔ kayi, aaka nwɔ ɔkyɛ lee okyesee, mmle okle aakyakaako ye mindiɛ ni sikpile ɔbla.”
44004001	Obe wɔ di Petro ku Yohane n-yɛ bɔɔkakatɛko ni batii nwu yi, Yaa olebatatɛ bawo ku Yaa Olekatakɔ banyuntɛ ɔnɔɔfo ku Saduki batii bawo kafɔɔ lawa nfa.
44004002	Obe wɔ baanu alɛ Petro ku Yohane lawɛ ninfa bootuo ni asaa di Yesu Ɔtaka suoto, diotuo alɛ bakpi mataka mansiɛ ni nkpa, ɔblɔ lafiɛ ma osie kanya!
44004003	Nioso baamufũ ma. Ta kaale latooloo ni oso, baatɛ ma leeyo kale lasɛ.
44004004	Kafɔɔ, batii ba nianu ni sɛlaa lɛma nwu kasɔ, baafũ ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle baanu. Nioso lɛpɔ lɛma labla fɛ basuɔtɔ nkpe nnɔɔ.
44004005	Obe wɔ kaale lasɛ nii, diawa alɛ Yuda batii batunletɛ bawo ku okpoo banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ lakyaka di Yerusalem.
44004006	Baawa baabasi ku Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo Hana ku Kaiafa ku Yohane ku Aleksandro ku Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo batii nɔɔ bawo kafɔɔ.
44004007	Ninfɛ baakpaa Petro ku Yohane baakyɛnko ma ninfa nɛ. Ninfɛ baakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ɔmɛnsuku suoto biɛbla nle mmle? Owe leyooto ku osie kamɛ biɛbla lɛsaa le mmle okle?”
44004008	Nfanwu, Petro wɔ nieyii ni ku Yaa Ninwuna Klekle lataka aayila aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Batunletɛ loo ku okpoo banɔɔfo,
44004009	se biomiɛ bilɛ bitofo lɛsaa biene le buɔbla buɔta ni otii wɔ ninkpaa lakpi ni ninfũ ku mmle buɔɔyɔɔsɔɔ ni ofiɛ,
44004010	ni kɔta ye mintofo, aye ku Israel batii bamuu nlɛ, di Yesu Kristo Nasaret Otii leyooto kamɛ, nwɔ di aye biatuna baapɛ baakaasa ni di kowoso suoto, kafɔɔ Yaa lakple aasɛnkɛsa nwɔ aakyeko ni kukpi kamɛ, ni di otii wɔ mmle lɛwɛ osie nɛ.
44004011	Nioso Yesu wɔ mmle suoto di Kɔkpana Klekle lakakatɛ alɛ, ‘Difuɔ le baayotofotɛ lesĩ nii, nni nitɔbakple difuɔ le niefũ ni kɔya dilenke ni afuɔ bule nɛ.’
44004012	Lete nɔɔ ninle batii dikitɛ, diekye nnwɔɔ lete di Yaa lɛta leyooto ku osie di batii bamuu kamɛ alɛ aafuo wo ni nkpa ɔta.”
44004013	Obe wɔ baatunletɛ nwu ku banɔɔfo nwu nkpo lanya mmle okle di Petro ku Yohane lakakatɛ ni ku sɛkambi, banaa ni kayilakɔ kukanwii, manan-ye ni kukũ kafɔɔ yi, diabla ma ɔkpɛ. Nfa nfɛ diabudi ma alɛ Yesu basiɛwo baale.
44004014	Kafɔɔ baanya otii wɔ baayɔɔsa ni ofiɛ n-yɛ ni di anu lɛma oso, batafuo ɔlaa kuonwii obuɛ.
44004015	Nioso baata ma baadie di kasikɔ lɛma nwu, ninfɛ baakpee asi baawo nɛ.
44004016	Bawo lakaalɛ alɛ, “Be lɛsaa buabla batii ba mmle? Bulabafuo osĩ bulɛ lɛsaa le bɛɛbla ni diele lɛsaa le niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ, diekye otii biala di Yerusalem nfɛ n-ye, baatoonu kafɔɔ ɔlaa wɔ mmle.
44004017	Kafɔɔ bita bukpee ma kufiofa alɛ blasinkakatɛ bata otii kuonwii di Yesu leyooto kamɛ mmle okle di ɔlaa wɔ mmle dilaasinkpɛ ni.”
44004018	Nioso baakple baalɛɛ ma baawako kasikɔ lɛma, ni baasĩ baata ma alɛ diedie ni di nunua, bataasintɔkɔ otii kuonwii ɔlaa ee batuo asaa di Yesu leyooto kamɛ.
44004019	Ninfɛ di Petro ku Yohane ladiki kanya alɛ, “Aye bamu bibu binyu. Lɛmɛnle nimakpee Yaa suoto lɛyɔɔ? Nse buɔkyɔɔ ye kufiofa atoko ɛɛ, sɛɛ nse buɔkyɔɔ Yaa ɔlaa atoko?
44004020	Asaa ya buɔnya ni ku n-ya buonu nii, bulaafuo kanya ɔmaasa osiɛ kloklo.”
44004021	Nioso banɔɔfotii di kasikɔ nwu lafunaa ma osie kanya ni baadiɛ ma nɛ. Diekye batii bamuu latɔɔtansa Yaa di ɔsaabla nwu suoto, nioso batawɛ lɛsaa le suoto baafe mananfi ma ni kootoko.
44004022	Otii wɔ baayɔɔsa ni ofiɛ ntoofũ alenke alɛɛ afosi ana.
44004023	Di obe wɔ kamɛ baadiɛ ma nii, Petro ku Yohane lasifi bawo lɛma nfũ baalaatɔkɔ ma mmle okle di olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku okpoo banɔɔfo lɛtɔkɔ ma nii.
44004024	Nioso bafũbanutɛ ba mmle bamuu lasi, ni baapɛ ɔlaa baata Yaa alɛ, “O Saate, afɔ wɔ niɛbla ni osi ku kasɔ ku lekpo ku asaa ya amuu ninsi ni kaamɛ.
44004025	Afɔ niafe di Ninwuna Klekle lɛfɔ suoto ni di Ɔwa loo kpɛmblatɛ lɛfɔ Dawid labuɛ alɛ, ‘Be oso di kayi batii kɔta lɛhaa, be oso kafɔɔ baatii kobu asi kpile kasakasa?
44004026	Kayi baka ku batunletɛ lɛbla onwii bayɛ bɔɔkpɛ Saate Yaa ku Kristo nɔɔ.’
44004027	Nwaako ɔlaa kule alɛ Herode ku Pontio Pilato ku Israel batii ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii lesi kanya di okpoo wɔ mmle kamɛ, bɛɛtaka bayɛ di kpɛmblatɛ lɛfɔ klekletɛ Yesu suoto, nwɔ fɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ.
44004028	Kafɔɔ, afɔ, di osie ku ninumbe lɛfɔ kamɛ, faayila faanya falɛ baasi baabla di sɛlaa se faabuɛ faatɛ falɛ sibawa ni kanya.
44004029	O Saate, nunua wɔ mmle nyu lɛyɛkɛ le bɔɔyɔ mankpee wo ni di suoto, faata awo bakpɛmblatɛ lɛfɔ, sɛkambi se buafuo ni ɔlaa lɛfɔ nwu obuɛ.
44004030	Kpanko batii fayɔɔsa ma sifiɛ, faabla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ ku atuosaa kpinwu di Yesu Obi Klekle lɛfɔ leyooto kamɛ.”
44004031	Obe wɔ baapɛ ɔlaa baata Yaa baaloo nii, lɛba le baasi ni latũkũ, Yaa Ninwuna layii bamuu lɛma kamɛ pɔ, ninfɛ baakyako ɔlaa biene nwu obuɛ ku sɛkambi nɛ.
44004032	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, bafũbanutɛ ba mmle bamuu labla onwii di nkpa disiɛbi ku disibu kamɛ, kuonwii lɛma ditanyu lete nɔɔ lele, lɛsaa lele niawɛ olele lɛma diale bamuu lɛma lele.
44004033	Batɔkyɛntɛ ba mmle layie Yaa ɔlaa lɛkya ku otu biene ku osie, diekye ni di Saate Yesu ɔtaka okye baakpi kamɛ suoto. Nioso Yaa dikusɛkusɛ kplɛ lasiɛko bamuu lɛma.
44004034	Kuonwii ditale piitɛ kaamɛ lɛma, diekye mba niawɛ ni ayo ee nsɔ, baayɔ baasunsũ.
44004035	Ni baayɔ ato ya baawɛ ni babakpee di batɔkyɛntɛ nnɛɛ, ni baasɛ baata bamuu lɛma fɛ mmle okle diafĩ ma nii.
44004036	Ni kafɔɔ osuɔtɔ onwii lawɛ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Yosef aakye ni Lewi banantii kamɛ diɛ Kipro kasɔ. Batɔkyɛntɛ latɔɔ leyooto alɛ Barnaba, lɛɛsɔdiki kotuo ni alɛ ɔnyɛɛkpeetɛ.
44004037	Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ aalaayɔ kasɔ nɔɔ aasunsũ aayɔ koto aawako batɔkyɛntɛ nwu.
44005001	Osuɔtɔ onwii kafɔɔ lawɛ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Anania, ku ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ Safira. Mma kafɔɔ baayɔ kasɔ lɛma kawo baasunsũ.
44005002	Kafɔɔ aadiki koto nwu kowo aakookaa, fiɛ aayɔ kubule aawako batɔkyɛntɛ nwu. Ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ Safira kafɔɔ latunako nwɔ.
44005003	Ninfɛ di Petro lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Anania, be oso fɛta Abonsam osuku, ɛɛta fɔ fɛɛlaa fɛɛta Yaa Ninwuna Klekle? Alɛ fandiki kasɔ ka faayɔ faasunsũ ni koto kowo fantɛ?
44005004	Afɔ nimba kasɔ nwu fiɛ faayɔ faasunsũ, koto ko kafɔɔ baata fɔ nii afɔ nimba. Be niata fɔ osuku alɛ faabla disibu kpile le mmle okle? Diele otii fɛɛlaa fɛɛta, kafɔɔ Yaa fɛɛlaa fɛɛta!”
44005005	Nfanwu di Anania lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, aanɔɔ aapɛ kaasɔ, aakpi! Batii ba bamuu nianu nii, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ ma osie kanya.
44005006	Bakosopo ba niasiɛ ma ni kaamɛ layɔ dibula baamiminisa nwɔ baayɔ nwɔ baalaakookaa.
44005007	Di abombo atiɛ kamɛ kamaa, ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ kafɔɔ lawa nfa anan-ye lɛsaa le nintɔɔwa nii.
44005008	Ni di Petro lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Tɔkɔ mi, minko ɔsa lɛfɔ, kasɔ lee ka biayɔ biasunsũ ni koto ko baataye ni, kumuu nɛ?” Ni di ɔsanko nwu labuɛ alɛ, “Yii, kumuu nɛ.”
44005009	Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Be oso minko ɔsa lɛfɔ biɛbla kanya kanwii biɔsɔ Saate Ninwuna minnyu? Nyu, bakosopo ba niɛyɔ ɔsa lɛfɔ bɛɛlaakookaa nii nfɛ n-yɛ kaayokontũ babayɔ afɔ kafɔɔ mansifiko.”
44005010	Nfanwu, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ anɔɔ aapɛ kaasɔ, aakpi. Obe wɔ baakosopo ba mmle lawa babanya alɛ aatookpi ate nii, ni baayɔ nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ baalaakookaa di ɔsa ɔlɔɔkɔ nɛ.
44005011	Nioso lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ mba niefũ beenu ni ku batii ba bamuu nianu ni lɛsaa le niawa nii osie kanya.
44005012	Yaa labla atuosaa ku sɛkpɛ se niabla ni ɔkpɛ aafenko di batɔkyɛntɛ suoto baatii nwu kamɛ. Bafũbanutɛ ba mmle nkyaka di Yuda batii Olekatakɔ kasikɔ ka manlɛɛ ni Salomo Lɛkpata kamɛ.
44005013	Batii ba ninayikyi ni layɔ dibu baata ma, kafɔɔ batafuo otu okpee otoobuo ma kaamɛ.
44005014	Kafɔɔ batii kpinwu basuɔtɔ ku basanko, lakyi siikpile lɛma kamɛ, baafũ Saate baanu.
44005015	Batii bawo layɔ bafiɛtɛ lɛma baatensa di mpa ku sɛkla suoto baalaatɛ diɛ akpaka, di aba ya beefũ beenu alɛ se Petro kofe kunyii nɔɔ makpete ni di bafiɛtɛ nwu suoto sifiɛ nyɔɔ ma nii!
44005016	Baakpaa bafiɛtɛ ku batii ba di anwuna kpile ladiki ni kasiɛ baakyeko sekpoo se niɛmana Yerusalem siekyi ni baawako ɔkyɛ lɛma, baayɔɔsa bamuu kafɔɔ sifiɛ.
44005017	Nioso Yuda batii Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo ku batii nɔɔ ba niekye ni dikudi le bɔɔlɛɛ ni Saduki batii kamɛ, lakye kasɔ baatɔɔkpɛko batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nkpo sɛsɔfɔwo osie kanya.
44005018	Nkpo oso, baamufũ ma baalaatɛ leeyo.
44005019	Kafɔɔ di kakyɛ yi, Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii labasɛkɛtɛ leyo katenkɔ nwu nkpo kayoko aata ma baadie. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ,
44005020	“Bitɔɔkyɛ Yuda batii kasikɔ biɛlaatoobuɛ nkpa fɔle be mmle ɔlaa omuu bita batii!”
44005021	Nioso obe wɔ kaale lasɛ nii, baakyɔɔ Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ ɔlaa atoko, baasifi Yaa Olekatakɔ baalaakyako asaa otuo. Nioso di obe nwu kamɛ, Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo ku bakyakaakotɛ nɔɔ, baalɛɛ bawo ku Yuda batii banɔɔfo baasiisa, ni baakpee batii alɛ balaadiki batɔkyɛntɛ nwu leeyo katenkɔ bawako ma nɛ.
44005022	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ baakyɛ nii, batanya ma! Nioso baakple babatɔkɔ ma alɛ,
44005023	“Buɔɔkyɛ nii, bɛɛsɛɛ leyo nwu kayoko kpa, batii ba nikonyu ni nfa n-yɛ di kayokontũ nwu. Kafɔɔ obe wɔ buɔɔsɛkɛtɛ nii, kuonwii diesi di leyo nwu kamɛ!”
44005024	Di obe wɔ di Yaa Olekatakɔ banyuntɛ ɔnɔɔfo ku Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, otu lakpanko ma nwaa, diekye baaye lɛsaa le kafɔɔ niɛwa ni di batɔkyɛntɛ nwu suoto.
44005025	Ni di otii onwii lawa aabatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Batii ba biemufũ biɛtɛ ni leeyo, nkpe di Yaa Olekatakɔ bootuo batii asaa.”
44005026	Nfanwu basaanyuntɛ nɔɔfo ku batii nɔɔ lataka baakyɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ baalaamufũ ma baawako. Batayɔ osie baakpaa ma, diekye baatɔɔyɛkɛ alɛ, batii nwu masafɔ ma afuɔ.
44005027	Baakpaa batɔkyɛntɛ nwu baawako nii, ni baata ma baayila di Yuda banɔɔfotii anu nɛ. Ni di Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo lakaalɛ ma alɛ,
44005028	“Butakpee ye kufiofa bulɛ bitaasinkple biakakatɛ biata kuonwii di Yesu leyooto kamɛ? Kafɔɔ bitɔɔkpɛnsa ɔlaa wɔ mmle omuu di Yerusalem kamɛ. Biomiɛ bilɛ biyɔ kukpi nɔɔ letokonanfi bitikawo di suoto!”
44005029	Ni di Petro ku batɔkyɛntɛ bamba nwu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Yaa dikpe ni buɔkyɔɔ atoko, diele batii.
44005030	Yesu wɔ biatuna baapɛ baakaasa ni koowoso suoto aakpi nii, di bawaloo Yaa latakatɛsa nwɔ aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ, akpe nkpa.
44005031	Yaa lɛtɔɔ kayilakɔ kplɛ di oletanɛɛkyɛ nɔɔ. Ɛɛyɔ nwɔ ɛɛbla kafɔɔ Tunletɛ ku Dikitɛ alɛ Israel batii kawɛ osuku mankyi di situ lɛma kamɛ, manwɛ sikpile lɛma kafɔɔ ɔyɔɔkyɛ.
44005032	Awo ku Yaa Ninwuna Klekle le ɛɛyɔ ɛɛta ni batii ba nikɔkyɔɔ nwɔ ni kotoko, awo ninle sɛlaa se mmle babuɛtɛ nɛ.”
44005033	Obe wɔ baanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, ɔblɔ lakple kuafiɛ ma nwaa, baamiɛ alɛ boolo batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nkpo.
44005034	Kafɔɔ Farisi otii onwii kaamɛ lɛma baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Gamaliel ditatunako ma. Batii bamuu latoobu osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle nwaa, diekye Mose kufiofa tuotɛ aale. Nnwɔɔ niataka aayila ni aabuɛ alɛ bata batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nkpo badie kɛɛkɛ.
44005035	Ninfɛ aakakatɛ aata ma alɛ, “Israel batii wo nii, bilolaa binyu nwaa di lɛsaa le biomiɛ bilɛ biɔbla ni di batii ba mmle suoto!
44005036	Obe onwii nintɔbafe nii, osuɔtɔ onwii lawɛ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Teuda, labla suoto alɛ, otii finnle ale. Batii alafa ana latikanko nwɔ. Baalo nwɔ nii, batikankotɛ nɔɔ lasamii, dikudi nwu nkpo labiɛ kualoo.
44005037	Nni kamaa, di batii ɔka bee kamɛ, Yuda, nnwɔ niakye ni Galilea lasiisa batii bawo aakyakaa di suoto, baatikanko nwɔ. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ baalo nwɔ, ni baatikankotɛ nɔɔ kafɔɔ lasamii nɛ.
44005038	Nioso ɔlaa wɔ kɔtɔkɔ ye ni ninle alɛ, bidiɛ batii ba mmle baatɔɔkyɛ. Nse asaa ya bootuo ni ku asaa ya bɔɔbla nii, nse mma bamu ɔkpɛ kule, dilabaklɛ fiɛ kubabiɛ.
44005039	Kafɔɔ nse Yaa ɔkpɛ kule, bulɔbafuo ma osuku otĩi. Nse diele nkpo, dii kɔwa bibanya bilɛ Yaa biɛɛtaka biyɛ biɔɔkpɛ ko!”
44005040	Batii nwu kaasikɔ nwu nkpo lafũ Gamaliel ɔlaa nwu baakpee. Nioso, baalɛɛ batɔkyɛntɛ nwu baawako kamɛ lɛma, ni baapɛ ma nɛ. Ni baakple baatɔkɔ ma alɛ bataasimbuɛ ɔlaa kuonwii di Yesu leyooto kamɛ. Ni baadiɛ ma nɛ.
44005041	Kafɔɔ baatoosifi nii, suoto latɔyɔɔ ma nwaa diekye baanya alɛ Yaa lefũ ma eekpee fɛ batii ba beekpee ni sinunsɔ ta Yesu oso.
44005042	Nle mmle sɛmaa, dii biala baakyako asaa otuo baatooyie ɔlaa biene nwu kafɔɔ lɛkya baatoobuɛ di Yaa Olekatakɔ ku batii ayo alɛ, Yesu ninle Dikitɛ nwu.
44006001	Di obe wɔ kamɛ di basaateketetɛ nwu nkpo labakyako ni ɔtɔɔpɔ yi, kananfi labuo di Yuda batii ba nikobuɛ ni Griki sele ku mba nikobuɛ ni Yuda batii sele nntɛɛ. Diekye se bɔɔsɛ dii alesaa, ánwo bakpisɔfɔ ba nikobuɛ ni Griki sele.
44006002	Ta nle mmle oso batɔkyɛntɛ lefosi banyɔ nwu lalɛɛ basaateketetɛ bamuu baasiisa baatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Dikpe nii buɔyɔ obe loo buɔta ɔlaa biene nwu obuɛ diele di alesaa ɔsɛ suoto.
44006003	-
44006004	Nunua, babiloo, binyu biediki basuɔtɔ bakuɛnsĩ ba di Yaa Ninwuna ntika ni di suoto beebe ni anu kaamɛ lee. Buɔɔyɔ ma buse di ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle kanya, alɛ awo kafɔɔ buawɛ obe munta Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu obuɛ ku ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta Yaa.”
44006005	Ɔlaa wɔ mmle lalɛ bamuu lɛma onu, nioso baadiki Stefano otii wɔ ninkpe ni ofũ onu diɛ Yaa Ninwuna leyii nwɔ ni kamɛ pɔ. Baadiki kafɔɔ Filipo ku Prokoro ku Nikanora ku Timona ku Parmena ku osuɔtɔ wɔ niakyi aabla ni Yuda otii baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Nikolao niakye ni Antiokia.
44006006	Batii bakuɛnsĩ ba mmle baadiki baatuo batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nɛ. Ni di mma kafɔɔ baatika ma nnɛɛ baapɛ ɔlaa baata Yaa diisi lɛma, baata ɔkpɛ nwu nkpo ɔbla nɛ.
44006007	Nioso Yaa ɔlaa nwu lakple kuatɔɔkpɛ nwaa. Basaateketetɛ kafɔɔ di Yerusalem lakyako ɔpɔ nwaa. Ni kafɔɔ Yuda batii Yaa olebatatɛ kpinwu lakyi baafũ baanu.
44006008	Stefano, otii wɔ di Yaa lale ni sibualɛ aabla ni sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ ku atuosaa kpinwu aatuo ni baatii nwu kamɛ.
44006009	Ni di Yuda batii dikudi le niale ni balanle batoodiɛ ni baakye ni Kirene ku Aleksandria ku mba niakye ni Kilikia ku Asia baakyako Stefano ɔlaa ɔnanfiko.
44006010	Kafɔɔ kuonwii lɛma diikudi nwu kamɛ ditafuo nwɔ oyilako di lɛkakatɛ nɔɔ kamɛ, ta ninumbe le di Yaa Ninwuna latɔɔ ni oso.
44006011	Nioso baanii kanya ku batii bawo alɛ baalaa mantika nwɔ di suoto alɛ, “Buonu Stefano kɔkakatɛ anyila di Mose ku Yaa suoto.”
44006012	Sɛlaa kuafunu se mmle, lata okpoo banɔɔfo ku kufiofa batuotɛ ku batii ba mmle lanya ɔblɔ nwaa. Nioso bamufũ nwɔ baasifiko kakankɔ lɛma.
44006013	Ni baawako batii bawo, baabalaa baatika di Stefano suoto alɛ, “Obe lele ɔɔkakatɛ anyila di Yaa Olekatakɔ ka mmle klekle ku Mose kufiofa suoto.
44006014	Buonu kafɔɔ oobuɛ alɛ otii wɔ niekye ni Nasaret, bɔɔlɛɛ nwɔ ni Yesu, ababiɛ Yaa Olekatakɔ ka mmle ankyɛlɛnsa kafɔɔ Mose afiofa ya ɛɛta wo nii.”
44006015	Di obe nwu kamɛ, batii ba bamuu niasiɛ ni di kakankɔ nwu lanya alɛ Stefano anu latɔkpa fɛ Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ ale.
44007001	Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo lakaalɛ Stefano alɛ, “Sɛlaa se boobuɛ ni di suoto lɛfɔ ninfũ site nkpo?”
44007002	Stefano ladiki kanya alɛ, “Bate nii ku babiloo, binu. Yaa ladiki leklekle nɔɔ aatuo ɔwa loo Abraham di Mesopotamia kasɔ suoto fiɛ aadie aasifi Haran kasɔ suoto aalaasiɛ.
44007003	Nfa ɔɔtɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Die fadiɛ batii lɛfɔ ku kasɔ lɛfɔ faasifi kasɔ ka matuo fɔ ni!’
44007004	“Nioso aataka aadie di kasɔ nɔɔ suoto aalaasiɛ di Haran diɛlaase di obe wɔ di Ote lakpi nii. Nni kamaa, Yaa lakpaa nwɔ aawako kasɔ ka suoto bisi ni miɛ.
44007005	Yaa ditata Abraham kalekɔ kukanwii ninfa, bia kasɔ nwu kakyɛɛ atabɛ aatɔɔ. Kafɔɔ aatɔkɔ nwɔ aatɛ alɛ, dii lewo kɔwa kasɔ nwu makple nnwɔɔ ku babi kale. Di obe wɔ kamɛ di Yaa latɔkɔ ni Abraham ɔlaa wɔ mmle bia, ayilofo obi kuonwii!
44007006	Nya ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa lakple aatɔkɔ nwɔ aatɛ ni, alɛ, banantii nɔɔ bamuu makple bafɔɔ di batii bawo kasɔ suoto, babakple batii nwu bakpɛmblatɛ mansiɛ ma kafɔɔ lɛɛkpaa kalɔ diibuo kamɛ, di alɛɛ alafa ana kamɛ.
44007007	Ni aakple aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Malo batii ba kasɔ basi bɔɔbla sɛkpɛ manta ma ni lɛpɔɔ. Nni kamaa, babadie kaasɔ nwu suoto manwa mamasumu mi kaasɔ ka mmle suoto busi nii.’
44007008	Ni di Yaa layɔ lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ obudi kanya onii aata Abraham di obe nwu kamɛ fɛ kanya ninii le nimasiɛ ni di nnwɔɔ ku Yaa nntɛɛ ku banantii nɔɔ nɛ. Nioso Abraham lalofo Isak ni aabudi nwɔ lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ di obe wɔ aafũ ni ayi anɛ nɛ. Isak lalofo Yakob ni aabudi nwɔ lɛsɔksɔkɔ nɛ. Ni di Yakob kafɔɔ lalofo babi lefosi banyɔ ba niɛbla ni Yuda batii nfaabi be ninle ni lefosi nfaabi nnyɔ nɛ. Aabudi bamuu kafɔɔ asɔkɔsɔkɔ.
44007009	“Yakob babi ba mmle lasɛɛsa anu di obilɛma Yosef suoto. Baamufũ nwɔ baasunsũ baata batii ba niakpaa nwɔ baasifiko ni Egipte kasɔ suoto. Kafɔɔ Yaa lasiɛko nwɔ,
44007010	aadiki nwɔ aakyeko abuo nɔɔ amuu kamɛ. Yaa latɔɔ ninumbe, aale nwɔ sibualɛ. Nioso Egipte Ɔka Farao lababɔmbɔ nwɔ aayɔ nwɔ aase di Egipte kale kamuu kanya ku leyo nɔɔ asaa kanyayilatɛ.
44007011	“Di obe nwu kamɛ, kɔka kplɛ lakpɛ diɛ Egipte ku Kanaan kasɔ suoto diananfi dibuo diawako bate loo suoto deikye batawɛ alesaa baatoole.
44007012	Nioso obe wɔ di Yakob lanu alɛ alesaa lawɛ ni di Egipte, ni aakpee babi nɔɔ lɛkasale alɛ bakyɛ baalaaya alesaa nwu awo bawako nɛ.
44007013	Obe wɔ di Yakob babi lakple baakyɛ ni nfa lɛnyɔɔfa, alɛ bɔɔlaaya ni alesaa, Yosef ladiki suoto aatuo ma, aadiki ma kafɔɔ aatuo Ɔka Farao.
44007014	Nioso Yosef latɔkɔ ma alɛ se bɛɛkyɛ, baalaakpaa Ote lɛma Yakob ku babi nɔɔ bamuu ku batii lɛma bawako Egipte. Di obe nwu kamɛ, lɛpɔ lɛma kabla fɛ batii afosi akuɛnsĩ batii banɔɔ.
44007015	Nioso Yakob lasifi Egipte aalaasiɛ ninfa dialaadu obe wɔ aakpi nii. Babi nɔɔ kafɔɔ lasiɛ ninfa baalaadu obe wɔ baakpi nii.
44007016	Baakplesa ma baasifiko okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Sekem. Baalaakookaa ma di ɔkya kamɛ kaasɔ ka di Abraham laya ni diɛ Hamor kafaabi nfũ ku koto.
44007017	“Obe wɔ di Yaa ntam be aaka aata ni Abraham nfɛ kɔtɛɛtɛɛ nii, kafaabi loo batii ntɔɔpɔ di Egipte kasɔ.
44007018	Diabawa kafɔɔ alɛ ɔka fɔle Farao wɔ niatoole ni sɛka di Egipte, ditatofo Yosef.
44007019	Ɔka Farao wɔ mmle lakyɔnkyɔ batii loo, aawɛ kafɔɔ disi osie di suoto lɛma, aayila ma di suoto alɛ baayɔ babi lɛma baatooyu alɛ baatookpi.
44007020	“Di obe nwu kamɛ kafɔɔ baalofo Mose nɛ. Ale obi wɔ niatɔɔlɛ ni onyu nwaa. Nioso balofotɛ nɔɔ layɔ nwɔ baalaawofasa leeyo awɛntɛ atiɛ.
44007021	Obe wɔ manamasinfuo nwɔ ni owofasa yi, baadiki nwɔ baase kaayi. Farao obi sankobi lakyɛ aalaafũ nwɔ aaklee nwɔ fɛ nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ kafutu kamɛ obi.
44007022	Baatuo nwɔ Egipte batii ninumbe aamuɔ koni, aabakple otii finle di lɛɛkakatɛ ku sɛkpɛ kpinwu ɔbla kamɛ.
44007023	“Obe wɔ aafũ ni alɛɛ afosi ana, diawa nwɔ disibu alɛ dikpe nii ɛɛkyɛ ɛɛlaanyu Israel batii wo nɔɔ mmle bɔɔbla ma nii.
44007024	Nioso di obe nwu kamɛ aakyɛ ni nfa, aanya Egipte otii kɔbla Israel otii amumu. Nioso Mose lakyɛ aalaafũ nwɔ, aalo kafɔɔ Egipte otii nwu nkpo.
44007025	Mose labu alɛ babilɛma manu kasɔ alɛ, Yaa niekyesee nwɔ alɛ, abadiki ma, kafɔɔ batanu kasɔ nkpo.
44007026	Kaleesɛ, aakple aawa, aanya Israel batii banyɔ kɔkpɛ. Aakyɛ aalaakpanaa ma ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, ‘Binyu, babilɛma bile, nioso diɛɛkaatɛ alɛ biaatɔɔkpɛ nkpo.’
44007027	“Kafɔɔ otii wɔ niatɔɔbla ni obilɛma amumu latukusa Mose, aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Owe niediki fɔ alɛ faayila wo kaanya, fanlewo kantɛ?
44007028	Sɛɛ foomiɛ falɛ faloe fɛ mmle okle faalo ni Egipte otii kɔsa?’
44007029	Di Mose lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ nwɔ nwaa. Nioso aatoso aalaawofa di Midian kasɔ suoto fɛ ɔfɔɔ. Nfa aalofo babi suɔtɔbi banyɔ nɛ.
44007030	“Alɛɛ afosi ana sɛmaa, Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ ladiki suoto aatuo nwɔ di owuufa bibii onwii niatoofiɛ ni ku ɔtɔ di ɔfaafuu kasɔ ka nintɛɛtɛɛ ni Sinai kobokote.
44007031	Obe wɔ di Mose lanya ni nle mmle, diabla nwɔ ɔkpɛ. Aakpukuti aatɛɛtɛɛ alɛ oololaa annyu lɛsaa le dile nii, ni di Yaa lalɛɛ nwɔ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ,
44007032	‘Ami ninle bawa lee Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob Yaa.’ Mose layɛkɛ aakyako otũtũkũ nioso atasinfuo nfa onyu.
44007033	“Ni di Yaa latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, ‘Diki ntokota lɛfɔ! Diekye kasɔ klekle suoto fayɛ.
44007034	Nwaako ntɔɔnya dibuo le kamɛ baatii nii nsi ni di Egipte kasɔ suoto. Diekye ntoonu ma lɛlɛɛ le boowi kaku manlɛɛ mi nii. Nioso ntɔɔwa nlɛ kodiki ma. Wa, ninkpee fɔ Egipte.’
44007035	“Mose wɔ mmle niale otii wɔ di Israel babi lasĩ baakakatɛ nwɔ di suoto alɛ, ‘Owe niɛbla fɔ kanyayilatɛ loo ku kantɛ?’ Nnwɔɔ Mose nwu, di Yaa lakpee alɛ akyɛ aalaayila ma kaanya, aale ma dikitɛ diefe ni di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ wɔ aadiki aatuo nwɔ ni lɛkyakaako kamɛ, diɛ ɔtɔ wɔ niatoofiɛ ni di owuufa kamɛ nɛ.
44007036	Aakpaa ma aadieko di Egipte diefe ni sɛkpɛ se niabla ni ɔkpɛ kamɛ, diɛ Egipte ku lekpo sɛɛle kotoko ku obe wɔ baatɔɔkyɛ ni di ɔfaafuu kamɛ alɛɛ afosi ana amu.
44007037	“Mose wɔ mmle omu niatɔkɔ Israel batii alɛ, ‘Yaa makyesee ye ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ onwii ankyeko kamɛ lee fɛ mmle eediki mi nii. Abadiki nwɔ ankyeko banantii lee kamɛ.’
44007038	Mose niale otii wɔ niasiisa ni bawa loo di obe wɔ kamɛ di Israel batii lawɛ ni di ɔfaafuu kamɛ. Nnwɔɔ niale otii wɔ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ lakakatɛko ni di Sinai kobokote osi nɛ. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ niafũ Yaa ɔlaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa aawako wo nɛ.
44007039	“Kafɔɔ, bawa loo ditakyɔɔ Mose ɔlaa atoko. Baasĩ nwɔ baamiɛ alɛ bookple mansifi Egipte kasɔ suoto.
44007040	Nioso baatɔkɔ Mose obilɛma Aaron alɛ, ‘Bla Yaa bamba fata wo, nnwɔ nimakpaa wo ni, diekye buoye lɛsaa le nintɔɔwa ni di Mose wɔ niɛkpaa wo eedieko ni di Egipte kasɔ.’
44007041	Nfa nfɛ bɔɔbla afiɔ fɛ nankyue, ni baatɔɔta nya ole nɛ, baale dii kafɔɔ ku suoto lɛyɔɔ baata lɛsaa le di mma bamu baabla nii.
44007042	Ta nle mmle oso Yaa lakple ma kaamaa aadiɛ ma. Nioso baawɛ ninfa baatɔɔtɔ kufĩ ku awɛntrɛbi. Fɛ mmle di Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ lakpana ni di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, ‘Israel batii, diele ami biayɔ babɔkɛɛ biata ole, alɛɛ afosi ana ya biawɛ ni di ɔfaafuu kamɛ.
44007043	Kafɔɔ biayɔ Molok akpanta ku Ronfa awɛntrɛbi afiɔ biabla biatɔɔta ole. Nioso kamata mammufũ bamuu lee balanle mankpaa ye mansifiko Babilon sɛmaa fanfa.’
44007044	“Bawa loo layɔ Yaa akpanta baaklee di ɔfaafuu kamɛ diotuo alɛ asiko ma nii. Baabla nya di letembi le kamɛ di Yaa ladiki aatuo ni Mose alɛ abla nii.
44007045	Ni sɛmaa bawa loo ba niafũ ni akpanta nwu di bate lɛma nfũ laklee nya di obe wɔ di Yosua lakpaa ma baalaakpɛko ni batii ba di Yaa latososa ni kaasɔ ka mmle suoto. Nfa baablako akpanta ya mmle ɔkpɛ dialaase di ɔka Dawid obe kamɛ nɛ.
44007046	Yaa lakyakaako Dawid nwaa. Nioso Dawid lakaalɛ Yaa alɛ aatɔɔ osuku aatofo kasiɛkɔ ata nnwɔɔ Yakob Yaa.
44007047	Kafɔɔ, Salomo nfɛ niabatofo kasiɛkɔ nwu.
44007048	“Kafɔɔ Yaa wɔ ninlenke nii, ninsiɛ di leyo le kamɛ batii lɛyɔ nnɛɛ beetofo nii. Yaa labuɛ aafenko di ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ nɔɔ suoto alɛ,
44007049	‘Osi ninle mi lɛkakpomii, kasɔ kafɔɔ ninle mi nkpaa kasekɔ. Lɛmɛnyo okle biafuo mi otofo ɔta? Ee ɔfɛ ninle nfũ kasiɛ ni?
44007050	Diele ami niɛbla asaa amuu?’ ”
44007051	Ni di Stefano lakple aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Batokopĩtɛ bile nwaako! Situ lee nkpe osie di Yaa suoto. Biesĩ Yaa ɔlaa kafɔɔ onu fɛ mmle baate lee labla nii. Obe lele biɔtaka minyila di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle suoto.
44007052	Ɔmɛ Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ di bawa lee ditamiɛ alɛ boolo? Baalo Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛ ba niabuɛ alɛ Tininitɛ wɔ aapɛ ni ɔfɔɔ kɔwa nii. Tininitɛ nwu nkpo kafɔɔ biediɛ biɛta, bɛɛyɔ nwɔ beelo nɛ.
44007053	Aye ninle batii ba niafũ ni Yaa kufiofa nwu nkpo biakyeko ni Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ, kafɔɔ biesĩ kufiofa nwu ole.”
44007054	Obe wɔ baanu ni Stefano sɛlaa se aabuɛ nii, ɔblɔ lafiɛ ma baakyako anyɛɛ owee okpee nwɔ.
44007055	Kafɔɔ ta Yaa Ninwuna Klekle le niayii ni Stefano kamɛ pɔ oso, aatakatɛsa anu aanyu osi, ni aanya Yaa lɛkpa ku Yesu n-yɛ di Yaa oletanɛɛkyɛ nɛ.
44007056	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Binyu! Kɔnya Yaa Kafa lɛsɛkɛtɛ, Otii Obi nwu nkpo n-yɛ di Yaa oletanɛɛkyɛ!”
44007057	Ni baayiisa kudu osie kanya, baayɔ nnɛɛ baatĩi atoko lɛma, ni baatu wididi baamufũ nwɔ nɛ.
44007058	Baananfi nwɔ baadiki di okpoo, ni baakyako nwɔ afuɔ ɔsafɔ nɛ. Batii ba niananfi nwɔ baadieko ni ladiki awu lɛma baatɛ di okosopo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Saulo ɔkyɛ.
44007059	Obe wɔ kamɛ bɔɔsafɔ nwɔ ni afuɔ, Stefano lalɛɛ Yaa aabuɛ alɛ, “Saate Yesu, fũ ninwuna nii!”
44007060	Ni aapɛ akunkyi aafaa osie kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Saate, tanta ma okpile wɔ mmle koto, feenu!” Aabuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle aaloo nii, ni aakpi nɛ.
44008001	Saulo latuna di Stefano olo suoto. Diayɔ ni di dii nwu nkpo, ni baakye kasɔ baatootikanko batii ba niafũ baanu ni di Yerusalem, ni baatoso baasifi Yudea ku Samaria nɛ. Kafɔɔ batɔkyɛntɛ nwu lasiɛ di Yerusalem.
44008002	Yesu bafũbanutɛ bawo layɔ Stefano baawi ku sɛnyaami baalaakookaa.
44008003	Saulo layɔ aatika di suoto osie kanya, aatoomiina mba niefũ beenu nii, aatookyi ayo aatoomufũ basuɔtɔ ku basanko aalaatɔɔtɛ leeyo katenkɔ.
44008004	Mba niafũ baanu ni latoso baadie di Yerusalem, baakyɛ baatokyi kakɔ biala baatobuɛ Saate ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo.
44008005	Filipo lakyɛ Samaria okpoo kplɛ onwii aalaabuɛ Kristo ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo aatɔkɔ batii.
44008006	Batii kpinwu lakyɔɔ nwɔ ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ ni atoko, diekye baanya sɛkpɛ kplɛ se aabla aatuo nii.
44008007	Aatososa anwuna kpile di batii kpinwu kamɛ, anwuna kpile ya mmle layiisa adu osie kanya fiɛ aadie. Aayɔɔsa kafɔɔ batii ba niakpi ni kakyɛkakyɛ sifiɛ ku mba di nnɛɛ ku nkpaa lakpi nii.
44008008	Nle mmle oso, suoto lɛyɔɔ lawɛ di Samaria okpoo kamɛ nwaa!
44008009	Osuɔtɔ onwii lawɛ di Samaria baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Simon, aale otii wɔ niaklee ni afa nwaa. Di obe kpinwu kamɛ, aayɔ afa nɔɔ nwu aatɔɔbla sɛkpɛ kplɛ se niabla ni batii ɔkpɛ. Nioso aanyu alɛ sientɛ owo ale.
44008010	Samaria banɔɔfo ku babisɔ bamuu mbu nwɔ, diekye di sɛkpɛ se ɔɔbla antuo ni oso. Nioso mambuɛ di suoto nɔɔ alɛ, “Nnwɔɔ ninle Yaa kafa osie wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni osie kplɛ nɛ.”
44008011	Di afa nɔɔ ɔbla labla ma ni ɔkpɛ di obe kpinwu kamɛ oso, mankyɔɔ nwɔ ɔlaa atoko.
44008012	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ baafũ Filipo ɔlaa biene wɔ aabuɛ ni di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ ku Yesu Kristo suoto baanu nii, basuɔtɔ ku basanko lafũ Yaa ntu okpeesa di Yesu Kristo leyooto kamɛ.
44008013	Simon omu kafɔɔ lafũ aanu. Aafũ ni Yaa ntu okpeesa nwu nkpo, aatikanko Filipo kakɔ lele oofe. Aanya ni sɛkpɛ kplɛ ku atuosaa ya niatikanko nii, diabla nwɔ ɔkpɛ!
44008014	Nioso obe wɔ di batɔkyɛntɛ nwu di Yerusalem lanu alɛ Samaria batii ntoofũ Yaa ɔlaa beenu nii, baakyesee Petro ku Yohane ɔkyɛ lɛma.
44008015	Baalaabuo nii, baapɛ ɔlaa baata Yaa di mba niafũ baanu ni suoto alɛ baafũ Yaa Ninwuna Klekle.
44008016	Diekye di obe nwu kamɛ, bayifũ Yaa Ninwuna Klekle, dilenke Yaa ntu be baakpeesa ma in di Saate Yesu leyooto kamɛ.
44008017	Nioso, Petro ku Yohane latika ma nnɛɛ di suoto, ni baafũ Yaa Ninwuna Klekle nɛ.
44008018	Di Simon lanya alɛ batɔkyɛntɛ latika mba niafũ baanu ni nnɛɛ baafũ ni Yaa Ninwuna Klekle, ni aayɔ koto alɛ ɔɔta Petro ku Yohane nɛ,
44008019	ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Amii bitɛɛ osie nwu owo alɛ nse letika otii lele kɔnɛɛ, abafũ Yaa Ninwuna Klekle nwu.”
44008020	Kafɔɔ Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Minko koto lɛfɔ bibawɔɔ! Feenyu falɛ faafuo Yaa lɛtasaa ɔya ku koto?
44008021	Kablakɔ ee kalekɔ kukanwii nnaa fɔ di ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle kamɛ, diekye otu lɛfɔ diɛkpa di Yaa anu.
44008022	Diɛ disibu kpile le mmle, faapɛ ɔlaa fata Saate. Loobia abayɔ okpile lɛfɔ ankyɛ fɔ di disibu kpile le mmle suoto.
44008023	Diekye lɛnya nlɛ fakpe onumbɛbɛɛ, mmia kafɔɔ okpile ntoole fɔ otu kamɛ!”
44008024	Ninfɛ di Simon latɔkɔ Petro ku Yohane alɛ, “Bipɛ ɔlaa bita Saate bitikiti lekoto di diisi nii, alɛ sɛlaa se biebuɛ ni dilaawa di suoto nii!”
44008025	Di obe wɔ di Petro ku Yohane ntoloo ni Yaa ɔkpɛ ku ɔlaa biene lɛkya oyie di Samaria, baakple baasifi Yerusalem, bafe kafɔɔ di Samaria sekpoo kpinwu kamɛ baabuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu.
44008026	Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii latɔkɔ Filipo alɛ, “Taka faatɔɔkyɛ ɔfaafuu osuku wɔ niekye ni Yerusalem kuosoo kuosifi ni Gasa.”
44008027	Nioso aataka aasifi osuku nwu suoto. Aatoofe nii, aakyakako ɔnɔɔfotii wɔ ninnyu ni Etiopia ɔka sanko wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Kandake akesinɔsaa, lekye Yerusalem Yaa ɔlaa kapɛkɔ.
44008028	Obe wɔ aatoofe ni leyo, asiɛ di keke wɔ di bapɔnkɔ nnanfi ni kamɛ, aatɔɔka Kɔkpana Klekle di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia lɛkpana nii.
44008029	Nioso Yaa Ninwuna Klekle latɔkɔ Filipo alɛ, “Tɔɔkyɛ, faalaatikanko bapɔnkɔ keke nwu nkpo.”
44008030	Filipo latoso aakyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, ni aanu alɛ ɔnɔɔfo nwu nkpo kɔka Yesaia kukũ nɛ. Ni aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Foonu asaa ya fɔɔka ni kasɔ?”
44008031	Ni di ɔnɔɔfo nwu ladiki kanya alɛ, “Oowo, lɛ kabla kanu kasɔ di otii kuonwii nnaa aadiki kasɔ antɛɛ ni?” Nioso aatikiti Filipo lekoto alɛ, abuo di keke nwu nkpo kamɛ, aasiɛ nwɔ di ɔlɔɔkɔ.
44008032	Sɛlaa se aatɔɔka ni di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ nwu kamɛ niale alɛ, “Bɛɛkpaa nwɔ fɛ foso boofenko olo, ee fɛ lefosobi le di saate konwiɛ nwɔ ni sinwini ate ni kloklo, nkpo kafɔɔ atabuɛ ɔlaa nɛ.
44008033	Baawakosa nwɔ kasɔ, kuonwii kafɔɔ ditaka aatɔɔ. Kuonwii dilabafuo ɔlaa kuonwii obuɛ di banantii nɔɔ suoto, diekye baadiki nwɔ nkpa kaasɔ ka mmle suoto.”
44008034	Ɔnɔɔfo nwu lakaalɛ Filipo alɛ, “Lekoto tɔkɔ mi, owe suoto di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia kɔkakatɛ? Suoto nɔɔ alakaɛɛ sɛ otii bamba alaka?”
44008035	Nioso Filipo lakye kasɔ aakakatɛ. Aakye kasɔ di Yaa ɔlaa wɔ mmle suoto, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ ɔlaa biene wɔ niekye ni Yesu suoto nɛ.
44008036	-
44008037	Obe wɔ bakyɛ ni di osuku nwu suoto boosifi nii, baadu lɛba ninwii di ntu nte nii. Ni di ɔnɔɔfo nwu latɔkɔ Filipo alɛ, “Nya ntu nwo. Be nikatĩi mi osuku alɛ, naafũ Yaa ntu okpesa nwu nkpo?” Ni di Filipo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nse feefũ feenu ku otu lɛfɔ omuu, faafuo ofũ.”
44008038	Ni di ɔnɔɔfo nwu labuɛ alɛ, “Lefũ Yesu Kristo lenu nlɛ Yaa Obi ale.” Nioso aayilasa keke nwu di pɔnkɔ kɔnanfi nii, ni baabuo di ntu nwu kamɛ nɛ, ni di Filipo lakpeesa nwɔ Yaa ntu di Yesu Kristo leyooto kamɛ nɛ.
44008039	Obe wɔ kamɛ baadie ni di ntu nwu kamɛ, Saate Ninwuna lakpaa Filipo aasifiko. Ɔnɔɔfo wɔ mmle ditasinkple aanyɔɔ. Kafɔɔ lete nɔɔ aasifi ku suoto lɛyɔɔ.
44008040	Obe wɔ di Filipo latofo nii, atɔlaadie di Asoto okpoo kamɛ. Aadie ni ninfa aatoosifi nii, aatoobuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu di sekpoo se ninkpe ni di osuku, dialaase di obe wɔ aabuo ni Kaesarea okpoo kamɛ.
44009001	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Saulo latikanko Saate basaateketetɛ ku ninunsɛɛ alɛ oolo ma. Ni aakyɛ Yuda batii Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo nfũ,
44009002	ni aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ atɔɔ akũ ya nimatɔɔ ni osie an-yɔ anklee antɔɔkyɛ ni Yuda batii nsiisakɔ di Damasko anatoomufũ ni basuɔtɔ ku basanko ba nintikanko ni ofũ onu fɔle nwu anwako ni Yerusalem.
44009003	Di obe wɔ nfɛ ɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ ni Damasko, nfanwu ɔtɔ onwii lamunaa kuakye osi kuamana nwɔ kuakyi.
44009004	Ni anɔɔ aapɛ kaasɔ nɛ. Ni aanu sɛlɔ sewo kɔkaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saulo, Saulo, be oso fatikankoe nkpo?”
44009005	Ni di Saulo lakaalɛ alɛ, “Saate, owe fale?” Ni sɛɛlɔ nwu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ami ninle Yesu wɔ fatikanko ni osie kanya nɛ.
44009006	Kafɔɔ, taka faatɔɔkyɛ okpoo kamɛ. Babatɔkɔ fɔ lɛɛsaa le dikpe ni fɛɛbla nii.”
44009007	Basuɔtɔ ba niatikanko ni Saulo, baayila batabuɛ ɔlaa kuonwii. Baanu sɛlɔ kafɔɔ batanya otii kuonwii.
44009008	Di Saulo lataka aayila aatikiti ni anu, oloosinnya. Nioso baaklee nwɔ di kɔnɛɛ baabuoko Damasko okpoo kamɛ.
44009009	Nioso aasiɛ ninfa ayi atiɛ ɔlɔɔnya, atale alesaa, atanyi ntu kafɔɔ.
44009010	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, bafũbanutɛ onwii lawɛ di Damasko, nwɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Anania. Saate ladiki suoto aatuo nwɔ ni aalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Anania!” Ni aatuna aabuɛ alɛ, “Teete, nnyɛ!”
44009011	Ni di Saate labuɛ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Taka, faatɔɔkyɛ osuku wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni osuku tinini suoto, faakyɛ Yuda leyo, faakaalɛ osuɔtɔ wɔ niekye ni Tarso bɔɔlɛɛ ni Saulo, akpe ninfa ɔɔpɛ ɔlaa anta Yaa.
44009012	Diekye ntoodiki letuo nwɔ nlɛ osuɔtɔ wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Anania lɛwa ɛɛbatika nwɔ nnɛɛ alɛ aakple antɔɔnya.”
44009013	Ninfɛ di Anania ladiki kanya abuɛ alɛ, “Saate, ntoonu kpinwu asaa kpile ya di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle ntɔɔbla ni bafũbanutɛ lɛfɔ di Yerusalem!
44009014	Lenu kafɔɔ alɛ eefũ osie kukũ eekyeko Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo nfũ alɛ aamufũ bafũbanutɛ lɛfɔ bamuu di Damasko!”
44009015	Kafɔɔ Saate latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tɔɔkyɛ falaabla fɛ mmle lɛtɔkɔ fɔ ni. Diekye ntoodiki Saulo fɛ otii nii wɔ nimayɔ ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo ankyɛnko ni mba ninanle ni Israel batii ku baka anu ku Israel batii bamuu.
44009016	Ami omu matuo nwɔ mmle okle dikpe ni diebuo nwɔ ni ta ami oso.”
44009017	Nioso Anania lakyɛ aalaabuo leyo le di Saulo lawɛ nii, ni aatika nwɔ nnɛɛ di suoto nɛ, ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Obiloo Saulo, Saate Yesu wɔ niadiki suoto aatuo fɔ ni di osuku, nnwɔɔ niekpee mi ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ alɛ faakple faanya, fanfũ kafɔɔ Yaa Ninwuna kaamɛ lɛfɔ.”
44009018	Nfanwu, diabla Saulo fɛle apoo awo niefiɛ nwɔ di anu suoto, niakple aakyako ɔnya nɛ. Ninfɛ aataka aata baakpeesa nwɔ Yaa ntu nɛ.
44009019	Ninfɛ aale alesaa nɛ, niakple aawɛ osie nɛ. Nioso Saulo lasiɛ di bafũbanutɛ nwu nfũ di Damasko ayi asɛɛ.
44009020	Nfanwu aasifi Yuda batii nsiisakɔ aalaatobuɛ alɛ Yesu ninle Yaa Obi.
44009021	Nioso batii ba bamuu nianu nwɔ ni ɔlaa, diabla ma ɔkpɛ. Ni baakaalɛ bawo alɛ, “Diele osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle niatoolo Yesu wɔ mmle batikankotɛ di Yerusalem nɛ? Nioso kafɔɔ ɛɛwa nfũ alɛ ɔɔbamufũ bafũbanutɛ, ankpaa ma ankyɛnko olebatatɛ banɔɔfo.”
44009022	Saulo lawɛ osie di ɔlaa wɔ mmle obuɛ kamɛ. Nioso Yuda batii ba niawɛ ni di Damasko ditafuo ɔlaa kuonwii obuɛ. Diekye aakpasa kamɛ klekle aatuo alɛ Yesu ninle Kristo.
44009023	Ayi awo sɛmaa, Yuda batii lalɛɛ bawo baabla disibu alɛ babalo Saulo.
44009024	Kafɔɔ batii bawo lawa babatɔkɔ Saulo alɛ, boomiɛ alɛ balo nwɔ. Kakũ ku kakyɛ, balo nɔɔ latooyila baatoonyu nyoko be manfe mambuo ni okpoo nwu kamɛ, mmle baawɛ nwɔ manlo nii.
44009025	Nioso di nkyɛntɛɛ, batii nɔɔ ba niafũ baanu ni layɔ nwɔ baakpee di kakyikyɛ kamɛ baafenko di oyoyiɛ kutuɛ baasoosa nwɔ baase kaasɔ.
44009026	Saulo lakyɛ aalaabuo Yerusalem, aamiɛ alɛ oobuo di mba niafũ baanu ni kamɛ ninfa, kafɔɔ batafũ nwɔ baanu alɛ atookyi, nioso baatɔɔyɛkɛ nwɔ.
44009027	Nioso Barnaba lakpaa nwɔ aakyɛnko batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nfũ, ni aatɔkɔ ma mmle di Saulo ntɔɔnya ni Saate di obe wɔ aatoofe ni Damasko. Aatɔkɔ ma kafɔɔ ɔlaa wɔ di Saate latɔkɔ nwɔ nii, ku mmle di Saulo labuɛ ni ɔlaa biene nwu di Yesu leyooto kamɛ di Damasko ku sɛkambi.
44009028	Nioso baafũ nwɔ baakpee kaamɛ lɛma. Diayɔ ni di obe nwu kamɛ, aasiɛ ma kaamɛ, obe lele aatoobuɛ Yaa ɔlaa di Yerusalem ku sɛkambi.
44009029	Yuda batii ba nimbuɛ ni Griki sele ku Saulo labuo sɛɛlaa sewo kamɛ baanyu, kafɔɔ baamiɛ alɛ boolo nwɔ.
44009030	Nioso obe wɔ di bafũbanutɛ bawo lanu alɛ batii ba mmle komiɛ alɛ balo nwɔ nii, baakpaa nwɔ baasifiko Kaesarea, ni baakyesee nwɔ aasifi Tarso nɛ.
44009031	Di obe wɔ mmle kamɛ, diefe ni di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle lɛkyakako kamɛ oso, bafũbanutɛ ba niawɛ ni di Yudea ku Galilea ku Samaria kasɔ suoto yi, atoko lakyɛ ma ole, batasintɔɔyɛkɛ. Nioso baabapɔ, baayɔ dibu kafɔɔ baata Saate nwu.
44009032	Petro lakyɛ aatookyi aatoonyu Kristo batii bamuu, diɛ osuku nɔɔ ɔkyɛ kamɛ, aakyɛ aalaanyu bafũbanutɛ ba niawɛ ni di okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Lida.
44009033	Nfa aanya osuɔtɔ onwii baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Ainea, eefefee ate di ɔkla oloofuo ɔtaka alɛɛ anɛ amu.
44009034	Obe wɔ di Petro lanyɔɔ nii, aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ainea, nyu! Yesu Kristo ntɔɔyɔɔsa fɔ ofiɛ! Taka fayila! Faatakatɛsa ɔkla lɛfɔ.” Nfanwu aasie aataka aayila.
44009035	Batii ba bamuu niawɛ ni di Lida ku Saron okpoo kamɛ, lanya Ainea nkyɛ nii, baayɔ nkpa lɛma baata Saate.
44009036	Ɔsanko onwii lawɛ di Yopa baatɔɔlɛɛ nwɔ Tabita. Di Griki sele kamɛ, baatɔɔlɛɛ nwɔ Dorka, kasɔ ninle alɛ káfɛ. Aale otii wɔ niafũ aanu nii, aatɔɔbla sifutulɛ aatɔɔta bapiitɛ obe lele.
44009037	Diawa alɛ ofiɛ lapɛ nwɔ aakpi. Nioso basiɛwo nɔɔ lakpeesa nwɔ ntu, baalolaa nwɔ baatɛ di ayo ya beetofo beetika ni baawo ninwii kamɛ di osi.
44009038	Nioso obe wɔ baanu alɛ Petro ntɔɔwa akpe ni di Lida, diɛ Lida lɛtɛɛtɛɛ ni Yopa oso, baakpee batii banyɔ alɛ balatikiti nwɔ lekoto aatikanko ma nkpaa nkpaa awa Yopa.
44009039	Nioso Petro lataka aatikanko ma, baalaabuo nii, baakpaa nwɔ baasifiko leyo le osi di Dorka late nii. Bakpisɔfɔ ba niawɛ ni ninfa bamuu baamana Petro baakyi boowi kaku. Baaklee awu ya di Dorka lakaa ni aawɛ ni nkpa baatootuo nwɔ.
44009040	Nioso Petro latɔkɔ bamuu alɛ badie di leyo nwu kamɛ, ni aapɛ akunkyi aapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa nɛ. Ninfɛ aamunikĩi aanyu Dorka kpi, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Tabita, taka!” Nfanwu ni aatikiti anu nɛ. Aanya ni Petro ni aataka aasiɛ nɛ.
44009041	Ninfɛ di Petro lakyɔɔ nwɔ kɔnɛɛ nɛ, ni di nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ aakpee nwɔ kole nwɔ ni aataka aayila nɛ. Ninfɛ di Petro lakple aalɛɛ bafũbanutɛ nwu ku bakpisɔfɔ nwu aawako nɛ. Ninfɛ aayɔ nwɔ akpe ni nkpa, aakpee ma di nnɛɛ nɛ.
44009042	Nioso ɔlaa wɔ mmle lakyaka okpoo nwu kamɛ, ni baatii kpinwu lafũ Saate baanu nɛ.
44009043	Nni kamaa, Petro lasiɛ di Yopa okpoo ayi awo diɛ osuɔtɔ wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Simon nfũ, nwɔ niatɔɔbla ni babɔkɛɛ akũ ɔkpɛ.
44010001	Di obe nwu kamɛ, osuɔtɔ onwii lawɛ di Kaesarea okpoo kamɛ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Kornelio. Aale kakpɛ kanyayilatɛ di Roma bakpɛtɛ ba manlɛɛ ni Italia bakpɛtɛ.
44010002	Aale Yaa yɛkɛtɛ, nnwɔɔ ku leyo nɔɔ batii bamuu n-yɔ dibu manta Yaa. Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle layɔ otu nɔɔ omuu aabla dibiene aata batii, ambɔmbɔ ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta Yaa kafɔɔ.
44010003	Dii ninwii kakũ elomu etiɛ kamɛ, aanya odiki otuo. Di odiki otuo nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, aanya Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii lawa nwɔ ɔkyɛ, ni aalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Kornelio!”
44010004	Di Kornelio lanyɔɔ nii, lɛyɛkɛ lamufũ nwɔ nwaa. Ni aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate, be dile?” Ninfɛ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ wɔ mmle latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Sifutulɛ ku ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta Yaa lɛfɔ, ntoodu Yaa nfũ. Nioso atɔɔwa fɔ onyuma.
44010005	Kpee batii bawo baakyɛ Yopa baalaalɛɛ otii wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Simon Petro bawako fɔ.
44010006	Akpe diɛ Simon leyo, nwɔ ninsi ni di lekpo ɔlɔɔkɔ, ɔɔbla ni babɔkɛɛ akũ ɔkpɛ.”
44010007	Obe wɔ di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu lasifi nii, Kornelio lalɛɛ bakpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ banyɔ ku kpɛtɛ nɔɔ onwii, nwɔ ninyila annyu nwɔ nii, ale ni Yaa yɛkɛtɛ.
44010008	Ni aatɔkɔ ma lɛsaa le niawa nii, ni aakpee ma alɛ bakyɛ Yopa.
44010009	Kaale lasɛ nii, baakyɛ ni di osuku boofe nii, nfɛ bɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ ni okpoo nwu, Petro layie aakyɛ leyo le asi ni nsintɛɛ di kakũ alɛ ɔɔlaapɛ ɔlaa anta Yaa.
44010010	Kɔka laklee nwɔ, aatoomiɛ lɛsaa alɛ oole, obe wɔ baatɔɔwa ni alesaa nwu, aanya odiki otuo.
44010011	Aanya osi lasɛkɛtɛ, ni aanya lɛsaa fɛ dibula fututu kplɛ bɛɛpɛ ni akpa sɛɛnya nɔɔ ana nwu nkpo kosoo ninwa kasɔ.
44010012	Di dibula le mmle kamɛ yi, babɔkɛɛ ate ate kpinwu ku basaanwu ku bakansiɛ lasiɛ kaamɛ.
44010013	Ninfɛ aanu sɛlɔ sinwii latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Petro, taka! Faalo fawee.”
44010014	Kafɔɔ Petro labuɛ alɛ, “Oowo, Saate! Diidii ninwee babɔkɛɛ ba di awo Yuda batii munanle ni, munankpanko ni kafɔɔ!”
44010015	Sɛlɔ se mmle lakple siatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Lɛsaale di Yaa ntookleklesa nii, tansinnyu falɛ dieklekle!”
44010016	Aanya odiki otuo wɔ mmle sitiɛ simu. Ditiɛfa kamaa baayɔ dibula nwu nkpo baasifiko osi.
44010017	Obe wɔ di Petro latoobu ni diisi, ɔɔkaalɛɛ suoto alɛ be di odiki otuo wɔ mmle kutuo ni yi, nfanwu batii ba di Kornelio lakpee ni okpoo nwu ntɔɔkaalɛ bɛɛnya Simon leyo, nfɛ bayɛ kafɔɔ di kayokontũ.
44010018	Baalɛɛ baakaalɛ alɛ ɔfɔɔ owo nkpe ninfũ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Simon Petro?
44010019	Di Petro lasiɛ oobu disi alɛ oonu ni odiki otuo nwu kasɔ yi, ni di Yaa Ninwuna latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Nyu! Batii batiɛ bawo kowolaa fɔ.
44010020	Taka faakyɛ falaanya ma. Tanyɛkɛ ma otikanko ɔkyɛ, diekye ami niekpee ma.”
44010021	Nioso Petro lakyɛ aalaanya ma, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Ami ninle otii wɔ biowolaa ni nɛ. Aye ninkyɛ, nfũ loo buɛɛ.”
44010022	Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Buokye Kornelio nfũ, nwɔ ninle ni Roma batii kakpɛ kanyayilatɛ nɛ. Otii biene ale, anyɛkɛ Yaa kafɔɔ. Yuda batii bamuu mbɔmbɔ nwɔ ɔlaa. Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ akpee otii baalɛɛ fɔ batɔɔ, aanu ɔlaa wɔ nikpe fɔ ni.”
44010023	Nioso Petro lata bafɔɔ nwu labuo kasiɛkɔ nɔɔ aafũ ma, aabla ma kɔfɔɔ, aata baate nfa. Kaale lasɛ nii, aalolaa suoto ku bafũbanutɛ bawo di Yopa baatikanko ma baasifi.
44010024	Baabuo Kaesarea kaleesɛ. Di obe nwu kamɛ Kornelio ntoosiisa leyo nɔɔ batii basi basoko Petro ɔwabee.
44010025	Obe wɔ di Petro alɛ oobuo ni leyo, Kornelio lapɛ akunkyi di Petro katũ aase disi kaasɔ aatɔɔ.
44010026	Nioso Petro latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Taka! Amii otii nle.”
44010027	Petro latɔɔkakatɛko Kornelio obe wɔ boofe ni leyo kamɛ, nfa aanya batii kpinwu lesi basi.
44010028	Ni di Petro latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye bamu biye bilɛ Yuda batii kufiofa diɛta osuku alɛ kabuo otii wɔ ninanle ni Yuda kafaabi otii kasiɛkɔ ee katɛɛtɛɛ nwɔ. Kafɔɔ Yaa ntoodiki eetuo mi alɛ ntaanyu otii kuonwii alɛ aaklekle ee ɛɛkpɔnɔnfɔ.
44010029	Nioso obe wɔ baawa mi ni ɔlɛɛ, ni lataka lawa nɛ. Bita nkaalɛ ye, be oso biowolaa mi?”
44010030	Nioso, Kornelio latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Diɛbla fɛ miɛ dii naafa nɛ, latɔɔpɛ ɔlaa latɔɔta Yaa di obe wɔ mmle okle kamɛ dile ni kakũ elomu etiɛ kamɛ. Nfanwu, osuɔtɔ onwii niakyɔɔ mi di anu, aakpee awu ya niatosesee ni di anu!
44010031	-
44010032	Aatɔkɔ mi alɛ, ‘Kornelio, sifutulɛ lefɔ ɔbla ku ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta Yaa lɛfɔ ntoodu Yaa nfũ! Kpee otii owo aakyɛ Yopa, aalaalɛɛ osuɔtɔ wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Simon Petro, nwɔ ninsi ni di Simon wɔ nikɔbla ni babɔkɛɛ akũ ɔkpɛ nfũ diɛ lekpo ɔlɔɔkɔ.’
44010033	Nioso lakpee otii ninfa ninfa nlɛ abalɛɛ fɔ nɛ, dilɛ alɛ fɛɛwa nkpaa nkpaa. Nioso bamuu loo busi ninfũ di Yaa anu, buonyu osuku bulɛ buanu ɔlaa lele di Saate alɛ faatɔkɔ wo.”
44010034	Ninfɛ di Petro latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Mianfɛ ntoonu kasɔ nlɛ nwaako Yaa ninkpee kasɛ di batii nntɛɛ.
44010035	Kale lele otii niɛwakosa suoto kasɔ ɛɛta Yaa, ɛɛbla nwɔ dibiesaa, nnwɔɔ di Yaa nfũ nɛ.
44010036	Biye ɔlaa biene wɔ di Yaa lakyesee ni Israel batii alɛ, diefe ni di Yesu Kristo suoto, babawɛ atoko ɔkyɛ ole. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ ninle batii bamuu Saate nɛ.
44010037	Batoobuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle beefenko di Yudea kasɔ kamuu suoto, baakye kasɔ di Galilea di obe wɔ kamɛ di Yohane layie ni lɛkya di Yaa ntu okpeesa suoto sɛmaa.
44010038	Biye mmle okle di Yaa layɔ Ninwuna Klekle nɔɔ ku osie aakpee ni di Yesu Nasaret Otii nwu kamɛ. Aakyi aba kpinwu aatɔɔbla dibiene, aayɔɔsa batii ba bamuu di Abonsam latɔɔkpɛko ni sifiɛ, diekye Yaa lasiɛko nwɔ.
44010039	“Buodiki mumbuɛ asaa ya buanya aabla ni di Israel kasɔ ku Yerusalem kamɛ. Ni kamaa baakaasa nwɔ koowoso suoto baalo.
44010040	Kafɔɔ, Yaa lakple aasɛnkɛsa nwɔ aakyeko kukpi kamɛ dii tiɛfa, aata batii lanyɔɔ.
44010041	Diele batii bamuu nianyɔɔ. Kafɔɔ awo ba aadiki nii, awo nianyɔɔ nɛ. Mia kafɔɔ buale, buanyi ku nnwɔɔ, aataka aakye ni kukpi kamɛ.
44010042	Ni aatɔkɔ wo alɛ, bubuɛ ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle buta batii. Buodiki bubuɛ kafɔɔ bulɛ nnwɔɔ Yesu di Yaa lediki alɛ aakanko batii ba ninkpe ni nkpa ku bakpi bamuu.
44010043	Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ bamuu labuɛ di suoto nɔɔ alɛ, olele niefũ nwɔ eenu mawɛ sikpile nɔɔ ɔyɔ ɔkyɛ di leyooto nɔɔ osie kamɛ.”
44010044	Obe wɔ di Petro diiloo ni lɛkakatɛ, ni di Yaa Ninwuna lawa di batii ba bamuu ninsi boonu ni Petro ɔlaa nwu suoto nɛ!
44010045	Yuda batii ba niefũ beenu ni baatikanko Petro baakye ni Yopa, lanya alɛ Yaa ntɔɔyɔ Ninwuna Klekle nɔɔ eekpete ni di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii suoto, diabla ma ɔkpɛ.
44010046	Diekye baanu boobuɛ sele fɔle mantansa Yaa Nimuɔ nɔɔ. Nioso Petro labuɛ alɛ,
44010047	“Batii ba mmle lefũ Ninwuna Klekle, fɛ mmle okle di awoo buafũ nii. Lɛsaa lewo katĩi ma osuku alɛ balaakpeesa ma Yaa ntu?”
44010048	Nioso aata ma osuku alɛ, bakpeesa ma Yaa ntu di Yesu Kristo leyooto kamɛ. Nni sɛmaa, baatikiti Petro lekoto alɛ asiɛko ma ayi asɛɛ.
44011001	Ditafũ obe fiɛ di batɔkyɛntɛ ku bafũbanutɛ bamba di Yudea lanu alɛ mba ninanle ni Yuda batii kafɔɔ ntoofũ Yaa ɔlaa beenu.
44011002	Nioso obe wɔ di Petro lakple aasifi ni Yerusalem, Yuda batii ba niefũ beenu nii ditatunako nwɔ, ni baabuɛ alɛ,
44011003	“Fɛɛbla onwii ku batii ba ninambudi ni asɔkɔsɔkɔ, feekpe kafɔɔ kɔnɛɛ kaasɛfɛ kanwii kamɛ biele alesaa!”
44011004	Nioso Petro ladiki sɛlaa se mmle simuu kasɔ aata ma, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ,
44011005	“Di obe wɔ latɔɔpɛ ɔlaa latɔɔta ni Yaa di Yopa yi, ni lanya odiki otuo nɛ. Nfa lanya dibula kplɛ ninwii bakle ni atokosi ana nwu boosoosa mankyeko osi manwako kasɔ di anu nii.
44011006	Lalolaa kamɛ lanyu nii, lanya babɔkɛɛ ate ate di dibula kplɛ nwu suoto, babɔkɛɛ ba nikpe ni nkpaa nna ku mba ninkpe ni kobe ku mba ninkpɔkɔ ni kaasɔ ku bakansiɛ ba munanle ni kafɔɔ.
44011007	Ni lanu sɛlɔ latɔkɔ mi alɛ, ‘Petro! Taka! Faalo fawee.’
44011008	“Ni labuɛ nlɛ, ‘Oowo! Saate, diidii! Ninle lɛsaa le di Yuda batii ninanle ni di kufiofa kanya, ninanklekle ni ee diɛkpɔnɔnfɔ ni nnya.’
44011009	“Kafɔɔ sɛlɔ nwu lakple siakye osi siabuɛ alɛ, ‘Lɛsaa le di Yaa ntookleklesa nii, tansinnyu falɛ dieklekle.’
44011010	“Diabla nkpo sitiɛ simu. Nni sɛmaa, baayɔ dibula nwu ku babɔkɛɛ nwu niasiɛ ni kaamɛ baasifiko osi.
44011011	Di obe nwu kamɛ, batii batiɛ ba baakpee baakye ni Kaesarea alɛ babalɛɛ mi ni ntɔɔwa bɛɛbabuo leyo le lasiɛ nii.
44011012	Yaa Ninwuna latɔkɔ mi alɛ ntikanko ma nkyɛ, ntaanyɛkɛ. Babiloo bafũbanutɛ ba mmle bakuɔ latikankoe buakyɛ bualaabuo osuɔtɔ wɔ niakpee alɛ babalɛɛ mi ni leyo.
44011013	Aatɔkɔ wo kafɔɔ mmle okle di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ ladiki suoto aatuo nwɔ ni leeyo nɔɔ, aatɔkɔ nwɔ kafɔɔ alɛ, ‘Kpee otii aakyɛ Yopa aalaawolaa Simon Petro.
44011014	Abatɔkɔ fɔ sɛlaa se nimata alɛ afɔ ku leyo lɛfɔ batii bamuu minwɛ ni didiki.’
44011015	Lakye kasɔ kɔtɔkɔ ma ni ɔlaa biene nwu, ni di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle lawa ma di suoto fɛ mmle okle diawa wo ni di suoto kaasɔ kakyekɔ nɛ!
44011016	Ni lanyuma ɔlaa wɔ di Saate labuɛ ni alɛ, ‘Yohane layɔ ntu aakpeesa batii. Kafɔɔ, Yaa mayɔ Ninwuna Klekle ankpeesa ye.’
44011017	Nse Yaa niɛta batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii lɛtasaa le mmle fɛ mmle okle aayɔ aata wo ni di obe wɔ buafũ Saate Yesu Kristo buonu nii, owe nle katĩi Yaa osuku?”
44011018	Di obe wɔ baanu in sɛlaa se mmle, baadiɛ ɔlaa lɛma nwu ɔnanfi, ni baakye kasɔ baatɔɔtansa Yaa alɛ, “Yaa ntɔɔta batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii osuku alɛ baakyi manwa ɔkyɛ nɔɔ alɛ baawɛ nkpa.”
44011019	Di obe wɔ kamɛ di asaa ya mmle latɔɔwa nii, bafũbanutɛ ba niatoso ni ditikanko le niawa ma ni di suoto ta Stefano olo oso, baasifi Foinike ku Kipro ku Antiokia. Baatookyi baatoobuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu, kafɔɔ diele batii bamuu baatɔɔtɔkɔ, Yuda batii lete baatɔɔtɔkɔ.
44011020	Kafɔɔ, bafũbanutɛ ba niakye Kipro ku Kirene lakyɛ Antiokia baalaatoobuɛ Saate Yesu ɔlaa nwu baatɔɔta batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii.
44011021	Diekye Saate osie latika ma di suoto, nioso batii kpinwu lakyi baafũ Saate nwu baanu.
44011022	Di obe wɔ di bafũbanutɛ ba niawɛ ni di Yerusalem lanu ni lɛsaa le nikɔwa ni ninfa, baakyesee Barnaba alɛ atɔɔkyɛ Antiokia.
44011023	Aalaabuo ni nfa aanya mmle okle di Yaa ntɔɔkyakaako ma nii, suoto layɔɔ nwɔ nwaa, nioso aakpee ma osie aapɔɔsa alɛ balolaa Saate nwu basumu ku otu biene, baatikanko nwɔ osie kanya.
44011024	Barnaba lale otii biene aawɛ ofũ onu, Yaa Ninwuna Klekle lasiɛ nwɔ kaamɛ. Nioso batii kpinwu lafũ Saate nwu baanu.
44011025	Ninfɛ di Barnaba lakyɛ Tarso aalaawolaa Saulo nɛ.
44011026	Obe wɔ aanyɔɔ nii, aakpaa nwɔ aawako Antiokia, banyɔ lɛma baasiɛ ninfa lɛlɛɛ niwii, baatuo batii dikudi nwu kplɛ asaa. Nioso di Antiokia baakasa bafũbanutɛ ɔlɛɛ alɛ Kristo bale nɛ.
44011027	Di obe nwu kamɛ, ni di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ bawo lakye Yerusalem baawa Antiokia nɛ.
44011028	Ni di onwii kaamɛ lɛma bɔɔlɛɛ ni Agabo, lataka aayila di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle kamɛ, ni aabuɛ aatɛ alɛ, kɔka dibinte kɔwa kaayi kamuu suoto. Ɔlaa wɔ mmle lawa kaanya di obe wɔ di Klaudio latoole ni sɛka.
44011029	Nioso bafũbanutɛ ba mmle labla alɛ boosiisa asaa fɛ mmle baafuo ni mankyesee babilɛma ba ninkpe ni di Yudea. Nioso baata fɛ mmle di onwii onwii lɛma kafuo nii.
44011030	Baakũ asaa nwu baaloo nii, baayɔ baata Barnaba ku Saulo, ni baayɔ baakyɛnko bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni di Yudea banɔɔfo nɛ.
44012001	Diɛ obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Ɔka Herode lakyako bafũbanutɛ bawo ɔkpɛko.
44012002	Ni aata baalo Yakobo, dile ni Yohane obilɛma ku kapamii nɛ.
44012003	Obe wɔ aanya alɛ suoto layɔɔ ni Yuda batii di lɛsaa le aabla ni oso, aamufũ Petro kafɔɔ di obe wɔ kamɛ boole ni Bloblo wɔ Ninantaka ni dii.
44012004	Baayɔ nwɔ baatɛ leeyo, ni baadiki banyuntɛ bana bana akudi ana alɛ batoonyu nwɔ nɛ. Herode latɛ alɛ, abakanko nwɔ lɛɛkpaka, nse batooloo Okpi Diisi Ofe Dii nwu ole.
44012005	Nioso baakpee Petro leeyo, banyuntɛ latoonyu nwɔ. Kafɔɔ, bafũbanutɛ nwu latɔɔpɛ ɔlaa baatɔɔta Yaa diisi nɔɔ osie kanya.
44012006	Obe wɔ di Herode latɛ alɛ abadiki Petro anta ni batii nse kale lɛsɛ, Petro late aatɔɔkyɔsĩi di banyuntɛ banyɔ obo. Baapɛ nwɔ akpo anyɔ. Mia kafɔɔ banyuntɛ bawo layila di leyo katenkɔ nwu kayoko.
44012007	Nfanwu, lɛkpa lewo lakpete leenyo nwu kamɛ. Ni di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ onwii lawa aabaayila di Petro ɔlɔɔkɔ. Ni aapɛ Petro kɔnɛɛ niimuusi aasɛnkɛsa nwɔ abuɛ alɛ, “Pɛsɛwa, faataka!” Nfanwu ni di akpo nwu lafukuti di nnɛɛ nɔɔ aapɛ kaasɔ nɛ.
44012008	Ni di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Yɔ awu lɛfɔ ku ntokota fakpee.” Ni di Petro labla nkpo nɛ. Ni di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu lakple aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Yɔ awu wua lɛfɔ nwu kafɔɔ fakpee, faatikankoe.”
44012009	Ni di Petro lataka aatikanko nwɔ aadie leeyo nwu kamɛ nɛ. Di obe wɔ mmle nwu kamɛ, diate Petro fɛ lɛsaa le ɔɔnya nii, kɔlaafɔ kule ɔɔsɛ.
44012010	Baafe di banyuntɛ kayoko kasale ku kayɔɔfa ni baalaadu abɔɔsaa kayoko kplɛ ka niɛkyɔɔ ni okpoo anu nɛ. Kayoko nwu nkpo kamu, niasɛkɛtɛ suoto, ni baafe ninka kafɔɔ baadie nɛ. Baakyɛ ni sitũ kɛɛkɛ, ni di Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ nwu layɛ di Petro anu aasifi nɛ.
44012011	Nfa nfɛ di Petro latofo lɛsaa le niawa ni nɛ. Ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Nwaako, Saate niekyesee tɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ alɛ abadiki mi di Herode nnɛɛ kamɛ ku asaa ya di Yuda batii konyu osuku alɛ bababla mi ni kamɛ.”
44012012	Obe wɔ diabudi nwɔ nii, ni aasifi Maria nwɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Yohane Marko ɔya leyo nɛ. Nfa di batii kpinwu lasi baatɔɔpɛ ɔlaa baatɔɔta Yaa nɛ.
44012013	Petro lapɛ kayi kokloo kɔnɛɛ, ni di ɔsankobi tɔkyɛntɛ wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Roda lawa alɛ ɔbasɛkɛtɛ kayoko nwu.
44012014	Obe wɔ aatofo alɛ Petro sɛlɔ sile nii, suoto layɔɔ nwɔ siawaalɛ! Atasɛkɛtɛ kayoko nwu, ni aatoso aasifi batii nwu kamɛ aalaatɔkɔ ma alɛ Petro ntɔɔwa ayɛ kookloo sɛmaa.
44012015	Kafɔɔ batafũ baanu, nioso baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Foobuo afĩiɛ?” Ɔsankobi nwu nkpo labensa kanya alɛ, nwaa ni! Ni baabuɛ alɛ, “Loobia Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ wɔ nikonyu ni Petro dile.”
44012016	Di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ kafɔɔ, Petro lakple aayila aatɔɔpɛ ɔpɛ kokloo kɔnɛɛ. Ni baalaasɛkɛtɛ nii nnwɔɔ diale, diabla ma ɔkpɛ osie kanya.
44012017	Nioso Petro lawii ma kɔnɛɛ alɛ balo kanana. Ni aatɔkɔ ma mmle okle di Yaa lediki nwɔ ni di leyo katenkɔ nɛ. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ batɔkɔ Yakobo ku bafũbanutɛ ba niebu ni. Nni sɛmaa, aadie aadiɛ ma, aasifi lɛba bamba.
44012018	Kaale lasɛ nii, kakpɔkpɔtɔ dibinte labuo di banyuntɛ ba nikonyu ni leyo katenkɔ nwu kamɛ. Baakaalɛ kafɔɔ alɛ, “Be niɛbla Petro, fɛ eefe?”
44012019	Herode lata ma baawolaa nwɔ, kafɔɔ batanya Petro. Nioso aata baakanko leyo bayuntɛ nwu, ni aata osuku alɛ balo ma nɛ. Nni sɛmaa Herode ladie di Yudea aasifi Kaesarea aalaale obe owo ninfa.
44012020	Obe wɔ mmle kamɛ, Herode lanya ɔblɔ aakpeeko Tiro ku Sidon batii. Nioso batii bawo lakye Tiro ku Sidon okpoo baakyɛ alɛ bɔɔlaanyɔɔ. Lɛkasale, baalaanya Blasto, otii wɔ nin-yɛ ni di Herode asaa kanya alɛ, akyakaako ma. Ni baakyɛ Herode nfũ baalaabla onwii ku nnwɔɔ, diekye Herode okpoo manwɛ alesaa mankyeko.
44012021	Dii le di Ɔka Herode latɛ nii, aakpee akasaa, aasiɛ di lɛkakpomii suoto aakakatɛ ata batii.
44012022	Batii nwu layiisa kudu osie kanya alɛ, “Diele otii nikɔkakatɛ, Yaa nikɔkakatɛ!”
44012023	Nfanwu, Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ lakpee Herode ofiɛ, diekye atayɔ katansa aata Yaa. Nioso aabuo akudikudi aakpi.
44012024	Nioso Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu lakpɛ kuakyaka kayi, bafũbanutɛ kafɔɔ labapɔ kpinwu.
44012025	Nioso obe wɔ di Barnaba ku Saulo ntooloo ni ɔkpɛ wɔ baakpee ma ni ɔbla, baakple di Yerusalem, ni baakpaa Yohane wɔ manlɛɛ ni Marko baasifiko nɛ.
44013001	Di Antiokia, Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ bawo ku basaatuotɛ lawɛ di bafũbanutɛ dikudi nwu kamɛ. Mma niale Barnaba ku Simeon, nwɔ manlɛɛ ni otii wɛɛfɛɛ ku Lukio wɔ niekye ni Kirene ku Manaen, obisɔ wɔ baananfi ni di Ɔka Herode leyo ku sibisɔ ku Saulo.
44013002	Obe wɔ baatoosumu ni Saate, baatoonii ni kanya, Ninwuna Klekle latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bidiki Barnaba ku Saulo bise lete bitɛɛ, alɛ baabla ɔkpɛ wɔ oso lɛlɛɛ ma ni.”
44013003	Nioso baanii kanya, baatika ma nnɛɛ baapɛ ɔlaa baadiki Yaa diisi lɛma, ni baata ma osuku baasifi nɛ.
44013004	Yaa Ninwuna Klekle latuo ma osuku, baasifi okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Seleukia. Nfa baayɔ oklo baataalɛ baasifi kasɔ ka nintu lɛmana diekyi ni bɔɔlɛɛ ni Kipro nɛ.
44013005	Obe wɔ baabuo ni okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Salami, baasifi Yuda batii kasiisakɔ baalaabuɛ Saate ɔlaa nwu. Marko Yohane kafɔɔ latikanko ma fɛ kyakaakotɛ.
44013006	Nle mmle sɛmaa, baataalɛ baasifi baalabuo okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Pafo. Nfa baakyakako Yuda otii onwii niale ni fatɛ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Bar-Yesu. Aabla suoto alɛ ale Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ.
44013007	Fatɛ wɔ mmle ku okpoo nwu kanyayilatɛ wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Sergio Paulo niale basiɛwo. Nioso kanyayilatɛ wɔ mmle niale ni numbentɛ lalɛɛ Barnaba ku Saulo alɛ bawa, diekye aamiɛ alɛ onu Yaa ɔlaa nwu.
44013008	Kafɔɔ baakyɛ nii, fatɛ wɔ mmle bɔɔlɛɛ ni di Griki sele kamɛ alɛ Elima, lananfiko ma ɔlaa. Aamiɛ alɛ oodiki kanyayilatɛ nwu disibu ku ofũ onu ankyeko ɔlaa wɔ di Saulo ku Barnaba latoobuɛ nii.
44013009	-
44013010	Nioso Saulo, nwɔ kafɔɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Paulo, layii pɔ ku Ninwuna Klekle, nianyu fatɛ di anu tuwĩi aabuɛ alɛ, “Afɔ Abonsam obi, feeyii pɔ ku kakyɔnkyɔ ku kalalaa, feekyidi lɛsaa biene ɔbla, obe lele foomunikĩisa Yaa ɔlaa nwu fanta sɛlaa kuafunu. Fabanya!
44013011	Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ Yaa mananfi fɔ kootoko. Anu mabiɛ fɔ flabanya kufĩ kafɔɔ diɛlaase ni di obe owo kamɛ!” Nfanwu kɔmaa latĩi Elima anu diawɔfɔ nwɔ atasintɔɔnya. Ni aakyako nnɛɛ ɔnwanwanyi otikiti batii lekoto alɛ baklee nwɔ di nnɛɛ.
44013012	Di obe wɔ di okpoo kanyayilatɛ nwu lanya ni lɛsaa le mmle diabla nwɔ ɔkpɛ, nioso aafũ Saate ɔlaa nwu aanu. Diekye lɛsaa le baatuo nwɔ ni di Saate suoto labla nwɔ ɔkpɛ.
44013013	Nni sɛmaa, Paulo ku mba niatikanko nwɔ ni labuo di oklo kamɛ, baadie di Pafo baasifi Perge wɔ ninkpe ni di Panfilia. Nfa di Yohane Marko lakple ma sɛɛmaa, aakple aasifi Yerusalem nɛ.
44013014	Nni sɛmaa, baadie di Perge baasifi Antiokia di Pisidia kɔmɛ suoto. Di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto, baakyɛ Yuda batii kasiisakɔ baalaasiɛ kaasɔ baatii nwu kamɛ.
44013015	Di obe wɔ batɔɔka asaa di Mose kufiofa kukũ ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ akpanasaa beeloo nii, kasiisakɔ nwu ɔnɔɔfo labuɛ aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Babiloo, nse onwii lee nkpe ɔlaa wɔ nimakpee wo ni osie, ni aawa ababuɛ.”
44013016	Nioso Paulo lataka aakplesa kɔnɛɛ alɛ balo. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Israel batii ku aye ba ninanle ni Israel batii biobu ni Yaa, bikyɔɔ mi atoko!
44013017	Awo Israel batii Yaa ladiki bawa loo, aabla ma kale kplɛ di obe wɔ baale ni bafɔɔ di Egipte kasɔ suoto. Yaa lakpaa ma aadieko di Egipte kasɔ suoto ku osie nɔɔ.
44013018	Aanyu ma di ɔfaafuu kamɛ di obe wɔ bakyɛ bookyi nii di alɛɛ afosi ana kamɛ.
44013019	Aawɔɔsa nnle nkuɛnsĩ di Kanaan kasɔ suoto, ni aayɔ ma kasɔ aata Israel batii keekple ma kale nɛ.
44013020	Ɔsaabla wɔ mmle lafũ alɛɛ alafa ana afosi anɔɔ. “Ninle mmle sɛmaa, Yaa lata ma bakantɛ baayila ma kaanya dialaase di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Samuel obe.
44013021	Ni baakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ ase ɔka ata ma. Ni di Yaa lata ma Kis obi Saul wɔ niakye ni Benyamin kɔna kamɛ, aale sɛka alɛɛ afosi ana nɛ.
44013022	Kafɔɔ Yaa latakatɛsa nwɔ di sɛɛka suoto, ni aayɔ Dawid aase sɛka nwu nɛ. Dawid wɔ mmle niale otii wɔ suoto di Yaa labuɛ alɛ, ‘Yese obi Dawid ninle otii wɔ di otu nii mbɔmbɔ nii, diekye ababla mi abiesaa amuu.’
44013023	“Di Dawid kɔna kamɛ, ni di Yaa ladiki Dikitɛ wɔ ninle ni Yesu aata Israel batii fɛ mmle abuɛ aatɛ ni nɛ.
44013024	Nioso fiɛ di Yesu mawa nii, Ntu Kpeesatɛ Yohane lawa aabatɔkɔ Israel batii bamuu alɛ, bakyi di sikpile lɛma kamɛ, baatika Yaa anu, baakpeesa ma Yaa ntu.
44013025	Di obe wɔ di Yohane ɔkpɛ nfɛ kɔwa ni kaloo, aakaalɛ alɛ, ‘Owe bienyu bilɛ nnle? Diele ami ninle otii wɔ bionyu osuku bilɛ abawa ni? Oowo! Otii nwu nkpi mi kamaa ɔɔwa. Otii wɔ ninansiɛko alɛ kabla ɔkpɛ kuonwii nta nii.’
44013026	“Babiloo, aye ba ninle ni Abraham babi ku aye ba ninanle ni Yuda batii biɔyɛkɛ ni Yaa, didiki le mmle bamuu loo bɛɛyɔ bɛɛta!
44013027	Batii ba ninkpe ni di Yerusalem ku banɔɔfo lɛma ditatofo alɛ Yesu ninle Dikitɛ nwu. Batanu Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ ɔlaa wɔ baabuɛ baatɛ ni kasɔ, bɔɔka ni obe lele di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi nwu suoto. Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ baalo nwɔ ni lɛpɔɔ, bɛɛta alɛ Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ ɔlaa ntɔɔwa kaanya.
44013028	Batanya okpile kuonwii di suoto nɔɔ eesiɛko ni kukpi, kafɔɔ baatɔkɔ Pilato alɛ ata balo nwɔ.
44013029	Di obe wɔ batɔɔbla asaa ya di Yaa Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ labuɛ ni di kukpi nɔɔ suoto beeloo nii, baadiki nwɔ koowoso suoto, baalaakookaa nwɔ di ɔkya kamɛ.
44013030	Kafɔɔ Yaa lasɛnkɛsa nwɔ aakyeko bakpi kamɛ, aawako nkpa kamɛ.
44013031	Nni sɛmaa, aadiki suoto kpinwu aatuo batii ba niakyɛ ni ku nnwɔɔ baakye Galilea baawa ni Yerusalem. Mma ninle batii ba nikodiki nwɔ ɔlaa mambuɛ ni nɛ.
44013032	-
44013033	“Nioso buɔyɔ ɔlaa biene nwu buɔwako ye nɛ. Ɔlaa nwu ninle alɛ, Yaa ntɔɔbla ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ ni bawa loo, diekye Yesu lataka aakye kukpi kamɛ. Fɛ mmle okle bɛɛkpana ni di Dawid sinu nyɔɔfa kamɛ alɛ, ‘Obi nii fale. Miɛ, ntookple fɔ kote.’
44013034	Nya ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa labuɛ ni di ɔtaka nɔɔ okye di kukpi kamɛ, diidii alaabuu di ɔkya kamɛ. ‘Mayɔ dikusɛkusɛ klekle le labuɛ latɛ lata ni Dawid nta fɔ.’
44013035	Nioso aakple aabuɛ di Dawid onu bamba kamɛ alɛ, ‘Flabatuna falɛ Klekletɛ lɛfɔ nwu abuu di ɔkya kamɛ.’
44013036	“Ɔlaa wɔ mmle diele Dawid kulaka, diekye Dawid lasiɛ aabla Yaa ɔkpɛ obe lele fɛ mmle okle di Yaa komiɛ nii, aakpi nii baakookaa nwɔ, abuu kafɔɔ di ɔkya kamɛ.
44013037	Kafɔɔ otii wɔ di Yaa latakatɛsa aakyeko ni kukpi kamɛ, suoto nɔɔ sina ditabuu.
44013038	“Babiloo, binu! Nioso di Yesu wɔ mmle leyooto kamɛ, ni di Yaa mayɔ sikpile lee ankyɛ ye nɛ.
44013039	Otii lele niefũ Yesu eenu, Yaa matɔɔ lɛbɛ, di sikpile se simuu di Mose kufiofa diefuo wo ni odiki diidii.
44013040	Nioso bilolaa binyu! Bitanta sɛlaa se di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ labuɛ ni lawa ye di suoto.
44013041	Diekye Yaa labuɛ alɛ, ‘Aye ba ninankyɔɔ mi ni ɔlaa kotoko, bilolaa binyu, nse diele nkpo, dibabla ye ɔkpɛ alɛ bibawɔɔ! Diekye lɛsaa le kɔbla ni di obe lee wɔ mmle kamɛ, nse otii owo lediki kasɔ ɛɛta ye bia yi, bilɔɔwa ɔbafũ onu.’ ”
44013042	Di obe wɔ di Paulo ku Barnaba nfɛ kodie kaasiikɔ lɛma nwu mansifi nii, batii nwu latɔkɔ ma alɛ bakple bawa, baakple babakakatɛ bata ma di ɔlaa wɔ mmle suoto di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi le nikɔwa ni kamɛ.
44013043	Obe wɔ baatii ntoodie ni kaasikɔ nwu, Yuda batii ku mba nintookyi bɛɛbla ni Yuda batii bɔɔyɛkɛ ni Yaa, latikanko Paulo ku Barnaba. Batɔkyɛntɛ nwu lakakatɛ baakpee ma osie alɛ bakpee ɔnyɛɛ baasiɛ di Yaa sibualɛ nwu kamɛ.
44013044	Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi le niatikanko nii, kɛɛkɛɛ niabu se batii bamuu di okpoo nwu lawa baabanu Saate ɔlaa wɔ baabuɛ nii.
44013045	Di obe wɔ di Yuda batii banɔɔfo lanya ni batii dikudi le niawa ni kasikɔ nwu, diakple ma ninunsɛɛ, baananfiko Paulo ɔlaa di sɛlaa se aatoobuɛ nii, baatufa nwɔ kafɔɔ.
44013046	Kafɔɔ Paulo ku Barnaba lakpee otu baatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Dikaatɛ alɛ baabuɛ Yaa ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle manta Yuda batii lɛkasale. Kafɔɔ biesĩ nwu ni oso, minoobu suoto bilɛ biawɛ ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo oso, bubadiɛ ye munsifi batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii nfũ.
44013047	Diekye nkpo ninle kufiofa ko di Yaa lata wo ni alɛ, ‘Ntɔɔyɔ fɔ lɛbla fɛ lɛkpa lɛta batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii. Mmle okle kaayi kamuu kawɛ ni didiki.’ ”
44013048	Nioso obe wɔ di mba ninanle ni Yuda batii lanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, suoto layɔɔ ma, baatansa Yaa ɔlaa nwu. Nioso batii ba di Yaa ladiki ɛɛta ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo lakple bafũbanutɛ.
44013049	Nioso Yaa ɔlaa nwu lakyaka kasɔ nwu kamuu suoto.
44013050	Kafɔɔ Yuda batii lata basanko ba diibu ntika ni di suoto, baye ni Yaa ku okpoo banɔɔfo lataka baayila di Paulo ku Barnaba suoto, baatososa ma di okpoo nwu kamɛ.
44013051	Nioso di obe wɔ boodie ni di okpoo nwu kamɛ, baafɛntɛ nkpaasɔ lɛma kɔtɛ baatɛ di okpoo nwu diotuo alɛ, okpoo nwu batii diefũ ma nii. Nni nkpo sɛmaa, baadie baasifi Ikonion.
44013052	Bafũbanutɛ ba mmle lanya suoto lɛyɔɔ, Yaa Ninwuna kafɔɔ layii ma kamɛ pɔ.
44014001	Obe wɔ baabuo ni Ikonion kafɔɔ, Paulo ku Barnaba lakyɛ Yuda batii kasiisakɔ ka niawɛ ni ninfa. Obe wɔ baatɔkɔ ni Yuda batii ku Griki batii ɔlaa biene nwu, batii kpinwu kaamɛ lɛma lafũ ɔlaa nwu baanu.
44014002	Kafɔɔ Yuda batii ba nintafũ Yaa ɔlaa nwu baanu nii, lakpee kakpɔkpɔtɔ di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii nntɛɛ, ni baataka baayila di Paulo ku Barnaba suoto nɛ.
44014003	Kafɔɔ batɔkyɛntɛ nwu lasiɛ di okpoo nwu kamɛ obe owo baabuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu ku ɔtɔ. Nioso Saate kafɔɔ lafe di suoto lɛma aabla sɛkpɛ se niabla ni ɔkpɛ kpinwu, diotuo alɛ sifutulɛ nɔɔ ɔlaa biene nwu nte ni nkpo.
44014004	Ni di okpoo nwu batii lasɛ di akyuu anyɔ, dikyuu ninwii latikanko Yuda batii, dikyuu nyɔɔfa kafɔɔ latikanko batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nɛ.
44014005	-
44014006	Nioso batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii ku Yuda batii bamu ku banɔɔfo lɛma lasi kanya alɛ bababla ma amumu mansafɔ ma afuɔ. Obe wɔ baatɔkyɛntɛ nwu lanu nii, baatoso baasifi Listra ku Derbe di Likaonia ku sekpoo se ninkpe ni di nntɛɛ nwu.
44014007	Baalaabuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu ninfa.
44014008	Baakyɛ ni Listra, baanya osuɔtɔ onwii di nkpaa lakpi nwɔ asi ni kaasɔ. Diayɔ ni di dii le baalofo nwɔ nii, diidii aditaka akyɛ.
44014009	Aasiɛ aanu Paulo ɔlaa biene wɔ aabuɛ nii. Paulo lanya alɛ, osuɔtɔ nwu ntoofũ ɔlaa nwu eenu baayɔɔsɔɔ ni ofiɛ, nioso aanyu nwɔ tuwĩi.
44014010	Paulo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Taka fayila di nkpaa lɛfɔ suoto!” Ni di osuɔtɔ nwu layefe aataka aayila aakyako ɔkyɛ okyi nɛ.
44014011	Obe wɔ baatii dikudi nwu lanya lɛsaa le di Paulo labla nii, baayiisa kudu osie kanya baabuɛ di Likaonia sele kamɛ alɛ, “Afiɔ bale! Beekple batii bɛɛwa wo kamɛ!”
44014012	Nioso baatika Barnaba leyooto alɛ Seus. Ni baatika Paulo kafɔɔ leyooto alɛ Herme, diekye nnwɔɔ niatɔɔkakatɛ.
44014013	Nioso afiɔ ya bɔɔlɛɛ ni Seus tɔtɛ di katɔkɔ nɔɔ nkaako ni okpoo lɔɔkɔ, layɔ banankyue ku atoto aawako alɛ nnwɔɔ ku batii nɔɔ bɔɔbata ole manta batɔkyɛntɛ nwu di okpoo kasukunya.
44014014	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di Paulo ku Barnaba lanu lɛsaa le di batii nwu lamiɛ alɛ bɔɔbla nii, baananfi awu lɛma baabɛbɛɛ, diekye batamiɛ alɛ batii nwu babla nkpo. Nioso baatoso baabuo baatii nwu kamɛ. Ni bayiisa kudu
44014015	baabuɛ alɛ, “Teete anɛ, be oso biɔbla nkpo? Awoo yi, batii bule fɛ aye! Buɔwa nfũ mmle bulɛ buɔbatɔkɔ ye ɔlaa biene nwu, alɛ biakyi mindiɛ asaa ya mmle ninanfĩ ni ɔbla, minwa Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa nfũ. Nnwɔɔ niɛbla osi ku kasɔ, lekpo ku asaa ya amuu ninsi ni kaamɛ!
44014016	Saa yi, Yaa ladiɛ nnle mmuu batii kaasɔ ka mmle, baabla lɛsaa le ninlɛ ma nii.
44014017	Kafɔɔ obe lele oodiki antuo di asaa biene nɔɔ ɔbla suoto, diotuo alɛ nwaako akpe nii. Obe lele, asaa nkpe oonyumasa ye ni sifutulɛ nɔɔ. Anta ye kanto obe lele ku alesaa kubi ku alesaa di obe kanya, ku suoto lɛyɔɔ kafɔɔ siitu lee kamɛ.”
44014018	Nu baatɔkɔ ma sɛlaa se mmle simuu, diawɛ ma osie fiɛ baatii ba mmle ladiɛ oleɔta lɛma nwu ɔta ɔta ma.
44014019	Kafɔɔ Yuda batii bawo lakye Antiokia di Pisidia kɔmɛ suoto ku Ikonion baawa baabamunikĩisa batii nwu disibu, baata baasafɔ Paulo afuɔ baawududusɔɔ kaasɔ baadieko di okpoo nwu kamɛ, diekye baabu alɛ atookpi.
44014020	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di bafũbanutɛ ba niawɛ ni ninfa labamana nwɔ baakyi nii, aakple aataka aasifi okpoo nwu kamɛ. Kaale lasɛ nii, nnwɔɔ ku Barnaba baasifi Derbe okpoo.
44014021	Paulo ku Barnaba labuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu di Derbe. Obe wɔ baawɛ ni bafũbanutɛ bawo kpinwu ninfa baakple baasifi Listra ku Ikonion ku Antiokia di Pisidia.
44014022	Baakpee bafũbanutɛ nwu osie, baakpee ma kafɔɔ otu alɛ bakle ofũ onu lɛma ku nwaako obuɛ. Baatɔkɔ ma kafɔɔ alɛ, “Dikpe nii buofe di abuo kpinwu kamɛ fiɛ buobuo Yaa Sɛka Kalekɔ nwu.”
44014023	Paul ku Barnaba ladiki batunletɛ baata nsiisakɔ nwu mmuu, baapɛ ɔlaa baata Yaa, baanii kanya. Ni baayɔ ma baakpee di Saate wɔ beefũ beenu ni nnɛɛ kamɛ nɛ.
44014024	Batoofe ni di sekpoo se ninkpe ni di Pisidia beeloo nii, baawa di Panfilia kasɔ suoto.
44014025	Baabuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu kafɔɔ di Perge fiɛ baasifi Atalia.
44014026	Nfa baasiɛ oklo baafe di ntu osi baakple baawa Antiokia nɛ. Lɛba le di bufũbanutɛ nwu layɔ ma baakpee ni di Saate nnɛɛ kamɛ baata ni ɔkpɛ wɔ batalaloo ni ɔbla.
44014027	Baabuo ni Antiokia, baalɛɛ bafũbanutɛ ba niawɛ ni bamuu baasiisa dikudi, ni baabɔ ma osuku wɔ beekye ni amanniɛ nɛ. Baatɔkɔ ma kafɔɔ asaa ya amuu di Saate lafe di suoto lɛma aabla nii ku mmle okle aasɛkɛtɛ osuku aata ni batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii baafũ Yaa ɔlaa baanu nii.
44014028	Ninfɛ baasiɛ di Antiokia di bafũbanutɛ nwu nfũ baaklɛ nɛ.
44015001	Obe wɔ di Paulo ku Barnaba lawɛ ni di Antiokia, batii bawo lakye Yudea baawa babatootuo bafũbanutɛ asaa alɛ, “Nse baabudi ye asɔkɔsɔkɔ di Mose kufioa kanya yi, bilaafuo didiki ɔwɛ.”
44015002	Paulo ku Barnaba lananfiko batii nwu ɔlaa wɔ mmle osie kanya. Nioso, baadiki Paulo ku Barnaba ku batii bamba bawo di Antiokia alɛ bakyɛ Yerusalem baalaanya batɔkyɛntɛ ku banɔɔfo lɛma di ɔlaa wɔ mmle suoto.
44015003	Nioso kasiisakɔ nwu batii ladiki ma osuku baasifi, baalaafe di Foenisia ku Samaria sekpoo kamɛ baasɛɛsa bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ninfa. Baatɔkɔ ma mmle okle di batii ba ninanle Yuda batii kafɔɔ layɔ suoto lɛma baata ni Saate. Ɔlaa wɔ mmle lata ma suoto lɛyɔɔ nwaa.
44015004	Obe wɔ baalaabuo ni Yerusalem, bafũbanutɛ ku batɔkyɛntɛ ku banɔɔfo lɛma lafũ ma nwaa. Ninfɛ di Paulo ku Barnaba latɔkɔ ma asaa ya amuu di Yaa labla aafenko ni di suoto lɛma nɛ.
44015005	Kafɔɔ Farisi batii dikudi le niakyi ni siitu lɛma kamɛ baafũ Kristo baanu ni bawo lataka baayila baabuɛ alɛ, “Dikpe nii, babiloo ba ninanle ni Yuda batii kaamɛ loo, beebudi ma asɔkɔsɔkɔ bɛɛbla kafɔɔ di Mose kufiofa suoto.”
44015006	Nioso batɔkyɛntɛ ku banɔɔfo lɛma lasi alɛ boomumufũ ɔlaa wɔ mmle mannyu.
44015007	Obe wɔ batɔɔnanfi ɔlaa nwu bɛɛklɛsa nii, Petro lataka aayila ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Babiloo, biye bilɛ obe owo nintɔbafe nii, Yaa ladiki mi kaamɛ lee lalaabuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu latɔkɔ batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii alɛ baafũ mannu.
44015008	Yaa wɔ kafɔɔ ninye ni batii otu kamɛ, ladiki aatuo alɛ aafũ ma, aata ma kafɔɔ Ninwuna nɔɔ fɛ mmle okle aayɔ aata ni awo kafɔɔ.
44015009	Atakpee kasɛ di awo ku mma nntɛɛ, diekye aafũ ma di ofũ onu lɛma oso. Aayɔ sikpile lɛma kafɔɔ aakyɛ ma fɛ mmle okle aayɔ sele wo aakyɛ wo nii.
44015010	Ni nua mɔ, be oso biɔsɔ Yaa minnyu? Be oso buɔyɔ aatoo ya di awo ku bawa loo munanfuo ni otuka, muntukasa bafũbanutɛ ba mmle nwu?
44015011	Oowo! Diekye buofũ buonu nii, ni buɔwɛ didiki di Saate Yesu sibualɛ kamɛ nɛ, nkpo kafɔɔ nimma beefũ beenu bɛɛwɛ didiki nɛ.”
44015012	Batii nwu bamuu baalo kanana baatoonu Barnaba ku Paulo sɛkpɛ kplɛ ku atuosaa ya baabuɛ alɛ Saate labla aafenko ni di suoto lɛma aatuo ni batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii.
44015013	Obe wɔ baaloo ni lɛkakatɛ lɛma, Yakobo kafɔɔ lataka aayila aabuɛ alɛ, “Babiloo bikyɔɔ mi atoko!
44015014	Simon Petro ntoonyumasa wo lɛkasale alɛ Yaa ladiki lɛbɔmbɔ nɔɔ aatuo batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii, aadiki bawo kaamɛ lɛma alɛ baale nwɔ ni bale.
44015015	Ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ labuɛ baatɛ nii nkaatɛ ku ɔlaa wɔ mmle. Baabuɛ alɛ,
44015016	‘Nle mmle sɛmaa, makple nwa mase Dawid sɛka kalekɔ nwu kafɔɔ letofo. Mase aba ya kafɔɔ niebibiɛ ni letofo, nta ninkple ninwɛ osie.
44015017	Nfa nfɛ baatii ba niebu nii ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii lɛlɛɛ ni fɛ bale mi babatofo mi. Nkpo di Yaa lebuɛ ɛɛtɛ
44015018	kofokofoko baatii n-ye ni nɛ.’ ”
44015019	Nioso Yakobo labuɛ alɛ, “Ole mi ninle alɛ bitanta buakpee batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii bookyi manwa ni Yaa nfũ kubuɛ.
44015020	Kafɔɔ bita bukpana kukũ buta ma bulɛ baasĩ alesaa ya ninankpa ni kɔmɛ, bɛɛyɔ bɛɛta ni afiɔ ole, baasĩ lɛsɔnɔkpee ku babɔkɛɛ ba beemimina beelo ni ku ntɔ ole.
44015021	Diekye Mose kufiofa nwu bɔɔka kũ di Yuda batii kasiisakɔ kofokofoko di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi biala kamɛ. Booyie sɛlaa nɔɔ nwu kafɔɔ lɛkya di sekpoo simuu kamɛ.”
44015022	Nioso batɔkyɛntɛ nwu ku banɔɔfo lɛma labla onwii ku dikudi lɛma nwu, baadiki batii bawo diikudi nwu kamɛ baakyakaa di Paulo ku Barnaba suoto baakpee ma Antiokia. Baadiki basuɔtɔ banyɔ di bafũbanutɛ nwu mmbu ni nwaa, mma niale Yuda wɔ manlɛɛ ni Barsaba ku Silas nɛ.
44015023	Kukũ ko baakle baakyɛnko ni kamɛ sɛlaa ninle alɛ, Awo, batɔkyɛntɛ ku banɔɔfo ba ninle ni babilee ba ninkpe ni di Yerusalem, buɔsɛɛsa babiloo ba ninanle ni Yuda batii biekye ni Antiokia ku Siria ku Kilikia.
44015024	Buonu alɛ batii bawo niekye ni kamɛ loo ninfũ bɛɛwa ɔkyɛ lee, bɛɛyɔ sɛlaa sewo bɛɛbakpɔkpɔtɔsa ye disibu di asaa otuo kamɛ. Kafɔɔ, diele awo niekpee ma bulɛ babatɔkɔ ye sɛlaa nwu.
44015025	-
44015026	Nioso buokpee asi baawo buotika difuɔ bulɛ, buodiki batii bawo kaamɛ loo buɔkyakaa di Barnaba ku Paulo ninle ni babiloo bɔmbɔtɛ bulɛ bawa. Diekye bɛɛyɔ nkpa lɛma bɛɛta di Saate loo Yesu Kristo ɔkpɛ suoto.
44015027	Nioso, buokyesee ye Yuda ku Silas, babatɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se buɔkpana nii.
44015028	Diekye Yaa Ninwuna ku awo buofũ buokpee bulɛ diɛkaatɛ alɛ buɔyɔ atoo nutũle kuanwii buotika ye di suoto dilenkee n-ya mmle nwu nkpo.
44015029	Bitanle alesaa ya bɛɛyɔ bɛɛta ni afiɔ ole, bisĩ ntɔ onyi, bisĩ babɔkɛɛ ba beemimina beelo ni ole ku lɛsɔnɔkpee. Se biɛbla di afiofa ya mmle suoto, dibalɛ ninta ye. Bisiɛ di kotoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ.
44015030	Nioso obe wɔ baadiki ni batɔkyɛntɛ nwu osuku baaloo nii, baasifi Antiokia. Baalaabuo nii, baalɛɛ bafũbanutɛ nwu baasiisa. Ni baayɔ kukũ ko baakyeko ni Yerusalem baata ma nɛ.
44015031	Obe wɔ baatii nwu laka ni kukũ nwu, suoto layɔɔ ma di ɔnyɛɛ okpeelaa nwu suoto.
44015032	Diekye Yuda ku Silas Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ baale, nioso baadiki sɛlaa kasɔ baata ma baapɔɔsa, baakpee ma kafɔɔ ɔtɔ ku osie.
44015033	Baasiɛ ni ayi asɛɛ ninfa, baadiki ma osuku ku atoko ɔkyɛ ole, baakple baasifi batii ba niakyesee ma ni nfũ di Yerusalem.
44015034	Kafɔɔ Silas, lakple alɛ osiɛ ninfa.
44015035	Nioso Paulo ku Barnaba lakple baasiɛ di Antiokia ninfa, mma ku batii bamba kpinwu baawɛ ninfa baatootuo asaa, baatooyie Saate ɔlaa biene nwu kafɔɔ lɛkya.
44015036	Di ayi awo sɛmaa, Paulo latɔkɔ Barnaba alɛ, “Ta bukple bukyɛ bulaanyu babiloo ba ninkpe ni di sekpoo se simuu butooyie Saate ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya buofe ni, buonyu bulɛ lɛ bakle.”
44015037	Barnaba latuna kafɔɔ aamiɛ alɛ, dikpe ni ɛɛkpaa Yohane wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Marko bɛɛkyɛ.
44015038	Kafɔɔ Paulo nnwɔɔ atatuna nkpo! Diekye obe wɔ di nnwɔɔ ku mma baatoofe ni Panfilia, Marko Yohane lakple aasifi aadiɛ ma ninfa.
44015039	Nioso kananfi labuo di batii ba mmle banyɔ nntɛɛ osie kanya di Marko ɔlaa wɔ mmle suoto, nioso diawa alɛ baasɛ bawo sisuku. Barnaba lakpaa Marko baafe di ntu osi baasifi Kipro.
44015040	Paulo kafɔɔ lakpaa Silas, ni di bafũbanutɛ ba niawɛ ni ninfa layɔ ma baakpee di Yaa nnɛɛ kamɛ, ni baasifi nɛ.
44015041	Baafe di Siria ku Kilikia baakpee bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni ninfa osie.
44016001	Ni di Paulo ku Silas ladie baakyɛ okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Derbe nɛ. Baabuo ni nfa, baawaalɛ baasifi Listra. Nfa baakyakako ofũonutɛ wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Timoteo nɛ. Ɔya lale Yuda otii wɔ niafũ Kristo aanu nii. Kafɔɔ ote lale Griki otii.
44016002	Bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni di Listra ku Ikonion, bamuu mambu Timoteo nwaa.
44016003	Paulo lamiɛ alɛ nnwɔɔ Timoteo ɔɔkpaa ansifiko, nioso aabla nwɔ Yuda batii suoto ɔkyɛlɛnsa amanle. Aabla nkpo, diekye Yusa batii ba niawɛ ni di nntɛɛ nwu n-ye alɛ ote Griki otii ale.
44016004	Baadie baatookyi ni sekpoo nwu kamɛ, baatɔkɔ bafũbanutɛ sɛlaa se di batɔkyɛntɛ ku Yerusalem banɔɔfo labuɛ nii. Nioso baatɔkɔ ma alɛ mma kafɔɔ babla ninkpo.
44016005	Nioso batii ba mmle labakyako ɔpɔ, nkpo kafɔɔ di ofũ onu lɛma labawɛ osie nɛ.
44016006	Nle mmle sɛmaa, baasifi Frigia ku Galatia, diekye Yaa Ninwuna Klekle ditata ma osuku alɛ bayie ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya di Asia kasɔ suoto.
44016007	Obe wɔ baalaadu ni Misia kɔmɛ, baamiɛ alɛ boobuo Bitinia kasɔ suoto. Nfa kafɔɔ, Yesu Ninwuna Klekle dita ta ma osuku alɛ bakyɛ nfa.
44016008	Nioso baakple baamunikĩi baafe di Misia kasɔ baasifi okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Troa.
44016009	Kakyɛ nwu, Paulo lanya odiki otuo di kɔlaafɔ kamɛ. Kɔɔlaafɔ nwu kamɛ yi, aanya osuɔtɔ onwii niekye ni Makedonia, n-yɛ otikiti lekoto alɛ, “Bitaalɛ biwa Makedonia biɛbakyakaako wo kyu woo!”
44016010	Ta odiki otuo wɔ mmle oso, nfanwu, buololaa suoto, ni buasifi Makedonia nɛ. Diekye nle mmle kotuo wo alɛ Saate komiɛ alɛ aakpee wo buɔkyɛ bulaayie ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya ninfa.
44016011	Ni bualaayɔ oklo di Troa, buawaalɛ buasifi Samotrake. Ni kaale lasɛ nii, buasifi bualaabuo Neapoli nɛ.
44016012	Buadie ni ninfa, buasifi Filipi wɔ ninle ni Makedonia okpoo kplɛ. Nfa kafɔɔ Roma batii kasiɛkɔ kale. Buasiɛ ninfa di ayi awo kamɛ.
44016013	Di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto, buadie di okpoo nwu kamɛ, buakyɛ oklelɔɔkɔ di lɛba le buanyu bulɛ batii nkyɛ manaapɛ ɔlaa manta ni Yaa. Ni buawakasɔ buasiɛ ninfa buatɔɔtɔkɔ basanko ba niawa ni nfa Yaa ɔlaa nɛ.
44016014	Batii ba nianu ni ɔlaa nwu onwii lɛma niale Lidia nɛ. Aatoosunsũ abula sɛɛle aakye ni Tiatira. Aale ɔsanko wɔ kafɔɔ ninyɛkɛ ni Yaa nwaa. Nioso obe wɔ aatoonu ni ɔlaa nwu, Saate latɔɔ lɛsɔnu aafũ ɔlaa wɔ omuu di Paulo labuɛ ni ninfa.
44016015	Nioso obe wɔ di nnwɔɔ ku leyo nɔɔ batii bamuu ntoofũ ni Yaa ntu okpeesa nwu, aatikiti wo lekoto alɛ, “Se biefũ biekpee bilɛ ntoofũ Saate lenu, ni biwa biɛbasiɛ di ɔkyɛ nii.” Nioso aananfiko wo ɔlaa wɔ mmle dialaase di obe wɔ buatuna bualaasiɛ ni di ɔkyɛ nɔɔ.
44016016	Dii ninwii buatoofe ni Yaa ɔlaakapɛkɔ buakyakako ɔlanlesankobi onwii di anwuna kpile nsi ni kaamɛ ampɛ ni sɛbɔ. Ambla koto kpinwu anta basaate nɔɔ di sɛbɔ nwu ɔpɛ kamɛ.
44016017	Ni di ɔsankobi wɔ mmle latikanko wo ku Paulo oyiisa kudu alɛ, “Batii ba mmle Yaa di osi bakpɛmblatɛ bale, nioso bɛɛwa nfũ alɛ bɔɔbatuo ye nkpa ɔwɛ Osuku!”
44016018	Aabla nkpo ayi kpinwu. Nioso diatuudi Paulo, ni aamunikĩi aatɔkɔ ninwuna nwu nikɔbla ni ɔkpɛ di ɔsankobi nwu kamɛ alɛ, “Di Yesu Kristo leyooto kamɛ die di ɔsankobi nwu kamɛ!” Nfanwu, ninwuna kpile nwu ladie di ɔsankobi nwu kamɛ!
44016019	Nioso obe wɔ baasaate nɔɔ lanya alɛ osuku wɔ manfe manwɛ ni koto ntoodie ma ni di nnɛɛ, baamufũ Paulo ku Silas baananfi ma baasifiko bakantɛ baanɔɔfo nfũ di lɛkpaka.
44016020	Baabuɛ baatɔkɔ banɔɔfo nwu alɛ, “Batii ba mmle Yuda batii bale, bɛɛwa bɔɔlalaasa wo okpoo.
44016021	Bɛɛwa bootuo batii asaa ya nin-yɛ ni di Roma batii afiofa suoto.”
44016022	Nioso batii kpinwu labamana ma baakyi, baayila di Paulo ku Silas suoto. Ni di bakantɛ nwu lata baananfi ma awu baadiki di suoto, ni baata osuku alɛ bapɛ ma ku kowesee nɛ.
44016023	Batɔɔpɛ ma nwaa beeloo nii, baatɛ ma leeyo, ni baatɔkɔ otii wɔ nikonyu ni leyo batentɛ alɛ, alolaa ma anyu nwaa.
44016024	Ta baatɔkɔ nwɔ ni nkpo oso, aayɔ ma aakpee di leyo katenkɔ nwu nntɛɛ lele, aapɛ ma lekpo kafɔɔ aatɛ.
44016025	Di nkyɛntɛɛ, Paulo ku Silas lakyako ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta Yaa, baatɔɔtansa nwɔ kafɔɔ ku sinu, mba kafɔɔ niate ni leeyo ninfa latoonu sinu lɛma nwu.
44016026	Nfanwu, kasɔ latũkũ osie kanya, diatũkunsa leyo katenkɔ nwu lɛsɔse nyoko mmuu lasɛkɛtɛ, akpo ya kafɔɔ baapɛ ni leyo batentɛ, amuu lafukuti.
44016027	Nioso leeyo katenkɔ nyuntɛ lataka aanya alɛ leyo katenkɔ nyoko lɛsɛkɛtɛ dite nii, aabu alɛ leyo batentɛ nwu letoso beesifi. Nioso aananfi kapamii nɔɔ alɛ oolo suoto.
44016028	Kafɔɔ, Paulo lanya lɛsaa le alɛ ɔɔbla ni suoto oso, aalɛɛ nwɔ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Tambla! Nya wo ninfũ.”
44016029	Ni di leyo katenkɔ nyuntɛ nwu labuɛ alɛ bawako nwɔ kanniɛ. Ni aapɛsɛwa aabuo leyo nwu ku lɛyɛkɛ, aapɛ akunkyi di Paulo ku Silas katũ.
44016030	Ni aakpa ma aadieko leeyo nwu kamɛ, aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Teete anɛ, be dikpe ni mbla fiɛ di Yaa kafũ mi?”
44016031	Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Fũ Saate Yesu Kristo fanu, ni afɔ ku leyo lɛfɔ batii bamuu, Yaa mafũ ye.”
44016032	Nioso baakyɛ baalaatɔkɔ nnwɔɔ ku leyo nɔɔ batii bamuu, Saate ɔlaa biene nwu.
44016033	Nioso kakyɛ nwu leyo katenkɔ nyuntɛ nwu lakpaa ma aalaakaasa ma nkɔ nwu di suoto. Ninfɛ aafũ Yaa ntu okpeesa nwu, nnwɔɔ ku leyo nɔɔ batii bamuu nɛ.
44016034	Ninfɛ aakpaa Paulo ku Silas aasifiko leyo ni aata ma alesaa baale nɛ. Suoto layɔɔ nnwɔɔ ku leyo nɔɔ batii osie kanya, diekye baafũ Yaa baanu.
44016035	Kaleesɛ, okpoo nwu bakantɛ lakpee bamufũtɛ baakyɛ baalaatɔkɔ otii wɔ ninnyu ni leyo batentɛ alɛ, baadiɛ “Basuɔtɔ nwu baatɔɔkyɛ.”
44016036	Nioso leyo katenkɔ nyuntɛ nwu latɔkɔ Paulo ku Silas alɛ, “Bakantɛ alɛ ndiɛ ye biɛtɔɔkyɛ. Nioso bitɔɔkyɛ ku atoko ɔkyɛ ole.”
44016037	Ni di Paulo latɔkɔ bamufũtɛ nwu alɛ, “Bɛɛpɛ wo lɛɛkpaka, di obe wɔ manankanko wo nii, beekple bɛɛtɛ wo leeyo. Mia kafɔɔ, Roma batii bule! Ninfɛ boomiɛ alɛ badiɛ wo leewofa kamɛ alɛ otii konwii atannu? Oowo, dilaba lɛ nkpo! Bita mma bamu bawa babadiɛ wo!”
44016038	Nioso bamufũtɛ nwu lakple baalaatɔkɔ bakantɛ nwu ɔlaa wɔ mmle. Obe wɔ kafɔɔ baanu alɛ Paulo ku Silas Roma batii bale nii, baayɛkɛ osie kanya!
44016039	Nkpo oso baakyɛ baalaatikiti ma lekoto, ni baadiki ma leeyo katenkɔ nɛ. Ni baatɔkɔ ma alɛ badie di okpoo nwu, baatɔɔkyɛ kakɔ bamba.
44016040	Nioso Paulo ku Silas ladie leeyo katenkɔ baasifi Lidia leyo. Nfa baalaanya bafũbanutɛ nwu. Ninfɛ baakple baakpee ma osie, fiɛ nfɛ baadie di okpoo nwu baasifi nɛ.
44017001	Di obe wɔ baakyɛ baalaafe ni di Anfipoli ku Apolonia, baalaabuo Tesalonika. Nfũ di Yuda batii kasiisakɔ lawɛ nii.
