44017002	Nioso fɛ mmle di Paulo mbla ni obe lele, aakyɛ aalaakakatɛ aata ma di kasiisakɔ lɛma nwu, di anyɛɛtɛyi atiɛ kamɛ, aatuo ma asaa aatikanko bawo di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ.
44017003	Ni aadiki kasɔ aata ma klekle di dibuo le baabuɛ baatɛ alɛ Kristo mawa aamanya ni suoto, ku mmle abakple antaka ni kuukpi kamɛ ansiɛ ni nkpa nɛ. Paulo latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Yesu, otii wɔ suoto ɔlaa kɔtɔkɔ ye ni ninle Kristo nwu nɛ.”
44017004	Ɔlaa wɔ aadiki kasɔ aata ma ni lakyisa batii bawo situ, baafũ baanu baatikanko Paulo ku Silas. Nkpo kafɔɔ di ɔlaa nwu kamɛ lakpa Griki batii kpinwu ku basanko ba diibu ntika ni di suoto manyɛkɛ ni Yaa, baakyi siitu lɛma kamɛ.
44017005	Kafɔɔ anu labasɛɛ Yuda banɔɔfotii nwu di suoto lɛma. Nioso baamiɛ batii kpile bawo di okpoo nwu kamɛ, ni baakpee okpoo nwu kamɛ batii ɔtɔ nɛ. Ni baasiisa batokopĩtɛ baakpee ma kudu, ni baakyɛ baalaamana Yason leyo baakyi alɛ, boomufũ Paulo ku Silas mankpaa ma mansifiko okpoo nwu, lɛkpaka.
44017006	Kafɔɔ batanya ma ni oso, baamufũ Yason ku bafũbanutɛ bawo, baananfi ma baakpaa ma baasifiko kasikɔ lɛma. Nfa nfɛ baatooyiisa kudu alɛ, “Batii bawo kokyi kakɔ biala bookpee kudu, batɔɔwa nfũ kafɔɔ bookpee kudu nwu.
44017007	Ni di Yason kafɔɔ lefũ ma di leyo nɔɔ nɛ. Batii ba mmle kafɔɔ bɛtaka bayɛ di Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare kufiofa suoto. Bootuo kafɔɔ alɛ osuɔtɔ wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Yesu ninle Ɔka!”
44017008	Obe wɔ baanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, ɔblɔ lafiɛ kudu bakpeetɛ dikudi nwu ku okpoo banɔɔfo.
44017009	Nioso baata alɛ Yason ku batii nɔɔ baata letokonanfi koto fiɛ baadiɛ ma.
44017010	Nfanwu kaakyɛ lawo nii, bafũbanutɛ ba niawɛ ni di okpoo nwu, lakpaa Paulo ku Silas baatosoko baasifiko Beroia. Baalaabuo ni nfa, baasifi Yuda batii kasiisakɔ baalaabuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu.
44017011	Kafɔɔ Beroia batii mma, diasɛkɛtɛ ma dialenkee Tesalonika batii. Nioso baakyɔɔ atoko baanu lɛkakatɛ lɛma. Obe lele, baatoowolaa di Kɔkpana Klekle kamɛ alɛ, boonyu alɛ sɛlaa se di Paulo atoobuɛ nii, site nkpo.
44017012	Nioso batii kpinwu kaamɛ lɛma lafũ baanu. Griki basanko ba diibu latika ni di suoto ku basuɔtɔ lɛma kpinwu lakyisa situ.
44017013	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di Yuda batii ba ninkpe ni di Tesalonika lanu alɛ Paulo nkpe ninfa ooyie ni ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya di Beroia, baataka baakyɛ nfa baalaakpee kudu di okpoo nwu batii kamɛ.
44017014	Nfanwu, bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni ninfa lakpaa Paulo baasifiko lekpo kotoko. Kafɔɔ Silas ku Timoteo lasiɛ di Beroia.
44017015	Mba niakpaa Paulo baasifiko ni lakpaa nwɔ baalaabuoko Atene. Nfa nfɛ baakple nɛ, Paulo latika ma kanya alɛ batɔkɔ Silas ku Timoteo alɛ, bapɛsɛwa babakyakako nwɔ.
44017016	Obe wɔ di Paulo lasiɛ di Atene aasoko ni Silas ku Timoteo yi, diabuo nwɔ suoto obe wɔ aanya alɛ okpoo nwu batii lɛyɔ suoto bɛɛta ni afiɔ ɔtɔ, di okpoo nwu kafɔɔ layii ni ku afiɔsaa.
44017017	Nioso aakyɛ aalaakakatɛ aata Yuda batii ku batii bamba ba kafɔɔ ninyɛkɛ ni Yaa di kasiisakɔ lɛma. Obe lele kafɔɔ, aatɔɔkakatɛ aatɔɔta mba aatɔɔkyakako ni di lɛkpaka.
44017018	Nioso obe onwii, nnwɔɔ ku dikudi le ninle ni Epikuro batii ku Stoa batii ba ninsi ni di kayi ninumbe kamɛ lakyako ɔlaa ɔnanfi ku Paulo, ni baakaalɛ alɛ, “Be lɛsaa suoto di kakatɛtɛ wɔ mmle kɔkakatɛ ni?” Nioso batii bawo labuɛ alɛ, “Ditefɛ nsɔ bamba afiɔ suoto ɔɔkakatɛ.” Batii ba mmle labuɛ nkpo diekye baanu alɛ, Paulo latooyie Yesu ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya ku okple ɔtaka nɔɔ di kukpi kamɛ.
44017019	Ta nle mmle oso, baakpaa nwɔ baasifiko lɛba le manka ni aka bɔɔlɛɛ ni Areopago banɔɔfo kasiisakɔ, ni baabuɛ alɛ, “Buomiɛ bulɛ bunu kasɔ, asaa fɔle ya footuo ni ninfũ.
44017020	Diekye sɛlaa se foobuɛ ni kɔbla wo ɔkpɛ. Nioso buomiɛ bulɛ bunu sɛlaa nwu kasɔ.”
44017021	Diekye Atene batii bamuu ku bafɔɔ ba ninsi ni kaasɔ ka mmle suoto nkpe obe bɛɛta sɛlaa fɔle obuɛ ku onu obe lele.
44017022	Ninfɛ di Paulo lataka aayila di batii ba mmle anu di kasikɔ nwu, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Di sisuku simuu suoto, lɛnya nlɛ aye Atene batii, nwaako anu lee ntika di afiɔ oleɔta suoto.
44017023	Diekye latookyi nii, lanya aba ya minta ni ole, lanya bɛɛkpana di oleɔta difuɔ ninwii suoto alɛ, ‘Nle mmle buɔyɔ buɔta Teete loo wɔ munanye ni nɛ.’ Nioso Teete nwu minanye ni fiɛ biɔtɔɔ ni ole yi, nnwɔɔ suoto ɔlaa komiɛ nɛ ntɔkɔ ye nɛ.
44017024	“Teete wɔ mmle ninle asaa amuu saate nɛ, nnwɔɔ niɛbla osi ku kasɔ ku asaa ya amuu ninsi ni kaamɛ, anansiɛ ni kafɔɔ leeyo le baatii lɛyɔ nnɛɛ beetofo ni kamɛ.
44017025	Ánle kafɔɔ batii nnɛɛ kamɛ ɔkpɛ lɛsalɛsaa, diekye nnwɔɔ ninta batii nkpa ku ninwuna ku amiɛsaa lɛma.
44017026	Nnwɔɔ niɛbla batii bamuu diefe ni di otii onwii suoto alɛ, baasiɛ fɛ ntɔ nnwii babi di kasɔ kamuu suoto. Nnwɔɔ omu niɛbla obe wɔ baasiɛ ni ɛɛta ma ku aba ya baasiɛ nii.
44017027	Ɛɛbla nle mmle ɛɛta awo batii alɛ, buawolaa nwɔ osuku muntikanko, mmle okle buanyɔɔ nii, diekye aakyo wo fanfa.
44017028	Diekye fɛ mmle di akpa lee lediki eebuɛ ni alɛ, ‘Nnwɔɔ ninkpe oso di awoo bukpe, busi nwɔ kaamɛ, munte nwɔ kaamɛ.’ Beebuɛ kafɔɔ alɛ, ‘Banantii nɔɔ bule.’
44017029	“Nfɛ bule ni Yaa babi oso, disinnaa alɛ, buabu bulɛ Yaa nte fɛ lɛsaa le batii lɛyɔ nnɛɛ bɛɛbla nii, fɛ mmle man-yɔ koto sɛɛle ee kufututu ee kowoso ee difuɔ mawola ni lɛsaa lewo letembi.
44017030	Diayɔ ni di kayi kasɔ kakyekɔ diɛbase ni di obe wɔ mmle kamɛ, Yaa ditananfi batii kootoko ta batatofo nwɔ ni oso. Kafɔɔ nunua, eekpee wo kufiofa alɛ awo bamuu kaakɔ biala buakyisa anu loo di asaa ya mmle nwu suoto, mumunikĩisa anu munnyu nwɔ.
44017031	Diekye atɔɔtɛ dii abafe ni di otii wɔ suoto eediki eese alɛ, abawa amankanko wo ni di nkpa loo suoto. Di nwaako ole kamɛ, aadiki nwɔ ɛɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ nwu kafɔɔ aatuo wo klekle di obe wɔ aatakatɛsɔɔ aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ aawako ni nkpa.”
44017032	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ baanu alɛ Paulo lakakatɛ ni di okple ɔtaka okye ni kukpi kamɛ yi, batii bawo lama nwɔ. Bawo kafɔɔ labuɛ alɛ, “Buomiɛ bulɛ bukple bunu sɛlaa se mmle okle.”
44017033	Nioso, Paulo lasifi aadiɛ ma.
44017034	Kafɔɔ batii bawo latikanko nwɔ, baakple bafũbanutɛ. Batii ba mmle onwii lɛma ninle Areopago ɔnɔɔfo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Dionisio ku ɔsanko onwii bɔɔlɛɛ ni Damari ku babamba kafɔɔ.
44018001	Nni kamaa, Paulo ladie di Atene aasifi Korinto.
44018002	Nfa aakyɛ aalaanya Yuda otii wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Akwila, baalofo ni di Ponto. Nnwɔɔ ku ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ Priskila baakye Italia baawa nfa ninadiklɛ nii, diekye kasɔ nwu ɔka wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Klaudio labuɛ alɛ Yuda batii bamuu badie di Roma basifi. Paulo lakyɛ aalaanya ma,
44018003	ni aasiɛ di ɔkyɛ lɛma aatɔɔkyakaako ma nɛ, diekye babɔkɛɛ akũ akpanta bablatɛ baale fɛ nnwɔɔ. Ɔkpɛ nwu kafɔɔ abla aatoole nɛ.
44018004	Di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi biala, Paulo nkyɛ Yuda batii kasiisakɔ anaatoodiki sɛlaa kasɔ antɔɔta Yuda batii ku Griki batii bamuu alɛ baakyisa situ lɛma.
44018005	Obe wɔ di Silas ku Timoteo lakye Makedonia baawa nii, Paulo layɔ obe nɔɔ omuu aata ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya oyie, ni aakpasa kamɛ aatuo Yuda batii nwu alɛ, nwaako, Yesu ninle nwɔ di Yaa lɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ.
44018006	Obe wɔ di Yuda batii nwu lataka baayila nwɔ ni di suoto, baabuɛ ni sɛlaa kpile, Paulo lasɔkɔ awu nɔɔ kudu aakpee ma, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nse biɛwɔɔ, nnɛɛ nii aku, nkpaa nii aku aye bamu atoo ale. Diɛyɔ di nua diesifi nii, nfɛ kosifi batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii nfũ, nnaatɔkɔ ma ɔlaa biene nwu.”
44018007	Nioso di Paulo ladie ni ninfa, aasifi aalaasiɛ di osuɔtɔ onwii nfũ, atale Yuda otii. Baatɔɔlɛɛ nwɔ Tito Yusto. Aale otii wɔ niatɔɔyɛkɛ ni Yaa, aasiɛ aakaako Yuda batii kasiisakɔ.
44018008	Kasiisakɔ nwɔ ɔnɔɔfo wɔ batɔɔlɛɛ ni Krispo ku leyo nɔɔ batii bamuu lafũ Saate baanu, Korinto batii kpinwu bawo kafɔɔ lanu ɔlaa nwu baafũ baanu, ni baakpeesa bamuu lɛma Yaa ntu nɛ.
44018009	Dii ninwii kakyɛ, Saate latɔkɔ Paulo di kɔlaafɔ kamɛ alɛ, “Tanyɛkɛ! Tandiɛ ɔlaa nwu kafɔɔ obuɛ.
44018010	Diekye nsiko fɔ, otii kuonwii kafɔɔ dilabafuo fɔ lɛsalɛsaa ɔbla. Batii kpinwu nkpe di okpoo wɔ mmle kamɛ bale mi ni bale.”
44018011	Nioso Paulo lasiɛ di okpoo nwu kamɛ lɛlɛɛ ninwii ku ɔfã, aatootuo batii Yaa ɔlaa.
44018012	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ baase ni Galio fɛ Roma batii abaa ɔnɔɔfo di Akaia kasɔ suoto, Yuda batii bawo labla onwii, baayɔ ɔlaa di Paulo suoto, baamufũ nwɔ baakpaa nwɔ baasifiko kakankɔ lɛma.
44018013	Baatɔkɔ abaa ɔnɔɔfo nwu alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle kɔmunikĩisa batii disibu alɛ baatoosumu Yaa di osuku wɔ nin-yɛ ni di kufiofa loo suoto.”
44018014	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di Paulo lakye kasɔ alɛ oodiki ni kanya, ni di Galio wɔ niale ni abaa ɔnɔɔfo labuɛ aatɔkɔ Yuda batii nwu alɛ, “Aye Yuda batii binu! Nse ɔlaa wɔ bikle biɛwa ko ni nfũ okpile wɔ nin-yɛ ni kuufiofa loo suoto kule yi, ntɔbawɛ otu nkyɔɔ ye ɔlaa kotoko.
44018015	Kafɔɔ diekye ni di aye bamu sɛlaa ɔnanfi di ayooto ku afiofa lee suoto yi, aye bamu bilaabuɛ. Diele ami beese alɛ kale kantɛ nta ye di sɛlaa se mmle suoto.”
44018016	Nioso aatososa ma aadiki di kakankɔ nɔɔ nwu.
44018017	Nioso batii dikudi le mmle lamufũ Sostene, nwɔ ninle ni kasiisakɔ lɛma nwu ɔnɔɔfo baapɛ nwɔ di kakankɔ nwu ɔlɔɔkɔ. Kafɔɔ Galio ditakpee kanya.
44018018	Paulo lasiɛ di bafũbanutɛ nfũ di Korinto okpoo kamɛ ayi kpinwu. Nni kamaa, aaklaa bafũbanutɛ nwu, ni di nnwɔɔ ku Akwila ku Priskila baafe di ntu osi baasifi Siria nɛ. Kafɔɔ fiɛ abasifi nii, Paulo lata baakpaasu nwɔ disi di Kenkrea, diekye di Yuda batii ɔsaabla kanya di ntam be aaka aatɛ ni oso.
44018019	Obe wɔ baabuo ni Efeso yi, aadiɛ Priskila ku Akwila ninfa. Kafɔɔ nnwɔɔ aasifi Yuda batii kasiisakɔ aalaabuo sɛɛlaa sɛwo kamɛ ku Yuda batii.
44018020	Baatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ asiɛko ma kɛkɛɛ, kafɔɔ obe ditawɛ nwɔ.
44018021	Ta nkpo oso aatoosifi nii, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nse Yaa letuna, makple nwa ye ɔkyɛ.” Ni aakple aalaabuo di oklo kamɛ aadie di Efeso aasifi nɛ.
44018022	Obe wɔ kafɔɔ aalaabuo ni Kaesarea, aakyɛ Yerusalem, ni aalaasɛɛsa bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni ninfa nɛ. Ni aafe aasifi Antiokia nɛ.
44018023	Paulo lasiɛ ninfa obe kɛɛkɛ, ni aasifi aalaafe di Galatia ku Frigia nsɔ suoto nɛ. Ni aatookpee bafũbanutɛ ba niawɛ ni ninfa bamuu osie nɛ.
44018024	Yuda otii onwii lawa Efeso. Baatɔɔlɛɛ nwɔ Apolo, baalofo nwɔ di Aleksandria. Aale otii wɔ niatofo ni lɛkakatɛ, aatofo Kɔkpana Klekle kamɛ sɛlaa nwaa kafɔɔ.
44018025	Baatuo nwɔ Saate osuku wɔ suoto baasiɛ ni nkpa, ɔtɔ lasiɛ nwɔ, nioso aabuɛ Yesu ɔlaa, aatuo asaa nwaa kafɔɔ di suoto nɔɔ. Kafɔɔ, Yohane ntu okpeesa ɔsaabla lete ko aatofo.
44018026	Nioso obe wɔ aayila aatɔɔkakatɛ ni ku sɛkambi di Yuda batii kasiisakɔ, Priskila ku Akwila lanu nwɔ, ni baakpaa nwɔ baasifiko leyo, baalaadiki Yaa sɛlaa nwu kamɛ nwaa baatɔɔ baakyakaa nɛ.
44018027	Nioso obe wɔ di Apolo latoobu diisi alɛ ɔkyɛ ni Akaia, Efeso bafũbanutɛ lakyakaako nwɔ, ni baakpana kukũ baata bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni di Akaia alɛ, nse ɛɛbabuo nfa, balolaa nwɔ bafũ nwaa. Obe wɔ aalaabuo ni nfa, aakyakaako batii kpinwu ba nintoofũ beenu nii, diefe ni di Yaa sibualɛ ɔnya oso.
44018028	Di sɛlaa se aananfiko ni Yuda batii di lɛkpaka yi, aayɔ suoto osie ku Kɔkpana Klekle kamɛ sɛlaa aakpasa sɛlaa kamɛ klekle alɛ, Yesu ninle nwɔ di Yaa lɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ.
44019001	Obe wɔ di Apolo lawɛ ni di Korinto yi, Paulo kafɔɔ lafe di nkpaa osuku kplɛ, aalaabuo Efeso. Nfa aakyɛ aalaanya bafũbanutɛ bawo nɛ.
44019002	Ni aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Diayɔ di obe wɔ biefũ bienu nii, bitoofũ Yaa Ninwuna Klekle?” Ni baadiki kanya lɛ, “Oowo, be ninle Yaa Ninwuna Klekle? Diidii buunu ɔlaa kuonwii nkpo.”
44019003	Ni di Paulo lakple aakaalɛ ma alɛ, “Ɔmɛ Yaa ntu okpeesa biafũ mɔ?” Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Yohane, Yaa Ntu Kpeesatɛ nnle nwu.”
44019004	Ni di Paulo ladiki kasɔ aatuo ma alɛ, “Yohane lakpeesa batii ba nintookyi ni siikpile lɛma kamɛ ku Yaa ntu. Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ bafũ otii wɔ ninkpi nwɔ kamaa ɔɔwa ni banu. Otii nwu ninle Yesu Kristo nɛ.”
44019005	Nioso baanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, baata baakpeesa ma Yaa ntu di Saate Yesu leyooto kamɛ.
44019006	Obe wɔ kafɔɔ di Paulo latika ma ni nnɛɛ di suoto, Yaa Ninwuna lawa ma di suoto, ni baakyako sele ate ate obuɛ, baabuɛ Yaa ɔlaa kafɔɔ nɛ.
44019007	Lɛpɔ lɛma lawo fɛ basuɔtɔ lefosi banyɔ.
44019008	Paulo lakyɛ Yuda batii kasiisakɔ aalaatoodiki sɛlaa kamɛ aatɔɔta ma ku otu okpee awɛntɛ atiɛ. Aamiɛ alɛ oomunikĩisa ma disibu anta Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu suoto.
44019009	Kafɔɔ batii bawo lawɛ otokopĩ kaamɛ lɛma, batafũ ɔlaa nwu baanu, baatii dikudi anu lɛɛkpaka baabuɛ sɛlaa kpile di Saate sisuku suoto. Nioso Paulo lakpaa mba niafũ baanu ni aasifiko Tirano asaa katuoko aalaatootuo ma asaa ninfa dii biala.
44019010	Di alɛɛ anyɔ kamɛ, aatuo asaa, ni di ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle labiɛ kuakyaka Asia kasɔ kamuu nɛ. Nioso batii ba ninle ni Yuda batii ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii kafɔɔ baanu ɔlaa nwu.
44019011	Yaa labla sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ siekyi ni lete aafenko di Paulo suoto.
44019012	Nse bia bɛɛyɔ awu nɔɔ awo kafɔɔ bɛɛlaatika di bafiɛtɛ suoto mansie, anwuna kpile kafɔɔ latoodie di batii ba kamɛ asiɛ nii.
44019013	Yuda batii bawo ba niakyɛ baatookyi baatootososa ni anwuna kpile kafɔɔ lamiɛ alɛ bɔɔyɔ Saate Yesu leyooto mantososa anwuna kpile. Ni baabuɛ alɛ, “Bulɛ die di Yesu otii wɔ suoto di Paulo kɔkakatɛ nii!”
44019014	Yuda batii olebatatɛ ɔnɔɔfo wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Skeva, babi suɔtɔbi bakuɛnsĩ niatɔɔbla asaa ya mmle.
44019015	Kafɔɔ baakakatɛ baata ni ninwuna kpile ninwii, ninwuna kpile nwu labuɛ alɛ, “N-ye Yesu, n-ye kafɔɔ Paulo. Aye mɔ, bawe bile?”
44019016	Nioso Otii wɔ suoto di ninwuna kpile nwu lasiɛ nii, latu aabuo ma di suoto aakpɛko ma, aalenkee ma. Aatika ma nkɔ nwaa, ni baatoso baadie leeyo kamɛ ku akyɔtɔ nɛ!
44019017	Lɛsaa le niawa ni ninfũ mmle lakyaka Efeso okpoo omuu, alɛ Yuda batii ku okpoo nwu batii bamuu lanu. Ta nkpo oso, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ ma nwaa, nioso baayɔ dibu baata Yesu leyooto osie kanya.
44019018	Nioso batii ba niakyisa ni situ lɛma, lawa babadiki sikpile lɛma baabuɛ di batii anu.
44019019	Nioso batii ba niasiɛ ma ni kaamɛ baale ni bafatɛ, layɔ sɛfakũ ku afa akũ lɛma baabatɛ, ni baakpee nya ɔtɔ di batii anu nɛ. Baasiisa ni akũ nwu nkpo baakpee ni ɔtɔ kɔya labla fɛ koto futu nkpe afosi anɔɔ.
44019020	Osuku wɔ mmle suoto di Yaa ɔlaa lafe kuatɔɔkpɛ kuatoomuɔ ni ku osie nɛ.
44019021	Di nle mmle kamaa, Yaa Ninwuna ladiki aatuo Paulo alɛ alaafe di Makedonia ku Akaia asifi Yerusalem. Paulo labuɛ kafɔɔ alɛ, “Nse lebuo nfa yi, dikpe nii lɛkyɛ lɛlaanyu Roma kafɔɔ.”
44019022	Nioso aakpee bakyakaakotɛ nɔɔ banyɔ, Timoteo ku Erasto, ni baale nwɔ katũ baasifi Makedonia nɛ. Ni aakple aasiɛ di Asia ninfa obe kɛkɛɛ aakyakaa nɛ.
44019023	Di obe nwu kamɛ, kudu kplɛ kunwii lawa di Efeso ta Kristo ofũ onu osuku nwu otikanko oso.
44019024	Nle mmle lakye kasɔ di otii wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Demetrio, nwɔ nin-yɔ koto fututu ambla afiɔ sanko ya baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Artemis leyo ansunsũ anta ni batii. Ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle ɔbla lananfi nfasũ diawako bakpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ.
44019025	Dii ninwii, Demetrio lalɛɛ batii ba mmle ku koto banyanakĩisatɛ ba nikɔbla ni ɔkpɛ lɛma nwu okle, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Babiloo, biye bilɛ lɛlɛ loo lekye ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle buɔbla ni kamɛ.
44019026	Nunua, bionu, biɔnya kafɔɔ klekle lɛsaa le di Paulo kɔbla nii. Ɔɔtɔkɔ batii aamunikĩisa ma disibu alɛ, afiɔ ya bɛɛyɔ nnɛɛ bɛɛbla ni diele afiɔ ya baawa kasɔ manta nii. Diele Efeso ninfũ lete oobuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle. Atoobuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle di Asia kasɔ kamuu suoto. Batii kafɔɔ ntoofũ beenu!
44019027	Nioso nfɛ dibata alɛ ɔkpɛ loo nlalaa. Diele bia nni lete, nfɛ dibata kafɔɔ alɛ batii dilabansimbu afiɔ sanko loo Artemis leyo bakpee di lɛsalɛsaa kamɛ. Nimuɔ nɔɔ kafɔɔ mayu. Nse nnwɔɔ ninle afiɔ ya bɔɔwa kasɔ manta ni di Asia kakɔ biala ku kayi kamuu fiɛ!”
44019028	Obe wɔ baanu ni Demetrio lɛkakatɛ nwu, ɔblɔ lafiɛ ma, ni baakyako kudu oyiisa baatoobuɛ alɛ, “Efeso Afiɔ Sanko Artemis ninle Afiɔ Kplɛ ya ninlenke nii!”
44019029	Nioso okpoo nwu omuu kamɛ layii ku kudu. Ninfɛ baasi dikudi, baamufũ Paulo bakpɛmblatɛ wo nɔɔ banyɔ ba bɔɔlɛɛ ni Gaio ku Aristarko ba niakyɛ ni Makedonia nɛ. Ni baakpaa ma baasifiko okpoo nwu kakankɔ nɛ.
44019030	Nioso Paulo kafɔɔ, lamiɛ alɛ oobuo baatii nwu kamɛ ankyɛ nfa, kafɔɔ bafũbanutɛ nwu ninfa ditatɔɔ osuku.
44019031	Nntɛɛ nwu banɔɔfotii ba niale ni Paulo basiɛwo, baakpee nwɔ otii, baatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ, atankpɛnsa suoto ɔkyɔɔsa bia kafii!
44019032	Di obe nwu kamɛ, kudu layii kasikɔ lɛma nwu kamɛ. Nioso batii ba niakyɛ ni nfa, otii ku ɔlaa nɔɔ aatoobuɛ. Nioso batii kpinwu ditatofo lɛsaa le oso baasi ni ninfa.
44019033	Ninfɛ di Yuda batii nwu lata Aleksandro layila ma kaanya alɛ adiki lɛsaa le niɛwa ni kamɛ ata ma. Nioso Aleksandro latakatɛsa kɔnɛɛ katoo alɛ balo kanana aatɔkɔ ma ɔlaa.
44019034	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ baatii ba mmle latofo alɛ Yuda otii ale nii, baakyɛ kasɔ baatooyiisa kudu osie kanya, diaklɛ fɛ abombo anyɔ. Ni baatoobuɛ alɛ, “Efeso Afiɔ Sanko Artemis ninle Afiɔ Kplɛ ya ninlenke nii!”
44019035	Yɛntɛ yɛntɛ fiɛ di okpoo nwu kukũ kpanatɛ lafuo ma ni olosa, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Efeso batii wo nii, awo ba dudu buye bulɛ Efeso ninfũ ninle Artemis Afiɔ Kplɛ kasiɛkɔ. Buye kafɔɔ bulɛ difuɔ klekle nwu niakpa diakye ni osi, ɔkyɛ loo ninfũ dite.
44019036	Otii kuonwii dilabafuo ɔlaa wɔ mmle obuɛ alɛ kuote nkpo. Nkpo oso bitɛ situ kaasɔ, bitambla lɛsalɛsaa ku ɔblɔ.
44019037	Batii ba mmle biemufũ biɛwako ni nfũ yi, baayu lɛsalɛsa bakyeko Artemis Afiɔ Sanko leyo, baakpɔnɔnfɔsa nwɔ leyooto kafɔɔ.
44019038	Kafɔɔ nse Demetrio ku bakpɛntɛ wo nɔɔ lɛnya alɛ bakpe ɔlaa owo ku otii owo, ɔlaa bakantɛ nkpe ninfũ. Bukpe ayi ya kafɔɔ manka ni sɛlaa. Baafuo ɔlaa nwu ɔyɔ ɔwako nfũ. Mambuɛ manta ma di osuku kanya.
44019039	Kafɔɔ nse ɔlaa bamba owo kule yi, ni biɛta babuɛ di okpoo banɔɔfo nfũ bata ye.
44019040	Diekye nle mmle niɛwa nii, nse bielolaa binyu, babayɔ ɔlaa di suoto lee di kudu ko mmle oso. Mia kafɔɔ bilabafuo kanya odiki. Babananfi ye kootoko.”
44019041	Obe wɔ aabuɛ sɛlaa se mmle aloo nii, aata ma baasamii.
44020001	Di obe wɔ kuudu nwu nkpo ntooloo nii, Paulo lalɛɛ bafũbanutɛ nwu nkpo aasiisa. Aakpee ma osie. Ni aakaalɛ ma osuku, aadie aasifi Makedonia nɛ.
44020002	Di osuku nɔɔ ɔkyɛ kamɛ, Paulo lafe di nntɛɛ nwu sekpoo kamɛ, aakpee batii osie ku Yaa ɔlaa, fiɛ nfɛ aalaabuo Akaia.
44020003	Aasiɛ ninfa awɛntɛ atiɛ. Di obe wɔ aatoololaa suoto alɛ oosifi ni Siria, ni aatofo alɛ, Yuda batii bawo kɔtɛ nwɔ kalá di osuku alɛ babablo nwɔ. Nioso aabla disibu alɛ, ookple anaafe di Makedonia ansifi.
44020004	Nioso obe wɔ aatoosifi nii, batii bawo latikanko nwɔ. Batii nwu niale Sopater wɔ niakye ni Beroia ale ni Piro obi ku Aristarko ku Sekundo baakye ni Tesalonika ku Gaio wɔ niakye ni Derbe ku Tihiko ku Trofimo ba niakye ni Asia ntɛɛ nwu ku Timoteo.
44020005	Baale katũ baalaasoko wo di okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Troa.
44020006	Nioso obe wɔ di Yuda batii bloblo wɔ ninantaka ni ayi ole lafe nii, buayɔ oklo di Filipi, ni buasifi bualaakyakako ma di Troa di ayi anɔɔ sɛmaa. Ni buasiɛ ninfa ayi akuɛnsĩ nɛ.
44020007	Dii kasale di nawɔkyi kamɛ, buasi dikudi di Yaa opunu katũ alesaa ole suoto. Diekye Paulo kɔwa ni ɔbasifi kaleesɛ oso, aakakatɛ diaklɛ, dialadu bia nkyɛntɛɛ.
44020008	Nioso baasɔ bakandiɛ kpinwu baabase di ayo ya beetofo beetika ni baawo nle kamɛ buasiɛ ni di osi.
44020009	Obe wɔ di Paulo latɔɔkakatɛ ditɔɔklɛ nii, sɛkyɔsĩ layɔ okosopo wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Eutiko di obe wɔ aasiɛ ni di sɛfle kotoko di ayo nwɔ osi. Obe wɔ atɔɔkyɔsĩi eesifi ni kamɛ, ni aakpa aakye ayo nwu letofo sitiɛ osi aabapɛ kaasɔ nɛ. Baakyɛ baalaakɛnkɛ nwɔ nii, aatookpi.
44020010	Kafɔɔ di Paulo lasoo aakyɛ ni kasɔ, aamufũ osuɔtɔbi nwu aakpee di suoto, aabuɛ alɛ, “Bitampɛ kamuntũ! Akpe nkpa!”
44020011	Nioso bamuu lɛma baakple baasifi leyo nwu osi. Ni baalaale opunu katũ alesaa nwu nɛ. Paulo lakple aakakatɛ ko ma dialaase di obe wɔ kaale lasɛ ni fiɛ nfɛ aasifi.
44020012	Baakpaa okosopo nwu kafɔɔ baasɛnkɛsa ni baasifiko leyo. Nioso otu late ma.
44020013	Ninfɛ di Paulo lafe di nkpaa osuku aasifi Aso nɛ. Kafɔɔ awo ba niatoofe ni nfa ku nnwɔɔ, buayɔ oklo buale nwɔ katũ bulɛ bubalaatɔɔkyaka ninfa munkpaa nwɔ fɛ mmle okle aabuɛ nii.
44020014	Nioso obe wɔ aabakyakako wo ni di Aso, ni di awo ba dudu buayɔ oklo buasifi Mitilene nɛ.
44020015	Kaleesɛ, bualaabuo Kio. Dii nyɔɔfa, bualaabuo Samo. Dii tiɛfa kafɔɔ bualaabuo Mileto.
44020016	Paulo lamiɛ alɛ buɔɔwaalɛ Efeso munfe, diekye atamiɛ alɛ ɔɔlalaasa obe kuonwii di Asia kasɔ ninfa. Diekye aamiɛ alɛ nse diaaba nwɔ, abuo Yerusalem fiɛ di Pentekoste dii nwu diwo.
44020017	Nioso obe wɔ baalaabuo ni Mileto, Paulo lakpee Efeso bafũbanutɛ banɔɔfotii otii alɛ bawa babakyakako nwɔ.
44020018	Obe wɔ baawa nii, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Babiloo, biye mmle okle lasiɛ ye ni di ɔkyɛ obe lele, diayɔ ni di dii kasale, di obe wɔ lababuo ni Asia kasɔ suoto diɛbase ni di nua.
44020019	Bianya mmle okle labla ni Saate ɔkpɛ di suoto kasɔ ɔwakosa kamɛ, nu lafe di dibuo ku kaku owi kamɛ diɛ Yuda batii omiɛ wɔ baamiɛ alɛ booloe ni oso.
44020020	Kafɔɔ biye bilɛ ninkookaa ye lɛsaa lee nimakyakaako ye nii, nle n-ye ni di Yaa suoto, di Yaa ɔlaa obuɛ ku otuo kamɛ, lɛɛkpaka ku ayo le kamɛ.
44020021	Kakɔ lele lakyɛ, laka Yuda batii ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii osie kanya nlɛ, badiɛ sikpile ɔbla, baakyi basifi Yaa nfũ, baafũ Saate Yesu Kristo kafɔɔ banu.
44020022	“Nunua kafɔɔ, Yaa Ninwuna kɔtɔkɔ mi alɛ ntɔɔkyɛ Yerusalem, ninye kafɔɔ lɛsaa le nimanawa mi ni di suoto ninfa.
44020023	Kafɔɔ lɛsaa le ko n-ye ninle alɛ, di okpoo lele kamɛ, Yaa Ninwuna ntɛɛ letofo alɛ leyo ote ku dibuo nsokoe ninfa.
44020024	Nkpa nii diedie lɛsalɛsaa ditɛɛ. Lɛsaa le niefĩ mi ni ninle alɛ kabla lɛsaa le di Saate Yesu lekpee mi alɛ mbla nii. Lɛsaa le di Yesu lekpee mi alɛ mbla ni ninle alɛ, katɔkɔ batii Saate ɔlaa biene nwu fɛ mmle di Yaa lɛnya wo ni nyaami.
44020025	“Nunua n-ye nlɛ aye ba nianu mi ni asaa otuo di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu suoto, kuonwii lee dilabasinnyɛɛ.
44020026	Nioso kɔta ye letofo miɛ wɔ mmle nlɛ, nse onwii lee leyu didiki nɔɔ, blɔbalo mi lɛpɔɔ diidii.
44020027	Diekye ninkookaa ye lɛsalɛsa di Yaa komiɛ alɛ biabla nii.
44020028	Ta nle mmle oso, bilolaa suoto binyu. Diekye Yaa Ninwuna niɛbla ye batunletɛ alɛ biaklee babi nɔɔ ba ɛɛyɔ eekpee ye ni di nnɛɛ. Bilolaa ma biklee, diekye Yaa lewii Obi nɔɔ ntɔ kaasɔ diisi lɛma eediki ma.
44020029	N-ye kafɔɔ nlɛ, nse ntoosifi, batii mataka ye di suoto mansamiisa ye, blɔbanya ye nyaami. Fɛ mmle okle di ɔkplɛle ntikanko ni bafoso ansamiisa ma nii.
44020030	Bia batii bawo kaamɛ le, mataka manyila di nwaako ɔlaa nwu suoto, mankyɔkyɔ ye mintikanko ma.
44020031	Bilolaa binyu, bienyuma mmle okle layɔ nnumɛɛ owi kafɔɔ latuo ye ni asaa kakũ ku kakyɛ di alɛɛ atiɛ ya lasiɛ ye ni kaamɛ.
44020032	“Nunua yi, kɔyɔ ye nkpee di Yaa nnɛɛ kamɛ, alɛ aayɔ ɔlaa nɔɔ anle ye sibualɛ. Ɔlaa nɔɔ wɔ ninkpee ni batii nɔɔ osie ku mmle kubata ye minle ni Yaa kafa asaa ku batii ba bamuu eediki eese lete ɛɛta ni suoto.
44020033	Ntasɛɛsa anu di otii kuonwii koto ee awu suoto.
44020034	Aye bamu biye bilɛ nnɛɛ nii be mmle layɔ labla ɔkpɛ wɔ labla latoole nii, nwu kafɔɔ layɔ latoonyu batii ba niatikankoe buatɔɔbla ni ɔkpɛ nɛ.
44020035	Labla asaa ya mmle amuu layɔ latuo ye mmle okle buatɔɔkyakaa ko ni bapiitɛ. Binyuma kafɔɔ ɔlaa wɔ di Saate Yesu labuɛ ni, ‘Ɔta nwako dikusɛkusɛ ninlenke ofũ.’ ”
44020036	Obe wɔ di Paulo laloo ni lɛkakatɛ nɔɔ, ni aapɛ akunkyi kaasɔ, ni manko ma baapɛ ɔlaa baata Yaa nɛ.
44020037	Batii nwu bamuu lakpee nwɔ nnɛɛ siimu baawi, baafifiɔ nwɔ akpoo, ta oosifi andiɛ ma ni oso.
44020038	Lɛsaa le kafɔɔ niabla ma ni nyaami ninle alɛ, aabuɛ alɛ, blɔbasinkple banyɔɔ. Ninfɛ baatikanko nwɔ baakpaa nwɔ baalaadunko oklo katũ nɛ.
44021001	Di obe wɔ butɔɔklaa ma buoloo nii, buasifi bualaabuo di oklo kamɛ buataalɛ buasifi Kos. Ni kaale lasiɛ nii, buasifi bualaabuo Rodo, buadie ninfa buasifi Patara.
44021002	Nfa buayɔ oklo onwii niatoofe ni Foenisia, buasifi nɛ.
44021003	Buanya Kipro kasɔ, ni buawaalɛ nfa buafe di nkpaalɔ lɛkyɛ bualaabuo Tiro okpoo Seria kasɔ. Ni buakyɛ lɛba le baatoofe ni atoo odiki di oklo nwu kamɛ nɛ.
44021004	Ni buasoo di oklo nwu kamɛ buakyɛ bualaanya bafũbanutɛ ba niawɛ ni ninfa nɛ. Buasiɛ di ɔkyɛ lɛma ayi akuɛnsĩ. Yaa Ninwuna ladiki aatuo ma lɛɛsaa le nimanawa ni di Paulo suoto. Nioso baatɔkɔ Paulo alɛ, atankyɛ Yerusalem.
44021005	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di ayi ya buasiɛ ni ninfa laloo ni buoosifi nii, bafũbanutɛ ba mmle ku basɔfɔ lɛma ku babi bamuu, baakpaa wo bualadu lekpo kotoko, ni bamuu loo buapɛ akunkyi buapɛ ɔlaa buata Yaa nɛ.
44021006	Ni buaklaa bawo nɛ. Ninfɛ bualaabuo di oklo kamɛ, ni di mma kafɔɔ baakple baasifi ayo nɛ.
44021007	Buadie ni di Tiro, buabayila di Ptolemai. Ni buakyɛ bualaasɛɛsa bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni ninfa nɛ. Buasiɛ di ɔkyɛ lɛma dii ninwii.
44021008	Kaleesɛ, buadie ninfa buasifi Kaesarea. Ni buakyɛ bualaasiɛ di Yaa ɔlaa biene buɛtɛ Filipo nfũ nɛ. Aasiɛ di bakyakaakotɛ bakuɛnsĩ ba baadiki ni kamɛ di Yerusalem.
44021009	Aawɛ babi kpeelebitɛ bana, manadiyɔ ni asa, Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ kafɔɔ baale.
44021010	Buasiɛ ninfa ayi awo. Obe wɔ buawɛ ni ninfa, Yaa ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ onwii baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Agabo lakye Yudea aawa nfa.
44021011	Obe wɔ aawa wo ni ɔkyɛ yi, ni aayɔ Paulo ofiamɛ, aanii nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ nnɛɛ ku nkpaa, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Yaa Ninwuna Klekle kobuɛ alɛ, nkpo okle di Yuda batii manii otii wɔ nimba ni ofiamɛ wɔ mmle di Yerusalem, man-yɔ nwɔ mankpee di batii ba ninanle Yuda batii nnɛɛ kamɛ nɛ.”
44021012	Nioso obe wɔ buanu ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle, awo ku batii ba niawɛ ni ninfa, buatikiti Paulo lekoto bulɛ atankyɛ Yerusalem.
44021013	Nfanwu aatɔkɔ wo alɛ, “Be oso biowi kaku mimbiɛsɛɛ otu nkpo? Ninlolaa suoto nta leyo ote lete di Yerusalem, letuna nlɛ bia kakpi ninfa ta Saate Yesu oso.”
44021014	Nioso obe wɔ buanya bulɛ, bulɔbafuo nwɔ ni disibu okyisa, buadiɛ nwɔ, ni buabuɛ bulɛ, “Yaa dibiesaa diwa kaanya.”
44021015	Di ayi asɛɛ awo kamaa, bualolaa suoto buasifi Yerusalem.
44021016	Bafũbanutɛ bawo kafɔɔ di Kaesarea latikanko wo. Ni baakpaa wo baasifiko ɔnɔɔfo wɔ niakye ni Kipro baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Mnason nfũ alɛ, bulaasoosa ninfa. Ɔnɔɔfo wɔ mmle lale otii wɔ niafũ aanu ni kofokofoko.
44021017	Obe wɔ buabuo ni Yerusalem, bafũbanutɛ ba niawɛ ni ninfa baafũ wo ku suoto lɛyɔɔ.
44021018	Kaleesɛ, Paulo lakpaa wo buakyɛ bualaanya Yakobo, Yerusalem bafũbanutɛ banɔɔfo bamuu kafɔɔ lawɛ ninfa.
44021019	Buasɛɛsa ma bualoo nii, Paulo latɔkɔ ma asaa ya amuu di Yaa labla aafenko ni di nnwɔɔ Paulo suoto, di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii kamɛ.
44021020	Baanu nwɔ ɔlaa baaloo nii, bamuu lɛma baatansa Yaa. Ni baatɔkɔ wɔ alɛ, “Obiloo, faye? Batii nkpe nkpe ba ninle ni Yuda batii batoofũ beenu nii, lemufũ Mose kufiofa nwu bakle kpinkpĩ.
44021021	Bawo latɔkɔ ma alɛ footuo Yuda batii ba bamuu ninkpe ni di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii kasɔ falɛ batantikanko Mose kufiofa. Diɛkyakaa nii, falɛ batambudi babi lɛma asɔkɔsɔkɔ ee batikanko afiofa lɛma.
44021022	Lɛ nfɛ buɔbla nunua? Diekye babanu alɛ fatɔɔwa.”
44021023	Nioso baabuko nwɔ disi alɛ, “Basuɔtɔ bana bawo nsi wo kaamɛ, bɛɛka ni ntam.
44021024	Kpaa ma fasifiko Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ nfa. Kpaasu disi nwu ku mma. Faakyakaako ma bata disi ɔkpaasu koto ko manta ni. Nle mmle mata otii biala nnya alɛ, sɛlaa se baabuɛ ni di suoto lɛfɔ diete nkpo. Ni bia afɔ omu lɛfɔ, fɔɔbla di Mose kufiofa nwu suoto.
44021025	Kafɔɔ mba ninanle ni Yuda batii batookyi beekple ni bafũbanutɛ, buakpana kukũ, ni buatɔkɔ ma bulɛ, badiɛ alesaa ya bɛɛyɔ bɛɛta ni afiɔ olé ole, baadiɛ kafɔɔ ntɔ onyi, batanle babɔkɛɛ ba kafɔɔ beenwunukũusa simu beelo nii, baadiɛ kafɔɔ lɛsɔnɔkpee.”
44021026	Nioso kaleesɛ Paulo lakpaa basuɔtɔ ba mmle nwu, ni baakyɛ baalaabla disi ɔkpaasu amanle nwu. Nni sɛmaa, aakyɛ Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ aalaata lɛtatofo ayi ya di disi ɔkpaasu nwu mafũ nii, ku obe wɔ babayɔ asaa manwako, manta ni ole diisi lɛma.
44021027	Kafɔɔ ditoobu ayi asɛɛ di ayi akuɛnsĩ nwu mawo nii, Yuda batii bawo lakye Asia kasɔ baawa baabanya Paulo di Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ. Ni baasiisa batii bawo dikudi, baamufũ nwɔ nɛ.
44021028	Ni baayiisa kudu alɛ, “Israel basuɔtɔ biwa bibakyakaako wo kyu woo! Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle kokyi aba aba antuo asaa anyila di Yuda batii suoto, Mose kufiofa suoto, ku Yaa Olekatakɔ suoto. Ɛɛkpaa Griki batii bia eebuoko Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ, ɔɔkpɔnɔnfɔsa lɛba klekle le mmle!”
44021029	Baabuɛ nkpo diekye di obe owo kamɛ, baanya alɛ, Paulo ku Trofimo wɔ ninle ni Efeso otii nkyɛ di Yerusalem okpoo. Nioso baabu alɛ aakpaa nwɔ aakyɛnko Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ.
44021030	Ta kudu nwu baatooyiisa ni oso, batii bamuu lataka baatoso baakyɛ baalaamufũ Paulo baananfi nwɔ baadiki di Yaa Olekatatɔ. Baamufũ nyoko baasɛɛ.
44021031	Di obe wɔ baamiɛ alɛ boolo nwɔ nii, Roma batii bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo lanu alɛ kudu ntoobuo di Yerusalem okpoo omuu kamɛ.
44021032	Nfanwu, ni aakpaa bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo bawo ku bakpɛtɛ baakyɛ lɛba le kuudu nwu nkpe ni nɛ. Obe wɔ kuudu bakpeetɛ nwu lanya ni bakpɛtɛ nwu ku ɔnɔɔfo lɛma, baadiɛ Paulo ɔpɛ.
44021033	Nfanwu bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo nwu lamufũ Paulo, ni aata baayɔ ɛkpɛnkyɛ ɛnyɔ baakpee nwɔ nɛ. Ni aakaalɛ alɛ, “Owe ninle osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle, be ɛɛbla?”
44021034	Di batii nwu kamɛ otii biala ku ɔlaa nɔɔ baatoobuɛ. Kudu nwu oso bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo nɔɔfo nwu ditatofo lɛsaa le niawa nii, nioso aata alɛ bakpaa Paulo balaatɛ di leyo katenkɔ.
44021035	-
44021036	Obe wɔ baadu ni kayoko nkatakɔ, nfɛ diabawa alɛ bakpɛtɛ ba mmle lakɛnkɛ Paulo ninfa diekye anu lasɛɛ batii nwu di Paulo suoto. Nioso batii nwu latikanko ma ku kudu osie kanya baatoobuɛ alɛ, “Balo nwɔ!”
44021037	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ nfɛ babayɔ Paulo mankpee ni leeyo kamɛ, aatɔkɔ bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo onwii alɛ, “Komiɛ nlɛ nkakatɛ kafɔɔ kɛɛkɛɛ.” Ni di bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo nwu lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Beeye! Foonu Griki sele?”
44021038	Ni aakple aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Ni faale Egipte otii wɔ niakpaa batiilotɛ nkpe nna ba niataka baayila ni di abaa suoto obe owo nitɔɔbafe ni kamɛ, baatoso baasifi ni ɔfaafuu kasɔ?”
44021039	Ninfɛ di Paulo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Yuda otii nle. Lekye Tarso di Kilikia kasɔ. Okpoo nwu kafɔɔ, okpoo finle kule. Lekoto, tikɛɛ nkakatɛ nta batii ba mmle.”
44021040	Ninfɛ di bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo nwu latuna alɛ Paulo akakatɛ ata ma nɛ. Ni di Paulo lataka aayila di kayoko kakatakɔ nwu, ni aawii ma kɔnnɛɛ alɛ balo kanana. Obe wɔ baalo ni kanana, ni aakakatɛ ko ma di Yuda batii sele kamɛ alɛ,
44022001	“Teete anɛ ku babiloo, bikyɔɔ mi atoko, biɛtɛɛ ndiki suoto kanya di anu lee bienu.”
44022002	Di obe wɔ baanu alɛ Yuda batii sele ɔɔkakatɛko ma nii, baakple balo kanana baalenkee lɛkasale. Ni di Paulo latɔkɔ ma alɛ,
44022003	“Yuda otii nle, baalofo mi kafɔɔ di Tarso di Kilikia kasɔ suoto. Kafɔɔ, Yerusalem baaklee mi lakyɛ sukuu. Gamaliel nfũ latekete asaa. Baatuo mi bawa loo afiofa nwu klekle. Layɔ otu nii lata Yaa, lasumu nwɔ ku okyiini fɛ mmle okle di ayee biɔbla ni miɛ.
44022004	Diayɔ ni di obe nwu, latikanko bafũbanutɛ ba niatɔɔkyɛ ni di Kristo osuku nwu suoto, lata baalo ma. Lamufũ basuɔtɔ ku basanko kafɔɔ latɛ leeyo katenkɔ.
44022005	Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo ku kasiisakɔ ɔnɔɔfo biala n-ye alɛ ɔlaa wɔ kobuɛ ni nte nkpo, diekye mma ninkpana akũ mantɛɛ fiɛ nimbla asaa ya mmle. Ni di obe wɔ latoofe ni Damasko, baatɛɛ osie alɛ, nse lɛnya bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni ninfa, nimmufũ ma, nkpee ma sɛkpɛnkyɛ, ninkpaa ma nwako Yerusalem baananfi ma di atoko.
44022006	“Di obe wɔ kofe ni Damasko ditoobu kɛɛkɛɛ mabuo nii, fɛ kakũ lefosi elomu ɛnyɔ kamɛ, nfanwu lakpa le ninkpe ni osie lakye osi diabakpete mi, diamana mi diakyi!
44022007	Ninfɛ lanɔɔ lapɛ kaasɔ nɛ, ni lanu sɛlɔ sinwĩi kɔkakatɛkoe alɛ, ‘Saulo, Saulo, be oso fatikankoe nkpo?’
44022008	“Ni lakaalɛ nlɛ, ‘Saate, owe fale?’ “Ni aakple aatɔkɔ mi alɛ, ‘Ami ninle Yesu Nasaret Otii wɔ fatikanko ni osie kanya.’
44022009	Munko batii ba niakyɛ ni lanya lɛkpa nwu, kafɔɔ batanu otii wɔ niatɔkakatɛkoe ni sɛlɔ.
44022010	“Ni lakaalɛ nwɔ nlɛ, ‘Saate, be nimbla?’ “Ni aatɔkɔ mi alɛ, ‘Taka, faatɔɔkyɛ Damasko okpoo. Nfa babatɔkɔ fɔ asaa ya amuu di Yaa lɛtɛ alɛ fababla nii.’
44022011	Anu labiɛ mi, ta ɔtɔ nwu lɛkpa osie oso. Nioso munko mba niakyɛ ni nfɛ niaklee mi ninnɛɛ bualaabuo Damasko.
44022012	“Osuɔtɔ onwii lawɛ di okpoo nwu, bɔɔlɛɛ nwɔ ni Anania. Aale otii wɔ ninyɛkɛ ni Yaa nwaa, aamufũ afiofa loo kafɔɔ aaklee osie kanya. Yuda batii ba bamuu kafɔɔ ninkpe ni ninfa mmbu nwɔ osie kanya.
44022013	Otii wɔ mmle labayila di ɔlɔɔkɔ nii, ni aabuɛ alɛ, ‘Obiloo Saulo, tikikti anu!’ Nfanwu, anu latikiti mi, ni lanyu nwɔ nɛ!
44022014	Ni aatɔkɔ mi alɛ, ‘Bawa loo Yaa niediki fɔ alɛ faatofo nwɔ dibiesaa, fannya Klekletɛ nɔɔ nwu kafɔɔ, fannu nwɔ sɛlɔ kafɔɔ.
44022015	Diekye fabale nwɔ ɔlaa buɛtɛ di aba aba fantɔkɔ batii bamuu lɛsaa le fɛɛnya ni ku nle feenu nii.
44022016	Nunua be feekple fasoko? Taka, faafũ ntu okpeesa amanle nwu. Faalɛɛ nwɔ, aafotofɔ sikpile adiki di suoto.’
44022017	“Nni kamaa, lakple lasifi Yerusalem. Obe wɔ lawɛ di Yaa Olekatakɔ latɔɔpɛ ɔlaa latɔɔta ni Yaa yi, diabla mi fɛ sɛkyɔsĩ niayɔ mi, ni lanya odiki otuo nɛ.
44022018	Nfa nfɛ di Saate omu latɔkɔ mi alɛ, ‘Pɛsɛwa faadie di Yerusalem, diekye nfũ mmle batii dilabanu fɔ ɔlaa wɔ fababuɛ ni di suoto nii.’
44022019	“Kafɔɔ ladiki kanya labuɛ nlɛ, ‘Saate, bamuu lɛma baye alɛ nkyɛ Yuda batii nsiisakɔ naamufũ mba niefũ fɔ beenu nii mpɛ ma.
44022020	Di obe wɔ baatoolo ni ɔlaa buɛtɛ lɛfɔ Stefano, lawɛ ninfa, latunako ma, mba niatoolo nwɔ nii, baadiki akpeele lɛma baatɛɛ laklee di obe wɔ bɔɔsafɔ nwɔ ni afuɔ.’
44022021	“Kafɔɔ Saate nwu latɔkɔ mi alɛ, ‘Taka, faatɔɔkyɛ, diekye makyesee fɔ fanfa di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii kamɛ!’ ”
44022022	Di obe nwu kamɛ, batii ba mmle layila kloklo baatoonu Paulo ɔlaa. Kafɔɔ obe wɔ aabuɛ ni ɔlaa yɛntɛle wɔ mmle, bamuu lɛma baayiisa kudu osie kanya alɛ, “Aa! Bilo nwɔ, diɛkaatɛ alɛ aakple ansiɛ nkpa!”
44022023	Ni baayiisa kudu osie kanya, baakyako awu lɛma ɔbɛbɛɛ, ni baatɔɔsa kɔtɛ kafɔɔ di osi ku ɔblɔ nɛ.
44022024	Ni baakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo nwu lata alɛ bakpaa Paulo balaakpee leeyo nwu kamɛ baapɛ nwɔ baawolaa kamɛ lɛsaa le oso di Yuda batii nwu diloomiɛ alɛ banyɔɔ ni anu.
44022025	Di obe wɔ baatoonii nwɔ alɛ bɔɔpɛ nii, Paulo lakaalɛ bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo onwii alɛ, “Osuku kule alɛ baapɛ Roma otii wɔ manadikanko balo nwɔ ni lɛpɔɔ?”
44022026	Ni di ɔnɔɔfo wɔ mmle lakyɛ bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo nwu nfũ alaakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Be falɛ fɔɔblaa? Osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle Roma otii ale lo!”
44022027	Nioso bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo wɔ mmle lakyɛ Paulo nfũ alaakaalɛ, nwɔ alɛ, “Beeye, Roma otii fale?” Ni di Paulo latuna alɛ, “Yii, Roma otii nle!”
44022028	Ni di bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo nwu latɔkɔ Paulo alɛ, “Amii, Roma otii nle. Kafɔɔ ami koto dikudi lata fiɛ lekple Roma otii!” Ni di Paulo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Ami, Roma obi tintĩ nle beelofo nii.”
44022029	Nfanwu bakpɛtɛ ba niayila alɛ babapɛ nwɔ mankaalɛ nwɔ ni kanya nɔɔ ɔlaa niakyɛ nwɔ di ɔlɔɔkɔ baasifi. Lɛyɛkɛ kafɔɔ lapɛ bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo nwu obe wɔ aatofo alɛ Roma otii ninle ni Paulo fiɛ beemufũ nwɔ kafɔɔ bɛɛpɛ ni lekpo.
44022030	Bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo nwu lamiɛ alɛ ootofo lɛsaa le niawa ni oso di Yuda batii bamuu n-yɛ ni di Paulo suoto. Nioso kaale lasɛ nii, aalɛɛ Yuda batii olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku bakantɛ lɛma aasiisa. Ni aata baafukuti Paulo, baakpaa nwɔ baawako anu lɛma alɛ, baabuo di ɔlaa nwu kamɛ.
44023001	Paulo lakyako Bakantɛ nwu niasi ni onyu di anu tuwĩi, ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Babiloo, otu nii diloolo mi lɛpɔɔ di mmle okle nsi ni nkpa di Yaa anu diɛbase bia miɛ.”
44023002	Nioso Anania wɔ ninle ni Yuda batii Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo labuɛ aatɔkɔ batii ba niayila baakaako ni Paulo alɛ bapɛ nwɔ kaanya.
44023003	Nfanwu, Paulo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Yaa mapɛ fɔ! Afɔ oyiyiɛ wɔ beekpiitaa ni ku akaaloo fututu, ɔmɛ kanktɛ fale! Fasi ninfa fɔɔkankoe di kufiofa kanya, kafɔɔ, afɔ fatɔɔtaalɛ kufiofa fɛɛta osuku falɛ bapɛ mi!”
44023004	Batii ba niayila ni di Paulo ɔlɔɔkɔ lakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo footufa?”
44023005	Nioso Paulo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Babiloo, ninye nlɛ Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo ale, se ninkakatɛko nwɔ nkpo. Diekye di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ, beebuɛ alɛ, ‘Bitambuɛ ɔlaa kpile kuonwii di batunletɛ lee suoto.’ ”
44023006	Obe wɔ di Paulo latofo alɛ batii ba niasi ni bawo nle ni Saduki batii, baawo kafɔɔ nle ni Farisi batii yi, nioso aabuɛ osie kanya alɛ, “Babiloo, Farisi otii nnle! Farisi otii kafɔɔ nielofo mi! Bɔɔkankoe ninfũ miɛ ta lefũ lenu nlɛ, bakpi makple mantaka ni oso!”
44023007	Nioso obe di Paulo laloo ni ɔlaa wɔ mmle obuɛ, ni kaananfi labuo di Saduki ku Farisi batii nntɛɛ, ni baasɛ di akyuu anyɔ nɛ.
44023008	Diekye Saduki batii kobuɛ alɛ bakpi dilabasintaka, ni Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ ku anwuna kafɔɔ nnaa. Kafɔɔ Farisi batii lefũ asaa nwu atiɛ beenu.
44023009	Nfa di kakpɔkpɔtɔ kplɛ labuo ma nintɛɛ nɛ. Ni kuufiofa batuotɛ ba ninle ni Farisi batii layila Paulo ɔlaa kamaa nɛ. Ni baatakatɛsa kanya katoo baabuɛ alɛ, “Buɔnya okpile kuonwii di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle suoto! Loobia Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ ee ninwuna lewo niɛkakatɛ diɛtɔɔ kubio!”
44023010	Kananfi labawɛ osie, ta nkpo oso bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo nwu layɛkɛ alɛ babananfi Paulo mambɛbɛɛ. Nioso aatɔkɔ bakpɛtɛ nɔɔ alɛ bakyɛ baalaakpaa nwɔ baatii nwu kamɛ basifiko leyo katenkɔ.
44023011	Dii nwu nkpo kakyɛ, Saate Yesu labayila di Paulo ɔlɔɔkɔ ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Paulo, kpee osie! Fɛ mmle okle feebuɛ mi ni ɔlaa di Yerusalem ninfũ, dikpe nii fɛɛbla nkpo di Roma kafɔɔ.”
44023012	Kaleesɛ, Yuda batii bawo labasi baaka ntam alɛ, nse bayilo Paulo, blɔbale alesaa ee banyi lɛsalɛsaa!
44023013	Batii ba niabla ni lɛsaa nwu mawo fɛ batii afosi ana ku kamaa.
44023014	Ni baakyɛ di Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku batunletɛ lɛma nfũ baalaabuɛ alɛ, “Buɔka ntam bulɛ bulɔbale ee bunyi lɛsalɛsaa, diɛlase di obe wɔ buolo ni Paulo.
44023015	Nioso aye ku Bakantɛ bikple bikpee bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo nɔɔfo otii bilɛ, akple akpaa Paulo awako ye. Biɛbla fɛle biomiɛ bilɛ biɔkaalɛ nwɔ sɛlaa sewo minkyakaa. Nse nfɛ bɔɔkpaa nwɔ manwako, awo bubalo nwɔ di osuku fiɛ abadu nfũ.”
44023016	Kafɔɔ Paulo ɔfa nɔɔ suɔtɔbi lanu kanwumbe ka baatookũ ni di Paulo suoto, nioso aakyɛ leyo katenkɔ aalaatɔkɔ nwɔ.
44023017	Nioso Paulo lalɛɛ bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo nwu onwii lɛma aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Akpaa okosopo wɔ mmle akyɛnko ɔnɔɔfo nɔɔfo lɛma. Akpe ɔlaa finle onwii alɛ ɔɔtɔkɔ nwɔ.”
44023018	Nioso, bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo nwu lakpaa okosopo wɔ mmle aakyɛnko ɔnɔɔfo nɔɔfo lɛma nfũ. Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Paulo wɔ bɛɛtɛ ni leeyo niɛlɛɛ mi ɛɛtɔkɔ alɛ, nkpaa okosopo wɔ mmle nwako fɔ aatɔkɔ fɔ ɔlaa onwii.”
44023019	Nioso bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo nɔɔfo wɔ mmle lamufũ okosopo nwu kɔɔnɛɛ aakpaa nwɔ aasifiko ɔlɔɔkɔ, ni aakaalɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Be ɔlaa foomiɛ falɛ fatɔkɔ mi?”
44023020	Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Yuda batii bawo lɛbla onwii ku banɔɔfo lɛma alɛ babawa mankaalɛ fɔ alɛ faakpaa Paulo fanwako kakankɔ lɛma kɔsɛɛ fɛle boomiɛ alɛ bakaalɛ nwɔ sɛlaa sewo.
44023021	Kafɔɔ tannu ma ɔlaa, diekye batii bawo ninlenke ni batii afosi ana lewofa basi di osuku bɔɔtɛ nwɔ kala alɛ babalo nwɔ. Batii ba mmle lɛka ntam alɛ babalo Paulo fiɛ babale ee manyi ntu. Nioso nfɛ basi di osuku nunua wɔ mmle alɛ bababla nkpo.”
44023022	Bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo wɔ mmle latɔkɔ obisɔ nwu alɛ, “Tanta kuonwii latofo alɛ fɛbatɔkɔ mi ɔlaa wɔ mmle, feenu!” Ninfɛ aata okosopo nwu lasifi nɛ.
44023023	Nioso bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo wɔ mmle lalɛɛ bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo banyɔ, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Bidiki bakpɛtɛ alafa anyɔ, balolaa suoto babasifi Kaesarea di miɛ kakyɛ ɛlomu ɛnaasĩ kamɛ. Biediki bapɔnkɔ basiɛtɛ afosi akuɛnsĩ ku akplɔ bakleetɛ alafa anyɔ bikyakaa.
44023024	Bita Paulo bapɔnkɔ asiɛ, biɛkpaa nwɔ bisifiko Ɔka Felike nfũ, bienyu bilɛ eebuo nfa buɛɛ.”
44023025	Ninfɛ di bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo nɔɔfo nwu lakpana kukũ fɛ mmle aata ma baasifiko nɛ.
44023026	Ami Klaudio Lisia niɛkpana kukũ ko mmle kokyesee afɔ Ɔka Biene Felike ku lɛsɛɛsa.
44023027	Yuda batii lamufũ osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle baamiɛ alɛ boolo nwɔ fiɛ munko bakpɛtɛ nii buakyɛ buaalafũ nwɔ, diekye lanu alɛ Roma otii ale ni oso.
44023028	Nioso lakpaa nwɔ lawako kakankɔ lɛma nlɛ konu lɛsaa le ɛɛbla nii.
44023029	Kafɔɔ labanya nlɛ diɛkaatɛ alɛ baalo nwɔ ee baatɛ nwɔ leeyo, diekye ɔlaa wɔ bɛɛyɔ ni di suoto nɔɔ n-yɛ di mma bamu afiofa suoto.
44023030	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di otii onwii layu aakpee mi ni kootoko alɛ bookũ nwɔ ni kanwumbe alɛ babalo nwɔ nii, nfanwu, labla nlɛ kɔyɔ nwɔ nkyesee fɔ nkpaa nkpaa. Nintɔkɔ batii ba niɛyɔ ni ɔlaa di suoto nɔɔ nlɛ, ɔlaa lele bakpe di suoto nɔɔ bayɔ bawako anu lɛfɔ bababuɛ ninfa.
44023031	Nioso bakpɛtɛ ba mmle labla fɛ mmle baatɔkɔ ma nii. Kakyɛ nwu baakpaa Paulo baasifiko Antipatri.
44023032	Ni kaaleesɛ, kasɔ bakpɛtɛ lakple baawa leyo katenkɔ nwu, kafɔɔ baata bapɔnkɔ basiɛtɛ lakpaa Paulo baasifiko Keasarea.
44023033	Obe wɔ baabuo nii, baayɔ Paulo ku kukũ ko baata ma nii, baata Ɔka nwu.
44023034	Nioso aaka kukũ nwu, ni aakaalɛ Paulo lɛba le eekye nii. Obe wɔ aatofo alɛ Kilikia eekye nii,
44023035	Ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Kama nu kanya lɛfɔ ɔlaa, nse batii ba niɛyɔ ni ɔlaa di suoto lɛfɔ lɛwa.” Nioso aata baayɔ Paulo baakpee di Ɔka Herode leyo katenkɔ. Ni aata kafɔɔ bakpɛtɛ layila baatoonyu nwɔ nɛ.
44024001	Di ayi anɔɔ sɛmaa, Yaa Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo Anania ku Yuda batii banɔɔfo bawo ku kanyadikitɛ wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Tertulo baakyɛ Kaesarea. Baawa Felike nfũ alɛ bɔɔbadiki Paulo sikpile mantɔkɔ nwɔ.
44024002	Nioso obe wɔ baalɛɛ Paulo bawako nii, Tertulo lakye kasɔ ku lɛkakatɛ alɛ, “Ɔnɔɔfo loo wɔ buobu ni, obe kpinwu ditɔɔwa alɛ busi ni di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ nɛ, diekye di ninumbe ku lɛsaatofo le fɛɛyɔ fɔɔkpaa wo ni oso. Butɔɔnya kafɔɔ kakyi kpinwu biene ka nintɔɔwa ni di kasɔ loo ka mmle suoto.
44024003	Lɛsaa le mmle nle lɛsaa le niebuo ni awo Yuda batii bamuu anu. Nioso buɔpɛ fɔ sɛfa.
44024004	Noomiɛ nlɛ nlalaasa fɔ obe, nioso buotikitifɔ lekoto bulɛ faale wo sibualɛ fankyɔɔ wo kotoko di ɔlaa kakui wɔ bukle ni di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle suoto.
44024005	“Diekye butɔɔnya bulɛ kudu kpeetɛ ale, akyɛ ookyi aba aba ookpee kudu di Yuda batii nntɛɛ di kayi kamuu. Eekple ale kafɔɔ dikudi le ninle ni Nasaret batii dikudi lalaale tunletɛ.
44024006	Diɛkyakaa nii, aamiɛ alɛ ɔɔkpɔnɔnfɔsa Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ, ninfɛ buamufũ nwɔ nɛ. Buamiɛ bulɛ buɔkanko nwɔ di kufiofa loo kanya fiɛ.
44024007	Kafɔɔ bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo Lisia lawa aabafũ nwɔ di nnɛɛ loo kamɛ ku osie. Ni aabuɛ alɛ, batii ba niɛyɔ ni ɔlaa di Paulo suoto bawa di anu lɛfɔ nɛ.
44024008	Nse afɔ omu lɛfɔ fɛɛkaalɛ nwɔ sɛlaa yi, fabanya falɛ sɛlaa se buobuɛ ni di suoto nɔɔ simuu nte nkpo.”
44024009	Ni di Yuda batii bamuu lasi kanya baabuɛ alɛ, sɛlaa se simuu di Tertulo lebuɛ ni di suoto nɔɔ site nkpo.
44024010	Obe wɔ di Ɔka wɔ mmle lawii ni Paulo kɔnɛɛ alɛ akakatɛ nii, Paulo labuɛ alɛ, “Teete, n-ye nlɛ fatɔɔka Yuda batii sɛlaa di alɛɛ kpinwu kamɛ. Nioso suoto kɔyɔɔ mi alɛ madiki suoto kanya di anu lɛfɔ.
44024011	Fɛ mmle faye nii, diɛbla fɛ lefosi ayi anyɔ nɛ, lɛkyɛ Yerusalem nlɛ kɔlata ole di Yuda batii Yaa Olekatakɔ kamɛ.
44024012	Yuda batii diɛnyɛɛ alɛ kɔnanfi ɔlaa ku otii di Yaa Olekatakɔ, ee banyɛɛ kokpee kudu di Yuda batii kasiisakɔ ee lɛkpaka lɛba lewo.
44024013	Batii ba mmle nnaa lɛsalɛsaa babayila ni di suoto mambuɛ alɛ, sɛlaa se boobuɛ mi ni di suoto nte ni nkpo.
44024014	Kafɔɔ, lefũ lekpee nlɛ, kosumu bawa loo Yaa di osuku wɔ boobuɛ alɛ diɛlɛ nii. Kafɔɔ lefũ asaa ya amuu bɛɛkpana ni di Mose kufiofa kamɛ ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ akũ kamɛ lenu.
44024015	Nkpe osuku onyu fɛ mmle di mma kafɔɔ bakpe ni osuku onyu alɛ batii biene ku bakpiletɛ, Yaa masɛnkɛsa ma ankyeko bakpi kamɛ.
44024016	Ta nle mmle oso, kokpee osie nlɛ disibu biene kawɛ mi di Yaa ku batii anu.
44024017	“Alɛɛ kpinwu nsinnaa in di Yerusalem nɛ. Ninfɛ lɛkyɛ nlɛ kɔlaata bapiitɛ asaa, ninta ole kafɔɔ nta Yaa.
44024018	Obe wɔ latɔɔbla ni disi ɔkpaasu amanle nwu, ni di Yuda batii bawo labanyɛɛ di Yaa Olekatakɔ ninfa nɛ. Diele munko adu bakpeetɛ niawɛ ninfa. Kudu kuninwii kafɔɔ ditawɛ ninfa.
44024019	Yuda batii bawo niakye ni Asia kasɔ niawɛ ninfa. Nse mma dikaatɛ alɛ manwa ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ ninfũ, nse ɔlaa owo nkpe ma di suoto nii, mambuɛ.
44024020	Ee batii ba ninsi ni ninfũ, ta ma babuɛ okpile wɔ lɛpɔɔ baalo mi ni, di obe wɔ di Yuda batii bakantɛ banɔɔfo lakankoe ni.
44024021	Ɔlaa wɔ ko latakatɛsa sɛlɔ katoo labuɛ ni ninle alɛ, ‘Bɔɔkankoe ninfũ miɛ ta lefũ lenu nlɛ bakpi mataka ni oso.’ Kaalɛ ma nse nle mmle ninle mi okpile wɔ lɛbla ni.”
44024022	Nioso Felike wɔ ninye ni ofũ onu osuku nwu nwaa, latɔkɔ Yuda batii ba mmle alɛ, “Bidiɛ biesoko dilaase di obe wɔ di bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ɔnɔɔfo Lisia mawa ni fiɛ nimbudisa ɔlaa wɔ mmle.”
44024023	Ni aatɔkɔ bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo alɛ baakpaa Paulo baalaakpee leeyo nɛ. Kafɔɔ batambla nwɔ amumu, baalolaa nwɔ banyu, bata kafɔɔ basiɛwo nɔɔ osuku se lɛsaa lewo lefĩ nwɔ baabla batɔɔ.
44024024	Di ayi awo sɛmaa, Felike ku ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ Drusila wɔ ninle ni Yuda otii lawa, ni aata baakpaa Paulo baawako, ni aatɔkɔ ma Yesu Kristo ofũ onu ɔlaa nɛ.
44024025	Di obe wɔ di Paulo lasiɛ aatoodiki sɛlaa kasɔ di nkpa biene osiɛ suoto aatɔɔtɔɔ nii, ku suoto omufũ oklee ku Yaa lɛkanko le nikɔwa nii, lɛyɛkɛ lapɛ Felike. Ni aatɔkɔ Paulo alɛ, “Taka faatɔɔkyɛ. Nse lɛwɛ obe nwaa makple nlɛɛ fɔ.”
44024026	Aabu kafɔɔ alɛ Paulo matɔkɔ alɛ, oomiɛ koto kowo ammufũ nwɔ kɔɔkpaa, nioso obe lele anta manlɛɛ Paulo mantɔɔ manko nwɔ mankakatɛ.
44024027	Di alɛɛ anyɔ sɛmaa, baadiki Felike, ni baayɔ Porkio Festo baawako kasiɛkɔ nɔɔ nɛ. Kafɔɔ ta Felike lamiɛ alɛ Yuda batii babɔmbɔ nwɔ ni ɔlaa oso, aata Paulo lakple aasiɛ di leeyo katenkɔ.
44025001	Di Festo lababuo ni sɛka kalekɔ nɔɔ di ayi atiɛ sɛmaa, aadie di Keasarea aakyɛ Yerusalem.
44025002	Nfa di Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku Yuda batii banɔɔfo latɔkɔ nwɔ Paulo suoto ɔlaa nɛ. Ni baatikiti nwɔ lekoto alɛ
44025003	ata bakpaa Paulo bawako Yerusalem. Diekye disibu lɛma niale alɛ, babasiɛ mansoko nwɔ di osuku. Nse oofe see batoolo nwɔ.
44025004	Kafɔɔ Festo latɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Leyo di Paulo nte di Kaesarea. Mia kafɔɔ kɔwa nfa ɔbasifi di obe kakui kamɛ.
44025005	Nioso bita banɔɔfo lee bawa nfa nse bakpe ɔlaa owo di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle suoto babadiki babuɛ.”
44025006	Di Festo lasiɛ ni ninfa fɛ ayi anɛ ee lefosi kamaa, aakple aasifi Kaesarea. Dii le aakple ni kaleesɛ, aalɛɛ Paulo ɔlaa nwu di kakankɔ.
44025007	Di Paulo lababuo ni kakankɔ nwu ninfa, Yuda batii ba niakye ni Yerusalem baawa nii, labamana Paulo baakyi, baabudi Paulo kanya ku sɛlaa kpinwu osie kanya. Kafɔɔ batawɛ ɔtɛ onyu kuonwii baatuo alɛ, sɛlaa se boobuɛ ni di suoto nɔɔ nte nkpo.
44025008	Paulo ladiki suoto kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Nintaalɛ Yuda batii kufiofa ee nkpɔnɔnfɔsa Yaa Olekatakɔ ee nyila di Roma Ɔka kufiofa suoto.”
44025009	Kafɔɔ Festo lamiɛ alɛ oobuo Yuda batii anu, nioso, aakaalɛ Paulo alɛ, “Foomiɛ falɛ fasifi Yerusalem nimatɔɔka ɔlaa lɛfɔ nwu ninfa?”
44025010	Ni di Paulo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Oowo. Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare kakankɔ n-yɛ nɛ. Nfũ kafɔɔ dikpe ni bɛɛkankoe. Fɛ mmle di afɔ omu lɛfɔ faye ni, nimbla okpile di Yuda batii suoto.
44025011	Nse lɛbla lɛsaa le dikaatɛ alɛ baalo mi, ninsĩ nlɛ batanloe! Kafɔɔ nse nimbla okpile kuonwii, dinaa alɛ afɔ ee otii bamba lɛyɔ mi eepkee di batii ba mmle nnɛɛ. Nioso komiɛ nlɛ ɔlaa nii kute di Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare anu aabuɛ nwu atɛɛ!”
44025012	Nioso Festo ku banɔɔfo wo nɔɔ lakpee asi baawo ni aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Fɛɛnya feebuɛ falɛ fɔɔyɔ ɔlaa lɛfɔ fantɛ ni di Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare anu oso, Kaesare anu ko fabakyɛ.”
44025013	Di ayi awo sɛmaa, Ɔka Agripa ku obilɛma sankobi Bernike lawa Festo nfũ di Kaesarea alɛ bɔbasɛɛsa nwɔ mantɔɔ ɔfɔɔ.
44025014	Baasiɛ ninfa ayi kpi, nioso Festo layɔ Paulo ɔlaa aatɔkɔ Ɔka wɔ mmle alɛ, “Osuɔtɔ onwii nte leeyo ninfũ mmle di Felike lesifi eediɛ nwɔ nii.
44025015	Obe wɔ lakyɛ ni Yerusalem yi, Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo ku Yuda batii banɔɔfo latɔkɔ mi ɔlaa nɔɔ, ni baatɔkɔ mi alɛ, nlo nwɔ lɛpɔɔ nɛ.
44025016	“Kafɔɔ latɔkɔ ma nlɛ, Roma batii kufiofa diɛta osuku alɛ baalo otii lɛpɔɔ fiɛ baakanko nwɔ. Dikpe ni bɛɛtɔɔ osuku alɛ manko batii ba niɛwɛ ni ɔlaa, bɛɛkyaka anu ku anu beebuɛ ɔlaa nwu fiɛ, se baalo nwɔ lɛpɔɔ, fiɛ manlo nwɔ.
44025017	Di obe wɔ baawa ni nfũ di ɔlaa wɔ mmle oso yi, ntafenko nwu sɛmaa. Kaleesɛ, ni lata baakpaa osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle baawakoe di kakankɔ nɛ.
44025018	Kafɔɔ, ɔlaa wɔ baayɔ ni di suoto nɔɔ ditale okpile wɔ lanyu nlɛ loo baabuɛ alɛ ɛɛbla nii.
44025019	Sɛlaa se ko baabuɛ ni niale ɔlaa ɔnanfi ku Paulo di mma bamu ofũ onu lɛma suoto, ku osuɔtɔ onwii bɔɔlɛɛ ni Yesu alɛ atookpi nii. Kafɔɔ Paulo kobuɛ alɛ akpe ni nkpa!
44025020	Diakpɔkpɔtɔ mi, nioso ntatofo mmle kabudisa ni ɔlaa nwu. Nioso lakaalɛ Paulo se eetuna alɛ bɔɔyɔ ɔlaa nwu mansifiko Yerusalem manaabuɛ ninfa.
44025021	Kafɔɔ Paulo labuɛ alɛ oomiɛ alɛ ayɔ ɔlaa nɔɔ ata Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare. Nioso lata nlɛ bayɔ nwɔ bakpee leeyo diɛlaase di obe wɔ mata mankpaa nwɔ mansifiko ni nfa.”
44025022	Ni di Ɔka Agripa latɔkɔ Festo alɛ, “Komiɛ nlɛ ami omu nnu nwɔ kanya ɔlaa.” Ni di Festo latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Yoo, kɔsɛɛ fabanu nwɔ kanya ɔlaa!”
44025023	Ninfɛ kaale lasɛ nii, Ɔka Agripa ku Bernike lawa kakankɔ nwu di Sɛɛka kanya. Bakpɛtɛ banɔɔfo ku okpoo nwu kamɛ banɔɔfo latikanko ma baawa. Ni di Festo lakpee alɛ balaakpaa Paulo bawako nɛ.
44025024	Ni di Festo labuɛ alɛ, “Ɔka Agripa ku aye ba niesi ni ninfũ, biɔnya osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle? Yuda batii ba bamuu ninkpe ni di Yerusalem ku Kaesarea lɛyɔ ɔlaa di suoto nɔɔ alɛ diɛkaatɛ alɛ aakple ansiɛ nkpa.
44025025	Kafɔɔ ninnya okpile wɔ ɛɛbla ni oso eesiɛko alɛ baalo nwɔ nii. Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ ɛɛkaalɛ alɛ ɔɔyɔ ɔlaa nɔɔ anta ni Ɔka Kplɛ letuna nlɛ kɔkpaa nwɔ nsifiko nfa.
44025026	Kafɔɔ nnaa ɔlaa kuonwii katɛ nkpana ni di suoto nɔɔ nkyɛnko ni Ɔka Kplɛ. Diekye aabla okpile kuonwii nwaako. Nioso ntɔɔkpaa nwɔ lɛwako ye, kyenkye afɔ Ɔka Agripa, nse bitoonu nwɔ kanya kamɛ ɔlaa bieloo, kawɛ ɔlaa nkpana nkyeko suoto nɔɔ.
44025027	Diekye, diɛlɛ alɛ faayɔ leyo tentɛ fankyesee Ɔka bamba falɛ akanko nwɔ alɛ, faakpana okpile wɔ ɛɛbla ni fakyakaa.”
44026001	Agripa latɔkɔ Paulo alɛ, “Osuku nkpe fɔ alɛ faabuɛ ɔlaa lɛfɔ fandiki suoto kanya.” Nioso Paulo lakplesa kɔnɛɛ katoo, ni aakakatɛ aadiki suoto kanya alɛ,
44026002	“Ɔka Loo Biene Agripa, disi nlɛ mi alɛ anu lɛfɔ madiki suoto kanya miɛ di sɛlaa se di Yuda batii lɛyɔ ni di suoto nii.
44026003	Diekye n-ye nlɛ afɔ faye Yuda batii kufiofa ku amanle lɛma amuu nwaa. Nioso lese fɔ akunkyi, wɛ otu fatɛɛ, faakyɔɔ mi ɔlaa kotoko.
44026004	“Yuda batii bamuu n-ye mmle okle lasiɛ ni nkpa diayɔ ni bia sibisɔ nii, di okpoo nii ku Yerusalem kafɔɔ.
44026005	Nse bababuɛ nwaako, baye kofokofoko alɛ, lasiɛ nkpa fɛ Farisi otii, di Yuda batii dikudi le ninle ni afiofa loo mulenkee ni kasumu lele.
44026006	Lɛsaa le oso bɔɔkankoe ni ninfũ mmle ninle alɛ, osuku onyu nkpe mi di ntam be di Yaa laka aata ni bawo loo suoto.
44026007	Ntamu be mmle kafɔɔ oso di Israel nfaabi lefosi nnyɔ latoonyu osuku baatoosumu ni oso, baatɔɔtɔ Yaa kakũ ku kakyɛ nɛ. Ɔka Loo Biene, osuku onyu wɔ mmle oso di Yuda batii lesi kanya di suoto nii nɛ.
44026008	Be oso dikpe ye osie alɛ biafũ minnu bilɛ Yaa ntakatɛsa bakpi?
44026009	“Ami niayɔ latika di suoto nlɛ mabla nle kafuo nii nnyila di Yesu Nasaret Otii nwu batii suoto.
44026010	Yuda batii Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo latɛɛ osie alɛ lamufũ batii Klekle nwu kpinwu latɛ leeyo di Yerusalem. Mba kafɔɔ baalo ni kaamɛ lɛma, ami niata oso baalo ma.
44026011	Latikanko ma osie kanya ku ɔblɔ lalaadu bia sekpoo bamba se niakyo ni kamɛ. Lata baabla ma amumu di Yuda batii nsiisakɔ. Layila ma di suoto baabuɛ mbusuo sɛlaa di Yesu suoto baakple nwɔ di nkpaamaa.
44026012	“Nle mmle oso latoofe Damasko ku osie fɛ mmle di Yaa olebatatɛ banɔɔfo latɛɛ ni kanya.
44026013	Ɔka Loo Biene, kukũ kpanamantãa latoofe ni osuku nwu, ni di lɛkpa le nikɔkpa dilenke ni kufĩ, lakpa diakye osi diamana mi diakyi ku batii ba niatoofe nii.
44026014	Ninfɛ baamuu loo buanɔɔ buapɛ kaasɔ nɛ. Ni lanu sɛlɔ sinwii kobuɛ di Yuda batii sele kamɛ alɛ, ‘Saulo, Saulo, be oso fatikankoe nkpo? Di balɛ alɛ faayɔ kɔkpaa fantɔɔsa di owuu alɛ diebuo fɔ.’
44026015	“Ni lakaalɛ nlɛ, ‘Afɔ owe dile, Saate?’ “Ni sɛɛlɔ nwu nkpo labuɛ alɛ, ‘Ami Yesu wɔ fatikanko ni osie kanya dile.
44026016	Nunua, taka fayila! Diekye ntoodiki suoto letuo fɔ alɛ kamayɔ fɔ mbla kpɛmblatɛ nii. Fabatɔkɔ batii asaa ya amuu fɛɛnya ni ninfũ ku n-ya kɔwa ni ɔbadiki otootuo fɔ nii.
44026017	Kamadiki fɔ di Yuda batii ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii ba kamɛ kokyesee fɔ ni nnɛɛ kamɛ.
44026018	Fabatikiti ma anu, fammunikĩisa ma fankyeko ditunu kamɛ fanwako lɛkpa kamɛ. Fabadiki ma fankyeko Abonsam osie kamɛ fanwako Yaa nfũ, alɛ Yaa kayɔ sikpile lɛma ankyɛ ma, alɛ baawɛ kasiɛkɔ di batii ba eediki eese ni lete ɛɛta ni suoto diekye beefũ mi beenu.’
44026019	“Nioso, Ɔka Agripa, ntasĩ odiki otuo wɔ lanya lakyeko ni osi ɔbla!
44026020	Lakye ɔlaa biene nwu obuɛ ɔta Damasko batii, ku Yerusalem batii ku Yuda batii bamuu ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii kafɔɔ. Latɔkɔ ma nlɛ, bakyi siikpile lɛma kamɛ, baamunikĩi bawa Yaa nfũ, baatɔɔbla kafɔɔ asaa ya nimatuo alɛ nwaako batookyi ni.
44026021	Nle mmle oso di Yuda batii ba mmle baamufũ mi di Yaa Olekatakɔ nɛ. Baamiɛ kafɔɔ alɛ boolo mi.
44026022	Kafɔɔ, Yaa ntoodiki mi di nnɛɛ lɛma kamɛ diɛbase bia miɛ. Nioso lekple nsi nkpa kodiki sɛlaa se mmle mbuɛ ntɔkɔ aye banɔɔfo ku batii bamuu nɛ. Sɛlaa se mmle kobuɛ ni ninfũ, nsĩnwu di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ bamuu ku Mose labuɛ alɛ sibawa kaanya nɛ.
44026023	Alɛ Kristo nwu di Yaa lɛpɛ ni ɔfɔɔ mawa amanya dibuo. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ nimale otii kasale wɔ nimataka ankye ni bakpi kamɛ nɛ. Abayɔ lɛkpa kafɔɔ anwako Yuda batii ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii bamuu.”
44026024	Nfanwu, Festo lafaa aabuɛ alɛ, “Paulo, fatoobuo afĩi! Dikunye lɛfɔ nwu kpinwu ntɔɔlalaasa fɔ disi kamɛ!”
44026025	Ni di Paulo ladiki kanya aabuɛ alɛ, “Festo bienetɛ, noobuo afĩi. Tan-yɔ ɔlaa wɔ mmle faakpeeko kɔkyɔ. Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ fɔ.
44026026	Nwaako, Ɔka Agripa n-ye sɛlaa se mmle kobuɛ ni ninfũ. Nioso kɔkakatɛ nwu ku sɛkambi nɛ. Lefũ lenu klekle nlɛ batabla asaa ya mmle baawofasa nwɔ.
44026027	Ɔka Agripa, feefũ Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ feenu? N-ye nlɛ feefũ feenu.”
44026028	Ni di Agripa lakaalɛ Paulo alɛ, “Foonyu falɛ faafuo mi Kristo ole ɔbla di obe kakuii wɔ mmle kamɛ?”
44026029	Ni di Paulo ladiki kanya alɛ, “Di obe kakuii kamɛ woo, di obe kaanale kamɛ woo, kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta Yaa nlɛ, afɔ ku mba nikonu mi miɛ biakyi minte fɛ mmle nte nii. Kafɔɔ diele fɛ mmle nsi ni di nkɔnii kamɛ!”
44026030	Ninfɛ di Ɔka Agripa ku Festo ku Bernike ku batii bule bamuu baataka baasifi nɛ.
44026031	Obe wɔ batoodie ni ninfa, baakakatɛ di Paulo ɔlaa nwu suoto baabuɛ alɛ, “Otii wɔ mmle diɛbla lɛsaa le baalo nwɔ nii ee baatɛ nwɔ ni leeyo katenkɔ.”
44026032	Nioso Agripa latɔkɔ Festo alɛ, “Baafuo osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle odiɛ nse diele fɛ nnwɔɔ nialɛ bayɔ ɔlaa nɔɔ balaatɛ di Kaesare anu oso.”
44027001	Di obe wɔ baabuɛ alɛ butɔɔkyɛ ni Roma di Italia, baayɔ Paulo ku leyo batentɛ bawo baakpee di bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo wɔ baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Yulio nnɛɛ kamɛ. Nnwɔɔ ninnyu batii ba ninyila mannyu ni Roma bakpɛtɛ dikudi le bɔɔlɛɛ ni Ɔka Kplɛ Dikudi nɛ.
44027002	Ni buayɔ oklo wɔ niakye ni Adramitio, kuatoofe ni Asia kasɔ. Nioso awo ku Makedonia otii wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Aristarko niekye ni Tesalonika niasiɛ di oklo nwu kamɛ.
44027003	Kaleesɛ, bualaabuo Sidon lekpo kotoko. Yulio lale Paulo sifutulɛ, aatɔɔ osuku di okpoo nwu kamɛ alɛ, akyɛ aalaanya basiɛwo nɔɔ alɛ baatɔɔ asaa ya niefĩ nwɔ ni abayɔ anklee ni osuku.
44027004	Buakple buadie ninfa ku oklo, kafɔɔ ta kɔfɛɛfɔ siene lafɛ kuatɔɔkyakako wo ni oso, buafe di Kipro kalɔ nɔɔ lɛkyɛ buatoso kɔfɛɛfɔ nwu.
44027005	Nioso buafe di Kilikia lekpo osi ku Panfilia lekpo osi buawa Mira lekpo kotoko di Likia kasɔ suoto.
44027006	Nfa di bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo nwu nikɔkpaa wo ni lanya oklo onwii niakye ni Aleksandria, latoofe Italia kasɔ suoto. Ni aayɔ bamuu loo aakpee di oklo nwu kamɛ nɛ.
44027007	Di ayi kpinwu kamɛ, osuku nwu ɔkyɛ labawɛ osie fiɛ buafuo Knido okpoo obuo. Kɔfɛɛfɔ siene nwu niatɔɔfɛ ni ninfa oso, batafuo ɔkyɛ tinini. Nioso obe wɔ buabuo ni Salmone, buakɛ buafe di Kreta, nfa kasɔ ntĩi kɔfɛɛfɔ siene kanya.
44027008	Butakyo di lekpo kotoko, sebe fiɛ buabadu lɛba le bɔɔlɛɛ ni oklo kayilakɔ nwaa. Ditakyo di okpoo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Lesea.
44027009	Buale obe kpinwu di osuku nwu ɔkyɛ kamɛ, kanya onii bee kafɔɔ ntoofe. Osuku ɔkyɛ di ntu osi di obe nwu kamɛ kafɔɔ labawɛ osie nwaa. Nioso Paulo laka ma aatɔkɔ ma alɛ,
44027010	“Teete anɛ, ntɔɔnya nlɛ osuku loo wɔ mmle ɔkyɛ diɛyɔ ni di nunua wɔ mmle mawɛ osie nwaa, diekye oklo wɔ mmle kamalalaa, ku asaa kpinwu, batii nkpa kafɔɔ kamawɔɔ.”
44027011	Kafɔɔ bakpɛtɛ ɔnɔɔfo wɔ mmle lafũ oklo kanyayilatɛ ku oklo saate kɔka aalenkee nwɔ di Paulo labuɛ nii.
44027012	Nioso obe wɔ di oklo kayilakɔ nwu diɛlɛ alɛ baasiɛ ni di lɛwɔɔfɔ obe kamɛ oso, osuku bakyɛntɛ nwu mba ninlenke nii baatuna alɛ boosifi, baatoonyu alɛ loo bababuo Foinike. Ni, babafuo osiɛ ninfa di lɛwɔɔfɔ obe. Diekye Foinike nle okpoo di Kreta kasɔ suoto ninkpe ni seklo nnyilakɔ, nintĩi ni kɔfɛɛfɔ kanya di kufĩ katunkɔ.
44027013	Di obe nwu kamɛ, kɔfɛɛfɔ kunwii latɔɔfɛ buɛɛ kuokye nkpaalɔ lɛkyɛ kuatɔɔwa, nioso diate oklo bawantɛ nwu fɛ osuku nwu ɔkyɛ malɛ ma. Nioso baafukuti oklo lekpo, ni baatu baafe di kasɔ ka bɔɔlɛɛ ni Kreta lekpo kotoko nɛ.
44027014	Ditaklɛ kɔfɛɛfɔ siene ko manlɛɛ ni, Katoo kufĩ katunkɔ kɔfɛɛfɔ, lakyako ɔfɛ okye Kreta kasɔ suoto.
44027015	Ni kɔɔfɛɛfɔ nwu labalɛ oklo nwu nɛ. Ditaba wo buamunikĩisa oklo nwu buakyɔɔ kɔfɛɛfɔ nwu anu. Nioso buata kɔfɛɛfɔ nwu osuku kuatuka wo kuatɔɔkyɛnko.
44027016	Sɛmaa fiɛ, buawɛ kawofakɔ kawo di kasɔ ka di ntu lɛmana diekyi ni bɔɔlɛɛ ni Kauda, di sɛmaa lɛkyɛ. Diawɛ osie fiɛ buafuo oklo biibii wɔ bukle ni di oklo kplɛ kamɛ onii ɔkaasa di lɛsaa suoto.
44027017	Di obe wɔ baamufũ nwu nii, baayɔ okũ baanii oklo kplɛ nwu kafɔɔ. Baatɔɔyɛkɛ alɛ kɔfɛɛfɔ mafɛ nwu kunsifiko apatapata lɛba di Libia lekpo kotoko. Nioso baasoosa abula ya ninta oklo nkyɛ nii. Nle mmle oso kɔfɛɛfɔ ko mmle laklee oklo nwu aakyɛ aatookyiko.
44027018	Kɔfɛɛfɔ siene nwu latɔɔfɛ ɔfɛ, nioso kaleesɛ, baakyako oklo kamɛ asaa ya aatuka ni odiki oyu di lekpo kamɛ.
44027019	Dii tiɛfa, baayɔ oklo akpɛmblasaa awo baayu di ntu kamɛ.
44027020	Kɔfɛɛfɔ siene ko mmle lafɛ ayi kpi. Nioso kufĩ ee awɛntrɛbi ɔnya ditawɛ. Butasinwɛ osuku onyu bulɛ bubawɛ nkpa!
44027021	Obe wɔ baatii ntoosiɛ ayi kpinwu alesaa ɔtanle ni yi, Paulo lataka aayila di anu lɛma, aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Babiloo, nse minnu mi ɔlaa, bitantu di Kreta yi, se dibuo le mmle diɛwa wo di suoto, se asaa loo kafɔɔ dieyu.
44027022	Kafɔɔ lekoto kotikiti ye, binya otu! Kuonwii loo dilɔbayu nkpa nɔɔ, oklo lete nimalalaa.
44027023	Diekye kɔsa ku kakyɛ, Yaa wɔ ole nle nii, nwɔ kosumu ni tɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ lawa mi ɔkyɛ.
44027024	Ni aatɔkɔ mi alɛ, ‘Paulo, tanyɛkɛ. Dikpe ni fɛɛyɔ ɔlaa lɛfɔ fɛɛtɛ di Kaesare anu. Yaa sifutulɛ se akpe ata fɔ ni oso, atɔɔnya minko batii ba ninkyɛ ni osuku wɔ mmle nyaami. Kuonwii lɛma dilɔba kpi.’
44027025	Nioso basuɔtɔ, binya otu! Lefũ Yaa lenu nlɛ, dibawa kaanya fɛ mmle aatɔkɔ mi nii.
44027026	Kafɔɔ, kɔfɛɛfɔ makpaa wo kunta munaaka di kasɔ kawo suoto di ntu lɛmana diekyi ni kɔtɛ kamɛ.”
44027027	Kɔfɛɛfɔ siene ko mmle laklee wo kuatɔɔpɛ kuatoofenko katoo ku kala di Adria lekpo suoto lefosi ayi ana. Di lefosi dii naafa nkyɛntɛɛ, oklo loo bakpɛmblatɛ latofo alɛ nfɛ bɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ kasɔ kawo suoto.
44027028	Ninfɛ baayɔ ntu lɛkpapoosaa baakpee baanyu ntu nwu lekyofo, ni baanya alɛ ntu nwu lekyofo fɛ nkpaa kɔlafa afosi anyɔ. Obe wɔ baakple baakyɛ ni sitũ kɛɛkɛ, baakple baaklapoosa ntu nwu baanyu, ni baanya alɛ lekyofo nimi nfɛ nte fɛ nkpaa afosi anaasĩ.
44027029	Nioso baayɛkɛ alɛ oklo manaasa di afuɔ kplɛ awo suoto, nkpo oso baasoosa abɔɔsaa ya ninkpe ni onutũ nwaa ana, beekpee ni okũ akle ni di oklo suoto diamufũ oklo nwu anse ni baakpee di ntu kasɔ di oklo sɛmaa, ni baapɛ ɔlaa baata Yaa alɛ, akyakaako kaasɛ ma nɛ.
44027030	Ni di oklo nwu bakpɛmblatɛ lamiɛ alɛ bootoso mandie ni di oklo nwu kamɛ oso, baasoosa oklo biibii nwu baakpee di ntu kamɛ, baabla fɛ omiɛ boomiɛ alɛ balaasoosa abɔɔsaa nutũle awo bakpee di oklo kplɛ sitũ.
44027031	Kafɔɔ, Paulo latɔkɔ bakpɛtɛ ku ɔnɔɔfo lɛma alɛ, “Nse bamuu lee bíekple bisiɛ di oklo wɔ mmle kamɛ, bibakpi.”
44027032	Nioso bakpɛtɛ ba mmle, baabudi oklo biibii nwu okũ wɔ ninkle nwu nii, baata nwu kuasifi ntu nwu kamɛ.
44027033	Ni koolesɛtũ, Paulo latikiti bamuu lɛma lekoto alɛ, bale alesaa awo. Ni aakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Lefosi ayi ana buobuo ni di nimiina le mmle kamɛ nɛ. Kuonwii lee diimufũ lelesaa ale.
44027034	Nioso lekoto kotikiti ye, bimufũ alesaa bile mmle biawɛ ni osie minaakpi ni. Diekye kuonwii lee disi nɔɔ onwini bia dilabayu.”
44027035	Di Paulo labuɛ ɔlaa nwu aaloo nii, ninfɛ aayɔ bloblo aapɛ Yaa sɛfa di bamuu lɛma anu, ni aabɛ, aakyako ole nɛ.
44027036	Nfanwu, bamuu lɛma baakpee situ, ni baakyako alesaa ole nɛ.
44027037	Awo ba niasiɛ ni di oklo nwu kamɛ, buawo fɛ batii alafa anyɔ afosi akuɛnsĩ batii bakuɔ.
44027038	Di obe wɔ batoloo ni alesaa ole, batii ba mmle lakple baadiki alesaa ya di oklo nwu ntuka nii baakpete di ntu kamɛ, mmle di oklo nwu kabla ni fɛnflɛ.
44027039	Di obe wɔ kaale lasɛ ni kɛsɛɛ, oklo bawantɛ ditatofo lekpo nwu kotoko. Kafɔɔ baanya kayilakɔ kanwii di lekpo nwu kotoko ninfa. Ni baanyu alɛ nse dialɛ bataawa oklo nwu anu manakpee ninfa.
44027040	Nkpo oso baabudi sikũ se ninkle ni abɔɔsaa nutũle ya ninkle ni oklo nwu, ni baadiki sewoso se man-yɔ mantooyilasa ni oklo sɛɛmaa nse kukyɛ. Ni baatakatɛsa dibula le kɔɔfɛɛfɔ mbuo ninta oklo nkyɛ ni kafɔɔ katoo alɛ kɔfɛɛfɔ katuka ma kuntɔɔkyɛnko nɛ.
44027041	Obe wɔ baakyɛ ni sitũ kɛɛkɛ, oklo nwu anu lalaasa di kɔtɛ ditufu suoto kuaka kaamɛ, nioso kutasinfuo ɔtɔɔkyɛ. Ni kɔɔfɛɛfɔ siene nwu kafɔɔ latɔɔsa di sɛmaa lɛkyɛ, kuabiɛ kuadie nɛ.
44027042	Nioso bakpɛtɛ nwu lanyu alɛ leyo batentɛ nwu kɔwa ɔbatoso, nse beekpe ntu bɛɛlaadu lekpo kotoko, nkpo oso baamiɛ alɛ boolo ma.
44027043	Kafɔɔ ɔnɔɔfo lɛma lamiɛ alɛ oodiki ni Paulo nkpa oso, atatunako ma. Nioso aadiki kanya di suoto lɛma alɛ, mba nikafuo nii, bayefe babuo di ntu kamɛ baafia ntu basifi lekpo kotoko.
44027044	Mba kafɔɔ niebu ni matikanko ye, bawo lasaka di oklo aba ya niɛbibiɛ ni ku asaa nintika ni di ntu osi. Nle mmle oso, bamuu loo buadu lekpo kotoko, kuonwii ditakpi.
44028001	Obe wɔ butoodie ni di dibuo nwu kamɛ bualaadu ni lekpo kotoko, fiɛ buatofo bulɛ kasɔ ka di ntu lɛmana diekyi ni bɔɔlɛɛ ni Malta dile.
44028002	Kasɔ ka mmle batii lafũ wo nwaa ku sifutulɛ. Diekye kanto ku lɛwɔɔfɔ obe diale ni oso, baakutaa ɔtɔ di lekpo kotoko nwu baata wo buawɔfɔ.
44028003	Paulo latoosiisa ntɔɔni nwo aatookpee di ɔtɔ nwu kamɛ, ni kɔɔsaanwu kunwii ladie di ntɔɔni nwu kamɛ kuamini di Paulo kɔnɛɛ ta ɔtɔ nwu difila oso.
44028004	Nioso kaasɔ nwu batii lanya alɛ kɔsaanwu nsaka nwɔ ni kɔɔnɛɛ, baatɔkɔ bawo alɛ, “Batii lotɛ ninle otii wɔ mmle. Nioso Asaa loo dilabatɔɔ asiɛ nkpa kuntɛ eedie di lekpo kukpi kamɛ.”
44028005	Kafɔɔ Paulo lasɔkɔ kɔsaanwu nwu nkpo aakpee di ɔtɔ nwu kamɛ, kutabla nwɔ lɛsalɛsaa.
44028006	Batii ba mmle latoonyu osuku alɛ, Paulo mafufu ee abanɔɔ ankpi ninfanwu. Kafɔɔ obe wɔ baanyu osuku diakɛlɛ, di lɛsalɛsaa ditabla nwɔ nii, baakyisa disibu lɛma di suoto nɔɔ, ni baabuɛ alɛ, “Afiɔ awo ale.”
44028007	Lekpo le kotoko bualaadie nii, kasɔ kanwii latɛɛtɛɛ nfa, dile ni Ɔka Publio kale. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ niale Ɔka di kasɔ nwu suoto. Ɔka wɔ mmle lafũ wo ku suoto lɛyɔɔ, aanyu wo ayi atiɛ.
44028008	Di obe nwu kamɛ yi, Publio ote late aatoofiɛ lɛwɔɔfɔ ofiɛ, aatoobiɛ kafutu kafɔɔ. Ni di Paulo lakyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, aalaatika nwɔ kɔnɛɛ, aapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa diisi nɔɔ, aayɔɔsa nwɔ ofiɛ.
44028009	Obe wɔ baanu ni ofiɛ nwu ɔyɔɔsalaa, bafiɛtɛ ba niawɛ ni kaasɔ nwu suoto bamuu baadie baawa, ni di Paulo layɔɔsa ma sifiɛ nɛ.
44028010	Ta nle mmle ɔbla oso, baata wo asaa kpinwu. Obe wɔ kafɔɔ buatoosifi nii, baayɔ asaa ya nimafĩ wo ni di osuku nwu ɔkyɛ kamɛ baakpee wo di oklo kamɛ.
44028011	Awɛntɛ atiɛ kamaa, buasifi. Di osifibee loo kamɛ, buasiɛ oklo wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni, “Atabi Afiɔ” kuakye ni Aleksandria, kuayila di kasɔ nwu suoto di kolele obe kamɛ.
44028012	Buadie ni ninfa, buayila di okpoo kplɛ wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Sirakusa. Ni buasiɛ ninfa ayi atiɛ nɛ.
44028013	Obe wɔ buadie ni ninfa, buataalɛ buawa Regio. Kaleesɛ nɔɔ, kɔfɛɛfɔ lakye nkpaalɔ kuatɔɔfɛ. Diɛ dii nyɔɔfa kamɛ buababuo Puteoli.
44028014	Ninfa buakyakako bafũbanutɛ bawo, ni baatikitiwo lekoto alɛ busiɛko ma ayi akuɛnsĩ. Nfa nfɛ buakye buababuo Roma nɛ.
44028015	Babiloo ba ninkpe ni di Roma, baanu alɛ buɔɔwa nii, baawa babakyakako wo fanfa bia Apia asaa kasunsukɔ ku lɛba le bɔɔlɛɛ ni Bafɔɔ Nsoosakɔ Ntiɛ. Di Paulo lanya ma nii, aapɛ Yaa sɛfa, otu kafɔɔ late nwɔ.
44028016	Obe wɔ buabuo ni Roma, baata Paulo osuku alɛ asiɛko suoto. Ni baata kpɛtɛ onwii latoonyu nwɔ nɛ.
44028017	Di ayi atiɛ sɛmaa, Paulo lalɛɛ Yuda batii banɔɔfo ba ninkpe ni ninfa aasiisa. Obe wɔ baasi nii, ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Babiloo, Yuda batii ba ninkpe ni di Yerusalem, beemufũ mi bɛɛyɔ mi bɛɛta Roma batii alɛ bakankoe. Di obe wɔ ninambla ni batii loo lɛsalɛsaa ee nyila ni baawa loo kufiofa suoto.
44028018	Obe wɔ di Roma batii ntɔɔkankoe nii, baanya alɛ nimbla lɛsalɛsaa dikaatɛ alɛ baaloe nii, nioso baamiɛ alɛ boodiɛ mi fiɛ.
44028019	Kafɔɔ Yuda batii ditatuna. Nkpo oso diata alɛ latɔkɔ ma nlɛ, ni kɔyɔ ɔlaa nii nta Ɔka Kplɛ Kaesare annukoe. Kafɔɔ diele alɛ lɛyɔ ɔlaa di batii loo suoto ni oso.
44028020	Nkpo oso lɛlɛɛ ye nlɛ kɔnya ye munkakatɛ nɛ. Nwaako katɔkɔ ye nii, beekpee mi nkɔkyɔ be mmle ta otii wɔ suoto di Israel batii konyu osuku manta nii.”
44028021	Ni baatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Buofũ kukũ ku kunwii bukyeko Yuda di suoto lɛfɔ. Diɛkyakaa nii, babiloo kubanwii kafɔɔ diekye nfa bawa bababuɛ ɔlaa kpile kuonwii di suoto lɛfɔ batawo.
44028022	Kafɔɔ buomiɛ bulɛ buonu ɔlaa owo bukyeko lɛsaa le feefũ feenu ni suoto. Diekye nwaako, batii ninkakatɛ ɔlaa biene bakyeko dikudi le mmle kamɛ fasi ni diidii, di aba aba.”
44028023	Nioso baatɛ Paulo dii. Diɛ dii nwu lawo nii, batii kpinwu labasi lɛɛba le di Paulo lasiɛ nii. Aadiki sɛlaa kasɔ aata ma di Mose kufiofa kamɛ ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ akũ kamɛ, di Yaa sɛka ole ku otii wɔ ninle ni Yesu suoto ɔlaa aata ma alɛ baafũ mannu. Aakakatɛ diayɔ ni di olesɛ dialaase di kɔtɔɔfɔ.
44028024	Batii bawo lafũ ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ ni baanu, kafɔɔ bawo ditafũ baanu.
44028025	Nioso sɛlaa se mmle lakple kananfi kaamɛ lɛma. Obe wɔ nfɛ boosifi nii, Paulo latɔkɔ ma ɔlaa yɛntɛle alɛ, “Nwaako di Yaa Ninwuna labuɛ aafenko di Yaa Ɔlaa Buɛtɛtɛ Yesaia suoto aatɔkɔ bawa loo alɛ,
44028026	‘Kyɛ faalaatɔkɔ batii ba mmle falɛ, “Bibanu kafɔɔ bilɔbanu kasɔ, bibanya kafɔɔ bilɔbatofo.”
44028027	Diekye batii ba mmle disibu lɛbla buɛɛ, bakpe kafɔɔ setokopĩ, beetĩi anu lɛma kafɔɔ. Nse diele nkpo, se bɔɔnya, se boonu kafɔɔ, se disibu lɛma kafɔɔ ntabasɛkɛtɛ, alɛ baamunikĩi manwa ɔkyɛ nii, alɛ ami Yaa kayɔɔsa ma sifiɛ.’ ”
44028028	-
44028029	Ni di Paulo layɛntɛ lɛkakatɛ nɔɔ ku mma alɛ, “Dikpe ni mintofo nfɛ bilɛ, Yaa didiki ɔlaa nwu yi, batɔɔyɔ bɛɛkyɛnko batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii. Mma, babakyɔɔ atoko mannu!”
44028030	Paulo lasiɛ ninfa alɛɛ anyɔ di leyo le aafũ aasiɛ ni kamɛ, nfa kafɔɔ aatoofũ batii ba niatɔɔwa babatɔɔnyɔɔ ni nɛ.
44028031	Aatɔɔkakatɛ di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ suoto aatɔɔta ma ku sɛkambi. Aatootuo ma asaa kafɔɔ di Yesu Kristo suoto. Otii kuonwii kafɔɔ ditatĩi nwɔ osuku.
45001001	Ami, Paulo wɔ ninle ni Yesu Kristo kpɛmblatɛ, di Yaa lɛlɛɛ ɛɛbla mi ni tɔkyɛntɛ alɛ kayie ni ɔlaa biene nɔɔ nwu lɛkya, ni kɔkpana kukũ ko mmle nta ye.
45001002	Yaa labuɛ aatɛ kofokofoko alɛ, abadiki ɔlaa biene nwu kayi. Aabuɛ aafenko di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ suoto, fɛ mmle bɛɛkpana ni di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ.
45001003	Ɔlaa biene nwu aabuɛ aatɛ nii yi, Obi nɔɔ wɔ ninle ni Saate loo Yesu Kristo aalaka, nwɔ baalofo ni di otii letembi kamɛ, aale ni ɔka Dawid ɔnantii.
45001004	Diefe ni di Yaa Ninwuna kamɛ, Yaa ladiki nwɔ aatuo batii kaayi alɛ Obi nɔɔ ale ku osie kplɛ, aatakatɛsa nwɔ aakyeko kukpi kamɛ.
45001005	Nnwɔɔ Kristo oso, Yaa lɛnya wo nyaami, ɛɛyɔ wo ɛɛbla batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ, alɛ buakpaa nnle mmuu munwako ɔkyɛ nɔɔ, mamafũ nwɔ mannu, mankyɔɔ nwɔ ɔlaa atoko.
45001006	Aye Roma batii kafɔɔ, bikyaka di batii ba di Yaa lɛlɛɛ alɛ baale ni Yesu Kristo bale.
45001007	Nkpo oso kɔkpana kukũ ko mmle nta bamuu lee ba ninkpe ni di Roma, di Yaa mbɔmbɔ ɛɛlɛɛ ye ɛɛbla ni bale nwɔ nɛ. Teete loo Yaa ku Saate Yesu Kristo ale ye sibualɛ, aata ye suoto lɛyɔɔ.
45001008	Lɛkasale, kɔpɛ Yaa ni sɛfa di bamuu lee disi diɛ Yesu Kristo leyooto kamɛ. Diekye mmle okle biefũ Kristo bienu ni ntɔɔkpɛ diɛkyaka kayi kamuu.
45001009	Yaa ninle mi kamaa yilatɛ alɛ ɔlaa wɔ kobuɛ ni nte nkpo. Yaa wɔ ɔkpɛ kɔbla ni ku otu ni omuu di Obi nɔɔ ɔlaa biene obuɛ kamɛ, alɛ, nnyuma ye di ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔtɔɔ Yaa diisi lee.
45001010	Obe lele kafɔɔ lɛpɛ ɔlaa lɛta Yaa, ntikiti nwɔ lekoto nlɛ, se dibiesaa nɔɔ dile, aatɛɛ osuku nwa nimanya ye di obe wɔ mmle kamɛ.
45001011	Dikle mi ɔkɔnsɔ osie kanya alɛ kanya ye, nsɛko ye ninwuna kamɛ dikusɛkusɛ alɛ biawɛ osie.
45001012	Lɛsaa le kobuɛ ni ninle alɛ buakpee bawo osie di obe wɔ mmle kamɛ. Diekye ofũ onu lee makpee mi osie, ole mi kafɔɔ makpee ye osie.
45001013	Babiloo, biye bilɛ ntɔɔbla disibu di obe kpinwu kamɛ nlɛ kɔwa ɔkyɛ lee, kafɔɔ lɛsaa kotĩi mi osuku. Komiɛ nlɛ batii bafũ Kristo banu kaamɛ lee, fɛ mmle labla ni baatii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii kafɔɔ kamɛ.
45001014	Diekye ɔkpɛ nii kule kuɔta batii bamuu, bakunyentɛ ku mba ninanye ni akũ, banumbentɛ ku mba ninambe ni anu.
45001015	Nkpo oso ninu lɛsɛɛ mi nwaa alɛ kabuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu nta aye ba kafɔɔ ninkpe ni di Roma.
45001016	Ɔlaa biene nwu dilɔɔkpɛ mi sinunsɔ, diekye Yaa osie wɔ ninta otii lele niefũ eenu nwɛ ni didiki nkpa kule. Yuda batii ninle bakasale, fiɛ di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii ntika.
45001017	Ɔlaa biene nwu niediki kuotuo osuku wɔ suoto di Yaa kofe ambla ni Otii tinini. Ofũ onu suoto oofe diɛyɔ ni kaasɔ kakyekɔ diɛlaase ni kaayɛntɛlekɔ. Fɛ mmle bɛɛkpana ni Kɔɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “Otii ofũ onu di Yaa nnya ambla nwɔ tinini antɔɔ nkpa.”
45001018	Yaa ntoodiki ɔblɔ nɔɔ kayi eekyeko osi di sikpile simuu suoto, ku batii kpile ɔsaabla wɔ nikotĩi ni batii osuku alɛ batantofo ni nwaa ɔlaa biene nwu.
45001019	Atɔɔnya ɔblɔ diekye lɛsaa le di otii katofo ni di Yaa suoto, atootofo fiɛ. Diekye Yaa omu niediki ni kayi eetuo ma klekle.
45001020	Diekye diɛyɔ di obe wɔ di Yaa lɛbla ni kayi, asaa ya amuu ɛɛbla eekpee ni kayi ka mmle kamɛ kodiki Yaa osie wɔ munɔɔnya ni kuanu ku letembi nɔɔ nintuo. Nkpo oso kuonwii dilaafuo obuɛ alɛ Yaa nnaa.
45001021	Nioso kuntɛ batii n-ye Yaa, blɔɔyɔ dibu nɔɔ le niesiɛko nwɔ ni fɛ Yaa batɔɔ ee bapɛ nwɔ sɛfa kafɔɔ. Nkpo oso asaakuu suoto lete mambu diisi. Ditunu ɔsaabla kafɔɔ ntooyii ma kamɛ pɔ.
45001022	Mia mannyu suoto fɛ banumbentɛ, kafɔɔ beekple babuutɛ.
45001023	Se dikpe ni beesumu ni Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa anaa ni kaloo, bɛɛyɔ kasumu nwu bɔɔta afiɔ ya bɛɛyɔ asaa bɛɛbla ni di otii wɔ ninkpi ni letembi kanya ee bakansiɛ, babɔkɛɛ ee babɔkɛɛ ba ninkpɔkɔ ni kaasɔ fɛ basaanwu.
45001024	Nioso Yaa ntoodiɛ ma ɛɛta asaa kpɔnɔnfɔɔ ya siitu lɛma komiɛ ni ɔbla. Nkpo oso batɔɔyɔ suoto lɛma bɛɛta anunsɔsaa ɔbla ku bawo lɛma.
45001025	Batɔɔkyɛlɛnsa Yaa ɔlaa nwaa nwu kafɔɔ bɛɛbla sɛlaa ku afunu. Manta ole manta asaa ya kafɔɔ di Yaa lɛbla nii, se dikaatɛ alɛ Yaa wɔ niɛbla ni asaa nwu mansumu man-yɔ katansa mantɔɔ ni obe lele. Diwa kaanya.
45001026	Asaa ya mmle ɔbla oso, Yaa ntɔɔyɔ batii ba mmle ɛɛta anunsɔsaa ɔkɔnsɔ oklee. Bia basanko ntoodiɛ basuɔtɔ otenko bɛɛkyɛ bootenko basanko wo lɛma.
45001027	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ baasuɔtɔ ntoodiɛ basanko otenko bɛɛkyɛ bootenko basuɔtɔ wo lɛma nɛ. Ta anunsɔsaa ya mmle ɔbla oso, Yaa ntɔɔnanfi ma kootoko fɛ mmle diesiɛko ma ni di nkpa kpile be mmle kamɛ osiɛ oso.
45001028	Ta beesĩ alɛ blootekete asaa ya nikata mantofo ni Yaa oso, Yaa lediɛ ma ɛɛta alɛ sikpile ntoofũ ma disibu kamɛ diɛta alɛ asaa ya ninankaatɛ alɛ bɛɛbla nii, nnya bɔɔbla nɛ.
45001029	Nioso disi osie ɔsaabla ntooyii ma kamɛ pɔ, fɛle, okpile, onumbɛbɛɛ, katiikyidi, onunsɛɛ, batii olo, kakpɛ, ditiikyɔnkyɔ, disikpile obu ku batii suoto sɛlaa obuɛ.
45001030	Bale batii ayooto balalaasatɛ kafɔɔ. Bale batii ba niekyidi ni Yaa. Bale batii batufatɛ, suoto batuotɛ, bale batii ba ninkanta nii. Bale batii ba nintaasa sikpile manwako ni ku batii ba ninambu ni balofotɛ lɛma.
45001031	Bale batii ba ninantofo ni okpile ku dibiene baatɛ ni nsũ. Bale batii ba ninambla ni sɛɛlaa lɛma suoto. Ɔlaa, ninnu ma kafutu ee banya otii nyaami.
45001032	Baye klekle alɛ Yaa lekpee kufiofa alɛ batii ba ninsi ni nkpa be mmle okle, Yaa mata ma kukpi letokonanfi. Kafɔɔ manyila mambla sikpile nwu. Diele bia nni lete, diɛkyakaa nii, manyila batii ba nikɔbla ni sikpile nwu okle kamaa.
45002001	Nioso, nse otii owo lɛkanko otii wo nɔɔ, eelo nwɔ lɛpɔɔ di ɔlaa owo suoto, ninnwɔɔ kafɔɔ asi nkpa nwu okle, anaa lɛnyadiki kuninwii. Diekye nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ suoto atoolo lɛpɔɔ nɛ.
45002002	Bamuu loo buye bulɛ Yaa lete ninkpe osuku alɛ aakanko batii ba nimbla ni asaa ya mmle okle.
45002003	Ni nse afɔ fɛ otii kaayi nimbla ni asaa ya mmle okle foolo bawo lɛfɔ lɛpɔɔ, feenyu falɛ faatoso Yaa lɛkanko?
45002004	Sɛɛ bienyu bilɛ kasakasa oso di Yaa kole wo sifutulɛ, ɛɛwɛ otu ɔtɛ kaasɔ kafɔɔ ɛɛta wo? Nwaako biye bilɛ, Yaa kole wo sibualɛ se mmle okle diekye Omiɛ alɛ akyakaako wo buokyi siitu loo kamɛ.
45002005	Ta bikpe ni setokopĩ, biesĩ minankyi ni siitu lee kamɛ oso, Yaa kɔwa ye ku letokonanfi nwaa di dii le eediki eese alɛ abakanko ni batii bamuu di osuku tinini suoto.
45002006	Diekye Yaa mata otii biala koto di ɔkpɛ wɔ ɛɛbla ni kanya.
45002007	Batii ba niekpee ni okyiini di lɛsaa biene ɔbla kamɛ, beetikanko ni leklekle ku dibu ku nkpa biene osiɛ nkpaamaa, Yaa mata ma nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
45002008	Kafɔɔ batii ba nimbɔmbɔ ni kalɔ, beesĩ ni ɔlaa biene nwu koto ɔkyɔɔ, batikanko ni asaa kpile ɔbla nkpaamaa Yaa manya ɔblɔ ankpee ko ma annanfi ma kootoko osie kanya.
45002009	Batii ba bamuu nikɔbla ni okpile, babawɛ dibuo, blɔbawɛ kafɔɔ ɔnyɛɛ ɔtɛ. Yuda batii ninle bakasale diibuo le mmle kamɛ, fiɛ diɛ mba ninanle ni Yuda batii kafɔɔ matikanko.
45002010	Kafɔɔ mba nimbla ni asaa biene, Yaa mata ma leklekle ku dibu ku suoto lɛyɔɔ. Yuda batii ninle bakasale nimawɛ ni asaa ya mmle, fiɛ di mba ninanle ni Yuda batii kafɔɔ matikanko.
45002011	Diekye Yaa nínnyu di otii anu aakanko.
45002012	Batii ba bamuu di Mose kufiofa dienii nii, kafɔɔ bɛɛbla ni okpile, Yaa mananfi ma kootoko ku kukpi manwɔɔ, anamayɔ ni kufiofa nwu. Batii ba kafɔɔ ninsi ni di Mose kufiofa nwu kalɔ bɛɛbla ni okpile, kufiofa nwu di Yaa mayɔ ankanko ma nɛ.
45002013	Diekye diele batii ba di onu ko boonu ni kufiofa nwu ninte tinini diɛ Yaa anu. Kafɔɔ batii ba nimbla ni diɛ kofiofa nwu nkpo kanya ninte tinini.
45002014	Nwaako, batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii Mose kufiofa nwu dienii ma. Kafɔɔ nse situ lɛma se nintɔkɔ ma ni ɔlaa kaamɛ lɛma nta ma mambla asaa ya di Mose kufiofa kotuo nii, ni ɔsaabla lɛma kotuo alɛ bakpe kufiofa kaamɛ lɛma kuntɛ baaye Mose kufiofa nwu.
45002015	Nle mmle kotuo alɛ Yaa lɛkpana Mose kufiofa nwu diɛ situ lɛma kamɛ. Situ lɛma kafɔɔ ntɔkɔ ma alɛ nwaako kute nkpo. Obe owo kafɔɔ, disibu lɛma nlo ma lɛpɔɔ, obe owo kafɔɔ mantofo alɛ boololaa mambla.
45002016	Nioso ɔlaa biene wɔ suoto koyie ni lɛkya, kotuo alɛ Yaa mata Yesu Kristo nkanko batii disi kamɛ awofasaa amuu di lɛkankoyi nwu suoto.
45002017	Aye ba kafɔɔ kobuɛ nlɛ Yuda batii bile nii, bietika ni anu di Mose kufiofa suoto, minkanta bilɛ Yaa batii finle bile.
45002018	Mimbuɛ kafɔɔ bilɛ biye lɛsaa le niɛyɔɔ ni Yaa kafutu, bietekete kafɔɔ lɛsaa biene diɛ kufiofa nwu kamɛ biediki lɛsaa le ninlɛ nii.
45002019	Minnyu kafɔɔ bilɛ aye ninle ninu biɛta banumbiɛtɛ, ku lɛkpa biɛta batii ba ninsi ni diɛ ditunu kamɛ.
45002020	Mimbuɛ kafɔɔ bilɛ aye ninka babuutɛ, mintuo kafɔɔ mba ninayibe ni anu asaa. Biefũ bienu osie kanya kafɔɔ bilɛ lɛsaatofo ku onukwale lete ninsi diɛ kufiofa nwu kamɛ.
45002021	Ni aye ba nikotuo ni batii bamba asaa, bitootuo suoto lee asaa nwu? Minyie Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya minta batii bilɛ, batan-yu, kafɔɔ aye bamu mɔ, bilooyu?
45002022	Mintɔkɔ batii bilɛ batankpee asɔnɔ, kafɔɔ aye bamu bilookpee asɔnɔ? Biɛtaka biyɛ diɛ afiɔ ɔtɔ suoto, kafɔɔ bilooyu kafiofa asaa bile?
45002023	Bikle Yaa kofiofa biɔkanta, sɛɛ bieye bilɛ sinunsɔ kɔkpɛ Yaa minankyɛ ni diɛ kufiofa nɔɔ nwu suoto?
45002024	Bɛɛkpana diɛ Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “Aye Yuda batii nkpa kpile oso, yɛta alɛ batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii, kɔlɛɛ Yaa leyooto kpile.”
45002025	Nse biele kufiofa nwu, ni lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ lee obudi nle lɛsaa le niefũ ni kɔya. Kafɔɔ nse bíele kufiofa nwu, ni lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ obudi amanle ya biɛbla ni nle lɛsaa fukuti.
45002026	Nse otii wɔ ninanle ni Yuda otii, anambudi ni lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ kafɔɔ lele kufiofa nwu, Yaa dilaanyu nwɔ fɛ otii wɔ niebudi ni lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ?
45002027	Otii wɔ niele ni kufiofa nwu kafɔɔ anambudi ni lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ, abalo ye lɛpɔɔ. Kuntɛ aye bɛɛta kufiofa nwu, biebudi asɔkɔsɔkɔ. Diekye bíele kufiofa nwu.
45002028	Diele suoto sina suoto mannya Yuda otii biene mantɛ nsũ. Lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ obudi biene nwu kafɔɔ diesi diɛ suoto sina ɔkpɛ wɔ baatii nnya ni diɛ otii suoto.
45002029	Kafɔɔ otii wɔ ninle ni Yuda otii biene ninle otii wɔ diɛ ɔkpɛ nɔɔ ɔbla kamɛ diotuo alɛ atɔɔyɔ otu nɔɔ ɛɛta ni Yaa. Diele suoto sina se beebudi ni diɛ kufiofa kanya. Kafɔɔ diefe ni di Yaa Ninwuna suoto. Diele otii kaayi kafɔɔ nintakatɛsa otii nwu leyooto katoo, kafɔɔ Yaa.
45003001	Ni se dite nkpo mɔ, kɔmɛn-ya diɛ Yuda otii lefũ alenke batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii? Be nfasũ ninsi di lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ obudi kamɛ?
45003002	Diɛ sisuku kpinwu suoto, dikle asaa biene. Lɛkasale, Yuda batii nnɛɛ kamɛ diɛ Yaa layɔ ɔlaa nɔɔ aakpee.
45003003	Ni nse diɛwa alɛ bawo diefũ banu, ni diotuo alɛ Yaa kafɔɔ dilababla di ɔlaa nɔɔ suoto?
45003004	Oowo! Nse bia diɛwa alɛ batii bamuu lekple balaatɛ, Yaa nnwɔɔ ababla diɛ ɔlaa nɔɔ suoto. Fɛ mmle bɛɛkpana ni Kɔɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “Ɔlaa lele feebuɛ kute nkpo. Nse bɛɛkanko fɔ fabale lɛbɛ obe lele.”
45003005	Be bukpe mumbuɛ, nse sikpile loo se buɔbla ni kɔta alɛ batii nnya Yaa dibiene le ɔɔbla ni mantɛ nsũ? Nioso buabuɛ bulɛ Yaa dielolaa abla nse ɛɛnanfi wo kootoko? Oowo! Kafɔɔ nkpo baatii bawo kobuɛ nɛ.
45003006	Ni se Yaa diete tinini ni be suoto abayila ankanko batii kaayi?
45003007	Batii bawo nkaalɛ alɛ, “Nimɔ nse sɛlaa kuafunu nii nta alɛ mannya Yaa dibiene ɔbla mantansa nwɔ mɔ, be oso boolo mi lɛpɔ alɛ otii kpile nle?”
45003008	Nse buɔyɔ ni ninkpo, ni buafuo obuɛ bulɛ, “Bita butɔɔbla sikpile, alɛ lɛsaa biene kadie kaamɛ ninwa.” Diekye nkpo baatii bawo kobuɛ mantika wo alɛ buobuɛ nɛ. Batii ba nimayɔ nwu ni ninkpo, beesiɛko alɛ Yaa kalo ma lɛpɔɔ.
45003009	Nimɔ, be buafuo obuɛ di awo Yuda batii suoto? Buofuo obuɛ bulɛ lele wo nlɛ dilenke mba ninanle ni Yuda batii? Oowo! Diekye ntoodiki letuo lelesa katũ nlɛ okpile ntoofũ batii ba ninle ni Yuda batii ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii bamuu kamɛ.
45003010	Diekye fɛ mmle bɛɛkpana ni Kɔɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “Otii kuonwii nnaa ate ni tinini di Yaa anu. Bia onwii nnaa!
45003011	Otii kuonwii nnaa atɔɔnya dibiene ɛɛtɛ ni nsũ. Kuonwii kafɔɔ nnaa oowolaa ni Yaa osuku.
45003012	Batii bamuu ntookple di Yaa nkpaamaa. Bamuu kafɔɔ batooyu. Kuonwii kafɔɔ nnaa ambla ni dibiene. Bia onwii wɔ mmle nnaa!
45003013	Nnya lɛma lɛbɛ dite foo fɛ ɔkya. Sɛlaa kuafunu kafɔɔ ntika diɛ sɛkplalomii lɛma suoto. Nnya lɛma kamɛ sɛlaa nlo batii fɛ kɔsaanwu adi.
45003014	Kanya lɛma kamɛ sɛlaa leyii pɔ ku akpaani kpile.
45003015	Mampɛsɛwa ku nkpaa lɛma di batii olo suoto.
45003016	Nkpa lɛma ntɔɔlalaa alɛ dibuo ko mananfi manwako osie kanya.
45003017	Baaye mmle mansiɛ ni nkpa di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ.
45003018	Nkpa lɛma kafɔɔ nintuo alɛ manyɛkɛ Yaa.”
45003019	Nunua, buye bulɛ sɛlaa se simuu beebuɛ ni di Mose kufiofa nwu kamɛ, batii ba ninsi ni diɛ kufiofa kalɔ beebuɛ bɛɛta. Ni batii kaayi dilɔbafuo kanya odiki di Yaa lɛkanko kamɛ. Diekye Yaa makanko kayi ka mmle kamuu.
45003020	Nioso Yaa dilabata kuonwii lɛbɛ di anu nɔɔ di kufiofa nwu otikanko kamɛ. Kafɔɔ kufiofa nwu ninta batii ntofo alɛ bɔɔbla sikpile nɛ.
45003021	Kafɔɔ nunua batoodiki osuku wɔ suoto di Yaa kofe anta ni batii lɛbɛ beetuo, ninankye ni kufiofa kamɛ. Kufiofa ko mmle ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ lɛkpasa sɛlaa se mmle kamɛ klekle.
45003022	Yaa kɔta batii lɛbɛ di ofũ onu lɛma di Yesu kamɛ. Yaa lɛbla nle mmle ɛɛta batii ba bamuu niefũ Kristo beenu nii. Diekye aakpee kasɛ di batii ntɛɛ.
45003023	Kaasɔ ninle alɛ batii bamuu ntɔɔbla okpile, beekpukuti di Yaa leklekle nfũ.
45003024	Kafɔɔ, Yaa lefe di Yesu Kristo suoto ɛɛta koto di batii disi fɛ lɛkyɛsaa, ɛɛta ma lɛbɛ, diɛ sifutulɛ nɔɔ kamɛ.
45003025	Yaa layɔ Yesu aata ole di sikpile loo disi. Alɛ diefe ni di ntɔ nɔɔ be aawii ni kaasɔ oso, batii kawɛ sikpile lɛma ɔyɔ ɔkyɛ nse beefũ Kristo beenu. Yaa labla nle mmle aayɔ aatuo wo alɛ, ambla lɛsaa di osuku kanya. Aawɛ otu di obe wɔ nintoofe ni kamɛ, alɛ, aafee sinumpoo aatĩi batii sikpile.
45003026	Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ mmle kamɛ, diefe ni di oleɔta wɔ mmle suoto, ni di Yaa kotuo alɛ ate tinini nɛ. Nioso ɔɔta otii lele niefũ Yesu eenu lɛbɛ nɛ.
45003027	Ni be lɛsaa suoto buakanta bulɛ buɔbla fiɛ buɔwɛ didiki? Lɛsalɛsaa nnaa! Diekye blɔɔta otii kuonwii lɛbɛ di kufiofa ole suoto. Kafɔɔ diefe ni di ofũ onu suoto ni di Yaa lelolaa awo ku nnwɔɔ ntɛɛ nɛ.
45003028	Nioso butootofo klekle bulɛ, diefe ni diɛ ofũ onu suoto ni di Yaa kɔta otii lɛbɛ di anu nɔɔ nɛ. Ni diele kufiofa nɔɔ ole kanya oso.
45003029	Sɛɛ Yaa Yuda batii lete ole ale? Aale batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii Yaa? Ɛɛ, ole ma kafɔɔ ale!
45003030	Diekye, di Yaa onwii ko ale nii, abata Yuda batii lɛbɛ diɛ ofũ onu lɛma suoto. Nkpo kafɔɔ abata batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii lɛbɛ diɛ ofũ onu lɛma suoto nɛ.
