47011007	Obe wɔ kamɛ lakye ni Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo kasɔ lɛkya oyie ɔta ye yi, ntafũ ye koto kukunwii. Kafɔɔ lawakosa suoto kasɔ di mmle okle baatakatɛsa ye ni katoo. Ni, nni ninle okpile wɔ lɛbla ni nɛ?
47011008	Koto ko di bafũbanutɛ akudi bamba latoosiisa baatɔɔtɛɛ ni yi, nkũ layɔ latoonyu suoto di obe wɔ lawɛ ni di ɔkyɛ lee nɛ. Ote ko dite fɛ latooyu ma layɔ latɔɔkyakaako ye.
47011009	Obe wɔ lawɛ ni di ɔkyɛ lee yi, kanya nii onyu ditatika ye di suoto nse lɛsaa lefĩ mi. Babiloo ba niakye ni Makedonia niawakoe lɛsaa biala le niafĩ mi nii. Nioso ntakpee kuonwii lee kubuɛ di lɛsalɛsaa nii suoto. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ ninɔɔwa ye kubuɛ ɔbakpee diidii nɛ.
47011010	Obe wɔ di Kristo nwaako ɔlaa nwɔ nsi mi ni kaamɛ yi, lɛsalɛsaa dilaafuo mi osuku otĩi alɛ, naafuo nle mmle ɔyɔ ɔkanta di Akaia kasɔ suoto di ntɛɛ nwu.
47011011	Ni be oso kobuɛ nlɛ ninfũ lɛsalɛsaa nkyeko ɔkyɛ lee? Diele alɛ nimbɔmbɔ ye ni oso. Yaa omu n-ye alɛ mbɔmbɔ ye.
47011012	Lɛsaa le kɔbla nii yi, makple ntɔɔbla nkpo okle alɛ, namafũ lɛsalɛsa nkyeko ɔkyɛ lee. Nle mmle mata alɛ, mma nkpo ninkobuɛ alɛ bale ni batɔkyɛntɛ yi, blɔbawɛ osuku kuonwii bakanta babuɛ alɛ, mma kafɔɔ bɔɔbla ɔkpɛ fɛ mmle okle di awoo buɔbla nii.
47011013	Batii nwu nkpo diele batɔkyɛntɛ nwaa. Balaatɛ batɔkyɛntɛ bale. Mambuɛ kafɔɔ sɛlaa kuafunu di ɔkpɛ lɛma ɔbla kamɛ. Bɛɛbla suoto alɛ batii kanya ma fɛ Kristo batɔkyɛntɛ nwaa bale.
47011014	Nle mmle diele lɛsaa fɔle, diekye Abonsam omu bia nkyɛlɛnsa suoto ambla fɛ Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ wɔ ninkpe ni leklekle.
47011015	Nkpo oso nle mmle diɛbla ɔkpɛ nse batikankotɛ nɔɔ nwu kafɔɔ lɛkyɛlɛnsa suoto bɛɛbla fɛ Yaa bakpɛmblatɛ ba nimbla ni asaa tinini. Kaayɛntɛlekɔ Yaa kɔwa ma kotoko ɔnanfi fɛ mmle okle diesiɛko ma ni di ɔsaabla lɛma suoto.
47011016	Kokple ntɔkɔ ye nlɛ, kuonwii atannyu mi alɛ lebuu. Kafɔɔ nse otii owo lenyu alɛ lebuu yi, aayɔ ninkpo alɛ amii kafuo ɔkanta kɛɛkɛɛ.
47011017	Katɔkɔ ye nii, ɔlaa wɔ kobuɛ ni yi, diele lɛsaa le di Saate lekpee mi alɛ mbuɛ ni dile. Diekye ɔkanta wɔ kɔkanta ni di ɔlaa wɔ mmle kamɛ yi, dibate fɛ mmle di buutɛ nkanta nii.
47011018	Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ baatii kpinwu nkanta ni kaayi ka mmle asaa suoto oso yi, ami kafɔɔ bitɛɛ osuku ninkanta kɛɛkɛɛ.
47011019	Di obe wɔ di aye bamu bile ni banumbentɛ oso yi, mintuna minfũ babuutɛ ba mmle okle.
47011020	Nse otii owo lɛyɔ ye ɛɛbla kpɛmblatɛ nɔɔ, ee ɔɔtafaa ye, ee ɔɔkyɔɔ ye okũ owo, ee oloobu ye akpee lɛsalɛsaa kamɛ, ee ɛɛpɛ ye kɔnɛɛ kootokosi bia yi, mintunako nwɔ.
47011021	Kafɔɔ awo yi, sinunsɔ sile siɛta wo alɛ buabla ye asaa nwu nkpo okle. Sɛɛ dikaatɛ alɛ buabla nya? Asaa ya baatii bawo makpee otu mankanta ni yi, ni ami kafɔɔ makpe otu nwu nkpo okle nkanta. Binyu lo kɔkakatɛ fɛle buutɛ.
47011022	Batii nwu nkpo, nse boobuɛ alɛ Hebri batii bale, ami kafɔɔ Hebri otii nwu nle nɛ. Nse boobuɛ alɛ Israel batii bale, ami kafɔɔ Israel otii nwu nle nɛ. Nse boobuɛ kafɔɔ alɛ Abraham banantii bale yi, ami kafɔɔ Abraham ɔnantii nwu nle nɛ.
47011023	Nse boobuɛ alɛ Kristo bakpɛmblatɛ bale? Ami, nle Kristo kpɛmblatɛ biene nlenke ma. Bɛɛta kɔkakatɛ fɛle otii wɔ diisi kamɛ ntɔɔlalaa nii. Nwaako kabuɛ nii, kɔbla Kristo ɔkpɛ osie kanya nlenke ma. Batii ba ninambɔmbɔ ni Kristo ntɔɔtɛ mi leeyo obe kpinkidi. Batɔɔpɛ mi kafɔɔ taataa ninaafuo ni ɔka. Obe kpinwu kafɔɔ ntoobuo di kukpi ku nkpa ntɛɛ.
47011024	Sɛnɔɔ simu batɔɔpɛ mi ku Yuda batii mpile afosi atiɛ sɛnaasĩ.
47011025	Sitiɛ simu kafɔɔ di Roma batii ntɔɔpɛ mi ku kowesee. Ninwii kafɔɔ batɔɔsafɔ mi afuɔ. Sitiɛ simu kafɔɔ di oklo kplɛ ntooyibiɛkoe lakpa labuo di lekpo kamɛ. Niinwii kamɛ yi, lekpo ntu latuka mi dii kufĩ nimu ku kakyɛ kanwii nimu.
47011026	Di sisuku nii kpinwu ɔkyɛ kamɛ yi, ntoobuo di amiina ate ate kamɛ. Sekle ntɔɔyɔ mi taataa, ntoobuo di bayu nnɛɛ kamɛ. Ntoobuo di amiina kamɛ di ami omu batii nii ba ninle ni Yuda batii nnɛɛ kamɛ ku batii ba kafɔɔ ninanle ni Yuda batii nnɛɛ kamɛ. Ntoobuo di amiina kamɛ di sekpoo kplɛ kamɛ. Labuo di amiina kamɛ di sɛfaafuu kamɛ, ku lekpo kamɛ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ labuo niimiina kamɛ di lekpo ntu osi ku batii ba ninanfũ banu ni nnɛɛ kamɛ nɛ.
47011027	Lakpee okyiini labla ɔkpɛ osie kanya, lasiɛ nkyɛ kpinwu ku sɛkyɔsĩ ɔtante ɔkyɔsĩi. Kɔka ku otukɔnsɔ laklee mi taataa, obe kpinwu kafɔɔ alesaa ditawɛ mi. Lɛwɔɔfɔ kafɔɔ leklee mi, kafɔɔ ntawɛ lɛsaa katĩi ni suoto.
47011028	Kakyakaa ni di n-ya mmle suoto yi, obe lele kobu diisi di nsiisakɔ be ninkpe ni di aba aba sɛlaa suoto.
47011029	Nse otii wɔ niefũ eenu ni lɛwa kasɔ yi, ami ninnɛɛ nlenkee ofee. Nse bɛɛkpaa otii owo kafɔɔ beekpee di okpile kamɛ yi, nimbuo mi suoto osie kanya.
47011030	Nse diefĩ alɛ kakanta yi, ni asaa ya nikodiki antuo alɛ lɛwa ni kasɔ suoto makanta.
47011031	Yaa wɔ ninle ni Saate Yesu Teete, nwɔ buɔtansa ni diesifi ni dinnaa ni kaloo, aye alɛ sɛlaa se kobuɛ nii, site nkpo.
47011032	Obe wɔ lawɛ ni di Damasko yi, abaa nɔɔfo wɔ niasiɛ ni di Ɔka Areta kalɔ lamiɛ alɛ oomufũ mi. Nkpo oso aase okpoo banyuntɛ di oyoyiɛ wɔ baatofo baakyisa ni okpoo nwu nkpo nnyoko.
47011033	Kafɔɔ bafũbanutɛ layɔ mi baakpee di kakyikyɛ kamɛ baafenko di oyoyiɛ nwu nkpo fesere, baasoosɛɛ baase kaasɔ, latoso lasifi alɛ ntabuo nwɔ nnɛɛ.
47012001	Dikpe nii lɛkanta kuntɛ nfasũ kunwii diesi di ɔkanta kamɛ. Aye oso yi, nfɛ mabuɛ asaa ya di Saate ladiki aatuo mi lanya nii.
47012002	N-ye osuɔtɔ onwii niefũ Kristo eenu nii. Lefosi alɛɛ ana nintabafe ni kamɛ nɛ, Saate lakɛnkɛ nwɔ aasifiko osi osi. Kafɔɔ ninye nse suoto sina kamɛ diale woo, ninwuna kamɛ diale aakpaa nwɔ. Yaa lete ninye.
47012003	-
47012004	Lɛsaa le lete n-ye kobuɛ ni ninle alɛ Yaa lakpaa osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle aasifiko Paradiso di osi. Kafɔɔ ninye nse suoto sina kamɛ diale aakpaa nwɔ woo, ninwuna kamɛ diale. Kafɔɔ Yaa nnwɔɔ aye. Nfa di osuɔtɔ wɔ mmle lanu sɛlaa se di otii nnaa osuku ambuɛ nii, manaafuo sĩ ni kasɔ kafɔɔ odiki.
47012005	Nioso makanta di otii nwu nkpo suoto, kafɔɔ namakanta di ami omu suoto. Nse makanta di suoto nii yi, ni makanta di asaa ya nikotuo alɛ lɛwa ni kasɔ lete suoto.
47012006	Nse kuntɛ nlɛ kɔkanta di suoto nii kamɛ yi, dilabate fɛ dibuusaa kɔbla. Diekye sɛlaa se kamabuɛ ni nte nkpo. Kafɔɔ lesĩ nlɛ nɔɔkanta, diekye noomiɛ nlɛ otii kuonwii anyɛɛ alenkeesa mmle okle nte nii di asaa ya nimbla ni ku n-ya nimbuɛ ni kamɛ.
47012007	Ta mmle okle ninamawa fɛ suoto katoo kɔtakatɛsa ni di asaa kplɛ ya di Yaa ladiki aatuo mi ni oso yi, beekpee mi ofiɛ wɔ ninte ni fɛ owuu di suoto. Ofiɛ wɔ mmle ntookple fɛ Abonsam tɔkyɛntɛ di suoto nii kamɛ, kuɔkpɛkoe osie kanya, mmle okle ninamatakatɛsa ni suoto katoo.
47012008	Sitiɛ simu ntɔɔpɛ ɔlaa lɛta Saate di ofiɛ wɔ mmle suoto nlɛ, aayɔɔsɛɛ nwu.
47012009	Kafɔɔ aatɔkɔ mi alɛ, “Sibualɛ nii nfɛ mpɔ di suoto lɛfɔ, diekye osie nii mbla ɔkpɛ di batii ba ninnaa ni ɔnyɛɛ suoto kunlenkee bia.” Nle mmle oso di suoto mayɔɔ mi sinfensa nse kɔkanta di kasɔ nii ɔwa suoto alɛ Kristo osie mafũ kasiɛ di suoto nii simuu kamɛ nɛ.
47012010	Nse Kristo oso lɛwa kasɔ yi, ee batii kotufa mi, ee diobuo mi, ee baatii ntikankoe, ee asaa dilɔɔlɛ mi ɔkyɛ yi, suoto mayɔɔ mi. Diekye nse ami omu osie ntɔɔwa kasɔ yi, ni ninfũ Kristo osie nɛ.
47012011	Kɔkakatɛ fɛle buutɛ, kafɔɔ aye niɛta diɔwa ninkpo. Diekye aye dikaatɛ alɛ biatansɛɛ fiɛ. Kuntɛ bia diɛwa alɛ nindie lɛsalɛsaa yi, batii ba bionyu bilɛ bale ni batɔkyɛntɛ biene nwu nkpo yi, baalɛ balenke mi di osuku kuonwii suoto.
47012012	Sɛkpɛ se niabla ni ɔkpɛ ku atuosaa ku sɛkpɛ kplɛ bamba se labla ni ku otu ɔtɛ kaasɔ kaamɛ lee, kotuo alɛ nwaako tɔkyɛntɛ biene nle.
47012013	Ninya lɛsaa le lɛbla lɛta ni kasiisakɔ dikudi lewo dilenke alɛ nimbla nta ye nii. Sɛɛ mmle ntafũ ni koto kukunwii nkyeko ni ɔkyɛ lee n-yɔ nkyakaako ni suoto oso? Kotikiti ye lekoto nlɛ biyɔ bikyɛ mi alɛ ntabla nkpo.
47012014	Nle mmle ninle ditiɛfa ntoololaa ni suoto nlɛ kɔwa ni ɔkyɛ lee nɛ. Kafɔɔ noomiɛ lɛsalɛsaa nkyeko ɔkyɛ lee. Aye bamu komiɛ, diele koto lee komiɛ. Diekye diele babi ninsiisa asaa mantɛ alɛ boonyu balofotɛ lɛma. Kafɔɔ balofotɛ ninsiisa asaa mantɛ man-yɔ mannyu babi lɛma.
47012015	Nle mmle oso mayɔ asaa nii ya ninkpe mi nii mblako ɔkpɛ, n-yɔ suoto nii kafɔɔ bia nta ku suoto lɛyɔɔ diisi lee. Ni nse ntɔɔbɔmbɔ ye mmle okle mɔ, ni be oso di lɛbɔmbɔ lee di suoto nii kawa kasɔ?
47012016	Bitoonu kasɔ nfɛ bilɛ, ntale atoo latika ye di suoto. Kafɔɔ batii bawo kamabuɛ alɛ, ninumbe kanya nkyɛ kɔkyɔɔ ye okũ, mmle okle kawɛ ni lɛsaa lewo di suoto lee.
47012017	Batii ba lakpee ni ɔkyɛ lee, lafe ma di suoto latafaa ye?
47012018	Latikiti Tito lekoto nlɛ awa ɔkyɛ lee, ni lakpee bafũbanutɛ loo onwii kafɔɔ nlɛ atikanko nwɔ baawa nɛ. Di Tito lawa nii, biabuɛ bilɛ aatafaa ye? Diele disibu ninwii ninkpe munko nwɔ buayɔ buabla ɔkpɛ wɔ buabla ni kaamɛ lee? Diele osuku onwii suoto kafɔɔ buofe mumbla asaa?
47012019	Ni onyu ko bionyu bilɛ di obe wɔ mmle omuu kamɛ suoto ko buɔta mundiki di anu lee? Oowo, diele nkpo kute! Buɔkakatɛ munta ye fɛ mmle okle di Kristo kamamiɛ alɛ buakakatɛ munta ye ni di Yaa anu. Babiloo bɔmbɔtɛ, lɛsaa le ko buomiɛ bulɛ buɔbla ni ninle alɛ, buɔkyakaako ye alɛ, ofũ onu lee kamuɔ kunkyakaa.
47012020	Kɔyɛkɛ nlɛ nse lɛwa nfa yi, namawa manya ye fɛ mmle okle komiɛ nlɛ manya ye biekyi nii. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di ayee bilabanyɛɛ fɛ mmle okle biomiɛ bilɛ binyɛɛ nte ni nɛ. Kɔyɛkɛ nlɛ loobia mawa manya nii, kalɔ ku onumbɛbɛɛ ku bawo ɔblɔ okpee ku lete nii lete nii ninle ku bawo odu okutu ku bawo sɛlaa obuɛ ku suoto katoo ɔtakatɛsa ku onwii ɔtambla nsi ye kaamɛ.
47012021	Kɔyɛkɛ kafɔɔ nlɛ, di obe wɔ makple nwa ni nfa yi, Yaa nii mata nnɛɛ nfee mi di anu lee. Ni kamawi kaku di batii kpinwu disi, diekye baakyi siitu lɛma kamɛ di sikpile se bɛɛbla ni di obe wɔ nintɔbafe ni kamɛ oso. Bɛɛbla asaa ya ninkpɔnɔnfɔsa ni otii ku asɔnɔ okpee ku basiɛwo lɛma.
47013001	Nle mmle ninle ditiɛfa kɔwa ni ɔkyɛ lee nɛ. Bɛɛkpana di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, nse otii owo lɛyɔ ɔlaa di owo nɔɔ suoto yi, “Dikpe nii batii banyɔ ee batiɛ leyila ɔlaa nwu nkpo kamaa, beebuɛ alɛ, ɔlaa nwu nte nkpo, fiɛ baalo otii wɔ niɛbla ni okpile nwu nkpo lɛpɔɔ.”
47013002	Obe wɔ lawa ni ɔkyɛ lee lɛnyɔɔfa yi, lasĩ ɔlaa lata batii ba bamuu niabla ni okpile saa ku batii bamba. Nunua nsinnaa ni di ɔkyɛ lee yi, kokple nsĩ ɔlaa nta ma nlɛ, nse lekple lɛwa yi, namasĩ ma ɔnanfi kootoko.
47013003	Di obe wɔ biomiɛ bilɛ biotofo nse nwaako Kristo ninkofe di suoto nii ankakatɛ anta ye ni oso yi, bibanya lɛsaa le biomiɛ nii. Dilabayɔɔ dita ye nse Yaa lɛnanfi ye kootoko. Bibanya kafɔɔ bilɛ nwaako akpe osie kaamɛ lee.
47013004	Kuntɛ Yesu ditawɛ osie di obe wɔ baakaasa nwɔ ni koowoso suoto yi, Yaa layɔ osie nɔɔ aatakatɛsa nwɔ kuukpi kamɛ. Nkpo okle di awo ba niɛbla ni onwii ku Kristo bunaa osie nɛ. Kafɔɔ bukpe Yaa osie alɛ buabla lɛsaa le dikpe nii buɔbla ni kaamɛ lee.
47013005	Aye bamu bibuo di suoto lee kamɛ binyu, nse bisi di ofũ onu nwu nkpo kamɛ. Bieye bilɛ Yesu Kristo nsi ye kaamɛ? Biye ni! Diediki biebuo di suoto lee kamɛ bienyu, biɛnya bilɛ bíewo.
47013006	Lefũ lenu nlɛ, bibanya bilɛ awo yi, buowo.
47013007	Buotikiti Yaa lekoto bulɛ aklee ye alɛ bilaabla lɛsaa kpile kuonwii. Diele alɛ buɔkaalɛ nle mmle alɛ buayɔ muntuo bulɛ buowo ni di batɔkyɛntɛ ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle kamɛ oso. Kafɔɔ buɔkaalɛ nle mmle, ta mmle okle biabla ni lɛsaa biene kuntɛ diotuo fɛ, buololaa ɔkpɛ loo bubla.
47013008	Diekye bulaafuo ɔtaka oyila di nwaako ɔlaa nwu nkpo suoto di osuku kuonwii suoto, kafɔɔ mmle buabla kuakyɛ ni sitũ lete buɔbla.
47013009	Suoto nnyɔɔ wo nse ofũ onu lee kɔwɛ osie diɛbla fɛ awo buɔwa kasɔ di suoto loo osie kamɛ ta aye oso. Nkpo oso buɔpɛ ɔlaa munta Yaa bulɛ, biamuɔ minkyɛ sitũ minwo nimu nɛ.
47013010	Nle mmle oso kɔkpana kukũ ko mmle nkyesee ye di obe wɔ nnaa ni di ɔkyɛ lee nɛ, mmle okle nse lɛwa lɛbabuo ɔkyɛ lee yi, ninamananfi ye ni kootoko di osie wɔ di Saate lɛtɛɛ ni kanya. Ɔta ɛɛtɛɛ osie nwu nkpo alɛ kayɔ nkyakaako ofũ onu lee kummuɔ kunkyakaa, diele alɛ kata kunwa kasɔ.
47013011	Nunua, babiloo, kayɛntɛ nii yi, bilolaabisiɛ nwaa. Bieklee ofũ onu osie kanya alɛ biamuɔ minwo niimu. Biɛkyɔɔ ɔka wɔ kɔka ye ni atoko di kukũ ko mmle kamɛ. Bibla onwii, biesiɛ di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ. Yaa wɔ nimbɔmbɔ ni batii, anta ni atoko ɔkyɛ ole asiɛko ye.
47013012	Bisɛɛsa bawo di Yaa lɛbɔmbɔ kamɛ fɛ mmle diesiɛko ni.
47013013	Yaa bafũbanutɛ bamuu alɛ, bɔɔsɛɛsa ye biene biene.
47013014	Saate Yesu Kristo sibualɛ ku Yaa lɛbɔmbɔ, ku Ninwuna Klekle onwii ɔbla, disiɛko bamuu lee.
48001001	Ami, Paulo, wɔ ninle ni tɔkyɛntɛ nfũ kuukũ ko mmle lekye. Diele otii kuonwii niediki mi alɛ nle tɔkyɛntɛ, ee otii owo suoto diefe. Kafɔɔ diefe ni di Yesu Kristo suoto ku Teete Yaa wɔ niatakatɛsa Yesu aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ oso nle tɔkyɛntɛ.
48001002	Munko babiloo ba bamuu ninkpe ni ninfũ buɔsɛɛsa aye ba ninle ni Yaa bafũbanutɛ akudi ya ninkpe ni di Galatia.
48001003	Teete Yaa ku Saate loo Yesu Kristo bale ye sibualɛ, baata ye atoko ɔkyɛ ole.
48001004	Yesu Kristo niayɔ suoto nɔɔ aata siikpile loo disi, alɛ aadiki wo ankyeko miɛ kayi kpile ka mmle ablasaa kamɛ. Nni ninle Yaa loo, Teewo dibiesaa nɛ.
48001005	Yaa lele ninle katansa, diɛyɔ ni kaanunua diesifi ni dinaa ni kaloo! Diwa kaanya.
48001006	Diɛbla mi ɔkpɛ osie kanya alɛ kanunua ka mmle kose, nfɛ biokple nkpaamaa di Kristo wɔ oso di Yaa lɛlɛɛ ye ni siibualɛ kamɛ, biɛkyɛ bitikanko ɔlaa biene bamba.
48001007	Nwaako, ɔlaa biene kuonwii nsinaa fiɛ, kafɔɔ batii bawo ninsi bɔɔlalaasa ye atoko, alɛ boomunikĩisa Kristo ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo mambla ɔbamba.
48001008	Kafɔɔ bia nse awo ee Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ lekye osi ɛɛwa, ɛɛbabuɛ ɔlaa biene owo niekyi ni lete di nwɔ butooyie ni lɛkya buɔta ye ni kofokofoko, ni Yaa akpee nwɔ di ɔtɔ wɔ nikɔfiɛ ni kunaa ni kaloo kamɛ.
48001009	Butooyile katũ buobuɛ, nwu kafɔɔ kokple mbuɛ nɛ. Nlɛ nse otii owo leyie ɔlaa biene bamba owo niekyi ni lete lɛkya ɛɛta ye di nwɔ bitoofũ ni kofokofoko, ni Yaa aakpee nwɔ di ɔtɔ wɔ nikɔfiɛ ni kunaa ni kaloo kamɛ.
48001010	Ni kanunua ɔlaa wɔ kobuɛ nii kasɔ kutuo alɛ, omiɛ komiɛ nlɛ ɔsaabla nii kubuo batii anu ɛɛ, sɛɛ Yaa anu? Omiɛ komiɛ nlɛ mbuo batii anu? Nse okple kokple mmiɛ nlɛ ɔsaabla nii kubuo batii anu, ni see ninsinle Kristo kpɛmblatɛ.
48001011	Babiloo, komiɛ nlɛ nta ye bitofo nwaa nlɛ, ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya layie bianu nii yi, diele batii nfũ kuɔtaa kuokye.
48001012	Diele otii kuonwii nfũ lafũ nwu lakyeko, ee otii owo kafɔɔ niatuo mi. Kafɔɔ Yesu Kristo omu niadiki nwu aatuo mi.
48001013	Bitoonu mmle okle lasiɛ ni nkpa diɛbafe nii, fɛle Yuda otii omu omu. Bitoonu mmle latikanko ni Yaa bafũbanutɛ osie kanya, lakpee okyiini osie kanya nlɛ kɔwɔɔsa ma nii.
48001014	Lasɛɛsa anu nwaa di bawa loo ɔsaaɔbla suoto, diata alɛ lale akyɛnwo nii kpinwu katũ di Yuda batii bamu ɔsaabla kamɛ di okpoo loo.
48001015	-
48001016	Kafɔɔ Yaa lale mi sibualɛ aakyeko bia yaami kafutu kamɛ, aadiki mi aata ɔkpɛ nɔɔ ɔbla. Di obe wɔ niakaatɛɛko nwɔ nii, aadiki Obi nɔɔ aatuo mi alɛ naayie ɔlaa biene nwu niekye ni suoto nɔɔ lɛkya di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii kamɛ. Diawa ni nkpo, ntakyɛ otii kuonwii nfũ nlɛ atuo mi osuku wɔ kafe nii.
48001017	Ntakyɛ Yerusalem naanya batii ba ninle mi ni katũ fɛle Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ. Kafɔɔ nfanwu lasifi Arabia. Nni kamaa lakple lasifi Damasko.
48001018	Alɛɛ atiɛ sɛmaa fiɛ lakple lakyɛ Yerusalem nlɛ kɔlaanya Petro. Lasiɛ di ɔkyɛ nɔɔ lefosi ayi anɔɔ.
48001019	Ntanya tɔkyɛntɛ bamba kuonwii, dilenkee Yakobo wɔ ninle ni Saate obilɛma suɔtɔbi.
48001020	Nwaako, ɔlaa wɔ lɛkpana lɛta ye nii kute nkpo, Yaa omu n-ye alɛ diele sɛlaa sile.
48001021	Nni kamaa, lakyɛ aba aba di Siria ku Kilikia.
48001022	Obe nwu kamɛ, Kristo bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni di Yudea kasɔ diinyɛɛ diidii.
48001023	Onu ko boonu batii kobuɛ alɛ, “Otii wɔ niatootikanko wo ni alɛ see ɔɔwɔɔsa wo nii, kanunua ofũ onu nwu lɛkya nfɛ ooyie nɛ.”
48001024	Nkpo oso nfɛ bɔɔtansa Yaa ta ami oso.
48002001	Lefosi alɛɛ ana sɛmaa, munko Barnaba buakple buakyɛ Yerusalem. Lakpaa kafɔɔ Tito.
48002002	Lakyɛ nfa diekye Yaa niadiki aatuo mi alɛ nkyɛ. Ami ku bafũbanutɛ banɔɔfotii lakpee asi baawo di ɔlɔɔkɔ, ladiki ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya koyie nta ni batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii latɔkɔ ma. Labla nkpo, diekye noomiɛ nlɛ ɔkpɛ nii wɔ kɔbla ni kofokofoko diɛbase ni kanunua kubla kasakasa.
48002003	Kuntɛ Tito wɔ nintikankoe ni Hela otii ale, otii kuonwii ditabuɛ alɛ kɛkɛɛkɛ abudi lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ.
48002004	Kafɔɔ balaatɛ bafũbanutɛ bawo lafe kaakyɔnkyɔ osuku baasiɛ wo kaamɛ batoomiɛ osuku wɔ baafe manlalaasa ni suoto osiɛko wɔ di Kristo Yesu lɛta wo nii, nimata alɛ munkple ni balanle.
48002005	Kafɔɔ di nwaako ɔlaa di ɔlaa biene nwu nle nii, buomiɛ bulɛ kuwɛ ye ni kaamɛ oso, butatuna buata ma saa.
48002006	Kafɔɔ batii ba konyu nlɛ bale ni banɔɔfo ditatɛɛ disibu fɔle kuninwii baakyakaa. Kuntɛ bale banɔɔfo yi, ami nin-yɔ nwu ole, diekye Yaa nínyu kuonwii di anu fiɛ ankanko nwɔ. Kobuɛ nlɛ, banɔɔfotii nwu ditatɛɛ disibu kuninwii.
48002007	Kafɔɔ baanya baatɛ nsũ alɛ ɔkpɛ wɔ di Yaa latɛɛ ni ninle alɛ mbuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu nta batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii, fɛ mmle aayɔ aakpee ni di Petro nnɛɛ, alɛ abuɛ ni ɔlaa biene nwu ata ni batii ba ninle ni Yuda batii.
48002008	Diekye Yaa osie niabla mi tɔkyɛntɛ di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii nfũ, fɛ mmle aabla ni Petro tɔkyɛntɛ, aakpee nwɔ ni Yuda batii nfũ.
48002009	Yakobo ku Petro ku Yohane, baatii lanyu alɛ bale ni batunletɛ bɛɛta ni bafũbanutɛ dikudi nwu, lanya alɛ Yaa lele mi sibualɛ nwaa ɛɛtɛɛ ɔkpɛ finle alɛ mbla, nioso baakpee ami ku Barnaba kɔnɛɛ, diatuo alɛ beefũ wo ni atuu alɛ banwii bule nɛ. Baatika difuɔ alɛ awo bukyɛ batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii nfũ, ni mma kafɔɔ babakyɛ mba ninle ni Yuda batii nfũ.
48002010	Nle baatɔkɔ wo alɛ butɔɔbla ni ninle alɛ, bunyuma buotoonyu bapiitɛ ba ninsi ni kaamɛ lɛma. Nni kafɔɔ niale mi disi ditikasaa nlɛ mabla nɛ.
48002011	Di obe wɔ di Petro lawa ni Antiokia, lanaanfi ko nwɔ ɔlaa anu kuanu, diekye aabla lɛsaa le nitasiɛko nii.
48002012	Diekye fiɛ di batii ba di Yakobo lakpee ni kɔtɔ labadu ni nfa, Petro ku batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii latoole alesaa. Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ di batii ba mmle lawa nii, aakpukutisa suoto kaamɛ lɛma, atasimmiɛ alɛ oole ko ma alesaa, diekye aatɔɔyɛkɛ batii ba nialɛ dikpe ni beebudi ni asɔkɔsɔkɔ.
48002013	Batii bamba bawo di Yuda batii kamɛ kafɔɔ latikanko sɛlaa kuafunu nɔɔ nwu nkpaamaa, diata alɛ bia Barnaba omu kafɔɔ labla sɛlaa kuafunu ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle ku mma.
48002014	Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ lanya nlɛ ɔsaabla lɛma nwu diɛkyɛ ni di osuku tinini suoto, fɛle mmle di ɔlaa biene nwu nte nii, latɔkɔ Petro di bamuu lɛma anu nlɛ, “Nse fɛ afɔ, Yuda otii, feesiɛ nkpa fɛle otii wɔ ninanle ni Yuda otii, ni obe oso foonyinka batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii falɛ basiɛ nkpa fɛ Yuda batii okle?”
48002015	Nwaako, Yuda batii bule bia kaalofokɔ, nioso diele fɛ batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii okle buɔlɛɛ ni bakpileblatɛ.
48002016	Awo bamu buye bulɛ Yaa nlolaa manko otii ntɛɛ, diefe ni di ofũ onu wɔ akpe ni di Yesu Kristo kamɛ. Diele alɛ oole ni kufiofa oso. Nkpo oso awo kafɔɔ buofũ Kristo Yesu buonu, alɛ buate tinini di Yaa anu, di ofũ onu loo wɔ ninkpe wo ni di Kristo kamɛ nɛ. Kafɔɔ diele fɛ mmle buole ni kufiofa nwu oso di Yaa kobu wo fɛ batii tinini. Diekye kuonwii diete tinini di anu nɔɔ ta eele ni kufiofa nwu oso.
48002017	Ni nse buokpee okyiini bulɛ buate tinini di Yaa anu ku onwii ɔbla ku Kristo, kamaa diedie wo kayi alɛ awoo buɔbla okpile, ni otuo diotuo alɛ Kristo kafɔɔ letuna di sikpile ɔbla suoto? Oowo!
48002018	Nse loo lɛlalaasa kufiofa, lekple lɛkyako kũ ololaa, ni nfɛ dietuo alɛ ami omu ntɔɔtaka n-yɛ kuufiofa nwu suoto nɛ.
48002019	Di kufiofa nwu kanya, ni kpi nfɛ nle ta mmle kasiɛ ni nkpa nta ni Yaa.
48002020	Ami ku Kristo baakaasa koowoso suoto. Nioso kanunua, diesinle ami omu ninsi nkpa, kafɔɔ Kristo nfɛ ninsi kaamɛ nii. Nkpa be nfɛ nsi ni kanunua yi, Yaa Obi wɔ nimbɔbɔ mi nii oso nfɛ nsi mi, diekye aayɔ suoto nɔɔ aata ole diisi nii.
48002021	Ninsĩ mmle di Yaa lele ni batii sibualɛ. Diekye nse Yaa lɛbla otii tinini ta alɛ eele ni kufiofa oso, ni kasɔ kotuo alɛ Kristo kukpi lɛbla kasakasa.
48003001	Aye Galatia batii ba mmle ninaanu ni sɛlaa nsɔ! Owe niemunikĩisa ye disibu? Diekye anu lee amu ladiki latuo ye mmle baakaasa ni Yesu Kristo koowoso suoto aakpi nii!
48003002	Bitɛɛ nkaalɛ ye ɔlaa wɔ mmle. Kufiofa nwu ole niata ye biefũ Yaa Ninwuna nwu ɛɛ, sɛɛ ɔlaa biene nwu bianu ni biafũ nwu bianu ni oso?
48003003	Obe oso biɔbla abisɔnsaa nkpo? Di Yaa Ninwuna osie biayɔ biakye ni nkpa lee kasɔ, ni kanunua aye bamu osie nfɛ biomiɛ bilɛ biyɔ biyɛntɛ?
48003004	Ni kasakasa bianya dibuo nwu nimuu? Oowo, diɛkaatɛ nimbla kasakasa!
48003005	Kɔkaalɛ ye nii, kufiofa nwu ole niɛta alɛ Yaa lɛta ye Ninwuna nwu nikɔbla ni sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ kaamɛ lee ɛɛ, sɛɛ mmle bianu ni ɔlaa biene nwu, biafũ nwu biale ni oso?
48003006	Bibu Abraham binyu. Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Abraham lafũ Yaa aanu, nioso aabla nwɔ otii tinini di anu nɔɔ.”
48003007	Nioso bitofo bilɛ batii ba di ofũ onu nkpe nii, Abraham babi bale.
48003008	Di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ beebuɛ alɛ, Yaa mabla batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii mate tinini di anu nɔɔ ta ofũ onu lɛma oso. Nioso aatɔkɔ Abraham ɔlaa biene nwu aatɛ kofokofoko alɛ, “Makusɛkusɛsa batii bamuu kaayi diefe ni di suoto lɛfɔ.”
48003009	Nioso batii ba di ofũ onu nkpe nii, Yaa lekusɛkusɛsa bamuu lɛma fɛ mmle aakusɛkusɛsa ni Abraham wɔ niawɛ ni ofũ onu.
48003010	Lɛkpaani matikanko batii ba bamuu niɛyɔ anu lɛma beetika ni kuufiofa suoto. Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Otii lele ninankyɛ di sɛlaa se semuu bɛɛkpana ni Kuufiofa Kukũ kamɛ kanya, lɛkpaani matikanko nwɔ.”
48003011	Nwaako, kamɛ lɛkpa alɛ Yaa nimbla otii kuonwii tinini ta alɛ eele ni kufiofa oso. Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Otii ofũ onu di Yaa nnya ambla nwɔ tinini antɔɔ nkpa.”
48003012	Kafɔɔ kufiofa diɛyɔ nwu ole di ofũ onu kamɛ. Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Otii lele niele kufiofa nwu nkpo kumuu fɛ mmle kute ni kanya, abawɛ nkpa.”
48003013	Kafɔɔ di Kristo lakple ni lɛkpaani diisi loo oso, eediki wo eekyeko kufiofa nwu lɛkpaani kamɛ. Diekye bɛɛkpana di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “Otii lele bɛɛkaasa koowoso suoto nsi di Yaa lɛkpaani kalɔ.”
48003014	Nioso Kristo labla nle mmle, ta baatii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii kawɛ ni dikusɛkusɛ le di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ ni alɛ, abata ni Abraham diefe ni di Kristo Yesu suoto. Nioso diefe ni di ofũ onu kamɛ, awoo buafũ Ninwuna nwu di Yaa lebuɛ ɛɛtɛ alɛ buawɛ nii.
48003015	Babiloo, komiɛ nlɛ nta ye ɔtɛ onyu di dii biala nkpa be busi ni kamɛ. Aye bamu biye bilɛ nse batii banyɔ lɛbla kanya kanwii bɛɛkpana kukũ di ɔlaa owo suoto bɛɛtɛ, kuonwii lɛma nsinaa osuku ankpana lɛsaa bamba ankyakaa ee andiki lɛsaa lewo kaamɛ.
48003016	Nwaako, Yaa labuɛ ɔlaa aatɛ aata Abraham ku obi nɔɔ. Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ diebuɛ alɛ babi nɔɔ, kaasɔ kotuo ni alɛ batii kpinwu nii, kafɔɔ kuobuɛ alɛ obi nɔɔ, ni dietuo alɛ otii onwii lete balaka nɛ. Otii nwu ninle Kristo nɛ.
48003017	Ɔlaa wɔ kobuɛ ni ninle alɛ Yaa lanii kanya ku Abraham alɛɛ alafa ana alɛɛ afosi atiɛ aalesa katũ fiɛ aata Mose kufiofa. Nioso kufiofa nwu dilabafuo Yaa kanya ninii nwu ɔlalaasa.
48003018	Ni nse Yaa lɛkyɛsaa le mmle kuufiofa kamɛ ninkye, ni diesinle kanya onii ɔlaa kule. Kafɔɔ diele nkpo kute, diekye sibualɛ di Yaa omu lale ni Abraham oso aabuɛ ɔlaa nwu aatɛ nɛ.
48003019	Ni kanunua, obe oso di kufiofa nwu nkpe? Ɔwa kuufiofa nwu lɛwa alɛ kuakyakaako wo, mmle okle buanya ni okpile muntɛ ni nsũ. Kuawɛ kualaase di obe wɔ di Abraham obi nwu ɔlaa di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ ni lawa nii. Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ niayɔ kufiofa nwu baawako diefe di otii wɔ ninlolaa ni Yaa ku batii ntɛɛ suoto.
48003020	Kafɔɔ otii wɔ ninlolaa ni baatii ntɛɛ diefĩ ata otii onwii lete. Kafɔɔ Yaa nnwɔɔ, onwii ko ale.
48003021	Ni otuo diotuo alɛ kufiofa nwu nkpo lɛtaka kuyɛ di Yaa kanya ninii suoto? Oowo. Diekye nse otii owo lefũ kufiofa ko ninfũ ni nkpa, ni Yaa mata otii biala nte tinini di obe wɔ eekyɔɔ nwu ni atoko.
48003022	Kafɔɔ Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, kayi ka kamuu batii lekple sikpile bablatɛ. Nioso bafubanutɛ ninle mba di Yaa mata lɛkyɛsaa le aabuɛ aatɛ alɛ abata ni batii ba niefũ Yesu Kristo beenu nii.
48003023	Kafɔɔ fiɛ di ofũ onu nwu mawa nii, kufiofa nwu ntɔɔsɛɛ wo kuokpee leeyo fɛ leyo batentɛ, diɛlaase di obe wɔ babadiki ni ofũ onu nwu kayi.
48003024	Nioso kufiofa nwu niatootuo wo osuku dialaase di obe wɔ di Kristo lawa nii, ta mmle di Yaa kabla wo ni batii tinini di anu nɔɔ diefe ni di Kristo ofũ onu nwu kamɛ oso.
48003025	Kanunua di ofũ onu nwu ntɔɔwa nii, diesinle kufiofa nwu nfɛ ni ko kple kuntuo wo osuku.
48003026	Ta ofũ onu wɔ bikpe ni di Kristo Yesu kamɛ oso baamuu lee bile Yaa babi nɛ.
48003027	Diekye aye ba bamuu niafũ ni Yaa ntu okpeesa nwu di Kristo onwii ɔbla kamɛ, biɛyɔ Kristo biekpee fɛ awu.
48003028	Nioso kasɛ kukanwii diesinsi di Yuda batii ku Hela batii ntɛɛ, ee ɔlanle ku otii wɔ nisiko ni suoto ntɛɛ, ee osuɔtɔ ku ɔsanko ntɛɛ. Diekye bamuu lee bitɔɔbla onwii di Kristo Yesu kamɛ.
48003029	Nioso nse Kristo bale bile, ni Abraham babi bile, ni asaa baletɛ bile di ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ ni kanya.
48004001	Kafɔɔ nunua ɔlaa wɔ kobuɛ ni ninle alɛ, nse obisɔ owo nnle atesaa, di obe wɔ ale ni obisɔ oso, nu di atesaa nwu nkpo amuu nle nwɔ ale yi, di obisɔ ale ni oso, nkponwu ate fɛ ɔlanle nɛ.
48004002	Obe wɔ di obisɔ nwu diimuɔ nii, batii bawo nintoonyu nwɔ ku asaa nɔɔ nwu disi, ninaase di obe wɔ di ote lɛtɛ alɛ baayɔ asaa nwu mankpee nwɔ ni ninnɛɛ lewo.
48004003	Nkpo nwu di awo kafɔɔ obe wɔ buale ni babisɔ, buale balanle buasiɛ di kayi anwuna ablasaa kamɛ nɛ.
48004004	Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ di Yaa latɛ ni lawo nii, aakyesee Obi nɔɔ omu. Ɔsanko nialofo nwɔ aasiɛ di Yuda batii kufiofa kalɔ.
48004005	Nnwɔɔ aakyesee alɛ abadiki wo di kufiofa ko kalɔ busi nii, aayɔ wo aabla Yaa omu babi.
48004006	Ta mmle bile ni Yaa babi oso, ni aakyesee Obi nɔɔ Ninwuna alɛ dibasiɛ wo siitu kamɛ nɛ. Ninwuna le ninfaa nimbuɛ alɛ, “Abba,” kasɔ ninle alɛ Teete nii.
48004007	Nioso, faasinle ɔlanle kafɔɔ obi nfɛ fale. Di obi nfɛ fale ni oso, Yaa mata fɔ asaa ya amuu akpe ata ni babi nɔɔ.
48004008	Saa yi, bitatofo Yaa, nioso biale balanle biata asaa bamba ya nintale ni Yaa nwaa.
48004009	Kafɔɔ kanunua nfɛ biye ni Yaa, ee kabuɛ nlɛ Yaa nfɛ n-ye nii, be oso biomiɛ bilɛ biokple minsifi anwuna nwu kpiɛkpiɛ ku sɛnyaami nkpo nfũ? Obe oso biokple mimiɛ bilɛ biokple nya balanle?
48004010	Biediki ayi awo ku awɛntɛ awo, obe owo ku alɛɛ awo biɛtɛ biɛta suoto lee bilɛ biatoole.
48004011	Lɛyɛkɛ kɔpɛ mi ninta ye. Diekye dite mi fɛ ɔkpɛ nii wɔ omuu lɛbla ni kaamɛ lee lɛbla kasakasa.
48004012	Babiloo, kotikiti ye lekoto nlɛ bite fɛ ami. Diekye ami omu ote nte fɛ aye okle. Kuonwii lee diɛbla mi okpile kuonwii.
48004013	Aye bamu bionyuma bilɛ, suoto ditawɛ mi ni osie oso labayie ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya lata ye lɛkasale.
48004014	Bia kuntɛ suoto ditawɛ mi osie diibuo latika ye di suoto yi, bitasĩ ee bianyu mi nyakatãa. Kafɔɔ biafũ mi fɛ mmle biaafũ ni Yaa tɔkyɛntɛ, biafũ mi fɛ mmle biaafũ ni Kristo Yesu.
48004015	Suoto latɔɔyɔɔ ye! Ni be nfɛ nikɔwa nunua? Ami omu nii lanya nlɛ, nwaako di obe nwu kamɛ nse loo ɔlɛ ninlɛ see bia biadiki anumbi lee kaamɛ biatɛɛ.
48004016	Nioso ntookple lo lɛta ye, ta lɛtɔkɔ ye ni nwaako ɔlaa nwu oso?
48004017	Kakyɔnkyɔ osuku di batii ba nikɔbla fɛ bɛɛyɔ nwu ni ole di suoto lee nkyɛ. Disibu lɛma ninle alɛ bɔɔblasa ye di suoto nii, minkple bale ma min-yɔ anu lee mintika di suoto lɛma.
48004018	Dilɛ alɛ baayɔ nwu ole di suoto lee nse disibu biene bakle. Dikaatɛ alɛ biɛsɛɛsa anu lee di asaa biene ɔbla suoto obe lele. Ni diele alɛ nse nkpe di ɔkyɛ lee lete fiɛ biaabla nkpo.
48004019	Babi nii bɔmbɔle, konu dibuo fɛ ɔsanko wɔ lɛɛmɛ konu nii, ninaase di obe wɔ di Kristo letembi nwu mabuo ni baamuu lee kamɛ.
48004020	Nse alɛ ɔkyɛ lee lekple nkpe kanunua yi, see ntɔbawakosa sɛlɔ nii kasɔ, diekye diɛbla mi disibu osie kanya ta aye oso.
48004021	Aye ba nikomiɛ bilɛ kufiofa kalɔ biosiɛ nii, bitɛɛ nkaalɛ ye ɔlaa wɔ mmle. Bienu kufiofa nwu nkpo kasɔ nwaa?
48004022	Diekye kufiofa lebuɛ alɛ basuɔtɔbi banyɔ niawɛ Abraham. Ɔkasale ɔlanle ɔsanko obi aale, ɔnyɔɔfa kafɔɔ ɔsanko wɔ baakaalɛ baatɔɔ ni kaafaabi kamɛ obi aale.
48004023	Obi wɔ di ɔlanle sanko lalofo nii, aalofo nwɔ fɛ mmle di ɔsanko ku osuɔtɔ nlofo ni obi. Kafɔɔ ɔnyɔɔfa wɔ di ɔsanko wɔ baakaalɛ kaafaabi baatɔɔ ni lalofo ni nnwɔɔ yi, aale lɛkyɛsaa le di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ ni alɛ, abata ma ni di obe wɔ di ɔsa ku ɔsɔfɔ anu ditasintika alɛ baakple manlofo nii.
48004024	Lɛsaa tekete kplɛ ninle lɛsaa le mmle. Basanko banyɔ ba mmle n-yɛ bɛɛta kanya ninii kofole ku kafɔle. Nioso babi ba di kufiofa lenii ni fɛ balanle yi, mma ninle Hagar babi nɛ. Diotuo ni Yaa kanya ninii le aanii ni ku batii di Sinai kobokote osi.
48004025	Hagar nwu nte fɛ Sinai kobokote di Arabia kasɔ. Nnwɔɔ ninle miɛ Yerusalem okpoo wɔ ninte ni, di kamɛ ni nwu basiɛtɛ bamuu lekple ni balanle nɛ.
48004026	Kafɔɔ Yerusalem okpoo wɔ ninkpe ni di osi nwu yi, suoto lɛyɔɔ okpoo kule, nwu ninle yaawo nɛ.
48004027	Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Afɔ ɔlɛma, nya suoto lɛyɔɔ! Faa osie kanya, faanya suoto lɛyɔɔ, afɔ ɔsanko wɔ ninayilofo ni diidii. Diekye ɔsanko wɔ di ɔsa nɔɔ lediki nwɔ ni atoko, babi nɔɔ mapɔ manlenkee ɔsanko wɔ di ɔsa nɔɔ nkpe nwɔ ni di ɔkyɛ obe lele.”
48004028	Babiloo, kanunua yi, aye Yaa babi nfɛ bile fɛ Isak, diefe ni di ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ ni kanya.
48004029	Di obe nwu kamɛ, obi wɔ baalofo ni fɛ mmle di ɔsanko ku osuɔtɔ nlofo ni lakple lo aata nwɔ baalofo diafe ni di Yaa Ninwuna kamɛ. Nkpo nwu dite bia miɛ nɛ.
48004030	Kafɔɔ be di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ? Kuobuɛ alɛ, “Tososa ɔlanle ɔsanko nwu ku obi baasifi, diekye ɔlanle ɔsanko obi nnaa kalekɔ kukanwii di ote asaa kamɛ alɛ, baasɛ manko kafaabi ɔsanko obi.”
48004031	Nioso, babiloo, awo yi, buoole ɔlanle ɔsanko babi, kafɔɔ kafaabi ɔsanko babi bule.
48005001	Suoto lɛyɔɔ ɔnya oso di Kristo lediki wo. Nioso biyila kpinkpĩ, bitanta kuonwii osuku anyinka ye aakplesa ye aabla balanle diidii.
48005002	Binu lo! Ami, Paulo, kɔtɔkɔ ye nlɛ, nse biɛta osuku beebudi ye asɔkɔsɔkɔ ni kasɔ ninle alɛ Kristo diesinle lɛsalɛsaa di anu lee saa.
48005003	Kokple ntɔkɔ ye klekle nlɛ, otii lele nieta osuku beebudi nwɔ lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ yi, ni dikpe nii alɛ anle kufiofa nwu kumuu.
48005004	Aye ba nikonyu bilɛ bibate ni tinini di Yaa anu ta biele ni kufiofa nwu oso, bitofo bilɛ bitɔɔblasa suoto lee di Kristo. Ni biesinsi di Yaa sibualɛ nwu nkpo kamɛ nɛ.
48005005	Kafɔɔ awo yi, bukpe osuku onyu bulɛ, Yaa mabla wo munte tinini di anu nɔɔ. Ta ofũ onu wɔ ninkpe wo ni diefe ni di Yaa Ninwuna osie kamɛ oso.
48005006	Nse buɔbla onwii ku Kristo Yesu, ni kuntɛ beebudi fɔ ee baabudi fɔ lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ diɛbla lɛsalɛsaa. Lɛsaa le niefĩ ni nwaa ninle alɛ, buabɔmbɔ bawo di ofũ onu kamɛ.
48005007	Obe nwu biatookpee okyiini fiɛ. Kafɔɔ owe nietĩi ye osuku alɛ bitankyɔɔ atoko bianu ɔlaa biene nwu?
48005008	Diele Yaa wɔ niɛlɛɛ ye ni nfũ diekye.
48005009	Lɛnyankasaa kɛɛkɛɛ ninta mmɔle ntaka.
48005010	Lefũ lenu nlɛ Saate omu mata alɛ bilabafũ otii kuonwii disibu, diediki lele mi lete. Kafɔɔ nse otii owo kɔkpɔkpɔtɔsa ye disibu, kuntɛ be okle otii ale, Yaa mananfi nwɔ kootoko.
48005011	Babiloo, nse fɛ okplekokple mbuɛ ntɔkɔ batii nlɛ lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ obudi lefĩ, ni se be oso baatii kɔkpɛkoe? Nse fɛ nkpo kute, ni se Kristo kukpi di kowoso suoto ɔlaa wɔ lɛkya koyie ni dilabale dibuo saa dita otii kuonwii.
48005012	Batii ba nikɔkpɔkpɔtɔsa ye ni disibu mmle okle, komiɛ nlɛ mma bale katũ basɔ balaata suoto lɛma kuoloo!
48005013	Babiloo, ɔlɛɛ di Yaa lɛlɛɛ ye alɛ biasiɛko suoto. Kafɔɔ bitanta suoto osiɛko wɔ mmle lata ye osuku biatɔɔbla sikpile di suoto sina ɔkɔnsɔ aklesaa suoto. Kafɔɔ bikyakaako bawo lee ku lɛbɔmbɔ.
48005014	Diekye kufiofa kumuu lɛsɔdiki nimu ninle alɛ, “Bɔmbɔ owo lɛfɔ fɛ suoto lɛfɔ simu.”
48005015	Kafɔɔ nse biɔbla bawo amumu fɛ babɔkɛɛ ba ninkpe ni kobe, ni bilolaa binyu nwaa, se dilenkpo, bibawɔɔsa bawo.
48005016	Ɔlaa wɔ kɔtɔkɔ ye ni ninle alɛ, bita Yaa Ninwuna dileko ye katũ di nkpa lee disiɛbi kamɛ, mmle okle di suoto sina ɔkɔnsɔ akleesaa dilaalenkee ye ni.
48005017	Diekye suoto sina ɔkɔnsɔ akleesaa ntaka an-yila di Ninwuna ale suoto. Nkpo nwu kafɔɔ di asaa ya Niinwuna kafɔɔ komiɛ ni ntaka an-yila di suoto ɔkɔnsɔ akleesaa suoto nɛ. Asaa ya mmle anyɔ lekple balo ɛɛta bawo, nioso bilaafuo lɛsaa le niesiɛko ye ni ɔbla.
48005018	Nioso nse Ninwuna ninleko ye katũ, ni biesiɛ kuufiofa nwu kalɔ.
48005019	Asaa ya di suoto sina ɔkɔnsɔ akleesaa mbla ni ndiki suoto kayi antuo klekle. Asaa nwu ninle, lɛsɔnɔkpee, ayududusaa ku atiipɛsaa ɔbla,
48005020	afiɔ ɔtɔ, sɛsɛɛ, katii kyidi, kalɔ, sɛsɔfɔwo ɔkpɛ, ablɔmpɛ ɔnya, onumbɛbɛɛ, batii ntɛɛ ɔblasa ku sɛlaa ɔnanfi,
48005021	onunsɛɛ, lɛtansiɛ, atumpɛ ku asaa bamba ya niedie ni n-ya mmle okle ɔbla. Kokple nta ye letofo, fɛ mmle ntoyita ye bietofo ni kofokofoko nlɛ, batii ba nimbla ni asaa ya mmle okle dilabawɛ kalekɔ di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ kamɛ diidii.
48005022	Kafɔɔ asaa ya Niinwuna mbla ni ninle lɛbɔmbɔ, suoto lɛyɔɔ, atoko ɔkyɛ ole, suoto ɔtɛ kaasɔ, sifutulɛ, dibiene ɔbla, asaa ɔbla di osuku kanya,
48005023	suoto kasɔ ɔwakosa ku suoto omufũ oklee. Kufiofa dietĩi asaa ya mmle okle kuninwii osuku.
48005024	Batii ba ninle ni Kristo Yesu bale mma, batɔɔyɔ suoto sina ɔkɔnsɔ akleesaa lɛma nwu ku sikpile simuu bɛɛkaasa di kowoso suoto ku Kristo.
48005025	Ni nse Ninwuna oso bukpe nkpa, ni bita busiɛ nkpa be okle Niinwuna nwu komiɛ ni.
48005026	Bitanta buatakatɛsa suoto loo katoo ee buatookpee bawo ɔblɔ ee buatɔɔkpɛko bawo ku onunsɛɛ.
48006001	Babiloo, nse otii owo kaamɛ lee lɛbla okpile yi, ni aye ba di Yaa Ninwuna nsi ni kaamɛ, bikpee okyiini biɛtɛ suoto buɛɛ bilolaa nwɔ. Kafɔɔ bilolaa suoto lee binyu nwaa bilɛ, aye bamu biɛlaabla okpile nwu okle.
48006002	Bikyakaako bawo diibuo kamɛ. Nse biɔbla nkpo, ni biole Kristo kufiofa nwu nkpo nɛ.
48006003	Ni se otii owo lenyu suoto nɔɔ alɛ ale lɛsaa lewo kafɔɔ aale lɛsalɛsaa yi, ni otii nwu suoto nɔɔ ɔɔkyɔnkyɔ.
48006004	Otii biala asɔ suoto nɔɔ anyu di ɔsaabla nɔɔ kamɛ. Nse dilɛ, ni abafuo ɔkanta di nle ɛɛbla ni suoto. Kafɔɔ atan-yɔ suoto nɔɔ akaatɛɛsa ku otii bamba nle ɛɛbla ni suoto.
48006005	Diekye otii biala matuka nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ atoo.
48006006	Otii wɔ bootuo ni asaa di Yaa ɔlaa kamɛ yi, dikpe ni ɛɛsɛko asaa biene ya amuu ninkpe nwɔ ni ku saatuotɛ nɔɔ.
48006007	Bitankyɔnkyɔ suoto lee, diekye kuonwii dilaafuo Yaa ɔkyɔnkyɔ. Diekye lɛsaa le di otii lɛpɛ nii, nni antɛsɛ nɛ.
48006008	Nse fɛɛpɛ suoto sina kamɛ ɔkɔnsɔ akleesaa abi yi, ni kukpi abi fabatɛsɛ. Kafɔɔ nse fɛɛpɛ Ninwuna kamɛ abiesaa abi yi, ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo diidii abi fabatɛsɛ.
48006009	Bitanta nnɛɛ lafee wo di dibiene ɔbla kamɛ. Diekye nse nnɛɛ diefee wo yi, ni obe wɔ nikɔwa ni kamɛ bubatɛsɛ ni abi.
48006010	Nioso bita butɔɔbla dibiene butɔɔta otii biala, ni mmle kanya buɔwɛ ni osuku. Kyenkye mba ninle wo ni babilɛma di Kristo ofũ onu kamɛ.
48006011	Binyu akpanasaa akplɛ ya di ami omu layɔ kɔnɛɛ nii lakpana lakyesee ye ni.
48006012	Batii ba nikomiɛ alɛ baabuo ni batii anu nikokpee ye kubuɛ alɛ dikpe nii mambudi ye asɔkɔsɔkɔ. Bɔɔbla nkpo ta mmle manamawɛ ni ditikanko di Kristo kukpi di kowoso suoto oso.
48006013	Bia batii ba beebudi ni asɔkɔsɔkɔ bamu diloole kufiofa nwu. Kafɔɔ lɛsaa le ko baatii nwu komiɛ ni ninle alɛ bɔɔkanta di suoto lee mambuɛ alɛ, bia aye bamu biɛwakosa suoto kasɔ bisi di kufiofa lɛma nwu kalɔ. Nioso biɛta beebudi ye asɔkɔsɔkɔ nɛ.
48006014	Kafɔɔ Yaa akyakakoe alɛ, namakanta di lɛsalɛsaa suoto dilenkee Saate Yesu Kristo kukpi di kowoso suoto lete. Diefe ni kuukpi nɔɔ suoto di kowoso suoto yi, kayi ka mmle diesindie mi lɛsalɛsaa, ami kafɔɔ nisindie lɛsalɛsaa nta kayi.
48006015	Nioso beebudi fɔ lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ woo, baabudi fɔ lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ woo, nni nkpo diefĩ, kafɔɔ nle niefĩ ni ninle nkpa fɔle disiɛbi.
48006016	Kafɔɔ batii ba ninkyɛ ni di osuku wɔ mmle suoto di nkpa lɛma kamɛ yi, atoko ɔkyɛ ole ku Yaa sibualɛ disiɛko ma, ku Yaa batii bamuu.
48006017	Diɛyɔ ni kaanunua diesifi nii, otii kuonwii ataasinkpee mi kubuɛ kukunwii. Diekye apa ya nintika mi ni di suoto kotuo alɛ Yesu kpɛmblatɛ nle.
48006018	Babiloo, kotikiti lekoto nlɛ Saate Yesu Kristo ale ye sibualɛ, aakpee ye osie. Diwa kaanya.
49001001	Ami, Paulo wɔ nintɔbakple ni Kristo Yesu tɔkyɛntɛ diefe ni di Yaa dibiesaa suoto, nikɔkpana kukũ ko mmle nkyesee aye ba ninle ni Yaa bafũbanutɛ ba bɛɛbla ni klekle di Efeso kasɔ suoto, bɛɛbla ni onwii ku Yesu Kristo, biɔkyɔɔ nwɔ ni ɔlaa atoko.
49001002	Teete Yaa ku Saate loo Yesu Kristo bale ye sibualɛ, baata ye atoko ɔkyɛ ole.
49001003	Bita bupɛ Yaa wɔ ninle ni Saate loo Yesu Kristo Ote sɛfa. Ta mmle okle butɔɔbla ni onwii ku Kristo oso, eefe ni di Ninwuna nwu nkpo suoto ɛɛyɔ asaa biene ya amuu niekye ni osi ɛɛta wo ni dikusɛkusɛ.
49001004	Fiɛ bia di Yaa kamabla ni kayi yi, atoodiki wo eese lete kofokofoko alɛ, bubabla onwii ku Kristo, alɛ buale batii klekle ku batii ba di kalalaa kukanwii dilaatika wo ni di suoto di anu nɔɔ.
49001005	Ta di Yaa mbɔmbɔ wo ni oso, aabla disibu nɔɔ kofokofoko alɛ, diefe ni di Yesu Kristo suoto yi, ababla wo babi nɔɔ. Nle mmle niatɛ diale nwɔ disi tikasaa ku otu dibiesaa nɛ.
49001006	Ta nkpo oso, bita butansa Yaa di sifutulɛ kplɛ se mmle eele wo ni, diefe ni di Obi nɔɔ bɔmbɔtɛ nwu suoto.
49001007	Diekye diefe ni di Kristo kukpi nwu nkpo suoto, ni buɔwɛ didiki, buɔwɛ sikpile ɔyɔ ɔkyɛ nɛ. Yaa sifutulɛ se eele wo ni lemuɔ lo!
49001008	Yaa sifutulɛ se mmle nnaa kase. Diefe ni niinumbe nɔɔ ku mmle aye ni lɛsaa biala oso.
49001009	Yaa labla disi tikasaa nɔɔ, ɛɛta wo buotofo disibu nɔɔ le niewofa nii, ɛɛtɛ alɛ ababla ni, diefe ni di Kristo suoto.
49001010	Disibu nwu nkpo nimale alɛ, nse obe nwu lewo, Yaa kamasiisa asaa ya amuu ninkpe ni di osi ku kasɔ, an-yɔ nya ankpee di Kristo kalɔ.
49001011	Yaa niɛbla asaa ya mmle amuu diisibu nɔɔ kanya, alɛ awo ku Kristo buabla ni onwii oso. Ni eediki wo alɛ buale nwɔ babi diisibu le aabla aatɛ ni bia kaasɔ kakyekɔ nɛ.
49001012	Ta nle mmle oso, bita awo ba ninle ni batii kasale ba niɛwɛ ni osuku onyu di Kristo kamɛ, butansa lɛkpa nɔɔ!
49001013	Aye kafɔɔ biɛbakple Yaa babi di obe wɔ bianu ni nwaako ɔlaa nwu nkpo, dile ni ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo niɛwako ye ni didiki. Ta biefũ Kristo bienu ni oso, ni di Yaa lɛyɔ Ninwuna Klekle nɔɔ le aabuɛ aatɛ alɛ abata wo ni ɛɛtɛ ye nsũ nɛ.
49001014	Ninwuna nwu nkpo nin-yɛ wo kamaa alɛ, bubafũ lɛsaa le di Yaa lebuɛ ɛɛtɛ alɛ abata ni batii nɔɔ. Nle mmle kafɔɔ kotuo wo alɛ Yaa kamata batii ba ninle nwɔ ni bale didiki nwu nkpo nimu. Ta nkpo oso bita butansa lɛkpa nɔɔ nwu nkpo!
49001015	Ta nle mmle oso, diayɔ ni di obe wɔ lanu alɛ biefũ Saate Yesu bienu ni ku mmle okle mimbɔmbɔ ni batii ba niefũ Yaa beenu nii,
49001016	nindiɛ Yaa sɛfa ɔpɛ diisi lee. Nnyuma ye kafɔɔ nse kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta Yaa.
49001017	Kɔkaalɛ kafɔɔ Saate loo Yesu Kristo Yaa, otii wɔ ninle ni lɛkpa nimuu saate nlɛ, aata ye Ninwuna le nimabla ye ni banumbentɛ, alɛ aadiki Yaa nwu antuo ye, alɛ biatofo otii wɔ ale nii.
49001018	Kotikiti nwɔ lekoto nlɛ aatikiti ye anu alɛ bianya lɛkpa le nfũ ɛɛlɛɛ ye ɛɛwako ni, alɛ biatofo osuku onyu wɔ oso ɛɛlɛɛ ye nii, ku mmle okle di diikusɛkusɛ le eebuɛ ɛɛtɛ alɛ abata ni batii nɔɔ lefũ ni kɔya,
49001019	ku mmle okle di osie kplɛ nɔɔ kɔbla ni ɔkpɛ di awo ba niefũ buonu ni kamɛ osie kanya. Osie wɔ mmle nikɔbla ni ɔkpɛ kaamɛ loo nkaatɛ ku osie kplɛ
49001020	wɔ aayɔ aasɛnkɛsa Kristo aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ, ɛɛtɔɔ asi ni di oletanɛɛkyɛ nɔɔ di osi.
49001021	Kristo nsi ninfa oole sɛka di osi basientɛ suoto, siitumi ku anwuna siene ku baka bamuu suoto. Leyooto nɔɔ kafɔɔ nlenke sɛka nlekɔ mmuu kaasɔ ka mmle suoto ku nka nimawa ni kamɛ.
49001022	Yaa lɛyɔ lɛsaa biala eekpe di Kristo nkpaa kalɔ, ni ɛɛyɔ nwɔ ɛɛbla bafũbanutɛ Saate di asaa amuu suoto nɛ.
49001023	Bafũbanutɛ ba mmle ninle Kristo suoto sina se niɛta alɛ eewo ni nimu. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ ninle otii wɔ ninsi ni di asaa amuu kamɛ nɛ.
49002001	Saa yi, biakpi niinwuna kamɛ ta setokopĩ ku sikpile lee oso.
49002002	Diekye di obe nwu kamɛ yi, biatikanko kayi ka mmle sisuku kpile, biakyɔɔ kafɔɔ situmi se nikole ni sɛka di kɔfɛɛfɔ kamɛ ɔka atoko. Nnwɔɔ ninle ninwuna le nikɔbla ni ɔkpɛ di batii ba niesĩ nunua alɛ blɔkyɔɔ ni Yaa atoko kamɛ nɛ.
49002003	Nwaako bamuu loo nkpo buate fɛ mma nɛ. Buasiɛ nkpa di suoto sina loo akɔnsɔkleesaa suoto, buabla asaa ya di suoto sina loo ku disibu loo lamiɛ nii. Di obe wɔ di nkpa loo letembi ditakyi ni ku batii ba ninsi ni nkpa be mmle nwu okle oso yi, nse diesiɛko alɛ Yaa kananfi awo kafɔɔ kootoko fɛ batii bule fiɛ.
49002004	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di Yaa nyaami ɔnya mpɔ ni oso, di lɛbɔmbɔ nɔɔ le akpe ɛɛta wo ni kafɔɔ lemuɔ ni oso yi,
49002005	obe wɔ buaakpi ni niinwuna kamɛ ta setokopĩ loo oso, eekplesa wo ɛɛwako nkpa kamɛ ku Kristo. Yaa sibualɛ oso buɔwɛ didiki le mmle.
49002006	Di onwii loo ɔbla ku Kristo Yesu, Yaa lɛsɛnkɛsa wo eekyeko bakpi kamɛ alɛ, bualeko nwɔ sɛka di osi.
49002007	Yaa labla nle mmle alɛ ɔɔyɔ antuo batii ba babalofo ni kaayi kamaa alɛ, sibualɛ se eele wo ni nnaa kaloo di lɛbɔmbɔ le eediki eetuo wo ni di Kristo Yesu kamɛ.
49002008	Diekye Yaa niele wo sibualɛ eediki wo diefe ni di ofũ onu kamɛ. Diele awo bamu niɛbla lɛsalɛsaa, kafɔɔ Yaa lɛkyɛsaa dile.
49002009	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ ninanle awo bamu ɔkpɛ ɔbla kuonwii nɛ. Nkpo oso, kuonwii dilaafuo ɔkanta.
49002010	Yaa omu niɛbla wo ku nnɛɛ nɔɔ diefe ni di Yesu Kristo suoto alɛ, buabla onwii ku nnwɔɔ alɛ buabla sɛkpɛ biene se eelolaa ɛɛtɛ wo alɛ buabla ni ninkpa be mmle kamɛ.
49002011	Binyuma bilɛ, diele Yuda batii nielofo ye. Yuda batii nwu niebudi ni asɔkɔsɔkɔ ntufa ye alɛ, kale ka batii ninambudi ni asɔkɔsɔkɔ. Kafɔɔ lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ obudi ɔsaabla wɔ mmle yi, suoto sina lɛsaa ko dile. Batii ko nin-yɔ nnɛɛ lɛma mambla.
49002012	Binyuma bilɛ di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, minko Kristo ntɛɛ lakyo, bafɔɔ kafɔɔ biale biata Yuda kale batii. Bitasiɛ di ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ ni batii nɔɔ ku kanya ka aanii ni ku mma kamɛ. Biasiɛ kaayi ka mmle kamɛ di osuku onyu kuonwii ditawɛ ye diata ni lɛsalɛsaa, Yaa kafɔɔ ditawɛ ye.
49002013	Kafɔɔ nunua, aye ba niawɛ ni fanfa di Kristo Yesu nfũ, ta kukpi ko aakpi ni diisi lee oso, bitookpukuti biɛtɛɛtɛɛ nwɔ.
49002014	Diekye Kristo omu ntɔɔwako wo atoko ɔkyɛ ole di obe wɔ atɔɔyɔ Yuda batii ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii ɛɛbla ni batii banwii. Aayɔ suoto nɔɔ sina aadiki kalɔ ka niasiɛ ma ni nintɛɛ fɛ oyiyiɛ.
49002015	Eediki Yuda batii kufiofa ku ɔsaabla lɛma nwu nkpo alɛ, aasiisa nnle nnyɔ batii ba mmle nwu nkpo ambla ma kale fɔle batii banwii, diefe ni di suoto nɔɔ, alɛ atoko ɔkyɛ ole kasiɛ ma nintɛɛ.
49002016	Kristo kukpi di kowoso suoto niɛkpanaa kalɔ ka niasiɛ ni di nnle nnyɔ nwu nkpo ntɛɛ, eelolaa ma ɛɛbla ma onwii eekplesa ma ɛɛwako Yaa nfũ.
49002017	Nioso di Kristo lawa abayie atoko ɔkyɛ ole ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo lɛkya aata aye ba niawɛ ni fanfanfa di Yaa nfũ ku awo ba niatɛɛtɛɛ nwɔ ni nɛ.
49002018	Diefe ni di Kristo suoto ni di akyuu loo nwu nkpo anyɔ, dile ni Yuda batii ku mba ninanle ni Yuda batii, buɔwɛ Ninwuna Klekle ninwii nwu nkpo lɛkpaa wo diɛwako Teete anu nɛ.
49002019	Nkpo oso aye ba ninanle ni Yuda batii yi, biesinle bafɔɔ, ee osuku bakyɛntɛ ba nikɔwaalɛ manfe nii. Kafɔɔ nunua yi, minko Yaa batii yi, bitookple kale kanwii batii, ku Yaa kafaabi.
49002020	Aye kafɔɔ beetofo ye beetika di lɛsɔse le suoto di batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nkpo ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ letofo nii, ni di Kristo Yesu omu nle leyokɔ kleetɛ nɛ.
49002021	Nnwɔɔ ninle otii wɔ niemufũ leyo nwu nkpo beetofo bɛɛkyasa ni akle nɛ. Ni ɛɛta ni diɛbamuɔ diekple Olekatakɔ klekle diɛta Saate nɛ.
49002022	Di obe wɔ biɛbla ni onwii ku Kristo oso, ni bɛɛyɔ ye kafɔɔ beetofo leyo nwu nkpo ku batii bule bamuu alɛ buakple nfũ di Yaa kafe ni Niinwuna nɔɔ suoto ansiɛ nii.
49003001	Nle mmle oso di ami Paulo, bɛɛtɛ mi leeyo ta Kristo Yesu oso, di aye ba ninanle ni Yuda batii disi, kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta Yaa.
49003002	Lefũ lenu nlɛ, bitoonu mmle okle di Yaa lele mi ni sibualɛ ɛɛyɔ ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle eekpee mi di nnɛɛ kamɛ alɛ mbla ni kaamɛ lee.
49003003	Fɛ mmle okle di obe wɔ nintɔbafe ni lakpana kukũ kakui lakyesee ye nii, Yaa ladiki disibu nɔɔ le ɛɛbla eewofasa ni eetuo mi.
49003004	Nse bibaka kukũ ko mmle, bibanya mmle okle lenu owofalaa wɔ ninsi ni di Kristo kamɛ kasɔ.
49003005	Di obe wɔ nintɔbafe ni kamɛ batatɔkɔ otii kuonwii owofalaa wɔ mmle. Kafɔɔ nunua, Yaa lefe di Ninwuna nɔɔ suoto eediki eetuo batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ klekle ku ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nɔɔ.
49003006	Owofalaa nwu ninle alɛ diefe ni di ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo suoto, batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii ntɔbakple Yaa asaa baletɛ ku Yuda batii. Nfɛ bale suoto sina nwu nkpo sinwii kakyɛ kawo nɛ, mma kafɔɔ babawɛ kalekɔ di ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ ni batii nɔɔ, diefe ni di Kristo Yesu suoto.
49003007	Yaa lafe di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ osie suoto eele mi sibualɛ, ɛɛtɛɛ lɛkyɛsaa nɔɔ nwu ɛɛta alɛ lɛbakple ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo kpɛmblatɛ.
49003008	Ami ninle ɔnyɛntɛle di Yaa bafũbanutɛ bamuu kamɛ, kafɔɔ Yaa lɛyɔ lɛkyɛsaa le mmle ɛɛtɛɛ alɛ kayie lɛkya di lɛsaawɛ kplɛ le ninsi ni di Kristo kamɛ nta batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii.
49003009	Yaa niekpee mi alɛ kata batii bamuu ntofo disibu nɔɔ le eewofasa ni kaamɛ nɔɔ diɛyɔ ni kaasɔ kakyekɔ. Nnwɔɔ ninle otii wɔ niɛbla ni lɛsaa biala nɛ.
49003010	Disibu nɔɔ niale alɛ diefe ni baafũbanutɛ kamɛ yi, situmi se simuu ku basientɛ ba ninkpe ni di osi katofo Yaa ninumbe kplɛ le niefe ni siisuku ate ate suoto.
49003011	Nle mmle niale disibu le ninnaa ni kaloo di Yaa omu labla aatɛ ni bia kasɔ kakyekɔ nɛ. Ninfɛ ɛɛta disibu le mmle lɛwa kaanya diefe ni di Saate loo Yesu Kristo kamɛ nɛ.
49003012	Di obe wɔ buɔbla ni onwii ku Kristo, buofũ nwɔ buonu ni oso, nfɛ bukpe sɛkambi munkyɛ Yaa nfũ ku otu okpee nɛ.
49003013	Nkpo oso kotikiti ye lekoto nlɛ, bitanta nnɛɛ lafee ye ta diobuo mi ni diisi lee oso, diekye dibawako ye dibu.
49003014	Nle mmle oso, lese akunkyi kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta Teete nɛ.
49003015	Nnwɔɔ kamɛ di lɛsaa biala le ninkpe ni di osi ku kasɔ ka mmle suoto lefũ leyooto di letembi ni ni kanya nɛ.
49003016	Kɔpɛ ɔlaa ntikiti Yaa lekoto nlɛ, ata Ninwuna nɔɔ dita ye osie nɔɔ wɔ ninsi ni leeklekle nɔɔ kamɛ diyii ye situ kamɛ pɔ.
49003017	Kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta Kristo kafɔɔ nlɛ, aadiki ye kasiɛ di situ lee kamɛ. Lɛɛbɔmbɔ lee kafɔɔ dise sidu osie kanya fɛ mmle koowoso nse ni sidu,
49003018	alɛ aye ku Yaa bafũbanutɛ bamuu katofo mmle okle di Kristo lɛbɔmbɔ lɛblɛfɛ ni ku mmle diɛtaka ni katoo ku mmle diɛkaana ni ku mmle diekyofo ni.
49003019	Yaa ata ye bitofo Kristo lɛbɔmbɔ kplɛ nwu nkpo niɛtaka katoo dilenke ni otii lɛsɔnu, alɛ Yaa letembi nwu nkpo kayii ye kamɛ pɔ.
49003020	Bitansa Yaa wɔ niɛyɔ osie nɔɔ ɔɔbla ni ɔkpɛ kaamɛ loo. Aafuo wo lɛsaa biala ɔbla ɔta anlenkeesa bia mmle munkaalɛ nii, ee bia nle munoonyu osuku buta nii.
49003021	Bitansa nwɔ di bafũbanutɛ kamɛ diefe ni di Kristo Yesu suoto ku nnle mmuu anu, diɛyɔ ni nunua, diesifi ni dinnaa ni kaloo. Diwa kaanya.
49004001	Nkpo oso ami wɔ nikɔbla ni Saate ɔkpɛ nte ni leeyo, kɔka ye nlɛ biasiɛ nkpa be niesiɛko ni lɛlɛɛ le di Yaa lɛlɛɛ ye alɛ biasiɛ nii.
49004002	Biwakosa suoto kasɔ obe lele, biɛbla buɛɛ, biɛtɛ otu kaasɔ. Biediki lɛbɔmbɔ lee bituo di bawo ofũ kamɛ.
49004003	Di obe wɔ di Yaa Ninwuna nwu ntɔɔbla ye ni onwii oso, bikpee okyiini biesiɛko bawo di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ.
49004004	Suoto sina sinwii ku Ninwuna ninwii ninkpe, fɛ mmle okle di Yaa lɛlɛɛ wo ɛɛta ni osuku onyu onwii di lɛlɛɛ nwu nkpo ɛɛlɛɛ wo ni kamɛ.
49004005	Saate onwii ku ofũ onu onwii ninkpe wo, Yaa ntu okpeesa onwii kafɔɔ ninkpe.
49004006	Yaa onwii ninkpe ale ni batii bamuu Kote, nnwɔɔ ninle asaa amuu Saate, ɔɔbla ɔkpɛ anfenko di bamuu loo suoto, asi kafɔɔ baamuu loo kamɛ.
49004007	Kristo Yesu lefe di sifutulɛ nɔɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ ɛɛta obiala loo lɛtasaa.
49004008	Nkpo oso di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Di obe wɔ aataka aasifi ni osi, aakpaa batii ba aakpɛ aafũ ni aasifiko. Ni aayɔ atasaa aata batii nɛ.”
49004009	Ni nse kɔkpana nwu nkpo kotuo alɛ aataka aasifi osi, ni diotuo alɛ lɛkasale, aalekatũ aasoo aawa kasɔ ka mmle suoto.
49004010	Nioso otii wɔ niasoo aawa ni kasɔ ka mmle yi, nnwɔɔ nwu niataka aasifi osi fanfa nɛ, alɛ aawaalɛ lɛsaa biala, anfũ kasiɛ di lɛsaa biala kamɛ.
49004011	Nnwɔɔ niayɔ atasaa aata batii, ni aadiki batii bawo alɛ baale batɔkyɛntɛ nɛ, bawo kafɔɔ alɛ baale ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ, bawo kafɔɔ alɛ baale Yaa ɔlaa bakyayientɛ, bawo kafɔɔ alɛ baale bafũbanutɛ banyuntɛ ku asaa batuotɛ.
49004012	Aabla nle mmle aayɔ aalolaa Yaa batii bamuu anta Yaa ɔkpɛ ɔbla, alɛ aayɔ anta Kristo suoto sina nwu nkpo kafɔɔ mmuɔ, dile ni bafũbanutɛ nwu.
49004013	Yaa niɛbla nle mmle alɛ bamuu loo mumakple onwii di lɛsaa le buofũ buonu ni kamɛ, mumatofo Yaa Obi nwu nkpo nwaa, mumamuɔ munkple banɔɔfo munkyɛkyɛ ku Kristo di nkpa nɔɔ letembi kanya.
49004014	Ni bulɔbasinte fɛ babisɔ di asaatuo fɔle lele kɔfɛɛfɔ matɔɔfɛ wo kuntoofenko ni katoo ku kala, di balaatɛ basaatuotɛ nkle bɔɔkyɔnkyɔ batii mankpee ni di osuku lalaale kamɛ ta disibu kpile lɛma oso.
49004015	Kafɔɔ nse buobuɛ nwaako ɔlaa nwu nkpo di lɛbɔmbɔ kamɛ yi, ni bubamuɔ munte fɛ Kristo wɔ ninle wo ni disi di osuku biala suoto.
49004016	Nnwɔɔ niɛta alɛ suoto sina nwu nkpo kakyɛ biala nka baawo nɛ. Ni di suoto sina nwu nkpo kafɔɔ simuu nka di lɛba le bɛɛtɔɔ alɛ aakaa ni nɛ. Nkpo oso nse suoto sina nwu nkpo kakyɛ biala lɛbla ɔkpɛ nɔɔ nwaa fɛ mmle okle diesiɛko nii, ni suoto sina nwu nkpo simuu mmuɔ sinwɛ osie di lɛbɔmbɔ kamɛ.
49004017	Nkpo oso kɔka ye di Saate leyooto kamɛ nlɛ bitansinsiɛ nkpa fɛ batii ba ninanye ni Yaa, diisibu lɛma nte ni foee.
49004018	Lɛsɔnu lɛma lɛwɔfɔ. Di obe wɔ mananye ni lɛsalɛsaa, boloomiɛ kafɔɔ alɛ bakyɔɔ ni lɛsalɛsaa kotoko oso yi, banaa kalekɔ kukanwii di nkpa be di Yaa lɛta ni batii nɔɔ kamɛ.
49004019	Siinunsɔ ninankpɛ ma ni oso yi, suoto sina akɔnsɔkleesaa nkpaamaa mantikanko, asaakuu ate ate kpɔnɔnfɔɔ mambla, asaa nwu nkpo ɔbla ntoole ma kamɛ fɛɛ.
49004020	Aye yi, diele asaa nwu nkpo okle bietekete biekyeko Kristo suoto!
49004021	N-ye nlɛ bianu nwɔ suoto ɔlaa. Fɛ batikankotɛ nɔɔ kafɔɔ, baatuo ye nwaako ɔlaa wɔ ninsi ni di Yesu nwu nkpo kamɛ.
49004022	Nkpo oso bidiɛ nkpa kofole lee be biasiɛ ni, mbe niata biasiɛ nkpa fɛ mmle diakaatɛɛko ye nii. Nkpa kofole nwu nkpo batɔɔwɔɔsa mi ku akɔnsɔkleesaa ninya.
49004023	Bita disibu ku letembi lee dibla lɛfɔle.
49004024	Biɛyɔ nkpa fɔle be bɛɛbla ni di Yaa letembi kanya bikpee. Nkpa be nikodiki suoto nintuo alɛ nwaako dite ni tinini leeklekle kamɛ.
49004025	Nunua yi, sɛlaa kuafunu nsinnaa. Otii biala atɔkɔ owo nɔɔ ɔlaa wɔ ninte ni nkpo. Diekye bamuu loo yi, suoto sina aba ate ate bule buka di Kristo suoto.
49004026	Nse ɔblɔ lefiɛ ye yi, bitanta ɔblɔ nwu nkpo lakpaa ye kuakpee di okpile kamɛ. Bitanta kale kafɔɔ laloo di ɔblɔ nwu nkpo suoto.
49004027	Bitanta Abonsam nwu nkpo osuku.
49004028	Otii wɔ nin-yu ni yi, adiɛ oyu. Aayɔ nnɛɛ nɔɔ abla ɔkpɛ biene alɛ nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ aawɛ lɛsaa an-yɔ ankyakaako bapiitɛ.
49004029	Bitanta sɛlaa kpɔnɔnfɔɔ kusinwii ladie siakye kanya lee kamɛ. Nse bibakakatɛ yi, biebuɛ sɛlaa se nimakpee ni otii osie fɛ mmle diesiɛko ni. Ni batii ba nimanu ye ni sɛlaa nwu nkpo mawɛ dikusɛkusɛ.
49004030	Bitambla lɛsaa le nimakpee ni Yaa Ninwuna Klekle sɛnyaami. Diekye nni bɛɛyɔ bɛɛtɛ ye nsũ alɛ, Yaa kamadiki ye di dii yɛntɛle nwu nkpo suoto nɛ.
49004031	Bitasinta akɔɔ latɔɔyɛɛ ye kaafutu kamɛ. Bitasinta batii sɛlaa latotofo ye siitu kamɛ, biediɛ sɛblɔ ɔnya. Bidiɛ kalɔ ku batii ayooto ɔlalaasa, biediɛ kafɔɔ asibu kpile amuu ɔbla baawo suoto.
49004032	Di asaa ya mmle nwu nkpo ɔbla kanya yi, biɛta bawo lee sɛlaa sitoonu ye kafutu, biɛbla sifutulɛ bitɔɔta bawo. Biɛyɔ sikpile bitɔɔkyɛ bawo fɛ mmle okle di Yaa lɛyɔ seleye ɛɛkyɛ ye ni di Kristo kamɛ.
49005001	Di obe wɔ bile ni Yaa babi ba ambɔmbɔ ni oso yi, dikpe ni biekpee okyiini biete fɛ nnwɔɔ.
49005002	Bita lɛbɔmbɔ didiki suoto kayi dituo di nkpa lee kamɛ, fɛ mmle okle di Kristo mbɔmbɔ wo ni, aayɔ nkpa nɔɔ aata ni diisi loo, fɛ oleɔta wɔ nikɔpɛ ni ɔkɔnɔ, kuobuo ni Yaa anu.
49005003	Di obe wɔ nfɛ bile ni Yaa babi oso yi, diɛkaatɛ alɛ baakple manlɛɛ lɛsɔnɔkpee ku asaa kpɔnɔnfɔɔ ɔbla ku onumbɛbɛɛ ɔlaa kuonwii bia kaamɛ lee.
49005004	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ ninankaatɛ alɛ biabuɛ sɛlaa se nimatofo ni kootoko nɛ. Diekye sɛlaa kpile ku sibuulaa ninankyɛ ni di osuku kanya sile. Minaabuɛ ni sɛlaa se mmle nwu nkpo oso yi, bita kataansa sɛlaa sitoodie ye kaanya kamɛ sitɔɔta Yaa.
49005005	Diekye biye nle mmle nwu nkpo biɛtɛ bilɛ, basɔnɔkpeetɛ ku batii ba nimbla ni asaa kpɔnɔnfɔɔ ku banumbɛbɛɛtɛ, kuonwii lɛma nnaa kalekɔ di Kristo ku Yaa sɛka kalekɔ kamɛ. Nwaako, onumbɛbɛɛ nkaatɛ ku afiɔ ɔtɔ.
49005006	Bitanta otii kuonwii layɔ obuulaa kuonwii aakyɔnkyɔ ye. Diekye asaa ya mmle nwu nkpo okle oso di Yaa ɔblɔ kamawa di batii ba ninkpe ni setokopĩ suoto nɛ.
49005007	Nkpo oso bitambla onwii ku batii ba mmle nwu nkpo kuonwii lɛma.
49005008	Diekye saa yi, ditunu kamɛ biasiɛ. Kafɔɔ nunua bitookple ni Saate bale oso yi, nfɛ bisi di lɛkpa nwu nkpo kamɛ. Nkpo oso dikpe nii nfɛ minsiɛ nkpa fɛ batii ba ninsi ni lɛɛkpa nwu nkpo kamɛ.
49005009	Diekye batii ba ninsi ni lɛɛkpa nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, nkpa biene be niefũ kɔya lete mansiɛ. Ɔlaa wɔ ninte ni nkpo lete mambuɛ, mansiɛ nkpa be kafɔɔ ninte ni tinini.
49005010	Bikpee okyiini bietekete lɛsaa le nimbuo ni Saate anu.
49005011	Bitan-yɔ suoto biakpee di ɔsaabla wɔ ninanfũ ni kɔya, baatii mbla ni diitunu kamɛ. Kafɔɔ bidiki ɔsaaba nwu nkpo kayi.
49005012	Diɛbla onunsɔlaa alɛ baakakatɛ bia di asaa ya mambla ni di lewofa kamɛ.
49005013	Nse beediki lɛsaa biala kayi bɛɛwako lɛkpa kamɛ yi, ni mannya ni letembi klekle nɛ.
49005014	Diekye lɛsaa le beediki bɛɛwako ni kayi mbuo lɛɛkpa kamɛ. Nkpo oso beebuɛ alɛ, “Afɔ wɔ nikɔkyɔsĩi ni sɛnkɛ, faataka fadie baakpi kamɛ, ni Kristo lɛkpa kamakpete fɔ di suoto.”
49005015	Nkpo oso bilolaa binyu nwaa mmle okle bisi ni nkpa. Bitansiɛ nkpa fɛle batii ba ninanye ni lɛsalɛsaa, kafɔɔ bisiɛ nkpa fɛ batii ba ninye ni lɛsaa.
49005016	Biblako osuku onyu wɔ nintoobuo ye ninnɛɛ kamɛ ɔkpɛ nunua wɔ mmle nwaa. Diekye ayi kpile ninle obe wɔ mmle kamɛ busi ni nɛ.
49005017	Nkpo oso bitambla asaa fɛle batii ba niebuu nii, kafɔɔ bikpee okyiini biewolaa lɛsaa le di Saate nwu nkpo komiɛ alɛ bibla ni.
49005018	Bitanyi nta be nimataye minsiɛ nii, diekye ninta otii mbla asaakuu. Kafɔɔ bita Yaa Ninwuna diyii ye kamɛ pɔ.
49005019	Biyɔ Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ sinu sɛlaa ku sinu ku Ninwuna kamɛ sɛlaa bikakatɛ bita bawo. Biɛyɔ katansa sinu ku sinu mɛnɛfɛle bitansa Saate nwu nkpo siitu lee kamɛ.
49005020	Bipɛ Teete Yaa sɛfa obe lele di lɛsaa biala kamɛ, di Saate loo Yesu Kristo leyooto kamɛ.
49005021	Biwakosa suoto kasɔ bita bawo, ta diibu le bikpe biɛta ni Kristo oso.
49005022	Basantɛ, biwakosa suoto kasɔ bita basa lee fɛ mmle okle minwakosa suoto kasɔ minta ni Saate loo.
49005023	Diekye santɛ yi, ɔsa ninle nwɔ disi fɛ mmle okle di Kristo nle ni bafũbanutɛ disi. Nkpo oso di Kristo layɔ suoto nɔɔ aata ole di bafũbanutɛ disi ninle ni dikitɛ nɛ.
49005024	Nioso fɛ mmle okle di bafũbanutɛ lɛwakosa suoto kasɔ bɛɛta ni Kristo lɛɛsaa biala kamɛ, nkpo okle kafɔɔ dikpe ni basantɛ lɛwakosa suoto kasɔ bɛɛta basa lɛma lɛɛsaa biala kamɛ nɛ.
49005025	Basuɔtɔ, aye kafɔɔ bibɔmbɔ basɔfɔ lee fɛ mmle okle di Kristo mbɔmbɔ ni bafũbanutɛ aayɔ nkpa nɔɔ aata ni ole diisi lɛma.
49005026	Aabla nle mmle alɛ ɔɔyɔ ankleklesa bafũbanutɛ nwu nkpo suoto anta Yaa, di obe wɔ kamɛ aakpeesa ma ni ɔlaa nɔɔ fɛ ntu.
49005027	Aabla nle mmle alɛ aalolaa bafũbanutɛ nwu nkpo anta suoto ku sekpeele alɛ diku kuninwii dilaatika ma di suoto, ee lɛfɔfɔtĩ ee kalalaa kukanwii dilaatika ma di suoto, ee kasɔ ɔwa dilaawɛ ma alɛ baate klekle.
49005028	Nkpo okle dikpe nii basuɔtɔ lɛbɔmbɔ basɔfɔ lɛma fɛ mmle okle mambɔmbɔ ni suoto sina lɛma nɛ. Nioso osuɔtɔ wɔ nimbɔmbɔ ni ɔsɔfɔ yi, suoto nɔɔ simu ɔɔbɔmbɔ.
49005029	Diekye otii kuonwii ninkyidi nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ suoto sina, kafɔɔ anta sĩ sinlɛ, anlolaa sĩ annyu nwaa, fɛ mmle okle di Kristo mbla ni bafũbanutɛ nɔɔ dikudi nwu nkpo.
49005030	Diekye awo ninle nwɔ suoto sina aba aba nɛ.
49005031	Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Nle mmle oso, osuɔtɔ madie di ote ku ɔya suoto ansifi manko ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ manaabla onwii, banyɔ lɛma mankple suoto sina sinwii.”
49005032	Owofalaa kplɛ ninle nwɔ mmle, kafɔɔ kobuɛ nwu n-yɔ nkaatɛɛsako di Kristo ku bafũbanutɛ dikudi nwu nkpo suoto.
49005033	Ɔlaa wɔ kɔtɛ mbuɛ ni ninle alɛ, dikpe nii, otii biala lɛbɔmbɔ ɔsɔfɔ nɔɔ fɛ nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ suoto. Ɔsanko biala kafɔɔ lenyu alɛ ɛɛyɔ dibu ɛɛta ɔsa nɔɔ.
49006001	Babisɔ, bibu balofotɛ lee di Kristo osuku kanya, diekye nle mmle ninle lɛsaa biene le dikpe ni alɛ biɛbla ni nɛ.
49006002	“Bu teefɔ ku yaafɔ,” ninle kufiofa kasale ko beebuɛ ɔlaa beetikasa ko ni alɛ,
49006003	“Asaa amuu kamalɛ anta fɔ, fabasiɛ nkpa kaanale kaasɔ ka mmle suoto.”
49006004	Babibate, bitambla asaa ya nimakpee ni babi lee sɛblɔ. Kafɔɔ bienyu ma nwaa, binanfi ma di Yaa osuku suoto, biɛka ma kafɔɔ.
49006005	Balanle, biyɔ dibu ku lɛyɛkɛ bikyɔɔ basaate lee atoko kaasɔ ka mmle suoto, dieekye di situ lee kamɛ fɛ mmle okle minkyɔɔ ni Kristo ɔlaa atoko.
49006006	Bibla nle mmle, diele alɛ bayɛ boonyu ye ni, biomiɛ bilɛ biabuo ma ni anu oso. Kafɔɔ fɛ le Kristo balanle yi, bibla lɛsaa le di Yaa komiɛ ni bikyeko situ lee kamɛ.
49006007	Bibla sɛkpɛ lee ku situ biene fɛ balanle. Biɛbla sĩ fɛle Saate nwu biɔbla minta, kafɔɔ diele batii fukuti.
49006008	Binyuma bilɛ Saate nwu mata otii biala koto di ɔkpɛ biene wɔ ɛɛbla suoto, ale ɔlanle woo, aale ɔlanle.
49006009	Basaate, aye kafɔɔ bibla laakpanwu bita balanle lee, biediɛ ma lɛyɛkɛ kafɔɔ okpee. Diekye binyuma bilɛ aye ku balanle lee, Saate onwii ninkpe ye di osi, anannyu batii di anu aakanko nii.
49006010	Lɛyɛntɛle, babiloo, biwɛ osie di Saate nwu ku osie kplɛ nɔɔ nwu kamɛ.
49006011	Biyɔ Yaa akpɛsaa ya amuu ɛɛta ye ni bikpee, mmle okle bibafuo oyila mintĩi ni Abonsam kakyɔnkyɔ sisuku nɔɔ simuu.
49006012	Diekye diele batii buɔkpɛko. Kafɔɔ ninwuna kamɛ basientɛ ku ninwuna kamɛ banyayilatɛ ku kayi ka mmle ditunu kamɛ banyayilatɛ ku asaa kpile ɔbla anwuna ya ninkpe ni kɔɔfɛɛfɔ kamɛ di osi nikɔkpɛ.
49006013	Nkpo oso, biyɔ Yaa akpɛsaa nwu nkpo amuu bikpee alɛ nse dii kpile nwu nkpo lewo yi, biafuo oyila minkpɛ kakpɛ minaase kaase. Nii nni nkpo sɛma yi, biafuo okple oyila osie kanya.
49006014	Nkpo oso bilolaa suoto biyila biɛyɔ nwaako ɔlaa nwu nkpo binii ɔtɔ fɛ ofiamɛ. Biɛyɔ ɔsaabla tinini bifuusa nintɛɛ fɛ ntɛɛ kubi difunsaa.
49006015	Bielolaa suoto biɛyɔ atoko ɔkyɛ ole ɔlaa nwu nkpo obuɛ kafɔɔ bikpee ninkpaa fɛ ntokota.
49006016	Diɛkyakaa ni di n-ya mmle suoto yi, obe lele biyɔ ofũ onu biklee fɛle kubi difunsaa. Ni bibafuo ɔyɔ otĩi Abonsam kɔtaa ko ɔɔtaa ni ku ɔtɔ kanya oniisa.
49006017	Biɛyɔ Yaa didiki nwu nkpo bitukũ fɛ kakpɛ lɛbɔɔsaa lekoto. Biɛyɔ kafɔɔ Yaa ɔlaa nwu nkpo ninle ni Ninwuna kamɛ kapamĩi biklee osie kanya.
49006018	Bita Yaa Ninwuna nwu nkpo ditɔɔkpaa ye biɛtɔɔpɛ ɔlaa bitɔɔta Yaa obe lele, biɛkaalɛ nwɔ osie kanya bilɛ akyakaako ye. Nle mmle oso bita anu lee ate kesekese, biekpee okyiini, biɛtɔɔpɛ ɔlaa bitɔɔta di Yaa batii bamuu disi.
49006019	Bipɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa diisi nii kafɔɔ bilɛ, Yaa kayɔ ɔlaa nɔɔ ankpee mi kaanya mbuɛ nta batii ku sɛkambi, ndiki owofalaa wɔ ninsi ni di ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo kamɛ kayi.
49006020	Ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle oso nle tɔkyɛntɛ wɔ ninte ni leeyo di sɛkpɛnkyɛ kamɛ nɛ. Nkpo oso bipɛ ɔlaa diisi nii alɛ kafuo nwu obuɛ ku sɛkambi fɛ mmle okle dikpe ni lebuɛ nwu ni.
49006021	Obiloo bɔmbɔtɛ Tihiko wɔ ninle ni Saate kpɛmblatɛ biene, kamawa nfa amatɔkɔ ye fɛɛ mmle okle nte nii, ku mmle okle di asaa kote anfe ni di ɔkyɛ nii ninfũ.
49006022	Nkpo oso okpee kokpee nwɔ ɔkyɛ lee amatɔkɔ ye mmle okle bute ni ninfũ. Ankpee kafɔɔ ye ɔnyɛɛ.
49006023	Babiloo, Teete Yaa ku Saate Yesu Kristo ata ye atoko ɔkyɛ ole ku lɛbɔmbɔ ku ofũ onu.
49006024	Yaa sibualɛ disiɛko batii ba bamuu nimbɔmbɔ ni Saate loo Yesu Kristo ku lɛbɔmbɔ le ninnaa ni kase.
50001001	Ami, Paulo, ku Timoteo wɔ ninle ni Kristo Yesu bakpɛmblatɛ nikɔkpana kukũ ko mmle munkyesee aye bafũbanutɛ bamuu ku batunletɛ lɛma ku bakyakaakotɛ ba niɛbla ni onwii ku Kristo Yesu bakpe ni di Filipi.
50001002	Teete Yaa loo ku Saate Yesu Kristo bale ye sibualɛ, baata ye atoko ɔkyɛ ole.
50001003	Obe lele lenyuma ye kamaa, mpɛ Yaa sɛfa diisi lee.
50001004	Obe lele kafɔɔ kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta Yaa di bamuu lee disi, mpɛ ɔlaa nta ku suoto lɛyɔɔ.
50001005	Ta mmle okle bitɔɔkyakaakoe nii diɛyɔ ni di dii kasale diɛbase bia mmiɛ di ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo ɔkpɛ ɔbla suoto oso.
50001006	Ta nkpo oso lefũ lenu nlɛ Yaa wɔ niekye ni ɔkpɛ biene wɔ mmle kasɔ kaamɛ lee kamabla nwu anyɛntɛ ninaase di dii le di Kristo Yesu makple anwa nii.
50001007	Obe lele ɔlaa lee ntika mi di otu. Nwaako, diɛsiɛko alɛ katoobu ye diisi fɛ mmle okle. Diekye Yaa lele ami ku aye sibualɛ alɛ diobuo ye ta ami oso di obe wɔ nte ni leeyo. Diɛkyakaa nii, biɛkyakaakoe buɔkpɛ di ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo disi alɛ kuayila sidu baatii kamɛ.
50001008	Yaa omu n-yɛ mi kamaa alɛ ɔlaa wɔ kobuɛ nlɛ fɛ mmle okle di Kristo Yesu mbɔmbɔ ye nii, nkpo okle di ɔlaa lee ntika mi ni di otu kamɛ nɛ.
50001009	Kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta Yaa nlɛ lɛbɔmbɔ lee katɔtaka katoo obe lele, alɛ biawɛ lesaatofo ku lɛsɔnu nimu nimu,
50001010	mmle okle biafuo ni lesaa le ninle ni dibiene odiki alɛ dii le di Kristo Yesu kamawa nii, biale batii ba di lɛkpɔnɔnfɔ kuniwii dilabatika ni di suoto alɛ baalo ye ni lɛpɔɔ.
50001011	Ni ɔsaabla wɔ ninte ni tinini di Yesu Kristo lete ninta ni batii mbla nya ni kamayii ye kamɛ pɔ, min-yɔ dibu ku katansa minta Yaa.
50001012	Babiloo, komiɛ nlɛ nta ye letofo nlɛ, lɛsaa le niawa mi ni di suoto, nwaako diɛta ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo lɛkyɛ sitũ osie kanya.
50001013	Ta nle mmle oso, basaanyuntɛ ba ninkpe ni di ɔka leyo ku batii bamba ba ninkpe ni ninfũ bamuu ntootofo alɛ Kristo kpɛmblatɛ nle ni oso nte leeyo.
50001014	Leyo nii ote wɔ mmle ntookpee babiloo kpinwu osie di Saate kamɛ alɛ, batookple bɛɛwɛ otu okpee osie kanya alɛ, nfɛ boobuɛ Yaa ɔlaa nwu nkpo ku sɛkambi ku ɔtanyɛkɛ.
50001015	Nwaako kabuɛ nii, batii bawo kaamɛ lɛma kobuɛ Kristo ɔlaa nwu nkpo diekye bɔɔkpɛkoe sɛsɔfɔwo, boomiɛ alɛ batɔɔnanfikoe ɔlaa. Batii bawo kafɔɔ kobuɛ nwu ku otu biene.
50001016	Batii ba nikobuɛ nwu ni ku otu biene yi, boobuɛ nwu ku lɛbɔmbɔ. Diekye baye alɛ Yaa niɛyɔ ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle eekpee mi ninnɛɛ kamɛ alɛ kakpɛ di ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo disi.
50001017	Batii nwu nkpo diloobuɛ Kristo ɔlaa nwu nkpo ku otu biene, diekye boomiɛ mma bamu lɛlɛ lɛma. Diekye boomiɛ alɛ dibuo nii ditaka katoo di obe wɔ nte ni leeyo.
50001018	Nni nkpo diɛlala, diekye otii owo lebuɛ Kristo ɔlaa nwu nkpo ku otu biene woo, aabuɛ nwu ku otu biene woo, di obe wɔ bɔɔnya mambuɛ ni Kristo ɔlaa nwu kamaa, nni nkpo mpɔ mi. Suoto kɔyɔɔ mi.
50001019	Suoto kɔyɔɔ mi, diekye n-ye nlɛ di ɔlaa wɔ biɔpɛ minta ni Yaa diisi nii ku mmle okle di Yesu Kristo Ninwuna nwu nkpo kɔkyakaakoe ni oso, kamadie leeyo katenkɔ.
50001020	Lɛsaa le ninle mi ni dibiesaa di anu nii ntika ni ni di suoto osie kanya ninle alɛ, sinunsɔ dilaakpɛ mi di ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle kɔbla ni suoto. Kafɔɔ di obe lele kamɛ, kyenkye nunua, kayii pɔ ku sɛkambi, n-yɔ katansa nta Kristo di nkpa nii osiɛ kamɛ. Kuntɛ lekpi woo, nkpe nkpa.
50001021	Be ninle nkpa? Di ɔkyɛ nii yi, nwu ninle alɛ nse nsi kamabla ɔkpɛ nta Kristo. Kafɔɔ kukpi mawako nfasũ ninlenkee.
50001022	Kafɔɔ nse fɛ nsiɛ nkpa nkyakaa yi, nse ntaakple mbla ɔkpɛ biene nkyɛnko sitũ. Kafɔɔ nootofo lɛmɛnle nfɛ nindiki, kukpi woo, nkpa!
50001023	Ntɔɔka di ntɛntɛɛ, diekye asaa ya mmle anyɔ nkle mi ɔɔnanfi. Kafɔɔ ami yi, dikle mi ɔkɔnsɔ alɛ kasifi naawɛ di Kristo nfũ. Nle mmle kalɛ mi ninlenkee.
50001024	Kafɔɔ ta aye oso, dilɛ dilenke alɛ kasiɛ nkpa.
50001025	Di obe wɔ lefũ nle mmle lenu ni oso, n-ye nlɛ kamasiɛko bamuu lee kaayi ka mmle kamɛ, nkyakaako ye minkyɛ sitũ di ofũ onu lee kamɛ minwɛ suoto lɛyɔɔ.
50001026	Ni nse nkpe ye di ɔkyɛ yi, suoto kamayɔɔ ye osie kanya di Kristo kamɛ ta ami oso.
50001027	Nunua, lɛsaa le niefĩ ni ninle alɛ nkpa lee disiɛbi kate fɛ mmle di ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo kotuo nii, diekye nle mmle di Kristo komiɛ nɛ. Nioso nse lefuo ye ɔwa ɔbanya, ee lenu ye lɛkpanko yi, kanu alɛ biyɛ niinwuna kamɛ biɔkpɛ ku disibu ninwii di ofũ onu lee kamɛ di ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo kanya.
50001028	Bitanyɛkɛ balo lee nwu nkpo, biyila kpinkpĩ ku sɛkambi. Nle mmle madiki nintuo ma alɛ, Yaa kamadiki ye, anwɔɔsa ma letembi nwu nkpo. Diekye nnwɔɔ nikɔkpɛ kakpɛ lee nwu nkpo anta ye, ni ɔɔta alɛ biolenkee kakpɛ nwu nkpo nɛ.
50001029	Diekye Yaa lɛta ye osuku alɛ biadiki Kristo kɔlɛɛ, diele alɛ mmle biafũ minnu ni lete oso ɛɛlɛɛ ye. Kafɔɔ alɛ diabuo ye ta nnwɔɔ oso.
50001030	Nunua yi, ayee bibuo kaakpɛ nwu nkpo kamɛ biɛkpɛ bikyakaakoe. Kakpɛ ka mmle ninle nka bianyɛɛ latɔɔkpɛ ni nɛ. Fɛ mmle okle bianu nii, nka nwu kokple nkpɛ ɔkpɛ miɛ nɛ.
50002001	Nunua, onwii lee ɔbla ku Kristo kokpee ye osie. Lɛbɔmbɔ nɔɔ kafɔɔ kokpee ye kɔnɛɛ kaafutu. Bitɔɔbla onwii kafɔɔ ku Ninwuna nwu, nioso nfɛ biɔbla sifutulɛ, minnya bawo kafɔɔ nyaami.
50002002	Ta di suoto lɛyɔɔ nii kabla ni nimu oso, kokpee ye osie nlɛ, bibla kanya kanwii, biediki lɛbɔmbɔ bituo bawo. Biɛbla onwii diisibu kamɛ, fɛ otii onwii okle.
50002003	Bitambla lɛsalɛsaa di onumbɛbɛɛ, ee suoto katoo ɔtakatɛsa kamɛ, kafɔɔ biwakosa suoto kasɔ bita bawo. Obe lele biebu bawo disi bilenkee suoto lee simu.
50002004	Bibie bawo lee dibiene, kafɔɔ diele lete lee lele.
50002005	Bita disibu le niawɛ ni Kristo Yesu diwɛ aye kafɔɔ.
50002006	Obe lele aawɛ Yaa letembi. Kafɔɔ diidii atabla disibu alɛ dikpe nii ɛɛtakatɛsa suoto katoo alɛ manko Yaa bɛɛkyɛkyɛ.
50002007	Kafɔɔ di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ dibiesaa kanya, aadiɛ kayilakɔ nɔɔ ka ninkpe nwɔ nii, aayɔ kpɛmblatɛ letembi, aawa kayi ka mmle fɛ otii.
50002008	Ta nkpo oso, aawakosa suoto kasɔ aakyɔɔ Yaa kotoko dialaase di obe wɔ aakpi nii bia koowoso suoto.
50002009	Nioso, Yaa latakatɛsa nwɔ katoo aatɔɔ kayilakɔ ka ninlenke nii, ni aatɔɔ leyooto le ninlenke ni di ayooto amuu kamɛ nɛ.
50002010	Nioso nse bɛɛlɛɛ Yesu leyooto nwu nkpo kamaa, dikpe nii asaa ya amuu ninkpe ni di osi ku kasɔ ka mmle suoto ku n-ya ninsi ni kaasɔ kalɔ lɛpɛ akunkyi,
50002011	amuu lediki eebuɛ alɛ Yesu Kristo ninle Saate. Alɛ baayɔ mantansa Teete Yaa nwu.
50002012	Nkpo oso basiɛwo nii bɔmbɔtɛ, fɛ mmle okle minkyɔɔ mi ni ɔlaa kotoko nse nkpe di ɔkyɛ lee yi, nkpo okle diefĩ dilenke alɛ biakyɔɔ mi ɔlaa kotoko di obe wɔ nnaa ye ni di ɔkyɛ nɛ. Biyɔ lɛyɛkɛ ku ditũtũkũ bibla ɔkpɛ bikyɛnko sitũ biyɔ bidiki, didiki lee nwu nkpo bituo.
50002013	Diekye obe lele Yaa nsi ye kaamɛ ɔɔbla ko ye suoto ɔkpɛ, alɛ aata ye mintuna minkyɔɔ nwɔ atoko mimbla nwɔ dibiesaa.
50002014	Lɛsaa lele biɔbla yi, bitandiki kanya lɛɛsaa nwu suoto, ee biananfi ɔlaa ninni suoto.
50002015	Ni bibadie di lɛpɔɔ olo biala kamɛ minle Yaa babi ba niɛkpa ni di okpile kuonwii dietika ma ni di suoto. Di obe wɔ bisi ni ku batii kpile ba ninsi ni di kayi ka mmle nintɔɔlalaa ni kamɛ oso yi, bitɔɔkpa kaamɛ lɛma fɛ mmle di awɛntrɛbi nkpa ni di osi.
50002016	Bimufũ nkpa ɔlaa nwu nkpo biklee osei kanya. Nse biefuo ɔbla nkpo yi, ni dii le di Kristo kamawa ni yi, kafuo kɔnɛɛ ɔpɛ lɛɛkankpɛɛ mbuɛ nlɛ ninwuo ee nkuɔ kasakasa.
50002017	Ofũ onu lee di Saate kamɛ ku ɔkpɛ lee ɔbla nte fɛ oleɔta bɛɛta bɛɛtɔɔ nii. Nse diɛsiɛko alɛ baawii ntɔ nii di oleɔta nwu nkpo suoto yi, suoto nta bayɔɔ mi, mpɔko bamuu lee.
50002018	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ dikpe ni biɛnya suoto lɛyɔɔ biɛpɔkoe nɛ.
50002019	Nse Saate loo Yesu letuna yi, di obe kakui kamɛ kamakpee Timoteo anwa ɔkyɛ lee amanyu ye, ni nse ɛɛkple ɛɛwa yi, babatɔkɔ mi ɔkyɛ lee ɔlaa suoto nkple sinyɔɔ mi.
50002020	Nwaako katɔkɔ ye ni yi, otii kuonwii nsinnaa munko nwɔ disibu lɛbla ni ninwii fɛ Timoteo. Diekye mmle okle dite mi ni di suoto lee yi, nkpo okle kafɔɔ dite nwɔ nɛ.
50002021	Batii bamuu bule yi, mma bamu lɛlɛ nfɛ batikanko, diesinle nle ninle ni Yesu Kristo lele.
50002022	Aye bamu biye bilɛ Timoteo yi, otii finle ale, diekye aayila aasũ mi kpinkpinkpĩ fɛ mmle okle di obi suɔtɔbi nyila ansũ ni ote di ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo obuɛ kamɛ.
50002023	Nkpo oso konyu osuku nlɛ kamakyesee nwɔ ɔkyɛ lee wla nse lɛnya mmle okle di asaa kote anfe nii.
50002024	Lefũ Saate Lenu nlɛ di obe kakui kamɛ, ami omu kamawa ɔkyɛ lee.
50002025	Lɛnya nlɛ diefĩ alɛ kakyesee ye obiloo Epafrodito ankple anwa ɔkyɛ lee. Nnwɔɔ niayilakoe buakpɛ kakpɛ buabla Yaa ɔkpɛ nɛ. Nnwɔɔ ninle otii wɔ biakpee bilɛ awa abakyakaakoe ni nɛ.
50002026	Oomiɛ alɛ anya ye osie kanya. Dile lɛsaa le nikowikitisa nwɔ ni otu, diekye aye alɛ bitoonu bilɛ suoto ditawɛ nwɔ osie.
50002027	Kubio aatoofiɛ, kɛɛkɛɛ niabu se aakpi. Kafɔɔ Yaa lanyɔɔ nyaami. Diele lete nɔɔ aanya nyaami nwu nkpo, kafɔɔ ku ami aanya nyaami. Nse diele nkpo, ntababuo nyaami nlenkee nle kɔnya nii.
50002028	Nkpo oso ami omu dikle mi ɔkɔnsɔ osie kanya nlɛ kodiki nwɔ osuku anwa. Ni nse biɛnyɔɔ yi, suoto makple sinyɔɔ ye. Nse ami kafɔɔ kaku nii owi ntooloo.
50002029	Nkpo oso bifukuti nnɛɛ bifũ nwɔ ku suoto lɛyɔɔ di Saate leyooto kamɛ. Biɛyɔ dibu bita batii ba ninte ni fɛ nnwɔɔ okle.
50002030	Diekye atayɛkɛ nkpa nɔɔ, aadiɛ mi aata ta Kristo ɔkpɛ oso, diabu kɛɛkɛɛ se aakpi. Aabla nkpo aayɔ aatɛɛ lɛkyakaako le di aye bamu minamafuo mi ni ɔta.
50003001	Babiloo, kayɛntɛ nii, bita suoto siyɔɔ ye alɛ bitɔbla onwii di Saate kamɛ. Dilootuudi mi alɛ kakple nkpana asaa ya ntɔɔkpana lebafe ni nkple nkyesee ye. Dekye nse biɛbla nya yi, abakyakaako ye.
50003002	Bilolaa binyu di mba nimbla ni asaa kpile suoto bate ni fɛ baweewee, booyila ye ni di suoto kyekelee alɛ dikpe ni biebudi ni asɔkɔsɔkɔ.
50003003	Awo ninle batii ba niebudi ni asɔkɔsɔkɔ bamu bamu nɛ, diele mma. Diekye muntansa Yaa diefe ni Niinwuna nɔɔ suoto. Munwɛ suoto lɛyɔɔ di obe wɔ di awo ku Kristo Yesu butɔɔbla ni onwii oso. Buootika anu di suoto sina ɔsaabla kuonwii suoto.
50003004	Nse otii owo lenyu alɛ ɔɔyɔ anu antika di suoto sina ɔsaabla nwu nkpo suoto yi, ni ami ninkpe osuku nwu nkpo nlenke.
50003005	Diekye baalofo mi nii, dii nɛnle suoto ni baabudi mi lɛsɔkɔsɔkɔ nɛ. Israel obi tintintĩ nle. Lekye kafɔɔ Benyamin leyo kamɛ. Hebri otii nle, diekye Hebri batii bamu nielofo mi. Nse Yuda batii kufiofa nwu lete ole kafɔɔ oso yi, ni Farisi otii nle.
50003006	Di okyiini ni okpee fɛ Yuda otii yi, lakpee bafũbanutɛ nwu nkpo dikudi kubɛ diitikanko kamɛ. Nse beebuɛ alɛ kuufiofa nwu nkpo lete ole alɛ baanya otii wɔ ninte ni tinini yi, ni okpile kuonwii dietika mi di suoto.
50003007	Kafɔɔ di obe wɔ dikpe ni nnyu ni asaa ya mmle fɛ asaa ya niefũ ni kɔya, kafɔɔ nunua, kɔnya nya fɛ asaa ya ninanfũ ni kɔya ta Kristo oso.
50003008	Diele nni nkpo lete. Kɔnya asaa amuu nlɛ aafũ kɔya, diekye ntɔbatofo nlɛ Kristo ninle mi Saate. Lɛsaatofo le mmle lefũ kɔya dilenke asaa amuu. Nkpo oso kɔnya asaa nii amuu fɛle asaa ya ntɔɔyɔ leyu ni leefleku, mmle okle kɔɔnɛɛ nii kakpanko ni Kristo,
50003009	munko nwɔ mumbla ni onwii. Nkpo oso ɔsaabla tinini wɔ di otii nwɛ ankyeko ni kufiofa kamɛ nsinnaa mi di suoto nii kamɛ. Nioso nunua mbla lɛsaa le di Kristo ofũ onu komiɛ alɛ mbla nii. Nnwu ninle ɔsaabla wɔ niekye ni Yaa nfũ kusi ni di ofũ onu kamɛ nɛ.
50003010	Lɛsaa le lete komiɛ ni ninle alɛ, katofo Kristo wɔ niataka aakye ni bakpi kamɛ ku osie nɔɔ wɔ nikɔbla ni ɔkpɛ. Mmle okle di amii kafuo ni ofe diibuo nɔɔ kamɛ, nkpi ni fɛ nnwɔɔ.
50003011	Ni amii masiɛ di osuku onyu kamɛ nlɛ, Yaa matakatɛsɛɛ mankyeko bakpi kamɛ nsiɛ nkpa.
50003012	Diele obuɛ kobuɛ nlɛ kɔnɛɛ nii ntɔɔkpanko disi tikasaa nwu nkpo, ee ntoowo niimu kofokofoko. Kafɔɔ ɔkpɛ kɔkpɛ osie kanya nlɛ kɔnɛɛ nii kakpanko ni, diekye nni oso di Kristo Yesu lɛlɛɛ mi ɛɛbla mi ole nwɔ nɛ.
50003013	Babiloo, diele alɛ onyu konyu nlɛ kɔnɛɛ nii ntɔɔkpanko ni kofokofoko. Kafɔɔ lɛsaa le kɔbla ni ninle alɛ koyee asaa ya ntɔɔbla lɛbafe nii. Kokpee okyiini nlɛ kɔnɛɛ nii kakpanko nle ninte mi ni siitũ.
50003014	Nkpo oso kotoso tinini nlɛ kalenkee nfũ letota le ninte ni di osi di Yaa lefe di Kristo Yesu suoto ɛɛlɛɛ mi ni nɛ.
50003015	Dikpe nii, biɛta disibu le mmle okle lɛwɛ awo ba nintoomuɔ ni di Yaa Ninwuna kamɛ. Ni nse diɛwa alɛ disibu bamba lewo nkpe otii owo kaamɛ lee, ni Yaa kamadiki ni kayi antuo nwu.
50003016	Akpakpa lele dite, bita bukyɛ sitũ di osuku wɔ butɔɔkyɛ diɛbase ni bia miɛ.
50003017	Babiloo, binyu ɔsaabla nii biɛbla. Batii ba niɛbla ɔtɛ onyu biene bɛɛta ye ni fɛ mmle okle buabla nii yi, bikyɔɔ ma atoko.
50003018	Ntoyitɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle obe kpinwu lɛbafe fiɛ, kafɔɔ nunua, kokple nse ye lɛtɔkɔ ku nnumɛɛ. Nle mmle kotuo alɛ batii bawo, nkpa lɛma be basi ni kaamɛ lee yi, batookple balo bɛɛta Kristo kukpi ko aakpi ni koowoso suoto.
50003019	Batii ba mmle kamabuo di kawɔɔ ɔtɔ nwu ninnaa ni kaloo kamɛ. Diekye bɛɛyɔ kafutu lɛma bɛɛbla Yaa lɛma. Asaa ya ninle ni anunsɔsaa kafɔɔ suoto mannya suoto lɛyɔɔ. Kayi ka mmle asaa lete kafɔɔ disi mambu.
50003020	Kafɔɔ awo yi, kafa loo ninle Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nɛ. Nfa buonyu osuku munta bulɛ Dikitɛ loo wɔ ninle ni Saate Yesu Kristo kamankye anwa nɛ.
50003021	Abakyɛlɛnsa suoto loo sina se mmle ninnaa ni ɔnyɛɛ, anta sĩ sinkpa fɛ sele nwɔ, ku osie nɔɔ wɔ ninkpe nwɔ ni kanya, diɛta alɛ lɛsaa biala lɛwa kasɔ diɛtɔɔ nii.
50004001	Nkpo oso, babiloo bɔmbɔtɛ, mmle okle biefĩ mi nii, fiɛ ninɔnya ye nii. Mmle okle biokpee mi ni suoto lɛyɔɔ ku mmle okle kɔpɛ ni kɔnɛɛ lɛɛkankpɛɛ ta aye oso. Babiloo babɔmbɔtɛ nii, nnya mmle okle dikpe ni bieyila ni osie kanya di Saate kamɛ.
50004002	Euodia ku Sinteke, lekoto kotikiti ye nlɛ, binu bawo kasɔ biekple bibla onwii fɛ babilɛma sankobi di Saate kamɛ.
50004003	Afɔ kafɔɔ kpɛmblatɛ wo nii bienetɛ, komiɛ nlɛ fakyakaako basanko ba mmle. Diekye baakyakaakoe buabla ɔkpɛ osie kanya ku Klemens ku bakpɛmblatɛ wo nii bamba di ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo lɛkya oyie okyiko kamɛ. Mba ayooto ninsi ni di Yaa nkpa kukũ kamɛ.
50004004	Bita suoto sitɔɔyɔɔ ye obe lele alɛ bitɔɔbla onwii ku Saate nwu. Kokple mbuɛ nkyakaa nlɛ bita suoto siyɔɔ ye.
50004005	Bita batii bamu banya alɛ bikpe nkpa be niɛyɔɔ ni. Diekye Saate nwu nkpo ɔwabee ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ.
50004006	Bitankpee suoto kubuɛ lɛɛsalɛsaa suoto, kafɔɔ nse biɔpɛ ɔlaa minta Yaa yi, biɛkaalɛ nwɔ asaa ya amuu niefĩ ye ni, biɛpɛ nwɔ sɛfa.
50004007	Yaa atoko ɔkyɛ ole wɔ niɛtaka katoo dilenke ni otii lɛsɔnu kamalolaa ye situ ku disibu osie kanya di onwii lee ɔbla kamɛ ku Kristo Yesu.
50004008	Babiloo, kayɛntɛ nii yi, bita asibu lee atika di asaa ya ninlɛ ni eesiɛko ni katansa suoto. Biebu disi sɛɛlaa nwaa suoto ku asaa ya niesiɛko ni dibu ku n-ya ninte ni tinini ku asaa ya niɛkpa ni kɔmɛ ku asaa ya niesiɛko alɛ baanyu ni ku n-ya niesiɛko ni otii.
50004009	Bisiɛ nkpa di asaa ya bietekete biekyeko ni ɔkyɛ nii, ku n-ya biefũ ni, ku n-ya bienu biekyeko ni kanya nii kamɛ, ku n-ya biɛnyɛɛ lɛbla ni suoto. Yaa wɔ ninta ni atoko ɔkyɛ ole asiɛko bamuu lee.
50004010	Suoto kɔyɔɔ mi osie kanya di Saate kamɛ nlɛ, bitookple biɛbla disibu fɔle di kanyu nii suoto kuntɛ ditɔɔklɛ. Diele alɛ obuɛ kobuɛ nlɛ bitoodiɛ mi onyu. Kafɔɔ osuku nitasɛkɛtɛ alɛ biatɛɛ lɛsaa di obe nwu kamɛ.
50004011	Diele obuɛ kobuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle nlɛ loo lɛsaa lewo lefĩ mi ni oso. Diekye ntootekete di sisuku simuu kamɛ nlɛ lɛsaa lele ninkpe mi kabuo mi anu.
50004012	N-ye lɛsaa le ninle ni dipii, n-ye kafɔɔ lɛsaa le ninle lɛsaawɛ. Lɛɛsaa biala kamɛ letekete lɛwofasaa le mmle. Mmle okle dikpe ni otii lesiɛ ni di obe lele kamɛ. Di kɔka kamɛ woo, ole omiɛ kamɛ woo, lɛsaawɛ kamɛ woo, lɛsaa tanwɛ kamɛ woo, nfuo ofe di amuu kamɛ.
50004013	Di Kristo osie wɔ ɛɛtɛɛ ni oso nfuo ofe di lɛsaa biala kamɛ.
50004014	Kafɔɔ bielolaa biɛbla alɛ biɛkyakaakoe diibuo nii kamɛ.
50004015	Filipi batii, aye bamu biye bilɛ diayɔ ni di obe wɔ ladie ni di Makedonia lakye kasɔ latooyie ni ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo lɛkya, aye niale bafũbanutɛ ba lete niatɔɔkyakaakoe ni di asaa ɔta kamɛ, minfũ mi dikusɛkusɛ.
50004016	Obe wɔ lawɛ ni di Tesalonika, lɛɛkyakaako lafĩ mi nii, biakyesee mi asaa dialenkee ninwii.
50004017	Diele asaa lee ɔta komiɛ, kafɔɔ lɛwɛ le bibawɛ ni di asaa lee ɔta kamɛ di osi letika anu.
50004018	Bitɔɔtɛɛ koto kulenke bia ɔkpɛ wɔ labla nii. Asaa ya biata Epafrodito bilɛ awakoe nii labakpankoe nnɛɛ, diɛta alɛ ntɔɔwɛ asaa ya niefĩ mi ni fɛɛ. Asaa ya mmle biekyesee mi ni nte fɛ oleɔta wɔ niebuo ni Yaa anu kuɔpɛ nwɔ ni ɔkɔnɔ, kuɔtɔɔ ni suoto lɛyɔɔ.
50004019	Yaa wɔ ɔkpɛ kɔbla nii, kamata ye abiesaa lee amuu, diefe ni di Yesu Kristo lɛɛsaawɛ kplɛ di lɛkpa nɔɔ kamɛ.
50004020	Bita butansa Teete loo Yaa diɛyɔ ni di nua diesifi ni dinaa ni kaloo. Diwa kaanya.
50004021	Kɔsɛɛsa Yaa batii ba bamuu niefũ Kristo Yesu beenu nii. Babiloo ba ninkpe ni ninfũ ku ami kafɔɔ kɔsɛɛsa ye biene biene.
50004022	Yaa batii klekle ba ninkpe ni ninfũ kɔsɛɛsa ye biene biene. Kyenkye mba ninkpe ni di Roma batii Ɔka kplɛ leyo.
50004023	Saate loo Yesu Kristo sibualɛ disiɛko ye.
51001001	Kukũ ko mmle lekye ami, Paulo nfũ, diefe ni di Yaa dibiesaa kamɛ, ni ntɔbakple Kristo Yesu tɔkyɛntɛ nɛ. Ami ku obiloo Timoteo nikɔkpana kũ.
51001002	Munkyesee aye babiloo ba ninkpe ni di Kolose, di Yaa ntɔɔbla ni klekle, mimbla ni lɛsaa di osuku kanya, biɛbla ni onwii ku Kristo. Teete loo Yaa ale ye sibualɛ, aata ye atoko ɔkyɛ ole.
51001003	Obe lele mumpɛ Yaa wɔ ninle ni Saate loo Yesu Kristo Ote sɛfa, nse buɔpɛ ɔlaa munta diisi lee.
51001004	Diekye butoonu mmle okle biefũ Kristo Yesu bienu ni osie kanya, ku mmle okle mimbɔmbɔ ni Yaa bafũbanutɛ bamuu.
51001005	Obe wɔ baatɔkɔ ye ni nwaako ɔlaa nwu nkpo, ninle ni ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkasale, bianu asaa biene ya ninle ye ni ale di osi. Obe wɔ bietika ni anu di nle mmle oso, ofũ onu lee ku lɛbɔmbɔ lee ntika di lɛsaa le suoto bietika ni anu.
51001006	Ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo kokple kunwako dikusɛkusɛ, kuɔkpɛ kumbuo kaayi ka mmle, fɛ mmle okle kutɔɔbla ni kaamɛ lee, diɛyɔ ni di dii le bianu ni Yaa sibualɛ nwu nkpo lɛkasale, bitɔɔwa biɛbatofo nwu ni fɛ mmle okle kute nii.
51001007	Obiloo bɔmbɔtɛ Epafra wɔ ninle ni kpɛmblatɛ wo loo, oololaa Kristo ɔkpɛ ambla ni kaanya loo, namatuo ye asaa di Yaa sibualɛ nwu nkpo suoto.
51001008	Nnwɔɔ niɛmatɔkɔ wo lɛbɔmbɔ le di Yaa Ninwuna lɛyɔ ɛɛta ye nii.
51001009	Nle mmle oso, diɛyɔ ni di dii le buanu ye ni ɔlaa, obe lele buɔpɛ ɔlaa munta diisi lee. Buɔkaalɛ Yaa bulɛ, ata ye bitofo dibiesaa nɔɔ ku ninumbe nɔɔ nimuu ku lɛsɔnu le di Ninwuna nɔɔ nta ni niimu kamɛ.
51001010	Ni bibafuo nkpa osiɛ fɛ mmle okle di Saate nwu nkpo komiɛ nii, obe lele kafɔɔ bibabla lɛsaa le nikobuo nwɔ ni anu. Nkpa lee kamadiki ɔsaabla biene ate ate amuu antuo, minkple mintofo Yaa minkyakaa.
51001011	-
51001012	Yaa ayɔ osie nɔɔ kplɛ nwu nkpo amufũ ye aklee osie kanya, alɛ biafuo otu okpee lɛsaa biala kamɛ mintɛ suoto kaasɔ. Biyɔ suoto lɛyɔɔ bipɛ Teete sɛfa obe lele, diekye nnwɔɔ niɛta alɛ buɔwɛ kalekɔ di lɛsaa le eelolaa ɛɛtɛ ɛɛta ni batii nɔɔ di sɛka kalekɔ nɔɔ lɛkpa nwu kamɛ.
51001013	Nnwɔɔ niediki wo eekyeko ditunu kamɛ ninwuna nnɛɛ kamɛ, ni ɛɛyɔ wo eekpee di Obi nɔɔ bɔmbɔtɛ sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ nɛ.
51001014	Obi wɔ mmle nwu nkpo kamɛ di Yaa lefe eediki wo nɛ, ni ɛɛyɔ sikpile loo kafɔɔ ɛɛkyɛ wo nɛ.
51001015	Kristo niediki Yaa wɔ munɔɔnya ni kuanu letembi eetuo. Nnwɔɔ ninle Yaa Obi kasale wɔ nikole ni sɛka di asaa amuu suoto nɛ.
51001016	Diekye nnwɔɔ suoto di Yaa lafe fiɛ aabla asaa amuu. Asaa ya ninkpe ni di osi woo, n-ya ninkpe ni kaasɔ ka mmle suoto woo, asaa ya mannya ni kuanu woo, n-ya mananya ni kuanu woo, ninwuna kamɛ basientɛ woo, baka woo, batunletɛ woo, ee basientɛ yi, Yaa Obi nwu nkpo suoto eefe ɛɛbla nya fɛɛ nɛ, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ ɛɛbla nya ɛɛta.
51001017	Kristo nfɛ nkpe fiɛ di Yaa labla asaa amuu. Diefe ni di suoto nɔɔ, ni laasaa amuu kafɔɔ nte ninfũ dikaatɛ alɛ eete ni nɛ.
51001018	Nnwɔɔ ninle disi ɛɛta suoto nɔɔ sina nwu ninle ni bafũbanutɛ dikudi nwu nkpo. Nnwɔɔ kamɛ diikudi nwu nkpo nkpa lɛtaa diekye. Nnwɔɔ ninle Yaa Obi kasale wɔ aatakatɛsa aakyeko ni kukpi kamɛ, alɛ aale ni lɛsaa biala katũ.
51001019	Yaa omu dibiesaa diale alɛ letembi le nimu nimu ninkpe nwɔ ni kawɛ Obi nɔɔ nwu nkpo.
51001020	Diefe ni di Obi nɔɔ nwu nkpo suoto ni di Yaa lekple eetuna alɛ oololaa nnwɔɔ ku asaa ya ninkpe ni di osi ku kasɔ kamuu ntɛɛ nɛ. Yaa lɛwako atoko ɔkyɛ ole wɔ mmle diefe ni di Obi nɔɔ ntɔ be aawii ni kaasɔ di kowoso suoto.
51001021	Saa yi, onwii ɔtambla lasiɛ di aye ku Yaa ntɛɛ, biakyidi nwɔ diisibu lee kamɛ diekye di sikpile se biatɔɔbla ni oso.
51001022	Kafɔɔ nunua, diefe ni di Obi nɔɔ suoto sina kukpi nwu nkpo kamɛ, atookple eefũ wo ku nnɛɛ nnyɔ, ɛɛyɔ wo eese di anu nɔɔ fɛ batii ba ninte ni klekle, di okpile kuonwii dietika ni di suoto, bute ni tinini.
51001023	Nkpo oso dikpe ni bieyila kekleke di ofũ onu lee kamɛ, bitanta nnɛɛ lafee ye di osuku onyu wɔ bikpe ni di obe wɔ bianu ni ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo. Ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya buoyie munta kayi batii bamuu nɛ. Nkpo oso di ami Paulo lebakple Yaa kpɛmblatɛ nɛ.
51001024	Nunua yi, suoto kɔyɔɔ mi alɛ diobuo mi ta aye oso. Dibuo le kɔnya ni di suoto nii sina kamɛ ninle alɛ kayɛntɛ dibuo le di Kristo alɛ kanya ni di suoto nii sina kamɛ di bafũbanutɛ dikudi nwu suoto.
51001025	Yaa niɛblɛɛ alɛ kale kpɛmblatɛ nta bafubanutɛ dikudi nwu, alɛ kayie ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo lɛkya, mmle okle baatii katofo ni Yaa ɔlaa nwu nkpo klekle.
