51001026	Ɔlaa nwu nkpo ninle owofalaa wɔ di Yaa lɛyɔ eekookaa ni saa bakofo batatofo ni nɛ. Kafɔɔ nunua yi, Yaa ntoodiki nwu kayi eetuo batii ba niefũ nwɔ beenu nii.
51001027	Yaa omu dibiesaa diale alɛ owofalaa nwu niefũ ni kɔyɔ ku lɛkpa nɔɔ, oodiki ni kayi aantuo nnle mmuu batii ba niefũ nwɔ beenu nii. Owofalaa nwu ninle alɛ, Kristo nsi wo siitu kamɛ, nle mmle kotuo alɛ, bukpe kalekɔ di Yaa lɛkpa nwu nkpo kamɛ.
51001028	Nle mmle oso buobuɛ Kristo ɔlaa nwu nkpo munta otii biala nɛ. Ni buɔka ma muntuo ma aasaa di ninumbe nimuu kamɛ, mmle okle buayɔ ma munse ni di Yaa anu fɛ batii ba niɛbla ni onwii ku Kristo batoomuɔ beewo ni nimu.
51001029	Kafuo ni ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle ɔbla yi, nkpo oso kokpee okyiini nkpɛ osie kanya ku osie wɔ omuu di Kristo lɛyɔ eekpee mi ni kaamɛ nɛ.
51002001	Bitɛɛntɔkɔ ye mmle okle ntɔɔbla ni ɔkpɛ osie kanya diisi lee ku batii ba ninkpe ni di Laodikea ku batii bule ba bamuu ninayinyɛɛ banya ni diidii.
51002002	Kɔbla nle mmle, ta mmle okle baawɛ ni otu okpee, mambla ni onwii kafɔɔ di lɛbɔmbɔ kamɛ. Diɛkyakaa nii, baawɛ lɛsɔnu le niewo ni nimu, alɛ baatofo Yaa lɛwofasaa nwu ninle ni Kristo. Nle mmle ninle lɛsaawɛ kplɛ nɛ.
51002003	Kristo kamɛ di Yaa lɛyɔ lɛsaawɛ kplɛ le mmle ninle ni ninumbe ku lɛsaatofo eekookaa.
51002004	Kɔtɔkɔ ye ɔlaa wɔ mmle, mmle okle di otii kuonwii dilaayɔ ɔnya mɛnɛfɛ akyɔnkyɔ ye nii.
51002005	Kuntɛ nnaa ye diɔkyɛ di suoto sina kamɛ yi, nkpe ye diɔkyɛ niinwuna kamɛ. Diɛyɔɔ mi kafutu, lɛnya mmle okle biemufũ ofũ onu lee bikle ni osie kanya di Kristo kamɛ.
51002006	Di obe wɔ bitoofũ Yesu Kristo fɛle Saate lee ni yi, bibla onwii ku nnwɔɔ di nkpa lee disiɛbi kamɛ.
51002007	Bise sidu ninnwɔɔ kamɛ osie kanya fɛ mmle okle di kowoso nse ni sidu kaasɔ. Biesiɛ nkpa di nle nwɔ suoto, nimmle okle biawɛ ni osie di ofũ onu lee kamɛ, fɛ mmle okle beetuo ye ni. Diɛkyakaa ni ninle mmle ɔbla kamɛ yi, biɛtɔɔpɛ Yaa sɛfa obe lele.
51002008	Bilolaa binyu nwaa alɛ otii kuonwii diɛyɔ kayi ka mmle lɛsaatofo le ninnaa ni kɔya akyɔnkyɔ ye. Diekye asaatuo ya mmle lekye saa bakofo ku anwuna ya nikɔbla ni ɔkpɛ kaayi ka mmle nfũ. Diele Kristo nfũ eekye.
51002009	Diekye Kristo suoto kamɛ di Yaa letembi nimu nimu nsi.
51002010	Di obe wɔ butɔɔbla ni onwii ku Kristo oso yi, Yaa ntɔɔta wo nkpa mmummu. Diekye Kristo kole sɛka di ninwuna kamɛ basientɛ ku niwuna kamɛ kanya bayilatɛ biala suoto.
51002011	Di obe wɔ bitɔɔbla ni onwii ku Kristo oso yi, Yaa lɛyɔ Ninwuna nɔɔ ɛɛtɛ ye nsũ alɛ bale nwɔ bile. Kafɔɔ diele fɛ mmle Yuda batii mbudi ni asɔkɔsɔkɔ. Kafɔɔ Kristo omu niɛbla nle mmle ɛɛyɔ eediki wo eekyeko sikpile se butɔɔbla ni kamɛ.
51002012	Di obe wɔ baakpeesa ye ni Yaa ntu yi, baakookaa ye ku Kristo. Di Yaa ntu okpeesa nwu nkpo kamɛ, ni di Yaa latakatɛsa ye ku Kristo aakyeko kukpi kamɛ nɛ. Diekye biefũ Yaa wɔ niatakatɛsa nwɔ aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ ku osie nɔɔ bienu.
51002013	Di obe owo nintabafe ni kamɛ, aye kafɔɔ biakpi niinwuna kamɛ ta sikpile lee oso, diekye biale batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii kuufiofa ditawɛ ye nii. Kafɔɔ Yaa ntɔɔta ye nkpa diefe ni di Kristo suoto, di obe wɔ ɛɛyɔ sikpile loo simuu ɛɛkyɛ wo nii.
51002014	Yaa lɛyɛɛsa sɛlaa se simuu nin-yɛ wo ni di suoto fɛɛ, di kufiofa nwu nkpo ɔtanle kamɛ. Diekye ɛɛyɔ sĩ ɛɛpɛ ɛɛkaasa di kowoso suoto ku Kristo.
51002015	Eeklee osie eefũ di ninwuna kamɛ basientɛ ku ninwuna kamɛ batunletɛ bamuu nnɛɛ kamɛ, eekpee ma sinunsɔ di lɛkpaka, eemufũ ma sɛlanle ku suoto lɛyɔɔ di lelenkee kamɛ.
51002016	Nkpo oso bitanta otii kuonwii lakpee ye kufiofa di lɛsaa le biale ni ku nle bianyi ni suoto, ee ayi klekle suoto, ee awɛntɛ fɔle dii ole suoto, ee Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi suoto.
51002017	Asaa ya mmle amuu nle lɛsaa le nimawa ni kunyii. Lɛsaa nwu nkpo nimu nimu ninle Kristo wɔ nintɔɔwa ni nɛ.
51002018	Bitanta otii kuonwii lalo ye lɛpɔɔ alɛ biawakosa suoto kasɔ di sɛlaa kuafunu kamɛ ee biakyɔɔ Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ atoko. Batii ba mmle nimbuɛ alɛ odiki otuo lefĩ, mantakatɛsa suoto katoo kasakasa, diekye suoto sina kamɛ disibu lete ninkpe ma.
51002019	Diekye baasinsi di Kristo wɔ ninle ni disi ɛɛta ni suoto sina nwu nkpo simuu kamɛ. Kristo nfũ di suoto sina aba nwu nkpo simuu nwɛ suoto osie ankya baawo, simmuɔ fɛ mmle okle di Yaa komiɛ nii.
51002020	Di obe wɔ butookpi ni ku Kristo oso yi, butoodie di kayi ka mmle anwuna kpile osie nnɛɛ kamɛ. Ni be lɛsaa oso biekple biɛta boonii afiofa wɛkyɛ wɛkyɛ nwu nkpo manta ye fɛ kayi ka mmle osie kalɔ biekple bisi?
51002021	Be lɛsaa oso bookple mantɔkɔ ye alɛ bitamblako nle mmle ɔkpɛ, ee bitantu nle mmle bianyu, ee bitankpanko nninkpo kafɔɔ?
51002022	Afiofa ya mmle amuu nle asaa ya mamblako ni ɔkpɛ anloo ni di obe ninya nfe ni ale. Batii ɔsaabla ku asaatuo awo ko ale.
51002023	Di Yaa ɔkpɛ ɔbla di suoto sina lɛkyɛ yi, nse otii lemufũ afiofa ya mmle nwu eeklee ɛɛwakosa suoto kasɔ ɛɛbla suoto amumu yi, ninte fɛle ninumbe kplɛ dile oodiki antuo. Kafɔɔ asaa ya mmle nwu nkpo ɔbla nínkyakaako otii nwu nkpo. Ánfuo nwɔ ɔkyakaako aalenkee suoto sina akɔnsɔkleesaa nɔɔ.
51003001	Di obe wɔ di Yaa ntɔɔtakatɛsa ye eekyeko ni bakpi kamɛ ku Kristo oso, bita anu lee atika di Yaa kafa asaa suoto, nfũ di Kristo nsi ni di Yaa oletanɛɛkyɛ.
51003002	Bita asibu lee atika di Yaa kafa asaa suoto, diele n-ya kaasɔ ka mmle suoto.
51003003	Diekye bitookpi ni yi, nkpa lee ntoowofa di Kristo kamɛ di Yaa kamɛ.
51003004	Nkpa lee mmummu ninle Kristo nɛ. Nkpo oso nse Kristo nwu nkpo lɛkyɔɔ yi, ni ayee bibakyɔɔ ku nnwɔɔ lɛɛkpa nɔɔ nwu kamɛ.
51003005	Nkpo oso, dikpe ni bielo suoto sina akɔnsɔkleesa ya nikɔbla ni ɔkpɛ di suoto lee kamɛ, ninle ni, lɛsɔnɔkpee, asaa kpɔnɔnfɔɔ ɔbla, ku ɔkɔnsɔ akleesaa kpile, ku suoto sina kamɛ abiesaa kpile, ku onumbɛbɛɛ wɔ ninkaatɛ ni ku afiɔ ɔtɔ.
51003006	Ta asaa ya mmle ɔbla oso di Yaa ɔblɔ kamawa di batii ba ninkpe ni setokopĩ suoto nɛ.
51003007	Ninkpa be bitoosiɛ biɛbafe nii, aye kafɔɔ biabla asaa nwu nkpo okle.
51003008	Kafɔɔ nunua, dikpe nii nfɛ mindiɛ asaa nwu nkpo ɔbla. Dile ni sɛblɔ ɔnya, kafutu kamɛ ɔtɔ okpee, kakyidi, ditiikpɔnɔnfɔsa ku mbusuo sɛlaa obuɛ. Disinnaa alɛ asaa ya mmle nkple antɔɔbla ɔkpɛ kaamɛ lee.
51003009	Di obe wɔ bitoodiki letembi kofole nwu biɛtɛ ni di ɔlɔɔkɔ, bitansinlaa biatɔɔta bawo.
51003010	Bítɔɔyɔ letembi fɔle nwu nkpo biekpee nii, Yaa kɔbla letembi le mmle lɛfɔle obe lele di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ letembi kanya alɛ biatofo nwɔ.
51003011	Ta nle mmle oso kasɛ kukanwii diesinsi di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii ku mba ninle ni Yuda batii ntɛɛ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di kasɛ diesi di mba niebudi ni asɔkɔsɔkɔ ku mba ninambudi nii, ku mba nimbuɛ ni sele ate ate ku nkpayotũ batii, balanle ku mba ninanle ni balanle ntɛɛ nɛ. Bamuu lɛma batii banwii bale di Kristo kamɛ, nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ ninsi bamuu lɛma kamɛ nɛ.
51003012	Obe wɔ di Yaa mbɔmbɔ ye eediki ye ɛɛbla ni bale nwɔ oso, bita letembi nɔɔ disiɛ ye kaamɛ. Biɛnya batii nyaami, biɛbla sifutulɛ, biɛwakosa suoto kasɔ, biɛbla buɛɛ, biɛwɛ situ kafɔɔ.
51003013	Bikyakaako bawo, nse onwii lee lɛbla owo okpile yi, aayɔ akyɛ nwɔ fɛ mmle di Saate nwu layɔ aakyɛ ye ni.
51003014	Di asaa ya mmle nwu nkpo amuu ɔbla kamɛ, bibɔmbɔ bawo. Diekye lɛbɔmbɔ niemufũ asaa amuu eenii ɛɛbla nya ninwii niimu kamɛ.
51003015	Bita atoko ɔkyɛ ole wɔ di Kristo lɛta ni dile sɛka di situ lee kamɛ. Diekye, nkpo oso di Yaa lɛlɛɛ ye eesiisa ɛɛbla ye suoto sina sinwii alɛ biawɛ atoko ɔkyɛ ole nɛ. Nioso obe lele bitɔɔpɛ nwɔ sɛfa.
51003016	Biɛta Kristo ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo kuyii ye situ kamɛ pɔ. Bietootuo bawo asaa, biɛtɔɔka bawo di ninumbe kamɛ. Biɛyɔ Kɔkpana Klekle kamɛ sinu ku bafũbanutɛ sinu ku sinu se niekye ni Ninwuna Klekle kamɛ bitɔɔpɛ Yaa sɛfa di situ lee kamɛ.
51003017	Lɛsaa lele bibabuɛ ee mimbla, biɛbla ni di Saate Yesu leyooto kamɛ, di obe wɔ biofe di suoto nɔɔ mimpɛ ni Teete Yaa sɛfa.
51003018	Basantɛ biwakosa suoto kasɔ bita basa lee, diekye nkpo okle dikpe ni biɛbla fɛle Kristo bafũbanutɛ nɛ.
51003019	Aye basuɔtɔ kafɔɔ bibɔmbɔ basɔfɔ lee. Bitantɔɔkpakpalo ma.
51003020	Babisɔ, bikyɔɔ balofotɛ lee atoko obe lele. Diekye nle mmle ɔbla mbuo Yaa anu osie kanya.
51003021	Babibate, bitankpee babi lee sɛblɔ, alɛ nnɛɛ dilaafee ma.
51003022	Balanle, bikyɔɔ basaate lee atoko kaasɔ ka mmle suoto di asaa amuu kamɛ. Bitanta diale alɛ obe wɔ bayɛ di ɔlɔɔkɔ lee boonyu ye ni fiɛ biabla ɔkpɛ bilɛ biobuo ma anu. Kafɔɔ bibla sɛkpɛ ku situ biene bita ma, ta dibu le bikpe biɛta ni Saate nwu oso.
51003023	Ɔkpɛ lele biɔbla yi, bibla nwu ku otu biene fɛle Saate nwu biɔbla minta, kafɔɔ bitanta diate ye fɛ otii biɔbla minta.
51003024	Binyuma bilɛ bibafũ letota lee minkyeko Saate nwu nfũ, nle eebuɛ ɛɛtɛ alɛ abata ni batii nɔɔ. Kristo ninle Saate wɔ ɔkpɛ biɔbla nii.
51003025	Binyuma bilɛ otii lele niɛbla okpile, abafũ letokonanfi nɔɔ di okpile wɔ ɛɛbla ni kanya. Diekye Yaa nínnyu otii di anu fiɛ annanfi nwɔ kootoko.
51004001	Aye ɔkpɛ basaate, obe wɔ biye bilɛ ayee Saate nkpe ye ni di osi oso yi, binyu bilɛ biɛbla lɛsaa le ninlɛ ni di osuku kanya biɛta balanle lee.
51004002	Bipɛ ɔlaa bitɔɔta Yaa obe lele. Nse biɔpɛ ɔlaa minta, biɛta anu lee ate kesekese, biɛtɔɔpɛ nwɔ sɛfa.
51004003	Obe lele biɔpɛ ɔlaa minta Yaa yi, bieyuma wo kafɔɔ alɛ Yaa kasɛkɛtɛ osuku anta wo alɛ buadiki Kristo owofalaa biene nwu di Yaa lakookaa ni saa mumbuɛ. Nnwu oso nte leeyo nɛ.
51004004	Bipɛ ɔlaa bita bilɛ kafuo owofalaa biene nwu odiki obuɛ, batii nnu nwu kasɔ klekle fɛ mmle okle dikaatɛ nii.
51004005	Bitofo mmle okle biakyɛ ni ku batii ba ninanle ni bafũbanutɛ niinumbe kamɛ. Osuku biala biɛwɛ, biɛblako nwu ɔkpɛ bita Saate nwu.
51004006	Bita lɛkakatɛ lee dilɛ onu kootoko obe lele, bietofo mmle okle dikaatɛ alɛ biadiki ni batii kanya di sɛlaa suoto.
51004007	Obiloo bɔmbɔtɛ Tihiko wɔ ninle ni kpɛmblatɛ wo nii di Saate ɔkpɛ nwu kamɛ, ɔɔbla ni ɔkpɛ ku otu biene kamatɔkɔ ye ɔlaa nii.
51004008	Nkpo oso kokpee nwɔ ɔkyɛ lee nlɛ, abatɔkɔ ye mmle okle ninfũ nte nii, an-yɔ ankpee ye osie.
51004009	Manko obiloo Onesimo wɔ mumbɔmbɔ ni osie kanya buofũ nwɔ buonu nii, eekye ni kamɛ lee nikɔwa. Babawa mamatɔkɔ ye lɛsaa le nikɔbla wo ni ninfũ.
51004010	Aristarko wɔ ninte ni leeyo ku ami ku Marko wɔ ninle ni Barnaba obilɛma alɛ bɔɔsɛɛsa ye. Batɔɔtɔkɔ ye lɛsaa le dikpe ni biɛbla biɛta ni Marko kofokofoko. Nkpo oso nse ɛɛwa biefukuti nnɛɛ lee bifũ nwɔ ku suoto lɛyɔɔ.
51004011	Yosua wɔ bɔɔlɛɛ ni Yusto kafɔɔ alɛ ɔɔsɛɛsa ye. Batii batiɛ ba mmle ninle Yuda batii ba niefũ beenu bɔɔblakoe ni ɔkpɛ di Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo suoto nɛ. Bale lɛkyakaako kplɛ kafɔɔ bɛɛtɛɛ osie kanya.
51004012	Epafra wɔ ninle ni Kristo kpɛmblatɛ wɔ niekye ni bafũbanutɛ kasiisakɔ lee nwu kamɛ kafɔɔ alɛ ɔɔsɛɛsa ye biene biene. Obe lele ɔɔpɛ ɔlaa anta Yaa diisi lee osie kanya alɛ, aata ye minyila kekeleke alɛ biamuɔ minwo nimu di ofũ onu lee kamɛ, minkyɔɔ nwɔ ɔlaa kotoko diibiesaa nɔɔ suoto.
51004013	N-yɛ nwɔ kamaa kobuɛ nlɛ ɔɔbla ɔkpɛ osie kanya anta ye ku batii ba ninkpe ni di Laodikea ku mba di Hierapoli.
51004014	Obiloo bɔmbɔtɛ Luka wɔ ninle ni fablatɛ ku Dema kafɔɔ kɔsɛɛsa ye biene biene.
51004015	Buɔsɛɛsa babiloo ba ninkpe ni di Laodikea ku obiloo sankobi ninfa ku bafũbanutɛ ba ninkyaka ni leeyo nɔɔ.
51004016	Nse bitooloo kukũ ko mmle ɔka yi, biɛyɔ kũ bikyesee bafũbanutɛ ba ninkpe ni di Laodikea kafɔɔ baaka. Biɛka nko kafɔɔ lakpana lakyesee ni Laodikea bafũbanutɛ kafɔɔ.
51004017	Biɛtɔkɔ Arkipo bilɛ akpee kɔnyaabe aayɛntɛ Saate ɔkpɛ wɔ ɛɛyɔ eekpee nwɔ ni ninnɛɛ kamɛ ninfa.
51004018	Lɛsɛɛsa le mmle yi, ami Paulo omu niɛyɔ kɔnɛɛ nii lɛkpana. Bitanyee mi kafɔɔ di obe wɔ nte ni leeyo. Yaa sibualɛ disiɛko ye.
52001001	Ami, Paulo, ku Silvano ku Timoteo niɛkpana kukũ ko mmle munkyesee aye ba ninle ni Teete Yaa ku Saate Yesu Kristo bale di Tesalonika. Buɔɔkaalɛ Yaa sibualɛ ku atoko ɔkyɛ ole munta ye.
52001002	Mumpɛ Yaa sɛfa diisi lee. Obe lele kafɔɔ nse buɔpɛ ɔlaa munta Yaa, munnyuma ye muntikiti lekokoto di bamuu lee disi.
52001003	Munnyee kafɔɔ alɛ buatɔkɔ Teete loo Yaa mmle okle bikle ofũ onu lee biɔblako ni ɔkpɛ. Muntɔkɔ nwɔ kafɔɔ mmle biɔkyakaako ni batii di lɛbɔmbɔ kamɛ, ku mmle bietika ni anu di Saate Yesu Kristo suoto osie kanya.
52001004	Babiloo, buye bulɛ Yaa nwu mbɔmbɔ ye nwaako, ni eediki ye fɛ batii nɔɔ nɛ.
52001005	Ɔlaa biene wɔ buabatɔkɔ ye nii, diele ɔlaa fukuti kule. Kafɔɔ diafe ni di Yaa Ninwuna Klekle osie wɔ aadiki aatuo ni oso, diata alɛ biafũ nwu bilɛ nwaa ɔlaa kule. Bianya mmle okle buasiɛ ye ni kaamɛ, buabla nkpo ta mmle diakyakaako ye nii.
52001006	Nwaako kafɔɔ, bitikanko wo ku Saate nwu nkpa disiɛbi nkpaamaa. Kuntɛ diabuo ye nwaa, biafũ ɔlaa nwu ku suoto lɛyɔɔ le niakye ni Yaa Ninwuna Klekle nfũ.
52001007	Nioso bitookple ɔtɛ onyu biɛta bafũbanutɛ ba bamuu ninkpe ni di Makedonia ku Akaia kasɔ suoto.
52001008	Diele alɛ Saate ɔlaa nwu ledie di ɔkyɛ lee kuosifi ni Makedonia ku Akaia lete oso. Kafɔɔ mmle biefũ Yaa bienu nii ntoodu aba aba. Nioso diesinle awo niakple buabuɛ ɔlaa kuonwii, diekye batii bamuu ntoonu nwu.
52001009	Batii nwu bamu nikobuɔɛ mmle okle biafũ wo ni di obe wɔ buawa ni ɔkyɛ lee, ku mmle okle biediɛ ni afiɔ ɔtɔ, biɛyɔ suoto lee biɛta ni Yaa wɔ lete ninkpe ni nkpa.
52001010	Diɛkyakaa nii, bisi bisoko obi nɔɔ Yesu wɔ aatakatɛsa aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ, alɛ abakye osi anwa amadiki wo ankyeko ni Yaa ɔblɔ wɔ nikɔwa ni kamɛ.
52002001	Babiloo, aye bamu beye bilɛ awo ɔkyɛ lee ɔwa diɛbla kasakasa.
52002002	Biye mmle okle kafɔɔ baatuo wo ni dibuo ku sinunsɔ di Filipi fiɛ buababuo ni ɔkyɛ lee di Tesalonika. Kuntɛ baayila wo di suoto di ɔkyɛ lee ninfa kafɔɔ osie kanya yi, Yaa loo lakpee wo osie buatɔkɔ ye ɔlaa biene wɔ niekye ni ɔkyɛ nɔɔ.
52002003	Ɔka wɔ buɔka ye nii, diele ditiikyɔnkyɔ ee kalalaa ku disibu lalaale bukle.
52002004	Nioso obe lele munkakatɛ fɛ mmle di Yaa komiɛ alɛ bukakatɛ nii. Diekye nnwɔɔ niɛsɔ wo eenyu niɛnya alɛ buowo, ni ɛɛyɔ ɔlaa biene nɔɔ eekpee wo ninnɛɛ alɛ buabuɛ nɛ. Nioso múnkakatɛ bulɛ buobuo batii anu, kafɔɔ munkakatɛ bulɛ buobuo Yaa anu, diekye nnwɔɔ niɛsɔ wo situ eenyu.
52002005	Biɛtɛ biye nwaa bilɛ, diele ɔnyamɛnɛfɛ sɛlaa buɔyɔ buɔwako ye. Buɔtɔkɔ ye ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle bulɛ, buɔyɔ munwɛ asaa munkyeko ɔkyɛ lee. Yaa omu n-yɛ wo kamaa.
52002006	Buloomiɛ lɛtansa bukyeko ɔkyɛ lee ee batii bamba nfũ. Kuntɛ bukpe osuku fɛle Kristo batɔkyɛntɛ alɛ abiesaa loo katika ye di suoto yi,
52002007	buamufũ suoto, buasiɛko ye fɛ mmle di obiɔya nnyu ni babi nɔɔ.
52002008	Diekye mumbɔmbɔ ye ni oso, buomiɛ bulɛ binu ɔlaa biene nwu. Diele alɛ bianu Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu lete. Kafɔɔ alɛ buayɔ nkpa loo munta diisi lee, diekye biefĩ wo ni oso.
52002009	Babiloo, binyuma bilɛ obe wɔ buawɛ ni di ɔkyɛ lee buatɔɔtɔkɔ ye ni Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu, buabla sɛkpɛ kakũ ku kakyɛ buayɔ buatoonyu suoto, mmle okle munaakple atoo butika ni di kuonwii lee suoto.
52002010	Aye ku Yaa biale wo kamaa bayilatɛ alɛ nkpa loo disiɛbi di aye ba niefũ bienu ni kamɛ labla klekle, diawo, okpile kuonwii ditasiɛ mi kaamɛ.
52002011	Biye kafɔɔ bilɛ buaklee aye ba dudu onwii onwii fɛ mmle koote nklee ni babi.
52002012	Buakpee ye osie, buakpee ye kɔnɛɛ kaafutu, buase ye sɛkpaadu kafɔɔ bulɛ biasiɛ nkpa be nikabuo ni Yaa anu, di lɛlɛɛ le ɛɛlɛɛ ye alɛ biawɛ ni dibia di sɛka nɔɔ kalekɔ ku leklekle nɔɔ nwu kamɛ.
52002013	Lɛsaa ninwii le oso munkple mumpɛ ni Yaa sɛfa kafɔɔ ninle alɛ, di obe wɔ buatɔkɔ ye ni ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle, bita yɔ nwu fɛ ɔlaa fukuti kule. Kafɔɔ biafũ nwu fɛ Yaa ɔlaa. Nwaako kafɔɔ ɔlaa nɔɔ kule. Diekye kutɔɔwako kakyi nwaa kafɔɔ di aye ba niefũ bienu ni nkpa kamɛ.
52002014	Babiloo, asaa ya niawa ni di suoto lee ninfũ nyanwu okle kafɔɔ niawa di Yaa batii ba ninkpe ni di Yudia kasɔ suoto nɛ. Dibuo le biawɛ ni baatii lee nnɛɛ kamɛ, nninwu okle di batii ba niefũ Yesu beenu ni di Yudia kasɔ lawɛ di batii lɛma nnɛɛ kamɛ nɛ.
52002015	Yuda batii ba mmle baalo Saate Yesu ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ, mma nwu kafɔɔ niatikanko wo nɛ. Ɔsaabla lɛma lɛtaka ayɛ di Yaa suoto. Bayɛ kafɔɔ di batii bamuu suoto, bootĩi ma osuku.
52002016	Bɛɛyɔ beetika di suoto alɛ butantɔkɔ batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii ɔlaa biene nwu alɛ baawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo. Di nle mmle ɔbla oso sikpile lɛma ntɔɔpɔ siebiɛ siewii alɛ Yaa letokonanfi nfɛ kawa ma di suoto.
52002017	Babiloo, obe kakuii ko ninle nwɔ buosifi buodiɛ ye ni nɛ. Kuntɛ buloosinnya ye ku anu yi, ɔlaa lee ntika wo di otu kamɛ. Buomiɛ kafɔɔ osie kanya bulɛ bunya ye anu kua anu. Buɔkpɛ siisuku simuu suoto bulɛ buawa mumanya ye.
52002018	Nioso buomiɛ bulɛ bukple bubanya ye. Fɛ ami Paulo, nwaako, ntoomiɛ sisuku kpinwu nlɛ kɔwa. Kafɔɔ Kpiletɛ kotĩi osuku.
52002019	Nunua, bawe ninle wo osuku onyu, suoto lɛyɔɔ ku lɛkakoto le suoto bubakanta ni se Saate loo Yesu lɛwa? Mma ninle aye nɛ.
52002020	Nwaako, aye ninle wo lɛsaa le suoto munkanta ni ku suoto lɛyɔɔ.
52003001	Ɔtanfuo ye ɔbanya ntoolenkee wo ninnɛɛ oso, butootuna bulɛ buokple munsiɛ di Atene,
52003002	Ni munkpee Timoteo anwa amakpee ye osie, ankyakaako ye di ofũ onu lee kamɛ. Nnwɔɔ ninle obiloo wɔ ninkyakaako wo ni di Yaa ɔkpɛ ku Kristo ɔlaa biene nwu obuɛ kamɛ nɛ.
52003003	Buɔbla nkpo diekye buloomiɛ bulɛ kuonwii lee akple nkpaamaa di ditikanko le nikɔwa ye ni di suoto. Aye bamu biye bilɛ ditikanko le mmle okle nle Kristo batikankotɛ lele.
52003004	Bionyuma bilɛ obe wɔ buawɛ ni di ɔkyɛ lee, buatɔkɔ ye bualesa katũ bulɛ ditikanko le mmle okle mawa wo di suoto. Fɛ mmle biye nii, nni nfɛ nikɔwa nɛ.
52003005	Nioso ntookyesee Timoteo nlɛ awa abanyu, nse biekple bikle ofũ onu nwu osie kanya. Diekye ɔlaa lee wɔ mmle dilɔɔtɛɛ suoto lɛyɔɔ. Kɔyɛkɛ nlɛ loobia kpiletɛ nwu ntɔɔkpɔkpɔtɔsa ye disibu, ni dibuo loo nwu nimuu mabla kasakasa.
52003006	Kafɔɔ Timoteo ntookple ɛɛwa, ɛɛbatɔkɔ wo suoto lɛyɔɔ ɔlaa di ofũ onu ku lɛbɔmbɔ lee suoto. Ɛɛbatɔkɔ wo alɛ obe lele bionyuma wo osie kanya, biomiɛ bilɛ binya wo, fɛ mmle okle di awoo buomiɛ bulɛ bunya ye ni osie kanya.
52003007	Nioso, babiloo, di amiina loo ku abuo loo kamɛ yi, otu ntoote wo, di ofũ onu wɔ biekple bikle ni oso.
52003008	Mianfɛ di nkpa ntoobuo wo kaamɛ nɛ, diekye butoonu mmle okle biyɛ ni osie kanya di Saate ofũ onu nwu kamɛ.
52003009	Sɛmɛnfa buapɛ Yaa diisi lee siawo? Buɔpɛ nwɔ sɛfa di suoto lɛyɔɔ kplɛ le butɔɔwɛ ni di anu nɔɔ ta aye oso.
52003010	Buotikiti nwɔ lekoto kakũ ku kakyɛ bulɛ buakple munkyaka anu ku anu alɛ, buayɔ lɛsaa le niebu ni di ofũ onu lee kamɛ munkyakaa ye.
52003011	Nunua, Teete Yaa omu ku Saate Yesu basɛkɛtɛ osuku bata wo alɛ buawa ɔkyɛ lee.
52003012	Saate nwu ata alɛ lɛbɔmbɔ le bikpe biɛta ni bawo ku batii bamba dipɔ dikyakaa. Fɛ mmle okle mumbɔmbɔ ye ni.
52003013	Di nle mmle ɔbla kamɛ abakpee ye osie, ni bibawo, minte klekle di Teete Yaa anu nse Saate loo Yesu lɛwa ku batii ba bamuu ninle nwɔ ni bale.
52004001	Babiloo, lɛsaa yɛntɛle kotikiti ye ni lekoto ninle alɛ, bisiɛ nkpa be nimabuo ni Yaa anu, fɛ mmle okle nfɛ bisi ni kofokofoko, bietekete biekyeko ni ɔkyɛ loo. Buokpee ye osie di Saate Yesu leyooto kamɛ bulɛ, biabla minlenkeesa nkpo.
52004002	Diekye biye asaa ya buatuo ye ni diefe ni di Saate Yesu osie kamɛ.
52004003	Yaa komiɛ alɛ biabla suoto klekle, mindie di lɛsɔnɔkpee okpile kamɛ kenke.
52004004	Oomiɛ kafɔɔ alɛ, basuɔtɔ bamuu katofo mmle okle baalenkee ni suoto, alɛ baafuo osiɛ ku basɔfɔ lɛma di leklekle ku dibu kamɛ.
52004005	Ni bilaatikanko suoto sĩna ɔmɛnɛfɛ fɛ batii ba ninanyɛkɛ ni Yaa.
52004006	Di ɔlaa wɔ mmle suoto yi, kuonwii atambla okpile di owo nɔɔ suoto ee atafaa nwɔ. Fɛ mmle buatɔkɔ ye, buaka ye ni osie kanya, diekye Saate nwu mananfi batii ba nikɔbla ni asaa ya mmle nwu nkpo kootoko.
52004007	Yaa diɛlɛɛ wo ata nkpa lalaale osiɛ, kafɔɔ nkpa klekle osiɛ oso ɛɛlɛɛ wo.
52004008	Nioso otii lele niesĩ kufiofa ko mmle ole, diele otii eesĩ. Kafɔɔ Yaa wɔ niɛyɔ Ninwuna Klekle nɔɔ ɛɛta wo ni eesĩ.
52004009	Di Yaa kamɛ sibilɛma lɛbɔmbɔ yi, diefĩ alɛ kakpana lɛsalɛsaa nkyesee ye. Diekye Yaa omu ntootuo ye mmle biabɔmbɔ ni bawo.
52004010	Nwaako, mimbɔmbɔ babiloo ba bamuu ninkpe ni di Makedonia kasɔ suoto. Kafɔɔ buotikiti ye lekoto bulɛ, biakple mimbla minlenkeesa nkpo.
52004011	Bita dile ye dibiesaa alɛ biasiɛ nkpa di suoto kasɔ ɔwakosa kamɛ. Di obiala ayɔ anu atika di ɔkpɛ nɔɔ suoto. Aayɔ nnɛɛ nɔɔ abla ɔkpɛ ale, fɛ mmle okle buatɔkɔ ye ni.
52004012	Nle mmle mata kayi batii mbu ye, ni bilabatika kuonwii disi di abiesaa lee suoto.
52004013	Babiloo, buomiɛ bulɛ butɔkɔ ye lɛsaa le nimawa ni di batii ba nintookpi ni suoto, mmle okle minamatoowi ni sɛnyaami fɛ batii ba ninnaa ni osuku onyu.
52004014	Buofũ buonu bulɛ Yesu lakpi, ni aakple aataka nɛ. Nkpo oso buofũ buonu bulɛ Yaa mata alɛ bafũbanutɛ ba nintookpi nii, Yesu makpaa ma anwako di okple ɔwa nɔɔ kamɛ.
52004015	Asaa ya di Saate omu latuo nii, nnya suoto buyɛ buɔtɔkɔ ye bulɛ, awo ba ninkpe ni nkpa di Saate okple ɔwabee kamɛ, bulabale katũ busifi osi budiɛ mba nintookpi nii.
52004016	Saate omu masoo ankye osi anwa ku sɛlɔ kplɛ odiki, bubanu Yaa Tɔkyɛntɛ Nɔɔfo kafɔɔ sɛlɔ, babafɛ Yaa dikyukyoo nwu. Se mba niekpi ni di Kristo kamɛ ntɔɔkasa ɔtaka.
52004017	Nni kamaa, awo ba niebu busi ni nkpa yi, Yaa makɛnkɛ wo ku mma anaasiisa di alokonkyɛ kamɛ munakyakako Saate nwu di osi. Nkpo nfɛ bubasiɛ ku Saate nwu dinaa ni kaloo nɛ.
52004018	Nkpo oso biyɔ sɛlaa se mmle bikpee bawo osie.
52005001	Nunua babiloo, díefĩ alɛ kakpana obe ku ayi ya di nle mmle mawa ni nta ye.
52005002	Diekye aye bamu biye bilɛ Saate dii nwu abawa nii, ɔwa dibawa fɛ mmle di yu nwa ni ku kakyɛ.
52005003	Di obe wɔ kamɛ batii kobuɛ alɛ asaa nfɛ kɔlɛ ni ɔkyɛ, atoko ɔkyɛ ole nfɛ nkpe nii, obe nwu kamɛ kaawɔɔ kplɛ nwu mafua ma fɛ mmle di lɛmɛ nnu ni mɛlakatɛ. Kuonwii lɛma dilabadie kaamɛ.
52005004	Kafɔɔ, babiloo, aye biesi diitunu kamɛ. Nioso dii kplɛ le mmle ditanfua ye fɛ mmle di yu nfua ni otii.
52005005	Diekye bamuu lee lɛkpa ku dii babi bile. Diele kakyɛ ku ditunu babi bile.
52005006	Nioso, bitanta buate fɛ batii ba nikɔkyɔsĩi nii, bita busɛnkɛ, buomufũ suoto.
52005007	Diekye mba ninkyɔsĩi nii, kakyɛ mankyɔsĩi. Mba ninsiɛ ni kafɔɔ, kakyɛ mansiɛ.
52005008	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ bule ni dii batii oso yi, bita anu loo ate kesekese. Biɛta buyɔ ofũ onu ku lɛbɔmbɔ bukpee fɛ ntɛɛ kubi difunsaa, ku osuku onyu alɛ bubawɛ didiki fɛ disi ditĩisaa loo.
52005009	Diekye Yaa diɛlɛɛ wo alɛ buafe di ɔblɔ nɔɔ wɔ ninkɔwa ni kamɛ. Kafɔɔ alɛ buawɛ didiki diefe ni di Saate loo Yesu Kristo suoto.
52005010	Yesu wɔ mmle lakpi diisi loo alɛ, bukpe nkpa woo, buokpi woo, nse ɛɛwa bubasiɛ nkpa ku nnwɔɔ.
52005011	Nkpo oso, bikpee bawo osie biɛkyakaako bawo fɛ mmle biɔbla ni.
52005012	Babiloo, buotikiti ye lekoto bulɛ, biayɔ dibu minta batunletɛ ba nikotuo ye ni asaa ku okyiini bɔɔkpaa ye ni di Yaa sisuku suoto bɔɔka ye ni.
52005013	Bibɔmbɔ ma, biebu ma nwaa di ɔkpɛ biene wɔ bɔɔbla ni kaamɛ lee oso. Biesiɛko bawo di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ.
52005014	Diɛkyakaa nii, babiloo, buokpee ye osie bulɛ, bisĩ ɔlaa bita mba ninle ni bakyɔkɔ. Biekpee bayɛkɛtɛ osie, biɛkyakaako mba ninnaa in osie. Biɛwɛ otu bita otii lele.
52005015	Bilolaa binyu nwaa bilɛ kuonwii diɛbla okpile akyisa, kafɔɔ obe lele bita dile ye dibiesaa alɛ biabla dibiene minta bawo, ku batii bamuu.
52005016	Bita suoto siyɔɔ ye obe lele.
52005017	Bipɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa obe lele.
52005018	Bipɛ Yaa sɛfa di asaa amuu suoto. Diekye nle mmle di Yaa komiɛ ankyeko aye ba niɛbla ni onwii ku Yesu Kristo nfũ nɛ.
52005019	Bitanniisa Ninwuna Klekle ɔtɔ kaamɛ lee.
52005020	Bitansĩ Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ ɔlaa fɛ kuofĩ.
52005021	Bisɔ asaa amuu binyu, biemufũ n-ya ninlɛ ni biklee.
52005022	Bidiɛ okpile biala ɔbla.
52005023	Yaa wɔ ninta wo ni atoko ɔkyɛ ole abla ye klekle di sisuku simuu suoto. Aaklee ye ninwuna, disibu ku suoto sina lee alɛ blaanyako ye okpile kuonwii di Saate Yesu Kristo okple ɔwa kamɛ.
52005024	Yaa wɔ niɛlɛɛ ye ni mbla asaa di osuku kanya, nioso asaa ya eebuɛ alɛ ababla nii, ababla.
52005025	Babiloo, bitɔɔpɛ ɔlaa bitɔɔta Yaa diisi loo.
52005026	Bisɛɛsa bawo ku sibilɛma lɛbɔmbɔ di Yaa leklekle kamɛ.
52005027	Kɔkaalɛ nkyeko ɔkyɛ lee fɛ mmle di Saate nwu komiɛ ni nlɛ biaka kukũ ko mmle minta bafũbanutɛ bamuu.
52005028	Saate Yesu Kristo sibualɛ disiɛko bamuu lee.
53001001	Ami, Paulo, ku Silvano kuɛ Timoteo niɛkpana kukũ ko mmle buɔta aye ba ninle ni Yaa ku Saate Yesu Kristo bale di Tesalonika.
53001002	Teete Yaa ku Saate Yesu Kristo bale ye sibualɛ ku atoko ɔkyɛ ole.
53001003	Babiloo, dikpe ni buɔpɛ Yaa sɛfa diisi lee obe lele. Diesiɛko alɛ buabla nkpo, diekye ofũ onu lee komuɔ osie kanya, lɛbɔmbɔ le bikpe biɛta ni bawo kafɔɔ nfɛ kɔkyɛ sitũ.
53001004	Nioso munkanta di suoto lee munta nsiisakɔ bule nɛ. Diekye ofũ onu lee lekple kukpe osie. Nu batikanko ye, biofe kafɔɔ diibuo kpinwu kamɛ.
53001005	Nle mmle kotuo alɛ Yaa lɛkanko le ɛɛta ni lewo, nioso bababu ye manta ye kasiɛkɔ di sɛka nɔɔ kalekɔ nɛ, ta ninni oso biɔnya ni dibuo.
53001006	Yaa makanko di osuku kanya. Nioso abananfi mba nintikanko ye ni kootoko.
53001007	Kafɔɔ abata alɛ aye ku awo ba diobuo ni munwɛ ɔnyɛɛ ɔtɛ. Yaa kamabla nle mmle di obe wɔ di Saate Yesu ku Yaa Batɔkyɛntɛ makyɔɔ ni di osi ku osie ku ɔtɔ.
53001008	Nioso batii ba ninanyɛkɛ ni Yaa ku mba ninanfũ Saate Yesu Kristo ɔlaa biene banu nii, abananfi ma kootoko.
53001009	Nioso Saate nwu matososa ma di anu nɔɔ. Mia kafɔɔ blɔbanya leklekle nɔɔ ku osie nɔɔ. Nfa nfɛ abawɔɔsa ma ku letembi lɛma nɛ.
53001010	Nle mmle mawa di dii kplɛ le suoto di Yesu makple anwa nii. Bafũbanutɛ nɔɔ bamuu matikanko nwɔ ku katansa. Aye kafɔɔ bibasiɛ ma kaamɛ, diekye biafũ ɔlaa biene nɔɔ nwu buatɔkɔ ye ni bianu.
53001011	Ta nkpo oso obe lele buɔpɛ ɔlaa munta Yaa diisi lee. Muntikiti Yaa loo lekoto bulɛ nkpa lee kakaatɛɛ di lɛlɛɛ le ɛɛlɛɛ ye ni suoto. Diɛkyakaa nii, osie nɔɔ kukyakaako ye aakpee ye osie diɛ disibu biene le bikpe ni alɛ, lɛsaa lele bibabla ta nnwɔɔ oso diɛwa kaanya.
53001012	Buɔkaalɛ asaa ya mmle munta ye ta mmle baatakatɛsa ni Saate Yesu Kristo leyooto katoo ta aye oso. Ku mmle di nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ aatakatɛsa ye ni ayooto katoo, ta nnwɔɔ Yesu ku Yaa sifutulɛ oso.
53002001	Babiloo, buomiɛ bulɛ butɔkɔ ye lɛsaa finle ninwii di Saate Yesu Kristo okple lɛwa ku mmle bubasi munkyakako nwɔ nii.
53002002	Nse bienu bilɛ Saate lɛwa dii nwu ntɔɔwa diɛbafe, buloomiɛ bulɛ disibu lee dikpɔkpɔtɔ ye ee lɛyɛkɛ dipɛ ye. Loobia dibate ye alɛ buabuɛ ni di obe wɔ kamɛ buatoodiki ni Yaa kanya ee buabuɛ ni Yaa ɔlaa nwu ee buakpana kukũ kowo buakyesee ye ni oso.
53002003	Bitanta bilɛ otii kuonwii lakyɔnkyɔ ye di osuku kuonwii suoto. Diekye Saate dii nwu nkpo dilabawa diɛlaase di obe wɔ baatii kpinwu masĩ ni Yaa, ku otii kpile wɔ di Yaa lediki eese lete alɛ nnwɔɔ Yaa abawɔɔsa ni lɛwa fiɛ.
53002004	Otii kpile wɔ mmle mayila di Yaa suoto, ee lɛsaa lele mantɔ ni suoto. Abatakatɛsa suoto katoo alɛ nnwɔɔ ninlenke. Abasifi anaasiɛ di Yaa leyo ambla suoto fɛ nnwɔɔ ninle Yaa.
53002005	Binyuma bilɛ obe wɔ lawɛ ni kaamɛ lee, latɔkɔ ye sɛlaa se mmle simuu.
53002006	Kafɔɔ, osie onwii nikotĩi osuku alɛ nle mmle ditayiwa nunua. Aye bamu kafɔɔ biye lɛsaa le dile nii. Otii kpile nwu madiki suoto kayi nse obe nɔɔ ntoowo.
53002007	Kafɔɔ disi osie asaa ya babatɔɔbla ni ntookye kasɔ kofokofoko di lɛwofa kamɛ. Kafɔɔ asaa ya nimawa nii, dilabawa diediki Yaa lekyisa otii wɔ nietĩi ni otii kpile nwu osuku.
53002008	Nni kamaa, otii kpile nwu madiki suoto kayi antuo. Kafɔɔ se Saate Yesu lɛwa, abayɔ kanya nɔɔ kamɛ owiidi ku lɛkpa nɔɔ anlo nwɔ, anwɔɔsa letembi nɔɔ kafɔɔ.
53002009	Otii kpile wɔ mmle nwu mawa ku Abonsam osie, amabla kakyɔnkyɔ sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ ate ate antuo.
53002010	Abafe di disi osie osuku lele suoto ankyɔnkyɔ batii ba nimawɔɔ nii. Babawɔɔ diekye beesĩ alɛ boloofũ Yaa ɔlaa biene wɔ nimata ma in nkpa banu.
53002011	Ta nkpo oso Yaa madiɛ ma manfũ sɛlaa kuafunu mannu.
53002012	Nni kamaa, Yaa malo bamuu lɛma lɛpɔɔ, diekye baafũ ɔlaa biene nwu banu. Ta baatɔɔnya suoto lɛyɔɔ di okpile ɔbla kamɛ.
53002013	Kafɔɔ dikpe nii buɔpɛ Yaa sɛfa diisi lee obe lele, aye babiloo ba di Saate mbɔmbɔ ni nwaa. Diekye eediki ye, diɛyɔ ni kaasɔ kakyekɔ ɛɛbla ye klekle alɛ biawɛ nkpa diefe ni diɛ Yaa Ninwuna Klekle ɔkpɛ ɔbla kamɛ, ta biefũ ɔlaa biene nwu bienu ni oso.
53002014	Diefe ni di ɔlaa biene loo obuɛ kamɛ, ni di Yaa lalɛɛ ye alɛ biawa mimawɛ kalekɔ di Saate Yesu Kristo leyooto kamɛ nɛ.
53002015	Nioso, babiloo, biyila osie kanya, biemufũ ɔlaa wɔ buatuo ye ni di akũ loo ɔkpana ku lɛkakatɛ kamɛ biklee osie kanya.
53002016	Saate Yesu Kristo omu ku Teete Yaa loo wɔ nimbɔmbɔ wo nii, ata wo otu okpee wɔ ninnaa ni kaloo ku osuku onyu biene ta sibualɛ nɔɔ oso.
53002017	Akpee ye otu ku osie alɛ obe lele biabuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu, mimbla kafɔɔ asaa biene amuu.
53003001	Kayɛntɛ nii, babiloo, bitɔɔpɛ ɔlaa bitɔɔta Yaa diisi loo alɛ, Saate ɔlaa nwu katɔɔkpɛ kuntɔɔkyɛ aba aba ku dibu fɛ mmle di aye kafɔɔ biafũ nwu nii.
53003002	Bipɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa kafɔɔ bilɛ, aadiki wo ankyeko basiensietɛ ku bakpiletɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ, diekye diele batii bamuu niefũ ɔlaa nwu beenu.
53003003	Kafɔɔ Saate nle nwaakotɛ, abakpee ye osie, andiki ye kafɔɔ ankyeko kpiletɛ nwu nnɛɛ kamɛ.
53003004	Bukpe ofũ onu di Saate kamɛ bulɛ biɔbla asaa ya buatuo ye nii, buye kafɔɔ bulɛ bibafuo okple ɔtɔɔbla onlenkeesa nkpo.
53003005	Saate omu ata ye lɛsɔnu le niɛtaka ni katoo di Yaa lɛbɔmbɔ le akpe ɛɛta wo ni ku otu okpee wɔ niekye ni Kristo nfũ.
53003006	Babiloo, buokpee ye kufiofa di Saate Yesu Kristo leyooto kamɛ bulɛ, biblasa suoto di bafũbanutɛ ba ninle ni bakyɔkɔ manamufũ asaatuo ya buotuo ye ni baklee ni.
53003007	Aye bamu biye nwaa bilɛ dikpe ni biɛbla ɔkpɛ fɛ mmle buɔbla nii, diekye butabla nkyɔkɔ di obe wɔ buawɛ ni kaamɛ lee.
53003008	Butale kuonwii alesaa alɛ butata koto. Nioso buabla ɔkpɛ osie kanya kakũ ku kakyɛ alɛ bulakple atoo butika di otii kuonwii suoto.
53003009	Diele alɛ bunaa osuku alɛ bianyu wo ni kanya oso butata ye biabla nkpo. Kafɔɔ buabla bulɛ buɔyɔ muntuo ye alɛ ayee, biabla nkpo.
53003010	Nse bianyuma, obe wɔ buawɛ ni di ɔkyɛ lee, buatɔkɔ ye bulɛ otii wɔ niesĩ ni ɔkpɛ ɔbla ninnle.
53003011	Buobuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle diekye buonu alɛ bakyɔkɔ bawo nsi ye kaamɛ boosĩ ni ɔkpɛ ɔbla kafɔɔ bɔɔplɛplɛ baatii sɛkpɛ suoto.
53003012	Buokpee batii ba mmle kufiofa osie kanya di Saate Yesu Kristo leyooto kamɛ, munka ma kafɔɔ bulɛ, balolaa nkpa basiɛ, baamufũ sɛkpɛ babla banyu suoto.
53003013	Kafɔɔ aye, babiloo, bitanta nnɛɛ lafee ye di dibiene ɔbla kamɛ.
53003014	Nse otii owo diɛkyɔɔ ɔlaa wɔ buɔɔtɔkɔ ye ni kotoko di kukũ ko mmle kamɛ, biɛtɛ nwɔ nsũ, bitansimbla onwii ku nnwɔɔ, mmle sinnunsɔ kakpɛ nwɔ nii.
53003015	Bitambla nwɔ fɛ lo lee ale. Kafɔɔ, bisĩ ɔlaa bitɔɔ fɛ obilee.
53003016	Nioso, Saate wɔ ninta ni atoko ɔkyɛ ole omu, ata ye atoko ɔkyɛ ole lɛsaa biala ɔbla kamɛ. Saate asiɛko bamuu lee.
53003017	Ami, Paulo omu, niɛyɔ kɔnɛɛ lɛkpana ɔklaa kukũ ko mmle. Nkpo ninkpee kɔnɛɛ di kukũ nii biala lɛkpana kamɛ nɛ. Ami omu kɔkpana ninle nko mmle nɛ.
53003018	Saate Yesu Kristo sibualɛ disiɛko bamuu lee.
54001001	Ami, Paulo wɔ ninle ni Yesu Kristo tɔkyɛntɛ diefe ni di Yaa dikitɛ loo ku Kristo Yesu suoto wɔ buotika ni anu, niɛkpana kukũ ko mmle,
54001002	nta afɔ Timoteo, obi nii bɔmbɔtɛ di ofũ onu kamɛ. Yaa Ote ku Saate Yesu Kristo, bale fɔ sibualɛ, baanya fɔ nyaami, baata fɔ atoko ɔkyɛ ole.
54001003	Komiɛ nlɛ fasiɛ di Efeso, fɛ mmle okle latɔkɔ fɔ ni di obe wɔ latofe ni Makedonia. Diekye batii bawo nkpe ninfa bootuo ni asaa otuo lalaale di Yesu Kristo ofũ onu suoto. Dikpe nii, feesĩ ɔlaa fɛɛta ma di asaa otuo lalaale nwu nkpo suoto, beediɛ.
54001004	Tɔkɔ ma falɛ badiɛ obe ɔlalaasa di sekofolaa se beewola bɛɛtɛ ni kpɔkpɔtɔ kpɔkpɔtɔ ku ana ɔyɔ ɔtɔɔkanta. Sɛlaa ɔnanfi ko ninkyeko ninwako, nínta Yaa dibiesaa diwa kaanya, dile ni Yaa dibiesaa di ofũ onu kamɛ.
54001005	Lɛsaa le oso kokpee fɔ ni kufiofa ko mmle ninle alɛ, bafũbanutɛ bamuu lee ba ninkpe ni ninfa kayii ku lɛbɔmbɔ le niekye ni otu biene kamɛ, ku otu wɔ ninanlo ni lɛpɔɔ ku ofũ onu biene.
54001006	Kafɔɔ batii bawo ntookple di lɛsaa le mmle kamaa, beeyu osuku, batikanko sɛlaakuu ɔnanfi.
54001007	Boomiɛ alɛ bakple Mose kufiofa batuotɛ, kafɔɔ baanu sɛlaa se boobuɛ ni kasɔ. Nu mankakatɛ di Mose kufiofa nwu suoto ku okyiini.
54001008	Buye bulɛ Mose kufiofa nwu nlɛ, nse otii lɛbla ko kũ ɔkpɛ fɛ mmle di Yaa komiɛ nii.
54001009	Dikpe nii, buonyuma kafɔɔ bulɛ, diele batii biene oso mankpee kufiofa, kafɔɔ batokopĩtɛ ba ninyila ni di Yaa kufiofa suoto ku bakpileblatɛ, ku mba ninanyɛkɛ ni Yaa, ku batii ba ninanklekle nii ku anunsɔsaa bablatɛ beeyii ni ku asaakuu ɔbla, manantikanko ni ofũ onu kuonwii, ku batii ba ninlo ni bate lɛma ku baya lɛma ku batii bamba ku batii balotɛ oso.
54001010	Ku basɔnɔkpeetɛ, basuɔtɔ ba ninteko ni basuɔtɔ wo lɛma, batii ba ninnyu batii mansunsũ nii, balaatɛ, ku mba ninlaa manlɛɛ ni asaa osie kanya, ku batii ba ɔsaabla ninankyɛkyɛ ni ku asaatuo biene nwu, mma ninle batii ba bɛɛta ni kufiofa nwu nɛ.
54001011	Asaatuo ya mmle nsi di ɔlaa biene wɔ di Yaa lɛyɔ eekpee mi ni di nnɛɛ kamɛ alɛ mbuɛ nii, ɔlaa biene wɔ niekye ni Yaa leklekle kamɛ. Nwu kafɔɔ buɔtansa nɛ.
54001012	Kɔpɛ Saate loo Yesu Kristo sɛfa di osie wɔ ɛɛtɛɛ ni di ɔkpɛ nii ɔbla kamɛ. Nnwɔɔ niɛsɔ mi eenyu ni ɛɛnya alɛ nwaako nlɛ, ni eediki mi alɛ mbla nwɔ ɔkpɛ nɛ.
54001013	Kuntɛ obe wɔ nintɔbafe nii, labuɛ sɛlaa kpile di suoto nɔɔ, latikanko batii nɔɔ, latufa nwɔ, kafɔɔ Yaa lanyɛɛ nyaami. Diekye di obe nwu kamɛ, ntafũ nwɔ lanu, ntatofo kafɔɔ lɛsaa le latɔɔbla nii.
54001014	Kafɔɔ Saate loo lele mi sibualɛ kpinwu, ɛtɛɛ kafɔɔ ofũ onu ku lɛbɔmbɔ di Yesu Kristo onwii ɔbla kamɛ.
54001015	Nwaako ɔlaa ninle nwɔ mmle, dikpe ni batii bamuu nfũ mannu nii. Yesu Kristo lawa kayi ka mmle alɛ ɔɔbadiki batii siikpile lɛma kamɛ, ami ninle bakpileblatɛ ɔnɔɔfo.
54001016	Kafɔɔ Yaa lanyɛɛ nyaami, alɛ Yesu Kristo kawɛ otu ɔtɛ kaasɔ niimu kamɛ anta ami, bakpileblatɛ ɔnɔɔfo alɛ, kale ɔyɔ ɔtɛ onyu ɔta bakpileblatɛ ba nikɔwa nwɔ ni ofũ onu alɛ baawɛ ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
54001017	Nioso bita buyɔ katansa ku dibu buta Yaa kafa ɔka wɔ ninnaa ni kaloo, mananya ni, leete nɔɔ ninle ni ɔka. Diwa kaanya.
54001018	Obi nii Timoteo, kokpee fɔ kufiofa ko mmle diefe ni di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ sɛlaa se baabuɛ ni di suoto lɛfɔ baalesa ni katũ. Mufũ sɛlaa se mmle faklee, faakpɛ Saate kakpɛ biene nwu.
54001019	Faamufũ ofũ onu lɛfɔ faklee osie kanya di Yesu kamɛ, ku otu biene wɔ nintɔkɔ ni otii ɔlaa. Diekye batii bawo diɛkyɔɔ otu lɛma wɔ nintɔkɔ ma ni ɔlaa kotoko, nioso beeyu ofũ onu lɛma osuku.
54001020	Batii ba mmle bawo ninle Himeneo ku Aleksandro nɛ. Lɛyɔ ma lekpee di Abonsam nnɛɛ kamɛ, alɛ baatofo alɛ diɛlɛ alɛ baabuɛ mbusuo sɛlaa di Yaa suoto.
54002001	Lɛsaa kasale komiɛ nlɛ biatɔɔbla ni ninle alɛ, biatikiti lekoto baatii bamuu disi, biapɛ ɔlaa minta Yaa diisi lɛma, biakaalɛ abiesaa lɛma minta ma, mimpɛ Yaa kafɔɔ sɛfa diisi lɛma.
54002002	Bipɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa kafɔɔ di baka disi ku batii ba bamuu nin-yɛ ni di nyilakɔ kplɛ, alɛ buasiɛ di atoko ɔkyɛ ole ku suoto lɛyɔɔ kamɛ, alɛ buafuo Yaa osumu ku dibu di sisuku simuu suoto di nkpa biene osiɛ kamɛ.
54002003	Nle mmle ɔbla nlɛ, nimbuo Yaa Dikitɛ loo kafɔɔ anu.
54002004	Diekye oomiɛ alɛ batii bamuu bawɛ didiki baatofo nwaako ɔlaa nɔɔ nwu.
54002005	Yaa onwii ko ninkpe, Kpanaatɛ onwii kafɔɔ ko ninkpe, oololaa ni Yaa ku batii ntɛɛ. Nnwɔɔ ninle Kristo Yesu nɛ.
54002006	Otii wɔ niayɔ suoto aata ni fɛ oleɔta di batii bamuu disi. Nni niale obe wɔ nikotuo alɛ Yaa latɛ alɛ, batii bamuu kawɛ ni didiki nɛ.
54002007	Nioso di Yaa lekpee mi fɛ tɔkyɛntɛ ku saatuotɛ di batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii nfũ, alɛ kayie ofũ onu ɔlaa biene nwu ku nwaako ɔlaa nwu lɛkya. Diele ɔlaa kɔlaa, nwaako kobuɛ.
54002008	Di bafũbanutɛ kasiisakɔ yi, komiɛ nlɛ basuɔtɔ katɔɔpɛ ɔlaa mantɔɔta Yaa, basuɔtɔ ba niediɛ suoto bɛɛta ni Yaa leeklekle kamɛ, baafuo ni nnɛɛ klekle lɛma katoo okplesa, di ɔblɔ ku ɔlaa ɔnanfi dilabasiɛ ni kaamɛ.
54002009	Komiɛ kafɔɔ nlɛ basanko kalolaa mannyu di asaa lɛma oklee suoto, ninamale ni ninuntofo. Ditanle kafɔɔ asi ɔbla sikitii ku sika asaa ate ate ya niefũ ni kɔya okpee ku abula ya niefũ ni kɔya oklee.
54002010	Kafɔɔ, nkpa biene osiɛ kadiki ma kayi fɛ basanko ba nintikanko ni Yaa.
54002011	Basanko bamuu kawakosa suoto kasɔ, manlo kanana mantekete asaa.
54002012	Ninta basanko osuku nlɛ baatuo asaa, manle sɛsaate baasuɔtɔ suoto. Nioso bamaasa nnya kloklo.
54002013	Diekye Adam di Yaa laka ɔbla fiɛ aabla Eva.
54002014	Mia kafɔɔ diele Adam di Abonsam nwu lakyɔnkyɔ, ɔsanko aakyɔnkyɔ, ni aatɔɔ aabla okpile nɛ.
54002015	Kafɔɔ ɔsanko mataka kaalofokɔ, nse eesiɛ nkpa biene di ofũ onu ku lɛbɔmbɔ ku leklekle kamɛ.
54003001	Ɔlaa obuɛ wɔ mmle nte nkpo alɛ, nse otii owo komiɛ alɛ ale bafũbanutɛ tunletɛ, ɔkpɛ nwaa eediki.
54003002	Yaa babi tunletɛ yi, dikpe nii anle otii wɔ baatii ninankakatɛ nwɔ ni di suoto, an-yɔ ɔsanko onwii, anle numbentɛ, anle otii wɔ ninkpee ni otu, anle otii wɔ baatii mbu nii. Dikpe nii antofo mmle manfũ ni bafɔɔ ku otii wɔ ninfuo ni asaa otuo.
54003003	Dinaa alɛ anle tasiɛntɛ, ku otii wɔ ninantɛ ni suoto kaasɔ. Dikpe nii anle otii wɔ niɛyɔɔ nii, ambɔmbɔ ni suoto lɛyɔɔ. Dinaa alɛ anle otii wɔ nimbɛbɛɛ ni anu kooto suoto.
54003004	Dikpe nii anle otii wɔ nikofuo ni leyo nɔɔ batii onyu nwaa, anta babi nɔɔ mbu nwɔ nii, mankyɔɔ nwɔ ni ɔlaa kotoko.
54003005	Nse otii owo diloofuo nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ leyo onyu, lɛ abafuo bafũbanutɛ oklee anleko ma katũ?
54003006	Dinaa alɛ bafũbanutɛ tunletɛ lele otii fɔle wɔ ninayimuɔ ni di ofũ onu kamɛ, alɛ silaatu nwɔ atakatɛsa suoto katoo alalaa fɛ mmle di Abonsam labla nii, dikple nwɔ letokonanfi.
54003007	Dikpe nii anle otii wɔ baatii ba ninansi ni kaasiisakɔ nɔɔ kobu nii, mmle okle manakpee nwɔ ni sinunsɔ alaabuo ni di Abonsam okũ wɔ ɛɛkyɔɔ ɛɛtɛ ni kamɛ.
54003008	Nkpo kafɔɔ, dikpe nii, bafũbanutɛ kasiisakɔ bakyakaakotɛ kale batii ba ninkpe ni nkpa biene nɛ. Mammufũ ɔkpɛ nwu mambla osie kanya. Balaale batii ba ninyi ni nta kpinwu mansiɛ ni ku koto banumbɛbɛɛtɛ
54003009	Dikpe ni kafɔɔ beemufũ ofũ onu ɔlaa biene nwu beediki ni kayi beeklee osie kanya ku otu biene wɔ nintɔkɔ ni otii ɔlaa.
54003010	Kafɔɔ fiɛ baadiki ma ni fɛ kasiisakɔ bakyakaakotɛ, dikpe nii mansɔ ma mannyu nse beewo fiɛ baata ma ɔkpɛ nwu mambla.
54003011	Basɔfɔ lɛma kafɔɔ, dikpe ni beele basanko ba ninkpe ni nkpa biene. Dinaa alɛ beele batii ba nimbuɛ ni batii suoto sɛlaa. Nioso dikpe ni beele basanko ba nimmufũ suoto manklee nii, manlolaa asaa amuu mambla nii.
54003012	Kasiisakɔ kyakaakotɛ yi, dikpe ni ɔsanko onwii an-yɔ, anlolaa babi nɔɔ ku leyo nɔɔ batii bamuu anklee nwaa.
54003013	Bakyakaakotɛ ba ninlolaa sɛkpɛ lɛma mambla ni nwaa, manwɛ dibu mankyeko batii nfũ. Nkpo oso manwɛ sɛkambi mankakatɛ di Yesu Kristo ofũ onu ɔlaa suoto manta batii.
54003014	-
54003015	Kuntɛ kɔkpana ɔlaa wɔ mmle nkyesee fɔ, konyu osuku nlɛ di obe kakui kamɛ mawa manya fɔ. Kafɔɔ nse kokpi kamaa ku ɔwa, kukũ ko mmle mata fɔ fantofo mmle okle dikpe ni batii kasiɛ ni nkpa di Yaa leyo, dile ni batii ba niefũ Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa beenu nii. Mma ninle lɛsɔse ku lɛkpaka le ninkle ni nwaako ɔlaa nwu nɛ.
54003016	Yaa owofalaa wɔ beediki ni kanyi buofũ buonu nii, lemuɔ. Kuonwii kafɔɔ dilabafuo nwu osĩ. Nnwu nile alɛ, “Saate nwu ladiki suoto aatuo di otii letembi kanya. Yaa Ninwuna ladiki nwɔ aatuo alɛ ale otii klekle. Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ lanyɔɔ. Batii labuɛ nwɔ ɔlaa di nnle mmuu kamɛ. Batii kpinwu kaayi lafũ nwɔ baanu. Yaa lakpaa nwɔ aasifiko osi di leklekle kamɛ.”
54004001	Yaa Ninwuna ladiki aabuɛ klekle alɛ, di ayi yɛntɛle kamɛ, batii bawo masĩ ofũ onu ɔlaa nwu, mantikanko kayɔnkyɔ anwuna ku anwuna kpile asaa otuo.
54004002	Asaa otuo ya mmle makye balaatɛ ku bafũnuntɛ nfũ, ambiɛ ambuo kaayi. Batii ba mmle situ se nintɔkɔ ni otii ɔlaa ntookpi fɛ lɛbɔɔsaa filale bɛɛyɔ beefiɛ ma situ.
54004003	Batii ba mmle mantuo alɛ diɛlɛ alɛ baayɔ ɔsanko. Mantuo kafɔɔ alɛ diɛlɛ alɛ baale alesaa awo. Kafɔɔ Yaa niɛbla alesaa nwu alɛ, batii ba niefũ nwaako ɔlaa nɔɔ nwu beenu ni batikanko nwɔ ni kale mampɛ sɛfa.
54004004	Lɛsaa lele di Yaa lɛbla dilɛ, blaasĩ kuninwii, nioso dikpe nii manfũ amuu mampɛ Yaa sɛfa.
54004005	Diekye Yaa ɔlaa ku ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta Yaa di sɛfa ɔpɛ kamɛ, nkleklesa alesaa nwu.
54004006	Nse feetuo babilee asaa ya mmle, ni fabakple Yesu Kristo kpɛmblatɛ biene, bɛɛnanfi ni di nwaako ofũ onu kamɛ. Ni fatikanko asaa otuo biene.
54004007	Nioso tankyɔɔ sekofolaa ku akakatɛ ya ninanta otii latofo ni Yaa atoko. Yɔ Yaa ɔlaa fananfi suoto fata nkpa biene osiɛ.
54004008	Suoto osie lɛnanfi lefĩ, kafɔɔ Ninwuna kamɛ suoto ɔnanfi lefũ kɔya dilenke amuu. Diekye ninwako letota biene di nkpa be mmle kamɛ ku nkpa be kafɔɔ ninkpe ni kaakpimaa kamɛ.
54004009	Nwaako ɔlaa ninle nwɔ mmle dikpe ni batii bamuu lefũ beenu nii.
54004010	Buokpee okyiini mumbla ɔkpɛ osie kanya. Diekye buɔyɔ osuku onyu loo buokpee di Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa kamɛ, nwɔ ninle ni batii bamuu dikitɛ, kyenkye mba niefũ nwɔ beenu nii.
54004011	Asaa ya mmle dikpe ni feetuo ma bɛɛbla nɛ.
54004012	Tanta otii kuonwii lanyu fɔ sinunkɔnkɔ ta fale ni okosopo oso. Nioso, nyu falɛ lɛkakatɛ lɛfɔ, nkpa disiɛbi lɛfɔ, lɛbɔmbɔ lɛfɔ, ofũ onu lɛfɔ ku nkpa klekle lɛfɔ osiɛ lele ɔtɛ onyu diɛta bafũbanutɛ.
54004013	Nyu falɛ fɛɛtɔɔka Yaa ɔlaa fɛɛtɔɔta bafũbanutɛ se beesi. Faatɔɔka bamuu lɛma, faatootuo ma asaa diɛlaase di obe wɔ lɛwa ni.
54004014	Tansĩ Ninwuna kamɛ lɛtasaa le ninsi fɔ ni kaamɛ ɔkpɛ ɔblako. Nle baayɔ baata fɔ ni di obe wɔ di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ labuɛ nii, di banɔɔfo latika fɔ ni nnɛɛ di suoto.
54004015	Ta disibu lɛfɔ ditika di nle mmle suoto, faatɔɔbla ni obe lele, mmle okle baatii bamuu manya, mantofo ni nkpa lɛfɔ biene osiɛ sitũ ɔkyɛ.
54004016	Lolaa suoto ku asaa otuo lɛfɔ fanyu nwaa. Klee asaa otuo nwu osie kanya, diekye nse fɛɛbla nkpo, ni fabadiki suoto lɛfɔ ku batii ba nikonu fɔ ni ɔlaa nkpa.
54005001	Tansĩ ɔlaa faata ɔnɔɔfo ku ɔblɔ. Kafɔɔ kakatɛ fatɔɔ fɛ mmle fabakakatɛ fanta ni teefɔ ku suoto kasɔ ɔwakosa. Faaklee bakosopo fɛle babilee suɔtɔbi.
54005002	Faaklee basanko nɔɔfo fɛle baya lɛfɔ. Faaklee bakpeele kafɔɔ fɛle babilee sankobi, diɛ leklekle le niewo ni kamɛ.
54005003	Lolaa bakpisɔfɔ ba ninnaa ni bakyakaakotɛ faklee ku dibu.
54005004	Kafɔɔ nse kpisɔfɔ owo nkpe babi ee bawa, lɛkasale, mma dikpe nii mantekete batii lɛma onyu laayo, mannyu kafɔɔ balofotɛ lɛma fɛ mmle kule ni bafũbanutɛ ɔkpɛ. Nle mmle kafɔɔ nimatuo alɛ, boodiki balofotɛ lɛma kɔlɛɛ nɛ. Nle mmle ɔbla nle lɛsaa le nimbuo ni Yaa anu.
54005005	Kafɔɔ kpisɔfɔ wɔ ninnaa ni kyakaakotɛ, n-yɔ anu nɔɔ antika di Yaa suoto, ampɛ ɔlaa anta Yaa kakũ ku kakyɛ, diekye oomiɛ alɛ Yaa kakyakaako nwɔ.
54005006	Kafɔɔ kpisɔfɔ wɔ niɛyɔ suoto ɛɛta ni nkpa ole, ntookpi di Yaa anu kuntɛ asi nkpa.
54005007	Sĩ ɔlaa fata ma di ɔsaabla wɔ mmle suoto, mmle okle di batii dilabakakatɛ ma ni di suoto.
54005008	Kafɔɔ nse otii owo kaamɛ lee lesĩ alɛ oloonyu banatii nɔɔ, kyenkye manko mba ninsi nii, bale nwɔ ni balofotɛ, ni bitofo bilɛ atooyu ofũ onu osuku nwu, ni atɔɔlalaa kafɔɔ anlenke otii wɔ ninanfũ anu nii.
54005009	Tan-yɔ kpisɔfɔ wɔ ninayifũ alenkee ni alɛɛ afosi akuɔ leyooto faakpee di bakpisɔfɔ ayooto kamɛ. Diɛkyakaa nii, nyu falɛ kpisɔfɔ wɔ niayɔ ni kɔsa kunwii leyooto ko faakpee di bakpisɔfɔ kukũ kamɛ.
54005010	Dikpe nii anle otii wɔ batii nlɛɛ nwɔ ni leyooto biene di ɔkpɛ nɔɔ biene ɔbla oso. Dikaatɛ kafɔɔ alɛ aale ɔsanko wɔ nielolaa babi ɛɛnanfi ni nwaa, anfũ ni bafɔɔ kafɔɔ. Dikpe ni eele ɔsanko wɔ ninkpe ni sifutulɛ di bafũbanutɛ wo nɔɔ suoto, ankyakaako ni batii di abuo lɛma kamɛ, ɛɛyɔ nkpa nɔɔ ɛɛta ni dibiene ɔbla.
54005011	Tankpee bakpisɔfɔ ba ninayibe ni ayooto di bakpisɔfɔ kukũ kamɛ. Diekye nse kɔsa ɔyɔ nkle ma ɔkɔnsɔ, babakple di Kristo nkpaamaa, mansifi manaayɔ basa bamba.
54005012	Nle mmle mata ma mandiɛ ntam be ninsi ni manko Yaa ntɛɛ manlo ma lɛpɔɔ.
54005013	Di nle mmle kamaa, babakple bakyɔkɔ, manlalaasa obe lɛma mantookyi batii ayo mantoobuɛ batii sɛlaa, mantɔɔkakatɛ di batii sɛkpɛ suoto, mambuɛ sɛlaa se ninankaatɛ alɛ baabuɛ nii.
54005014	Nioso, komiɛ nlɛ bakpisɔfɔ ba ninayibe nii baayɔ asa, manlofo babi, mannyu ma, mmle okle ninamata alɛ bakyiditɛ loo kawɛ osuku mankakatɛ wo ni di suoto kpɔnɔnfɔɔ.
54005015	Diekye bakpisɔfɔ bawo ntookple nkpaamaa batikanko Abonsam.
54005016	Nse bakpisɔfɔ nkpe di bafũbanutɛ sanko owo leyo, nnwɔɔ dikpe nii annyu ma alɛ alaayɔ atoo nwu atika di bafũbanutɛ suoto. Mmle okle di bafũbanutɛ dikudi nwu kafɔɔ mafuo ni bakpisɔfɔ ba ninnaa ni bakyakaakotɛ onyu.
54005017	Bafũbanutɛ batunletɛ ba nikololaa ɔkpɛ mambla nii, dikpe nii, bɛɛta ma koto ko niɛkyɛ ni sitũ sɛɛnyɔ kamɛ ku dibu. Kyenkye mba nintuo ni asaa, mambuɛ ni ɔlaa biene nwu kafɔɔ.
54005018	Diekye beebuɛ Kɔɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “Tannii bɔkɛɛ wɔ ninkyakaako manfiɛlɛ ni alesaa kanya, nse ɔɔbla ɔkpɛ koofe.” Diekye, “Kpɛmblatɛ dikpe nii, mantɔɔ koto.”
54005019	Nse otii owo lɛwako fɔ lɛnyabudi di tunletɛ owo suoto yi, tanfũ ɔlaa nwu faanu, diediki feenu ɔlaa nwu feekyeko batii banyɔ ee batiɛ nfũ fiɛ.
54005020	Batii ba nikɔbla ni sikpile yi, dikpe ni feediki ma kayi, feesĩ ɔlaa fɛɛta ma di bafũbanutɛ bamuu anu. Ni, dibata batii bule nyɛkɛ okpile ɔbla.
54005021	Nioso kɔka fɔ, nkpee fɔ kufiofa di Yaa ku Yesu Kristo ku Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ anu nlɛ, faamufũ afiofa ya mmle fanklee osie kanya, alɛ flaanyu otii kuonwii di anu di lɛsaa lele fɔɔbla kamɛ.
54005022	Tɛ suoto, tantaka nkyenkye faatika otii kuonwii nnɛɛ di suoto, fase nwɔ sɛnɔɔfo faata Yaa ɔkpɛ. Tanyila bakpileblatɛ kamaa, bla suoto klekle.
54005023	Ta kafutu lɛfɔ ofiɛ oso, tantɔkɔ falɛ footoonyi ntu lete. Dilɛ alɛ faatoonyi nta kɛɛkɛkɛɛkɛ, ta mmle foofiɛ ni wlawla oso.
54005024	Batii bawo sikpile nte temple diotuo alɛ batookpi lɛpɔɔ bɛɛta ni lɛkanko. Batii bawo kafɔɔ sele sɛmaa fiɛ sibadie ma kayi.
54005025	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di asaa biene ɔbla nte temple nɛ, bia nnya mɔnɔnya nii, dilabawofa diidii, abadie kayi.
54006001	Tɔkɔ bafũbanutɛ ba ninle ni balanle falɛ baayɔ dibu le niesiɛko ni manta basaate lɛma, alɛ otii kuonwii dilawɛ osuku akakatɛ di asaa otuo loo ku Yaa leyooto suoto.
54006002	Diɛkaatɛ alɛ balanle ba baasaate lɛma nle ni bafũbanutɛ, balanle nwu dilaabu ma ta babilɛma bale ni di Yesu kamɛ oso. Dikpe nii, manwakosa suoto kasɔ mankyakaako ma nwaa. Diekye basaate ba nikɔwɛ ni lɛkyakaako di sɛkpɛ lɛma ɔbla kamɛ, bafũbanutɛ ku babɔmbɔtɛ bale fɛ mma. Dikpe nii feetuo asaa ya mmle feekpee ma osie bɛɛbla nya.
54006003	-
54006004	Otii lele nietuo lɛsaa bamba le ninankaatɛ ni ku Saate Yesu Kristo nwaako ɔlaa nwu suoto, otii nwu kɔtakatɛsa suoto katoo ananye ni lɛsalɛsaa. Sɛlaa ɔnanfi, nsĩ ankyeko anwako nɛ. Nle mmle nwako onumbɛbɛɛ, kalɔ, katufa, disibu kpile di batii suoto,
54006005	Ku sɛlaa ɔnanfi ɔklɛsa. Nni nintikanko batii ba di disibu lɛma diloosimbla ni ɔkpɛ nwaa, batookple ni ɔlaa biene nwu nkpaamaa. Batii ba mmle nnyu alɛ Yaa ofũ onu nle koto ɔwɛ sisuku.
54006006	Kafɔɔ, se anu lɛsɛɛ otii di Yaa ɔkpɛ ɔbla suoto di asaa ya ninkpe nwɔ ni lebuo nwɔ anu yi, nimakple fɛ saawɛntɛ ale.
54006007	Diekye fɛ mmle baalofo wo nii, butaklee lɛsalɛsaa buawako ni kayi, se buokpi kafɔɔ, nkpo okle munamayɔ lɛsalɛsaa busifiko nɛ.
54006008	Nioso, se nle buaklee ni ku nle buale ni nkpe wo, bita dipɔ wo.
54006009	Kafɔɔ batii ba di anu nsɛɛ ma ni di koto ɔwɛ suoto, nnɔɔ mambuo di Abonsam okũ wɔ ɛɛkyɔɔ ɛɛtɛ ma ni kamɛ. Ninta alɛ mambuo di asaakuu ɔbla kamɛ, ku suoto sina sikpile ɔkɔnsɔ akleesaa ya ninta otii mbuo ni di kalalaa ku kawɔɔ kamɛ.
54006010	Diekye sikpile simuu kataakɔ ninle koto ɔnumbɛbɛɛ. Diekye koto ɔbɔmbɔ oso, batii bawo ntooyu ofũ onu osuku nwu. Nkpa lɛma kafɔɔ ntoobuo di abuo kamɛ.
54006011	Kafɔɔ afɔ, Timoteo, obe wɔ fatɔɔyɔ suoto fɛɛta ni Yaa oso, toso asaa kpile ya mmle amuu. Faatikanko lɛsaa biene ɔbla. Faatikanko Yaa di ofũ onu kamɛ, faawɛ lɛbɔmbɔ, faawɛ otu faklee batii di suoto kasɔ ɔwakosa kamɛ.
54006012	Kpɛ kakpɛ biene di ofũ onu kamɛ. Faawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo, nkpa be oso di Yaa lɛlɛɛ fɔ ni di obe wɔ faadiki ofũ onu lɛfɔ faabuɛ ni di bafũbanutɛ kpinwu anu.
54006013	Di Yaa wɔ ninta ni asaa amuu nkpa anu ku Yesu Kristo wɔ niadiki ofũ onu nɔɔ aabuɛ ni di Pontio Pilato anu, kokpee fɔ kufiofa ko mmle.
54006014	Nlɛ faaklee kofiofa ko mmle osie kanya alɛ, otii kuonwii dilaawɛ ɔlaa kpile kuonwii abuɛ di suoto lɛfɔ diɛlaase di obe wɔ di Saate Yesu Kristo makple anwa nii.
54006015	Yaa mata Yesu Kristo nkple anwa lɛnyɔɔfa di obe wɔ ninlɛ nwɔ nii. Yaa wɔ leete nɔɔ ninlenke nii, ale ni baka Ɔka ku basaate Saate. Nnwɔɔ buɔtansa nɛ.
54006016	Lete nɔɔ ninle Yaa wɔ ninamakpi ni diidii, asi ni di leklekle le di otii kuonwii dilaafuo ni ɔtɛɛtɛɛ. Kuonwii diinyɔɔ, kuonwii kafɔɔ dilabafuo nwɔ ɔnya. Katansa ku osie ninle nwɔ lele, dinaa ni kaloo. Diwa kaanya.
54006017	Tɔkɔ batii ba ninle ni basaawɛntɛ kaayi ka mmle falɛ batantakatɛsa suoto katoo ee bayɔ osuku onyu lɛma batika di ato lɛma ya nimawɔɔ ni suoto. Kafɔɔ bayɔ osuku onyu lɛma batika di Yaa suoto. Diekye nnwɔɔ ninta wo abiesaa loo amuu di sifutulɛ nɔɔ kamɛ alɛ suoto kayɔɔ wo.
54006018	Tɔkɔ ma falɛ babla dibiene, baata sɛkpɛ biene lɛma ɔbla dikple ma lɛsaawɛ. Baata batii asaa ku sifutulɛ.
54006019	Se bɛɛbla nle mmle, ni boosiisa akesinɔsaa mantɛ suoto di kɔsɛɛ ko nikɔwa nii. Ni babawɛ nkpa biene be nikɔwa nii.
54006020	Timoteo, lolaa lɛsaa le di Yaa lɛyɔ eekpee fɔ ni di nnɛɛ kamɛ faklee nwaa. Tankpɔtɔɔ di sɛlaakuu obuɛ ku sɛlaa ɔnanfi kamɛ, di batii bawo konyu alɛ, nni ninle ni lɛsaatofo.
54006021	Diekye batii bawo ntooyu ofũ onu osuku nwu ta abuusaa ya mmle otikanko oso. Yaa sibualɛ disiɛko ye.
55001001	Ami, Paulo, di Yaa sibualɛ kamɛ nle ni Yesu Kristo tɔkyɛntɛ, nfũ kuukũ ko mmle lekye. Beekpee mi alɛ mbuɛ ntɔkɔ batii di nkpa be suoto bɛɛka ntam bɛɛta wo ni di Yesu Kristo onwii ɔbla kamɛ.
55001002	Kɔkpana nta obi nii bɔmbɔtɛ Timoteo. Yaa Ote ku Saate loo Yesu Kristo ale fɔ sibualɛ, aanya fɔ nyaami, aata fɔ atoko ɔkyɛ ole.
55001003	Kɔpɛ Yaa wɔ ɔkpɛ kɔbla ni sɛfa fɛ mmle baawa nii labla nii. Mbla nle mmle di otu wɔ niɛkpa ni kamɛ. Mpɛ Yaa sɛfa di obe wɔ konyuma fɔ ni di ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔtɔɔ Yaa diisi lɛfɔ kakũ ku kakyɛ.
55001004	Nse lenyuma kaku ka faawi nii, mmiɛ osie kanya nlɛ kanya fɔ mmle di suoto kayɔɔ mi nii.
55001005	Ntoonyuma ofũ onu biene wɔ fakpe nii. Ofũ onu nwu okle niawɛ ɔwa lɛfɔ sanko Lois ku yaafɔ Eunike nɛ. Lefũ lenu nlɛ ofũ onu nwu okle ninkpe fɔ nɛ.
55001006	Nle mmle oso konyumasa fɔ nlɛ, faaklee lɛtasaa le di Yaa lata fɔ ni di obe wɔ latika fɔ ni nnɛɛ di suoto lapɛ ɔlaa latɔɔ nii.
55001007	Diekye Yaa diɛta wo lɛyɛkɛ ninwuna. Kafɔɔ Ninwuna le ninkpee wo ni osie, lɛbɔmbɔ ku suoto olenkee ninwuna ɛɛta wo.
55001008	Nle mmle oso tanta sinunsɔ lakpɛ fɔ di Saate ɔlaa nwu obuɛ suoto, ee sinunsɔ lakpɛ fɔ di suoto nii, ami wɔ ninle ni leyo tentɛ ta Kristo oso. Kafɔɔ lolaa suoto fata dibuo di Saate ɔlaa biene nwu obuɛ kamɛ, fɛ mmle di Yaa lɛta fɔ osie alɛ faabla ni.
55001009	Diekye nnwɔɔ Yaa niediki wo, ɛɛlɛɛ wo, ɛɛbla wo batii nɔɔ. Diele alɛ lɛsaa biene lewo buɔbla ni oso. Kafɔɔ, Yaa omu niɛtɛ ku sibualɛ nɔɔ se akpe ata wo ni oso. Eele wo sibualɛ se mmle di Saate Yesu Kristo kamɛ fiɛ bia ɛɛbla kayi.
55001010	Kafɔɔ mianfɛ di Yaa lediki sĩ kayi klekle di Dikitɛ Yesu Kristo nwu lɛwa kamɛ nɛ. Nnwɔɔ nialenkee kukpi osie, diefe ni di ɔlaa biene nɔɔ nwu kamɛ, ɛɛyɔ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo ɛɛta wo.
55001011	Yaa lɛyɔ mi ɛɛbla tɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ alɛ kale nwɔ ɔlaa biene nwu kyayientɛ ku saatuotɛ.
55001012	Nle mmle oso kɔnya dibuo nɛ. Kafɔɔ sinunsɔ dilɔɔkpɛ mi. Diekye n-ye otii wɔ lefũ lenu nii. N-ye nlɛ abafuo lɛsaa le lɛyɔ lekpee nwɔ ni ninnɛɛ kamɛ onyu nwaa ninaase di dii yɛntɛle nwu kamɛ.
55001013	Mufũ ɔlaa nwaa nwu faklee osie kanya fɛ mmle latuo fɔ ni. Faasiɛ di ofũ onu ku lɛbɔmbɔ le ninsi ni di Yesu Kristo onwii ɔbla kamɛ.
55001014	Ninwuna Klekle le ninsi wo ni kaamɛ dikpee fɔ osie alɛ, faalolaa lɛsaa biene le bɛɛyɔ beekpee fɔ ni ninnɛɛ kamɛ fanklee nwaa.
55001015	Faye falɛ bafũbanutɛ ba bamuu ninkpe ni di Asia ntoosĩ mi, bia Figelo ku Hermegene kafɔɔ nsi kaamɛ.
55001016	Saate omu anya Onesiforo ku kafaabi nɔɔ nyaami, diekye sinunsɔ dilɔɔkpɛ nwɔ di suoto nii alɛ nle leyotentɛ. Nioso obe lele ɔɔkyakaakoe osie kanya.
55001017	Obe wɔ aanya aakye okye Roma aababuo nii, ni aakyako mi owolaa dialaase di obe wɔ aanyɛɛ nii nɛ.
55001018	Saate loo anyɔɔ nyaami di lɛkankoyi nwu suoto! Faye kafɔɔ mmle okle aakyakaakoe ni di Efeso osie kanya.
55002001	Afɔ yi, obi nii, kpee osie di onwii loo ɔbla kamɛ ku Yesu Kristo sibualɛ se ɛɛta wo ni kamɛ.
55002002	Yɔ asaatuo ya faanu latuo ni di batii kpinwu anu fatuo batii ba feefũ feenu falɛ beelolaa suoto alɛ baatuo ni batii bamba kafɔɔ.
55002003	Kpee otu diibuo kamɛ, fɛ Yesu Kristo kpɛtɛ biene.
55002004	Diekye kpɛtɛ biene wɔ nikomiɛ alɛ abuo ni kakpɛ kanyayilatɛ ee saate nɔɔ anu, ninsinkpee kanya di sɛkpɛ se ninanle ni kakpɛ kanya.
55002005	Fiɛ di tosotɛ mafũ ni lelenkee letota, dikpe nii eetoso di otoso afiofa kanya.
55002006	Fekpɛntɛ wɔ niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ koofe ku okyiini, nnwɔɔ ninle kofe nɔɔ kamɛ alesaa kasale nɛ.
55002007	Bu sɛlaa se kobuɛ ni disi fanyu, diekye n-ye nlɛ, Saate nwu makyakaako fɔ faanu simuu kasɔ.
55002008	Nyuma Yesu Kristo, Otii wɔ di Yaa latakatɛsa aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ, ale ni Dawid ɔnantii. Ɔlaa nɔɔ ninle ɔlaa biene wɔ kobuɛ ni nɛ.
55002009	Ta ɔlaa biene nwu kobuɛ ni oso, ni diobuo mi nɛ. Bɛɛpɛ mi kafɔɔ lekpo fɛ otii wɔ niɛbla ni okpile. Kafɔɔ blafuo Yaa ɔlaa lekpo ɔpɛ.
55002010	Nioso kopee otu di asaa amuu kamɛ ta Yaa batii ba eediki ni oso, mmle okle nimma kafɔɔ baawɛ ni didiki le niekye ni Yesu Kristo kamɛ ninwako ni suoto lɛyɔɔ leklekle le ninnaa ni kaloo.
55002011	Nwaa ɔlaa kule alɛ, “Nse buokpi ku Yesu, ni bubasiɛ nkpa ku nnwɔɔ.
55002012	Nse buokpee otu diibuo kamɛ, ni bubale sɛka ku nnwɔɔ. Nse buosĩ nwɔ, ni nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ abasĩ wo.
55002013	Nse diɛwa alɛ buokple di ofũ onu loo kamaa, nnwɔɔ ɔlɔbakple di ntam nɔɔ kamaa, diekye nwɔɔ ɔlabafuo suoto osĩ diidii.”
55002014	Nyumasa batii lɛfɔ asaa ya mmle faasĩ ɔlaa fata ma osie kanya di Yaa anu falɛ batansinnanfi sɛlaa. Diekye nfasũ kunwii diesi kaamɛ. Ninta alɛ batii ba nikonu ye ni ofũ onu nkpi.
55002015	Kpee okyiini faabla ɔkpɛ fɛ kpɛmblatɛ wɔ nikobuo ni Yaa anu, siinunsɔ dilɔɔkpɛ ni. Faale otii wɔ nintuo ni Yaa ɔlaa nwaa fɛ mmle kute ni.
55002016	Diki suoto di seteeteelaa ku sɛlaakuu obuɛ kamɛ. Diekye batii ba nikɔbla ni asaa ya mmle okle, nimblasa ma ninkyeko Yaa nfũ fanfa.
55002017	Akakatɛ ya mmle kafɔɔ nte fɛ lekpesekɔ le ninankpi nii. Batii banyɔ kɔbla nya okle, mma ninle Himeo ku Fileto nɛ.
55002018	Batoodiɛ osuku biene nwu, bɔɔkpɔkpɔtɔsa bafũbanutɛ bawo mambuɛ alɛ, okple loo lese lɛtaka nwu ntɔɔwa kaanya kofokofoko.
55002019	Kafɔɔ, lɛsɔse le siene di Yaa ntoose nii, diidii dilabafuo otũkũ. Nni suoto bɛɛkpana sɛlaa se mmle beetika alɛ, “Saate n-ye batii ba ninle nwɔ ni bale,” ni, “Olele kafɔɔ nikobuɛ alɛ Saate ole ale, dikpe nii otii nwu lekyi eediɛ sikpile ɔbla.”
55002020	Di saawɛntɛ leyo, awansaa ate ate nwɛ. Awo koto fututu bɛɛyɔ bɛɛbla nya, awo kafɔɔ koto sɛɛle bɛɛyɔ bɛɛbla nya. Awo kɔtɛ ku sewoso bɛɛyɔ bɛɛbla nya. Awo ayi finle mamblako nya ɔkpɛ, fiɛ di awo kafɔɔ obe lele mamblako nya ɔkpɛ.
55002021	Nioso se otii owo lɛbla suoto klekle, eediki suoto eekyeko sikpile simuu kamɛ, abalɛ anta sɛkpɛ finle ɔyɔ ɔblako, diekye eelolaa suoto ɛɛta Saate nɔɔ ɔkpɛ biene ɔbla.
55002022	Nioso toso sekosopo akɔnsɔklesaa, faatikanko leklekle, ofũ onu, lɛbɔmbɔ ku atoko ɔkyɛ ole. Faasiɛ di batii ba nimpɛ ɔlaa manta ni Yaa ku otu biene kamɛ.
55002023	Kokple ntɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, tansiɛ di dibuu ku lɛsaa ɔtantofo sɛlaa bananfitɛ kamɛ, diekye faye falɛ kalɔ ko ninwako.
55002024	Diekye diɛkaatɛ alɛ Yaa kpɛmblatɛ lɛlɔ. Diekye dikpe ni anwɛ sifutulɛ anta batii bamuu, anle saatuotɛ biene, anwɛ otu ɔtɛ kaasɔ.
55002025	Batii ba kafɔɔ niɛtaka bayɛ ni di ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle suoto, dikpe nii eediki sɛlaa kasɔ ɛɛta ma ku otu buɛɛ. Loobia Yaa mata mankyisa situ, mamatofo nwaako ɔlaa nwu.
55002026	Ni dibasɛkɛtɛ ma mandie di Abonsam sikũ se ɛɛkyɔɔ eemufũ ma ɛɛbla ma ni kufiofa nɔɔ baletɛ.
55003001	Tɛ nle mmle nsũ, di ayi yɛntɛle kamɛ, amumu mata kayi mawɛ osie.
55003002	Batii mabɔmbɔ suoto lɛma lete ku koto lɛma. Babatakatɛsa suoto katoo, suoto lɛma mabuo ma anu. Babatufa batii, batii dilabasimbu balofotɛ lɛma. Batii dilabasimpɛ sɛfa, blɔbasintikanko Yaa leklekle kafɔɔ.
55003003	Batii dilabasimbla sifutulɛ, nyaami ɔnya dilabasinwɛ, ditiikpɔnɔnfɔsa mapɔ, suoto omufũ okle dilabasinwɛ, batii mayakayaka ku kakpɛ, dibiene ɔtambɔmbɔ mawɛ.
55003004	Awo kafɔɔ ninle alɛ, batii madiki bawo lɛma manta. Batii mapɛsɛwa mambla asaa diisi ɔtambu kamɛ, suoto katoo ɔtakatɛsa mata batii nnyu alɛ lete lɛma ninlenke. Batii mabɔmbɔ kafɔɔ kayi asaa manlenkee Yaa.
55003005	Batii ba mmle okle mabla fɛ Yaa batii bale, kafɔɔ beesĩ Yaa osie wɔ nikakpaa ma mansiɛ ni Yaa nkpa disiɛbi. Tambla onwii ku batii ba mmle okle.
55003006	Diekye batii ba mmle okle, mammaa mambuo batii ayo, mankyɔnkyɔ basanko ba ninanfuo ni suoto olenkee, ta beeyii ni ku sikpile ate ate siɔkpaa ma sinsifiko ni siisuku kpile suoto.
55003007	Basanko ba mmle okle kotekete asaa obe lele kafɔɔ, boloonu nwaako ɔlaa nwu kasɔ.
55003008	Fɛ mmle di Yane ku Yambri lataka baayila ni di Mose suoto, nkpo okle di balaatɛ asaa batuotɛ ba mmle lɛtaka bayɛ di nwaako ɔlaa wɔ mmle suoto nɛ. Batii ba mmle nle batii ba siikpile ntooyii ni asi kamɛ pɔ batooyu ni ofũ onu osuku nwu.
55003009	Kafɔɔ, batii ba mmle dilabakyɛ sitũ, diekye dibuu lɛma nwu madie kayi batii bamuu nnya, fɛ mmle okle diawa ni di Yane ku Yambri suoto.
55003010	Kafɔɔ afɔ yi, faye mi asaa otuo, faye mi nkpa, faye mi disitikasaa, faye mi ofũ onu, otu ɔtɛ kaasɔ, lɛbɔmbɔ, ku mmle ninkpee ni osie diɛ dibuo kamɛ.
55003011	Faye atikanko nii ku abuo nii. Faye nle niablɛɛ ni di Antiokia ku Ikonion ku Listra, ku atikanko siene ya kamɛ lafe nii. Kafɔɔ Saate nwu ladiki mi di amuu kamɛ.
55003012	Nwaako dile alɛ, batii ba bamuu nikomiɛ alɛ basiɛ ni nkpa biene di Yesu Kristo onwii ɔbla kamɛ, manwɛ abuo ku atikanko.
55003013	Kafɔɔ batii kpile ku balaatɛ asaa batuotɛ kalalaa matɔɔtaka katoo, mantɔɔkyɔnkyɔ batii. Nioso babatɔɔkyɔnkyɔ batii. Batii bamba kafɔɔ matɔɔkyɔnkyɔ ma.
55003014	Kafɔɔ afɔ, klee asaa ya beetuo fɔ ni ku lɛsaa le feefũ feenu ni osie kanya. Diekye faye basaatuotɛ lɛfɔ.
55003015	Diekye ni bia sibisɔ lɛfɔ kamɛ faye Kɔkpana Klekle nwu. Nkũ niɛbla fɔ nubentɛ diɛta didiki nɛ, diefe ni di Yesu Kristo ofũ onu kamɛ.
55003016	Yaa Ninwuna Klekle niɛkpaa batii fiɛ bɛɛkpana Kɔkpana Klekle. Nioso kulɛ kuɔta asaa otuo, ɔlaa osĩ ɔta otii, kulɛ kuɔta kalolaa, ku otii ɔnanfi ɔta nkpa klekle osiɛ.
55003017	Bɛɛkpana nwu mmle okle kualolaa Yaa otii anwo, anta ni sɛkpɛ biene simuu ɔbla.
55004001	N-yɛ di Yaa ku Yesu Kristo anu, otii wɔ nimawa amakanko ni batii ku bakpi, anle ni sɛka, nka fɔ osie kanya nlɛ,
55004002	kayaa nkpe woo, kayaa nnaa woo, kpee okyiini fadiki ɔlaa biene nwu fabuɛ. Faalolaa ma, faasĩ ɔlaa fata ma, faakpee ma ɔnyɛɛ. Nse foodiki sɛlaa kasɔ fanta ma, faanyu falɛ fɛɛtɛ otu kaasɔ.
55004003	Diekye obe owo kɔwa batii dilabasimmiɛ alɛ bɔɔkyɔɔ atoko mannu ɔlaa biene nwu. Nkpo oso babamiɛ basaatuotɛ manta suoto lɛma alɛ baatuo ma asaa ya boomiɛ alɛ boonu nii.
55004004	Babakple di ɔlaa biene nwu sɛmaa mantikanko sɛlaa se beewola bɛɛtɛ nii.
55004005	Kafɔɔ afɔ yi, klee osie kanya, faakpee otu diibuo kamɛ. Faabla Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu buɛtɛ ɔkpɛ. Faalolaa ɔkpɛ lɛfɔ omuu fabla nwaa fɛ Yaa kpɛmblatɛ.
55004006	Diekye ami yi, obe nii wɔ kakpi ndie ni kaayi ka mmle kamɛ nfɛ kowo. Babayɔ mi fɛ bɔkɛɛ manta ni Yaa ole.
55004007	Ntɔɔkpɛ kakpɛ biene, ntooloo otoso biene nwu otoso. Leklee kafɔɔ ofũ onu nii di Kristo kamɛ lɛlaase kaase.
55004008	Nioso nunua, Yaa ntoololaa Leklekle letota ɛɛtɛ mi, nle di Saate wɔ ninka ni leeklekle kamɛ mayɔ antɛɛ ni di diikplɛ le suoto abakple anwa nii. Diele lete nii abata letota le mmle. Kafɔɔ ku batii ba nikonyu osuku manta ni lekple lɛwa nɔɔ nyɔɔfa nwu.
55004009	Kpee okyiini faawa wla fabanyɛɛ.
55004010	Diekye Dema ntoosifi Tesalonika eediɛ mi ta kayi asaa lɛbɔmbɔ oso. Kreske kafɔɔ ntoosifi Galatia. Tito ntoosifi Dalmatia.
55004011	Luka lete niebu di ɔkyɛ nii. Nioso wolaa Marko faakpaa nwɔ fawako, diekye abafuo mi ɔkyakaako nwaa di ɔkpɛ wɔ kɔbla ni kamɛ.
55004012	Lekpee Tihiko nlɛ akyɛ Efeso.
55004013	Nse fɔɔwa kafɔɔ yi, yɔ lɛwɔɔfɔ awu nii ya ladiɛ ni di Karpo nfũ di Troia fawakoe. Faayɔ akũ nii fawakoe kyenkye n-ya bɛɛbla ni ku babɔkɛɛ nkunkyɛɛ.
55004014	Aleksandro wɔ ninle ni abɔɔsaa kpɛmblatɛ labla mi amumu osie kanya. Saate matɔɔ asaa ya aabla mi ni koto.
55004015	Nioso lolaa suoto fanyu di suoto nɔɔ, diekye aataka aayila osie kanya di asaa otuo loo suoto.
55004016	Obe wɔ baalɛɛ mi ni lɛka kasale alɛ ndiki ni suoto kanya, kuonwii lɛma ditayila mi kamaa, bamuu lɛma baasĩ mi. Yaa atannanfi ma kootoko, ayɔ akyɛ ma.
55004017	Kafɔɔ, Saate nwu lasiɛkoe aakpee mi osie alɛ, lafuo Saate ɔlaa biene nwu obuɛ nwaa ɔta batii ba ninanle ni Yuda batii. Yaa ladiki mi aakyeko kukpi kamɛ.
55004018	Saate nwu madiki mi ankyeko okpile lele kamɛ, abakpaa mi kafɔɔ buɛɛ anaabuoko sɛka nɔɔ kalekɔ ninle ni Yaa Kafa. Yaa lele ninle lɛtansa ku leklekle ninnaa ni kaloo. Diwa kaanya.
55004019	Kɔsɛɛsa Priskila ku Akwila kuɛ Onesiforo leyo batii bamuu.
55004020	Erasto nkpe di Korinto, Trofimo kafɔɔ kofiɛ, nkposo ladiɛ nwɔ di Mileto.
55004021	Kpee okyiini faawa fababuo fiɛ di lɛwɔɔfɔ obe diwo. Eubulo ku Pude ku Lino ku Klaudia kuɛ bafũbanutɛ bule bamuu kɔsɛɛsa fɔ biene biene.
55004022	Saate nwu aklee fɔ ninwuna. Yaa sibualɛ disiɛko ye.
56001001	Ami, Paulo, Yaa kpɛmblatɛ ku Yesu Kristo tɔkyɛntɛ, nikɔkpana kukũ ko mmle nkyesee fɔ. Yaa lediki mi eekpee mi alɛ, kakyakaako batii nɔɔ ba eediki ni ofũ onu alɛ, kakpaa ma mantofo nwaako ɔlaa biene wɔ di ofũ onu loo kotuo wo nii.
56001002	Ofũ onu ku lɛsaatofo le mmle n-yɛ di osuku onyu wɔ ninta ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo, di Yaa wɔ ninanlaa ni lɛka ntam ɛɛtɛ ni fiɛ nfɛ ɛɛbla ni kayi.
56001003	Yaa lediki nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo ɔlaa wɔ mmle kayi eetuo wo di ɔlaa nɔɔ kamɛ, di obe wɔ di nnwɔɔ omu ɛɛtɛ ni kamɛ. Nnwu ɛɛyɔ eekpee mi di nnɛɛ kamɛ kobuɛ ntɔkɔ batii nɛ. Yaa dikitɛ loo omu niekpee mi kufiofa alɛ mbuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle.
56001004	Obi nwaa bɔmbɔtɛ Tito, kɔkpana kukũ ko mmle nkyesee fɔ, diekye buɔbla onwii di ofũ onu kamɛ. Teete Yaa ku Dikitɛ loo Yesu Kristo ale fɔ sibualɛ, aata fɔ atoko ɔkyɛ ole.
56001005	Ladiɛ fɔ di Kreta ta mmle faayɛntɛ ɔkpɛ wɔ niabu ni ɔbla ninfa. Ku mmle faase ni banyayilatɛ diɛ bafũbanutɛ nsiisakɔ nwu di sekpoo nwu simuu kamɛ fɛ mmle latɔkɔ fɔ nii.
56001006	Fɛ bafũbanutɛ nyayilatɛ, dikpe nii anwɛ nkpa biene. Dikpe nii anle otii wɔ nin-yɔ ni ɔsanko onwii. Babi nɔɔ kafɔɔ kale bafũbanutɛ nwaa, banaa ni setokopĩ mambu ni balofotɛ lɛma.
56001007	Bafũbanutɛ tunletɛ wɔ nikonyu ni Yaa ɔkpɛ, dikpe ni anwɛ nkpa biene. Dinaa alɛ eele otii wɔ nintakatɛsa ni suoto katoo ee annya ni ɔblɔ wla ee ananle ni tasiɛntɛ. Dinaa kafɔɔ alɛ eele kudu kpeetɛ ku otii wɔ nimbɛbɛɛ ni anu kooto suoto.
56001008	Dikpe nii anle otii wɔ ninfũ ni bafɔɔ, ambɔmbɔ ni lɛsaa biene ɔbla, anlenkee ni suoto nɔɔ kafɔɔ. Dikpe ni anle otii wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa biene ku otii wɔ nieklekle nii. Dikpe ni anle otii wɔ kafɔɔ ninfuo ni suoto ɔnanfi.
56001009	Dikpe ni anle otii wɔ niemufũ nwaako ɔlaa wɔ buofũ buonu nii anklee osie kanya fɛ mmle buotuo nii. Mmle okle abafuo ni batii bamba otuo ankpee ma in osie, ansĩ ɔlaa anta batii ba nikɔtaka manyila ni di ɔlaa wɔ mmle suoto.
56001010	Diekye batii kpinwu nkpe bɔɔkyɔnkyɔ batii bɔɔtaka manyila di ɔlaa wɔ mmle suoto ku sibuulaa. Mia kafɔɔ batii ba nikɔbla ni asaa ya mmle nle Yuda batii.
56001011	Dikpe nii beetĩi ma osuku di asaa ya mmle okle otuo suoto, diekye bɔɔkpɔkpɔtɔsa kafaabi batii kpinwu ofũ onu. Bootuo asaa ya mmle ta koto kpile ko bɔɔwɛ mankyeko ni kamɛ oso.
56001012	Bia Kreta otii onwii dile ni mma bamu ɔlaa buɛtɛtɛ labuɛ alɛ, “Kreta batii balaatɛ bale obe lele, lepoo kamɛ babɔkɛɛ ba ninkpe ni kobe, bakyɔkɔ ku balenyatɛ bale.”
56001013	Ɔlaa wɔ mmle nte nkpo. Nkpo oso sĩ ɔlaa fata ma osie kanya alɛ baadiɛ nkpa nwu, manklee ofũ onu biene nwu.
56001014	Nle mmle mata alɛ blɔbasinkyɔɔ Yuda batii sɛlaa se beewola bɛɛtɛ ni ku batii afiofa ya bootuo ni atoko, siekye ni batii ba nintoosĩ ni nwaako ɔlaa nwu nfũ.
56001015	Asaa amuu lɛbla klekle diɛta batii ba niɛbla ni klekle. Kafɔɔ bakpiletɛ ku batii ba ninanfũ banu nii, lɛsalɛsaa dieklekle dita ma. Diekye otu wɔ nintɔkɔ ni otii ɔlaa ku asibu lɛma leyii ku sikpile.
56001016	Batii ba mmle okle mbuɛ alɛ baye Yaa kafɔɔ ɔsaabla lɛma ntuo alɛ baaye nwɔ. Bale batii bakyidi ku batokopĩtɛ, baawo bata ɔkpɛ biene kuonwii ɔbla.
56002001	Kafɔɔ afɔ yi, tuo asaa ya ninkaatɛ ni ku ofũ onu nwaa nwu.
56002002	Tuo basuɔtɔ nɔɔfo falɛ baale batii ba nikamufũ suoto manklee nii, baale banumbentɛ, ku batii ba nikata ni suoto dibu. Baale batii ba kafɔɔ ninkpe ni ofũ onu nwaa, lɛbɔmbɔ ku otu okpee.
56002003	Nkpo kafɔɔ faatuo basanko nɔɔfo alɛ baasiɛ nkpa klekle nɛ. Batanle batii ba nimbuɛ ni batii suoto sɛlaa ee baale batasiɛntɛ. Dikpe nii beele basanko ba nikatuo ni batii nkpa biene.
56002004	Baatuo bakpeele kafɔɔ mmle baabɔmbɔ ni basa ku babi lɛma.
56002005	Ku mmle baalolaa suoto manklee nii, ku mmle baabla ni suoto klekle, ku mmle baale ni basɔfɔ biene manwakosa suoto kasɔ manta ni basa lɛma. Nle mmle mata alɛ otii kuonwii dilabawɛ ɔlaa kpile kuonwii abuɛ di Yaa ɔlaa suoto.
56002006	Nkpo kafɔɔ faatuo bakosopo alɛ baalolaa suoto manklee nwaa nɛ.
56002007	Di asaa ya mmle amuu ɔbla kamɛ, dikpe nii afɔ omu lɛfɔ feele ɔtɛ onyu fɛɛta ma diɛ nkpa lɛfɔ kamɛ. Faakpee okyiini nwaa diɛ asaa lɛfɔ otuo kamɛ.
56002008	Tofo mmle faakakatɛko ni batii ku sɛlɔ biene, alɛ batii dilabayila diɛ lɛkakatɛ lɛfɔ suoto. Ni balo lɛfɔ kafɔɔ dilabawɛ ɔlaa kuonwii babuɛ wo di suoto, siinunsɔ kakpɛ ma ni.
56002009	Tuo balanle kafɔɔ alɛ baawakosa suoto kasɔ manta basaate lɛma. Baanyu alɛ ɔsaabla lɛma omuu kakpee basaate lɛma suoto lɛyɔɔ. Batankyɔɔ ma kanya kafɔɔ.
56002010	Batan-yu ma, kafɔɔ obe lele badiki batuo ma alɛ, batii biene bale, mambla asaa manta ma diɛ osuku kanya. Nle mmle mata mantofo alɛ, asaa otuo loo ya buotuo ni di Yaa Dikitɛ loo suoto, asaa otuo nwaa ale.
56002011	Diekye Yaa ntoodiki sifutulɛ nɔɔ eetuo wo di didiki le ɛɛyɔ ɛɛwako ni batii bamuu kaasɔ ka mmle suoto.
56002012	Yaa sifutulɛ se mmle ntootuo wo alɛ buasĩ nkpa kpile ku kayi ka mmle asaakuu otikanko. Buololaa suoto buklee nwaa, buosiɛ nkpa nwaa, buɔbla suoto kafɔɔ klekle kaayi ka mmle kamɛ.
56002013	Di obe wɔ busi buonyu osuku munta ni dii kplɛ le suoto, di Yaa wɔ ninlenke nii ku Dikitɛ loo Yesu Kristo mawa ni di leklekle kamɛ.
56002014	Aayɔ suoto aata diisi loo aadiki wo aakyeko sikpile loo simuu kamɛ, ɛɛbla wo batii klekle ɛɛta suoto nɔɔ lete, alɛ buawolaa osie kanya alɛ buabla lɛsaa le ninlɛ ni lete.
56002015	Tuo asaa ya mmle ku otumi wɔ di Yaa lɛta fɔ ni, faakpee batii ba ninnu fɔ ni asaa otuo ɔnyɛɛ, faasĩ ɔlaa fata batii ba kafɔɔ ninankyɛ ni di ɔlaa nwu suoto. Tanta otii kuonwii kafɔɔ lanyu fɔ sinunkɔnkɔ.
56003001	Nyumasa batii lɛfɔ bamuu falɛ bawakosa suoto kasɔ bata kale banyayilatɛ ku banɔɔfo lɛma, baanu ma ɔlaa, baalolaa suoto alɛ baabla lɛsa nwaa di sisuku simuu suoto.
56003002	Tɔkɔ ma kafɔɔ falɛ batanlɛɛ otii kuonwii leyooto kpile. Kafɔɔ bale basiɛwo di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ.Baayɔ dibu bata batii bamuu diɛ sisiku simuu suoto.
56003003	Diekye awo bamu kafɔɔ buabla abuusaa, otokopĩ ku balalaatɛ di obe wɔ nitoofe nii. Suoto sina kamɛ asaa kpile kafɔɔ laklee wo ɔkɔnsɔ saa. Bualalaasa obe loo diisi osie ɔsaabla ku onumbɛbɛɛ kamɛ. Buale balo buata batii, batii kafɔɔ lale wo balo.
56003004	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di Yaa loo ku Dikitɛ, lediki ni sifutulɛ ku lɛbɔmbɔ nɔɔ kayi,
56003005	aafũ wo. Diele alɛ loo dibiene le buɔɔbla ni oso, kafɔɔ di Yaa nyaami ɔnya kamɛ oso eediki wo, diefe ni di Ninwuna Klekle nɔɔ kamɛ. Nnwɔɔ niɛta wo lelofo fɔle ku nkpa fɔle diɛ Ninwuna Klekle ntu okpeesa kamɛ.
56003006	Yaa layɔ Ninwuna Klekle nɔɔ aakpete wo di suoto lɛɛpɔ kamɛ, diefe ni di Yesu Kristo Dikitɛ loo suoto.
56003007	Alɛ diɛ sifutulɛ nɔɔ se mmle oso, awo ku Yaa ntɛɛ kalɛ, alɛ buawɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo buonyu osuku munta nii.
56003008	Sɛlaa se mmle nte nkpo. Nioso komiɛ nlɛ faabuɛ sɛlaa se mmle fantika sĩ difuɔ alɛ, batii ba niefũ Yaa beenu nii kayɔ nwu ole osie kanya, man-yɔ obe lɛma manta sɛkpɛ biene ɔbla. Sɛkpɛ se ninlɛ ni siefũ kɔya siɛta ni batii bamuu.
56003009	Tan-yɔ suoto faakpee di babuutɛ sɛlaa ɔnanfi kamɛ, tanlalaasa obe kafɔɔ di ana ɔka otuo kamɛ, kalɔ ku Mose afiofa sɛlaa ɔnanfi. Sɛlaa se mmle okle ɔnanfi diesi kɔya bia kafuii.
56003010	Sĩ ɔlaa fata otii wɔ ninwako ni kasɛ di bafũbanutɛ ntɛɛ fɛ sɛnyɔ. Nni kamaa, faadiɛ nwɔ.
56003011	Faye falɛ otii nwu okle ntɔɔlalaa, sikpile nɔɔ kafɔɔ kotuo alɛ atoolo suoto lɛpɔɔ.
56003012	Nse lekpee Artema ee Tihiko ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ, faakpee osie faawa ɔkyɛ nii di Nikopole. Diekye nfa komiɛ nlɛ nsiɛ diɛ lɛwɔɔfɔ obe kamɛ nɛ.
56003013	Kpee osie faakyakaako Sena wɔ ninkanko ni batii ku Apolo alɛ baalolaa suoto manta osuku lɛma nwu ɔkyɛ. Faanyu falɛ bɛɛwɛ lɛsaa biala nimafĩ ma ni.
56003014	Dikpe nii bafũbanutɛ letekete mmle okle baayɔ obe lɛma manta ni lɛsaa biene le niefũ ni kɔya ɔbla. Mankyakaako batii ba kafɔɔ di asaa lefĩ nii, dinaa kafɔɔ alɛ bɛɛtɔɔbla nkyɔkɔ.
56003015	Babiloo ba ninkpe ni di ɔkyɛ nii ninfũ alɛ, bɔɔsɛɛsa ye biene biene. Bisɛɛsa bafũbanutɛ basiɛwo ba ninkpe ni ninfa bita wo. Yaa sibualɛ disiɛko bamuu lee.
57001001	Ami, Paulo, wɔ ninte ni leeyo ta Kristo Yesu oso, ku obiloo Timoteo nikɔkpana kukũ ko mmle munkyesee, afɔ Filemon siɛwo loo bɔmbɔtɛ ku kpɛmblatɛ wo loo,
57001002	ku bafũbanutɛ ba nikɔkyaka ni leeyo lɛfɔ, ku obiloo sankobi Apia ku kpɛmblatɛ wo loo Arkipo wɔ nikɔbla ni Saate ɔkpɛ osie kanya.
57001003	Teete Yaa loo ku Saate Yesu Kristo bale ye sibualɛ, baata ye atoko ɔkyɛ ole.
57001004	Obiloo Filemon, obe lele kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta Yaa nii yi, nnyuma fɔ mpɛ nwɔ sɛfa diisi lɛfɔ.
57001005	Diekye lenu mmle okle fambɔmbɔ ni Yaa bafũbanutɛ bamuu ku mmle okle feefũ Saate Yesu feenu nii.
57001006	Kɔpɛ ɔlaa nta Yaa nlɛ, onwii loo ɔbla fɛ bafũbanutɛ kata wo lɛsɔnu le niekyofo nii diɛ atasaa biene ya amuu ninkpe wo ni ninkpa kamɛ di onwii loo ɔbla ku Kristo.
57001007	Obiloo bɔmbɔtɛ, lɛbɔmbɔ lɛfɔ ntɔɔtɛɛ suoto lɛyɔɔ kplɛkplɛ ku otu okpee osie kanya. Diekye lɛbɔmbɔ lɛfɔ ntɔɔta alɛ bafũbanutɛ bamuu ntɔɔwɛ otu ote kaasɔ.
57001008	Ta nle ni obilee di Kristo kamɛ oso kafuo otu okpee ntɔkɔ fɔ fambla lɛsaa le dikpe ni fɛɛbla nii.
57001009	Kafɔɔ nimbɔmbɔ fɔ ni oso, kotikiti fɔ lekoto. Ami, Paulo, nle Kristo Yesu tɔkyɛntɛ, nunua kafɔɔ lekple nte leeyo ta nnwɔɔ oso.
57001010	Nioso kotiki lekoto di Onesimo disi. Ntɔbakple nwɔ kote di Kristo kamɛ di obe wɔ nte ni leeyo.
57001011	Kuntɛ leyooto nɔɔ lɛsɔdiki ninle kyakaakotɛ yi, saa atale lɛkyakaako kuninwii aata fɔ. Kafɔɔ nunua yi, nfɛ ale lɛkyakaako ɛɛta ami ku afɔ.
57001012	Nunua yi, kokplesa nwɔ nkyesee fɔ, obi nii bɔmbɔtɛ nwaa ale.
57001013	Se kamiɛ nlɛ awɛ di ɔkyɛ nii ninfũ, aatɔɔkyakaakoe diisi lɛfɔ fiɛ, di obe wɔ nte ni leeyo ta ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo oso.
57001014	Kafɔɔ noomiɛ nlɛ nnyinka fɔ fiɛ faatɛɛ lɛkyakaako. Komiɛ nlɛ faabla ni díekye di otu lɛfɔ kamɛ. Nkpo oso namabla lɛsalɛsaa ninanle fɔ ni dibiesaa.
57001015	Loobia Yaa nietuna alɛ Onesimo adie di ɔkyɛ lɛfɔ di obe kɛɛkɛɛ kamɛ alɛ aakple anwa amasiɛ ɔnɔmasindie ni diidii.
57001016	Nunua yi, diesinle ɔlanle ko ale. Nfɛ ale otii finile alenke ɔlanle. Nfɛ ale obilɛma bɔmbɔtɛ ata wo kyenkye ami. Kafɔɔ eekple ale otii finle ata fɔ alenke. Diekye siitiinyu, ale fɔ ɔlanle, eekple ale fɔ obilɛma suɔtɔbi di Saate kamɛ.
57001017	Nkpo oso nse foobu mi fɛ kpɛmblatɛ wo lɛfɔ, ni faafukuti nnɛɛ lɛfɔ fafũ nwɔ fɛ mmle okle fabafũ mi ni.
57001018	Nse ɛɛbla fɔ okpile owo, ee asiko fɔ koto kowo yi, faabu fatɛ mi.
57001019	Ami, Paulo, niɛyɔ kɔnɛɛ nii lɛkpana nle mmle nlɛ, kamata koto nwu nkpo. Kafɔɔ noomiɛ nlɛ nnyumasa fɔ nlɛ afɔ omu lɛfɔ fasikoe nkpa lɛfɔ koto di Kristo kamɛ.
57001020	Nkpo oso obiloo, komiɛ nlɛ fatɛɛ lɛkyakaako le mmle ta Saate oso. Bla nle mmle faata suoto siyɔɔ mi di otu kamɛ.
57001021	Lefũ lenu nlɛ lɛkpana fɔ ni kukũ ko mmle, fababla fɛ mmle okle lebuɛ nii. N-ye nlɛ fababla fanlenkeesa bia.
57001022	Diɛkyakaa nii, lolaa lɛba fatɛ mi, diekye lefũ lenu nlɛ Yaa kamata ye sɛlaa se simuu bitɔɔpɛ biɛtɔɔ ni ntale, anta mandiɛ mi nkple nwa ɔkyɛ lee.
57001023	Epafra wɔ ninte ni leeyo ku ami ta Kristo Yesu oso, ɔɔsɛɛsa fɔ biene biene.
57001024	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di Marko ku Aristarko ku Dema ku Luka, bale ni bakpɛmblatɛ wo nii kɔsɛɛsa fɔ biene biene nɛ.
57001025	Saate Yesu Kristo ale ye sibualɛ, aakpee ye osie.
58001001	Saa yi, Yaa lakakatɛ aata bawa loo diafe ni di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ suoto obe kpinwu di sisuku ate ate suoto.
58001002	Kafɔɔ di ayi yɛntɛle ya mmle kamɛ, Yaa lɛkakatɛ ɛɛta wo diefe ni di Obi nɔɔ suoto. Nnwɔɔ suoto di Yaa lefe ɛɛbla kayi ka mmle nɛ. Obi nwu nkpo ninle otii wɔ eediki eese alɛ aale nwɔ ni asaa amuu kleetɛ nɛ.
58001003	Obi nwu nkpo niediki mmle okle di Yaa leklekle ni eetuo nɛ. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ ninkpe Yaa letembi le okle ninkpe nwɔ nii. Obi nwu nkpo kafɔɔ niɛyɔ Yaa ɔlaa osie wɔ ninkpe nwɔ ni akle kayi ka mmle osie kanya. Di obe wɔ atɔɔyɔ batii sikpile ɛɛkyɛ ma eeloo nii, atoosifi ɛɛlaasiɛ di kasiɛkɔ ka ninlenke ni di osi di Yaa oletannɛɛkyɛ.
58001004	Yaa lɛbla Obi nɔɔ nwu nkpo ɛɛtaka katoo alenke Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ. Diekye leyooto le di Yaa lɛyɔ ɛɛtɔɔ nii, lɛtaka katoo dilenke alema.
58001005	Diekye Yaa diitɔkɔ batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ kuonwii diidii alɛ, “Obi nii fale. Miɛ ntookple fɔ kote.” Ee Yaa diitɔkɔ tɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ kuonwii alɛ, “Kɔwa fɔ kote ɔbale, nioso fabale mi Obi.”
58001006	Di obe wɔ kafɔɔ di Yaa makyesee ni Obi nɔɔ kasale kayi, aabuɛ alɛ, “Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ bamuu dikpe nii, beese asi kaasɔ beesumu nwɔ.”
58001007	Di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ suoto yi, Yaa labuɛ alɛ, “Lɛbla batɔkyɛntɛ nii, alɛ baate fɛ kɔfɛɛfɔ. Mba kafɔɔ nikɔbla nwɔ ni ɔkpɛ di osi, lɛbla ma nlɛ baate fɛ ɔtɔ ɔkplalomii.”
58001008	Di Obi nwu nkpo suoto, Yaa labuɛ alɛ, “O Yaa, sɛka kalekɔ lefɔ nwu nkpo mawɛ dinaa ni kaloo. Le sɛka di batii lɛfɔ suoto di osuku kanya.
58001009	Fambɔmbɔ lɛsaa biene ɔbla, feekyidi kafɔɔ lɛsaa lalaale. Nkpo oso di Yaa lɛfɔ lediki fɔ nɛ, ɛɛta fɔ suoto lɛyɔɔ, ɛɛyɔ fɔ eese di lɛba le diibu nkpe nii, dilenke ni nle ɛɛta ni akyɛnwo lɛfɔ.”
58001010	Yaa lakple aabuɛ alɛ, “O Saate, kaasɔ kakyekɔ, afɔ niabla kasɔ ka mmle kamuu, afɔ kafɔɔ niɛyɔ nnɛɛ lɛfɔ fɛɛbla kolo.
58001011	Asaa ya mmle amuu kamafe, kafɔɔ afɔ flɔbafe diidii. Asaa ya mmle amuu matɔ fɛ mmle okle di abula ntɔ nii.
58001012	Fabakatu asaa ya mmle fɛ mmle okle mankatu ni awu. Babakyɛlɛnsa nya kafɔɔ fɛ abula. Kafɔɔ afɔ diidii flɔbakyi. Alɛɛ lɛfɔ kafɔɔ nnaa kaloo diidii.”
58001013	Diidii Yaa diɛtɔkɔ batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ kuonwii alɛ, “Siɛ mi di oletannɛɛkyɛ, dilaase di obe wɔ lɛyɔ balo lɛfɔ lekpee fɔ ni ninkpaa kalɔ.”
58001014	Be di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nkpo nle mɔ? Anwuna ale bɔɔbla sɛkpɛ manta Yaa, ni eekpee ma alɛ babakyakaako batii ba nimawɛ ni didiki nɛ.
58002001	Nle mmle oso dikpe ni buotikanko sɛlaa se buonu ni nwaa, buomufũ sĩ buoklee osie kanya alɛ, bulaayu osuku biene nwu nkpo.
58002002	Diekye nse kanya ka di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ lafũ baawako ni bawa loo saa, nte nkpo, di otii owo lɛtaalɛ kufiofa ee ɛɛbla otokopĩ di Yaa lananfi obiala kootoko fɛ mmle okle diesiɛko nii,
58002003	ni lɛ bienyu bilɛ buatoso letokonanfi le ninte dita wo ni nse buosĩ didiki kplɛ le mmle nwu nkpo? Saate omu niakasa didiki le mmle nwu nkpo lɛkya oyie, fiɛ di batii ba bamuu nianu nwɔ ni kafɔɔ lediki beetuo wo klekle alɛ kute nkpo.
58002004	Yaa omu layɔ atuosaa ku sɛkpɛ se niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ ate ate aayila ɔlaa nwu nkpo kamaa alɛ kute nkpo. Ku Ninwuna Klekle kamɛ akyɛsaa ate ate ya aasɛ aakpee ni baatii kamɛ ni mmle okle dilɛ nwɔ ni kanya.
58002005	Yaa ditayɔ kayi ka fɔle ɔlaa buobuɛ bulɛ kabawa ni aakpee di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ.
58002006	Kafɔɔ fɛ mmle beebuɛ ni lɛɛba ninwii di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “O Yaa, be ninle otii, fiɛ foobu nwɔ disi nkpo? Be lɛsaa niɛtɛ dile otii kaayi ka mmle fiɛ foonyu nwɔ nkpo?
58002007	Fɛɛbla nwɔ ɛɛwa kasɔ kɛkɛɛ di obe kakui kamɛ alenke Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ. Fɛɛyɔ lɛkpa ku dibu feetũkũsɔɔ fɛle lɛkakoto,
58002008	ni fɛɛyɔ nwɔ feese di asaa amuu kanya nɛ.” Di obe wɔ di Yaa lɛyɔ nwɔ eese ni di asaa amuu kanya oso, ni lɛsalɛsaa nnaa alɛ diele nnwɔɔ nin-yɛ kaanya. Kafɔɔ mmle okle di asaa nte ni nunua yi, dilootuo alɛ nnwɔɔ nin-yɛ di asaa amuu kanya.
58002009	Kafɔɔ buɔnya Yesu wɔ di obe kakui kamɛ bɛɛwakosɔɔ ni kasɔ kɛɛkɛɛ beelenkeesa ni Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nwu nkpo, diefe ni di Yaa sibualɛ kamɛ oso, aafe diibuo kamɛ aakpi di batii bamuu disi. Ta nkpo oso, Yaa ntɔɔyɔ lɛkpa ku dibu eetũkũsɔɔ fɛle lɛkakoto.
58002010	Dilɛ alɛ Yaa wɔ niɛbla ni asaa amuu, eemufũ n-ya akle ni kata alɛ Kristo kawo nimu di dibuo le kamɛ aafe ni oso, alɛ aakpaa batii ba ninle ni Yaa babi anwako lɛkpa nɔɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ. Diekye Yesu ninle otii nwɔ nikɔkpaa ma ankpee ni diidiki kamɛ.
58002011	Nnwɔɔ ninfoto batii ankyeko sikpile kamɛ, nnwɔɔ ku batii ba sikpile eefoto nii, kote kunwii ninkpe ma. Nkpo oso sinunsɔ ninkpɛ Yesu alɛ aalɛɛ ma alɛ babilɛma.
58002012	Aatɔkɔ Yaa alɛ, “Kamalɛɛ fɔ leyooto nta babiloo. Kamatansa fɔ di bafũbanutɛ kasiisakɔ kamɛ.”
58002013	Aakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Kamayɔ anu nii ntika di Yaa suoto.” Ni aakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Nyɛɛ ku babi ba di Yaa lɛyɔ ɛɛtɛɛ ni.”
58002014	Di obe wɔ baabi nwu nkpo nle ni suoto sina ku ntɔ oso yi, Yesu omu kafɔɔ layɔ otii letembi. Aabla nle mmle alɛ diefe ni di kukpi nɔɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ yi, aawɔɔsa Abonsam wɔ ninkle ni kukpi osie.
58002015	Diɛkyakaa nii, Yesu labla nle mmle alɛ aadiki batii ba nikɔyɛkɛ ni kukpi di nkpa lɛma disiɛbi le nienii ma ni kamɛ.
58002016	Diekye diɛkpa kɔmɛ klekle alɛ, diele Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ ɛɛwa ɔkyakaako, kafɔɔ Abraham banantii.
58002017	Nkpo oso Yaa labla nwɔ fɛ babilɛma di sisuku simuu suoto, alɛ aale Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo wɔ nikɔnya ni batii nyaami, ambla ni asaa di osuku kanya di Yaa anu, alɛ aadiki batii ankyeko sikpile lɛma kamɛ.
58002018	Nioso nunua, aafuo batii ba bɛɛsɔ beenyu ni odiki, diekye nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ baasɔ nwɔ baanyu, aafe kafɔɔ diibuo kamɛ.
58003001	Nkpo oso babiloo, aye ba di Yaa lɛlɛɛ alɛ biasɛko nwɔ ni kafa nɔɔ asaa, ɛɛbla ye ni klekle, bibu diisi di Yesu wɔ eekyesee alɛ ale ni Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo di ofũ onu loo n-yɛ ni di suoto binyu.
58003002	Aabla asaa di osuku kanya aata Yaa wɔ nialɛɛ nwɔ alɛ abla nwɔ ni ɔkpɛ fɛ mmle okle di Mose labla ni asaa di osuku kanya di Yaa leyo kamɛ.
58003003	Fɛ mmle okle di otii wɔ nietofo ni leyo nfũ dibu anlenkee ni leyo nimu yi, nkpo okle kafɔɔ di Yesu lefũ dibu alenke Mose nɛ.
58003004	Diekye leyo biala, otii nietofo ni. Kafɔɔ Yaa ninle otii wɔ niɛbla ni lɛsaa biala.
58003005	Mose labla lɛsaa biala di osuku kanya di Yaa leyo fɛ kpɛmblatɛ. Ni aadiki sɛlaa se di Yaa kɔwa ni ɔbabuɛ aatuo nɛ.
58003006	Kafɔɔ Kristo nnwɔɔ ɔɔbla asaa di osuku kanya fɛ Obi wɔ nin-yɛ ni di Yaa leyo kanya. Awo ninle nwɔ leyo nwu nkpo nse buokpee situ, buotika nwɔ anu lɛɛsaa le buonyu osuku munta ni osie kanya.
58003007	Nkpo oso fɛ mmle okle di Yaa Ninwuna labuɛ alɛ, “Nse bienu Yaa sɛlɔ miɛ yi,
58003008	bitanwɛnsa situ lee osie, fɛ mmle okle di bawa lee labla nii, baataka baayila ni di Yaa suoto, fɛ mmle okle baabla ni dii nwu nkpo baawɛ ni di ɔfaafuu kamɛ, di obe wɔ baasɔ nwɔ baanyu nii.
58003009	Nfa di bawa lee lasɔ mi baanyu, baawolaa mi kaanya nɛ, nu baanya asaa ya labla ni di alɛɛ ofosi ana kamɛ.
58003010	Nkpo oso ɔblɔ lafiɛ mi di batii nwu nkpo suoto, ni labuɛ nlɛ, ‘Obe lele beeyu di situ lɛma kamɛ, diekye bayinya sisuku nii batɛ nsũ.’
58003011	Nkpo oso ɔblɔ lafiɛ mi, ni laka ntam osie kanya nlɛ, ‘Diidii blɔbabuo kasɔ ka suoto nlɛ kamata ma mantɛ ni ɔnyɛɛ!’ ”
58003012	Babiloo, bilolaa binyu nwaa bilɛ, kuonwii kaamɛ lee diɛwɛ otu kpile wɔ ninanfũ kunu nii, alɛ aakple di Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa nkpaamaa.
58003013	Kafɔɔ, bika bawo obe lele fɛ mmle okle di miɛmiɛ wɔ beebuɛ ni lɛkaako ye ni oso, alɛ okpile dilaakyɔnkyɔ kuonwii lee alɛ aawɛnsa otu nɔɔ osie.
58003014	Diekye nse buotika anu di Kristo suoto osie kanya diɛlaase di kayɛntɛlekɔ fɛ mmle okle buakye ni kasɔ yi, ninfɛ fiɛ bubawɛ lele ku nnwɔɔ nɛ.
58003015	Nnya ɔlaa wɔ di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ ni. Alɛ, “Nse bienu Yaa sɛlɔ miɛmiɛ yi, bitanwɛnsa situ lee osie fɛ mmle baawa lee labla ni, di obe wɔ baataka baayila ni di Yaa suoto.”
58003016	Bawe niale batii ba nianu ni Yaa ɔlaa fiɛ baataka baayila nwɔ di suoto? Mma niale batii ba bamuu di Mose lakpaa aakyeko Egipte kasɔ suoto nɛ.
58003017	Bawe di Yaa lanya ɔblɔ aakpeeko alɛɛ afosi ana amu? Mma niale batii ba niabla ni okpile di Yaa lata ma baakpi ni di ɔfaafuu kasɔ nɛ.
58003018	Obe wɔ di Yaa laka ntam aabuɛ alɛ, “Diidii blɔbabuo kasɔ ka suoto nlɛ kamata ma ni ɔnyɛɛ ɔtɛ,” bawe aalaka? Mma niale batii ba niataka baayila nwɔ ni di suoto nɛ.
58003019	Nioso buɔnya bulɛ batafuo kasɔ nwu nkpo obuo, diekye, batafũ baanu.
58004001	Nkpo oso obe wɔ di Yaa ntɔɔta wo osuku onyu alɛ buawɛ ni ɔnyɛɛ ɔtɛ wɔ aaka ntam aabuɛ aatɛ nii, bita bulolaa bunyu nwaa alɛ, kuonwii lee dilabaka di osuku alɛ aabuo ɔnyɛɛ katɛkɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ.
