58004002	Diekye butoonu ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo fɛ mmle okle di mma kafɔɔ baanu nii. Baanu ɔlaa nwu nkpo, kafɔɔ kutakyakaako ma. Diekye obe wɔ baanu nwu nii, batafũ nwu baanu kafɔɔ.
58004003	Kafɔɔ awo ba niefũ buonu nii, bubabuo ɔnyɛɛ katɛkɔ nwu nkpo. Yaa labuɛ alɛ, “Ɔblɔ lafiɛ mi, ni laka ntam labuɛ nlɛ, ‘Diidii, blɔbabuo kasɔ ka suoto labuɛ nlɛ kamata ma ni ɔnyɛɛ ɔtɛ!’ ” Yaa labuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle kuntɛ ɔkpɛ nɔɔ omu ntooloo di obe wɔ aabla ni kayi.
58004004	Diekye di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ lɛba ninwii Yaa lakakatɛ di dii kuɛnsĩ suoto alɛ, “Di dii kuɛnsĩ le suoto, Yaa ladiɛ sɛkpɛ simuu ɔbla, aatɛ ɔnyɛɛ.”
58004005	Yaa lakple aabuɛ ɔlaa nwu nkpo kafɔɔ ninfũ alɛ, “Diidii blɔbabuo kasɔ ka suoto labuɛ nlɛ kamata ma ni ɔnyɛɛ ɔtɛ!”
58004006	Batii ba niakasa ni ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo onu, batabuo ɔnyɛɛ katɛkɔ nwu nkpo, diekye batafũ baanu. Kafɔɔ osuku lekple kute alɛ batii bamba kabuo.
58004007	Nle mmle kotuo klekle alɛ Yaa lediki obe bamba ɛɛtɛ, obe nwu nkpo ninle Miɛ nɛ. Alɛɛ kpinwu ntɔbafe fiɛ aakakatɛ aafenko di Ɔka Dawid ɔlaa wɔ butoobuɛ buɔbafe ni suoto alɛ, “Nse bienu Yaa sɛlɔ miɛmiɛ yi, bitanwɛsa situ lee osie.”
58004008	Diekye nse fɛ Yosua nkpaa batii nwu nkpo ambuoko ɔnyɛɛ katɛkɔ nwu nkpo di Yaa labuɛ ni yi, nse Yaa diesinkakatɛ akyeko dii bamba kuninwii suoto.
58004009	Nkpo oso di Lɛnyɛɛtɛyi lewo lekple dikpe di Yaa batii ntɛ ni ɔnyɛɛ nɛ.
58004010	Nioso otii lele niebuo Yaa ɔnyɛɛ katɛkɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ, madiɛ sɛkpɛ nɔɔ simuu ɔbla antɛ ɔnyɛɛ fɛ mmle okle di Yaa latɛ ni ɔnyɛɛ.
58004011	Nkpo oso bita bukpee okyiini osie kanya alɛ awo kafɔɔ buabuo ɔnyɛɛ katɛkɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ. Alɛ kuonwii loo dilaaka di osuku fɛ mmle okle baaka nii, ta otokopĩ lɛma oso.
58004012	Diekye Yaa ɔlaa nwu nkpo nkpe nkpa, kuɔbla kafɔɔ ɔkpɛ wlawla. Kukpe abe kafɔɔ kulenke kapamii nfũ abe nfũ abe. Kumbuo di otii kamɛ, kunsifi kamɛ kamɛ, kunsɛ ɔkla ku ninwuna ntɛɛ, kumbuo kunsifi akufi nkyakakɔ ku dikufi kamɛ lɛla, kunwolaa kafɔɔ otii disibu kamɛ ku otu nɔɔ kamɛ dibiesaa klekle nindiki ninwako.
58004013	Asaa ya amuu di Yaa lɛbla nii, kuninwii nnaa alɛ diewofa nwɔ nii. Amuu nte temple di anu nɔɔ. Nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ ɔkyɛ baamuu loo bubata suoto loo nkuntaa munta nɛ.
58004014	Nunua yi, bita bumufũ ofũ onu wɔ ninkpe wo buodiki buobuɛ ni buklee osie kanya. Diekye bukpe Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo kplɛ wɔ ninle ni Yesu, ale ni Yaa Obi wɔ niasifi ni osi.
58004015	Diekye Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo loo diele otii wɔ di ɔlaa loo dilɔbanu ni kafutu diɛ kasɔ loo ɔwa kamɛ. Diɛkyakaa nii, Oletatɛ loo nle otii wɔ baasɔ baanyu ni siisuku kpinwu suoto fɛ mmle okle bɔɔsɔ wo mannyu nii, kafɔɔ atabla okpile.
58004016	Nkpo oso, bita bukpukiti butɛɛtɛɛ Yaa lɛkakpomii nwu nkpo katũ ku sɛkambi, nfũ siifutulɛ nɔɔ nkpe ni. Nfa di Yaa manya wo nyaami anle wo sibualɛ di obe wɔ diefĩ wo ni nɛ.
58005001	Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo lele beediki beekyeko batii kamɛ yi, ose manse nwɔ alɛ aasiɛ di batii ku Yaa ntɛɛ ambla ɔkpɛ kaanya lɛma. Ɔkpɛ nɔɔ ninle alɛ, aayila di batii kanya an-yɔ asaa ɔta anta Yaa, anta ole kafɔɔ di sikpile lɛma disi.
58005002	Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo nwu nkpo nfuo otu ɔtɛ kaasɔ ɔta batii ba ninanye ni kufiofa nwu nkpo beeyu ni osuku. Diekye nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ kafɔɔ oloofuo kufiofa nwu nkpo ole.
58005003	Ta nkpo oso, dikpe ni ɛɛta ole di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ sikpile suoto ku batii bamba sele disi.
58005004	Otii kuonwii ninse suoto Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo ayɔ dibu le mmle ata suoto. Kafɔɔ Yaa lete ninlɛɛ otii ambla nwɔ Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo fɛ mmle okle aalɛɛ ni Aaron.
58005005	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di Kristo diese suoto Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo ayɔ dibu le mmle ata suoto nɛ. Kafɔɔ Yaa niase nwɔ ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Obi nii suɔtɔbi fale. Miɛ ntookple fɔ kote.”
58005006	Aakple aabuɛ di lɛba bamba alɛ, “Oletatɛ fale diesifi ni ninaa ni kaloo fɛle Melkisedek okle.”
58005007	Obe wɔ di Yesu lawɛ ni kaayi ka mmle fɛ otii, ampɛ ɔlaa anta Yaa ku lekoto otikiti osie kanya. Anwi kaku ku kudu osie kanya ku nnumɛɛ blɔblɔblɔ, anta otii wɔ nimadiki nwɔ aakyeko ni kukpi kamɛ. Ta aawakosa suoto kasɔ aayɔ dibu aatɔɔ nii oso, Yaa lanu nwɔ diwilɛɛ.
58005008	Kuntɛ Yaa Obi aale yi, aatekete mmle mankyɔɔ ni ɔlaa atoko di abuo ya kamɛ aafe nii.
58005009	Ta mmle di ɔlaa nɔɔ atoko ɔkyɔɔ lɛbla ni nimu oso, ɛɛbakple otii wɔ ninta ni batii ba bamuu niɛkyɔɔ nwɔ ni ɔlaa atoko nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo tatɛ.
58005010	Nioso Yaa ladiki nwɔ alɛ aale Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo di Melkisedek osuku kanya.
58005011	Asaa kpinwu nkpe buabuɛ ni di ɔlaa wɔ mmle suoto fiɛ, kafɔɔ kasɔ ninya odiki ntookple ɔlaa, diekye mínfuo asaa omufũ okpee diisi kamɛ wlawla.
58005012	Nwaako, ditɔɔklɛ dikaatɛ alɛ nfɛ minle ni basaatuotɛ fiɛ, kafɔɔ diekple diefĩ alɛ otii owo kakple antuo ye kasɔ kakyekɔ asaa di Yaa ɔlaa nwu nkpo suoto. Ote bite fɛ babifɔɔle ba di nnyɛɛ ntu lefĩ nii, nse nfɛ dikaatɛ alɛ biale ni alesaa nutũle.
58005013	Otii lele nikokple anyɛɛfu yi, obifɔɔle eekple ale, ananye ni lɛsaa le ninle ni dibiene ku dikpile.
58005014	Banɔɔfo ninle alesaa nutũle, diekye batɔɔnanfi suoto di asaa kpinwu kamɛ, nfɛ baye lɛsaa biene ku lɛlalaale.
58006001	Nioso yi, bita bukyɛ sitũ di banɔɔfo asaa otuo kamɛ, biɛta budiɛ kasɔ kakyekɔ asaa ya baatuo ni di Kristo kamɛ. Bitasinta buakple buatuo asaa di mmle okle biakyisa ni situ di asaa ya ninanfũ ni kɔya nfũ ku mmle okle biafũ Yaa minnu ni lɛfɔle.
58006002	Butootuo ye asaa ate ate di Yaa ntu okpeesa suoto ku nnɛɛ otika di batii suoto ku mmle di bakpi mataka mankye ni kukpi kamɛ ku lɛkanko yɛntɛle le nimawa nii.
58006003	Nkpo oso bita bukyɛ sitũ. Nse Yaa letuna yi, nnya nle mmle nfɛ bubabla ni.
58006004	Batii ba nintooyinya Yaa lɛkpa nwu nkpo bɛɛnya nii fiɛ beekple ni nkpaamaa, lɛ dibate ma? Diekye baatu lɛkyɛsaa nɔɔ le niakye ni osi baanya, baawɛ kafɔɔ dibia di Ninwuna Klekle kamɛ,
58006005	baanya kafɔɔ dibiene le ninsi ni di Yaa ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo kamɛ, baafũ kafɔɔ osie wɔ ninsi ni di sɛka kalekɔ nɔɔ ka nikɔwa ni kamɛ,
58006006	fiɛ nfɛ baakple nkpaamaa di ofũ onu lɛma kamɛ, mansinfuo okple okyi. Diekye beekple bɔɔkaasa Yaa Obi nwu nkpo di kowoso suoto, bookpee nwɔ sinunsɔ di batii bamuu anu di lɛkpaka.
58006007	Yaa nkusɛkusɛsa kasɔ ka di kanto nnɔɔ ankpete ka ni obe lele, kanta alesaa nlɛ anta ni batii ba oso bɛɛkpɛ ka nii.
58006008	Kafɔɔ kasɔ ka ninkɔntɔ ni siwuu ku sɛfa kpile yi, kanaa nfasũ kɛɛta lɛsalɛsaa. Lɛkpaani mmiɛ ka otikanko. Kayɛntɛkɔ, babakpee ka ɔtɔ manfiɛ.
58006009	Babiloo bɔmbɔtɛ, kuntɛ buɔkakatɛ mmle okle, di ɔkyɛloo, buotika ye anu bulɛ aye, biye asaa biene ya ninsi ni di nkpa ɔwɛ kamɛ.
58006010	Yaa diele otii wɔ ninambla ni asaa di osuku kanya alɛ, aayee asaa biene ya biabla nii. Ee lɛbɔmbɔ le biadiki biatuo ni ta nnwɔɔ oso di lɛkyakaako kamɛ. Biakyakaako batii nɔɔ ba niefũ beenu nii, bia mmiɛ biokple minkyakaako ma.
58006011	Dile wo dibiesaa osie kanya bulɛ, obiala kaamɛ lee kakpee okyiini di nkpa biene be mmle kamɛ ninaase kaase, alɛ asaa ya bionyu osuku minta ni kawa kaanya.
58006012	Buloomiɛ bulɛ biakple bakyɔkɔ, kafɔɔ bikpee okyiini alɛ biate fɛ batii ba niafũ baanu nii, baawɛ ni otu ɔtɛ kaasɔ, alɛ baafũ ni ntam be di Yaa laka aata ma nii.
58006013	Obe wɔ di Yaa labuɛ ɔlaa aatɛ ni Abraham, aaka di leyooto nɔɔ suoto aatɔɔ di ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ ni suoto. Diekye otii kuonwii nsinnaa alenke ni nnwɔɔ Yaa.
58006014	Aabuɛ alɛ, “Nwaako kɔtɔkɔ fɔ nlɛ, kama kusɛkusɛsa fɔ nta fɔ fanwɛ banantii kpinwu.”
58006015	Abraham latɛ otu kaasɔ, aatika Yaa anu. Nkpo oso, kɔnnɛɛ nɔɔ lakpanko lɛsaa le ɔlaa di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ aatɔɔ nii.
58006016	Batii nka di asaa ya ninlenke ma ni suoto, man-yɔ mantuo alɛ lɛsaa le balaka ni nte nkpo, man-yɔ maniisa ɔlaa ɔnanfi lele ninsi ni di lɛsaa le balaka ni kamɛ.
58006017	Nkpo oso di Yaa laka di suoto nɔɔ aayɔ aatika difuɔ di ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ ni suoto nɛ. Diekye oomiɛ alɛ kamɛ kakpa batii ba nimafũ ni lɛsaa le suoto aabuɛ ɔlaa aatɛ ni alɛ, nnwɔɔ ánkyi ɔlaa nɔɔ kamaa.
58006018	Yaa lɛbla nle mmle eefenko di asaa akyuu anyɔ suoto ninle ni ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ ni ku ntam be aaka ni suoto, ninaafuo ni okyi diidii. Yaa kafɔɔ ninlaa. Nle mmle oso di awo ba nietoso buɔbataniko nwɔ nii, nnɛɛ dilabafee wo di osuku onyu wɔ ɛɛyɔ eekpee wo ni kaamɛ oso.
58006019	Osuku onyu loo wɔ mmle lata alɛ buomufũ Yaa bukle osie kanya di situ loo kamɛ, fɛ mmle okle di kowoso sidu mmufũ kaasɔ sinklee ni osie kanya. Osuku onyu wɔ mmle nkpaa wo kunfenko di dibula le baasaka baasɛ ni Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo sɛmaa kumbuo ko kakleklekɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ kamɛ.
58006020	Nfa di Yesu lalekatũ aabuo diisi loo fɛle tunletɛ nɛ. Ni eekple Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo fɛle Melkisedek okle dinaa ni kaloo nɛ.
58007001	Melkisedek wɔ mmle lale ɔka di Salem, aale kafɔɔ oletatɛ aata Yaa wɔ ninlenke nii. Obe wɔ di Abraham latookple ni di kakpɛkɔ, aalenkee ni baka bana yi, Melkisedek wɔ mmle lakyɛ aalaakyakako nwɔ, ni aatɔɔ dikusɛkusɛ nɛ.
58007002	Ninfɛ di Abraham layɔ asaa ya amuu aafũ ni di kakpɛkɔ nwu nkpo dikyuufosile aatɔɔ nɛ. Lɛkasale, Melkisedek leyooto lɛsɔdiki ninle Ɔka wɔ nimbla ni asaa tinini. Lɛnyɔɔfa, leyooto nɔɔ lɛsɔdiki ninle Atoko Ɔkyɛ Ole Ɔka ta aale ni Ɔka di Salem oso.
58007003	Baakpana lɛsalɛsaa bakyeko di Melkisedek wɔ mmle ote ee ɔya ee ɔnantii nɔɔ kuonwii suoto. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ manankpana lɛsalɛsaa bakyeko di kolofo nɔɔ ee kukpi nɔɔ suoto nɛ. Nioso ote ate fɛ Yaa Obi nwu nkpo, eekple ale oletatɛ wɔ ninnaa ni kaloo.
58007004	Biɔnya mmle okle di Melkisedek wɔ mmle lefũ ni kɔya osie kanya! Bia ɔwa loo Abraham nɔɔfo layɔ asaa ya amuu, aafũ ni kaakpɛ dikyuufosile aatɔɔ.
58007005	Nioso di kufiofa kanya yi, bɛɛta Lewi banantii ba ninle ni olebatatɛ osuku alɛ baafũ asaa dikyuufosile di Israel batii nnɛɛ, nu bale mma bamu babilɛma, bale ni Abraham banantii.
58007006	Melkisedek wɔ mmle diekye Lewi kɔna kamɛ, kafɔɔ aafũ asaa dikyuufosile di Abraham nfũ, ni aakusɛkusɛsa nwɔ nɛ. Otii wɔ di Yaa labuɛ ɔlaa aatɛ aatɔɔ nii.
58007007	Diele sɛlaa sile alɛ otii wɔ ninta ni dikusɛkusɛ yi, alenke otii wɔ nikofũ ni dikusɛkusɛsa nwu nkpo.
58007008	Batii ba kafɔɔ ninfũ ni asaa dikyuufosile yi, bale olebatatɛ ba ninkpi nii. Kafɔɔ di Melkisedek lɛkyɛ yi, aafũ asaa dikyuufosile nwu nkpo fɛ oletatɛ wɔ kafɔɔ ninkpe ni nkpa fɛ mmle okle di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ nii.
58007009	Nioso buafuo obuɛ bia bulɛ Lewi wɔ niafũ ni asaa dikyuufosile nwu nkpo kafɔɔ lafenko di Abraham suoto aata Melkisedek asaa dikyuufosile nwu nkpo.
58007010	Diekye obe wɔ di Abraham lakyakako ni Melkisedek aatɔɔ ni asaa dikyuufosile yi, Lewi lasiɛ di ɔwa nɔɔ Abraham kafutu kamɛ.
58007011	Di Lewi batii olebatatɛ ole oso di Yaa lata Israel kufiofa. Nse fɛle Lewi batii olebatatɛ ole nwu nkpo lewo nimu, nse diesinfĩ alɛ, oletatɛ bamba wɔ ninte ni fɛ Melkisedek, kakple anwa di Aron babi kanya?
58007012	Nkpo oso nse bɛɛkyɛlɛnsa oletatɛ yi, ni dikpe ni kakyi kafɔɔ lɛwa di kufiofa nwu nkpo kamɛ.
58007013	Saate loo wɔ kafɔɔ suoto beebuɛ ni sɛlaa se mmle nwu nkpo, lekye kɔna bamba kamɛ. Otii kuonwii kafɔɔ diikye kɔna nwu nkpo kamɛ abla oletatɛ ɔkpɛ, ata ole di oleɔta akyikye suoto diidii.
58007014	Diekye buye klekle bulɛ, Yuda kɔna kamɛ di Saate loo nwu nkpo lekye. Mose kafɔɔ ditabuɛ ɔlaa kuonwii akyeko di kɔna ko mmle olebatatɛ ole suoto.
58007015	Ɔlaa wɔ mmle kamɛ lɛkpa bia klekle, di obe wɔ di oletatɛ bamba wɔ ninte ni fɛ Melkisedek ntɔɔwa nii.
58007016	Bɛɛbla nwɔ oletatɛ ninanle ni batii kufiofa kanya ku ɔsaabla suoto. Kafɔɔ diefe ni di osie wɔ ninta ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo kamɛ.
58007017	Diekye Yaa labuɛ klekle alɛ, “Fabale oletatɛ diesifi ni dinaa ni kaloo, fɛle Melkisedek okle.”
58007018	Batooklee kufiofa kofole nwu nkpo beekyisa bɛɛtɛ di ɔlɔɔkɔ. Diekye kunaa osie, kuodie lɛsalɛsaa kafɔɔ.
58007019	Diekye Mose kufiofa nwu nkpo diefuo lɛsalɛsaa ɔbla diwo niimu. Nunua yi, batɔɔta wo osuku onyu wɔ niɛtaka ni katoo kulenke nii, buofuo ni okpukuti ɔtɛɛtɛɛ Yaa.
58007020	Diɛkyakaa nii, Yaa lɛka ntam ɛɛkyakaa di olebatatɛ fɔle nwu nkpo ole suoto. Saa yi, Yaa ditaka ntam aata batii ba baase ni olebatatɛ.
58007021	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ baase ni Yesu oletatɛ yi, Yaa laka ntam aatɔɔ aabuɛ alɛ, “Saate ntɔɔka ntam, diidii kafɔɔ ɔlɔbasinkyisa kanya, aabuɛ alɛ, ‘Fabale oletatɛ diesifi ni dinaa ni kaloo.’ ”
58007022	Diefe ni di ntam be mmle di Yaa laka ni suoto oso yi, Yesu lɛbakple wo kamaa yilatɛ di kanya ninii le mmle ninlɛ dilenke ni fanfa suoto.
58007023	Kakyi bamba kafɔɔ lekple kasi diɛ olebatatɛ kofole nwu nkpo kamɛ. Nwu ninle alɛ, baatɛ baapɔ. Diekye baatookpi baatoodiɛ ɔkpɛ nwu nkpo. Nioso manfuo ɔkpɛ nwu nkpo ɔtɔɔbla obe lele.
58007024	Kafɔɔ Yesu nnwɔɔ akpe nkpa obe lele. Nioso ɔkpɛ nɔɔ ɔbla fɛ oletatɛ, ɔlɔbakyɛlɛnsa ayɔ ata otii kuonwii diidii.
58007025	Nkpo oso, nunua ku obe lele anfuo batii odiki diefe ni di suoto nɔɔ anwako Yaa nfũ. Diekye akpe nkpa obe lele, akpe di Yaa nfũ ootikiti lekoto diisi lɛma.
58007026	Nle mmle oso yi, Yesu wɔ mmle ninle Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo wɔ okle buomiɛ ni nɛ. Ate klekle, lɛkpɔnɔnfɔ ee okpile kuonwii dietika nwɔ di suoto. Ɛɛkpa kɔmɛ, nioso Yaa lediki nwɔ lete di bakpileblatɛ kamɛ, ɛɛtakatɛsa nwɔ katoo asi di osi katakalekɔ ka ninlenke nii.
58007027	Áate fɛ olebatatɛ banɔɔfo bule. Díefĩ kafɔɔ alɛ aatɔɔta ole dii biala di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ sikpile disi lɛkasale, fiɛ nfɛ sɛmaa aatɔɔta di batii bamba kafɔɔ disi. Aata oleɔta nwu nkpo ninwii di ayi bule amuu kanya, di obe wɔ aayɔ suoto nɔɔ aata ni ole.
58007028	Diekye Mose kufiofa nwu nkpo ladiki batii ba nintawɛ ni ɔnyɛɛ baawa ni kasɔ, baase ma olebatatɛ banɔɔfo. Kafɔɔ Yaa kanya ka aanii ni ku ntam be aaka ni di kufiofa kamaa yi, ladiki Obi nwu nkpo aase Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo wɔ ninnaa ni kaloo nialolaa ɔkpɛ nwu nkpo aabla kuawo ni nimu.
58008001	Nunua yi, lɛsaa finle le ninsi ni di ɔlaa wɔ mmle kamɛ, nwaako, buomiɛ bulɛ budiki butuo ni ninle alɛ, bukpe Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo wɔ mmle okle asi ni di Yaa wɔ diibu ntika ni di suoto lɛkakpomii, oletanɛɛkyɛ di osi.
58008002	Ɔɔbla ɔkpɛ fɛ oletatɛ di Yaa Akpanta Klekle ya ninle ni Akpanta amuamu di Yaa omu lɛyɔ nnɛɛ nɔɔ ɛɛbla nii. Diele batii niɛbla.
58008003	Manse Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo biala alɛ, aayɔ asaa ɔta ya manta ni ku babɔkɛɛ oleɔta anta Yaa. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ dikpe ni oletatɛ loo wɔ mmle lɛwɛ lɛsaa lewo ɛɛta ole ɛɛta Yaa nɛ.
58008004	Nse fɛ kasɔ ka mmle akpe yi, nse áale oletatɛ kuonwii. Diekye olebatatɛ ba ninta ni ole di Yuda batii kufiofa kanya nkpe kofokofoko.
58008005	Ɔkpɛ wɔ bɔɔbla ni fɛ olebatatɛ di Akpanta Klekle kamɛ yi, dile lɛsaa le ninkpe ni di osi bɔɔbla ni kunyii ni kũ, fɛ mmle okle mannyu lɛsaa mambla ni lete dile. Bibu binyu mmle okle diate ni di Mose obe. Obe wɔ alɛ ɔɔpɛ ni Akpanta anta ni Yaa, Yaa latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Lolaa fanyu nwaa falɛ fɛɛbla lɛsaa biala diete fɛ nle okle latuo fɔ ni di kobokote osi!”
58008006	Kafɔɔ oletatɛ ɔkpɛ wɔ bɛɛyɔ beekpee ni di Yesu nnɛɛ kamɛ lefũ kaya kulenke nwɔ baayɔ baakpee ni di olebatatɛ kofole nnɛɛ kamɛ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di kanya ninii fɔle le di Yesu lekyeko Yaa nfũ ɛɛwako ni batii nɔɔ lefũ kɔya dilenke kanya ninii kofole nwu nɛ. Diekye kanya ninii fɔle nwu nkpo ntika di ɔlaa wɔ beebuɛ bɛɛtɛ ni ninlenke ni suoto.
58008007	Nse lɛsalɛsaa diɛlalaa di kanya ninii kofole nwu nkpo suoto, se diesinfĩ alɛ baakple mambla kanya ninii fɔle kukanwii.
58008008	Kafɔɔ Yaa lanya ɔtanlolaa ɔbla di batii nɔɔ suoto ni aabuɛ alɛ, “Saate nwu labuɛ alɛ, Binyu lo! Obe kɔwa mase ni kanya ninii fɔle ɔbla ku Israel kale batii ku Yuda kale batii.
58008009	Dilabate fɛ kanya ninii le lanii ni ku bawa lɛma di obe wɔ laklee ma ni kaanɛɛtũ ladieko ni di Egipte kasɔ suoto. Diekye batabla di kanya ninii le lanii ni ku mma suoto. Nkpo oso di amii, lakple ma di nkpaamaa nɛ. Nkpo di Saate kobuɛ nɛ.
58008010	Saate nwu nkpo lakple aabuɛ alɛ, Nnya kanya ka manii ni ku Israel kale nwu nkpo di obe wɔ nikɔwa ni kamɛ. Kamayɔ kufiofa nii nkpee ma diisi kamɛ. Kamakpana nwu kafɔɔ ntika ma di otu kamɛ. Ka male ma Yaa, mma kafɔɔ babakple mi batii.
58008011	Otii kuonwii kafɔɔ dilabasintuo owo nɔɔ lɛsaa ee obilɛma alɛ atofo Saate nwu. Diekye bamuu lɛma babatofo mi, diɛyɔ ni di obisɔ biibii diɛlaase ni di ɔnɔɔfo yɛntɛle suoto.
58008012	Diekye kamanya ma nyaami n-yɔ sikpile lɛma se simuu bɛɛbla nii nkyɛ ma. Diidii kafɔɔ namasinnyuma ɔsaabla lɛma lalaale nwu nkpo.”
58008013	Di obe wɔ nfɛ di Yaa kɔkakatɛ ni kaanya ninii fɔle nwu suoto, ni diotuo alɛ kɔkasale nwu nkpo ntookofo. Lɛsaa le kafɔɔ nintoobe diekofo nii, di obe kakui kamɛ, nimmafe nin-yu kunloo.
58009001	Kanya ninii kofole nwu nkpo, dikpe sisuku se manfe mambla ni Yaa ɔkpɛ. Baapɛ akpanta ya kamɛ mambla nwu ni kaasɔ ka.
58009002	Baasɛ akpanta nwu nkpo kayi ku kamɛ ku dibula. Kayi lele le baatɔɔlɛɛ ni Kakleklekɔ, baase kandiɛ ditikasaa, ku opunu wɔ suoto mantika ni bloblo wɔ bɛɛta ni Yaa.
58009003	Di dibula nwu nkpo sɛmaa, kamɛ nini baatɔɔlɛɛ Kakleklekɔ kaamɛ Kakleklekɔ nɛ.
58009004	Di Kakleklekɔ kaamɛ Kakleklekɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ, asaa ya nin-yɛ ni ninfa ninle, oleɔta akyikye ya bɛɛyɔ koto sɛɛle bɛɛbla ni, nnya suoto manfiɛ oluufii nɛ, ku kanya ninii lɛlakaa le suoto bɛɛyɔ koto sɛɛle beefifia beekyisa nii. Di lɛlakaa nwu nkpo kamɛ, koto sɛɛle dibukii nsi kaamɛ bɛɛyɔ Yaa alesaa ya manlɛɛ ni mana beekpee kaamɛ. Aron ɔkyɛnwoso wɔ kafɔɔ niadie ni afata nsi kaamɛ ku akpanafuɔ anyɔ ya suoto baakpana ni Yaa afiofa lefosi nwu.
58009005	Di lɛlakaa nwu nkpo nsintɛɛ, bɛɛbla asaa ya bɔɔlɛɛ ni Kerubi letembi beetika bakpe ni afoko, diotuo alɛ Yaa nkpe ni ninfa. Afoko lɛma nwu nkpo lɛblɛfɛ ɛɛbla oyududu kuotĩi lɛba le man-yɔ batii sikpile lɛma mankyɛ ma nii. Kafɔɔ nunua wɔ mmle, bulabafuo obuo di sɛlaa se mmle kamɛ, budiki sĩ kamɛ klekle.
58009006	Fɛ mmle bɛɛbla asaa ya mmle bɛɛtɛ ni ninfa. Olebatatɛ nwu nkyɛ Akpanta nwu kasale kamɛ obe lele manaabla Yaa ɔkpɛ lɛma ninfa.
58009007	Kafɔɔ Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo lete ninkyɛ akpanta nyɔɔfa nwu nkpo kamɛ, ninwii lɛɛlɛɛ kamɛ. Nse oofe nfa, anklee babɔkɛɛ ntɔ. Ntɔ nwu nkpo an-yɔ anta Yaa ole di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ sikpile disi ku batii bamba sikpile se bɛɛbla mananye ni disi nɛ.
58009008	Yaa Ninwuna Klekle ladiki aatuo klekle alɛ, di obe wɔ di kayi akpanta nwu nkpo lekple ayɛ ni kamaa, osuku nnaa alɛ baabuo Kakleklekɔ kaamɛ Kakleklekɔ nwu.
58009009	Nle mmle nwu nkpo nle lɛsaa le nikotuo ni lɛsaa di miɛ ayi ya mmle kamɛ. Diotuo alɛ, asaa ɔta ku babɔkɛɛ oleɔta Yaa dilabafuo otii wɔ ninkɔta ni oleɔta nwu nkpo otu wɔ nintɔkɔ nwɔ ni ɔlaa ɔbla kuwo nimu.
58009010	Diekye asaa ya mmle amuu ɔbla nle ole ku onyi ku ɔsaabla ate ate ya ninle ni otii suoto okleklesa lete ko dile. N-ya mmle afiofa ko ale bɛɛbla bɛɛta ni otii diɛlaase di obe wɔ di Yaa mase ni osuku fɔle nwu nkpo ɔsaabla ɔbla.
58009011	Kafɔɔ Kristo ntɔɔwa fɛ Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo ɛɛta asaa biene ya nintɔɔwa nii. Olekatakɔ ka kamɛ eebuo ɔɔbla ni ɔkpɛ lefũ kɔya, dilɛ kafɔɔ dilenke lekofole nwu. Diele batii nnɛɛ kafɔɔ bɛɛyɔ beetofo ni. Nle mmle kotuo kafɔɔ alɛ diele kayi ka mmle lɛsaabla lewo dile.
58009012	Obe wɔ di Kristo labuo ni laakpanta nwu nkpo, aasifi ni Kakleklekɔ kaamɛ Kakleklekɔ ninwii diɛta ni ayi bule, ataklee batie ee banankyue ntɔ aalaata fɛ oleɔta, kafɔɔ, nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ ntɔ aakle aakyɛnko. Aabla nle mmle diisi loo, aayɔ aafũ wo, aata wo nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo.
58009013	Batie ku banankyue ntɔ ku nankyue dibi le beefiɛ ni ntɔ man-yɔ mankpekpete di batii ba ninanklekle ni suoto, ninta alɛ suoto lɛma mbla klekle.
58009014	Ni nse ɔsaabla wɔ mmle nte nkpo, ninta alɛ otii mbla klekle mɔ, ni Kristo ntɔ kafɔɔ kafuo otii ɔbla ambla klekle anlenkee bia. Diefe ni di Yaa Ninwuna le ninkpe ni nkpa obe lele suoto yi, Kristo layɔ suoto nɔɔ aabla oleɔta wɔ niewo ni nimu aata Yaa. Ntɔ nɔɔ nwu nkpo mafoto situ loo se ninkakatɛ sinta wo ni ninkyeko ɔsaabla wɔ ninanfũ ni kɔya kamɛ, alɛ buabla Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa ɔkpɛ.
58009015	Nle mmle oso di Kristo ninle otii wɔ niekyeko kanya ninii fɔle le mmle, Yaa nfũ ɛɛwako ni batii nɔɔ nɛ. Alɛ batii ba di Yaa lɛlɛɛ ɛɛbla ni bale nwɔ, kɔnɛɛ lɛma kakpanko ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ ni, dile ni nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo. Nle mmle mawa kaanya diekye otii lakpi alɛ, batii ba niasiɛ ni di kanya ninii kofole nwu nkpo kalɔ, Yaa kayɔ sikpile lɛma ankyɛ ma.
58009016	Nse otii lɛkpana kukũ ɛɛtɛ di asaa nɔɔ suoto yi, diediki otii nwu nkpo lekpi fiɛ kuukũ nwu nkpo mbla ɔkpɛ.
58009017	Diekye kukũ ko bɛɛkpana bɛɛtɛ ni ninwɛ osie kuabla ɔkpɛ nse otii wɔ niɛkpana ni kukũ nwu nkpo lekple akpe nkpa. Diediki kakpimaa nɔɔ fiɛ kuukũ nwu nkpo mbla ɔkpɛ.
58009018	Nkpo oso baablako ntɔ ɔkpɛ fiɛ di kanya ninii kofole nwu nkpo bia labla ɔkpɛ nɛ.
58009019	Lɛkasale, Mose laka ɔsaabla wɔ ninsi ni di kufiofa nwu nkpo kamɛ aata batii nwu nkpo. Nni nkpo kamaa, aayɔ banankyue ku batie ntɔ aakpɔtɔɔsa di ntu, aayɔ bafoso sinwini ku ɔfakɔnɔkɔnɔ onwii aanyɔ kaamɛ, aayɔ aakpekpete di kukũ ko kamɛ di afiofa nwu nkpo nsi ni suoto ku batii nwu nkpo bamuu suoto.
58009020	Ni aatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nnya ntɔ be mmle ninle ni nsũ lɛtɛsaa alɛ Yaa lenii ni kanya ku aye alɛ biakyɔɔ nwɔ ni atoko.”
58009021	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di Mose lakpekpete ntɔ nwu nkpo di Akpanta Klekle nwu nkpo suoto ku asaa ya amuu man-yɔ mambla ni Yaa ɔkpɛ suoto nɛ.
58009022	Nwaako kabuɛ nii, di kufiofa kanya yi, ntɔ man-yɔ makleklesa lɛsaa biala suoto. Nse baawii ntɔ kaasɔ yi, Yaa nin-yɔ sikpile aakyɛ.
58009023	Diesiɛko alɛ asaa ya bɛɛbla ni kaasɔ ka mmle suoto eedie ni osi ale, dikpe ni beekleklesa nya di osuku wɔ mmle suoto. Kafɔɔ n-ya ninkpe ni di osi nnya yi, dikpe ni bɛɛyɔ oleɔta wɔ niɛtaka katoo kulenke ni bɛɛyɔ beekleklesa nya.
58009024	Diekye Kristo ditabuo di Olekatakɔ ka baatii lɛyɔ nnɛɛ bɛɛbla ni kamɛ, kale ni nka ninkpe ni di osi kunyii. Kafɔɔ Yaa Kafa kamu kamu aakyɛ, nfũ akpe ni di Yaa anu diisi loo.
58009025	Yuda batii Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo nkyɛ Kakleklekɔ kaamɛ Kakleklekɔ lɛlɛɛ biala ku babɔkɛɛ ntɔ. Kafɔɔ Kristo ditabuo nfa ayɔ suoto nɔɔ ata ole kpinkidi.
58009026	Nse diele nkpo, nse Kristo ntabatoofe diibuo kamɛ obe lele diɛyɔ ni di kayi ka mmle kasɔ kakyekɔ. Kafɔɔ mmle okle nfɛ dite ni nunua yi, Kristo lawa ninwii pɛ di kayi ka mmle ayi yɛntɛle ya mmle kamɛ alɛ aayɔ nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ suoto anta ole diisi loo, andiki wo ankyeko sikpile kamɛ.
58009027	Yaa lɛbla ɛɛta otii alɛ, akpi ninwii pɛ, nni kamaa, abakanko nwɔ.
58009028	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di Kristo layɔ suoto aata ole ninwii pɛ alɛ, aatekete batii kpinwu sikpile di suoto lɛma nɛ. Abakple anwa lɛnyɔɔfa. Kafɔɔ diele alɛ abakple amabla lɛsalɛsaa di sikpile suoto. Kafɔɔ abawa amafũ batii ba ninsi boonyu osuku mantɔɔ ni osie kanya, anta ma nkpa.
58010001	Yuda batii kufiofa nwu nkpo yi, asaa biene ya nimawa ni kunyii lete kule, kuole nkũ ninle lɛsaa biene nwu nkpo nimu. Nioso kufiofa nwu nkpo dilabafuo ofe di oleɔta wɔ manta ni lɛlɛɛ ku lɛlɛɛ kamɛ kubla batii ba niɛwa ni Yaa nfũ bawo nimu.
58010002	Nse fɛ kufiofa nwu nkpo kafuo ma ɔbla manwo nimu yi, nse batoodiɛ ole nwu nkpo kafɔɔ ɔta. Nse fɛ lɛsaa le kafɔɔ oso manta ni ole nwu nkpo ɔbla ditɔɔbla klekle yi, nse otu lɛma kafɔɔ diloosinlo ma lɛpɔɔ ku ninwii di okpile suoto.
58010003	Kafɔɔ oleɔta wɔ mmle nnyumasa batii nwu nkpo sikpile lɛma lɛlɛɛ ku lɛlɛɛ.
58010004	Diekye batie ku banankyue ntɔ dilabafuo sikpile ofoto odiki di batii suoto diidii.
58010005	Nle mmle oso, obe wɔ di Kristo kamawa ni kayi ka mmle aabuɛ aatɔkɔ Yaa alɛ, “Teete, floomiɛ oleɔta ku asaa ɔta, kafɔɔ sitii suoto fɛɛbla fɛɛtɛɛ.
58010006	Babɔkɛɛ oleɔta wɔ beefiɛ ni nimuu di oleɔta akyikye suoto, ee oleɔta wɔ bɛɛta ni di sikpile disi nimbuo fɔ anu.
58010007	Ninfɛ labuɛ nlɛ, ‘Yoo Teete, nnyɛɛ! Ɔwa lɛwa nlɛ kɔbla fɔ dibiesaa, fɛ mmle okle bɛɛkpana ni di suoto nii di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ.’ ”
58010008	Lɛkasale, aabuɛ alɛ, “Floomiɛ oleɔta ku asaa ɔta. Ee asaa ɔta wɔ beefiɛ ni nimuu di oleɔta akyikye suoto ku oleɔta wɔ manta ni di sikpile disi.” Nu aabuɛ ɔlaa wɔ mmle, kafɔɔ kufiofa kanya baatɔɔta oleɔta nwu omuu fiɛ.
58010009	Ninfɛ aabuɛ alɛ, “Yoo Teete, nnyɛɛ! Ɔwa lɛwa nlɛ kɔbla fɔ dibiesaa.” Di osuku wɔ mmle suoto, ni di Yaa ladiki oleɔta kofole nwu nkpo sɛsaabla simuu aatɛ di ɔlɔɔkɔ, ni aayɔ Kristo oleɔta aase di nsinkpo kanya nɛ.
58010010	Ta di Yesu Kristo latuna aabla ni Yaa dibiesaa di oleɔta wɔ aatuna aayɔ suoto nɔɔ aata ni ninwii pɛ ku ayi amuu suoto oso yi, Yaa lefoto wo eediki di sikpile kamɛ.
58010011	Dii biala yi, Yuda batii olebatatɛ nyila manta ole nwu nkpo okle onwii di Yaa Olekatakɔ obe lele. Oleɔta nwu nkpo kafɔɔ diloofuo sikpile otekete di batii suoto diidii.
58010012	Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di Kristo lawa aabata ni ole ninwii di sikpile simuu disi di ayi amuu suoto aaloo nii, ni aasifi aalaasiɛ di Yaa oletanɛɛkyɛ nɛ.
58010013	Diɛyɔ ni di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ, Kristo nfɛ nsoko diɛlaase di obe wɔ di Yaa mayɔ balo nɔɔ ankpee nwɔ ni di nkpaa kalɔ fɛ nkpaa ditikasaa.
58010014	Ole onwii nwu nkpo di Kristo lɛta di ayi amuu suoto yi, diɛta alɛ batii ba bamuu beefoto bɛɛbla ni klekle beekyeko ni sikpile kamɛ, lewo nimu dinaa ni kaloo.
58010015	Nwaako yi, Yaa Ninwuna Klekle lediki dietuo wo klekle. Lɛkasale aabuɛ alɛ,
58010016	“Nnya kanya ninii le kamanii ni ku mma. Di ayi ya ninkɔwa ni kamɛ, Saate labuɛ alɛ, kamayɔ kufiofa nii nkpee ma siitu kamɛ. Kamakpana nwu kafɔɔ nkpee ma di asi kamɛ.”
58010017	Ninfɛ aakple aabuɛ alɛ, “Diidii namasinnyuma sikpile lɛma ku ɔsaatanlolaa ɔbla lɛma.”
58010018	Nse batɔɔyɔ okpile bɛɛkyɛ yi, ni oleɔta kuonwii nsinnaa.
58010019	Nle mmle oso babiloo, bukpe osuku alɛ buabuo di Kakleklekɔ kaamɛ Kakleklekɔ nwu diefe ni di Yesu kukpi nwu nkpo kamɛ.
58010020	Diekye ɛɛyɔ suoto nɔɔ ɛɛta diisi loo, ɛɛsɛkɛtɛ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo osuku fɔle ɛɛta wo. Diefe ni diibula le niasɛ ni akpanta nwu nkpo nin-yɛ diɛta ni suoto nɔɔ simu.
58010021	Di obe wɔ bukpe ni Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo wɔ ninlenke ni di Yaa leyo oso yi,
58010022	bita bukpukuti butɛɛtɛɛ Yaa di otu biene kamɛ ku ofũ onu wɔ ninkpe ni osie. Diekye batoofoto situ loo beekyeko otu wɔ nintɔkɔ ni otii ɔlaa lalaale kamɛ. Beefoto suoto loo simu kafɔɔ di ntu klenkle kamɛ.
58010023	Nioso bita bumufũ ofũ onu wɔ ninkpe wo ni, buodiki mumbuɛ ni buklee osie kanya. Diekye otii wɔ niebuɛ ɔlaa ɛɛtɛ alɛ ababla ni yi, ambla asaa di osuku kanya.
58010024	Nioso bita buyɔ nwu ole baawo suoto, alɛ baakyakaako bawo lɛma, alɛ baadiki lɛbɔmbɔ mantuo bawo lɛma, alɛ baabla dibiene.
58010025	Bitanta buadiɛ kasiisakɔ loo ɔkyɛ buatɛ fɛ mmle okle baatii bawo kɔbla nii. Kafɔɔ bita bukpee bawo osie bulenkeesa fɛ mmle dikaatɛ ni di obe wɔ buɔnya bulɛ Saate Dii nwu nkpo nfɛ kɔtɛɛtɛɛ ni.
58010026	Nse buɔtɛ bulɛ buokple muntɔɔbla sikpile di obe wɔ nfɛ buye ni nwaako ɔlaa nwu nkpo kamaa, ni oleɔta kuonwii nsinnaa kuɔta okpile ɔyɔ ɔkyɛ.
58010027	Kafɔɔ nle ko niebu ni ninle alɛ buasiɛ di lɛyɛkɛ kamɛ munsoko lɛkanko le nikɔwa ni ku ɔtɔ kplɛ wɔ nimafiɛ ni batii ba niɛtaka bayɛ ni di Yaa suoto.
58010028	Otii lele niɛwaalɛ Mose kufiofa nwu nkpo, di batii banyɔ ee batiɛ lebuɛ alɛ, kute nkpo kamaa, manlo otii nwu nkpo, mannyɔɔ nyaami.
58010029	Ni nse otii owo lenyu Yaa Obi nwu nkpo nyakatãa, eenyu Yaa kanya ninii ntɔ nwu nkpo bɛɛyɔ beefoto nwɔ ni sikpile alɛ diedie lɛsalɛsaa, eekpee Yaa Ninwuna Klekle le ninle ni otii sibualɛ sinunsɔ, biɔnya nii, Yaa dilabananfi otii nwu nkpo kootoko alenkee?
58010030	Diekye buye otii wɔ niabuɛ alɛ, “Ami nimbla nkyisa, ami yi, kamata koto.” Ku nwɔ kafɔɔ niebuɛ alɛ, “Saate nwu makanko batii nɔɔ.”
58010031	Lɛyɛkɛsaa kplɛ diɛtɛ dile alɛ faabuo Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa, anaa ni kaloo, ánɛ́.
58010032	Binyuma obe wɔ bianya ni Yaa lɛkpa nwu nkpo, biakple ni bale nwɔ ku kakpɛka kamɛ biafe biadie ni.
58010033	Obe owo yi, baatufa ye di lɛkpaka, baabla ye amumu di batii anu. Obe owo kafɔɔ bialolaa suoto bilɛ biakpɔtɔɔ di mba baabla ni amumu di osuku wɔ mmle okle suoto.
58010034	Biawiko mba baatɛ ni laayo, obe wɔ kafɔɔ baaklee ye asaa amuu baafũ ni di nnɛɛ lee, biakpee otu biadiɛko ma ku suoto lɛyɔɔ, diekye biye bilɛ bikpe lɛsaa le niefũ kɔya dilenke nnya nkpo, diidii kafɔɔ ninamalalaa nii.
58010035	Nkpo oso bitanta nnɛɛ lafee ye di otu okpee kamɛ, diekye letota kplɛ nte ye bibafũ nii.
58010036	Nioso dikpe nii biɛtɛ otu kaasɔ alɛ biafuo Yaa dibiesaa ɔbla, di mmle okle di kɔnɛɛ lee makpanko ni ɔlaa wɔ di Yaa lebuɛ ɛɛtɛ nii.
58010037	Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Obe kɛkɛɛ niebu, nse otii wɔ beebuɛ alɛ abawa nii ntɔɔwa. Alabakpi kamaa.
58010038	Otii nii wɔ ninte ni tinini masiɛ nkpa di ofũ onu kamɛ. Kafɔɔ nwɔ nimakple ni nkpaamaa, suoto dilabayɔɔ mi di suoto nɔɔ.”
58010039	Awo yi, buole batii ba ninkple ni nkpaamaa di ofũ onu lɛma kamɛ man-yu nii. Kafɔɔ yi, bule mba niefũ beenu ni di Yaa lediki nii.
58011001	Ofũ onu ninle alɛ disi otika osie kanya di asaa ya suoto buonyu osuku munta nii, buofũ buokpee bulɛ akpe nii, kuntɛ bulɔɔnya nya.
58011002	Saa yi, ofũ onu niata alɛ bawa loo labuo Yaa anu.
58011003	Ofũ onu niɛta alɛ buofũ buokpee bulɛ Yaa lɛyɔ kanya nɔɔ kamɛ ɔlaa ɛɛbla kayi ka mmle kamuu. Lɛsaa le buɔnya ni yi, Yaa lɛbla ni eekyeko lɛsaa le munɔɔnya ni kamɛ.
58011004	Ofũ onu kamɛ di Abel lata ole biene aata Yaa, kualenkee Kain ole. Ofũ onu nɔɔ niata alɛ aabuo Yaa anu fɛ otii wɔ ninte ni tinini, diekye Yaa omu niafũ nwɔ oleɔta nwu nkpo aabuɛ alɛ kuobuo nwɔ anu. Abel lakpi baa, kafɔɔ ofũ onu nɔɔ oso di ɔlaa nɔɔ lekple kute kuɔkakatɛ kunta wo miɛ.
58011005	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Yaa lakpaa Enok aasifiko osi di obe wɔ akpe ni nkpa alɛ atakpi. Otii kuonwii ditasinnyɔɔ diidii kaakɔkaakɔ, diekye Yaa lakɛnkɛ nwɔ aasifiko osi. Fiɛ abakɛnkɛ nwɔ ansifiko nii, Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, aale otii wɔ niabuo ni Yaa anu osie kanya.
58011006	Otii kuonwii dilaafuo Yaa anu obuo nse anaa ofũ onu. Diekye dikaatɛ alɛ otii lele niɛwa Yaa nfũ, dikpe nii, eefũ eenu alɛ kubio Yaa nkpe, anta letota biene kafɔɔ anta batii ba niewolaa nwɔ ni osie kanya.
58011007	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Noa lanu Yaa kɔka di obe wɔ aatɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, asaa ya ninayiwa kaayi ka mmle di otii diinya anya nii, kɔwa ɔbawa. Aakyɔɔ Yaa kotoko aawola oklo kplɛ wɔ di nnwɔɔ ku leyo nɔɔ kamɛ batii labuo baawɛ ni didiki. Ta ofũ onu nɔɔ wɔ mmle oso, kayi batii bamuu latofo alɛ beekpi lɛpɔɔ, nkpo oso di Yaa labuɛ di Noa suoto alɛ, ale otii wɔ ninte ni tinini nɛ.
58011008	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Abraham lakyɔɔ Yaa kotoko di obe wɔ aalɛɛ nwɔ aatɔkɔ alɛ, adie atɔɔkyɛ kasɔ ka aabuɛ aatɛ alɛ abatɔɔ nii. Aadie di okpoo nɔɔ, aasifi di obe wɔ ananye bia nfũ oofe nii.
58011009	Ofũ onu niata alɛ aasiɛ fɛle ɔfɔɔ di kasɔ ka di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ alɛ abatɔɔ nii. Aasiɛ di abula akpanta kamɛ fɛ mmle okle di Isak ku Yakob kafɔɔ lasiɛ nii. Kasɔ nwu suoto baasiɛ nii, mma di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ alɛ abata fiɛ.
58011010	Abraham labla nle mmle diekye aatoonyu osuku aatɔɔta okpoo wɔ di Yaa omu lebudi, eelolaa nwu ni ku lɛsɔse le ninkpe ni osie.
58011011	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Abraham labakple obi ote nu aafe lebe, di obe wɔ kafɔɔ di Sara dilabasinfuo ni babi olofo. Diekye aafũ Yaa wɔ niabuɛ ɔlaa aatɛ nwɔ ni aanu alɛ, ánkyi di ɔlaa nɔɔ kamaa.
58011012	Nu di Abraham wɔ mmle laloo okpi, kafɔɔ nnwɔɔ kamɛ di banantii kpinwu ladie fɛle awɛntrɛbi lɛpɔ di osi ku lekpo ɔtɛnsia manamafuo ni oloo ɔka diidii.
58011013	Batii ba mmle bamuu lasiɛ nkpa ku ofũ onu baalaadu obe wɔ baakpi nii. Asaa ya di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ ma nii, kɔnɛɛ lɛma ditakpanko. Kafɔɔ baanya nya fanfanfa baablɛfɛsa nnɛɛ baatɛ alɛ dii babafũ nya. Baadiki baabuɛ kafɔɔ alɛ, bafɔɔ ku osuku bakyɛntɛ bale kaasɔ ka mmle suoto.
58011014	Batii ba niabuɛ ni sɛlaa se mmle okle yi, boodiki mantuo klekle alɛ, boonyu osuku manta mma bamu kasɔ ka ninle ma ni kale.
58011015	Nse fɛ mantoobu disi di kasɔ ka baakye nii yi, nse baakple baasifi nfa.
58011016	Kafɔɔ kasɔ ka niefĩ kalenke ni baatoonyu osuku baatɔɔta. Nka ninle Yaa sɛka kalekɔ okpoo nwu nɛ. Nkpo oso sinunsɔ dilɔɔkpɛ Yaa alɛ baalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ Yaa lɛma nɛ. Diekye eelolaa okpoo dibinte ɛɛtɛ ma.
58011017	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Abraham latuna alɛ ɔɔyɔ obi nɔɔ Isak anta ole anta Yaa di obe wɔ aasɔ nwɔ aanyu nii. Obi nwu suoto di Yaa labuɛ ɔlaa aatɛ alɛ abata Abraham nɛ. Kafɔɔ aatuna alɛ ɔɔyɔ obi nwu nkpo onwii anta ole anta Yaa.
58011018	Yaa latɔkɔ nwɔ alɛ, “Isak nwu nkpo suoto fabawɛ banantii ba ɔlaa latɔkɔ fɔ latɛ ni nɛ.”
58011019	Abraham lafũ aanu alɛ, Yaa mafuo bakpi ɔsɛnkɛsa, mansiɛ nkpa. Nwaako, buafuo obuɛ bulɛ, odiki di Yaa ladiki Isak aakyeko bakpi kamɛ aata Abraham.
58011020	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Isak lawii Yakob ku Esau lɛyɔɔ aata kayi kamaa batii ba okle babale nii.
58011021	Ofũ onu niata alɛ obe wɔ di Yakob nfɛ kokpi nii, awii Yosef babi lɛyɔɔ onwii onwii, aatansa Yaa, ni aakpɛ di ɔkyɛnwoso nɔɔ suoto nɛ.
58011022	Ofũ onu niata alɛ obe wɔ di Yosef nfɛ kokpi nii, aakakatɛ aakyeko di Israel batii odie di Egipte kasɔ suoto. Ni aakpee ma kufiofa mmle okle baabla ni akufi nɔɔ ya nimate ni di ɔkya kamɛ nɛ.
58011023	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Mose balofotɛ nɔɔ lawofasa nwɔ awɛntɛ atiɛ di obe wɔ baalofo nwɔ ni kamaa. Baanya alɛ obi wɔ ninkɔlɛ ni onyu ale. Nioso batayɛkɛ alɛ bɔɔwaalɛ Egipte kasɔ nwu nkpo ɔka kufiofa.
58011024	Ofũ onu niata alɛ obe wɔ di Mose lamuɔ nii, aasĩ alɛ, batanlɛɛ nwɔ Ɔka Farao obi sankobi obi.
58011025	Aatuna alɛ oofe diibuo kamɛ ku Yaa babi, alɛ aanya suoto lɛyɔɔ di okpile ɔbla kamɛ di obe kakui kamɛ.
58011026	Mose lanya alɛ, sinunsɔ se babakpee nwɔ ni ta Kristo oso lefũ kɔya dilenke lɛsaawɛ le ninte ni di Egipte kasɔ suoto. Diekye aatoonyu osuku aatɔɔta letota biene le abafũ ankyeko ni Yaa nfũ.
58011027	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Mose ladie di Egipte kasɔ suoto alɛ, atayɛkɛ Ɔka Farao ɔblɔ wɔ abanya nii. Aayila osie kanya fɛle aatɔɔnya Yaa wɔ di anu loo dilɔɔnya nii.
58011028	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Mose lataasa Okpi Diisi Ofe ɔsaabla, ku ntɔ be aata baawiwii ni di kayokontũ biala suoto alɛ, Yaa Tɔkyɛntɛ wɔ niaklee ni kukpi dilaalo Israel batii babi suɔtɔbi kasale kuonwii di Egipte kasɔ suoto.
58011029	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Israel batii lafuo lekpo sɛɛlɛ nwu ɔtaalɛ fɛle kasɔ kosole suoto bakyɛ. Kafɔɔ obe wɔ di Egipte batii lamiɛ alɛ bɔɔtaalɛ nii, lekpo nwu nkpo layɔ ma fɛɛ.
58011030	Ofũ onu niata alɛ Yeriko okpoo siyiyiɛ kplɛ nwu nkpo labiɛ di obe wɔ di Israel batii lakyɛ baakyi sĩ ni ayi akuɛnsĩ.
58011031	Ofũ onu niata alɛ batalo sɔnɔkpeetɛ Rahab fɛ mmle okle baalo ni batokopĩtɛ ba niasĩ ni Yaa. Diekye aatuna aafũ Israel batii ba baakpee alɛ balaala ni kasɔ nwu nkpo ninfa baasoosa di ɔkyɛ nɔɔ.
58011032	Ɔmɛnlaa kaple ntɔkɔ ye? Obe nnaa, nse ntɔbakakatɛ di Gideon ku Barak ku Samson ku Yefta ku Dawid ku Samuel ku Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ suoto.
58011033	Ofũ onu niata alɛ batii ba mmle bawo lalenkee sɛka nlekɔ di kakpɛ kamɛ. Bawo kafɔɔ lata batii labla asaa di osuku kanya. Bawo kafɔɔ nnɛɛ lakpanko Yaa ɔlaa wɔ aabuɛ aatɛ alɛ ababla ni suoto. Bawo kafɔɔ lamaasa bakplɛle nnya.
58011034	Ni baawo kafɔɔ laniisa ɔtɔ kplɛ wɔ natoofiɛ ni bembembe, ni baadie di balo lɛma nnɛɛ kamɛ nɛ. Batii ba mmle bamuu lɛma bia osie batawɛ, kafɔɔ Yaa lakpee ma osie, baabakple basientɛ di kakpɛ kamɛ, baalenkee bakpɛtɛ bamba.
58011035	Ofũ onu niata alɛ basanko lakple baafũ babilɛma ba niakple baataka ni baakpi kamɛ. Batii bamba kafɔɔ latuna baabla ma amumu, baasĩ alɛ, batandiki ma leeyo katenkɔ dialaase di obe wɔ baakpi nii. Baatuna baabla nle mmle diekye, baafũ baanu alɛ babawɛ nkpa fɔle be nikɔwa ni, dilɛ dilenke ni miɛ nle be mmle.
58011036	Batii bawo, batii wo lɛma lama ma, baapɛ ma kafɔɔ. Batii bawo kafɔɔ baapɛ akpo, baalaatɛ ma laayo.
58011037	Baasafɔ batii bawo afuɔ, baabɛ bawo kafɔɔ ku sɔɔ di akyuu anyɔ. Baalo bawo kafɔɔ ku apa. Bawo, bafoso ku batie akũ baatoonyukũ baatookyi, diekye bapiitɛ baale osie kanya. Batii labla bawo amumu ku disi osie, osie kanya.
58011038	Ta dibiene lɛma oso batawɛ lɛba nwaa baasiɛ di kayi ka mmle batii kamɛ. Nioso baakyɛ baatookyi sɛfaafuu ku abokote kamɛ fɛ bafɔɔ. Baasiɛ kafɔɔ di sifuɔntuu kamɛ ku atuɛ kaasɔ kamɛ.
58011039	Batii ba mmle bamuu lefũ leyooto biene ta ofũ onu lɛma oso. Kafɔɔ kuonwii lɛma kɔnɛɛ ditakpanko lɛsaa le ɔlaa di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ ma nii.
58011040	Diekye Yaa ntɔɔbla disibu le niɛtaka katoo dilenke ni ɛɛtɛ ɛɛta wo. Lɛsaa le oso ɛɛbla ni nkpo ninle alɛ, diediki awo buɔbakyakaa ma di suoto fiɛ ababla awo ba dudu munwo nimmu.
58012001	Nkpo oso, di obe wɔ bukpe ni batii kpinwu ba mmle di nkpa lɛma kotuo wo ni lɛsaa le ninle ni ofũ onu yi, bita bukpee okyiini buɔbla ɔkpɛ wɔ ninte wo ni siitũ alɛ buɔɔta disi. Biɛta budiki lɛsaa lele nimawa wo ni siisuku loo suoto ku okpile wɔ ninkle wo ni osie kanya butɛ di ɔlɔɔkɔ.
58012002	Biɛta buta anu loo atika di Yesu lete suoto, otii wɔ suoto di ofũ onu loo ntika ni diɛyɔ ni kaasɔ kakyekɔ diɛlaase ni kaanyɛntɛlekɔ. Aafe diibuo kamɛ aakpi di kowoso suoto. Kafɔɔ atayɔ nwu ole di sinunsɔ se nintika ni di otii wɔ niekpi ni koowoso suoto, diekye aanya suoto lɛyɔɔ le niate nwɔ ni sĩitũ. Kafɔɔ nunua yi, nfɛ aasi di Yaa lɛkakpomii ɔlɔɔkɔ di oletanɛɛkyɛ.
58012003	Bibu disi di Yesu suoto binyu, di mmle okle aatuna aafe ni diibuo kamɛ di bakpileblatɛ nnɛɛ kamɛ, alɛ nnɛɛ dilaafee ye bipɛbikple ni.
58012004	Kuntɛ biɔkpɛ minyila di okpile suoto yi, biibadu nfũ dikpe ni alɛ biewii ni ntɔ lee kaasɔ.
58012005	Bitooyee ɔnyɛɛ sekpeelaa se di Yaa lakakatɛ alɛɛ ye ni fɛ babi? Aakakatɛ alɛ, “Obi nii, tan-yɔ Saate lɛnanfi fɛ lɛsaa le ninanfĩ nii. Tanta nnɛɛ lafee fɔ nse oosĩ ɔlaa anta fɔ.
58012006	Diekye batii ba di Saate nwu mbɔmbɔ nii yi, mma annanfi nɛ. Batii ba kafɔɔ eefũ alɛ bale nwɔ ni babi yi, mma annanfi kootoko nɛ.”
58012007	Bikpee otu nse bɔɔnanfi ye fɛle Yaa nikɔnanfi babi. Diekye obi kuonwii nnaa alɛ diidii ote diɛnanfi nwɔ nii.
58012008	Nse baananfi ye fɛ mmle okle ɔɔnanfi ni babi nɔɔ bamu yi, ni diotuo alɛ, biele nwɔ babi bamu, ni otii bamba babi bile.
58012009	Diɛkyakaa ni di nle mmle suoto yi, bamuu loo bukpe bate kaasɔ ka mmle suoto ninanfi wo mun-yɔ dibu munta ma nii. Ni lɛ oso nfɛ munaawakosa suoto kasɔ buta Yaa wɔ ninle ni anwuna loo kote alɛ buasiɛ nkpa.
58012010	Bate loo kaasɔ ka mmle suoto nnanfi wo di obe kakuii kamɛ fɛ mmle okle beenyu alɛ dilɛma nii. Kafɔɔ Yaa nnwɔɔ yi, annanfi wo di mmle okle dialɛ ninta wo nii alɛ, buate klekle fɛ nnwɔɔ.
58012011	Lɛnanfi kuninwii nimɛnɛmɛnɛ di obe wɔ kamɛ bɔɔnanfi ni otii nwu nkpo, nimbuo nwɔ suoto. Kafɔɔ sɛmaa, lɛnanfi nwu nkpo nta alɛ otii nwu nkpo mbla asaa di osuku kanya ante tinini, ansiɛ nkpa di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ.
58012012	Bisinnaa osie, nioso bikple bikpee suoto lee osie.
58012013	Biediki sisuku se ninlɛ ni nwaa bita suoto biɛkyɛ sĩ di suoto alɛ batii ba di akunkyi nsinnaa ni osie dilaanɔɔ, kafɔɔ akunkyi lɛma nwu nkpo kawɛ osie.
58012014	Bikpee okyiini alɛ biasiɛ di atoko ɔkyɛ ole kamɛ ku batii bamuu. Bienyu kafɔɔ bilɛ biesiɛ nkpa klekle. Diekye otii kuonwii dilɔbanya Saate nwu nkpo nse aasiɛ nkpa klekle.
58012015	Bilolaa binyu nwaa bilɛ otii kuonwii dieyu Yaa sibualɛ se mmle, alɛ diata alɛ okpile odu wɔ ninkpe ni olo kakɔntɔ kaamɛ lee alɛ, kuakpɔkpɔtɔsa batii kpinwu alɛ baakpɔnɔnfɔ.
58012016	Bilolaa binyu nwaa bilɛ otii kuonwii dilaale sɔnɔkpeetɛ ee anunsɔsaa blatɛ fɛ mmle okle di Esau labla nii. Di obe wɔ aayɔ sɛnɔɔfo nɔɔ aasunsũ aafũ ni alesaa lɛbɛsibii ninwii pɛ.
58012017	Fɛ mmle okle biye nii, sɛmaa Esau lamiɛ osie kanya alɛ se aafũ dikusɛkusɛ fɛle obi nɔɔfole fiɛ, kafɔɔ ote lasĩ nwɔ ɔta. Diekye osuku kuonwii ditasinwɛ nwɔ alɛ aakyɛlɛnsa lɛsaa le aabla nii. Nu aawi kaku osie kanya alɛ oofũ dikusɛkusɛ nwu nkpo, atasinwɛ ni.
58012018	Diele Sinai kobokote ko biafuo ni ɔkpanko kuofiɛ ni kafɔɔ ku ɔtɔ bembembe nfũ biɛwa fɛ mmle okle di Israel batii lakyɛ nii. Diele nlokonkyɛ ku ditunu ku afɛɛfɔ siene nfũ kafɔɔ biɛwa.
58012019	Diele kafɔɔ dikyukyoo le sɛɛlɔ ni sĩ nkpe ni osie ku sɛlɔ onu wɔ di Israel batii lanu ni baatikiti lekoto alɛ sitasimbuɛ ni ɔlaa nfũ biɛwa.
58012020	Diekye balabafuo oyila di kufiofa ko baakpee ma ni suoto. Baatɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Nse lɛsaa lewo ee bia bɔkɛɛ lɛkpanko kobokote nwu nkpo yi, baasafɔ nwɔ afuɔ balo.”
58012021	Lɛsaa le baanya ni ninfa latɛ diabla lɛyɛkɛsaa kplɛ. Nioso diata alɛ Mose labuɛ alɛ, “Lɛyɛkɛ ntoomufũ mi dita alɛ kotũtũkũ kpakpakpa.”
58012022	Kafɔɔ aye yi, Sion kobokote suoto biɛwa, dile ni Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni okpoo, kule ni Yaa kafa Yerusalem. Nfũ di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ nkpe nkpe, nkpe nii ku suoto lɛyɔɔ.
58012023	Kakyakaa nii, bitɔɔwa Yaa babi kasale bawokalɛɛkɔ, mba ayooto bɛɛkpana ni di Yaa kafa. Bitɔɔwa Yaa wɔ ninle ni batii bamuu kantɛ ku batii biene ba nintookpi ni di Yaa lɛbla ma anwuna ɛɛbla ni klekle beewo ni nimu nfũ.
58012024	Bitɔɔwa kafɔɔ Yesu wɔ niekyeko kanya ninii fɔle Yaa nfũ ɛɛwako ni batii nɔɔ nfũ. Biɛwa kafɔɔ ntɔ nɔɔ be beewiwii ni nfũ dikle ni ɔlaa wɔ ninlenke ni Abel ntɔ be baawii ni suoto.
58012025	Nioso bilolaa binyu nwaa bilɛ nse Yaa kɔkakatɛ anta ye yi, bilaasĩ nwɔ ɔlaa onu. Diekye batii nwu nkpo lasĩ nwɔ ɔlaa onu di obe wɔ aasĩ ɔlaa aata ma ni kaasɔ ka mmle suoto. Nioso batafuo otoso di letokonanfi nɔɔ nwu kalɔ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di lele wo mate nɛ. Lele wo manlenkee nse buosĩ Yaa wɔ nikɔkatatɛ di osi anta wo ni kaasɔ ka mmle ɔlaa onu.
58012026	Ɔlaa nɔɔ latũkunsa kasɔ ka mmle di obe nwu nkpo kamɛ aakakatɛ nii. Aakple aabuɛ kafɔɔ aatɛ alɛ, “Kamakple ntũkunsa kasɔ ka mmle ninwii. Kafɔɔ nunua yi, diesinle kasɔ ka mmle lete kamatũkunsa kafɔɔ ku osi kamatũkunsa.”
58012027	Sɛlaa se mmle aabuɛ alɛ, “Kamakple ntũkunsa ni ninwii,” kutuo wo klekle alɛ, lɛsaa lele di Yaa lɛbla diotũkũ kamaa, abamufũ ni antũkunsa, anwɔɔsa ni. Diediki asaa ya ninantũkũ ni lete nimabu.
58012028	Nkpo oso bita bupɛ Yaa sɛfa, diekye bukpe sɛka kalekɔ ka ninantũkũ ni diidii alɛ bubabuo. Nioso bita busumu Yaa di osuku wɔ niesiɛko ni suoto ku lɛyɛkɛ, buɔyɔ dibu kafɔɔ butɔɔ.
58012029	Diekye Yaa loo ninle ɔtɔ wɔ ninfiɛ asaa anlalaasa ni nɛ.
58013001	Bibɔmbɔ bawo obe lele fɛle Kristo kamɛ babilɛma.
58013002	Bitanyee bafɔɔ otoofũ di ayo lee. Diekye batii bawo labla nkpo baafũ Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ batatofo nii.
58013003	Bienyuma mba ninte ni laayo fɛ minkoma ninte laayo. Bienyuma mba kafɔɔ bɔɔbla ni amumu fɛ minkoma bɔɔbla amumu nwu nkpo.
58013004	Bita dibu disiɛ baamuu lee sɛsa ku sɛsɔfɔ kamɛ. Basa ku basɔfɔ batandie bawo kamaa. Diekye Yaa makanko basɔnɔkpeetɛ bamuu ku mba nikotetee nii.
58013005	Bitansɛɛsa anu kooto suoto. Biɛta lɛsaa le ninkpe ye ni dibuo ye anu. Diekye Yaa lebuɛ alɛ, “Namadie ye nnɛɛ diidii. Namadiki ye atoko kafɔɔ diidii.”
58013006	Nkpo oso buafuo obuɛ ku sɛkambi bulɛ, “Saate nwu nkpo ninle mi kyakaakotɛ, nioso namayɛkɛ. Be di otii wo nii kafuo mi ɔbla?”
58013007	Binyuma batunletɛ lee ba niabuɛ Yaa ɔlaa baataye ni. Bibu disi binyu mmle okle baasiɛ ni nkpa, bienyu ofũ onu lɛma nwu bitekete.
58013008	Yesu Kristo ninkyi diidii. Mmle okle aate ni di obe wɔ nintɔbafe ni kamɛ, nkpo okle kafɔɔ ate miɛ nɛ. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ abate dinaa ni kaloo nɛ.
58013009	Bitanfũ asaa otuo bamba ya baatii kotuo ni ate ate bianu alɛ biadie di osuku biene nwu nkpo suoto. Yaa sibualɛ lete ninkpee ye situ osie, diele afiofa ya nintika ni diɛ alesaa ole suoto, anankyakaako batii ba nimbla nya ni di suoto.
58013010	Awo yi, oleɔta akyikye anwii nkpe wo di olebatatɛ ba ninta ni ole di Yuda batii Olekatakɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ, nnaa osuku manle ni alesaa ya nintika nya ni di suoto.
58013011	Yuda batii Oletatɛ Nɔɔfo n-yɔ babɔkɛɛ ntɔ ankyɛnko Kakleklekɔ kaamɛ Kakleklekɔ, anaata ole di sikpile disi. Kafɔɔ babɔkɛɛ nwu nkpo bamu manfiɛ ma di okpoo nwu nkpo ɔlɔɔkɔ.
58013012	Nle mmle oso di Yesu kafɔɔ lakpi di okpoo kplɛ nwu nkpo ɔlɔɔkɔ nɛ. Ku disitikasaa alɛ aafoto batii nkyeko sikpile kamɛ ku nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ ntɔ.
58013013	Nkpo oso yi, bita bukyɛ ɔkyɛ nɔɔ di okpoo nwu nkpo ɔlɔɔkɔ alɛ sinunsɔ se baakpee nwɔ ni yi, awoo baakpee wo sĩ fãa.
58013014	Diekye kaasɔ ka mmle suoto yi, bunaa okpoo kuonwii bubasiɛ nwu ni kaamɛ obe lele. Kafɔɔ buonyu osuku munta okpoo wɔ nikamawa nii.
58013015	Nkpo oso yi, obe lele bita buyɔ katansa buta Yaa fɛ oleɔta diefe ni di Kristo suoto. Nni ninle lɛsaa le nindie ninkye ni batii ba niefũ leyooto nɔɔ beenu ni kanya kamɛ nɛ.
58013016	Bitanyee dibiene ɔbla ɔta bawo, ku bawo kafɔɔ asaa ɔta. Diekye nle mmle ɔbla nle oleɔta wɔ nimbuo ni Yaa anu.
58013017	Bikyɔɔ batunletɛ lee ɔlaa atoko, biɛwakosa suoto kasɔ bita ma baakpaa ye. Diekye mma nikonyu ye nɛ, fɛ batii ba nimata ni nkuntaa di nkpa lee suoto manta ni Yaa. Bibu ma baabla ɔkpɛ wɔ mmle ku suoto lɛyɔɔ alɛ kulaakple atoo kuta ma. Nse diele nkpo, ni ɔkpɛ lɛma ɔbla dilabale lɛkyakaako dita ye.
58013018	Bipɛ ɔlaa bitɔɔta Yaa diisi loo. Buofũ buonu bulɛ otu loo diloolo wo lɛpɔɔ kuninwii. Diekye buomiɛ bulɛ butɔɔbla lɛsaa le ninlɛ ni obe lele.
58013019	Kotikiti ye lekoto osie kanya nlɛ, biapɛ ɔlaa minta Yaa alɛ aakplesa mi anwako ɔkyɛ lee di obe kakui kamɛ.
58013020	Yaa wɔ ninta ni atoko ɔkyɛ ole, aasɛnkɛsa ni Saate Yesu wɔ ninle ni Bafosokpatɛ Kplɛ aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ, diefe ni di ntɔ kanya ninii fɔle nwu nkpo ninnaa ni kaloo,
58013021	ayɔ asaa biene amuu ata ye fãa alɛ biafuo nwɔ dibiesaa ɔbla. Afe di Yesu Kristo suoto aabla lɛsaa le ninlɛ nwɔ ni kaamɛ loo. Lete nɔɔ lele ninle leklekle ninnaa ni kaloo. Diwa kaanya.
58013022	Babiloo, kotikiti ye lekoto nlɛ, biakyɔɔ atoko di ɔlaa wɔ mmle kɔkpana n-yɔ nkpee ye ni osie, diekye kukũ kakui ko kule.
58013023	Komiɛ nlɛ nta ye bitofo nlɛ, batoodiɛ obiloo Timoteo di leyo katenkɔ. Nse ɛɛwa ɔkyɛ nii wla kamaa, munko nwɔ bubawa mumanya ye.
58013024	Bisɛɛsa batunletɛ lee bita wo ku Yaa batii nwu nkpo bamuu. Babiloo ba niekye ni Italia bamuu kafɔɔ alɛ bɔɔsɛɛsa ye biene biene.
58013025	Yaa sibualɛ disiɛko bamuu lee.
59001001	Ami, Yakobo, wɔ ninle ni Yaa ku Saate Yesu Kristo kpɛmblatɛ nikɔkpana kukũ ko mmle nta aye Yuda batii lefosi nfaabi nnyɔ bafũbanutɛ ba bamuu niɛsamii bisi ni kaayi ka mmle aba aba. Kɔsɛɛsa ye kafɔɔ.
59001002	Babiloo, nse sɛlaa ate ate kɔwa ye di suoto yi, biɛta suoto siyɔɔ ye.
59001003	Diekye biye bilɛ sɛlaa se ninwa ye ni di suoto nsɔ ofũ onu lee kunnyu. Nkpo oso nfɛ di otu okpee nwɛ nɛ.
59001004	Bita otu lee okpee kudiki suoto kutuo di sɛsaabla lee simuu kamɛ alɛ biale batii ba niewo ni nimu. Mmle okle lɛɛsalɛsaa dilaafĩ ye ni.
59001005	Nse ninumbe lefĩ otii owo kaamɛ lee yi, ni aakaalɛ Yaa, abayɔ antɔɔ. Diekye Yaa ndiki kafutu nɔɔ kamɛ anta otii biala niɛkaalɛ nwɔ lɛsaa di sibualɛ nɔɔ kamɛ.
59001006	Kafɔɔ otii lele nikɔpɛ ɔlaa anta yi, dikpe ni eefũ Yaa eenu. Dinaa alɛ disibu nɔɔ nsɛ anyɔ. Diekye otii wɔ diisibu nɔɔ lɛsɛ ni anyɔ yi, nkpo ate fɛ lekpo ntu be kɔɔfɛɛfɔ nfɛ nintoofenko ni katoo ku kala nɛ.
59001007	-
59001008	Otii wɔ diisibu nɔɔ lɛsɛ ni anyɔ di ɔsaabla nɔɔ diete ni tinini, atantika anu alɛ abafũ lɛsalɛsaa ankyeko Saate nwu nfũ.
59001009	Nse Yaa lɛtakatɛsa ofũonutɛ wɔ ninle ni piitɛ katoo yi, aata suoto siyɔɔ nwɔ.
59001010	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ nse Yaa lɛwakosa ofũonutɛ wɔ ninle ni saawɛntɛ kasɔ yi, aata suoto siyɔɔ nwɔ nɛ. Diekye saawɛntɛ obe mafɛ fɛ mmle okle di ɔfa atoto nkpa ankpete ni kaasɔ nɛ.
59001011	Fɛ mmle kuufĩ ndie ni ku abe kumpɛ ni ɔfa, leetoto nɔɔ nyɔɔ ninkpa nimpɛ ni kaasɔ, sɛɛlɛ ni nwu n-yu nii, nkpo okle kafɔɔ di saawɛntɛ kamawɔɔ di obe wɔ akyɛ oofe ni katoo ku kala di sɛkpɛ nɔɔ suoto nɛ.
59001012	Suoto siyɔɔ otii wɔ niefũ eenu ni eekpee ni osie di ɔsɔ onyu kamɛ. Diekye nse nnɛɛ diefee nwɔ, eefe kaamɛ eeloo, Saate nwu mayɔ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo ɔlaa wɔ eebuɛ ɛɛtɛ alɛ abata ni otii wɔ nimbɔmbɔ nwɔ ni aantɔɔ fɛ letota.
59001013	Nse bɛɛsɔ otii owo beenyu, atambuɛ alɛ, “Yaa nfũ di ɔsɔ onyu wɔ mmle lekye.” Diekye lɛsalɛsaa dilaafuo Yaa ɔsɔ onyu alɛ abla okpile. Nkpo oso nwɔɔ omu nɔɔ kafɔɔ ánsɔ otii kuonwii aanyu alɛ abla okpile.
59001014	Kafɔɔ otii akɔnsɔkleesaa nɔɔ amu ninkyɔnkyɔ nwɔ annanfi nwɔ aakpee di ɔsɔ onyu kamɛ.
59001015	Nse akɔnsɔkleesaa nɔɔ nwu nkpo ntoole nwɔ suoto kamɛ yi, ni aambla okpile nɛ. Nse okpile nwu nkpo kafɔɔ ntɔɔpɔ, ninwako nwɔ kukpi.
59001016	Babiloo bɔmbɔtɛ, bitanta otii kuonwii lakyɔnkyɔ ye di nle mmle suoto.
59001017	Lɛtasaa biene lele ku n-ya buɔnya bulɛ eewo ni niimu lekye Yaa nfũ. Otii wɔ niɛbla ni kufĩ, kɔwɛntɛ ku awɛntrɛbi anankyi ni diidii, fɛ mmle okle di osi asaa ya mmle nkyi di oyududu lɛnya mmunikĩi anta wo ni ditunu.
59001018	Nnwɔɔ niɛtɛ diibiesaa nɔɔ kanya alɛ ɔɔta wo nkpa di nwaako ɔlaa nɔɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ alɛ buakple ɔsaabla finle di asaa ya ɛɛbla ni amuu kamɛ.
59001019	Babiloo bɔmbɔtɛ, binyuma ɔlaa wɔ mmle. Otii biala apɛsɛwa ku ɔlaa onu, kafɔɔ atɛ suoto ku lɛkakatɛ. Atantɔɔnya ɔblɔ kafɔɔ wlawla.
59001020	Diekye ɔblɔ ninta otii labla lɛsaa le ninte ni tinini di Yaa komiɛ alɛ abla nii.
59001021	Nkpo oso bidiɛ ɔsaabla lele ninɔɔlɛ ni onyu ɔbla ku nkpa kpile biala osiɛ. Biɛwakosa suoto kasɔ bita Yaa, biemufũ ɔlaa nɔɔ wɔ ɛɛpɛ eekpee ye ni siitu kamɛ biklee, mmle okle dibata alɛ minwɛ ni didiki.
59001022	Bitanle ɔlaa biene nwu banutɛ lete, kafɔɔ biyɔ nwu bikpee di ɔkpɛ ɔbla kamɛ. Nse diele nkpo, ni suoto ko biɔkyɔnkyɔ.
59001023	-
59001024	Diekye otii lele nienu ɔlaa biene wɔ mmle, anan-yɔ nwu akpee di ɔkpɛ ɔbla kamɛ, ote ate fɛ otii wɔ ninnyu ni suoto di awɛwɛ kamɛ annya mmle okle ate nii, kafɔɔ nfanwu nse ɛɛkyɛ eesifi, atooyee mmle okle ate nii.
59001025	Kafɔɔ otii lele niebu Yaa kufiofa ko mmle niewo ni kunta ni otii didiki, eemufũ kũ eeklee di okyiini okpee kamɛ, ninanle alɛ onu ko eenu nwu eeyee yi, Yaa kamawii otii nwu nkpo lɛyɔɔ di lɛsaa lele ɔɔbla kamɛ.
59001026	Nse otii owo konyu alɛ eefũ Yaa eenu, ananfuo okplalomii nɔɔ omufũ oklee di lɛkakatɛ kamɛ, ni ofũ onu nɔɔ nwu nkpo lɛbla kasakasa, suoto ɔɔkyɔnkyɔ.
59001027	Ofũ onu wɔ di Teete Yaa konyu alɛ kuɔkpa ni kamɛ di okpile kuonwii diesi ni kaamɛ ninle alɛ, baanyu bakuɛbi ku bakpisɔfɔ diibuo lɛma kamɛ. Otii kadiki suoto kafɔɔ ankyeko asaa ya ninkpɔnɔnfɔsa ni otii nkpa kaayi ka mmle kamɛ.
59002001	Babiloo, di obe wɔ bitoofũ Saate loo Yesu Kristo wɔ ninle ni lɛkpa Saate bienu nii, bitannyu batii di anu biabla asaa.
59002002	Bita buyɔ bulɛ batii banyɔ banwii lɛwa ye bawokalɛɛkɔ. Onwii nle saawɛntɛ ɛɛkpa dibula biene, eekpee kafɔɔ koto sɛɛle lɛkɔnii. Ɔnyɔɔfa kafɔɔ nle piitɛ eekpee asaa kofole kpɔnɔnfɔɔ.
59002003	Nse biefukuti anu biɛta saawɛntɛ nwu nkpo niɛkpa ni dibula biene biɛtɔkɔ nwɔ bilɛ, “Lekoto nnya kasiɛkɔ lɛfɔ ninfũ.” Kafɔɔ biɛtɔkɔ piitɛ nwu nkpo bilɛ, “Dila ninfa, ee basiɛ kaasɔ fukuti di nkpaatũ nii ninfũ.”
59002004	Biɔnya nii di nle mmle ɔbla kamɛ diele disibu kpile biɛyɔ bikle biɔta lɛkanko minkpee kasɛ di bawolee ntɛɛ?
59002005	Babiloo bɔmbɔtɛ, bikyɔɔ atoko bienu! Yaa lediki bapiitɛ kaayi ka mmle ɛɛbla ma basaawɛntɛ di Kristo ofũ onu kamɛ. Alɛ baawɛ Yaa sɛka kalekɔ nwu nkpo ɔlaa wɔ eebuɛ ɛɛtɛ alɛ abata ni batii ba nimbɔmbɔ nwɔ nii.
59002006	Kafɔɔ biloobu bapiitɛ! Diele basaawɛntɛ nwu nkpo ninyinka ye mantɛ kaasɔ, mankpaa ye mankyɛnko nkankɔ?
59002007	Basaawɛntɛ nwu nkpo ninle batii ba kafɔɔ nimbuɛ ni sɛlaa kpile di leyooto biene le biɛwɛ ni di Kristo kamɛ nɛ.
59002008	Nse biele Yaa kufiofa ko bɛɛkpana ni di Kɔkpana Klekle kamɛ beekyeko ni Sɛka kalekɔ nɔɔ nwu nkpo suoto yi, ni bibabla lɛsaa di osuku kanya. Bɛɛkpana alɛ, “Bɔmbɔ otii wo lɛfɔ fɛ afɔ omu lɛfɔ suoto.”
59002009	Kafɔɔ nse bienyu batii di anu di akleesaa nɔɔ suoto biɛbla asaa yi, ni bitɔɔbla okpile. Kufiofa nwu nkpo kafɔɔ ntoolo ye lɛpɔɔ alɛ biele kũ.
59002010	Diekye otii lele niele afiofa nwu nkpo amuu ɛɛtaalɛ kunwii kamaa, atɔɔtaalɛ abule.
59002011	Diekye Yaa wɔ niekpee kufiofa alɛ, “Otii atankpee ni asɔnɔ.” Nnwɔɔ nwu kafɔɔ niebuɛ alɛ, “Otii atanlo owo nɔɔ nɛ.” Nkpo oso nse faakpee asɔnɔ kafɔɔ feelo owo lɛfɔ kamaa, ni fatɔɔtaalɛ kuofiofa nɛ.
59002012	Lɛsaa lele bibabuɛ ee mimbla yi, binyuma bilɛ kufiofa ko ninta ni otii ɔnyɛɛ ɔtɛ yi, nkũ di Yaa mayɔ ankanko wo nɛ.
59002013	Diekye nse Yaa kɔkanko otii yi, alabanyɔɔ nyaami, nse otii nwu nkpo diɛnya bawo nɔɔ nyaami. Kafɔɔ nse ɛɛnya bawo nɔɔ nyaami yi, ni Yaa kafɔɔ manyɔɔ nyaami.
59002014	Babiloo, nse otii owo kobuɛ alɛ akpe ofũ onu, di ofũ onu nwu nkpo diloodiki suoto kutuo di ɔkpɛ ɔbla kamɛ, ofũ onu nwu nkpo, ɔnwaa kule? Ofũ onu nwu kafuo nwɔ odiki?
59002015	Bita buyɔ bulɛ babiloo sankobi bawo ee babiloo suɔtɔbi bawo niefũ beenu nii, akleesaa lɛma ntɔɔbɛbɛɛ ma di suoto, banaa alesaa kafɔɔ boole.
59002016	Lɛmɛnbiene ninsi kaamɛ, nse otii owo kaamɛ loo lɛtɔkɔ ma alɛ, “Aye bitɔɔkyɛ, Yaa mawii ye lɛyɔɔ, bibawɛ akleesaa minkpee, bibawɛ alesaa kafɔɔ minle, minanta ma asaa ya mmle niefĩ ma ni?”
59002017	Nkpo okle kute di ofũ onu kamɛ nɛ. Nse otii owo alɛ akpe ofũ onu anan-yɔ ofũ onu nɔɔ nwu nkpo akpee di ɔkpɛ ɔbla kamɛ yi, ofũ onu fukuti kule.
59002018	Kafɔɔ otii owo mabuɛ alɛ, “Otii owo nkpe ofũ onu, ɔbamba kafɔɔ nkpe ɔkpɛ biene ɔbla.” Kafɔɔ kɔtɔkɔ otii nwu nkpo nlɛ, “Adiki ofũ onu nɔɔ wɔ di ɔkpɛ biene ɔbla diesi ni kaamɛ atuo mi. Ami kafɔɔ matuo nwɔ fɔ ofũ onu nii diefe ni di ɔkpɛ biene nii ɔbla kamɛ.”
59002019	Feefũ feenu falɛ Yaa onwii lete ninkpe? Nkpo kute nɛ. Kafɔɔ nyuma falɛ anwuna kpile kafɔɔ lefũ eenu. Nkpo oso anyɛkɛ, antootũtũkũ nɛ.
59002020	Buutɛ! Foomiɛ falɛ ndiki ntuo fɔ nlɛ ofũ onu di ɔkpɛ biene ɔbla diesi kaamɛ ofũ onu fukuti kule?
59002021	Lɛ diawa fiɛ di Yaa lata ɔwa loo Abraham lɛbɛ? Diekye di ɔkpɛ ɔbla nɔɔ oso. Diekye aayɔ obi nɔɔ Isak aatika di oleɔta akyikye suoto alɛ ɔɔta ole anta Yaa.
59002022	Flɔɔnya falɛ ofũ onu nɔɔ ku ɔkpɛ ɔbla nɔɔ niakyɛ? Ɔkpɛ ɔbla nɔɔ niata alɛ ofũ onu nɔɔ lawo niimu.
59002023	Nle mmle oso di Kɔkpana Klekle sɛlaa se aabuɛ aatɛ ni lawa kaanya nɛ. Kuabuɛ alɛ, “Abraham lafũ Yaa aanu, ofũ onu nɔɔ oso, Yaa latɔɔ lɛbɛ.” Ni di Yaa lalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ siɛwo nɔɔ nɛ.
59002024	Bitɔɔnya nfɛ bilɛ Yaa nínnyu otii ofũ onu lete aatɔɔ lɛbɛ, kafɔɔ ɔkpɛ ɔbla nɔɔ nkyakaa.
59002025	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ diawa di sɔnɔkpeetɛ Rahab suoto nɛ. Yaa latɔɔ lɛbɛ di ɔkpɛ nɔɔ ɔbla kamɛ di obe wɔ kamɛ aafũ Israel batii ba ninwofa manwolaa ni asaa kamɛ kɔfɔɔ leeyo nɔɔ, aakyakaako ma, aatuo ma ni osuku bamba baatoso baasifi nii.
59002026	Nkpo oso, fɛ mmle nse ninwuna diesi di suoto sina kamɛ siekpi nii, nkpo okle kafɔɔ di ofũ onu di ɔkpɛ ɔbla diɛkyakaa yi, ofũ onu nwu nkpo lekpi nɛ.
59003001	Babiloo, bitanta batii kpinwu kaamɛ lee lakple basaatuotɛ. Diekye fɛ mmle okle biye nii, Yaa makanko awo ba ninle ni basaatuotɛ klekle anlenkeesa batii bule.
59003002	Diekye obe kpi, awo ba dudu munlolaa asaa buabla. Kafɔɔ nse otii owo nkpe anlolaa asaa ambla di sɛlaa se ambuɛ ni kamɛ yi, ni eewo, anfuo suoto nɔɔ kafɔɔ omufũ osie kanya.
59003003	Mun-yɔ okũ munkpee di pɔnkɔ kanya bulɛ aakyɔɔ wo atoko, munfuo nwɔ ɔkpaa ɔkyɛnko lɛba le ninlɛ wo nii.
59003004	Binyu oklo di lekpo osi, mmle okle kuomuɔ ni, kɔɔfɛɛfɔ siene ntuka nwu kunsifiko ni. Kafɔɔ kakatĩ biibii di oklo wantɛ n-yɔ amunikĩisa nwu anfenko lɛba le oomiɛ alɛ kufe nii.
59003005	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di okplalomii nte nɛ. Nu kule lɛsaa biibii di otii suoto yi, asaa kplɛ suoto kunkanta. Binyu mmle okle leepoo lemuɔ ni, kafɔɔ ɔtɔ biibii ninfiɛ nimuu.
59003006	Nkpo okle di okplalomii nte fɛ ɔtɔ nɛ. Kule kayi ka mmle sikpile, kuofũ kasiɛkɔ di suoto loo sina kamɛ, kuɔkpɔnɔnfɔsa wo ku sikpile. Kuokpee ɔtɔ di nkpa loo sitũ ɔkyɛ kamɛ ku ɔtɔ wɔ kuofũ kuokyeko ni ɔtɔ wɔ nikofiɛ ni kunaa ni kaloo kamɛ.
59003007	Batii nfuo babɔkɛɛ biala ninkpe kobe ɔbla manyɔɔ, bakansiɛ ku babɔkɛɛ ba ninkpɔkɔ ni kaasɔ ku kɔkpaku di okle kamɛ. Nwaako kafɔɔ batii ntoofuo ma ɔbla bɛɛyɔɔ.
59003008	Kafɔɔ otii kuonwii diifuo ɔkplalomii ɔbla kuyɔɔ. Ɔkplalomii nkpe kobe, kuoyii pɔ ku sikpile ku adi ya ninlo ni otii.
59003009	Nnwu mun-yɔ muntansa Teete Yaa loo nɛ. Nnwu nwu kafɔɔ mun-yɔ munkpaani otii wɔ di Yaa lɛbla ni leetembi nɔɔ kanya nɛ.
59003010	Kanya nwu kanwii kamɛ diikusɛkusɛ ndie nii, nkanwu kamɛ kafɔɔ lɛɛkpaani ndie nɛ. Babiloo, dinaa alɛ ninte nkpo.
59003011	Ntu dibiɔ le nikɔtaa ni ntu mɛnɛfɛle yi, ninkple diataa mba ntu diibiɔ nwu ninwii kamɛ.
59003012	Babiloo, akpaloo dikumii dilaafuo nkũ kowoso abi otika. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di aketeku dilabafuo akpaloo otika nɛ. Nkpo oso yi, ntu dibiɔ le nintaa ni mba ntu yi, dilabafuo ntu mɛnɛfɛle okple ɔtaa.
59003013	Nse otii owo nsi ye kaamɛ akpe ninumbe ku lɛsɔnu yi, ni dikpe nii ɛɛwakosa suoto kasɔ, ɛɛbla asaa biene ɛɛyɔ eediki eetuo alɛ kubio akpe nimumbe.
59003014	Kafɔɔ nse ɔnumbɛbɛɛ kpile nsi ye siitu kamɛ yi, bionyu lete lee lɛlɛ yi, ni bitanlaa biatika di nwaako ɔlaa nwu nkpo suoto biakanta di ninumbe lee nwu nkpo suoto.
59003015	Ninumbe nwu nkpo okle diekye Yaa nfũ, kayi ka mmle kamɛ diekye, diɛkyɛ kafɔɔ di nkpa biene osuku suoto, anwuna kpile nfũ diekye.
59003016	Diekye nfũ di onumbɛbɛɛ nkpe nii, baatii kafɔɔ komiɛ alɛ lete lɛma lele ninlɛ yi, lɛsɔtannu ku asaa kpile ate ate ɔbla ninwɛ ninfa.
59003017	Kafɔɔ ninumbe le niekye ni Yaa nfũ yi, lɛkasale, diɛkpa. Ninwako atoko ɔkyɛ ole, nintɛ otu kaasɔ, ninnu sɛlaa nsɔ, dieyii pɔ ku nyaami ɔnya, nimbɔmbɔ lɛsaa biene ɔbla, ninkpee kasɛ baatii kamɛ, sɛlaa kuafunu kafɔɔ diesi nwɔ kaamɛ.
59003018	Batii ba ninlolaa ni batii ntɛɛ manta ni atoko ɔkyɛ ole yi, dite fɛ nkpa biene osiɛ kubi bɛɛpɛ.
59004001	Be ninwako kalɔ ku kakpɛ kaamɛ lee? Diekye di akɔnsɔklesaa kpile ya nikɔkpɛ ni kaamɛ lee obe lele.
59004002	Biomiɛ asaa kafɔɔ bilɔɔwɛ. Nkpo oso bielolaa suoto bilɛ biolo bawo, nkpo okle kafɔɔ biɔbɛbɛɛ anu baatii bamba asaa suoto bilɛ biofũ nya nɛ. Nkpo oso biɔlɔ minkpɛko bawo, kafɔɔ bilɔɔwɛ asaa nwu nkpo biomiɛ nii, diekye bilɔɔkaalɛ Yaa.
59004003	Nse biɛkaalɛ kafɔɔ minwɛ, diekye disibu le biɔyɔ minkaalɛ ni diɛlɛ. Minkaalɛ Yaa lɛsaa bilɛ biayɔ minkpee suoto lɛyɔɔ.
59004004	Bile batii ba ninambla ni asaa di Yaa osuku kanya. Sɛɛ bieye bilɛ otii wɔ nimbɔmbɔ ni kayi ka mmle asaa osie kanya ntookple Yaa lo? Otii lele nikɔbɔmbɔ kayi ka mmle ntookple Yaa lo.
59004005	Diele kasakasa oso di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Yaa nkpɛ sɛsɔfɔwo di Ninwuna nɔɔ le ninsi wo ni kaamɛ oso.”
59004006	Kafɔɔ Yaa sibualɛ se eele wo ni lɛtɛ sipɔ osie kanya. Fɛ mmle okle di Kɔkpana Klekle lebuɛ ni alɛ, “Yaa nintunako batii ba nintakatɛsa ni suoto katoo, kafɔɔ anle batii ba niɛwakosa ni suoto kasɔ sibualɛ.”
59004007	Nkpo oso biwakosa suoto kasɔ bita Yaa. Bieyila di Abonsam suoto, ni abatoso ye di ɔlɔɔkɔ.
59004008	Bikpukuti bikaako Yaa, di nnwɔɔ kafɔɔ akpukuti akaako ye. Aye bakpileblatɛ, bifoto nnɛɛ lee bidiki siikpile ɔbla kamɛ. Aye ba kafɔɔ diisibu lee lɛsɛ ni anyɔ, bikleklesa situ lee.
59004009	Bita dibuo ye suoto, biebuo sɛnyaami, biewi kaku. Bita sɛma lee sikple ye kaku owi, biɛta suoto lɛyɔɔ lee kafɔɔ dikple ye sɛyaami.
59004010	Biwakosa suoto kasɔ di Saate nwu anu, ni babatakatɛsa ye katoo.
59004011	Babiloo, bitansimbuɛ sɛlaa se ninansiɛko ni baawo suoto. Otii wɔ nimabuɛ ni ɔlaa wɔ ninansiɛko ni di owo nɔɔ wɔ niefũ eenu ni suoto ee ɛɛkanko nwɔ ni yi, ni atoobuɛ ɔlaa wɔ ninansiɛko ni kuufiofa nwu suoto ee ɛɛkanko kũ. Nse kufiofa nwu kafɔɔ fɛɛkanko yi, ni faasinle kufiofa nwu nkpo letɛ, ni kantɛ nikũ nfɛ fale.
59004012	Yaa lete ninle kufiofa kpeetɛ ku kantɛ. Lete nɔɔ ninfuo otii nkpa ɔta, anfuo otii kafɔɔ ɔwɔɔsa. Nkpo oso fanaa osuku alɛ fankanko owo lɛfɔ.
59004013	Nunua yi, binu! Aye ba nimbuɛ bilɛ, “Miɛ ee kɔsɛɛ bubakyɛ okpoo kplɛ munaasiɛ ninfa lɛlɛɛ ninwii, mumbla ɔkpɛ mummiɛ koto kpinwu.”
59004014	Kafɔɔ bieye kɔsɛɛ kale ka nimasɛ nii. Nkpo ninkpa lee nte fɛ kɔyɔ nɛ. Kunkyɔɔ di obe kakui kamɛ kunyɛ.
59004015	Nkpo oso nse biobuɛ ɔlaa fɛ nwɔ mmle okle yi, biabuɛ bilɛ, “Nse Yaa letuna, bubasiɛ nkpa mumbla lɛsaa le mmle ee nninkpo.”
59004016	Kafɔɔ nunua biɛtakatɛsa suoto katoo biɔkanta. Ɔkanta wɔ mmle okle kafɔɔ diɛlɛ.
59004017	Nkpo oso otii wɔ ninye ni lɛsaa biene ɔbla fiɛ anambla ni yi, okpile kule kutɔɔ.
59005001	Aye basaawɛntɛ, binu nfɛ. Biwi kaku ku sɛnyaami ta dibuo kplɛ le nikɔwa ye ni di suoto oso.
59005002	Lɛsaawɛ lee nwu nkpo ntɔɔtɔ, bakunsũ kafɔɔ ntoowee ye abula.
59005003	Koto sɛɛle lee ku kufututu ntɔɔpɛ kɔsanka. Kɔsanka nwu nkpo kodiki nintuo alɛ bitookpi lɛpɔɔ. Kɔsanka nwu nkpo kamawee ye suoto sina sinfĩfiɛ fɛ ɔtɔ. Diekye biesiisa lɛsaawɛ biɛtɛ ayi yɛntɛle ya mmle.
59005004	Binyu lo! Bakpɛmblatɛ ba biɛkpaa biesifiko ni afe lee, biesĩ bilɛ bilɔɔta ma ni ato yi, binu mmle batɔɔyɔ ni ɔlaa di suoto lee ku kaku. Bakpɛmblatɛ nwu nkpo kaku kafɔɔ ntoobuo di Yaa wɔ ninlenke ni atoko kamɛ.
59005005	Biole nkpa kaasɔ ka mmle suoto min-yɔ asaa ya niefũ ni kɔya minkpee suoto, suoto lɛyɔɔ obe lele. Biole alesaa kafɔɔ minsiɛ lɛla minta olo.
59005006	Bialo batii ba nintabla ni okpile lɛpɔɔ, bialo ma kafɔɔ. Batataka baayila ye di suoto kafɔɔ.
59005007	Nkpo oso babiloo, bitɛ situ kaasɔ buɛɛ dilaase di dii le di Saate nwu nkpo mawa ni. Binyu fekpɛntɛ ɛɛ! Antɛ otu kaasɔ buɛɛ ansoko kabiene ku kɔkyɛɛ kanto di obe wɔ oonyu osuku anta ni alesaa biene ya abawɛ ankyeko ni kofe nɔɔ kamɛ.
59005008	Nioso aye kafɔɔ bitɛ situ kaasɔ buɛɛ laakpanwu. Bitanta nnɛɛ lafee ye, diekye Saate nwu nkpo ɔwabee ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ.
59005009	Babiloo, bitankakatɛ baawo suoto, mmle okle di Yaa dilaakanko ye nii. Diekye kantɛ nwu nkpo ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ, nfɛ abakyɔɔ.
59005010	Babiloo, binyuma Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ ba niabuɛ nwɔ ni ɔlaa mmle okle baakpee ni situ di abuo lɛma amuu kamɛ, bita bale ɔtɛ onyu bata wo.
59005011	Munlɛɛ batii ba niakpee ni situ bulɛ dikusɛkusɛ batii. Bitoonu mmle okle di Hiob latɛ ni otu kaasɔ ku mmle okle di Yaa latɔɔ ni abiesaa nɔɔ kaayɛntɛlekɔ. Diekye Saate nwu leyii pɔ ku sifutulɛ ku nyaami ɔnya.
59005012	Babiloo, lɛsaa le niefĩ dilenke kɔtɔkɔ ye ni ninle alɛ, nse biobuɛ ɔlaa bilɛ bibabla lɛsaa yi, bitanlɛɛ lɛsalɛsaa, osi woo, kasɔ woo, ee lɛsaa bamba lewo. Nse ɔlaa wɔ foobuɛ ni nte nkpo yi, buɛ falɛ, “Yii,” nse kuote nkpo kafɔɔ, buɛ falɛ, “Oowo,” mmle okle di Yaa dilaalo fɔ ni lɛpɔɔ.
59005013	Nse otii owo kaamɛ lee nsi diibuo kamɛ yi, aapɛ ɔlaa ata Yaa. Nse suoto kɔyɔɔ otii owo kafɔɔ kaamɛ lee yi, aasa katansa sinu ata Yaa.
59005014	Nse otii owo nsi kaamɛ lee oofiɛ yi, aakpee balɛɛ bafũbanutɛ dikudi nwu nkpo batunletɛ batɔɔ, baabapɛ ɔlaa bata Yaa diisi nɔɔ, baafifia nwɔ nnɔnyi di suoto di Saate nwu leyooto kamɛ.
59005015	Ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta nwu nkpo bɛɛpɛ ni di ofũ onu kamɛ mata ofiɛ nwu nkpo nyɔɔ nwɔ. Saate nwu nkpo mata fiɛtɛ nwu nsie. Nse ɛɛbla okpile kafɔɔ, Yaa kamayɔ okpile nwu nkpo ankyɛ nwɔ.
59005016	Nkpo oso bidiki sikpile lee bitɔkɔ bawo, biɛpɛ ɔlaa bita Yaa baawo disi, mmle okle di Yaa mayɔɔsa ye ni sifiɛ. Otii wɔ ninte ni tinini di Yaa kamɛ ɔlaa ɔpɛ ɔta mbla sɛkpɛ kpi.
59005017	Elia yi, otii aale fɛ mmle okle di awo kafɔɔ bute nii. Aapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa osie kanya alɛ kanto atannɔɔ. Nwaako kafɔɔ kanto ditanɔɔ alɛɛ atiɛ ku awɛntɛ akuɔ.
59005018	Nni nkpo sɛmaa, aakple aapɛ ɔlaa aata Yaa kanto lakple aanɔɔ aakpete kaasɔ asaa lakple aalɛ.
59005019	-
59005020	Babiloo, nse otii owo kaamɛ lee lekple di ofũ onu nwu nkpo nkpaamaa, di onwii lee lekple ɛɛlaakpaa nwɔ ɛɛwako yi, ni atoodiki otii nwu nkpo nkpa eekyeko kukpi kamɛ. Binyuma nle mmle bilɛ, otii lele niediki kpileblatɛ eekyeko sikpile nɔɔ kamɛ, atɔɔta Yaa lɛyɔ otii nwu nkpo sikpile kpinwu ɛɛkyɛ nwɔ.
60001001	Ami, Petro, wɔ ninle ni Yesu Kristo tɔkyɛntɛ nikɔkpana kukũ ko mmle nta aye batii ba di Yaa lediki nii, biɛsamii fɛ bafɔɔ bikpe ni di Ponto ku Galatia ku Kapadokia ku Asia ku Bitinia nsɔ suoto.
60001002	Teete Yaa omu niediki ye di mmle okle di nnwɔɔ omu ɛɛtɛ ni kanya, ni Niinwuna Klekle lɛbla ye batii klekle alɛ biakyɔɔ Yesu Kristo atoko, alɛ aayɔ ntɔ nɔɔ anfoto ye suoto. Yaa ale ye sibualɛ, aata atoko ɔkyɛ ole disiɛko ye lɛɛpɔ kamɛ obe lele.
60001003	Bita bupɛ Yaa sɛfa, dile ni Saate loo Yesu Kristo Ote. Diekye ɛɛnya wo nyaami osie kanya ɛɛta wo nkpa fɔle di obe wɔ ɛɛsɛnkɛsa Yesu Kristo eekyeko ni bakpi kamɛ. Nle mmle nikotuo alɛ bukpe osuku onyu wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa nɛ.
60001004	Nioso buonyu osuku bulɛ bubawɛ dikusɛkusɛ kplɛ le di Yaa lelolaa ɛɛtɛ ɛɛta ni batii nɔɔ di osi. Dikusɛkusɛ nwu nkpo kafɔɔ ninlalaa ee nintɔ ee ninfiele.
60001005	Aye ba niefũ nwɔ bienu ni bɛɛyɔ Yaa osie beelolaa ye alɛ baata ye ni nkpa di dii yɛntɛle nwu nkpo suoto lele ninle dikusɛkusɛ nwu nkpo nɛ.
60001006	Binya suoto lɛyɔɔ di nle mmle suoto, kuntɛ di obe kakuii wɔ mmle kamɛ biɔnya dibuo ku ɔsɔ onyu ate ate.
60001007	Asaa ya mmle nimawa ye ni di suoto matuo mmle okle di ofũ onu lee nle ni ɔnwaa. Bia koto sɛɛle ko ninlalaa nii, ɔtɔ kamɛ manwa kũ fiɛ mantofo kũ lɛlɛ. Nioso ofũ onu lee wɔ niefũ ni kɔya kulenke ni koto sɛɛle yi, dikpe ni bɛɛsɔ nwu beenyu fiɛ babatofo alɛ ofũ onu nwaa kule, fiɛ di Yaa kamatansa ye, antakatɛsa ye katoo, ankpee ye dibu di dii le di Yesu Kristo makple anwa nii.
60001008	Diidii biinya Yesu, kafɔɔ mimbɔmbɔ nwɔ. Kuntɛ bilɔɔnyɔɔ nunua wɔ mmle, biefũ nwɔ bienu. Suoto lɛyɔɔ kafɔɔ leyii ye kamɛ pɔ manamafuo ni ɔyɔ ɔkaatɛɛsa ku lɛsalɛsaa.
60001009	Ta mmle okle biefũ nwɔ bienu ni oso, Yaa mata alɛ minwɛ didiki.
60001010	Didiki le mmle oso di Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ labuo di sɛlaa kamɛ, baawolaa sĩ kamɛ klekle baabuɛ baatɛ mmle okle di Yaa male wo ni sibualɛ.
60001011	Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nwu nkpo lakpee kɔnyaabe alɛ bootofo obe wɔ dibale ni ku mmle okle dibate nii, di obe wɔ di Kristo Ninwuna latika ma ni di suoto, baatoobuɛ baatɔɔtɛ dibuo le okle nimawa ni di Kristo suoto ku suoto lɛyɔɔ le abanya ni sɛɛmaa.
60001012	Yaa ladiki aatuo Yaa ɔlaa babuɛtɛtɛ nwu nkpo alɛ ɔkpɛ nwu nkpo baatɔɔbla nii, diele mma oso baatɔɔbla nwu, kafɔɔ aye oso baatɔɔbla di obe wɔ baabuɛ ni sɛlaa se bitoonu biekyeko ni batɔkyɛntɛ nɔɔ ba niayie ni ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya ku Ninwuna Klekle osie wɔ di Yaa lakyesee kuakye ni osi. Nle mmle nle asaa ya di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ bia lamiɛ alɛ boonu ni kasɔ fiɛ.
60001013	Nioso bilolaa suoto bita ɔkpɛ ɔbla. Biɛta anu lee ate kesekese, biesiɛ bitoonyu osuku di dikusɛkusɛ le di Yaa kamata ye ni di dii le di Yesu Kristo makple anwa ni.
60001014	Bikyɔɔ Yaa ɔlaa atoko, biediɛ nkpa kpile be kamɛ biasiɛ ni di obe wɔ minayikyi bifũ binu ni.
60001015	Kafɔɔ bite klekle di ɔsaabla lee biala kamɛ, fɛ mmle okle di Yaa wɔ niɛlɛɛ ye ni nte ni klekle.
60001016	Diekye Yaa lebuɛ Kɔɔkpana Klekle Kukũ kamɛ alɛ, “Bite klekle, diekye amii nte klekle.”
60001017	Nse biɔpɛ ɔlaa minta Yaa, minlɛɛ nwɔ bilɛ Teete. Binyuma kafɔɔ bilɛ, nnwɔɔ ninkanko otii biala di asaa ya ɛɛbla ni kanya, anannyu ni batii di anu. Nioso nkpa be niebu ye ni kaasɔ ka mmle suoto yi, bisiɛ mi bitɔɔ ku dibu.
60001018	Diekye biye bilɛ diele koto sɛɛle ee kufututu ko ninwɔɔ ni di Yaa lata diisi lee aadiki ye di bawa lee nkpakuu be baasiɛ baabuko ye ni kamɛ.
60001019	Kafɔɔ Kristo ntɔ be niefũ ni kɔya aata. Nnwɔɔ niate fɛ Lefosobi le niasiɛko ni di lɛsalɛsaa ditalalaa nwɔ ni di suoto nɛ.
60001020	Yaa ladiki nwɔ aase lete kofokofoko fiɛ bia aababla kayi. Ni aadiki nwɔ aatuo kayi di ayi yɛntɛle ya mmle kamɛ ta aye oso nɛ.
60001021	Diefe ni di suoto nɔɔ ni biefũ Yaa wɔ niatakatɛsɔɔ aakyeko ni bakpi kamɛ bienu nɛ. Ni ɛɛtɔɔ kasiɛkɔ ka niɛtaka katoo kalenke ni nɛ. Mmle okle di ofũ onu lee ku osuku onyu lee katika ni di Yaa suoto.
60001022	Di obe wɔ bitɔɔkyɔɔ ni nwaako ɔlaa nɔɔ nwu nkpo atoko, bitɔɔbla ni suoto klekle bitootuna bilɛ biɔbɔmbɔ ni bafũbanutɛ bamba, dikpe nii, biɛbɔmbɔ bawo di otu biene kamɛ.
60001023	Diekye bitɔɔwɛ lelofo fɔle. Nkpa fɔle be mmle kafɔɔ diekye lɛsaa le ninkpi ni kamɛ, kafɔɔ diekye lɛsaa le ninankpi ni kamɛ. Biɛwɛ lelofo fɔle le mmle di Yaa ɔlaa wɔ ninkpe ni nkpa kunaa ni kaloo kamɛ.
60001024	Fɛ mmle okle di Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ ni alɛ, “Batii bamuu nte fɛ ɔfa. Sɛlɛ lɛma kafɔɔ ntɛ fɛ atoto. Ɔfa nwu nkpo nyɔɔ, atoto nwu kafɔɔ nkpa.
60001025	Kafɔɔ Yaa ɔlaa nwu, kunaa kaloo.” Ɔlaa wɔ mmle ninle ɔlaa biene wɔ lɛkya baayie baata ye ni nɛ.
60002001	Nkpo oso bidiɛ sikpile simuu ɔbla. Biediɛ sɛlaa kuafũnu, anu anu sɛsaabla, onumbɛbɛɛ ku batii ayooto ɔkpɔnɔnfɔsa.
60002002	Fɛ mmle okle di babifɔɔle mmiɛ ni nnyɛɛ ntu yi, bita Yaa ɔlaa nwu mananlɔ ni lɛsalɛsaa kuklee ye ɔkɔnsɔ osie kanya. Alɛ biamuɔ diidiki lee kamɛ.
60002003	Diekye aye bamu bitoowolaa kamɛ bietofo mmle okle di Saate sifutulɛ nlɛ nii.
60002004	Biwa Saate nfũ. Diekye nnwɔɔ ninle difuɔ le ninkpe ni nkpa di kayi batii lesĩ alɛ diefũ ni kɔya nɛ. Kafɔɔ nnwɔɔ ninle difuɔ le di Yaa lediki alɛ dile ni difuɔ le niefũ ni kɔya nɛ.
60002005	Bite fɛ afuɔ ya ninkpe ni nkpa. Nkpo oso biyɔ suoto lee bitofo ninwuna olekatakɔ ka kamɛ bibale ni olebatatɛ ba nimayɔ ninwuna kamɛ oleɔta asaa ya niesiɛko ni minta ni Yaa diefe ni di Yesu Kristo suoto.
60002006	Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Lediki difuɔ le niefũ ni kɔya, nle mayɔ nse ni di Sion fɛ leyokɔ difuɔ, otii lele niefũ nwɔ eenu, sinunsɔ dilabakpɛ nwɔ diidii.”
60002007	Difuɔ le mmle lefũ kɔya osie kanya diɛta aye ba niefũ nwɔ bienu nii. Kafɔɔ mba ninanfũ nwɔ banu nii, dile, “Difuɔ le di bayotofotɛ lesĩ nii, kafɔɔ dibakple difuɔ le nfɛ niefũ kɔya dilenke ni amuu.”
60002008	Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lɛba bamba lekple diebuɛ alɛ, “Difuɔ le mmle mata batii ntuula, difuɔkpaa le mmle nimata ma mannɔɔ nɛ.” Baatuula, diekye baasĩ ɔlaa nwu nkpo ofũ onu. Nkpo di Yaa lɛtɛ alɛ dibawa ma di suoto nɛ.
60002009	Kafɔɔ aye ninle batii ba di Yaa lediki ni olebatatɛ ba nintansa ni Yaa wɔ ninle ni Ɔka, ku batii klekle ba di Yaa lɛlɛɛ alɛ bale nwɔ ni bale. Eediki ye eekyeko ditunu kamɛ ɛɛwako lɛkpa nɔɔ le niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ kamɛ, alɛ biayie ɔsaabla nɔɔ wɔ niɛbla ni ɔkpɛ lɛkya.
60002010	Di obe wɔ nintabafe ni, bitale Yaa batii, kafɔɔ nunua bitɔbakple nwɔ bale. Di obe wɔ nintabafe nii, Yaa ditanya ye nyaami, kafɔɔ nunua, atɔɔnya ye nyaami.
60002011	Babiloo bɔmbɔtɛ, ote bite fɛ bafɔɔ ku osuku bakyɛntɛ kaasɔ ka mmle suoto. Nioso kotikite ye lekoto nlɛ, biatoso suoto sina akɔnsɔkleesaa kpile ya nikɔkpɛko ye ni obe lele.
60002012	Bisiɛ nkpa biene di batii ba ninanfũ banu ni kamɛ ka bisi ni, alɛ nse bia bɛɛkakatɛ di suoto lee alɛ bakpileblatɛ bile yi, sɛmaa, baanya ɔkpɛ biene wɔ biɛbla nii, alɛ baatansa Yaa di Lɛkankoyi nwu nkpo suoto.
60002013	Ta Saate nwu nkpo oso yi, biwakosa suoto kasɔ bita kale batunletɛ bamuu ku Ɔka Kplɛ wɔ di osie nsi di nnɛɛ kamɛ dilenke ni.
60002014	Biwakosa suoto kasɔ kafɔɔ laakpanwu bita abaa banɔɔfotii ba di Ɔka Kplɛ nkpee alɛ baananfi ni asaa kpile bablatɛ kootoko, antansa ni batii ba kafɔɔ nimbla ni asaa di osuku kanya.
60002015	Diekye Yaa komiɛ alɛ dibiene lee ɔbla kata alɛ, babuutɛ ba ninanye ni lɛsalɛsaa dilaawɛ ɔlaa kuonwii babuɛ di suoto lee.
60002016	Bisiɛ nkpa fɛ batii ba ninsiko ni suoto. Kafɔɔ bitanta suoto osiɛko lee nwu nkpo lata ye osuku biabla okpile. Kafɔɔ bisiɛ nkpa fɛ Yaa bakpɛmblatɛ.
60002017	Bibu batii bamuu. Biɛbɔmbɔ bafũbanutɛ wo lee bamuu. Biɛyɛkɛ Yaa. Biebu kafɔɔ Ɔka Kplɛ.
60002018	Aye bakpɛmblatɛ, biwakosa suoto kasɔ bita basaate lee, biebu ma kafɔɔ nwaa. Diele basaate ba ninnya ye ni nyaami, mambɔmbɔ ye ni lete biabu, kafɔɔ ku mba nimbla ye ni asi osie.
60002019	Diekye nse otii owo lekpee otu eefe diibuo le ninankaatɛ ni baatii nnɛɛ kamɛ ta Yaa oso yi, Yaa mawii nwɔ lɛyɔɔ.
60002020	Kafɔɔ nse bɛɛnanfi fɔ kootoko di okpile wɔ fɛɛbla ni suoto, feekpe otu feefe kaamɛ, kamɛntansa ninsi kaamɛ? Kafɔɔ nse feekpee otu diebuo fɔ di lɛsaa biene ɔbla kamɛ yi, Yaa kamawii fɔ lɛyɔɔ.
60002021	Nle mmle oso di Yaa lɛlɛɛ ye nɛ. Diekye Kristo omu lafe diibuo kamɛ aakpi diisi lee aadiɛ ɔtɛ onyu aatɛ ye alɛ biakyɛ di nnafukpaa nɔɔ suoto.
60002022	“Diidii atabla okpile kuonwii, atalaa kafɔɔ aata otii kuonwii.”
60002023	Batii latufa nwɔ, kafɔɔ, atatufa aakyisa. Obe wɔ baatootuo nwɔ ni dibuo, atafunaa kuonwii. Kafɔɔ aayɔ lɛsaa biala aata Yaa wɔ ninka, andiki ni lɛbɛ ku lɛpɔɔ.
60002024	Kristo omu niafũ wo sikpile aatika di suoto, aasifiko kowoso suoto, aalaakpi. Aabla nle mmle alɛ buadie di sikpile kamɛ munsiɛ nkpa be ninte ni tinini diobuo ni Yaa anu. Ninnkɔ nɔɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ kafɔɔ di Yaa lata ye lɛfabla.
60002025	Saa yi, biasiɛ nkpa fɛ bafoso ba niayu ni osuku. Kafɔɔ nunua yi, Yaa ntookplesa ye ɛɛwako otii wɔ ninle ni batii kpatɛ ku batii nyuntɛ nfũ.
60003001	Aye basantɛ kafɔɔ, dikpe nii biɛwakosa suoto kasɔ biɛta basa lee, alɛ nkpa lee biene osiɛ kata alɛ nse bawo diikyi yi, baakyi manfũ Yaa mannu. Ni dilabasinfĩ alɛ aye biabɛ kanya mintɔkɔ ma ɔlaa kuonwii,
60003002	diekye basa lee bamu manya mmle okle di nkpa biene lee nwu nlɛ ni di suoto kasɔ ɔwakosa nwu kamɛ.
60003003	Bitan-yɔ suoto sina akleesaa biatuo sekpeele lee, fɛle asi ɔbla sikitii ku sika anyɛnɛ okpee ku abula ya niefũ ni kɔya oklee.
60003004	Kafɔɔ bita sekpeele lee dikye suoto omufũ oklee ku nkpa buɛɛ osiɛ kamɛ. Sekpeele se mmle ninlalaa diidii, diefũ kɔya kafɔɔ osie kanya di Yaa anu.
60003005	Diekye saa, basanko klekle ba niayɔ suoto lɛma baata ni Yaa yi, baadiki sekpeele lɛma baatuo di suoto kasɔ ɔwakosa ɔta basa lɛma.
60003006	Sara kafɔɔ labla nkpo, diekye aawakosa suoto kasɔ aata Abraham, ni aalɛɛ nwɔ alɛ, “Saate nii nɛ.” Nioso Sara babi sankobi nfɛ bile, nse biɛbla asaa di osuku kanya minanyɛkɛ lɛsalɛsaa.
60003007	Aye basuɔtɔ kafɔɔ, dikpe nii biɛta lɛsɔnu lesiɛ minko basɔfɔ lee ntɛɛ, diekye bale batii ba ninnaa ni ɔnyɛɛ fɛ sele ye. Biyɔ dibu bita ma, diekye minko ma di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ alɛ abayɔ nkpa be ninnaa ni kaloo anta. Nse biɛbla nle mmle, biɛpɛ ɔlaa biɛta Yaa yi, alabasĩ onu.
60003008	Kayɛntɛ nii, bita bamuu lee disibu dibla ninwii. Biɛta otii ɔlaa kukpɛ ye nyaami. Biɛbɔmbɔ bawo fɛ babilɛma. Biɛbla sifutulɛ bita bawo. Biɛwakosa suoto kasɔ kafɔɔ bita bawo.
60003009	Bitan-yɔ okpile biata mba niɛbla ye ni okpile koto, ee biatufa mba nietufa ye nii biakyisa. Di nle mmle ɔbla kanya yi, bikaalɛ dikusɛkusɛ bita ma. Diekye dikusɛkusɛ di Yaa labuɛ aatɛ alɛ abata ye di obe wɔ aalɛɛ ye nii.
60003010	Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle lebuɛ alɛ, “Otii lele nikomiɛ alɛ asiɛ nkpa diɛmɛnɛmɛnɛ nwɔ, oomiɛ kafɔɔ alɛ suoto sitɔɔyɔɔ nwɔ di nkpa nɔɔ ayi kamɛ yi, ni atanta ɔlaa kpile kuonwii ladie nwɔ kaanya kamɛ, atanlaa sɛlaa kuafunu kafɔɔ.
60003011	Dikpe nii andiɛ sikpile ɔbla ambla dibiene, anwolaa atoko ɔkyɛ ole, antikanko nwu ku otu nɔɔ omuu.
60003012	Diekye Saate anu ntika di batii ba ninte ni tinini suoto, annu ma kafɔɔ lɛlɛɛ nse bɛɛlɛɛ nwɔ. Kafɔɔ mba nimbla ni sikpile ankpɛko ma.”
60003013	Nse biekpee okyiini di lɛsaa biene ɔbla suoto, owe nimayila ye di suoto?
60003014	Kafɔɔ bia nse diebuo ye di lɛsaa biene ɔbla suoto yi, suoto lɛyɔɔ dile dita ye. Bitanyɛkɛ otii kuonwii, bitanta situ lee kafɔɔ latũkũ.
60003015	Kafɔɔ di nle mmle kanya yi, biyɔ dibu bita Kristo fɛ Saate lee di situ lee kamɛ. Obe lele bilolaa suoto bilɛ biadiki otii lele niɛkaalɛ ye ɔlaa kanya di osuku onyu wɔ ninkpe ni suoto.
60003016	Kafɔɔ bibla nle mmle di suoto ɔtɛ kaasɔ ku dibu. Bita situ lee se nintɔkɔ ye ni ɔlaa kamɛ sikpa, alɛ nse beetufa ye yi, sinunsɔ kakpɛ batii ba niebuɛ sɛlaa kpile beekyeko ni nkpa biene be ninkpe ye ni suoto di onwii lee ɔbla ku Kristo.
60003017	Dilɛ dilenke alɛ diabuo ye diibiene ɔbla suoto nse Yaa dibiesaa dile, alɛ diabuo ye di okpile ɔbla suoto.
60003018	Diekye Kristo kafɔɔ lakpi ninwii pɛ di batii sikpile disi di ayi amuu kanya. Nu aale otii wɔ niate ni tinini yi, aakpi di batii ba ninante ni tinini disi alɛ aafuo awo ku Yaa ntɛɛ ololaa. Baalo nwɔ di suoto sina kamɛ, kafɔɔ diafe ni di Yaa Ninwuna kamɛ, aakplesɔɔ aawako nkpa kamɛ.
60003019	Ninwuna kamɛ aakyɛ aalaayie Yaa ɔlaa nwu lɛkya aata anwuna ya baasɛɛ baakpee ni baakpi kamɛ.
60003020	Anwuna nwu nkpo ninle batii ba di Yaa lawɛ otu aata ni baasĩ nwɔ ni atoko ɔkyɔɔ di obe wɔ di Noa latoowla ni oklo kplɛ nwu nkpo nɛ. Batii basɛɛ ba niawo ni banɛ lete niawɛ didiki di ntu nwu nkpo ditayɔ nii.
60003021	Ntu nwu nkpo niayii nii nte fɛ Yaa ntu okpeesa wɔ nikodiki ye nii, diekye Yesu Kristo lataka aakye di bakpi kamɛ. Diele alɛ kunusũ ofoto di otii suoto dile, kafɔɔ ntam ɔka dile diɛta Yaa di otii otu biene kamɛ alɛ abatikanko nwɔ.
60003022	Nunua Kristo ntoosifi osi asi di Yaa oletanɛɛkyɛ, oole sɛka di Yaa batɔkyɛntɛ ku situmi se ninkpe ni di osi ku basiɛntɛ suoto.
60004001	Nioso obe wɔ di Kristo lafe ni diibuo kamɛ fɛ otii oso yi, ayee bita disibu nwu nkpo okle diwɛ ye fɛ nnwɔɔ, biɛyɔ bikpee suoto osie. Diekye otii wɔ nikonu ni dibuo di suoto sina kamɛ ninsimbla okpile.
60004002	Nioso diɛyɔ di nunua diesifi nii, dikpe nii biesiɛ nkpa lee bule kaasɔ ka mmle suoto di Yaa dibiesaa suoto. Diesinle di batii akɔnsɔkleesaa suoto.
60004003	Saa yi, bialalaasa obe kpinwu biabla asaa ya baatii ba ninanfũ banu ni mbla nii. Biakpi lɛpɔɔ di basiɛwo kpile otikanko ku lɛsɔnɔkpee ku batii akɔnsɔkleesaa kpile otikanko ku lɛtansiɛ ku ole pokyoa ku afiɔ ɔtɔ wɔ ninankyɛ ni di osuku kuonwii suoto.
60004004	Di obe wɔ minansimbla ni onwii ku mma bilɛ biokple mintɔɔbla ni asaakuu nwu nkpo oso, diɛbla ma ɔkpɛ, nkpo oso bootufa ye nɛ.
60004005	Kafɔɔ bɔɔwa suoto kanya obadiki di Yaa wɔ nielolaa suoto abakanko ni batiinyu ku bakpi di asaa nwu nkpo ɔbla suoto.
60004006	Nkpo oso di Kristo labuɛ ɔlaa biene nwu nkpo aata bakpi kafɔɔ nɛ. Nu di Yaa lakanko ma siitiinyu fɛ mmle okle ankanko ni batii bamuu, Kristo latɔkɔ ma ɔlaa biene nwu alɛ baasiɛ nkpa di Ninwuna kamɛ fɛ mmle okle di Yaa nsi nii.
60004007	Asaa amuu kaloo ntɔɔtɛɛtɛɛ. Nkpo oso bimufũ suoto, biɛta anu lee ate kesekese, mmle okle biafuo ni ɔlaa ɔtɔɔpɛ.
60004008	Lɛsaa le niefĩ dilenke ni ninle alɛ biabɔmbɔ bawo osie kanya. Diekye lɛbɔmbɔ nta alɛ batii n-yɔ bawo lɛma sikpile kpinwu mankyɛ.
60004009	Nse onwii lee lebuo owo nɔɔ kɔfɔɔ yi, afũ nwɔ, atankakatɛ nwɔ di suoto.
60004010	Diekye obiala lee lefũ lɛtasaa finle lewo eekyeko Yaa nfũ. Nioso fɛ basaanyuntɛ biene yi, biyɔ atasaa lee nwu nkpo bikyakaako bawo.
60004011	Otii lele ninyie ɔlaa biene nwu lɛkya yi, ayie nwu fɛ mmle okle di Yaa lekpee nwɔ ni. Otii lele kafɔɔ ninkyakaako batii yi, ayɔ osie wɔ di Yaa lɛtɔɔ ni akyakaako ma, alɛ baatansa Yaa lɛɛsaa biala kamɛ diefe ni di Yesu Kristo suoto. Nnwɔɔ lele ninle katansa ku osie dinaa ni kaloo. Diwa kaanya.
60004012	Babiloo bɔmbɔtɛ, bitanta diabla ye ɔkpɛ di abuo ya kplɛ biɔnya ni suoto di ɔsɔ onyu kamɛ. Bitanta diate ye fɛle lɛsaa le minoonyu osuku bita ni nikɔwa ye di suoto.
60004013	Kafɔɔ bita suoto siyɔɔ ye alɛ aye kafɔɔ biɔnya dibuo fɛ Kristo okle. Diekye suoto kamayɔɔ ye mimpɔ osie kanya di obe wɔ abakple anwa ni di lɛkpa nɔɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ.
60004014	Bita suoto siyɔɔ ye nse batii letufa ye ta bile ni Kristo batikankotɛ oso. Diekye Ninwuna kpale le, ninle ni Yaa Ninwuna ntika ye di suoto.
60004015	Bitanta kuonwii kaamɛ lee lanya dibuo fɛ batii lotɛ ee yu ee saalalaasatɛ ee kubuɛ kpeetɛ.
60004016	Kafɔɔ nse onwii kaamɛ lee kɔnya dibuo ta ale ni Kristo ole oso yi, atanta sinunsɔ lakpɛ nwɔ, kafɔɔ apɛ Yaa sɛfa alɛ Kristo leyooto ntika nwɔ di suoto.
60004017	Obe ntoowo alɛ Yaa kakye lɛkanko kasɔ, batii nɔɔ bamu kafɔɔ ninle batii kasale ba abakanko nii. Ni nse abakye lɛkanko nwu kasɔ kaamɛ loo, ni be nimawa di batii ba ninanfũ ɔlaa biene nɔɔ nwu nkpo banu ni suoto?
60004018	Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Nse dibawɛ osie fiɛ baatii biene kamawɛ didiki mɔ, ni lɛ dibate ninta batii ba ninanyɛkɛ ni Yaa ku bakpileblatɛ?”
60004019	Nkpo oso, batii ba nikɔnya ni dibuo ta Yaa dibiesaa dile dita ma ni yi, batɔɔbla lɛsaa biene, baayɔ suoto lɛma bakpee di blatɛ lɛma nnɛɛ kamɛ, nwɔ nimbla ni di ɔlaa nɔɔ suoto obe lele.
60005001	Nunua ami fɛ bafũbanutɛ tunletɛ yi, kɔka aye ba ninle ni batunletɛ di bafũbanutɛ dikudi nwu nkpo kamɛ. Ami omu lanya mmle okle di Kristo lanya ni dibuo. Nse eekple ɛɛwa yi, kamawɛ kalekɔ di lɛkpa nɔɔ nwu nkpo kamɛ. Kotikiti ye lekoto nlɛ,
60005002	bilolaa Yaa batii ba ɛɛyɔ eekpee ye ni ninnɛɛ kamɛ binyu nwaa fɛ mmle okle di baafosokpatɛ nnyu ni bafoso nɔɔ. Bitanta diabla fɛ onyinka boonyinka ye, kafɔɔ bibla ɔkpɛ nwu ku otu biene. Diekye nkpo okle di Yaa komiɛ ankyeko ɔkyɛ lee nɛ. Bitan-yɔ ɔkpɛ nwu nkpo biabla fɛle lɛsaawɛ lee kamiɛkɔ, kafɔɔ bidiki kafutu lee kamɛ bibla nwu.
60005003	Bitambla bilɛ biole sɛsaate di batii ba di Yaa lɛyɔ eekpee ye ni ninnɛɛ kamɛ, kafɔɔ bile ɔtɛ onyu bita ma di nkpa lee disiɛbi kamɛ.
60005004	Alɛ nse bafosokpatɛ nɔɔfo nwu ninle ni Kristo lɛbawa yi, abata ye lɛkakoto le nikɔkpa ni, ninanfiele nii.
60005005	Nkpo okle kafɔɔ dikpe nii aye bakosopo biɛwakosa suoto kasɔ biɛta bafũbanutɛ batunletɛ nɛ. Bamuu lee biwokosa suoto kasɔ bita bawo. Diekye Kɔkpana Klekle Kukũ lebuɛ alɛ, “Yaa kotĩi batii ba nintakatɛsa ni suoto katoo osuku. Kafɔɔ anle batii ba niɛwakosa ni suoto kasɔ sibualɛ.”
60005006	Nkpo oso biwakosa suoto kasɔ di Yaa kɔnɛɛ siene kalɔ, alɛ aatakatɛsa ye katoo di nnwɔɔ omu nɔɔ obe biene kamɛ.
60005007	Biyɔ ahaa le amuu bikpee di Yaa nnɛɛ kamɛ, diekye obe lele oobu ye disi.
60005008	Bimufũ suoto biɛta anu lee ate kesekese! Diekye kyiditɛ lee Abonsam kokyi katoo ku kala, fɛ kyata wɔ nikokumii nii, oomiɛ otii wɔ aamufũ anwee nii.
60005009	Biwɛ osie di ofũ onu lee kamɛ bietĩi nwɔ osuku, diekye biye bilɛ bafũbanutɛ wo lee kaayi ka mmle kamuu kamɛ kofe di abuo ya mmle okle kamɛ.
60005010	Kafɔɔ nse ditoobuo ye di obe kakui sɛmaa, Yaa wɔ ninkpe ni sifutulɛ, ɛɛlɛɛ ye alɛ biawa mimawɛ ni kalekɔ di lɛkpa nɔɔ le ninnaa ni kaloo, diefe ni di onwii lee ɔbla di Kristo kamɛ mabla ye minwo, anse ye sidu, ankpee ye osie, anse ye di lɛsɔse nwaa suoto.
60005011	Osie omuu ninle nwɔ ole dinaa ni kaloo. Diwa kaanya.
60005012	Obiloo Silvano wɔ ninle ni kpɛmblatɛwo nii biene niɛkyakaakoe lɛkpana ye kukũ ko mmle kakui. Kɔkpana kũ nkpee ye osie ntɔkɔ ye kafɔɔ nlɛ nwaako, Yaa sibualɛ simu ninle nse mmle nɛ. Bimufũ nwu biklee osie kanya.
60005013	Bafũbanutɛ wo lee ba di Yaa lediki ni di Babilon kasɔ suoto kɔsɛɛsa ye. Nkpo okle kafɔɔ di obi nii Marko kafɔɔ alɛ ɔɔsɛɛsa ye biene biene nɛ.
60005014	Bisɛɛsa bawo ku atuu ɔbla di Yaa lɛbɔmbɛ kamɛ. Atoko ɔkyɛ ole disiɛko bamuu lee ba niɛbla ni onwii ku Kristo.
